In other words a towel dispenser is virtually useless apart from giving the roll a place to reside without falling over.. So I am going to go back to my Bounty paper towels that may not be as "good" but are far friendlier and easier to use at least in my case.

review_title: Viva is the only towel purchase!
review_body: I love the softness and how strong Viva paper towels are. These are the soft, smooth towels. I don't care if there are patterns on my paper towels; I buy Viva for the quality and have very never purchased a brand that has the quality Viva has. I used these when I do my walks for everything from tissues when I have a cold to help me feel cool when I perspire. We have them, not just in the kitchen, but in both bathrooms and the laundry room.. They are great when used for cleaning mirrors or windows, wiping off the bathroom sink after cleaning it, as well as the toilet. They have wonderful capacity for cleaning up spills.They are great when used with furniture polish.You can't beat the overall us of these paper towls.

review_title: Very soft, but hard to get a sheet ripped off.
review_body: The paper towel itself is quite nice, very soft and cloth like. However, the biggest downfall and my reason for not repurchasing is that it "sticks" together and therefore you cannot pull one sheet off one-handed. I have two young girls (1 and 3 years old), so being able to grab a sheet of paper towel and ripping it off one handed is a must (and a deal breaker if not achievable). My girls have a pretty hard time getting a sheet and just end up tearing little pieces off, making a mess. You literally have to hold the roll with one hand, then separate the sheet from the roll with the other while pulling down. I wish these were more convenient as (like I said above) they feel quite nice. If you dont need to rip paper towel off one handed, then these would be great! Maybe when my girls are older and I don't constantly have a little one on my hip, I can try these again.

review_title: Not as big as they use to be but work well.
review_body: I am not typically one to use one specific brand of paper towels.  I tend to go with whatever the best deal is at the time.  I have recently used the Sparkle brand as they usually are reasonably priced and decent quality, although this time around, the Viva towels were cheaper at around a dollar per big roll.  These are select a sheet style and are decent quality and durable. They also clean and absorb well.  Like the Sparkle brand though, the big rolls aren't not as big as I would expect them to be and not the size big rolls used to be a few years ago.  The big rolls are almost the same size as what standard rolls use to be.. 4 stars

review_title: We've loved these Viva 'like cloth' napkins for about 8 years
review_body: We've loved these Viva 'like cloth' napkins for about 8 years and have preferred them over others all that time. We were both moaning when I accidentally bought a case of the 'Viva scrubs' paper towels, as they're not at all like cloth. So, since we're finally through those, I looked especially for 'like cloth'. I'm not sure if it's because they're 'Choose-a-Sheet' or because they changed the structure, but they're slightly thinner and courser than they were (we had some of the former 'like cloth' to compare them to). So, they get 4 instead of 5 stars from us now. However, they're still pretty nice. Unless we discover better, we'll be sticking with them.

review_title: 3 years of using Viva paper towels makes it hard to switch to anything else
review_body: I've never really been a fan of using paper towels. I've tried to stick to washable towels and try to refrain from using paper, but there are plenty of times that they come in handy. It's been 3 years of sticking to Viva, after trying different big brand paper towels before that. Besides the durability, convenience of the choose-a-sheet indentations, and absorbency, the other reason I've stuck to viva is it's softness. Paper towels aren't meant to be soft, they are meant to be tough and able to clean well. Viva does that, but as a bonus is on the soft side. Since Viva is brought to you by the makers of Kleenex, I can understand why. The best paper towel I've used so far, highly recommended.

review_title: Towels stick together. Have to peel them off the roll.
review_body: I don't know what they did to Viva, but these paper towels are useless. The sheets stick to each other and have to be peeled off of the roll. They do not absorb. They merely spread the water around. Don't bother attempting to wipe down your faucet, stove, tile or anything else that shines, because these towels leave water streaks on everything. Need to clean up a spill? Get a cloth unless you want to use half a roll of Viva, and even then, the surface will still be damp. Along with having to peel each sheet off of the roll, nearly half of the sheets tear as your peeling. I bought a full case. What a huge waste of money. Never again.

I recall when I first used Viva and was taken aback by how cloth-like they were. They seemed dramatically more luxurious than the other brands we have used.  Sometime later one of my daughters arrived for breakfast and commented "what is up with these paper towels? They are amazing!" When my younger daughter came for breakfast several minutes later she also noticed the feel of these and said "are these the kind of paper towels super rich people use?" And no, I don't normally make them use sandpaper!  Viva are a really nice substitute for table napkins.

**Update - 16 months later  ** We purchased another SafeRest cover just a couple months after our first purchase so we would have an extra for those middle of the night seizures. These covers have been an absolute dream. I throw them in the washing machine on a normal cycle and they go straight in the dryer and they come out looking brand new. We have never had any leaks. Our brand new mattress has maintained its lovely white color even after a full year and a half of seizure activity. When my parents bought their new bed I immediately recommended a SafeRest cover to protect the mattress from my Dad's sweatiness while he sleeps.. The very best thing about these covers is no one knows there IS a cover on our bed. There is no crinkly sounds or rubber feeling. My husband doesn't feel like he is sleeping on a hospital bed cover and I don't need to worry that I'm one seizure away from ruining a $2,000 mattress.. I'm an epileptic and during a seizure accidents happen. I was beyond tired of worrying about our brand new mattress, so I purchased the best rated cover I could find. All I can say is that it works. Our mattress has remained spotless and I have the peace of mind knowing after a seizure I don't need to rush to rescue soiled bedding.

review_title: Peace of Mind & Silent - What More Do You Need?
review_body: Purchased this as a "better late than never" after one of our cats urinated on our bed, soaking through to the mattress, which we didn't discover until we were exhaustedly going to bed at 11:30pm, ugh. Thank goodness for air mattresses! After telling friends about what happened, they all suggested we get a waterproof mattress cover, explaining they'd come a long way since grandma's plastic wrapped days. I went with this cover because of the high ratings and am very happy! It arrived a day early so I had time to wash it before putting it on the mattress (which was still drying from the steam cleaning) and saw the water beading off of the inner liner when I put it into the washer as it filled with water, so that made me feel confident. I have not otherwise tested the waterproof-ness of the cover. It washed easily with a set of sheets (queen size) in a regular sized washing machine and dried in the dryer alongside the sheets. It did need a little extra time in the dryer after the sheets were dried, but it didn't take much longer. It's crinkle free, no plastic rustling or crinkling sounds when you touch it, which was honestly my biggest concern. Little noises really irritate me but thankfully this is silent! It fit my mattress easily with plenty of depth and is thin enough that my regular mattress pad still fit over it, as well as sheets without any problem. I'm very happy with this mattress cover, hopefully it won't ever be necessary again, but it was a painless $30 to spend on peace of mind vs. the cost of the mattress steam cleaning, buying enzyme cleaner, sleeping on an air mattress for 5 days and the elbow work and sniff testing the mattress to make sure it was cat-pee-free. Knowing that the worst case scenario of this happening again is just a few loads of laundry to clean bedding is very relieving.

After I read the reviews I went ahead and purchased the mattress protector because the price was right, most of the reviews were positive, and I was purchasing for my personal bed so I only needed minimal to moderate waterproof protection, BUT BOY WAS I SURPRISED when only 3 months after purchasing my son was sick and slept in my bed. After fluid being released from every orfice the protector WAS WATERPROOF! I followed all of the directions, everything cleaned up and off, no leakage, and here it is back on the bed in perfect condition!

review_title: I purchased three in different sizes.
review_body: I am currently a caregiver for a 76 year old man diagnosed with Lewy Bodies Dementia. He is my husband. Our lives changed when he shattered his hip some months back. An illness that was in the background was suddenly in the FOREGROUND. In fact, his diagnosis was changed from Parkinson's to Lewy Bodies. Prior to his fall he had never had any continence issues, but after two months in a nursing rehab center he came home with issues. And many of the new medications they have been trying on him have side effects dealing with continence.  I ordered Two extra long Twin sized mattress pads for his hospital bed and I use them both, making his bed up in layers so that if he has an accident at night I can peal off a pad, sheet, and mattress pad and the bed is already made up underneath.  I also ordered a queen sized pad to put on our bed over our regular mattress pad--for insurance, I suppose. I think the quality of this pad is excellent. It seems to wash and dry quite well. It is soft too. One night when we had gone through several layers and the only thing left was this mattress pad I just added a top sheet and fresh blanket to get us to morning--too difficult to try to move him to put on a fitted sheet. He didn't even notice.  It is a good mattress pad. If I could change anything I would perhaps have them make the SIDES of the mattress pad waterproof as well. Ol' Maximum Damage Max has managed on several occasions to spill down the side of the bed. Sheesh.

review_title: Perfect for potty training at night
review_body: I purchased this brand a while back as just a mattress protector for my daughters bed. Recently we have moved away from diapers at night and have had a few accidents and this has been a lifesaver; liquids never soak down to the mattress.  I am back to buy another to double wrap the bed to make changing sheets at night easier on myself; it absolutely does not need double wrapping to protect your mattress.  This also washes and drys extremely well and does not make that horrible crinkle sound that you get with plastic sheets.  I would highly recommend as a regular mattress cover but especially if you have pets or kids that are potty training.

review_title: This is really good. I’ve never had a mattress protector before but ...
review_body: This is really good. I’ve never had a mattress protector before but I did research before buying this and read it doesn’t feel odd. I can’t feel anything different as far as sleeping on plastic and I never notice it. I gave it 4 stars because although it’s fine, I have been sweating a little at night. We did just purchase a memory foam mattress too, so it might be that, but it’s nothing more than taking the blanket off when I start to sweat. Overall, I would purchase it again.. * I hope my review was helpful in your decision.
Nice protector! Does just what I needed. Deep pockets for the thicker mattresses, and it stays on well.. I really like this product. Reasonably priced, too.

review_title: Will save your mattress from pet pee
review_body: 6/27/2016. *Update*. I woke up this morning to a puddle of fresh cat pee on the bed. Thankfully this protector was on the mattress so all I had to do was soak up the spot with Nature's Miracle and throw the sheets and this in the wash. NO mess. Drying does take longer because you have to use low heat, but overall this is waterproof and kept my mattress free of cat pee this morning.. Just thought I'd share.. Here's some advice I am going to share that will hopefully help you save your mattress. My trial and error.. I have 4 cats (1 female, 3 neutered males). 3 of my cats I raised as kittens and other was an adult high kill shelter rescue- so 2 of my male cats were not neutered and sprayed.  Now after lots of trial and error I have found solutions that work and am sharing them with you so hopefully you won't go through all the frustrations I did trying to clean the house of that awful cat spray stench and cat pee smell.. One of the favorite places for my male cats to pee and spray was/is the bed. I am not sure why, but I've read something about cats wanting to mingle their smell with yours, especially if they have separation anxiety when you're gone during the day.. Anyone who has tried getting cat spray smell out of a mattress will tell you that it is nearly impossible and many probably have thrown out the mattress because the smell is so hard to remove. If you don't get a mattress protector like this one on the mattress in time and a cat pees or sprays on it, you will need to find a way to clean up the pee smell (both to your senses and the cats senses) or else the cat will continue to back to that same place to pee/spray again.. Here is my solution that might help save a mattress.. When my cats sprayed the bed and this all stopped after they were neutered, except one cat is 'high strung' and the vet thinks he has anxiety issues- which means that when he gets mad at me he seeks out the bed or pillows to pee on (and no sometimes he doesn't care if I am sleeping in the bed, he will go about his business as if I wasn't even there).. The trick is to treat the pee area (once you find it) because honestly that smell is awful, who wants to sleep in a bed that smells like a skunk marinated it's stink all over your mattress? (that is what cat spray smells like, in my opinion).. Natures Miracle just for Cats- urine smell and stain remover works wonders to treat the pee/spray spot FIRST. Follow instructions there on the bottle but to treat a mattress of memory foam topper I pour a cup full of NM onto the pee spot and let it soak. Blot after an hour. Smell to see if the horrendous odor is still there and pour on another cup if it is. IF the smell is gone and all you can smell is NM, then blot and let it air out till dry before putting sheets and a water proof mattress protector back on.. You can find Natures Miracle here > and I do suggest buying a gallon bottle if you have a cat with any issues peeing or spraying.. https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B002I3ANQ8/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o04_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1. Now for this waterproof mattress protector- I love it. It has saved me lots of time and cleaning when my cat decides to pee on the bed. Now all I do is wipe the spot down with some Natures Miracle, wash the pad in the washer and done. No more soaking and struggling to get the pee smell gone from my mattress. I do love how this pad keeps the pee from going through to the mattress even if I don't catch it till it's dry.. To those who are new like I was to waterproof vs water resistant- waterproof is when liquid doesn't go through material and eventually dries there. Water resistant is when the liquid will go through the material if you don't pick it up IMMEDIATELY and it will go through to your mattress and dry there if not picked up right away.. I would much rather have water proof because I can't always find where the cat peed on time and when I do find it, the spot is already dried- the stink is stronger dry.. Overall I am very happy with this mattress protector because it is not crinkly, makes no noise when we sleep on it and stays put on the bed without us and it sliding around all night long. This launders easily with the sheets and when my cat does get mad enough at me to pee on the bed, like I said, it's so much easier cleaning pee of THIS than it is the mattress or memory foam.. I'd highly recommend to everyone who has pets or kids. My 18 mo old occasionally leaks through his diaper at night, so I ordered a second one just for his crib and couldn't be happier with that.. Hopefully this has helped save someone else's bed. I wish when my cat first started spraying that someone had written a blog or review like this one tying the 2 things together- mattress protector/Natures Miracle cat pee odor remover because honestly, who has time to be scrubbing pee off a mattress anyways?. In my attached picture you can see a puddle of water I made at the kitchen sink. The water stayed right there until I of course spilled it all over myself. I am happy to say the water does not go through, not even a drop.

review_title: I haven't tried dumping a glass of water/wine/beer on it yet... or been drunk enough to.
review_body: Update: I thought the top might be a little 'rough' for me, because of the cloth fabric on the top, but I couldn't feel it, or a difference from my old mattress cover once I put sheets on the bed... All I can feel is my sheet, other thoughts: I'm using a 'Zinus Memory Foam 12 Inch Green Tea Mattress, Full size' the memory foam mattress is 'hotter' than my old coil spring mattress I was used to so I am really glad to have this premium protector to keep my sweat from getting to the mattress. Memory foam mattress sleeps really well, but I'm so used to flipping my mattress just spinning it around so you sleep on the other side just doesn't feel the same. This cover fits my bed perfectly, & I'm using Damask Stripe 500 tc sheets.. Perfect, arrived a day early, same day as my mattress delivery but arrived early enough for me to wash it before the mattress even showed up!. I plan to update as this will be the only protection for my mattress under my fitted sheet. Starting date 8/23/2016, mattress needs to expand 24 hours, so we'll say 8/24/2016. I'm what you call a drinker, I tend to drink a little too much booze during the day, so I have water next to my bed and sometimes miss my lip going for the wake up drink... It's not always water that gets split... I've washed it and it feels durable and resistant but I'm not about to waste a good drink on testing it.. I'm not a huge fan of the fabric top on this, but I plan to use 500 count Damask Striped sheets so I don't have to feel it either, I have another cover on our other bed which has a soft pattern sewn onto it, but it's not as resistant either....

review_title: Not full coverage but fine for a top cover.
review_body: I'm OK with the cover although,  I was surprised it didn't cover the entire mattress and have a zipper. It just goes on like a fitted sheet.. What I like about it is it will protect the mattress from body sweat. I would have preferred 100% coverage to protect from mites which was why I bought it in the first place. I should have paid more attention to reading what it looks like.. It is not thick and bulky like other covers I've had, which I like too.

In my shopping process, I failed to notice that these are the half-size sheets. Normally I don't buy those because they are usually more expensive, but I have enjoyed using these. I find that a half-sheet is usually enough. They are tough and absorbent.

review_title: These keep things cleaned up nicely at a fair price
review_body: I use a lot of paper towels because I am messy. These keep things cleaned up nicely at a fair price.

review_title: The best PT in the biz.
review_body: I just don't remember "products" for the kitchen and home ever being so expensive. Other than that, love the select-a-size option and they are absorbent as anything I have used... (Starting to understand the uptick in price, here...)
Always liked the options of a half sheet. Bounty does save your bacon and drain it too.
These are my favorite paper towels. Super absorbent and I love the select-a-size options!

review_title: These last a while in the holder.
review_body: I hate changing out the paper towel roll, mostly because I’m cheap and it seems like they go way too fast.  But these last a lot longer.  Love Select-a-size.  I don’t think I could go back to full sized sheets or smaller rolls.
Product size has been reduced they're not huge Normie they're called family now

review_title: These are my favorite paper towels
review_body: I’ve purchased these several times with a coupon. It makes the deal even sweeter. These are my favorite paper towels!!!

review_title: Awesome for cleaning house and spills
review_body: My “must have” household paper towels. Strong and super absorbent and love the select a size.
bulky paper towels delivered at a better price than in the store, amazing

review_title: IT'S ONLY SPARKLE FOR MY HOUSE!!
review_body: I've tried a number of paper towel products.  Price is NOT all that matters!  I tried a cheaper brand and I hated it.  I don't care if Sparkle is a little more.  The quality of the towel is what matters.  Sparkle is sturdy.  It doesn't feel like thick toilet paper like some do.  Sparkle is good thick towels and you can even choose your size so it lasts longer.  I won't ever by anything but Sparkle again.  I assure you that you will love it too!

review_title: One of my favorite 'Saves' in my 'Subscribe & Save'
review_body: One of my favorite 'Saves' in my 'Subscribe & Save'. It's actually a TON of paper towels, so keep an eye on how many you have and when your next shipment sends. I wasn't paying attention one month and they sent more when I still had 17 rolls left!!! Haha GREAT deal, decent paper towels. They obviously aren't Bounty but they do the job. They are comparable to Costco's brand of paper towels. They're wrapped in twos so they are easy to stack up (particularly helpful when you order too many...) I will continue to order as long as they offer these!

I understand these aren't Bounty or Brawny. I understand these are a "bargain brand". I bought these because they were cheap. Normally I go to Costco for this type of stuff, but the previous "bargain brand" paper towel I bought off Amazon was almost as good as Costco brand, so I figured I would buy another bargain brand and not have to go to the store. These are terribly thin. It takes me four towels to clean my counter top, which is in no way a very large space. They tear when damp, and aren't very absorbent. Would definitely not buy this brand again. I'm only giving two stars because it was delivered at a reasonable pace and I didn't have to fight traffic for paper towels.

I keep buying these paper towels for the value.  Its just plain cheap vs the other expensive brands.  They are not nearly as soft or able to absorb like the other brands that are 3x the price but realistically, many people grab a whole handful and clean a tiny stain and toss in the trash.  The Sparkle brand is generally fine and does the job unless you're trying to soak up a whole bottle of water and when someone grabs a handful and tosses it in the trash you don't feel like you just lost $3 in in the trash can

review_title: Generally good value but waayyy to much scenting agent / perfume sometimes
review_body: As a few others noted the product does seem to have been 'cheapened' a few times over the years. I was ok with that aspect, but lately they've been putting a lot of scenting agent or perfume on the product, which gives me a headache.. This last box Sept 2018 I could smell it before I even brought the box in the house. When I opened the package blech this cheap perfumey smell is on all the paper towels. Blech. I imagine it's to cover up the natural papery smell that some people don't like, but yick I'd rather smell that than this perfume smell. Especially since whatever natural papery smell is still there, it's just covered up by this perfume.

I like the fact that there were so many of these for such a great price. I also like the fact that I don't have to step foot into a store to get what I need. It's an advantage to just be able to place the box into my storage, and only grab them when I need them. The rolls are also a good size too. What I do not like is the fact that they have a horrible odor. It turns my stomach every time.  I am not sure if it was just mine, as I have not seen any other reviews about this issue. But maybe the formula needs to change.

Normally I am very pleased with this product, however, this time while using when you get near the end of roll the towels start tearing and shredding unlike in past and it has been like this with each package I open. If this is how the quality of the towels are heading I will be switching to another more reliable paper towel as this is wasteful and not worth the money paid for them.

review_title: For those of us who like quality+price=good deal
review_body: For those of us who like quality+price=good deal, the Sparkle paper towels will make you happy. Our family has usually always used Sparkle paper towels. We've never been disappointed. Some of the more popular brands come with prices to match. Sparkle paper towels in my opinion are a good deal. I just purchased the 24 pack of Sparkle Papwer Towels Giant Rolls so I won't be needing paper towels for a while.
I have used these & the other main brands.  These smell.

These are usually pretty great value for the price! We've had 10+ deliveries over the last several years and, more often than not, these have done the trick with little issue.. Like some reviews have mentioned, a couple of the shipments have had an odd smell, not overpowering but a bit musty. I'd imagine this is related to how these boxes were stored and/or transported, so this is most likely a warehousing issue and I wouldn't hold this against the product overall necessarily. The only other minor gripe is the amount of dust these leave on our kitchen counter, just from sitting in the holder.. For the price, however, you cannot quibble too much!

These pillow inserts, or cushions, are definitely being sold at a really great price and they were delivered when I was told that they would be! The construction of the item is terrific! The seams are solid, straight and even. However, these perfectly made pillows feel like they are only half full!!! The instructions say to let them sit outside of the plastic covering for a couple days so they can "breath".  Well, mine must be brain dead, because they didn't breath in anything!! 😀 Still used them because I had to deliver the pillows for a gift and didn't have time. Just an update - the forms have never gotten any bigger - and it's been three weeks!

These are good pillow inserts if you're looking for something cheap. Depending on how much give your case has, you might want to size up, but I found the 18x18 worked fine for my 18x18 pillowcase. The pillow didn't look overstuffed, however the the corners were flat. The way that the pillow is packaged also made it so there was an indent down the middle, but I think it will continue to even out with time. Obviously if you're looking for a high-quality insert, this isn't going to be your pick, but for the price these work great!

Shame on me because I didn't click on all the photos beside the product.  One of them shows the tag and the tag says this "18x18"" pillow stuffer fits a 17'x17' pillow cover.  The stuffer is definitely 17x17 so shame on them for misrepresentation in the title.  The stuffer may even be smaller because it left a lot of room around the inside of the cover and certainly didn't go near the corners of my 18x18 cover.  I would return it but not worth the trouble.

Used these to fill out some awesomely cheap pillow cases I got on AliExpress.  They are used as decorative pillows. Not something you’d want to take a nap on. All of the pillow inserts had evenly spaced filling without any gaps or voids. Definitely not lumpy.  I ordered a slightly larger size that my cases because I wanted a more dense feel and these worked out great.

review_title: Just fine for a decorative pillow, but not sure how much wear and tear it would take
review_body: I bought this to replace a lumpy insert for a decorative pillow that I have on my bed - it doesn't get much wear and tear other than occasionally leaning on it to read/watch TV. It fit just fine into the cover and is nice and puffy. I've had it for about a half a year now, and it's definitely a bit misshapen and lumpier now, but still okay. I don't know that I'd recommend it for somewhere that gets more regular use, like a busy living room couch, but for a more decorative pillow it's been just fine.

I got this to fit my new pottery barn pillow cover. It is a nice pillow (and way cheaper than pottery barns). I liked how it advised to get a pillow insert larger than the cover. It makes my pillow look much fuller and it was easy to stuff. Looks great as a decorative pillow on our couch.

I read so many reviews regarding a pillow and decided to try this one.  I'm so glad I did!  I ordered the 28" x 28" for a 26" x 26" sham...as recommended.  As you can see by my pictures, the corners filled out nicely and it was NOT like a basketball.  There was a slight odor but sat it on the porch for a few hours and it was gone.  I cannot speak of the durability as I just received it and am using it for decorative purposes on a bed.

review_title: I put them in the washing machine and they fell ...
review_body: I put them in the washing machine and they fell apart, I also bought 26x26 to stuff into a 24x24 pillow case with the intent to have a fuller pillow and they barely fill the 24x24 pillow case, I would never buy a product from Foamily again.
Pefect insert for my pillow covers.  Well made and stay fluffed.

review_title: OK, but you get what you pay for...
review_body: These 'stuffers' should serve their purpose, but they were misshapen, and I do NOT think they'd hold up to daily use. Bought these inserts for new pillow cases I ordered for a small couch in my office. The forms arrived in clear plastic bags that were smaller than the inserts themselves, so they were all bunched up. They unfolded OK, but the cheap fluff inside did not go into each corner-- those were just floppy, empty space, so the pillow were lumpy/rounded instead of square. I was able to pinch the empty corners, push it into the fluff, and pull some of the filler into each corner, squaring them off a bit. Once in the cases, they look decent. These are not dense, sturdy inserts, which is fine for my seldom-used couch, and should work well for those who also need their pillows to be more decorative than functional. If you plan to USE or rest on your pillows regularly, I imagine they'll lose their shape very quickly. But they're OK for what I wanted...

I was so excited to get these but I'm really upset about the quality. I have several strands that just won't light up and they are NOTHING like the picture. If you think you're getting a nearly solid curtain of lights, like the picture, you're not. They are spaced out every 5-6 inches and you'd probably need three-four sets to get the effect of the picture and that's if the strings work.. I only bought these because I saw someone on Youtube raving about how hers lasted for three years. Maybe I got a bad set.

While it is beautiful and has a lot of features, the picture must have two or three sets over lapping because it does NOT have that many strands hanging down. It is true to the described length at least.

review_title: Nicer than I imagined.  Great price.
review_body: These lights are very darling.  They turned out better than I had imagined.  I used them for a photo backdrop, but will be using them in my front window for Christmas as well as for any other fun celebrations.  Great price.  One photo shows the lights with flash, the second shows them without flash.

review_title: These lights were terrible!! bought them thanks to all the good ...
review_body: These lights were terrible!! bought them thanks to all the good reviews and pictures but they were a tangled mess.  Took me forever to untangle and then when I did the outlet is on the very top, so you would need an extension cord hung up towards the ceiling to even make these work.  Throwing away.  Cant even return them because they are so tangled

Our 13yr old daughter wanted string lights for her room and after searching Amazon I settled on these, and they do not disappoint.  I hung them behind her bed over the window (underneath curtains).  They were easy to hang using Command Decorating Clips.  As another reviewer suggested, hang the lights before you unravel the strings so they won't get tangled.  I did use an extension cord because the plug didn't reach the outlet.  Also, many reviewers state there is no off button, however I found if you press the light options button (there are 8 light settings to choose from) 9 times, it turns the lights off -- we do not have to unplug them to turn them off.

review_title: to make it look like this picture - you will need to buy 4 ...
review_body: to make it look like this picture - you will need to buy 4 of these and over lap them. The strands are really far apart not close together!! Very disappointed - and especially at this price!!

Exactly what I had wanted when I ordered these!!! I even got a deal on them since the box had been damaged! They worked very well with my project, need to order more now!!! Highly recommend this product!!!! As you can tell from my pictures I am not quite finished with the project, but wanted to make sure I loved it before I finished the entire back wall.

I bought two but the over all width from left to right isn't as long as I would of liked or expected but they seem like nice lights . It's a plug in not batteries like some people would have you believe and there is a end attachment if you decide to hook a few of them up together but if not it has cap that covers it . They don't seem as bright as I would liked In fact the pictures make them look nice and bright like you'd expect from outdoor holiday lights but they are actually dimmer like the ones you'd have inside as mood lights ,I guess I'd compare these to the dimmer Christmas tree lights vs the bright outdoor ones or say dim like a night light would be . Also there are several settings to change the lights from a constant to different flashing patterns. Overall I like them but if you expected them to be nice and bright Id say find some other lights but if your looking for something more as mood / dim lights then these are for you .also I thought I could get away with two of these on one wall of my camper but it appears I'll need 3 so I'd say get out a measureing tape and then look at the measurements to see how many you'd need because they aren't very wide and you may need more then you expected .

review_title: I purchased this product in September and it worked great, looked great
review_body: I purchased this product in September and it worked great, looked great, and I had no problems with them until now, it's December, not even half a year later and they suddenly stopped working even though they are not used daily or constantly and they are used indoors. I do not recommend these at all.

Beautiful. I used it on the door leading to my backyard. It was over a blue curtain and it was so stunning. The button for different patterns all worked and were in the ordered they were written. The lights  weren’t bulky and seemed well made and sturdy.. The only downside was that after about 30 min of the lights being plugged in and being set up , they got dim and dimmer, until they stopped working completely.. I was so bummed, as I wanted them for decorations during the new year. I ended up buying from another seller and they weren’t as nice. Had I ordered/ received these earlier and had time to order another set, I would’ve gotten these again.

Another superb amazon purchase!  I am very happy I got this steamer out of all the available choices on Amazon.  It was decently priced and works great!  All you do is add water and turn it on.  I love the size and ease of use.  It works quickly in each spot and I didn't find the need to go over any area twice.  I only used it 2 times and so I hope it holds up over time.  It's small, so you have to keep adding water if you're steam ironing multiple clothes depending on their size, but the small size is what makes it easier to travel with.  Love it!!

This product is dangerous. While it produces a fair amount of steam for a short while, enough for a few shirts, when it is turned off it shoots boiling hot water out of the steamer opening. Fortunately I had already set the product down. This thing could cause very serious injuries and should be avoided!

review_title: I would like to see a wider vent option (an extra attachment ...
review_body: I have a 10' x 20' muslin green screen that is covered in wrinkles when it's unpacked. I needed something portable and this is it. I would like to see a wider vent option (an extra attachment or after market option). I used it quite extensively and it worked great!

This steamer is easy to use and very portable. For a size M blouse, i can finish the job in one reservoir of water. But for my complicated layered skirt, it took me 6 additional fillings. Each fill lasted about 4-6 minutes. I will suggest that a larger size of reservoir be supplied to the buyer. For a small appliance, the price is on the high side, a second larger water storage will make it more cost effective. Our tap water is a bit hard and left a film of calcium deposit on the heating element. Some instruction on how to re- dissolve it will be helpful. .

review_title: Broken before it could be used...
review_body: We bought this steamer to take with us overseas.  After filling the tank up to the water line and plugging it in, it immediately began working. However, it begin to smell like something was burning and unplugged it. After the steam stopped and it cooled down, we noticed the heating part of the steamer was cracked. It wouldn’t heat anymore after that. We left it behind so that we didn’t have to lug it around for the remainder of our trip.

This is junk. No visible steam, doesn’t remove anything!  Not nearly enough water to steam anything because you spend 10 minutes trying to remove one little wrinkle which it still doesn’t remove. Im returning immediately. Amazon should maybe actually try to use a product before stating “Amazon’s Choice”. I have been a Prime member for years and continue to see a steady decline in products and service. Too bad....

review_title: Heats up quickly, too small to be a time saver
review_body: This is definitely a travel steamer, as it is really small, so don't expect to be able to do much steaming without refilling the tank. It does heat up very quickly, and the auto-shut off is very handy for that reason-you shouldn't walk away for any length of time, or you will come back to an empty tank within minutes. It seems to 'spit' on my clothes too often, and the small width of the steam head means you may need numerous swipes of your garment to release wrinkles. I will pay a bit more next time for bigger and better features.

review_title: ... up lending it to a family member and she liked it so much I told her to keep it ...
review_body: I bought this for curtains and it works well--I ended up lending it to a family member and she liked it so much I told her to keep it and ordered myself another one--it has the largest reservoir of all the handheld ones I found--I had ordered another one by mistake and sent it back because it was too small and the water reservoir so small I doubt it would have done 1 shirt--this model is perfect for several curtains before you have to refill it

review_title: Great product - small and easy to use
review_body: Great product - small and easy to use. I took it in my luggage to a wedding. Be careful not to get hot steam on your hand. If you overfill or tip too far down boiling water will come out and can burn you.

I was so excited to buy this steamer after reading all the positive reviews. I’ve been using it for less than three months and it’s already spitting a lot of water every time I use it.. I make sure to not over-fill it and always hold it at the proper angle but it spits out water every morning- leaving water stains on a lot of my nicer blouses

review_title: Swifter cleaning cloths are better than generic brands
review_body: Good for dusting and keeping hardware floors clean.
I love this things, I have a husky and a cat, which means daily struggle with hair, but this help so much all the hair sticks to it, I don’t have to worry about it flying as I sweep, just love it.
with four Corgis I use these daily..wonderful product
Love swiffer products.
Love them, they pick up all my dog hair.
We get these every month because we use them for everything!
Great for pet hair!
It cleans!
As described, perfect for the job.
they are pads, what can you say?

Will update my post if our second experience proves better but I store the scale next to the etagiere and toilet and when I pulled it out I bumped the middle against the bowl and it shatteeed into 467 pieces - thankfully safety glass but I would expect more durability from an item. designed to hold 150-200+pounds of human on a daily basis

I bought this to help keep track of my weight at the start of my diet. Unfortunately, I can't be certain if I've gained or lost weight. Within 5 to 10 minutes I would get different results. One result showed I lost a pound and then 5 minutes later I got on the scale again and showed I gained a pound and half. It's very frustrating to buy something thinking it's going to be accurate but in reality you can't rely on it.

I bought this scale because of the positive ratings, but my experience with this product was anything but positive. After receiving the scale I set it up using the instructions. However, this scale never worked. When I got on the scale, it added 40lbs to my weight, so I tried recalibrated it (it was on a tiled floor in my bathroom), but was not successful. I had two friends over and asked them to test it out, they experienced the same problem. After more attempts to recalibrate and reset the scale I gave up and emailed the seller. Not much help from them, but Amazon was kind enough to issue a refund. I will be purchasing a different scale over the weekend.
This scale is awful. It looks fancy. It shows a number when you step on it. But, I can step on it 20 times in 10 minutes and get a different weight every time, within a 10 pound range! UNRELIABLE!

This scale is highly inaccurate or at least mine is defective. When I first tried it...it told me about 10 different weights in 5 minutes. It also told me I gained five pounds in a day, when I checked on my other scale my weight was about a pound higher than when I weighed myself in the morning. It is not accurate. I purchased this scale because I wanted a more precise reading than my dial scale. However, this product is not worth the money. I absolutely do not recommend buying this scale. I have had digital scales that are much more accurate than this one.

review_title: It broke, but etekcity replaced it!
review_body: I liked it. It worked well. Auto turn on and off. Easy to use. It worked great for me and my husband with no high tech remember me stuff.  Just the weight displayed. Simple, 3 seconds and read the number. But, just shy of 2 months now, it broke. It worked fine last time I used it, but now the display lights up and shows no numbers. Some fiddling, removing batteries a few times. ...turns out its still working, but you can only read the display from an angle (like about 2-3 steps away).  Must read quick before the auto turn off!  Too bad it's been 45 days instead of 30.. Etekcity contacted me and offered to replace. The new one is working just as well as the old one did. Hopefully it will keep working for a long time! I'll try to remember to update my review later.. The replacement is still working 02/2018.  Still a happy customer!

This scale is very attractive with a modern glass design. The blue LED backlight makes the number very easy to see. Of course, you have to put it on an even surface for it to work properly, but you have to do that with any scale. Accuracy is fine. The only negatives I can see is that the shiny glass surface could be slippery if your feet are wet and the fact that the surface will show watermarks are footprints if you aren't completely clean. That doesn't bother me and I think it looks very nice and classy in the bathroom. Much nicer than a cheap plastic scale. I also like the fact that it uses regular batteries and not button batteries like my previous scale did. It is much easier to replace them without searching around for the exact right type of button cell.

review_title: Disappointed that this is not accurate
review_body: This product is not accurate.. I am on a diet right now and weigh myself everyday and average it out.. One day I lost 5 pounds, I knew something was wrong as I stepped on it another time, I got another number.. Disappointed that this is not accurate, now all the progress that I was tracking is not reliable.

Unlike most scales I've had in the past, you can move this scale to different parts of the room and it still gives you the same weight. The one I had before, I could be a difference of 8 pounds depending on what part of the closet/bathroom floor it was pushed into which was aggravating while I was trying to lose weight to never be able to track my weight loss. I've only had this new one a few weeks but I'm very impressed. It gives you a quick, accurate reading as soon as you step on the scale. You dont have to step on, step off to get it to start. It gives you a reading the first time. Very cool.

I have two other digital weight scales and they are both more reproducible than this scale - this one has more variation.  (I use all three daily, measuring at least twice on each scale, with the scale rotated 90 degrees on the second measure to make sure it's reading is unchanged by rotation.  I'm an old retired physics prof.). More aggravating, the instructions included with this scale say to store it horizontally, something that less practical for me (although I've been doing that). Because my other two scales didn't seem to say anything similar (or maybe I missed it???) I emailed a question to Etekcity.  They did not even reply.  I was disappointed that they didn't.. It's possible to imagine that the strain sensors would be affected by storage position, but it seems pretty unlikely.  Overall I would not buy this again.

The Glad OdorShield kitchen bags with Gain/Febreze work well. I haven't had one break on me yet even when I've had seriously stuffed trash bags full of heavy items. The ties are sturdy - none have broken on me yet! I don't really notice the Gain or Febreze scents so it's not bothersome to have that addition to the bag.

review_title: Product provides a fresh scent to trash can
review_body: Great combative pricing with grocery and box stores. No fighting traffic to buy basic household goods. Product provides a fresh scent  to help with trash can in-between cleanings and while waste is waiting to go out to the curb.So happy to find everything I need and not have to go out and spend extra dollars on gas to travel to the store and back.

This is how many bags (10) that it took to find one with a solid bottom.  This was after I had to pick up all my trash because the bottom split on my half full  bag.  The last 3 bags had leaked,  and I assumed my kids were just being lazy and spilling drinks.  I can't find a working email address,  and I'm not sitting on the phone and taking up any more of my time.  Have had these on subscribe and save for a while and I'll be canceling that today, because of the difficulty in accessing customer service.  Disappointed.

these are trash! literally.  the ties break when we just start to pull them together to tie the bag up.  We have been through 1/2 the box and have only been able to tie TWO bags then both broke when we picked up the bag out of the bin.  NO NO NO ... never again.  Hefty all the way for us.

I have been using these bags for a while and I won't buy anything else. They are a little bit thin but as long as you aren't throwing sharp debris in them they will hold up well. The best part about them is the fresh scent. I have thrown away fish scraps, etc. and the bag masks the smells well!

This used to be an excellent product.  I have been using it for years.  However, since the product was recently updated, it has been completely unsatisfactory.  About half of the bags I have used have ripped apart.  The tears occur at the top, near the drawstring.  I won't buy these bags again.

Good bags, OK at covering the smell but better than a non-scented bag! Only complaint is that the handle straps area little weak, that seems to be the only area that breaks. Also, I am 6'1" and with the strings double tied this still drags along the ground when taking the trash out. I suppose that is more of a sin of its size than anything, but would be nice not to have to hold an arm curl all the way to the dumpster with my excessive amounts of garbage.

review_title: Needs to double bag... not worth it
review_body: I hated these. We use these bags as a diaper trash bag and also for regular trash in he kitchen. It holds up decent with the diapers, as long as it's not too heavy. However, with the regular trash I end up always having to double bag. Not bc something punctured it, but just bc of quality.  We switched to the strong shield and haven't had any issues yet. But I o not recommend this product.

review_title: As a family of 8 we go through about 2 bags per day of garbage. So
review_body: We are now just using our box we ordered because we had to finish what we previously bought in local stores. As a family of 8 we go through about 2 bags per day of garbage. So, it will last almost about 2 months maybe a little less than 2 months. The quality is good. Lasts long and is strong and doesn't leak. Fragrance helps keep my garbage can smelling fresh. I will buy again so, long as the prices doesn't increase.

review_title: It's a trash bag and it holds trash.
review_body: The only drawback to these is that the top is a little loose and occasionally slips down in my trash can.  These hold up to a pretty significant amount of weight when carrying, and are flexible enough to carry out with a pizza box or two jammed inside.  The odorshield is nice but I don't notice it at all after I put the new bag in.  Good bargain that will last my single-person household a year or more!

review_title: Plenty get's the job done! Amazon CSR for MIA orders CSR rock!
review_body: I just happened to give these a try based off feedback and less than $0.90 a roll with free shipping...no brainer for me LOL! My husband and I like them they are better than say for example Bounty's basic roll but not quite as good as their pick a size roll. Plenty get's the job done. It would be great if they could come in select a size in the future but for now scissors work. So this month not only did I stock up for us but surprised my mother and she likes Plenty 2 :-).. Side note first order MIA. So I emailed Amazon they FIXED IT and within 48 hours we had our paper towels & TP Thank you Amazon CSR!

review_title: Better than Brawny - soft and absorbant and lint free
review_body: I am not let down by this paper towel at all, and per square foot this is one of the least expensive paper towels I can buy especially after the subscribe and save discount. It's softer than brawny and seems to be a Bounty made product (Plenty was the original name for Bounty). I almost want to deduct one star because they are standard rolls and I would much prefer big rolls so I don't have to change the rolls as often. However, I am leaving it 5 stars because that's not a let down of this product at all.

review_title: These rolls r so narrow I can put two side ...
review_body: These rolls r so narrow I can put two side by side and they fit in my holder . Warning: "can be very messy when used"!

review_title: They work fine and absorb well
review_body: These were alright. I figured I’d try these since it was easier to have them shipped that running to. Sams all the time.  These were a bit more money and the rolls were significantly smaller.  They work fine and absorb well. However, I seem to be going through rolls so much faster thN I did with others.

Mediocre towels, not terrible, but definitely not great. You are better off spending a few dollars more for a better brand. The tube of the rolls did not spin very well on my dispenser, every other brand does just fine. This issue, coupled with it not being a select-a-size sheet and you end up with lots of torn paper towels. They'll do ina  pinch and are better than bargain basement stuff, but definitely not on my future shopping lists.

review_title: Good product for a good price
review_body: As in all the other reviews I read these paper towels do work. I have to say though they are very skinny rolls and it seems that I am using these a lot faster than I would spending the additional $6 on paper towels for the same amount of rolls. They work don't get me wrong, however, I'm going to start collecting coupons to purchase name brand rolls that actually give me more bang for the role. I would order them again in case I don't find good sales out there I just don't think these are spectacular based on the price.

Was sick of hauling cases of paper towels from the grocery store so I decided to try a subscription and get them delivered to my door. I have to say this is the best value! Less than $1.00 a roll and the quality is better than most of the name brands I was buying in the store. Highly recommend!

As I was raising my family, I'd always been a die hard Bounty fan. The durability is what you need for the spills and quick clean up jobs incumbent with raising children. However, as an empty-nester I found I couldn't justify the expense versus the need, which just wasn't as pressing. I shopped around until I found Plenty. The cost is great and to my surprise so is the durability. Had I known about Plenty years ago, I would've started using it when my family was young. I'm very pleased with the product.

review_title: Great price - up to the job in the kitchen
review_body: It's nice when we can find generic paper towels for under a dollar per roll that are up to the job in our kitchen. Although this brand doesn't seem to be as "thick" as some of the premium brand names, they absorb well and hold up as well as the more expensive brands. We will buy these again. Can't beat the price.

These are thinner than Bounty.  In the picture the left side is Plenty & the right side is Bounty.  As the picture demonstrates you can see the counter top through the Plenty brand.  That being said, depending on a price comparison it still may be a better deal to go with the Plenty brand over Bounty, but do realize you will use more paper towels for the same job.

Great micorfiber cloths. Not the cheapest I've found costco is where I've got the best deal but they function and hold up as expected. These are the thinner style of microfiber cloths, not the heavy thick ones.. Pros:. -cheapest online and prime convenience. Cons. -cheaper at costco

review_title: Great size for spill clean-up, dusting, and wiping down screens, windows, etc. without lint/smears
review_body: In an effort to cut my carbon footprint and be more green, I'm forcing myself out of the paper-towel game and bought this multi-pack instead.. I was initially worried about their absorbancy, but they're great at pulling up liquids from hardwood and soaking things up from carpet and rugs.. Buying these along with some other recycling I've started has greatly cut down on my amount of garbage each week. And since my washing of towels and such was always such a small load (for 1 person), I don't feel like I'm wasting water by adding these to the loads.

review_title: Wish I Read the Negative Reviews
review_body: I will not complain about the size since that is as advertised. I will, however, address other areas and quality issues.. Intended Use: I bought these primarily for car cleaning because my husband is meticulous about automotive detailing. I also do not use paper towels in the kitchen/home, so these will do cleaning duty, too.. Cons:. 1) Each cloth is tagged with a large paper-like care label. For my husband, this is unacceptable because it's too scratchy and I'm inclinded to agree. So here we are, ripping off all of these labels.. 2) They smell and feel weird. The care instructions say to wash with cool water before using. Normally (and with every other microfiber I've purchased) i would laugh this off. The smell and coating on them, however, was weird enough that i DID was them before using! And that only made the smell worse! And I'm not even a freak about "chemicals!" I actually compared them to some unused clothes I got from the home improvement store and they are substantially more coated, almost to the point of being tacky to the touch.. 3) They are not good quality and I give them a year or less in the rotation before they are thrown away. This sounds okay, but considering we have good quality microfiber clothes that are now a decade old, it's a little wasteful. I was thinking the 144-count would last me YEARS.. Pros:. 1) You get what you pay for. The bulk pricing is as cheap as I've seen, especially with subscribe and save. If you view these as fairly disposable, then you will not be disappointed.. Overall, I don't feel good about this purchase and will not buy again. I don't use paper products in the home because they're wasteful and expensive. Sadly, I think these are pretty wasteful too and they smell so weird, I wonder what part of the world they're poisoning with their production. Still, I'll make the best of it and use these for heavy cleaning. You do get what you pay when it comes to these things. High quality clothes make a huge difference. But if you cannot properly care for the high quality ones or you're using these with heavy solvents or soil, these make sense.

*** updated review ***. These are worse than I thought.  I used them to wash the car today.  These microfibers are among some of the worst that I have ever used (I've been buying microfibers for about 10 years).  When using soap, these barely lather up at all, because they are so skimpy (they apparently have fewer fibers than higher-quality microfibers.  They also do a poor job of buffing.  Horrible, horrible quality.  Not worth the purchase at all.. Original review:. I'm almost always happy with AmazonBasics products, but these are the exception.  They are relatively small and fairly thin.  In particular, check out costco before buying these!  The ones at my local costco are much, much better.

As has been mentioned - these are pretty awful. Thin, don't absorb moisture well. Probably one of the more annoying aspects is the size. Yes, they're the advertised size when you get them, but throw them all through a cold wash prior to first use (as it tells you on the piece of paper in the bag), and they all shrunk by about 20%. Didn't even tumble dry them. They're basically single use small cloths.

review_title: Great Cleaning Cloths for Kitchen and Otherwise
review_body: I needed a replacement for my kitchen rags/towels that were wearing out. I had read about the microfiber material and its absorbency. These have worked out very well. I use them in the kitchen and for cleaning jobs everywhere including the bathroom. These are great all purpose cleaning rags. I use the white ones for the bathroom and other cleaning like cleaning jobs and the colored ones for the kitchen. They work incredibly well and when they start to wear out they are cheap enough that I just throw them away and get a new one. This is a good product at an inexpensive price.

review_title: Their okay, not as thick as some premium versions and my whites are thinner then the colored ones. Doesn't work as well on glass
review_body: These ain't bad,  but they aren't great either. I had bought a set at a local auto parts store that were nice and thick and high quality.  I thought from all of the positive reviews on here these might be the same as those.  I was wrong.. They do the job, but they aren't near as nice as the other ones I bought.  Also with my set, the white ones are thinner then the blue and yellow versions in the same set.  If the whites were as thick as the yellow and blue ones I might bump this up a star.  It's almost like they are a different cloth completely.. They do the job pretty well with things like dusting, but when it comes to cleaning off my eye glasses, TV, and mirror I can definitely notice a difference between the thinner product and the thicker one.  A little disappointed with this purchase. If I need more I'll be looking at another product.

by far the worst microfiber cloth i purchased.  don't be suckered into buying this bundle for the cheap price.  Cheap price = cheap quality.  Very unhappy with the quality of the cloth.  Mainly use this to clean glasses and glass products, but these leave trail of tiny bits of fiber on the surface.  now i am using these for fishing and cleaning floors...

review_title: Great cloths, half for cleaning the car, half for the home
review_body: Awesome cloths for cleaning without scratching.. Each cloth is a good size and the quantity is a nice.. Three different colors also help to keep use separate, eg. wash, dry, polish.. Wash them by themselves else they will pick up lint from other clothes and they tend to stick and be abrasive to other items in the laundry.

WOW I cant believe the BAD reviews on these, I ordered the second package and have no prob with them at all, yes they will shrink when you wash them in a normal cycle of wash. But, it says wash cold. I personally dont worry about it. I wash with my towels and dry with them. They are great!! I have NO HOLES or probs with stitching at all, you can buy anything of these clothes and pay a high price and not get any better quality. I personally would rather not pay that high price and get something for my dollar. You take a chance on these I know I love the way they clean, and have bought many in the past, used to clean houses for a living, and holes and all they are the best at cleaning anything. I LOVE WHAT I GOT thank you Amazon for the great buy!! And I will be buying more!!

These trash bags are just that... trash. Each one has easily ripped, some while merely pulling them from the roll or opening them for use. The handles are strong, but if the bag falls off or rips apart what does that matter?. The bags have black handles, not red as pictured.

Trash bags that fit a standard kitchen trash can. I like this brand - and this specific version - because my family is notorious for over-stuffing trash cans. They will pack, push, balance, slide, shake, and do any other action necessary to fit their article of trash on the pile in an attempt to avoid just taking out the trash. This means I get to do uniquely strange dances while attempting to get the bag out of the can...but that's ok with these bags. Due to the ties, there is a little additional space at the top of the bag - which helps keeps everything contained within the bag, instead of spilling out all over the floor (and me). The ties are pretty strong allowing one to shake the trash deeper into the bag than many other brands. It is easy to tie the ties - and they are sturdy enough to provide a handle with which to carry out the trash. The bags themselves are pretty tough - I have not found another brand that will stand up to similar abuse without breaking. Glad bags will stretch and expand to accommodate virtually anything. That's not to say they won't rip - they will. They are PLASTIC - anything sharp in the bag will cut and/or puncture the bag.. When liquid is thrown into the trash bag, it has been my experience that these do not leak as much - or as often. Of course, if you slide the bag across pavement or a rough surface, it will leak. Again, this is PLASTIC. It's not some special high tech material - it's a trash bag. But if you're looking for a strong trash bag that can stand up to some abuse and over-stuffing without wimping out - or worse, disintegrating - look no further. The price is good (especially for the quality), there is no strong odor to them, and they do their job. That's why I continue to buy these.. Bottom Line: Practically simple - or simply practical. They work - and work a lot harder than any of the teenagers around here. ;) Sturdy. Can take some abuse. I've never had one "disintegrate" - which makes these a priceless value to me.

review_title: Good bags if you like spilling garbage all over your house.
review_body: I've never felt the need to write an Amazon review before but this bag has caused me more rage than you can imagine. My wife wanted to throw these away after we used 5 or 6, but I'm a cheap idiot and refused. Around 75% of the bags I've gotten out of this box have split in the bottom corners when removing the bag from the can, causing me to spill trash everywhere.  It has even happened a few times when double bagging it.  It looks like great value for 90 bags, but once you take into account that you have to double or even triple bag everything it loses it's value quickly.

review_title: They rip a lot more easily that I had hoped for the premium price
review_body: I usually buy bags in bulk at Costco, but I ran out and Amazon was easier.  These bags are ok...but they are not strong.  They rip a lot more easily that I had hoped for the premium price.  Next time I'll just buy less expansive bags.  I think part of the problem is that the material of these bags is sort of puckered and loose, so it catches on things that normally your bag would not catch on.  I'm sure it took lots of high paid engineers to come up with these, and I'm sure plenty of people like them...for me, they're a pain.  3-star review cause they're not total crap...just not what I expected based on the description and advertisements.

strong and tie well without tearing the seams.  However, they are definitely not meant for a true "tall kitchen trash can" because they're just about 3 inches too short. As a result, they continually fall into the trash can when nearly full, resulting in garbage finding its way between the liner and the can.

review_title: I have cancelled my subscription and replaced it with Glad Force Flex w/Febreeze as we used them without any ...
review_body: I used the Force Flex bags for two years and put these on our S&S subscription, since the Force Flex worked so well.  That was NOT the case with either box delivered, they have split on multiple occasions.  While I understand that over-filled bags are not ideal, sometimes households full of children tend to "trash stack" before any parents notice...it was those cases that resulted in splitting...and fairly often.. I have cancelled my subscription and replaced it with Glad Force Flex w/Febreeze as we used them without any failures for two years.  I would suggest that you do the same, I think it may be $0.03 extra per bag.

These bags are very well made and very resilient and tough. They are better than what I buy at Costco, albeit slightly more expensive per bag. I appreciate the convenience of having this delivered as it is not all that exciting buying trash bags. I think I will repeat purchase this.

review_title: I never ever worry about these bursting or breaking.
review_body: I'm a big fan of the Glad kitchen bags. They may not be the most top of the line of the Glad products, but they're perfect for my everyday use. Glass and other sharp edges will puncture the bags, and you can't overstuff them like the stretch bags. But they do hold heavy waste with no issues. I empty my kitchen garbage every few days after I clean out the (automatic) litter box waste drawer, so it never gets overfull, but it doesn't get heavy-ish. No waste, not even dirty cat litter, escapes the bag. And on days I empty the whole litter box, the only problem I have taking that bag of many pounds of cat litter out the street can, is lifting it up high enough to toss it into the (way too tall) street can. I never worry about these Glad bags bursting or breaking.. (There's another version of these bags, scented with Febreeze. Avoid those. They stink to high heaven in a cloying gross way. Unscented is the way to go.)
This entire box was defective - all the bags had slits up the side and came apart.  I had to send them back.

review_title: Great value and all around solid performer
review_body: I had read so many great reviews about these trash bags that frankly I was a tiny bit disappointed when I actually received them because they felt oddly thin and, well .. cheap. So far however I havn't had any tears or leaks (I've only gone through about 5 or so) so I'm giving them 4 stars. The fit isn't ideal for my simple human 40 liter trash can so I have to deal with a little bag showing around the top lid and they still feel very inferior compared to the trial pack of simple human bags that came with the trash can. Both minor issues especially considering that the simple human bags are three times the price of these!. UPDATE 12.02.15. Changing my review to a 5 star. Have almost gone through an entire box of 90 bags and not a single rip, tear or leak to date, including the times I overfilled it. The patterned stretchy material in the middle really does work. Also I figured out a way to put these in my trash can without any bag showing under the lid. For the price these can't be beat!

review_title: Changed Product. Poor Quality Paper Now
review_body: I've been buying these towels for a long time and now they have changed the paper quality. They don't absorb as half much and are very stiff and rough.
These paper towels have a strange finish to them.  I will make sure Amazon never substitutes these again.

I never expected myself to write a review for paper towels. First impressions, "that's a big box!" I didn't think about storage of my paper towels. This is Costco sized box of paper towel. I was hooked on these paper towels from the first pull from the roll. The paper towel actually ripped along the perforation. Not just part of the way, but the whole length of the paper towel. I was so impressed that the paper towel just didn't rip in half like most other products that I ripped off 5 more sheets and each one ripped only along the perforation. These paper towels have a good thickness to them. It just feels like you can handle a large mess. I felt I had the power to clean a spilled plate of spaghetti from the couch or a puddle from a 64oz big gulp from the floor of my car. These paper towels are tough as they feel while feeling soft, but not too soft. Just the right amount of tough and soft. I use them regularly to clean my seasoned pans. With the thickness of these paper towels, they are quite absorbent too. As far as smell goes, they have that good paper towel smell. I'd say if you're looking for a better performing paper towel, to give these a try. Maybe don't buy a giant box like I did, but pick up a couple rolls and see for yourself. Just having a paper towel that rips along the perforation is enough peace of mind for me to continue buying this product.

review_title: Not the same paper towel as when previously ordered!
review_body: I've ordered these multiple times before and they have been my favorite paper towel until the latest order. The thickness and durability is not the same anymore! Why did they change?!! :(

review_title: Badly stained w/ some green chemical
review_body: Half of the order was stained with something chemical-green. 4 out of 8 packets. See attached photos. These look toxic and unsafe. Apparently there is zero quality control.

review_title: It’s not the same Product as last time
review_body: I Have ordered this one time before it was Fine. This order it’s changed to Very Bad paper feels like sand Paper & seems to leave a film on your hands. I no longer have the box it came in . Please notify the company it’s like a bate & switch. Please give me credit so I can order Bounty . Thank you Jeannette Cupone

This is a great paper towel. After ordering this 16 roll we run out of them 6 days faster than the 24 roll. Looking now at the 24 roll it has gone up thirty dollars. Please bring back the 24 roll at a fair price (maybe 1 or 2 dollars more if needed). We can not continue to purchase at this price.
Rip off only five in the box!!

This is a BIG box of paper towels lol. They are ok, I thought that they would be more absorbent, but they are ok for cleaning up small messes. I like that they are plain white without the added dye from prints that no one looks at anyway. I think I am going to have to change the subscribe & save timing to once a year, so that makes them a good value even though you have to use a few more than I would like to finish the job.

I'm in love with paper towels.  They are just so handy and I love cleaning with them.  These are very nice and strong.  I love the select-a-size because I feel much better when choosing a small piece when I don't really need a full-size piece.  I use these with my weighted paper towel holder that clicks as I pull, rip, wipe wipe wipe, sparkle.. very satisfying.
I really like the large roll and the automatic shipment. I don't run out of towels very often.  Fewer changes

review_title: I particularly love these towels as they are perforated to used half sheets.  tremendously handy and economical.
review_body: great way to shop.  this is the brand I always use.  Now it's easier to buy in bulk and have it delivered.  loved these paper towels

review_title: Select a sheet saves paper towels
review_body: Very absorbent and the half sheets are often enough to do the job so that saves paper and money

review_title: Best paper towels on the market.
review_body: What can I say these are the best paper towels on the market and work the best.
I have been using everyday all summer, really like this product
I love having papertowels delivered right to my home. Love bounty
Great paper towels, Having beern using these for many years.
Our go to brand plus saves room in car to have it shipped.
Subscribe and save great feature for paper products.
Our family favorite. Great quality and absorption.
Love it! Great Plate, Great Price!
Perfect! - The box they arrived in was pretty banged up, but the plates were in excellent condition.  These are a bargain; I'll buy them again.
We love Dixie plates. Large enough and strong enough for a burger, sandwich, burrito. Good size, solid ,deposable plates.
Great value and good quality plate.
I bought the wrong size on accident, so they will last a while. The durability is fantastic.

Love these 10 1/16" plates by Dixie. It's just my husband and myself so we don't cook very much as we are getting older so we like to use paper plates to cut down on washing dishes. These plate are very sturdy and the perfect size. They are perfect for when the grandchildren come over also.

review_title: These are great. I love paper plates and paper towels
review_body: These are great.  I love paper plates and paper towels.  They are very much used in our house.  These are sturdy ....
These plates are wormy!  Every plate has little white worms on them.  It’s gross, i cannot eat off these!
dependable and cheaper than at the store.
Works great. Good price. Very handy. Doesn’t leak through. Not too thin or flimsy.
Love them
good deal
great
Plates are plate you get what you buy
Great plates
Great product at a great price point

review_title: Got paper towels instead of plates
review_body: I ordered Dixie paper plates but I recieved Brawny paper towels. I'm not sure where the error was but there definitely was one.
Love
You get more than what you pay for!
Received quickly and just what I was expecting.

I got a really nice discount that Viva was offering up. This household favorite towel is this product, not their Vantage line. The primary reason for this choice is how the product is used, not because the Vantage isn't good, but we did not want the patterned towel. The smooth towel is better when used anywhere near the nose, eyes, etc. This is the primary use we need.

review_title: got them and hate them since they are a nightmare to unravel since ...
review_body: While these were most rated on the wirecutter, got them and hate them since they are a nightmare to unravel since it's so tightly wound and since they are more like paper cloths and traditional power towels. I wouldn't call them "soft" as once again they are a different texture than expected. Effectiveness wise however yes they seem to work as expected.

review_title: hard to get off the roll
review_body: I've used these for years, and I recently moved from NE Ohio to SW FL.  Not sure if it's the humidity here or the batches I've been getting are just bad, but it takes two hands to get a sheet off and they more often than not rip before we get them unrolled. It's as if they are Velcroed to each other.  I'm unfortunately switching brands.

review_title: Major impact on office supply costs and waste
review_body: Great quality and value. Patients ask me all the time what kind of paper towels we have in our bathroom because they like them so much! Rolls last much longer than standard paper towel rolls and it's had a huge impact on office supply costs and waste. Our bathroom is in constant use with the many patients we see daily and we often do craft projects with kids. The amount of paper towel rolls we were going through on a regular basis was absurd, not to mention wasteful and environmentally unfriendly! I'm so glad I discovered this brand.

review_title: No fuss, no muss. Just gets the job done.
review_body: These are my favorite paper towels. I love that they come off in half sheets because with the quality of these, that's really all you need sometimes for small jobs. The absorbancy is great as well as the durability. These withstand washing multiple pots and pans and other clean jobs. I starting ordering them on subscription after my local grocery store was often sold out.

Junk!!! If you clean with the Viva paper towels, there's a white residue that is left behind. My counter tops look dusty after I use these towels. Also, if I use the paper towels to wrap my breakfast sandwiches to heat them in the microwave, the sandwich has pieces of the paper towel stuck to it every time. What the.....???

review_title: Quality of this product is amazing!
review_body: The price of these paper towels was too good to pass up! I love Viva paper towels because you only need one or two for a spill/clean up. My family goes through paper towels really fast. Problem is, they’re expensive... so I only get them when I get a great deal;) They lasted my family of 5 over 2 months (which is just unheard of). Amazing product! Definitely worth the money!!
