Worst paper towels ever. They’re soft but that’s not what I want in a paper towel. They are hard to take from the roll and have little absorption. Will never buy these again.

review_title: No longer as strong as they used to be.
review_body: I have always purchased Viva towels because they were stronger! You could actually wet them down, wring them out and keep going. I loved them. NOW - they fall apart when you get them wet and start wiping something down. They are no better than anything else you can buy. Very disappointed that they have apparently changed their product.
I don’t like these towels and am sorry I bought such a huge amount.  The sheets stick together and are a weird texture.

I’m not sure why this cover has so many good reviews; it is NOT waterproof. I’ve had this cover on my son’s bed the entire time and when I took the sheets and cover off to wash them, I found a huge stain. And this occures through a diaper, not even a direct leak through undies/jammies. Extremely disappointed.

review_title: Good for those who looking for a fitted sheet kind of cover.
review_body: I wish this product covers the entire mattress, this is more of a fitted sheet. The quality is good, though it does not serve my purpose. I do not wish to send it back at this moment only because I lost the original package that it came with.. Pros. -------. 1) Good Quality. 2) It has allergen traps. 3) Excellent customer service.. Cons. ------. 1) Not a zipped sheet. 2) I am afraid that fluid might pass through and spoil the mattress. I have a 2 years old and who loves to drink water/milk in the morning on weekends sitting between us... so I would not use this one there. : I got a reply from the manufacturer that they have tested this to be leak proof. I will go by them now as I have no proof that it might leak.

review_title: Pleased... Soft top... No plasticky sounds...
review_body: Bought this for our guest room mattress... the fit is fine... it definitely stays in place.  We slept on the bed for a couple nights to try out the new mattress so we got the opportunity to see what we thought of this mattress cover also.  As I mentioned, the fit is good and it stays in place, and most importantly there is no noise as you move around on the bed... no plasticky sounds, yeah!. I can not vouch for whether it is truly waterproof or not... I didn't test it before putting on the mattress and so I have no idea.  Hopefully we never have to find out but we hope we can take the manufacturer at their word along with reading other reviews.  Thanks to those who have put it to the test for the rest of us.

We've had this on for about a week. When we first put it on, my husband decided to test it's "waterproofness" (his word) by pouring water on it. Yes. Actual water out of a bottle, right on the cover. Despite reviews and product description, I was wary of him doing so. However, it all turned out just fine, as the only wetness stayed on top of the mattress protector - and on his side. It did not go through, our mattress was not wet. YAY! So we go to bed. I was a little worried it might be crinkly or noisy, as some customers had reported. It didn't *feel* that way, but I could definitely tell there was a lining underneath. Thankfully my worry abated as soon as I crawled into bed. I couldn't tell at all! And I haven't noticed it on other nights either. I am definitely happy with this purchase so far. My only concern - and it's minor - is how the lining will hold up when I wash it. I'll be sure to follow the care instructions closely!. I would definitely recommend this product to others and intend to buy another - so that when I wash one I can just put the other directly on (like I do my sheets). :)

My two year old is potty trained for the day time and we wanted to begin training her to sleep without a diaper at night and I was looking for something that wouldn't soak her mattress. The first week we had this in place she had two accidents and thankfully this worked as promised and the mattress was dry.. My daughter has a habit of sometimes sneaking into our bed middle of the night and therefore we ordered one for our bed too. So now we have a full size and a king size and trust me we sleep comfortably on it. We live in Texas but it doesn't feel hot or 'plasticky'.. Oh and we tumble dry on low heat and put it in the backyard to dry it out before reusing. That has worked well for us. We did that because of concerns from other users in the comments section.. It's a great product, buy without any hesitation.

review_title: It Really is a Great Price for a Great Mattress Cover.
review_body: when my spouse started having problems, i wanted a second mattress cover-just in case. After a few months i finally needed this SafeRest cover that sat in the closet unopened. the original mattress cover did not work. i threw it out and put this new cover on the bed. the SafeRest was on the bed for about a month, and i figured maybe it was the "magic matress cover.!" But maybe not, so i purchased another SafeRest  as an insurance policy. The price is Great so why not. Two days ago, i needed the second mattress cover, and there it was.. the first cover was wet and i needed to wash it, but i had another cover that i could use. Well, it worked! the mattress was totally dry! yeah! the only thing is that one needs to pay attention on how to dry these covers. i followed directions and the older on is ready to go NOW if needed,

review_title: This was easy to put on and has deep pockets that easily ...
review_body: It works. I got this because I was fostering a litter of puppies who kept urinating on the bed (I know, I shouldn't have brought them on.. But honestly you should've seen how they begged to cuddle on the bed). I wanted to protect my mattress. This was easy to put on and has deep pockets that easily fit over a King bed with a pillow top mattress.. In the photos attached, I spilled a large cup of water on my bed (accidentally!). It was soaked up by this mattress protector and my mattress was TOTALLY dry. Not even slightly moist. I also felt the bottom of the mattress pad (the side that lays against the mattress itself) and it was dry as well. This material is well made in that it absorbs on top, but protects on bottom to ensure moisture does not leak through. It's impressive, really.

review_title: It's OK and better than the two other products I tried
review_body: It's OK and better than the two other products I tried.  It does affect the feel of my memory foam bed a little and it does increase the heat some, too.  Also, it is not entirely crinkle-free.  But unlike the bamboo protector I tried, I didn't burn up with this.  It is nice and thin. Based on what others have said, it sounds like it will protect the bed, so I will keep it.  Don't know if I'll be able to tolerate it in the summer, however. UPDATE: Last week I accidentally spilled hot tea on my bed.  The protector worked well, keeping the liquid off my mattress.

I originally bought this because I’m 37 weeks pregnant and I’m scared my water will break in bed... on our brand new mattress. So growing up my mom put one of these on my bed and I hated it because they were so noisy, I swore I’d never use one again. So prior to buying this I read lots of reviews of several mattress covers. This one had the best reviews, so I went for it. When I received it, I washed it and put it on. I jumped in my bed and I was surprised! But the true test would be how I slept that night. I honestl slept fine. It’s loke nothing is even there. I’m very pleased and I have piece of mind that my mattress will be protected. If my water does break in bed, I hope it’ll hold up! And if it does, I’ll come back to update how the protector did.

review_title: So far, so good. Noiseless and comfortable.
review_body: So far so good. I followed the instructions and washed and dried it. Didn't burn like some ppl stated, but again, I followed the directions. It fits  nice and snug on my queen sized Tuft and Needle Mattress.. It's pretty comfy and has a rough textured cotton top. It's just rough to the fingertips. It feels really good to lay down on without bedsheets actually, but I have my sheets on it now and it just feels like another layer. It feels good.. It is also noiseless. I thought with the waterproof material, it would sound plastic-y, but it's fine, really.. Overall, I like it. It was only $30.00 and has a 10 year warranty. I won't find out how good it works until the future. Maybe I'll come back to this review in a couple of years after I've sweat in my sleep a couple [hundred] times.. *attached is a picture of how it looks underneath the sheets.
Pure junk! Poor, thin substitute for the “huge” rolls.
They have very good absorbency and do not tear apart when wet.
As always, good purchase. Competitive pricing. Love having it delivered instead of having to go buy it at the store.
Great absorbent product not made by Koch Bros
Bounty is my favorite.  this is all I buy
I have used this product for a long time
Very absorbent! Like the select-a-size.
Good towels, they get the job done.
I can never have enough paper towels, love these!
Must have, strong and lasting paper towel

I started buying these paper towels the day after I saw one of their commercials that pointed out how rarely one needs paper towels that can support a bowling ball. At my house, paper towels are used for soaking up spills and drying hands. These do a great job. I like that I can buy them in bulk and they show up at my front door in a reasonable amount of packaging. One less thing that I have to shop for weekly.

review_title: a good deal, once I figure out where to store ...
review_body: This is a LOT of paper towels. No, seriously -- a LOT. You know those big packs you buy at the grocery store? This is the equivalent of four of those. I'd ordered these without double-checking the quantity, and now we have enough paper towels to last us the full year. Still...a good deal, once I figure out where to store everything in this small apartment.

Paper towels are  good price?but for some reason I bought these more than  once and some of the rolls smell like eggs i let other people confirm and they do  smell like eggs..  I don't know why hopefully it's not a chemical  if so I will not order again..  Other than that they would be great .

I'm rating them 5 stars because they're a product that works at a great price. I've used cheap paper towels that rip in parts off the roll and disintegrate in your hands which is extremely infuriating, but these are cheap rolls that actually hold together and do what they need.. I mix between Sparkle and Bounty, and while obviously Bounty has a heartier build - I can't say it justifies the price in terms of use because I wouldn't say I need to use more Sparkle sheets to clean up the same mess I would with Bounty.

review_title: Can.t beat them for the $, just as good as costlier onesQ
review_body: I used to be a paper towel snob, however, necessity has changed my outlook on such things. I like these towels just as well as Bounty, my former all time brand user. They last just as long and even go through the washer without shredding, although I never Purposely put them in washer. Great product at a great price with subscribe and save. I highly recommend them to the cost conscious consumer.

review_title: Better than premium products for everyday use.
review_body: A regular item in our PrimePantry orders.  Love the select-a-size and the price. Who needs expensive premium paper towels to clean grandkids water paint brushes, kid or cat yak.  These do the job at a fraction of the price. They also take up less disposal space reducing lugging to curbside or transfer station.

I have ordered these many times before and have also ordered a competitive brand here & there. My last order was for these Sparkle paper towels. Once they arrived, I unboxed them & stored them as I usually do. Upon opening my first pack I smelled a specific smell. I thought to myself, no way! I continued using the first roll, smelling the smell the entire duration of the roll. Once I opened the next roll BOOM it hit me again & then my husband noticed. I will never purchase these again and the smell I’m talking about is ‘wet dog’! 😷

review_title: Great price delivered straight to door
review_body: I order these for our small business / office.  Fair price and serves our needs just fine.  We use them for clean-up - or napkins - and in kitchen and restrooms.  Buying these in quantity saves us time and money.. They are paper towels so I really don't have much to rave about but Sparkle is a good affordable servable brand so we're happy with them.

We have three dogs and as such, use a tremendous amount of paper towels.  The Sparkle paper towels are well made and hold up against wet and dry spills.  The simple imprinted design gives them a bit of an appeal, without any inks to rub off on the counter or anywhere else.  These are a high quality item and the price for subscribe and save can't be beat!

review_title: Bad decision! Not only are these very thin
review_body: Ugh!  I had been buying another brand, but decided to try these based on positive reviews and wanting to save money.  Bad decision!  Not only are these very thin, they are almost impossible to tear off properly.  I tend to grab and pull with one hand, and the other brand always tore off on the dotted line very easily.  I don't think I have ever managed to tear one of these without it ripping across halfway through.  I have to use two hands, and even then it's hard to get it right.  Now I'm stuck with a whole case of these losers, but I'll definitely be switching back next purchase.  You really do get what you pay for!

I purchased these pillow inserts for a 18" x 18" cover, despite the recommendations to size up, and they fit exactly as I wanted them to. I think if I'd sized up, the covers would have a hard time zipping closed. They are very soft inserts, so I wouldn't recommend them for people who want a firm throw pillow. Also, they're not the highest quality in the world on their own (think of an airline pillow, for instance), but I really don't find that it matters given that I never see the pillow itself. I'm really happy with the purchase given the low price.

After reading the recs I went with the 18 x 18 size for that size ikea cover. The result is too small. The corners arent filled. Id rather have a "basketball" look that someone else mentioned, at least it would be full!

review_title: Fantastic price! Cushy and can fit with 18" x 18" covers.
review_body: For the price, these are fantastic! They're very cushy and I bought an 18" x 18" pillow cover, and it fit fine (see pillows with the arrow covers). Note that the fabric lining for these pillows is not the highest quality though. They're a cheap, non-soft material compared to other pillow inserts I've bought that have very very soft cotton lining. These do not. However, they're being covered by a pillow cover anyway, so I don't really care. Just want to note the material. :)

review_title: You get what you pay for
review_body: Good price for a pillow that does the job as an ACCENT pillow. I got an 18x18 insert for an 18x18 sham and it fits well. For what I paid I am satisfied.. However, I removed one star as the insert is not one that I'd want to use as a pillow to rest on. It feels a bit stiff with some give, not pillowy like a typical bed or sofa cushion. This is good, however, for keeping its defined shape. The "case" also feels like fabric tissue paper, similar to the cases on airline pillows. (I will say the feel is MUCH fluffier/nicer than an airline pillow, however.) I could feel this tissue-like case through the sham.. This insert is great to fill out a sham and serve as a decorative accent and I highly recommend it for that purpose. That said, I would not recommend it as something to snuggle with.

review_title: Great replacement for my down-filled inserts from a major home ...
review_body: Great replacement for my down-filled inserts from a major home decor that shed feathers all over my family room.  I followed instructions and bought the 24X24 inserts for my 20x20 cases.  They fill out the cases nicely and are soft and comfortable.

I bought the 26x26" insert.  It is NOT thick and puffy at all.  The cover is cheap.  But it is the insert for a 26x26" square Euro sham for which I did NOT want a big puffy look, so it works well for me.  However, I suggest ordering an insert that is a size bigger than your pillow cover or sham if you want a more plump/puffy look.

Ordered this pillow as a plus option on a pillow cover. The pillow is what you would expect on an airplane. So the quality is terrible. Plus it came with a hand written not taped to it saying sample. Whatever that means. It is the wrong size for the pillow case Amazon offered with it. Not happy with my purchase. Can I return it and get a better pillow?

Very nice as a filling for pillows. Simple, made with thin material but it wasn’t too concerning since it is a decorative pillow filling anyway. The stuffing is great so far(hasn’t deflated), I’ve had these for two weeks now. Definitely worth it.

This pillow was so much more than I thought it would be. It came stuffed into a smaller box, but expanded to the advertised size immediately and not only fit the Euro sham I had perfectly, but also held it's shape very well. It is surprisingly firm enough to lay on to read or use as a back rest, yet soft. A perfect pillow.

I was influenced by the good rating for this product, but I've learned again that you get what you pay for.  Not enough fill - corners were flat.  Couldn't push or pull any of the filling into them.  The outside is not even real fabric.  Don't buy it!

I bought two but the over all width from left to right isn't as long as I would of liked or expected but they seem like nice lights . It's a plug in not batteries like some people would have you believe and there is a end attachment if you decide to hook a few of them up together but if not it has cap that covers it . They don't seem as bright as I would liked In fact the pictures make them look nice and bright like you'd expect from outdoor holiday lights but they are actually dimmer like the ones you'd have inside as mood lights ,I guess I'd compare these to the dimmer Christmas tree lights vs the bright outdoor ones or say dim like a night light would be . Also there are several settings to change the lights from a constant to different flashing patterns. Overall I like them but if you expected them to be nice and bright Id say find some other lights but if your looking for something more as mood / dim lights then these are for you .also I thought I could get away with two of these on one wall of my camper but it appears I'll need 3 so I'd say get out a measureing tape and then look at the measurements to see how many you'd need because they aren't very wide and you may need more then you expected .

review_title: I purchased this product in September and it worked great, looked great
review_body: I purchased this product in September and it worked great, looked great, and I had no problems with them until now, it's December, not even half a year later and they suddenly stopped working even though they are not used daily or constantly and they are used indoors. I do not recommend these at all.

Beautiful. I used it on the door leading to my backyard. It was over a blue curtain and it was so stunning. The button for different patterns all worked and were in the ordered they were written. The lights  weren’t bulky and seemed well made and sturdy.. The only downside was that after about 30 min of the lights being plugged in and being set up , they got dim and dimmer, until they stopped working completely.. I was so bummed, as I wanted them for decorations during the new year. I ended up buying from another seller and they weren’t as nice. Had I ordered/ received these earlier and had time to order another set, I would’ve gotten these again.

review_title: Beautiful if they survive the unraveling out of the box
review_body: These come in a tangled mess, I ordered 3 of them last Christmas and while untangling them from the box quite a few of the strings of lights didn't work. When it's Christmas time and you're doing everything else that needs to get done, the last thing you want to do is package something up and return it. The one and only box where it seemed to be packaged a little differently had all working lights and that was stunning when lit. They need to find a better way to package them.

review_title: Can't plug up and hang up without adjustments.
review_body: The slack for the power adapter to the string of lights is almost nonexistent.  How is one supposed to plug this up and also hang it up? You'd have to have high outlets or use an unsightly extension cord. Still that doesn't help..the issue is with amouny of cord to the controller box.  These are to hang, so this needs to have more slack.

Great set of lights!  They work very well, have a nice bright color, and the functions are easy to use.  The LED's look to be good quality, as are the wires.  I like the design a lot, too.  Though I will likely only use them around the holidays, they are great to put in areas that normal lights won't work the same, such as a window or draping an unused fireplace.

review_title: Product is defective, came in the mail and doesn't ...
review_body: Product is defective, came in the mail and doesn't work at all. The lights are much more spread à part than is described and end up covering close to my entire bedroom wall with a lot of space in between each strand. Very disappointing

review_title: Not enough strands for my taste, but useful if you don't need a lot of light
review_body: There were not nearly enough strands for what I was looking for. The other curtain lights I owned had almost twice as many strands. I returned the item.. On the other hand, if you're looking for a curtain light that does not get too bright, this may be a good option for you.

review_title: Order more than one set for it to look like the main photo.
review_body: The lights are lovely and a good price. I do have a couple of cons though.. One light was missing from a strand, which showed exposed wires. Didn't affect the circuit though, so that's a plus.. The lights aren't as bright as you'd expect. You definitely need more than one set for it to look like the first photo.. A word of caution, they tangle easily.. All in all, still pleased. I bought these for my husband who likes to hang out on the patio a lot. He says he loves them, so I'm thrilled nonetheless.

review_title: Count your LEDs first! They’re not sending what they advertise
review_body: I purchased this one specific light because I needed 300 LEDs.. When I opened the box I could immediately tell it looked way smaller than it needed to be and shown on the amazon page.. I counted it and it was 10 set of 14 LEDs which totals to 140 and not the 300 that was advertised.. Pretty disappointed to say the list.

This is the second steamer I have ordered.  The first one lasted about 6 months and the on/off switched failed.  I have noticed they have changed the switch on this model.  The steamer works great, very powerful yet light weight and compact.  It's the ideal thing to get last minute wrinkles out of everything , including T-shirts all the way to suites.  I love this little guy!

review_title: This is perfect for daily use because of the compact size and ...
review_body: This is perfect for daily use because of the compact size and ability to heat up quickly. I purchased this product for steaming flower girl dresses and it worked really well, saving me a trip out to have it done. I wish I ordered one a long time ago!
I pulled this product out of the box immediately to try on my bridesmaid dress. It is awesome. I would recommend. It is small (which I like both for storage and travel), but very effective.

It is perfect for touch up jobs. You would not be able to do all of your ironing with this because of it's size. But it is meant to be portable. The only problem I have is that it sometimes spits out huge blasts of water when I am not tipping it. I don't know if I can blame the product or user error. It doesn't ruin anything, just makes it wet. I love it for when I want to wear something that needs a quick steam.

Similar to other comments steamer heats VERY fast and works fairly well. One cautionary tale, however, DO NOT use it at any angle at all. Must be straight up or scalding water will flow out. I understand that the compact nature of the steamer requires this but it seems pretty dangerous. As other people have stated this is a very good steamer for traveling. For home use, I might go with one that has a tank on the floor and a hose.

Great little steamer! My wife wears dress clothes to work each day and having a steamer knock out the wrinkles makes her prep for work so much better. Because of its compact size we can take it along on conference trips. If you are looking for a clothes steamer that works, doesn't break the bank, and is portable - this is the one for you!

review_title: palm size, travel friendly / all plastic material built
review_body: It looks much smaller than the picture, but I found it effective as well dealing with clothes wrinkles. Despite of its size, you don't have to spend too much time steaming since the water is super boiling inside which is effective. However, I do wonder how plastic material stand with such high degree of water, and hoping the tube could be made with steel. But in that case this small gadget would be much more heavier, I guess. Still a very good product, would recommend to people who travel a lot!

review_title: One tank of water is good for a shirt
review_body: This steamer is small but definitely gets the job done. One tank of water is good for a shirt. Make sure you don’t fill it up with too much water and keep the steamer upright. I know that seems obvious but some reviews have complained about water spilling out. This has only happened to me a couple times, but this was user error and in no way had anything to do its the usability of the steamer. Overall a great product.. FYI, this steamer is not cordless.

I never used a steamer before, but I loath ironing.  It takes too long, I get creases where I don't want them and sometimes the stupid thing scorches my sweaters.  This thing is SO easy and fast!  It works fantastic - takes the wrinkles out of my sweaters much quicker than the iron does.  Slacks were a little more of an effort, but still easier than with the iron.  Love this purchase!

I previously had a non-portable garment steamer, and it was bulky and took a while to heat up. So I decided to get this on a whim.  It is much easier to use and heats up faster. It's the best steamer I've used so far. Worth every penny, I am tossing the big, bulky one I had. This works as a total replacement and takes up less space.
works great.  whoever invented the swiffer deserves all the millions of dollars they are getting.  so does the person that invented post it notes.
Their swiffers what else is there to say?
love these
good buy
Exactly as described.
Don't buy the imposters when you can get this bargain!
It's almost as if there were a magnet picking up the dirt.  I can quickly use the swiffer throughout the house on our hardwood and tile floors and be done with sweeping in a jiffy!
Essential for cleaning tile, vinyl, wood, and bamboo floors.  Package has enough wipes for a month of cleaning.
Good price for these

review_title: ... for years and the price point on amazon is amazing.
review_body: picks up the cat hair perfectly - I've been using the for years and the price point on amazon is amazing.

review_title: Hate What it Said, Loved the Way it Said it
review_body: This is a very good quality scale. I appreciate the fact that it does one thing and one thing only; it weighs things. It doesn't calculate your BMI, it doesn't ask you to program different members of the household, and it doesn't connect via Bluetooth to your smart devices. It's accurate to about two tenths of a pound.  When you stand on it, it doesn't feel like it's going to break.  The digital readout lights up only when you stand on it, so it's easy to read and you can use it in the dark. It's got a sleek look to it so I don't feel the need to hide it when company comes. I left the "getting started" sticker on mine, but you can obviously take that off.

This scale works great. I needed a new digital scale quite a while ago, and I always try to look for the best quality for the lowest price, and I think this is it. I've had it for about 6 months now, and I guess I generally use it once a week or sometimes more, so it gets regular use. It needs AAA batteries, which is slightly annoying because I feel like I always have AA on hand but not AAA, but it comes with two of them, so it's fine.. You do have to use it properly to get the proper results, so I do also sometimes get slightly different numbers, but when I'm making sure I use it correctly, it works perfectly. I have wood floors, so that's good for me, but just remember that you cannot use it on carpet or anything that has a give because it won't be accurate. You have to wait for the numbers to blink before you get the final result. If it seems way off, step on it and let it blink then go back to zero and try again. That zeros it out at the proper number. Sometimes I have to do this for no particular reason, maybe because I keep it stored underneath a table, and when I pick it up and movie it, it un-calibrates it or something, I dunno, but I think that's fairly standard for any digital scale like this.. So I think it works accurately as long as you use it right. I like the back lit numbers, they make it easy to see. It's glass, but I guess it holds a ton of weight, so don't be worried about that. I also like that it's a .1 scale so that's a more accurate number than just a whole number and you can see even a little bit of progress. Of course, your weight can fluctuate daily, or even hourly, so I wouldn't rely on any scale to tell you down to the ounce what you weigh, but it does give you a very accurate measurement at the time of usage. Highly recommended!

This scale was exactly what I was looking for.  A regular scale that I didnt have to spend 45 minutes programming before I used it. lol.  Out of the box, stepped on it, and that was it.  Its thin and lightweight, and has a nice look compared to my REALLY old dial scale.  I would give it 5 stars, but the only downside is if you step even just a little off of the main spot (like a little lower or higher on the scale), the scale reads your weight wrong.  A little lower and I lose 10 pounds (yay! haha), and little higher and I gain 10 pounds (boo).  Otherwise, you just have to find that right spot that reads your correct weight.. Edit: after having this for awhile, it now gives the wrong weight several times before you get the correct one.  I have to step on it, step off, step on, step off. lol.  Eventually it has the correct weight.  I know my average weight and while the scale taking 40-50 pounds off each time is funny, its not helpful. hahaha

I bought this scale because of the good reviews. It worked perfectly the first day. The next morning, I went to get on it and the blue light came on the screen but no numbers. I tried replacing the batteries, hitting the button on the back, checking the manual that came with it (which had no information on how to fix this), and gave up. It was on wood, not carpet, and I can't think of anything that would've made it stop working except it's just a faulty product.. I would've returned it if I hadn't thrown the box away.

review_title: While the scales does it's job just fine, there are a couple of things I don't ...
review_body: While the scale does it's job just fine, there are a couple of things I don't like.. Even without my glasses on, I should be able to see the 3" numbers. The combination of black numbers on a blue lit back make it difficult. The black numbers disappear until I get crouch down to see them. I'm glad it flashes a couple times to indicate the scale is finished reading the weight, otherwise I would not know when it was done (I can somewhat see the flashing).. The other thing might be common to most digital scales. It seems to use the weight from a previous reading if it isn't too far off. Eg., if you weigh yourself, step off and weigh yourself again while holding a cell phone, you will probably get the same weight. I'm guessing this is to give a sense of repeatability where a weight as accurate as possible would cause more confusion because it would never be exactly the same.

After looking at many electronic scales, I finally decided on this one, and I'm very glad I did!. It's aesthetically pleasing and loads quickly. I'm not too crazy about tracking my weight down to 0.1 accuracy (besides, it fluctuates throughout the day) so this gets the job done. I've stepped on and off the scale multiple times and most of the time I get a consistent reading (I think it helps to wait a second in between re-weighs)

review_title: This is just as accurate as my doctor's scale, ...
review_body: This is just as accurate as my doctor's scale, even though I wouldn't mind it lying to me once in a while.  It gets the same measurement no matter how I stand on it, though be careful.  I had it backed all the way up to the wall, which may have taken the pressure off, because it claimed I dropped ten pounds.  I wanted to keep it there, but my boyfriend moved it away from the wall.  It was a mournful day.

I'm on the "weigh yourself once a week" plan. So I used this scale appx 5 times, truly loved it for the clarity of the numbers and the design. But then it died.. This happened after I'd lifted the scale to move it and the batteries fell out. After that it never worked again. I put the batteries back in - nothing. Turned them in a variety of polarity directions, even though I placed them correctly the first time. Nothing. I replaced the original batteries with new  batteries. At insertion there was a very indistinct glow of the digital number pattern, then it died.. I have returned this to Amazon, they have kindly refunded the purchase price. I suspect I just got a dud, but won't be re-purchasing to find out. :(

review_title: This is a very nice scale. I highly recommend it
review_body: This is a very nice scale. I highly recommend it. I decided to only give it 4 stars because when you first step on the scale, it gives a false weight. After the first time, it says what the weight truly is over and over again. It's just the first time that it's off. Make sure to stand and wait for it to blink the number. Other than that it's a great scale.

When in the market for a new scale i looked at a lot of new tech alternatives but am happy with my purchase of something that does the basics. This scale is located at a great price point and operates with good efficiency. First of the scale works properly and gives a pretty exact weight. Between the scale at the gym, the scale at the doctor, and this scale there was only a slight decimal of difference (170.5, 170.8, 170.1). Second, the reading comes out very quickly. Some other scales may take a couple of seconds to calibrate and then you step on and wait another couple of seconds to find out how much weight registered. With this scale you step on and within a 2-3 seconds it has your weight on the display. I really like that the display lights up with a blue background which is great for darker locations for the scale (my scale is in the bathroom in the corner were is darker than most). Finally, the last scale i had died within a year from the humidity in the bathroom but this scale has no issues with water. Many times i will come out of the shower onto the scale and it has continued to work perfectly fine for over 6 months now. Overall this scale is easily 5 stars out of 5 for its low price point and the fact that it works just as well as any more expensive scale.

These are a little stinky (well, it smells good but it's a little overwhelming) when you first put them in the bin but you don't really smell them after that.  I've been super impressed by how they keep smell down.  I have a 15 month old and all diapers just go right into the garbage and I never smell them anymore since switching to these gain scented bags!

review_title: Leaves your garbage can smelling so nice!
review_body: These garbage bags smell amazing.  I love the Gain scent, it's so strong with a nice fresh scent.  I have it in my kitchen and notice that it helps mask the funky garbage odor that you sometimes smell when walking by, or opening the trash can lid.  It's now the only garbage bags that I will use and no doubt will continue to order on Amazon.

These bags smell AMAZING!  Just wish they were available in a larger quantity than 100.  Price is high just for the 'smell' as I can get 200 bags for $16.57 thru Sams Club (no scent).  Sometimes I just splurge and buy them anyway.  Nice fresh scent for the office trash cans.

review_title: ... quite well at helping to reduce the smell of garbage. Stop scents
review_body: These work quite well at helping to reduce the smell of garbage. Stop scents, such as coffee ground, will overpower the scent, but that is to be expected. They are fairly strong and give quite a bit without tearing. I have had a couple of instance of quality control issues with GLAD bags, but all-in-all this is a great product that I have purchased several times and would recommend.

These will last us forever. So glad I found these.  They are well made for the price and I’m happy I don’t have to go to the store to get them.  More than double the quantity I’m normally able to find in this brand and style.

I have a subscription for these bags and have never had a problem until just recently. Literally every bag I pull out of the box immediately tears along the side seam. It has to be a production issue. Sending them back and hoping the next box is better quality.

review_title: Only bags I get at the moment.
review_body: I have this item on Amazon's subscribe and save.  The smell is rather pleasant without being overpowering but we never had a problem with the garbage can smelling.  I get these because the price is good, they fit, they always work as intended, and they don't rip on the way out the door.

Love this product. I guess my whole family does too. Everybody comes to my house to borrow garbage bags. Good quality and quantity. The smell is great also. i don't think my husband would appreciate me if i stop ordering. lol he uses them religiously.

review_title: Work great but be careful if you're sensitive to strong smells.
review_body: These work really well and the price is great. The "Febreze and Gain Smell" is strong, however. It's not so noticeable in the kitchen except when changing out the bags, but I can't keep one in my bedroom. The smell gives me a headache. It should be noted, however, that I get migraines, and strong smells are one of my triggers, so as long as the strong, artificial, clean smell doesn't bother you, these bags are a great value for the price, and you won't have to buy again for a while.

These trash bags are the best trash bags!!! Not only do they smell good, but they're strong and can handle a lot of weight!  Like from beer and wine bottles, etc. great product, delivered earlier than I expected!

I have been a Bounty person forever, but I thought I would give this brand a try because it was cheaper and had received good reviews.  Glad I bought this brand.  I believe it is better than Bounty - I don't seem to need as much to get a spill up or clean the windows, counters, etc.  Will definitely purchase again.

review_title: If you are wondering if these are absorbent...
review_body: I was concerned that these would be thin and a waste of money. They are just right and absorbent enough to wipe the stove with just one sheet. The pieces are regular sized.  One way it could be made better is if they made them in "select-a-size". For now, I just cut them in half.

Made amazingly well, and I am super picky about my Paper Towels. I just wish they came in pick a size then they would last longer then a month. But I am sold, for the price you can't beat these high quality but gentle paper towels. They are strong and very well made. Hope First Quality continues to see these here on Amazon!

review_title: Decent but  not a great deal.
review_body: These are decent paper towels but you don't get many per roll. The weight per roll is poor, so the value may seem on the surface great but it's not. I will look to another brand in the future for a better deal.

review_title: Ok, but not great...depends on your need
review_body: These are OK, but I have better luck with other off brand paper towels.  These are great for quick spills, but I wouldn't recommend them for cleaning as they break down too quickly.

review_title: worse than dollar store paper towels - save your money
review_body: Don't waste money on this.  Buy your paper towels from another manufacturer.

I am baffled.. I had an old roll of a different brand paper towel (Scott's) I went to compare side by side.. Just to find out they are IDENTICAL! I swear I am not making this up.. The on on the left is "Plenty ultra" and the one on the right is Scott's ....

review_title: I like the Full size sheets
review_body: I like these.  The rolls are smaller than I am used too from like Bounty...but I hate the select a sheet type paper towels and that seems to be the only kind that the local stores sell.  I like the full sheet and am willing to take the smaller size...the sheet is not smaller, the roll is.

review_title: Great quality at a great price
review_body: Great quality at a great price!  Much better quality than most of the paper towels I usually buy.  Equivalent to the bounty towels or better.  I can clean my bathroom and kitchen counters and their strength lasts a long time and can hold a lot of dirt .  I love how amazon packages come straight to my door.

review_title: Quality is good - kitchen uses for many
review_body: Paper towels arrive when needed.  Quality is good - kitchen uses for many things.. Delivery is the best thing about this - when supply gets low product appears using subscription order system!  And a price break, too!. UPDATE:  Still a great deal and idea

by far the worst microfiber cloth i purchased.  don't be suckered into buying this bundle for the cheap price.  Cheap price = cheap quality.  Very unhappy with the quality of the cloth.  Mainly use this to clean glasses and glass products, but these leave trail of tiny bits of fiber on the surface.  now i am using these for fishing and cleaning floors...

review_title: Great cloths, half for cleaning the car, half for the home
review_body: Awesome cloths for cleaning without scratching.. Each cloth is a good size and the quantity is a nice.. Three different colors also help to keep use separate, eg. wash, dry, polish.. Wash them by themselves else they will pick up lint from other clothes and they tend to stick and be abrasive to other items in the laundry.

WOW I cant believe the BAD reviews on these, I ordered the second package and have no prob with them at all, yes they will shrink when you wash them in a normal cycle of wash. But, it says wash cold. I personally dont worry about it. I wash with my towels and dry with them. They are great!! I have NO HOLES or probs with stitching at all, you can buy anything of these clothes and pay a high price and not get any better quality. I personally would rather not pay that high price and get something for my dollar. You take a chance on these I know I love the way they clean, and have bought many in the past, used to clean houses for a living, and holes and all they are the best at cleaning anything. I LOVE WHAT I GOT thank you Amazon for the great buy!! And I will be buying more!!

Works as intended. I use these to clean my cars windshield/windows (I pair it with invisible glass cleaner) and it leaves my windows crystal clear. The moment it touches liquid, it absorbs it immediately. Easy to wash as well.

I love these! Remember when we used rags instead of expensive paper towels all the time? I especially like microfiber because it really picks upo the dust.  I also use these on my face. I am a DIY-er and I have a special oily mixture for facial cleansing. I put it on my face and then put a hot microfiber cloth on top and let it sit until it gets cold. The results are fabulous. I'm sure you'll find your own uses.

Very disappointed as this makes 2 out of 2 amazon basics purchases which have been terrible quality for prices that aren't that great.  These cloths have almost none of that microfiber gripping when you brush it across your fingers.  I have some left over unused Zwipes brand microfibers from amazon that blow these away for microfiber grip.  These weigh in at 30g each on my postal scale while the Zwipes are 33g and you can feel it in thickness.  The Zwipes are also 80% cotton instead of these which are 90% cotton and its well known across the internet that 80% is the sweet spot for a quality microfiber.  I don't understand all the positive reviews on here for these cloths when there is a superior product at the same price available on amazon.

review_title: Terrible - wish I could get a refund.
review_body: The biggest issue with these is the fact they leave behind a layer of smudge and sledge.  They look right. The tag is removable and they're soft.  The problem is as anyone knows who has used microfiber towels that once washed (no matter how they're washed) they're never the same. THe key problem after washing they leave a trail of whet smudge behind.  Unfortunately hear do it from the word go. Which makes them absolutely useless.. I can't even use them to dry my glasses after an ultrasonic bath. Let alone clean windows or televisions Etc. m. Do yourself a favor. Avoid them.  The Costco towels on shelf are excellent and less expensive.  Skip

After reading about a beauty blogger using basic microfiber cloths from the automotive aisle on her face for the oil cleansing regimen, I decided to give them a shot. Worst case scenario, I had a new assortment of cloths for house cleaning. Thankfully, that won't be necessary. These utilitarian cloths have done an amazing job of gently exfoliating my face with each wash. After three days, washing twice as usual each day, my face is clear, glowing and softer than a week of use with my clarisonic- and the best part is that they don't need to be charged! Don't waste your money on the pretty frou-frou cloths, just get these. I'm fairly sure these are going on my list as holy-grail products.. (Note: start out slowly and gently when using them on your face)

review_title: low pile, scratchy tag. Not good for cars
review_body: The pile is very, very low on these, and they have a massive, scratchy garment tag on them. I had planned on using these for applying a waterless Wash-and-wax on my car, and between t he low pile and tag I wouldn't dare try using them on the outside of my car. I'll have to find some other use for them to make it feel like not a waste of money. I'd suggest just going to your local big white-and-blue retailer and getting their microfiber cloths from the auto department. High pile, no tags and barely any more expensive as these.

Bought these based on the provided information. Description lists these as 12x16 which was exactly what I was looking for. However these are actually 11.5x16. I needed the extra half inch. I cut this size in half to use with a Swiffer mop/duster. With these missing the half inch they fall a bit short and I imagine they will shrink up after being washed and dried. Quality is ok for the money. Unfortunately I will be keeping these since I already cut one in half to try it. Should have measured before cutting.

review_title: Great bag for the people that love to cram as much into the bag as humanly possible
review_body: These are great for those that pack as much as they possibly can into their garbage bins. I'm one of those smoosh and compact the trash to fit more and more in to make it last until garbage day. They are durable and can handle a ton of garbage. I will say that I'm disappointed with the section of bag where the ties are, on top. I seem to poke holes in it all the time. It stretches out or I poke it with my nail. Seems less durable than most bags on that portion which is surprising when the rest of it is so tough and durable. They have some work to do on that before I'd give it the fifth star.

review_title: Not sure if I got a bad batch, but several to the bags ripped at ...
review_body: Not sure if I got a bad batch, but several to the bags ripped at the bottom without very much in them. The price was good but the quality wan't worth the savings. I ended up going local to get the bags from my usual store.

review_title: Which is awesome when you are carrying the garbage across the lawn ...
review_body: Work well, but, the strings often break. Which is awesome when you are carrying the garbage across the lawn and then suddenly there is trash everywhere, and that guy in your building jumps to help you clean up the trash, which is now blowing in the wind. And its not awkward at all when the wrappers from your feminine hygiene products are among those things blowing in the wind. Not that this happened to me or anything....

Still working through the box of these that I bought but most of them have leaked through the bottom. I've taken the trash out only to find the can wet and a leaking bag. We recycle so there isn't anything that would puncture or tear these bags. Very disappointed in this name brand product.

Living with five guys, we go through a lot of trash and are pretty haphazard on packing the bin till it's stuffed, thankfully, these bags are super sturdy. We've been using these bags for the past three years and I've never had one rip on me even after stuffing it beyond capacity (of normal kitchen garbage). I am sold and will forever hold a commitment to this particular product unless there is a change.

I  never paid much attention to my kitchen bags as long as they didn't break and were a reasonable price.  But these flexible Glad bags Rock!  The flexible weave means they stretch readily over the edges of the can and come off just as easily.  Sometimes little things make life better; these bags are excellent for people with arthritis or anyone annoyed by handing the bags.  I'll never buy anything else.

review_title: I don't recommend using these at all
review_body: not strong at all, if you fill up a bag with a normal amount of trash it still gets holes in it.  I don't recommend using these at all.  Every time we lift them out of the can we end up having to pick up trash from holes or double bagging to prevent a mess.

review_title: Terrible product, bags come apart at the top..
review_body: Terrible garbage bags.. I could perhaps have a defective bunch, but they tear at the top where the collar with the drawstring attaches.. so I've been gingerly walking the trash to the garbage, holding the bag shut with my hands.. terrible..

Never buying these again - I've had a couple now just split right along the bottom. These also have an alarming tendency to leak. Their bottom seems to be their weakest point, but I've also had the "strings" break off, and the channel for the strings is also critically weak. "Stronger with less plastic" - hilarious. Would not recommend for anything but the very lightest duty.

They tear almost every single time from the lip of the trash can. It's the right size and everything, but when I pull the bag to tie it up, it just pulls apart right where the lip of the trash can was. It's pretty annoying.. I have to double bag the garbage almost every time. That doesn't bother me as much because I can't wait to use all these up. I wanna go back the the old bags I was using. I always thought Glad was a good brand, but now I don't think so.

I've been purchasing paper towels from Amazon for the last couple of years.  I switched from the other major "B" named brand to Brawny because of the constant problem of getting rolls that smelled really bad.  Now I found with the last two shipments of Brawny that the towels smelled like a urinal.  Unfortunately, I've come to the conclusion getting it cheaper may come at a cost of getting a product they can't sell in the regular markets.

review_title: Favorite Paper Towel Choice for Decades
review_body: Brawny has been "my paper towel choice" for many many years.  The pick-a-size works great (detaches easily) and is a smart way for me to not be wasteful.  Brawny brand absorbs and stays strong.  If I use a paper-towel to dry my just washed hands, I often lay it out on the counter to re-use and once dried, it still works!

I love Brawny Pick-A-Size paper towels. They are sturdy, large, tear well and absorb well. I prefer buying them by the case, which is how I receive them when I order from Amazon. Bonus points if I can order them and get a discount using the coupon that can be applied at checkout. The prices vary (sometimes they are more expensive than I’m willing to pay), so monitor the price if you pay attention to such things. It usually drops.

These are super heavy duty and well worth the price.  I have a geriactric dog that has recently forgotten about being potty trained, and so we go through a ton of paper towels at my house.  As a thrifty woman, I needed to find some that were priced well but weren't thin due to the urine that I am constantly cleaning up but not wanting to touch.  These are perfect and lasting so much longer than other paper towels I have gotten in the past for this task.

review_title: They don't seem to be any bigger than the old Scott Big Rolls
review_body: These are a little bit thicker than the Scotts we used to get on subscribe and save, but also a little more expensive. They seem just as reliable, with enough to them to be able to use for scrubbing without falling apart.. I'm not sure what the significance of the XL sizing is, but as long as the price doesn't go up, we will likely keep buying these with subscribe and save.

review_title: Don’t fall apart and very absorbent!
review_body: Pick a size is great, more economical. Like the absorption and thickness Brawny has that other popular brands claim to have but don’t. I use them for hand drying and any/all kitchen cleanups as kitchen towels and sponges hold bacteria. Also use the same way in the bathrooms and other areas in my home. I’ve used Brawny Paper Towels for years and don’t intend to change.

review_title: Ordered Brawny, received Sparkle. An inferior brand.
review_body: I love Brawny Paper Towels. What I actually received was a giant box of Sparkle paper towels which are cheap, flimsy and terrible quality. I'd return if it wasn't a hassle. I would think you'd be notified if the product changed something as significant as the brand. Removing this from my subscribe and save.

review_title: Soaking wet. Have to put on dumpster.
review_body: Soaking wet.. Have to put on dumpster.

These paper towels do a good job of absorbing. Also like that they can be torn off in smaller sizes so as to minimize waste. Our consumption of paper towels has decreased and I attribute it to the smaller towel sizes. You can break off longer sheets if needed. This has saved us money while allowing us to purchase a good quality towel.
so the package was short 6 rolls! is there another package coming with the rest of the towels? If not I am going to return it. package did not seem to be sealed correctly.
The best for diarrhea
Can't beet Bounty. Quick shipping.
These are a great size and very reasonable.
Good
Good towels
These are great. A little pricey but worth the cost. They last a long time, the rolls are nice and big. Quality of paper towel is good too. Nice and thick.
Of course I love select a size. I may have bought a lifetime supply of paper towel but I'm cool with that.
Good

review_title: Cheapest per towel price for Bounty
review_body: Cheaper than our local wholesale club store (rhymes with LOSTGO :p) and these fit our under cabinet paper towel mount.  We love any select a size Bounty product but for the price these are the best way to go.  There is also a $5.00 first time purchase coupon on the item listing at the time of this writing (5/27/18) which brings it down to $30.14.  Can't beat that even if you only get it one time.  Highly recommended subscribe and save item!
Great product, great price. Especially with coupon! I have a large family and even more animals and this pack lasted us a good month.
Good quality, good value! Will buy again.

Very crappy! I had stuffed peppers on this and it soaked through the plate and caused holes in it and it's an extremely flimsy plate! I will just get the members mark ones from Sam's club! Cheaper and way sturdier!

I had this on my subscribe and save. Product always came on time and undamaged. I stopped the subscription however in an attempt to use less disposable products. Nice designs that vary from shipment to shipment. No leaks and don’t break when using a knife to cut your food.

review_title: I love thes for when someone wants to eat after mid ...
review_body: Hello, I love thes for when someone wants to eat after mid nite ,a midnite sandwich / snack, ! Or in between meals , because it makes it easier on me at clean time, later!

review_title: Perfect Disposable Dinner Plate -- Great Price!
review_body: Seriously love these paper plates (perfect dinner plate size) and they are a better price on Amazon then the wholesale box stores. What's not to love?!
Um...wrong item was delivered.  I need the plates, not toilet paper, especially a brand that I don’t use! 🙄😡🤦🏻‍♀️
They do the job. Good middle of the road option. Not as durable as chinet but not as expensive and much better than the cheap foam plates.

These are great for basic, everyday meals. They are a little too flimsy for meals heavy with sauce though. They seem to hold up, but you can definitely feel the bottom getting wet and absorbing the sauce. Overall they work just fine for a weeknight dinner and the plate is well worth the cost.
These were a bit bigger than I thought (my fault) but they are sturdy, good quality, and the price was good.
These are great plates for the price.  Very sturdy and a good size.  We buy them for our kids to eat on so we don’t have to do as many dishes:)
WHY O WHY CAN'T WE GET A PAPER PLATE WITH A DEVIT ON THE RIM TO KEEP A FORK FROM SLIDING INTO THE FOOD???????
Lots of sturdy plates for the money. I had a coupon too, so ended up a little cheaper than in the local stores.

review_title: The quality is great for the price
review_body: Great quality for the price.  Use them for camping versus plates we have to wash
Did not receive yet,but they look good.
Good quality paper plates for the price.
GOOD STRONGER PAPER PLATE
Great size and strong
exactly as expected
As expected
as expected durable

review_title: Excellent paper towels, and a lot of them.
review_body: Very good paper towels, and a lot of them! Thick, soft and absorbent. The only thing I don't like is the "select a size" feature where you can tear off half a towel, I find that to be a goofy notion. btw save the empty tubes in the center and stuff them with your dryer lint! When you want to start a fire in the fireplace, put one of the lint-stuffed tubes on your fireplace rack! Burns slowly, works great to light hard firewood!

These are my absolute favorite paper towels. They are soft enough to blow your nose if you need to, but strong enough to soak up spills and dirt and still be rinsable for reuse. I’ve accidentally bought the VIVA Advantage line (like a lot of people have accidentally done at least once) and they make me realize how good the original line is. The Choose-A-Sheet feature is also really awesome, so you can use smaller amount of towel.

We gave these a try as our other brand kept rising in cost.  At first we were skeptical because the rolls appeared smaller.  However, upon using these paper towels, we were delighted to find there was the same amount of towels on the roll.  It seems that because these are much more softer (and durable) that they pack tighter on the roll.  These paper towels are actually soft enough to use on your nose!  Great product!
I thought for "Big Plus" the rolls would be bigger, even though they may have more sheets, it seems about the size of a standard roll.. Quality of the towel is good, doesn't tear and absorbent.

review_title: These paper towels are the BEST paper towels you can buy
review_body: These paper towels are the BEST paper towels you can buy. They are choose a sheet which I love for small messes or larger ones. They are the softest paper towels I have ever used, but VERY durable. My husband as actually washed some dishes with them once and they didn't rip to shreds. I have them on my subscribe and save through amazon. If you are looking to change your paper towels , absolutely 100% change to Viva.

review_title: Best paper towels on the market at great price
review_body: Love these paper towels ! Strong, can be used as wet towels with water and soap/ dish soap and still doesn’t break or disintegrate. Lint free!! You will not have to live with white dust all over your counter tops and kitchen every time you take off a sheet. Sticks great together so the rolls are neat and paper not overused unless you chose to ( not because you get a yard of paper every time you pull some off!). Discovered it of mistaken when I run out paper towels and bought a roll from Walgreens. Det was 3 years ago, haven’t used any other brand since. Love it!

review_title: Saves money in the long run
review_body: A friend recommended these type of paper towels to me after I told her that I quit buying paper towels because some people in my house use 10 or more at a time.  These are great because they are sticky and harder to remove, so a person really has to work if they want to use five or six. It’s much easier just to grab one or two and clean up that way.  So the paper towels now last much longer in my house and I am happy about that.  And I’m finally buying paper towels again.

These are by far the worst paper towels I have ever purchased.  They leave a slight white residue.  They smear water/juice/other liquids instead of absorbing.  They tear easily, not only on the perforated lines.  And I personally hate how sticky they are.  One of my hands are often full when I need a paper towel and it's impossible to get a paper towel with 1 hand.  I'm going back to brawny and bounty.

These towels are awkward to use. The sheets cling to the roll and will just rip if you try to pull it from a dispenser like a normal roll of paper towels. You have to carefully unroll each sheet, which will stretch. I find myself unwinding the roll for several sheets then winding it back up so I can get a sheet more easily when I need it. I will not buy these again.

These paper towels are the worst! They stick together, and do not come off the roll easily (I need two hands to grab a sheet, even using a dispenser). They leave lint on my windows. They break when I clean my counters. Didn't think I was picky about paper towels, but it turns out it really does make a difference. Lesson learned - we're going back to our usual trusted brand.

I adore these mattress protectors! We've bought a second set for each of our toddler's beds and we have a king sized one for ours. It doesn't crinkle and make a ton of noise like most, you wouldn't even know it's waterproof until it saves your mattress from a disaster of biblical proportions.. I have a potty training 4 year old and a 2 year old that thinks nudity in the middle of the night is the best thing ever. I'm not exaggerating when I say I absolutely would have had to throw away at least one mattress if not for this protector.. You NEED this in your life.

review_title: Best Mattress Cover We Have Owned
review_body: I waited a few months to review this cover, as I wanted to test it out for comfort and durability.  Now that it has had a few months under our backs, I can say this is hands down the best cover we have owned!  We have a Full size mattress (don't judge our tiny bed...we snuggle when we sleep!) that is semi deep and have had trouble finding both sheets and mattress protectors that will stay put.  As adults, we don't want the little bedding straps to hold everything in place, so the challenge is real.  This cover fit our mattress like a glove, which was a win from the get-go!. Some key points:. - No Shrinkage.  I wash this on regular cold with bleach and dry on high.. - No pilling.  The low pile stays soft with no funky pilling balls,  I wash it twice weekly. - Durable, no rips or loose seams (see above for my abusive washing pattern). - No crinkles.  The vinyl-free construction makes this noise- free. - Resists leaks!  A red wine spill didn't seep through to mattress and bleached out wonderfully. - No slippage.  This bad boy stays put on the mattress. - No wrinkles... meaning it doesn't bunch/fold under your sheets.  The ones that do this can drive you  insane while you try to sleep.  I have been there.. This is the perfect lightweight layer to keep your mattress fresh and to help prevent mattress critters from getting to your skin.. Buy it!

review_title: Do not skip this mattress cover!!!!
review_body: This saved my mattress yesterday. I bought this about 6 months ago and have washed it a few times. My pup threw up in the bed - total MESS on the sheet, lifted up the mattress cover and NOTHING on the mattress. So happy I invested in this when I got a new bed.. Sorry for the yellow stain in the video, but it really shows that it worked, and I want to share!

review_title: Use for my whole family! Saved us millions of times!!
review_body: I have these on my 3 toddler boys beds, as well as my husband and I's split king adjustable beds. I cannot comment as to how many times these have protected my boys memory foam beds... seriously over 100 times in total probably. Between the flu, potty accidents and cat urine accidents, these are the best!!! I have washed a ton and they still hold up perfect!! They stay on great on their memory foam 8" and 6" mattresses, and on my husband and I's 2 twin xl adjustable 100% latex memory foam 10" beds too! the adjusting doesnt bother them 1 bit. There is no plastic feeling, you dont even know they are on. Do not hesitate, these are perfect!!

Love this so much more than my last mattress cover. It was loud and uncomfortable! My cats wouldn't even jump on my bed because they hated the texture and noise that my previous mattress cover made. This one is perfect and they aren't at all bothered by it! It's soft and quiet, but still has the protection that I was looking for.

I am beyond enthused with this mattress cover. This cover is AWESOME!. First, when I read the reviews, I noticed that others have expressed how thin it appears. Well, it is a mattress cover so of course it would be thin. If it were a mattress pad then I would agree with their statement..  I washed it at work (I work for an appliance manufacturer so I have the privilege of washing my clothes at work) on 195 degrees Fahrenheit. It washed perfectly and was clean and ready to go. I dried it on normal and it dried in no time. Our washer spin speeds max out at 1600rpm so that was a key factor as to how fast it dried. However, it passed the first test for me with flying colors.. Next, I brought it home for the mattress fitting. We have a queen size pillow top mattress. So I was worried that it wouldn't fit. Low and behold.. It did. It fit perfectly. I had some room to tuck the remainder underneath the mattress for a complete fit.. I don't drink anything in bed except for water at night. But I am very cautious to not get anything wet. But I can assure you that liquids will not penetrate this cover. We have a warranty on this bed that is still in effect. But the warranty will only cover the mattress as long as it's protected with a cover. So we didn't want just any mattress cover.  It doesn't move while sleeping or when changing the fitted sheet. It stays in place!. In conclusion.. We made the right choice!!!

We bought a brand new mattress and it was suggested that this pad be additionally purchased to help protect the mattress from issues such as night time body sweats.. We did but bought it from amazon seller Everyday Pure where it was much cheaper than at the "Big, National Name" store.. It arrived quickly and fit our 59.75" x 79" (and 12" thick) mattress easily. I was concerned about it being squeaky or noisy since it did make crinkle sounds as I put it on the mattress. Honestly, once the sheet was placed over the pad, it didn't make any noise at all.. I haven't noticed any heat retention issues, either.. It hasn't moved, hasn't pulled off, hasn't shifted in the slightest bit.. I am completely satisfied with this item and am glad the mattress salesman suggested it.

Excellent product. I purchased a new mattress, and before sleeping on it wanted to get a cover because even a small stain will void the warranty. The mattress store wanted $180 for their cover, and I was hoping to do better. I ordered this, and after 2 days (waiting for it to arrive I slept in my daughter's room- didn't want to risk the new mattress) it arrived. I am pleased with the quality, and it fits my memory foam mattress like a glove. Perfectly smooth, no wrinkles. With just a sheet on, it's hard to tell its there. The terry surface is comfortable, and you'd never suspect it's a waterproof cover- no noise or plastic feel. The first night I slept on it my dog had an accident on the bed, he rubbed his ear until it bled. Right on my sheet! It of course seeped through onto the cover. It didn't penetrate the barrier, my mattress is unblemished. It washed well (the stain came out), and held up in the dryer (no shrinking or melting, dried on low like instructions indicate). So glad I made this purchase.

While shopping for a memory foam mattress, and selecting the one I was to purchase, this mattress protector was the recommended add-on to that purchase.  I am glad it was.  I ordered, it arrived quickly, and was as described.  You know how sometimes the sheets or bedding you order are not quite the perfect fit, or are out of square?  Not this one.  It fit my 12" mattress well at the corners, and the protection went from side to side, head to foot, providing the full measure of protection.  It appears as well made and of good quality.  I've no hesitation is rating this 5-stars, and recommend without reservation.

Got this because my cat "used" my bed while I was away on vacation, and I don't want to spend hours cleaning my mattress again. It doesn't have that annoying "crinkle" noise most mattress toppers do, nor do I sweat quite as much as others have historically caused me to. I haven't had a chance to see how it does protecting from my cat (and hopefully I never will!), but it fits and isn't as uncomfortable as it could be.. Edit: Cat got stuck inside because of weather and couldn’t hold it, but this sheet protector could! My mattress pad was totally dry!
I love to buy in bulk and not have to worry about running out so these are great. Plus they get delivered to you so you don’t have to pack your car with all these paper towels
Have used them for years. Convenient size towel.
Great product have used for many years.

Our house consists of 3 messy girls, 2 cats who hack hairballs frequently and an elderly, diabetic pug. We use paper towels on such a regular basis, it’s not uncommon for us to stockpile them. We switched from using generic paper towels to Bounty recently and I’m so glad we did. We don’t go through nearly as many as we used to which saves us - it’s great! Plus, these hold up great when scrubbing on carpet - super durable. We’re super happy with this purchase and love having them sent right to us!
Love the strength of this towel!
Incredibly happy with this purchase! These rolls are going to last forever and there's nothing like having Bounty delivered straight to your door.
Great Value and I never run out when I order this way!
Love these. Larger than anything you can buy in the store. A staple at our house

review_title: Bounty is #1 choice in Paper Towel!
review_body: Part of my subscribe & save account at Amazon - Great addition to my housekeeping staples.  Totally worth buying Name Brand due to quality Difference!
I love Bounty paper towels. To me, nothing else comes close to being as absorbent and strong as them. Will continue to purchase them through Amazon.

review_title: These paper towels are amazing, I love buying in bulk
review_body: These paper towels are amazing, I love buying in bulk.. E. specially when the holiday comes. These will last a very long time. I  would like to change my order from sparkle to Bounty. I hoped I am going about. this the right way, I receive these paper towels every three months, I want to change my order from sparkle. to bounty.  Thank you

So many rolls and SO MUCH BLOOD! It is the perfect combination. So......Much......Blood! Sopped it right up. Funny thing was that I wasn't even planning ahead. The stabbing......er......sacrifice......er......"accident" wasn't at all premeditated (the jury got that one completely wrong I tell ya). Anyway, a few pats and swipes of these bad boys and if it weren't for the CSI black-light, you never would've known. NEVER! They're THAT absorbent. So absorbent that I've recommended them to the warden. He is taking it under advisement AND increased my meds. Thanks Sparkle!!

review_title: Poor Quality Paper Towels - Caveat Emptor
review_body: These are garbage paper towels - poor absorbency, tears easily when wet, and worst of all the perforations of sheets must be done on old machine cutters because they rarely tear off cleanly.  These are a big Do Not Buy again in my book.  I'll try a different brand next time.
We go through more paper towels than I would like to admit- these select a size help us cut down on waste and the absorbency of this brand easily rivals bounty or brawny.

We usually don't have trouble with this product but the paper towels that came in our last subscribe & save box smelled like wet dog.  I'm assuming somewhere down the line they got wet.  We are unable to use them and will end up throwing them away.  Such a shame, I will be finding somwhere else to stock our office with paper towels.

review_title: Sparkle Paper Towels, 24 Giant Plus Rolls,...
review_body: These towels had a funny smell and I did not like them at all.. Thank you ,. Dorothy Peterson

review_title: The quality of the product has decreased
review_body: I have been ordering this product for a few years now. Very satisfied until the last shipment. I ordered 2 ply with designs. I received passion white 1 ply. Kleenex tissues are thicker than these paper towels. I order by the case and if I had opened them immediately, I would have definitely returned them all. But I didn't open the box until a few weeks later.

review_title: Brawny or another towel with similar thickness works best.
review_body: Bought these because of housecleaning puppies. If anyone is buying these for that purpose -don't. Definitely not thick enough to absorb accidents efficiently and you'll use a roll on a couple accidents. Brawny or another towel with similar thickness works best.

review_title: what a great value -- i buy these every 2 months -- ...
review_body: what a great value -- i buy these every 2 months -- the quality is fantastic - strong but not too strong - like 1 1/2 rolls of p/t per roll  & these last a long tme. i have prime so free delivery.  i am getting ready to buy another box of these.
Very thin, abrasive and not very absorbent. You'll use 2 to 3 times of this as compared to better brand, in my case bounty. Don't waste your time

review_title: Definitely the best pillow insert on Amazon
review_body: Definitely the best pillow insert on Amazon. Very full. I have purchased several for various decorating projects, and the quality has been there every time.

I will update this in the future. They arrived very pump and a hint of firm. Much better than I had imagined. You can tell they are a very thin cover stuffed of cotton . They (2) certainly were worth 7.99 each.. Certainly, recommend them.

review_title: Definitely a great choice for me
review_body: They keep their shape and hold true to the measurements. Not a floppy half filled pillow at all, they are quite full and comfy. Definitely a great choice for me!

review_title: the 18x18 pillow fits my 16x16 pillow case nice and fluffy
review_body: Works perfectly for my needs, the 18x18 pillow fits my 16x16 pillow case nice and fluffy. Bit of extra effort to get in, but worth it.

review_title: Not sure where the negative reviews come from. Pillows are great!
review_body: I ordered 2 for my Aunt. Wonderful product! The pillow inserts are compressed and wrapped in plastic, but they fill out generously once removed from the package. (Give it atleast 15 minutes to expand to its proper size, people! DUH) The backing is NOT cheap & paper thin, contrary to some peculiar ratings and reviews. I would think half of you have never bought a pillow before. I even read a few reviews who complained about the pillow being mis-shaped when it arrived in its original packaging. ...You dont suppose the fact its wrapped up in tight plastic anything to do with that, geniuses? Take it out of its package and let it expand!  LOL The quality is equivalent to a higher grade pillow at Wal-Mart, for half the price, considering you get 2. Worth the money and I will be coming back for more! They are made in the U.S.A. too. :-)

The pillow is very full and cushy, though two of the corners had no stuffing in them upon arrival. There was no improvement after 10 minutes of fluffing and trying to guide the stuffing to the corners. It wasn’t bad enough though, to go through the hassle of returning it, plus I put a mermaid cover on it, which hides the flaw. Good pillow, otherwise. Also, I’m glad I bought the 18x18 pillow for the 18x18 cover, instead of the 20x20 pillow, which was suggested. Would have been entirely too big.

review_title: this pillow is more a basketball...
review_body: As others have mentioned, this pillow is more a basketball shape than a square pillow shape. Personally, I prefer a flatter, squarer pillow for my sofa.. I am pulling the stuffing into the corners to try to make a square and have the pillows under weights to try to flatten them. I may sew a stitch through the middle to pull the sphere into a flatter shape. I am hoping that when I cover them I can get flatter squares rather than big round balls.

review_title: looks cheap & feels cheap BUT for changing pillow covers it’s perfect! If ur on a budget these are great
review_body: Pillows arrived in vacuumed sealed plastic wrap...foam is thick & high quality...the outside actual pillow material is cheap...looks cheap & feels cheap BUT for changing pillow covers it’s perfect! If ur on a budget these are great!

These pillow inserts, or cushions, are definitely being sold at a really great price and they were delivered when I was told that they would be! The construction of the item is terrific! The seams are solid, straight and even. However, these perfectly made pillows feel like they are only half full!!!
