The instructions say to let them sit outside of the plastic covering for a couple days so they can "breath".  Well, mine must be brain dead, because they didn't breath in anything!! 😀 Still used them because I had to deliver the pillows for a gift and didn't have time. Just an update - the forms have never gotten any bigger - and it's been three weeks!

review_title: Nice quality pillow but ruined by shipping.
review_body: Nice quality pillow over all. However, the shipping ultimately ruined the pillow. No care was taken in shipping. The pillow was smashed from the top left corner through the center of the body to the bottom right corner and then compressed. So when you finally decompress and try and fluff the pillow, it's a huge lumpy mess and the corners no longer have adequate stuffing. I'm hoping a run through dryer helps since this is needed for a gift tomorrow. But I wouldn't order again unless shipping is improved. Compressing the pillow first and rolling neatly from one side to the other would almost eliminate any lump and corner issues.

review_title: I love these lights so much
review_body: Honestly, I love these lights so much.  They're beautiful and have lots of nice transitional settings.  The reason I gave them a 2 star though is because I've only had them about 3 months and two of the strands have gone dark.  I've put them indoors and they're on a timer so they're only on for around 4 hours every day so I don't understand why they would be dying already.  Very frustrating as they're the center point of the room.

So glad I went with these lights!! They’re perfect for my little girls play room/reading tent! I ordered the warm white lights. They have 10 strings of lights hanging down from the main strand. Each string is about 8’ long and hang perfectly from ceiling to floor in my daughters play room. I do wish there was an easier “on/off” switch; I’ll probably end up unplugging them from the wall when not in use. There is a switch button that changes the lights from “on” to “blinking”. There are about 6 or 7 different blinking patterns. I don’t remember if you can turn the lights off from that button. Overall, definitely happy with my purchase and would highly recommend.

review_title: Only every second bulb came on/ received new lights and they work perfect!
review_body: just put these lights up. like the directions say use hooks to hang them from. it took about an hour to get the hooks up hung the bulbs and only half worked, every second bulb. really frustrating because we can see the affect and it is really nice. So sending this set back and going to order another set and hope all the bulbs work this time.. Dec 13, 2017. I received my new lights and they work perfect! I appreciate the seller contacting me and taking the time to make sure everything went well.. Happy Holidays

The pictures seem to make these lights look like a nice golden color which went along with the color scheme of our party of ivory and gold.  But when we plugged them in they were more of an icy blue color and did not match well at all.  I'm not sure that we received the right thing, actually.  They were packaged well and easy to hang up without getting tangled, etc. but the color was definitely not as pictured.

These lights are much longer than expected, making them more versatile.  I originally put them up in our front window planning to put the Christmas tree in front of them, but my daughter asked to have them for her room.  The lights reach from ceiling to floor and give her a great night light alternative that all her friends are jealous of.  She can change the setting to have the lights flicker in different rhythms and patterns.  Great product and they weren’t all tangled when I got them out of the box!

review_title: but it turned out nice because the top of the curtain doesn't have lights ...
review_body: These lights hang long, hung from my ceiling over my now window and about 5 inches of the lights strands sat on the floor. I had to thumb tack the strands up, but it turned out nice because the top of the curtain doesn't have lights on it, noe it looks like it does.
Completely Stopped working on Day two. Not a single light will come on now.

Love it.. it was just what i needed to put behind my sheer curtains for my Valentines dinner setup. The lights weren't really the typical WARM white (golden white) like I wanted.. but it still looked good for the occasion.

review_title: 3 stars.. Who packaged these together.. a BLIND man??
review_body: I'm going to give this 3 stars because of the way they are intertwined together upon unpackaging.. It'sVERYconfusing and once you take the ties off, you are literally screwed and takes hours to untangle them and figure out how they lay, in order to put them up. If you have the patience to do this, they are very pretty warm lights. Had it been for the way you have to unravel them, I'd give them 5 stars. Maybe a warning label or a side note to not take them out of the twist ties until you have your lights mapped out.  A diagram of before and after woulf be perfect.

What a great find! Combined with sheer curtains, it changed the look of our dark bedroom completely and was very easy to hang (took me around 15 minutes.) You can't tell by the picture but it looks PERFECT! I agree with the other buyers about the plug cord being short, but we were already using an extension cable so we don't mind.

Agree with most of the other reviews. Compact, heats up fast, lightweight. Only issue is you definitely can’t hold it past the vertical or it can get super hot due to steam or the water starts dripping out. Also recommend using filtered or better yet distilled since the steam does spew out some calcium type deposits onto your clothes.. Having said that, it is portable & light so something I could take with me on my work trips. Not so effective if you’re trying to iron something big or maybe jeans..? Best suited for lightweight clothes

review_title: Spits out water as it warms up.
review_body: Not what I expected, 2nd use it was spitting water out everywhere, and I made sure not to fill it even to the max fill line.  Water went all over the floor and the dresser it was sitting on to warm up.  I am returning.

review_title: UPDATE:  Company has excellent customer service!
review_body: Wantd a small steamer to touch up bedding, curtains, linens, etc.  This looked like it would do the trick.  The first four times I used it, no problem.  Worked well, no hitches.  The fifth time I used it, had to refill tank to continue doing King bedskirt.  Let it cool, filled, turned back on, but it started sputtering water all over!  After half the tank sputtered away, it was okay.  Continued like this for two more fill-ups.  Will have to see what happens next time I use it.  I'll try not filling up all the way, but not a bad little steamer.  Did a great job on cotton drapes and bedding.  You can't tilt it, or it will spill, but for what I need it, it's fine.. UPDATE:  The company contacted me after my review, unsolicited, and offered to send me a replacement.  It arrived a day later, and I've used it seven times . . . no problems at all!  It heats up quickly, and this steamer can be used on garments layed flat.  It has a removable tank, so no twisting off the head to refill.  I am very happy with this steamer, and recommend it highly!  This company has excellent customer service!  It's not so much that there was a problem, it's how it's resolved.

I was very pleased with your product, it was my first time using a steamer. It is very convenient to travel with and I was able to steam the wrinkles out of a full length dress that I wore to a wedding. I introduced it to my friends that I traveled with and they all loved its size and convenience. I was even happier to learn that your company employs differently abled people, it is a cause close to my heart as my late mother was a special education teacher. I would love to learn more about your company's programmes for the differently abled.

review_title: Water just sprays out no steam!
review_body: I really wanted to love this steamer and after all the great reviews thought it would work great. The first time I used it it seemed to work great but after trying it again it just shoots water out. Then I thought maybe I put too much water but that wasn’t the case. Every time I try to use it it heats up for a few seconds then water starts shooting out with very little steam. Very disappointed.

The item is easy to hold and very compact. It would be perfect if it did it’s main job. But it doesn’t. It takes forever to unwrinkle a portion of my shirt. The water boils off before I’m done with ONE piece of clothing. Any iron is far more convenient, fast, and effective.. Furthermore, the item feels very cheap like it could break any minute. And somehow, despite its compact size, it feels clunky when using it. I’m returning this item.
Love the size and the steam. Works great. Heats up very quickly. Easy to use and clear directions.

I bought this for my husband. He just started a new job that requires dress clothes, and ironing takes up a lot of time. I thought this would be useful, especially in our busy mornings. I was surprised how small it is. Which is awsome, since it doesn't take up too much space.so far it's been great, he says that it has cut his morning routine in half! We will definitely keep using it!

Update (September 2018). I wrote a review (see below) about the iSteam Exagora model H-106, complaining about its shortcomings.  In response, Exagora called, listened to my concerns, and then shipped me free-of-charge their newer iSteam 2018 model.  Although more substantial in size and weight than the other steamer, it also does NOT leak when held sideways.  It steams out wrinkles of different types of fabric with complete efficiency.  It can be used with hanging or flat laying clothing, as on a table or bed if traveling.  It comes equipped with a brush as well for napped fabrics.  I find it to be an excellent, safe, and well engineered steamer.. From June 2018:. Although this handheld steamer may be perfect for travel use, it is not ideal for at-home use.  It cannot be rotated from verticals without causing boiling hot water spillage; its small capacity also means that for larger items such as jackets or long dresses, it has to be refilled more than once.  Additionally, it is truly only safe to use if wearing steamer gloves.  Having said all that, it works well on small items that can be hung from a rod.

I was super excited to use this instead of trying to iron clothes at the hotel. For my first trip to Washington DC, everything was fantastic. Then I went to Germany, and oops, this is only designed for a single voltage, and unlike many hair dryers and similar products does not have a selector switch for the voltage. As a result, this is basically worthless for those that travel.
Does its thing well
Great product! Couldn’t find anything for least!
Been using these a long time. I have 2 dogs. They are the best!
Very effective on tile and Amtico floors.
good
I like them
Helps to dust the floors and furniture quickly and efficiently.
I don’t understand what the big fuss is over these sweeping pads. They did not work for me the way I’d like for them to. Yes, they pick up some dust, but not hair or anything larger than that.
Good
As advertised.

review_title: Great if you don't actually want to know what you weigh.
review_body: This scale does not work properly. It has a different weight within minutes. Sometimes it says I lost 10 pounds in 5 minutes. Which would be nice, but that is not why I chose to purchase this scale. When I went to get the item replaced, they only offer refunds and to return the product. Do to the hassle I have chosen to keep the scale in hopes it works itself out. But I would not reccomend when there are many other options with better reviews here on Amazon.

I'm really happy with this scale and have only one minor complaint with it:  Finding the sweet spot to turn it on can be a bit challenging at first.  However, that line in the middle seems to be the spot.  So, if you purchase this product, step on that line in the middle and it should turn on every time, on the first try.  Aside from that, I'm very, very pleased with it - especially since it uses standard AA batteries, unlike my previous scale which had weird batteries that were a lot harder to find.

review_title: Different +/- 3 lbs readings within seconds? Garbage.
review_body: I take extremely good care of this scale. I store it in the plastic wrapping and styrofoam casing and only remove it once a day in the morning to weigh myself. I keep the batteries fresh and always start it on the same flat spot on the hardwood floor. However, no matter what I do, this scale is off +/- 3 lbs consistently. I usually have to move it around to 2 or 3 different places and take 5-6 reading before I begin to get an accurate reading. I weigh myself first thing in the morning with no clothes, before I eat or drink anything. Luckily, I am aware enough of my body to know on those days when I have lost a little weight overnight or if I have a few extra pounds of bloat that morning, so I can usually tell if the number is way off. I don't know if this is an issue with most digital scales, but it's annoying and defeats the purpose of having a scale in the first place.

Will update my post if our second experience proves better but I store the scale next to the etagiere and toilet and when I pulled it out I bumped the middle against the bowl and it shatteeed into 467 pieces - thankfully safety glass but I would expect more durability from an item. designed to hold 150-200+pounds of human on a daily basis

I've used it a few times now.  It doesn't always give the same weight...and I'll step on it a few minutes apart and move the placement to see if it's the surface rather than the scale.  Yesterday, it gave me a 3 lb difference within the span of 2 minutes.  Today, same thing.  It always says I weigh more the first time I step on.  Today the first weight was 3 lbs more than the second weight and the second weight was the same as the third weight.  I'll still use it because I'm not too fixated on my weight but if you need a truly accurate weight, this is not the scale for you.

First of all, this scale must be placed on a flat surface. Many reviewers are complaining about the scale not working when placed on a carpet, but scales don't work on carpets.. The problem is the sensors that these new scales use. Most of these newer scales have 4 sensors; one in each corner of the scale; therefore, the scale must be placed on a relatively level, hard, and flat surface.. This is a great, simple scale. It comes on quickly and automatically when you step on. The output is back-lit, so its easy to read even in dark environments. It is precise within a tenth of a pound, which is really more precision than anyone needs but at least you know you are getting an accurate reading. The scale is sleek and looks good in a bathroom. Its the perfect scale for someone who just wants a scale. It seems like all scales are becoming smart scales one way or another and becoming outrageously expensive in the name of being able to track your weight automatically on your smart phone. This scale is perfect and at a great price for someone who just wants a scale.. Others have complained about the scale shattering. i have had no problems.

review_title: Beware - you can't return it if you receive a faulty unit!
review_body: It worked one time.  Next time I stood on it, the display lit up but no numbers ever appeared.  Amazon says I can't return it!  I understand products sometimes break but seriously, I've had it for less than a week and it only worked once!  Buyer beware!

I bought this to help keep track of my weight at the start of my diet. Unfortunately, I can't be certain if I've gained or lost weight. Within 5 to 10 minutes I would get different results. One result showed I lost a pound and then 5 minutes later I got on the scale again and showed I gained a pound and half. It's very frustrating to buy something thinking it's going to be accurate but in reality you can't rely on it.

It looks great, seems to work great, uses AAA batteries which is amazing!! :) No damages either.. Several months later - still working fine HOWEVER, the damn number is always wrong! I weighed on several scales at thrift shops and at the doctor office and I'm always 5 pound lighter. Totally disappointing. When I put a barbell 30lb on it, it fluctuates about a pound, but with me, it fluctuates 5-10lbs. Doctor office, shoes and clothes on with wallet and keys in pocked, I weighed less than I do NAKED on this scale!

Very nice scale. The scale has a sleek, modern look to it. I'm replacing an old scale - I honestly couldn't see the dashes clearly  anymore. I started a new Healthy Eating program and I really wanted to keep track of weight loss so I got this digital scale. I love it! It has been very accurate as far as I can tell. I weighed myself several times in a row to see if I found a discrepancy. Not one so far!. Set it to zero by tapping it or putting some weight on it with your foot - and weigh yourself. Simple!. My old digital scale saved weights of person 1 and person 2 but frankly I never used it so when it broke I  went back to the old fashioned scale. I remember how much I weigh - no need for fancy programming.. Great product and really great price..   UPDATED- 6/4/18. Just ordered another one for my Mother’s house since mine is packed up. We love it. I find the weight is accurate and no discrepancies weighing myself several times in a row. It is glass so be careful where you put it..  Great scale.
These are great kitchen trash bags.  Super strong and the odor shield is great too.
I have to carry my trash across the street to a dumpster. I live in  CONDO and there is a large dumpster that is emptied every week. The strength of these bags is perfect.
Worse purchase I ever made. Approx 75% of the bags had heat/burn holes in them. This box must of been considered as 2nds or 3rds. Never will I buy them again. Pic below.
These trash bags smell great. My new normal trash bag.  Love Gain, they never disappoint.  Fresh and makes the kitchen garbage space smell nice.

review_title: Will not buy again. Not tall enough for my ...
review_body: Will not buy again. Not tall enough for my silver can that usually holds a tall bag. They rip at the top whereas my normal Costco brand does not.

Doesn't exactly make your garbage smell good, but definitely helps with the smell. Very strong bags that hold up to an overstuffing. They seem more puncture resistant as compared to some other brands.
Great product- does what it's suppose to and is very sturdy. Will buy it again.

review_title: Smells fantastic. And these bags are heavy duty
review_body: Smells fantastic. And these bags are heavy duty. I have four boys and I can't express the trash we have.... I just started amazon prime and signed up for these to come every 2 months. Pricing is cheaper this way as well.
Omg I have fallen in love with these garbage bags. I consider each bag as a member of the family. I have to buy more. Each bag is so precious.
These kitchen bags are the best! The scent infused into the bags really keeps the garbage odor away!

review_title: Best papers towels we have used.
review_body: At a good price, these have been the best paper towels we have used. We typically tend to stay away from high prices paper towels for the main reason they will get thrown away. If the less is too big we will just use a normal dish towel. But for small messes and quick clean up these towels do the job perfectly and at a great price.

These Plenty paper towels are not great, but they serve my purpose for using them and you get many at one time. I was trying to do without the towels for a while, but they come in handy for everything. They are just as good as Bounty, which some people say have changed. I will order the following next time: Plenty Ultra Premium Flex-A-Size Paper Towels, 24 Big Rolls,112 Sheets per Roll, White $49.99. That is about $2.08 per roll!

cant tell the difference between these and the major brands. honestly these are better! i notice alot of greasy streaks with most major papertowels especially when doing windows or mirrors. must be something they put in the paper. ive had no problems with these. i got tired of stacking up on newspaper ads just to clean my mirrors lol. made more of a mess than necessary. price is great also

review_title: Good quality, didn't realize that "full sheet" means full sheet
review_body: I was going to give fewer stars until I looked at the product title. It's clearly labeled "full sheet". I didn't realize that, and was expecting what I guess would be called "half sheets", because I don't usually need to use all that paper at once.. So, given that I should have known better, I'll give 4 stars because these are good, durable paper towels. Just know that they have large sheets!

review_title: This package has lasted almost 2 months now, and ...
review_body: This package has lasted almost 2 months now, and we use paper towels quite heavily (3-year-old loves doing science experiments with her drinks). Worth it.

These are the best paper towels I've ever used I can I don't use them in the kitchen to clean up I can use them in the bathroom they are superstrong I can use on the white my glasses off safely I never in my life had such a good paper towel I love them so much I will re-order always never brownie again great awesome love it !
The towels seem fairly strong and absorbent, but this is a little pricy for what you get.  Not many towels per roll.  Keep looking.  You can do better.

review_title: Plenty Ultra Premium Full Sheet Paper Towels
review_body: So love these towels. Made my decision to purchase after reading reviews. Not sorry I ordered these instead a name brand. They soak up spills, clean counters and do not fall apart when wet. Will order these again when needed.

review_title: Some paper towels suck, some are great and some are in between
review_body: Some paper towels suck, some are great and some are in between. These fall somewhere on the closer end of in between to great, hence the 4 stars. You can't wring them out and reuse them but I always wondered about those commercials anyway. Usually the things I need them for aren't reusable situations. I would say they are similar to Bounty and the Wegman's style of towels. They last a decent amount of time but the rolls are smaller in circumference than what you may be used to.

These are great paper towels!  I was hesitant to change from VIVA, but they had become too expensive. The Plenty towels are large, and quite absorbent.  The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because they don't have the select-a-size option.  Because they are a good value, I will continue to order them.

review_title: ... purchased because I don't remember the brand of the good ones and figured I should start testing
review_body: These rags were purchased because I don't remember the brand of the good ones and figured I should start testing. My intended use was for cleaning my glasses and electronic screens; however, I cannot do so as these leave too many fibers behind when used completely dry. It's akin to allowing a white cat to rub up against your black slacks in the summer... seriously, a lot of fibers get put on the glass.

Great for cleaning! Don't fall apart like a regular paper towel and then they can be washed and re-used to reduce waste. I am able to clean so many more surfaces without running through an entire roll of paper towels. I also love that there are three different colors so I can separate what is used in the kitchen vs the bathroom because let's face it, even after washing it's still nice to have those separate. Plus I love everything organized by color so it makes me happy.

I cut these in half, took a lighter, melted the exposed edges lightly, and used these for my swifter sweeper. They fit well enough. I had just folded them over but found I got too much friction. They pick up more dirt and hair than the swifter sweeper pads and wet mop pads. I have two bags; one for the dirties and one for the clean ones. I wash in separately in the machine on cold and cool dry. Also, no fabric softener and static guard. Just detergent and water! They last a really long time this way. They are a great size for dusting, cleaning electronics, and general household cleaning. I even saved a scrap to put in my glasses case to clean my sunglasses. So many uses! Amazon basics is much less expensive than the other brand so I don't mind cutting up a few and experimenting. :)

These towels work very well for cleaning autos (inside and outside), home, and even as a hair dryer (by quickly absorbing water from the hair after showers).. When cleaning cars, I use hot water with some soap (very diluted) and these microfiber towels do a great job of absorbing the dirt and oils. Inside the home, I generally don't use any cleaning liquid when using these towels as they are able to pick up accumulated dirt pretty well just with its microfibers. Lastly, I have a bunch dried and ready in the bathroom for use after showers to dry my hair quick...much quicker than normal towels.. I am sure you can find many other uses for these towels. They are durable but just like other materials, after you wash them they do change in shape and eventually deteriorate at the edges. However, given the very low price this is sold, I think it is highly recommendable due to the myriad of uses these microfiber towels can help with.

I went through 24 in about 8 months. I have 3 or 4 left, but that is too few to make it through the week without having to do laundry, so I am ordering more. None of mine tore, or even faded, but the stains felt unhygienic to me so I threw them out after a while. But I am ordering more, and will probably add them to my subscribe and save.

review_title: Arrived quickly, great value for the money!!
review_body: Received 144 cloths. They are a little thinner than other brands, but do the job just fine. Very soft, the yellow color runs onto the white if you wash them together however. Just make sure to wash the yellow separately if you care about keeping the colors true. I don't really mind since they are used for cleaning.

I used to be a "hard core" car buff that was very open to suggestion.  "Only buy 100% cotton towels made in the USA- you can't trust other countries.  You need cotton..." I was told, and so I complied.  Expensive towels.  Oh yeah, cut off the edges so they won't trap dirt to scratch your paint, too.  After a year, my bath towels became hand towels because they'd fray in every wash.  ...and the kicker is, my car still got swirl marks/fine scratches.  I've recently purchased a car that I want to be "that guy" with, but I'm a bit more open to my own experimenting.  Glad I am, because these towels rock!  About fifty cents a towel...  how can you beat that for a soft towel that's a great size for washing/waxing?  Maybe not enough nap for some in washing, but I feel a lot better about tossing aside a towel that falls out of my hands while washing (don't want the dirt from the ground scratching my ride!) when I'm staring at 47 more.  Also, your days of flipping and folding when polishing/waxing/gloss spraying/whatevering are over!  Just put it in the "done" pile and grab another one.  I have the Meguiar's X2020 as well and the Meguiar's seem softer and are larger, but between the "toss it and grab another one" aspect of the smaller towel and the much greater price of the Meguiar's, these are the king of the towels from what I've purchased thus far.

review_title: The tag ruins an otherwise good product
review_body: These are a decent microfiber rag for the money. At regular price, better can be had a Costco or Walmart, but on Lightning Deal, which happens often, these are pretty competitive.. They are slightly thin and flimsy feeling, but again, for a bargain brand, exactly what you'd expect, and they don't pull or pill, which is a plus.. One major drawback - their tag. These have a big, coarse polyester tag on each towel, which doesn't easily pull off, and if you forcibly tear off, sorta ruins the towel. Leaving the tag on, it sort of scratches at the finish of what you're using this to clean or buff. Honestly not acceptable.. Others can do this kind of thing without a tag, Amazon - follow suit.

These have no substance, way too thin for me.  Clearly many out there like them, more power to you.  But if you are used to a thick microfiber towel these aren't for you.  If you like a very thin microfiber towel, that curls up on the corners after being washed, then these will be perfect for you!  I love amazon, have many things amazon in my home from Echo (Alexa) to Kindle Fire, Amazon Basics shredder (Awesome) but these were a disappointment for ME.  My first thought for these was the garbage can, would have been easier but I decided to donate the whole package of cloths to the "Good Will" instead.  I have a suggestion, please make a thick microfiber towel for those of us that don't like super thin microfiber towels.

They are most certainly Microfiber cleaning clothes.  I don't really know what I can say about them.  They do come in 3 colors a nice blue, an okay yellow and a plain white.  After use I would say they are pretty good rags.  I was using them while cleaning a few cars and a boat they did the trick very well.  I have been using them while working on rebuilding a motor they seem to also be a rag then too.  Are they the best rag I have ever used?  Maybe and that means a lot I was in the military for 10 years and that means I know how to clean.  I can also say these could be labeled as military grade as it really doesn't mean anything but people see to get all excited about it so yeah..... Military grade
Still waiting for the trash bag that never gets punctured, LOL.  This one is not too bad.  But I still get holes on them once in a while (made mostly by sharp corners from milk and juice cartons).

review_title: wow i got this cheap on amazon & i think ...
review_body: wow i got this cheap on amazon & i think w/ my prime delivery (so free/fast).  i still have many bags left and i've had this since way b4 christmas.  we change bags a lot as we hang them up in the utility room.  the drawstring is strong & the bags never break no matter what kind of heaviness you put therein.  will buy again & again.

review_title: Another Hit from the Good Glad Folks
review_body: Consider the humble trash bag, it lines your trash can, is pulled out and sent on its way to whatever its fate may be. But remember that there are good ones, mediocre ones and ones that are a rip off. Glad makes a sensible, utilitarian trash bag that answers many household problems. Beyond the trash, I had friend who concealed the Christmas presents for her children in them and stowed them in the garage. Would that she had told her husband about this ploy before he put them out to be taken to wherever trash bags go. I've transported plants with soil in them, made a costume for Halloween (I went as a trash bag) from one and find that having them delivered to my door answers a problem before it happens. The drawstring works and, as opposed to some competing brands, is strong enough to stay tied. They are not indestructible but it took my cats a whole day to kill one and, the day before, they'd knocked off a slipper during a Chiefs game. They are delivered to you at no cost and do not have to be hauled home. Find something wrong in all that, I can't. Buy 'em by the box, 90-in my home over a three month supply-and you won't regret it

review_title: Don't waster your money! Cheap quality
review_body: This bags are a joke. They only have a tiny portion that is "reinforced" !!!! Very cheap quality...

review_title: Bad batch or decrease in quality?
review_body: I have been getting these bags for awhile through the subscribe and save program. Was happy up til recently. We wrote it off as a few bad bags at first but it keeps continuing as we move from bag to bag. Either we got a bad batch or the quality has drastically dropped. Sides ripping, black drawstring breaks on barely a tug, and some just not even seamed together. Just pulled this one out of the box and noticed looks cut or just not joined.

review_title: Not the value it used to be
review_body: I have been buying Glad trash bags through the subscribe and save for over a year.  I cancelled this subscription, the "guaranteed strong" bags ripped almost every single time.  We did not over fill the bags, they are just made poorly and at the flex portion is where the bags would rip. Even when I would put a second bag over the first ripped bag, it would rip as well and again- these were NOT even completely full.  I don't know if the manufacturer changed something or I got 2 bad boxes in a row, but I won't take any more chances on them.

I was very disappointed! These aren't really tall kitchen bags, short and small. I had to stretch it to get it to go on my garbage can and it did not fill the whole can.  If it weren't for the size issue I would have given this product 5 stars but size is kind of important.  Because of the size it is hard to get on and off.  Thank god the bag is strong and so are the handles because it is hard to get out of the can.  I do love that the bag is super strong and stretchy. The handles work great!

I have these on Subscribe and Save and am going to keep them there.. I have loaded them up when cleaning out the fridge and have had no leakage. There is the Force Flex stuff at the top so the bag actually stays around the garbage can, it does NOT fall into the can when something heavy is thrown in.. I have used other bags, but they seem to all have a fragrance now which is offensive to my sense of smell. These do not have a scent which is nice. No Febreeze + garbage scent is lingering around my kitchen.. The price seems about right, ordering these on Amazon keeps me from having to go to a big box store and impulse buy other items.

I’ve used a box of these before months ago and had no problems. But now I’m about 7 bags into a new box and 6 of them have ripped near the drawstring when I tried to take them out of the garbage can. Just from the pull of tying the drawstrings and without even lifting. I didn’t mind on the first one and the second one I figured was coincidence but im convinced it’s clearly poor quality bags in this box.

The ties rip out to the point where tieing them is pointless.  The bag tears as I lift it out of the can.  I'm double bagging these until I can go back to buying cheap store brand bags.. I'm confused about the people who love these.  Is their garbage really light?  Do they take it out every other day?

review_title: good quality - good price -  good size
review_body: love the large size rolls - not having to replace all the times.  Like the pick-a-size - saves wasted towels.. Brawny works great at picking up spills and stronger then the cheap brands.  This is a good price.

review_title: These paper towels are strong enough clean even the toughest ...
review_body: These paper towels are strong enough clean even the toughest of messes.. Ill not delve into my recent experience with my 65lb Kishu and his irritable bowels.  Thank God for Brawny Ultra Strong Paper Towels.
What can I say? Great paper towels that tear apart in half sheets. Have on auto ship since our dumb local stores rarely stock the half sheet rolls.
Cool but I wouldn't say one roll equals two, more like 1-1 1/2
I love this towel, as proven by my loyalty for years.  The feature that allows a user to tear off a smaller piece is invaluable, and the strength is perfect.
fits in my holder. I like the divider on the sheets so I can use half a sheet easly if that is what I need.

We buy these on subscription for more than a year.  Super-absorbent, The best features of these towels is they break off in half sheets, which is usually all you need, and they leave no lint behind when using on dry surfaces.
Our favorite brand in half-sheet availability for convenience, and delivered when we need it. Value better than Sam's or Costco without having to go get it. Nice!
Love the ability to select a size and not have to utilize a huge paper towel for one small job!
Love my subscribe and save.  Great product always received as needed.
Like: It lives up to the promises of your product description.
good price
Best paper towels.  Love select a size
Great product
Soaks up a bountiful amount without shredding.
Exactly as described!
Just in time, saves us allot of money
Thanks
Great quality paper towel. Love the jumbo rolls!!!!
I always use Bounty. I've got no complaints!

review_title: Great toilet paper. Not good for plates.
review_body: Well first off I didn't receive the paper plates I ordered. But on the other hand I got 36 mega rolls of angel soft toilet paper which cost more than the paper plates.
I like these plates. Load them full of food, and they won't fold.
Just as advertised, with Dixie reputation.
Larger circumference than I need, nice quality for a paper plate
Great value and fast shipping. Have ordered multiple times.
As described. Arrived on time and undamaged. No issues.
Dixie are very good quality material and can microwave on
Great product
Sturdy good sized plates. Niether of us need to wash dishes.
I love these plates - very, very sturdy and nice size.
Love them
Plates are plate you get what you buy
Great plates

review_title: Got paper towels instead of plates
review_body: I ordered Dixie paper plates but I recieved Brawny paper towels. I'm not sure where the error was but there definitely was one.
You get more than what you pay for!
Received quickly and just what I was expecting.
Paper plates no problem but I was suppose to get a 2.00 coupon off the price and it didn't give me the discount...Pretty tricky amazon

review_title: Deeper than expected.  Quite sturdy, no leaking, and fresh, modern graphics.
review_body: These were deeper than I expected, and that was really welcome.  I decided to go for broke and give them a serious test - southern fried chicken, fried corn, and bikkits with gravy.  None of that's particularly 'soupy' but it's plenty moist, and heavy enough to give a good test.. They passed with flying colors.  No leaks, collapses, or problems of any kind.  The depth makes them really good for things like spaghetti or gravies, and it also makes them a fair bit easier to hold, when needed.. One thing I thought of and tested separately - we all use our forks with biscuits and gravy, but it made me think of foods that need cutting.  If you use a serrated knife of any kind, it'll saw its way through the coating that keeps these from leaking.. Granted, surely everyone knows by now that cutting something on a paper plate isn't a great idea, but I thought I'd mention.  These are sturdy enough to do some limited cutting on, but it could defeat the liquid-proofing.. I'm pleased to note these are USA-made, but Dixie's website says these aren't recommended for home composting.  I think that should be expected for anything that says it has a water-proof coating, but is worth mentioning.. I'm not a fashionista type, but the 'geo' designs on these are nicely fresh and modern.  I like that.. Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - It's an Amazon program where many things you buy every day will generate a small donation to the charity of your choice.  Read about it here:  https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/about/ref=smi_se_rspo_laas_aas

review_title: Sturdy, soak proof  and not for home composting
review_body: Used these at an informal gaming afternoon at our home and the plates held up very well. There was no soak through from Hummus and dip and the plates for sturdy enough to hold food without needing to be on a flat surface for support.. I prefer to use paper plates instead of foam or disposable plastic for occasions when my own dishes are insufficient for the number of guests. The pattern on these are more modern than some of the flowery patterns I have used in the past and I definitely prefer this look.. On the downside, the sturdy, soak proof nature of the plate means that biodegradability takes a bit of a hit. Dixie's website states that while the plates have 91% compostable fiber, they are not suitable for home composting. They can be composted at a specialized composting facility. So into the trash bin these will go.  If you are looking for purely compostable plates, these are probably not going to fit the bill.

review_title: Sturdy plates with a nice printed design
review_body: These are very nice paper plates for outdoor events or any time you need something disposable or recyclable. There are 44 in each pack. They are strong with a fairly deep lip around the edge. They can hold a lot of food and not bend, even if you are holding it with only one hand. The lip keep sauces from spilling off the edge. They also prevent liquids from soaking through. This set has a very pretty design. It has some color and the plate is covered with some portion of the illustration. It makes the plates more festive for parties than plain white ones. It says these plates are microwaveable too. I haven't tried that; I've only used them for picnics, but I've been very happy with them.

My favorite paper towel ever! Very soft and durable,  absorbs lots of water and is actually.. reusable believe it or not.  I use these for cleaning my house - I can actually squeeze the water out and use it multiple times. I also use these for face masks, it feels like fabric.

review_title: Rough texture not the store quality
review_body: I have purchased this brand of paper towels from the grocery store and this item proved to be very soft.  However the product I received from Subscribe and save were rough and not at all what I expected.  Would not recommend

Amazing for pressing flowers. Only paper i have found so far that is thick enough and smooth enough. Can use multiple times.. It just sometimes leaves the smallest dusts.. So for glass table cleaning I prefer Scott

review_title: I like Viva because it is soft and it does the ...
review_body: I like Viva because it is soft and it does the job that it is suppose to.  The only thing I don't care for is it is somewhat hard to pull off the sheets off.  I unroll the sheets and then roll them back up so I can pull them off with ease.

We've always used the big brand name, but we're making the switch to these. They're a great value and do as described. One small annoyance is that they tend to stick together when you're pulling them from the dispenser. You almost always have to use two hands (first world problems... lol).

Yes it is a paper towel, yes it is select a size it just seems I always select the smallest size no matter what.. yes it absorbs and wipes but it seems like it is to soft and fuzzy.  Depending on the surface that is being wiped it can leave little paper fuzz behind

review_title: These are awful, they don't absorb anything, they ...
review_body: These are awful, they don't absorb anything, they stick to themselves and there's hardly any on the roll..never again, back to BOUNTY

review_title: Rolls felt slimmer but worst of all they leave residue (as another user mentioned ...
review_body: This shipment was low quality.  Rolls felt slimmer but worst of all they leave residue (as another user mentioned 'dust') when used to wipe something wet. For a short time I did not have a drying towel so used these paper towels to dry my pots and pans- bad decision! Weird white crap left all over them.  Yes they're soft, but I dont want soft to mean that their fibers fall apart all over the sirfaces they're used to wipe.  Would rather give up the softness to get the durability back.  Dont know if this was a bad shipment or just what to expect from viva.
By far my #1 favorite paper towels. So absorbent and love the select your size. I feel like you waste less. I would hate to do life with four kids without these.

review_title: These paper towels are the best.
review_body: These are my favorite paper towels. Now, I can continue to be a hermit and have them delivered to my door. The more toiletries I buy on amazon, the less I have to venture out of my home. Thank you, Viva.
Good pad for the price but it will split after a few washings on the underside. No big deal really because the top holds up well.

Life changes brought me to a twin bed, and at 60 years old...I figured protection wasn't a bad idea.. The price was very affordable, and once received I knew I had made the correct choice.. The quality was obvious, and putting the unit on my mattress was as easy as snapping on a fitted sheet.. My mattress is a LUCID hybrid gel/foam Twin XL and there is no way I want that to get wet.. Although I haven't tested this, (nor do I hope to) I feel secure that should an accident occur...mt bed will be fine and after a healthy wash, my protection will still be usable and available for use.

review_title: After pouring over product reviews I ordered this one and it's amazing. It only took 2 nights of sleeping on ...
review_body: Look no further! After pouring over product reviews I ordered this one and it's amazing. It only took 2 nights of sleeping on it before our daughter peed through her diaper and it completed protected the mattress underneath! There is no plastic sound or feeling, so you can move about freely without that telltale sound of a mattress cover. We have struggled to get our fitted sheet to stay tight on our mattress, literally having to pull it tight before bed every night, sometimes in the middle of the night even. Since we put this mattress cover on with our sheet, there have been NO issues. Our fitted sheet fits tight and we have not had to adjust it at all. So for us it solved a problem that it wasn't even mean to! This product is worth your money.

review_title: ... on ALL beds in our house and they are fantastic. I love that they aren't the plastic covers ...
review_body: We have these on ALL beds in our house and they are fantastic.  I love that they aren't the plastic covers that can be uncomfortable, even under bed dressings.  I purchased the first one to protect our mattress from dogs, and it has done exactly what it is supposed to do.  Highly recommend. (also tried a Claritain brand and this was far superior.)

When we purchased a bed for my son recently, the store recommended getting this mattress protector for it. We absolutely love it and just purchased this one for my other son's bed. I have had multiple mattress protectors on their beds over the years and they all have had problems - they are loud and "crunchy" sounding, they don't breathe, they aren't waterproof, or they rip. They rip when you wash them, they rip when you put them on the bed. These DO NOT RIP! It's got a waterproof layer underneath the but the top is very nice soft terry cloth material so it's more comfortable and quiet. THe edges are made of good quality material (not that felty-gauze stuff that tears when you stretch it across the mattress). They wash wonderfully - they look good as new when they come out  of the wash. Do not hesitate to buy this one!

review_title: Nice mattress protector and not noisy at all!
review_body: Very happy with the mattress protector so far.  Just nice to know there is something protecting the mattress if needed.  It does not sound crinkly at all!!!  If there is a noise, it reminds me a bit of wind pants, but it's not loud at all and actually after testing it out for the noise, my husband and I haven't even gave it another thought.  I toss and turn a lot at night and it's not an issue for noise at all, and I'm a very light sleeper and noises bother me at night.  Fit the bed perfect and we have a sleep number bed.  Very happy with the purchase.

review_title: Good mattress protector, dont anticipate it to totally block all spills
review_body: I liked the positive reviews of this protector, we needed something to replace our old protector which was old, stained, and always popping off the mattress. When the protector arrived in the mail I promptly washed it and put it on the mattress with my next sheet change out. The pockets of the protector are nice and deep and I'm pretty sure they won't pop off like the old protector we had. The protector is a little crinkly when you get into bed but it doesn't disrupt our sleep. We've had the protector on for about a week now and are pretty happy with it. I don't expect it to totally block any spills or accidents (from the future children), the goal I had in mind with this protector is to help reduce the amount of liquid that gets to the mattress and with prompt cleanup I don't anticipate too many problems on that front.. UPDATE December 2016: I purchased a second mattress protector for one of my guest beds. Since the purchase of the first one for my bed the crinkling has either reduced through normal sleeping or I have gotten used to the noise. Regardless, I liked it enough to purchase a second one and the 4 star rating stays.

I bought a very expensive organic mattress for the first time in my life and I wanted a mattress cover that would not ruin the experience of the new mattress.  I did some research and read many reviews and am glad I chose this brand.  It is thin, not puffy and baggy like most types  and very strong. It doesn't smell like  chemicals and doesn't make crunchy or other annoying noises that other mattress pads make.  It fits my bed like a glove and doesn't bunch up or move around.  It is a good product in my opinion.

review_title: They are still like brand new
review_body: I have purchased 4 of these mattress protectors.  Two full size and two king size.  I've had the two full size over a year.  I wash and dry them almost every week.  They are still like brand new.  They really do hold a lot of liquid, they do not make you hot, or make the plasticity sound when you move.  Two of my boys needed king size so I ordered them one each.  No complaints from them so far so they must be good!  I would recommend and when I need more I'll come back.  Also my three sons have allergies, and even though it's still there, it was worse.  Thank You!!

update:. like it so much we just bought another so we dont have to wait to wash it when we change our bed sheets.  protects matress. if you leave alot of liquid, like a spilled glass of water or whatever on it for awhile it WILL eventually soak through, but if you are relatively quick noticing the accident your mattress will be dry. the one that showed up is same packaging but different washing instructions, but seems like the same product. read other reviews about it not stopping moisture,  we have a dog that wets that bed sometimes and it has never penetrated through to the mattress using this thing.  easy to wash, i like that it can be washed and it is recommended to wash with hot water to sterilize.  the only thing that made me leary of a hypo allergenenic product is the plastics used to make it, so if you are sensitive to certain plastics, which we are not, double check.
Amazing brand!!
My favorite paper towel on my front door step.
Bounty the quicker picker uper
Perfect
Great
Perfect for retail store.
Our go to paper towel.
Excellent..
Best price around
I like stocking up
Terrible quality for the price. If you have a Costco membership these pale in comparison to the Kitkland brand are cheaper and much better quality

review_title: Great paper towel at a great price
review_body: These paper towels are totally fine. It may not be amazing but they are totally great for the money you can't beat them! We've been using them now for at least nine months use Amazon subscribe and Save feature and have no plans of discontinuing use.

Really want to leave 1 star but I try not to 'hate'. These are the worst paper towel regarding absorbency. Now if want to just push the spill along the floor.... Naturally I bought the 48 count and thought oh my gosh it is going to take me forever to go through them. Not a problem as I have to use SOO MANY to wipe things up or clean with them. What a disappointment

review_title: These have been my go to paper towels for years ...
review_body: These have been my go to paper towels for years on Amazon through Subscribe and Save. Very functional and economical. Only complaint is that they don't "snap" off the roll well. In other words, they'll tear off the seam improperly if you're not careful.

These aren't as thick and sturdy as the Bounty ones I used to get from Costco.  You can squeeze the whole roll to half its thickness easily with one hand, which was not possible with the other ones.  The UPS guy left the box on the porch in a wet spot when it was raining, but I brought it inside before any damage was done.
Now a regular in my subscribe and save. They aren't as "good" as another name brand... but damn close.  They actually work great for a home with a 3 year old and a messy dh.

review_title: High quality paper towels at a reasonable price!
review_body: These are by far the best paper towels I have ever used! Not only do they compare with the more expensive brands, but I have used them for years and I appreciate the fact that they are a quality product at a lesser price.

Love these guys. I use these daily all over the house and garage. I hate schlepping these from the grocery store and I order online monthly. Great product and do not smell funny like some of the competitors

review_title: Quality has decreased in latest shipment.
review_body: Quality seemed to go way down with latest shipment. Thinner paper and it's harder to pull apart than previous shipments. I've been receiving this for years and the quality has turned. Won't be re-ordering unless there's a good explanation.
Perfect for an office.  This purchase allowed us to buy enough at one time that we do not need to run to the store every week to purchase more.  Arrived in a large box for easy storage.

review_title: but this pillow is great quality and very full/comfy
review_body: I bought this pillow to go with a pillow case I also ordered from amazon...unfortunately the pillow case didn't work out, but this pillow is great quality and very full/comfy. I am going to have to find a new case to go with it lol.

I returned a set of pillows after I received these and ordered another couple of them. They're great. Fluffy and soft. They fit perfectly in my 18 inch covers. The true test was whether my dog would like them and I am happy to report that he does.

We inserted this foam pillow into a throw pillow case (18" x 18"), which was also purchased on Amazon.  It fit well and the recipients like it.  I am glad it is hypoallergenic.  Thank you Amazon Prime.

review_title: What can I say...it's a pillow stuffer.
review_body: Bought two, they came well packaged. When you first get them, the inserts don't look square (all the plastic wrapping). But once you open them, the inserts fluff out to the right sizes. Bought the inserts for two 18 x 18 pillow covers, perfect sizing as they are, unless you want the over stuffed look (which I didn't).

It's definitely foam, and it is not pleasant seeming right out of the package (where it is bent in half for shipping, by the way!) but once it has a throw pillow cover on it and has had the chance to un-crease from shipping, it's really functional and doesn't go flat or anything; nice and springy.

review_title: These are GREAT. Exactly what I expected - they came as ...
review_body: These are GREAT.  Exactly what I expected - they came as actual thick fluffy pillows, not smushed or anything. Easy to fit into standard 18"x18" pillow cases.

Purchased this pillow form for the purpose of covering it with my own fabric as a gift.. However, the fullness is all in the center and the corners are empty. Purchased extra filler for the corners, but would have saved money just using filler to begin with. Perhaps larger sizes are more forgiving..

Picture shows a square pillow, which is what I needed. I was delivered a rectangle pillow that will not fit the pillow cover I bought it for. Item shown is not as received. Will be sending it back as it won't work.

review_title: Very nice quality and very good value
review_body: Very nice quality and very good value.  These are really nice pillow forms.  I would buy them again.  I bought the 18 inch size and they are true to size.  I know it has been written that if you want to fill an 18 inch pillow case you should buy a 20 inch form but I did not find this to be true.  My 18 inch pillow case was filled by this form.

Love this pillow but since I received the shams from Sweden, the measurements were in centimeters and wish I had gotten one size bigger! The pillows still look great and love the way they look on my couch. Maybe you could change the size chart to include centimeters. That would be my only fault in ordering.

I purchased these lights to go behind some rainbow tool for an event I was doing. They worked great and I'm going to keep them and use them for other things.. I made a HUGE mistake when I opened these lights and opened every strand. They became entangled pretty much immediately and it took me 90 minutes to untangle. Not a fun time! That's not really the manufactuerer's fault - that's just an error on my part. My suggestion is to hang up your lights and then undo them one at a time.. They are much longer than I expected! I feel like I got a really great deal on these. There's also a little switch that changes the twinkle pattern.. I would certainly recommend these lights as a backdrop. They're not too bright and they're not too dim. I would purchase them again, for sure.

review_title: One of her absolute favorite things is the curtain lights
review_body: For Christmas I re-did my daughter’s room. One of her absolute favorite things is the curtain lights. The curtain is actually just a cheap ruffle shower curtain I found on Amazon, too) but the lights make all the difference! There are speeds and she likes the slow fade setting. But they can be left on as constant. She sleeps with it on. It’s too much light for me, but not her. She talks about the lights more than any other feature of the room.. Tip when hanging: hang before letting down each strand to prevent tangling. We figured that out a bit late 😜

review_title: I thought it was obvious from the pictures (if you bother to look farther than just the first one) that the strands are spaced pretty far apart
review_body: I bought two sets to overlap on each other. I thought it was obvious from the pictures (if you bother to look farther than just the first one) that the strands are spaced pretty far apart. My problem with the lights is that both sets were completely defective right out of the box. Didn't even work for a second. We tested all the connections, the outlet, and different parts of our setup to make sure it was the lights, and they're both broken right out of the box. Cheap, poorly-manufactured crap. Please don't waste your time or your money.

Love these twinkle ✨ lights. They were a pain to take out but I figured out that you take them out all at once. I thought it was just one strand of lights but it isn’t. It’s one long strand that stretches horizontally and it has rows of strands coming down vertically. Does that make sense? Lol. Beautiful nonetheless. My hubby over them thy he asked me to buy some for my daughter and sons room. I’ve had them for a few months, about 6? And I’ve had them on all day and night (I forget to turn them on) and up until tonight, I didn’t realize it had different settings...oops 0.o I posted a video so you can see. But don’t mind the noisy novela in the background. Lol binge watching on Netflix is no joke.. Enjoy!

I got mine and set it up recently. When I plugged it in, it didn’t work at all. I tried pressing the black bottom piece that connects the plug and the lights but it still wasn’t working. I guess I just got a bad one

The lights are beautiful!  Each string is tied separately so they don't get tangled which makes it super easy to install. The only bad thing is that the cord to plug it in is very short so you will need an extension cord; unless you have an outlet that is higher up on your wall.

review_title: I was worried by the reviews but they turned out great!
review_body: I love them however, they are not as full as the ones in the picture. They are more spread out but you could get two and put them on top of each other and it would make it more full.

For the price, these are nice. Just be aware that these are extremely tangled when they're taken out of the box. Give yourself time and have someone to help you if you can! Once you get past the hard part, putting them up is fairly easy. These strings are long so patience during this process is a must or you'll get them tangled again.. I wish I can turn the lights off without having to unplug the entire thing. Other than that, I have these in front of my curtains and they're definitely safe!

review_title: These lights are great, but I’m an idiot.
review_body: So when I got these, I plugged them in and tested all the different light modes and they were beautiful! I couldn’t wait to hang them up and see them on my wall. When I went to unravel and unpackage them, I saw there was a zip tie, so I cut it. I saw another, so I cut it. Turns out, the zip ties weren’t part of the packaging...it was how the lights were assembled. Sooo, I ruined them and couldn’t fix it. So I will have to re-order a new strand. I’m sure no one else is as dumb as me, so you’ll probably enjoy these lights correctly.

The box meant to change settings with was cheap and didn't work. I tried to bypass it by plugging the lights directly in to the plug, but only half of the lights worked. Disappointed. Won't be purchasing again.

review_title: Love this product! Love the customer service!
review_body: GREAT Product that is ideal for someone with not a lot of storage space. The size of this product makes it easy to tuck away and easy to travel with. It only takes a few minutes for me to steam my blouses and a few minutes to steam my boyfriend's white overcoat (which is a fairly thick material) and it always looks crisp, clean, and fresh! Rebecca was able to assist me with a slight problem I had with my steamer right away. Great customer service and great product!

I love this little steamer!  I share an apartment so having an iron or large steamer was out of the question.  This is so portable and heats up quickly.  I give my clothes a quick steam and I'm work ready!

Portable, light and fits in our suitcase. Does the job of releasing the wrinkles and does it well. I wish I had this years ago. Heats up extremely fast. May have to get a second one because the hubs takes it on all business trips.

Lightweight, portable, easy to use. After reading reviews for several steamers/companies, I chose this one. A lot had to do with the fact that this company employs those with disabilities. I hope your company continues to grow and prosper.

I’ve hade it for a few months now and I couldn’t be more happy with it. I travel a lot for work and it is the perfect size for my carry-on suit case, and it works great, it’s easier and faster to steam my shirts than having to iron them like I was doing before I got the steamer.

review_title: This heats up in no time and works great. This particular steamer only does about 3 garments ...
review_body: This heats up in no time and works great. This particular steamer only does about 3 garments before needing to be refilled.

This works very well and is easy to use. It does what it's supposed to--gets the wrinkles out of clothes quickly and easily. It's tiny, so it's not the most efficient, but it's great for travel, which is why I bought it. For large or very wrinkled clothes you will need to refill it a few times, but it starts steaming in seconds so that's no big deal. I'm very happy with this purchase.

This is a great product. I have never used a steamer before so it took me a while to get the hang of it. The only thing is that. I need a bigger one. I had done my husband's shirt, 2 sport tops and the water ran out already.. It is great. It is great for traveling. I just need a bigger one.

This's my first steamer and it does the job as described.  I've a lot of free people clothes, they're nice but because of the material, they're easily wrinkle.  This little streamer definitely did the trick with ease.

review_title: This is the greatest thing! I'm not sure why I have never ...
review_body: This is the greatest thing!  I'm not sure why I have never gotten a steamer before.  It worked perfectly, did NOT spit out water onto clothing or any of that.  Will be abel to pack into a carry on as well.  Money well spent.
Love swiffer!
Excellent quality and value!
I love using this to sweep up dusts. Perfect for hardwood floors
simple to use
Great at picking up. Pet hair.
Love to run dry swiffer pads over our hardwoods to collect all the dog hair!

review_title: That Amazon offers such good Deals
review_body: What a Great Price....So many Good offers from Amazon  Thanks
Perfect for sweeping/cleaning floors! Have no problems since the beginning, always a returning customer

review_title: Try not to run out of product.
review_body: These swifter sheets are just the thing to keep daily sweeping, dusting etc. fast and easy.
Cleans all the dust off the floor. Very good.

Got this scale and it worked consistently and correctly as far as weighing goes. I was very careful with it and always used it on a hardwood floor, but one day it just stopped working after having it for only a couple of months. The screen is spazzing and I’ve tried everything including replacing the batteries, but it appears to be defective. I’m not saying this brand is bad or that they’re all bad, but I had a defective one. They do come with a one year warranty, so I will send it in and update this review as I go. I just don’t know that I want to keep it and risk it breaking again.

review_title: received 2. returned 1st one due to malfunction. 2nd one was fine.
review_body: ORIGINAL REVIEW. chaotic and over 100lbs off...my gf normally weighs around 100lbs, I weigh around 205lbs. She now weighs 50lbs and I weigh 120lbs...These are impossible weights unless we are dead. probably a damaged circuit board. it fluctuates rapidly and won't settle on a weight...We own another Etekcity scale that works perfectly. This one is a disaster.. UPDATE. Etekcity, to their credit, sent another scale free and it works fine. Again, we also have a similar transparent Eteckcity scale. My gf weighs 99.2lbs on that scale and 99.6lbs on the this one. Good enough. A minor variance.. Etekcity should be commended for going above and beyond the call of duty in sending a new scale FOC. That is extraordinary.

If you like a scale that decides a weight on a whim this scale is for you. Pretty much it's a guess what you weigh every time you step on this. Step on it 5 times in a row get 5 different weights that you can pick from.

Circled back to review this product after several months of use.  It is fantastic.  First, it's gorgeous.  Looks like a piece of black glass.. Functionality is great.  When it finds the correct weight, it locks in so shifting of weight doesn't change the reading.  On my prior more expensive scale, every time I'd get on and off I'd get a different reading.  So I'd take best best out of three!  Every time you get on and off this scale at the same session the reading is identical.. I'm currently visiting a doc weekly and I get weighed every time on her $$ professional scale that measures everything and the reading is exactly the same there as on my home scale.  I would have paid much more for this beautiful and accurate scale and am very pleased.. Following up 2 weeks later - I had the occasion to call customer service and ask a question and Jubilee was awesome and took fantastic care of me.  So not only is the scale great, but the service is too.

review_title: because I see this product has received many good reviews. I live in nyc where my apartment ...
review_body: I recently bought this and it is not accurate at all. But I have a theory as to why, because I see this product has received many good reviews. I live in nyc where my apartment floor is kind of crooked in its layout. The floor is not completely parallel to the ground I would say, which is true of many building floor layouts in nyc. Anyway, if the surface is not flat or it's at an angle, the scale will read your weight and everytime it will be completely different. I can keep it on one spot and one day it will say 127, and the next it will read 145. So who knows how much I actually weigh..

review_title: No way am I 137 lbs like this scale says
review_body: I was 155 lbs last night and lost 18 lbs after I woke up. No way am I 137 lbs like this scale says. Also, gained 8 lbs later this morning and scale says I'm 145 lbs. Numbers are off on this scale. It's pleasing to the eye, but not accurate.

review_title: A daily reminder of progress. Also, some tips from my experience
review_body: There is nothing more motivating than going to take a wiz at 4 in the morning only to jump on this scale, have it blind you while lighting up the darkness that surrounds you, and lets you know, "Hey bud, good job. You are 0.4lbs lighter than you were yesterday morning.". Yaaaaasss.. While calculating body fat would be a better determinant in how much fat I am losing, of course, there is no denying in looking at the numbers showing, "160.8" when two months ago it showed, "179.8." It fluctuated every morning, but remember that there are many factors for that:. - How late you ate the night previously if you did so. That's not going to burn as fast as if you had light and had dinner much earlier.. - Any urine or other products manufactured in your body's supply chain that are being held in the distribution center waiting to get delivered the final consumer in your restroom. I'll check the scale when I get up for the day, strip down to only underwear (If you have the convenience), then go deposit urine to come back and lose a pound. Loopholes lol. Basically, the scale works great as it should. From my tips on accuracy, just make sure you set a time range for when you check your weight and match the same factors every day you do so. You'll know you're dropping lbs/kg when you are looking at your weight from week to week rather than day to day since that fluctuates heavily on numerous factors.

review_title: I don't feel like I fully trust it
review_body: This scale works to get an average weight During the week, but you will want to look elsewhere if you are planning on using it daily for an exact, accurate reading. The issue is that if you stand with your feet in one place, you will get one reading, but if you move your feet forward just an inch, or slide one foot further from the other, you can get at least full 1.5 pound increase or decrease for weight. I've stood too close to the front and seen an even larger increase in numbers. I'm not sure then, where that leaves people with bigger/smaller feet, or little children's feet. Also, If You move and the number changes, it leaves you wondering, which is the accurate number? I don't feel like I fully trust it.

review_title: Terrible Accuracy - readings show very high variance
review_body: The accuracy of the readings are absolutely horrendous. I reweighed myself 3 hours after my initial weigh-in and I came in at 3 pounds lighter. I didn’t realize sitting on the couch and watching TV would lower my weight by 3 pounds. Over the course of the next 4 weigh-ins I was either up a couple of pounds or down close to 5 pounds from my initial weigh-in. These readings were taken over the course of 2 days. I could live with a svale that is not the most accurate in the world but a scale that demonstrates such high variance is completely useless. Consistent readings, even if inaccurate, would allow me to monitor my weight trend line. When readings are all over the place, the measurements are essentially useless. This product is complete garbage. I bought it because of the high reviews, and attractive price point. I guess you get what you pay for. Terrible!!.

review_title: perfect scale for what we need
review_body: My husband and I decided to go on a diet and loose a few pounds. Unfortunately our old scale was not digital and it made it near impossible to count the small amount of weight loss each day. This scale had great reviews so we purchased it and have been very happy since then. Every little tenth counts for me and I love seeing the pounds come off over time (not so much on the days I've gained back a few pounds). The only negative I have (its not worth removing a start for) is that its cold on your feet. Just a recommendation in the winter in that you might want to wear socks (light weight socks! ha ha).

review_title: they work just fine for that task
review_body: The bags in this recent box only smell of plastic, no fresh Gain Febreeze scent whatsoever. kinda disappointing. I was going to use them to store off-season clothes. Normally, however, they work just fine for that task.
Holds trash & recycling well. Hardly ever tears. The febreeze smell is kind of overwhelming.

review_title: These bags easily got ripped and I don't think they really helped ...
review_body: These bags easily got ripped and I don't think they really helped block odors that well. I switched to the Febreze Forceflex.
It holds trash and keeps the stink down.

review_title: Pretty sturdy and rugged you can seem to get a ...
review_body: Pretty sturdy and rugged you can seem to get a lot of trash in the one bag. I’m knocking on wood but I have not had one bag rip to this point
This batch of bags is splitting on the side seam.  One bag after another, the same thing has happened.  Not what you want in a garbage bag...especially the mega size box.

Love that these bags hide the stinky trash bag smell. Not annoying or flowery and not overly sweet smelling. Smells like clean laundry.  A little more in cost but I don't dread the trash smell anymore.

I love these trashbags! The material is strong and has the ability to stretch so I can squeeze just a little more in there. The smell of the Gain scent is light and pleasing. It's not overwhelming, and won't hide the smell completely, but it certainly makes it more tolerable. The drawstring feature makes for easy securing and carrying of the bag. I would recommend these to my friends and family.
These are the best trash bags ever! They’re so great, infact, that I’m writing a review on trash bags!
Love the smell. Cuts down the odor from the trash, strong bags

review_title: Wish they were thicker/of better quality.
review_body: Pretty thin and cheap.  Not a lot to each roll.

review_title: A Great Replacement for Brawny Paper Towels.
review_body: These paper towels are just as thick and soft as Brawny. The only thing I miss is having the extra perforations for a 1/2 sheet of paper towel. Other than that I don't think anyone would notice a difference and that is saying alot since I am a very picky person.
These are not great paper towels. They absorb quickly but can't hold very much liquid. You end up using far more of them so they're not a bargain for cleaning. Will not buy again
Rolls are small compared to say bounty.  Paper towels are fairly strong and absorbent.
These paper towels are very heavy comparable to bounty and a great value. They are a must have in our house and they last a long time
It works, just wish there was a half sheet option.  These are full sheets.  But the price is a good value.  We juggle between scott select a size and this one.

review_title: Not Bounty but decent cheaper brand.
review_body: These are thinner than I'd prefer.bthey definitely are not bounty but they work okay. Most of the time they're just used as napkins anyway so they function well enough.

review_title: Nice paper towels that don't fall apart
review_body: These paper towels seem to be thicker than the ones I was previously ordering on Amazon.  The price is also cheaper but the rolls are smaller.
Great price and handy to have delivered to my front door. The paper towel are good average towels, not as good as high end however priced accordingly.
The rolls are a little small, but it works for the price.

I've used other brands before, this one is cheap quality. Not very soft, feels rather abrasive and not very absorbant. Don't bother using them on your car, they're not going to work very well. I just use them to clean my wheels, and discard after they get dirty.

It it magic?  Maybe.  After discovering melted chocolate that had already dried on a beige microfiber/suede-like sofa, I freaked.  The dried chocolate got scrapped off and then I went to work on the stain using soap and water (as recommended) and then a fabric cleaner.  What was left was an extremely visible water mark...so disappointing.  But then I remembered these cloths and went to work on the water mark using a dry white microfiber cloth.  Water mark...gone!

review_title: Excellent product that even my dog will tolerate
review_body: These cleaning cloths are very absorbent, thin enough to be easily maneuvered and thick enough to really absorb.  So far I have used them for all the standard cleaning chores around the house: countertops, eyeglasses, to absorb coating of grease from cooking utensils before washing them, the espresso I managed to spill all over and it didn't even stain the white cloth.  They are soft and comfortable to use wet or dry.. Most exciting for me however, is that my dog, who has lots of long fur around her face, finds them soft enough to be willing to allow me to dry off her face, or wipe the fur down after a particularly delicious meal.  I also used one to bathe her the other day rather than having to use my hands.  They spread the soap and water beautifully and then another few to do some surface drying.  She is quite fussy and finds them acceptably soft.  (A Havanese dog with thick fur).. Needless to say, they are also not expensive, which is an added plus.  I've washed them a few times in the washing machine and then left them hanging over something to dry - which they did very quickly.  All the absorbency and softness was retained.  I've found that microfiber needs to be very thoroughly rinsed (all microfiber), and air dried - but it dries quickly.. I wish Amazon would expand on this product and create more subtle and interesting colors.  My only conceivable objection is that the blue and the gold are bland versions of the colors - Martha Stewart probably wouldn't approve :). Since color is hardly the primary thing one is looking for in an item like this, I heartily give them 5 stars.

review_title: I Got What I Paid For
review_body: First the good things. They were delivered as promised. They are in lovely colors. That's it! These cleaning cloths are really not for me! They are exactly what I paid for. I was saving money so I ordered them instead of the original  cloths I bought. These cloths are paper thin and have none of the heft needed to do the job. If you spray furniture polish on them you get more on your hands then on the cloth. Sorry I bought them . Lesson learned ! You get what you pay for.. Lois A

review_title: Great green alternative to paper towels
review_body: I love using these clothes as an alternative to paper towels.
