I keep about 40 of these in a drawer in my kitchen and use them for everything from dusting, to cleaning my counters, to cleaning my bathrooms, to occasionally using them as a dish cloth.  After I have used each one, I put them in a mesh hamper bag in my laundry room along with my kitchen towels and when it gets full I wash them all using my washer's sanitary cycle so I know they are clean to use again.  I still use paper towels for things like cleaning my 12 month old's face after she eats or for really yucky messes that I don't want to use my cloths for, but because of the cloths, I have significantly reduced the amount of paper towels I use (and therefore buy).  I don't use dryer sheets when I was these so they are nice and staticy for dusting, but they still stay super soft.

review_title: The quality of these microfiber cloths are awesome. I was not sure about the quality when ...
review_body: The quality of these microfiber cloths are awesome. I was not sure about the quality when I purchased them but they are so much worth the price. I use them for washing my car and also keep one in my backpack for cleaning my laptop screen. They cloth feels soft and also is easily washable and dries faster too. I had super oil stains after washing the car tires but 98% of the stains came off after some washing with laundry soap.

Great product. We bought a 24 pack of these when we first moved into our apartment and we use them daily. I found that at first they were not too absorbent, but after a few washes, they got much better. Don't use fabric softeners or detergent that contains fabric softeners when washing these, it will only ruin them. We have had our set of 24 for a full year and they still work great. We clean the floor, kitchen, bathroom, everything with them. They are so much better for the environment than using paper towels. I throw them into the washer on a cold wash with plain baking soda and then wash them one more time with a tiny bit of detergent in hot water. This washing technique has removed all stains and odors while keeping the towels absorbent and fresh. We just purchased a 36 pack to add to our collection. Great value for the price!

review_title: Completely satisfied! Multi-use, so cheap they're disposable.
review_body: In spite of the negative reviews I found these to be just as good as the "best-selling brand". I use them to clean: mirrors, eyeglasses (reading and sunglasses), computer screens, cellphone screens and more. When I've used them a couple dozen times on those items I use them to dust: computer cases and components then I throw them away. I am completely satisfied!

These cleaning cloths are fantastic.  I have a black gas cooktop, and it's nearly impossible to keep clean.  Everything shows up on it - bacon spatter, dust, boiled-over water.  I bought these on a whim to see if they'd make a difference over sponges and paper towels - and boy did they ever!  I used .  and a couple of these babies, and I now have probably the shiniest cooktop I've ever seen. Ever.  I'll definitely be using these for my car and everything else that needs to have a lustrous, streak-free glow!

review_title: Towels are about 1/2 the advertised size
review_body: The microfiber material works well and and was what I was expecting, but the cloth is much smaller than advertised.  Each cloth is actually between 8" to 10" wide by 10" to 14" long.  This doesn't sound like a big deal but means I paid for half (56%) of the product I was expecting by surface area.  The advertised dimensions of 12" x 16" are a more useful size for car washing with the additional surface area and absorption per towel.. First time I'm disappointed with an amazon basics product.

Just about every heavy duty brand of bags I've tried inevitably rips or leaks. I've been using these for months now and haven't had a single tear or leak.  There are only so many glowing things you can say about a trash bag so bottom line: great quality, low price. That's all I'm really looking for in something I put trash in.... Edit: Finally made it through the first 90-count box and have yet to experience a ripped or leaking bag. Just repurchased and will continue to do so! Great value, quality product.

review_title: And economy sized box of trash bags that are great for the kitchen.
review_body: I really like these kitchen trash bags. They are decently strong and come in a large quantity box that is more economical for my family. I would highly recommend them and will definitely order them again in the future.

review_title: Ripped, poor quality, would never buy again.
review_body: I purchased these on Amazon and incorrectly thought Glad as a large brand name made great trash bags.  Almost every single one ripped and would have holes after using them.  I had to empty my trash when it was only half full hoping they wouldn't fall apart.  Moved onto to a different brand and have not had any problems.

These are the best bags.  Here's why:. 1.. Unlike other bags, it is EASY to open them up.  Other backs you have to wrestle with the plastic to pull it open - not this.  Nice and easy - every time!. 2.. The drawstring is designed to be both strong, and incredibly easy and fast to use.  Very nice!. 3.. The plastic bag is strong.  I have put heavy things inside with no problems.. 4.. JUST BUY IT!. FIVE STARS!

review_title: Worth the Extra Money Over Economy Brands.
review_body: I jam these bags with all sorts of trash from kitchen and elsewhere with objects poking the sides and it doesn't break.  No bag has ever leaked nor broke, I'm sold.  For the price variation between these and the Great Value of WalMart, I'll spend a little bit more.

review_title: These are good bags, my only frustration is the wide band ...
review_body: These are good bags, my only frustration is the wide band of 'dimples' near the opening which makes opening the bag more difficult than necessary.  Takes several attempts to open and expand the bag into the holder.

Pro:  They collect the trash I place inside of them.. Con: Is there really a con to a bag that collects trash?. Other thoughts:  If the trash placed inside of the bag can decompose, it begins to make a foul smell if trash bag is not removed from trash container it's placed in.

I've been ordering these through my dash button for about a year now. The most recent batches of these have really gone downhill. Frequently I find myself tearing corners just putting these into the garbage can. I'm going to have to find another brand.

review_title: Good product buy through Subscribe and Save program
review_body: This is the brand I normally buy but have been getting it through subscribe and save program. It's slightly cheaper and it ships free. You can set up auto delivery for any time between every month to every 6 months or you can set something you only need once. I love subscribe and save and the more you buy you get a discount. Set up your delivery dates for whatever works good for you.  I set it up to pay on the 6th of the month and get it about 7 days later. We have been buying stuff we regularly buy at the store and save a bit of money and don't have to lug so much home from the store.
Good
Arrived super quick and good price for so many rolls. Packaged 2 at a time, so it’s 8x 2 packs.

review_title: These came out cheaper than the bounty ones I used ...
review_body: These came out cheaper than the bounty ones I used and I needed some quick. I was surprised that they worked as well so i’ll buy these as long as they stay cheaper
well worth it. why would you ever go into the store, carry it around, carry to the car, carry to the house...stock up and be smart.
Great size and quality paper towels. Love that we won’t run out since they come automatically. Thank you Amazon!
Great paper towels, only down side is 16 of them takes up a LOT of space. lol
Cheaper than the grocery stores. Works good. Doesn't disintergrate when wet.
Too big for my dispenser.
I had never used Brawny paper towels before but I absolutely love them.
My husband goes through paper towels like they are limitless! I buy a case about every three months to make sure there is always a roll on hand for him.
Paper towels are just like Bounty brand. Works great.

review_title: Reasonable price n sturdy towels. Very absorbent.
review_body: Paper towels are my best tool for all clean ups.
good value for the money,
Good value!
No problems.
Great quality - always great to not have to go out and get basic household items!
So happy with Bounty towels...over the top with happiness!!!!!!
General spills
I like being able to choose the size of sheet I use,and the fact you delivered it!
Good price

review_title: Bounty Are Excellent Paper Towels and They Arrive Right At Your Door!
review_body: While some believe that Bounty are expensive, all you have to do is buy "cheaper" paper towels and see how well they clean up and how many MORE paper towels you need to clean up the same mess. Wet both brands and see if the cheaper towels fall apart as soon as they get wet. I have tried a few different brands and off brands and will stay with Bounty. When you buy them through Amazon, the large box is delivered right to your front and you don't have to carry in from the car. Having several rolls I always have them when I need them, no matter how big the mess is, which is often, because I am clumsy and a messes just seem to happen!
Awesome value
I like this because the are stronger then reg. Paper plates.
Extremely sturdy paper plates.  Good value too.
As advertised! Prompt service!
timely, as advertised
great for family eating
Good price for some sturdy plates
Love these paper plates, have them on reorder every 3 months. Strong, sturdy and good size.
These work great at our house and I took some for my work! Perfect size.
You can't beat Dixie!

I am a big fan of Dixie Plates and I have been ordering this brand for years!  Several reasons why I buy these:. 1. The size is a good dinner plate size. Perfect for Summer BBQs. 2. The plate is sturdy and does not fold under pressure.. 3. The design is nice and does not compete with the plated food. They have a faint weave pattern.. 4. They microwave well & also stand up to hot food and the temperature does not seep through.. 5. I have cut steak on these plates with no problems. Just be mindful of how hard you press the knife.

review_title: An upgrade in Dixie paper plates
review_body: I have used Dixie paper products for most of my life. I was pleasantly surprised at the strength and flexibility of this type of paper plate.  It holds reasonably well, it is water resistant and can handle light use against its surface from most utensils.. With a modern graphic design and easy to grip, this would be a good plate to use for many group dinners. Well recommended paper products and at a good price point.

review_title: Perfect for stews, pasta/sauces, large salads, enchiladas, etc.  Strong, thick, leak-resistant.  Perfect!
review_body: These are so strong, you can actually wash them off.  (I don't recommend re-using for food unless you use a little bleach.)  They're large, sturdy, and have a great design with a high lip for sloppy meals such as pasta with sauces, stews, mashed potatoes, large salads with lots of dressing, piles of steaming vegetables.  The thickness of the paper means that warm foods don't get too hot underneath.. These are great.  Dixie, don't change a thing.

I typically buy the private label brand at stores but did not like that they sagged a bit after they had a salad or meat on them with juices.  I wanted to try these to see if they could hold up to our get togethers outside.. I am happy to report that they do a great job.  They are definitely thicker than the plates I typically buy and the coating seems to keep them more sturdy after a couple trips to the buffet line!

These are really good paper plates.  A lot better than the cheap store brand ones.  I tried salmon, French fries, and breakfast burritos on them and no problems.  I wouldn't try putting a whole roasted chicken on there but it'll definitely hold up for barbecues, sandwiches, and so on.  The weird diamond pattern makes me think of Dow Chemical's logo, probably since my dad used to work there.

review_title: Great quality paper plates that hold up to everything
review_body: These plates are great.  They are pretty strong for normal food (like no issue holding corn on the cob) and don't soak through from juices.  The plates look good and make parties easy for cleanup. So far have not had any issues.  I am able to eat everything off of these with no issues.  Great plates and look good, the design is basic but adds a little touch for impressing party guests.

Paper plates for any occasion. These are basic plates, nothing fancy to them. A little stronger than the plates of old, these are good for parties and outside events. A must-have if you do any summer entertaining. We like them better than Styrofoam plates.

Great new design on heavy duty plates.  These would be great for cookouts, they are sturdy and will hold a lot of food.  I haven't had any trouble with leaks or sagging plates, so they work even for messy meals like spaghetti.
Product as advertised thank you
love these plates

We absolutely love these type and brand of paper towels. We love the freedom to be able to choose a smaller size of a paper towel for smaller messes. The soft fabric type of paper absorbs better, thus using less towels. We have these on subscribe and save!!

review_title: Not a traditional paper towel more like garage rags
review_body: These should be listed as garage clean up rags. The rolls are so small and there is no softness. Most paper towels aren't just for cleaning surfaces but washing hands & wiping children's faces - Not These!
Absolutely love that you can "Choose-A-Sheet."  Some times we need a couple, sometimes we just need one.  I will never buy another paper towel than Viva brand.

We have a puppy at home and were going through TONS of paper towels. Love being able to order this many at once and this brand! With Viva you do NOT have to use as many paper towels to clean up messes which is GREAT in itself!

I have been a dedicated Viva user since they were released. I have never been able to find another brand that comes even close to the high quality of these. We use them not only for household cleaning but also for homemade wipes.. Highly highly highly recommend!

These towels are difficult to use, for they stick together. Trying to tear off a whole sheet is next to impossible. I thought perhaps it was just a fluke with the first delivery, but the second delivery was just the same. I will not be buying them again. I‘d rather pay more.

review_title: Absolutely love Viva towels and highly recommend them to all
review_body: Absolutely love Viva towels and highly recommend them to all. We use them for so many chores and they are very sturdy & dependable. They are also much cheaper to buy in bulk here than a roll at a time in a store.

Product is excellent. USPS Delivery sucks. They left it in the foyer of an apartment building for anyone passing by to steal. Thankfully, it was seen by a kind neighbor who picked it up & informed me.

VIVA is definitely worth the price and when you buy them in bulk, it’s relatively affordable. After trying many other brands, I’ve always come back to VIVA. This Choose-A-Sheet style works best since a single (half-sheet) is often enough due to its thickness and absorption. For larger messes, use two or occasionally three half-sheets. Pair these with a good, natural spray cleaner and you’re golden!
These are way too soft and leave lint. They make great napkins or something to use as a facial tissue, but not for cleanups if you have appliances with glass or shiny surfaces.

This does have a bit of a rustle sound like others have noted. Honestly I only noticed it the first day because I was aware of it from the reviews but I didn't tell my husband and he's never said anything about it bothering him and he's a light sleeper. Over very pleased. I put 4* due to the rustle. Don't want to be misleading

Terry cotton surface was one reason I chose this mattress protector. It keeps the bottom sheet from sliding around, it's breathable, it's not noisy. My husband tends to sleep warm, but he's been comfortable with this. It fits our 12" deep mattress without bagging around the sides. Per instructions, I washed on hot, dried on low. It came out fine.. Can't speak to its longevity, as we've only had a little over a month. The 10-year warranty is a plus.

Wanted to love this mattress protector (have family members who do) but unfortunately, I found it to be too hot. It's almost like the cotton reflects your own body heat back at you. Normally, heat wouldn't be a problem for me (I'm always cold) but for some reason this was more intense. Felt the need to write this because all of the great reviews are not necessarily "wrong," however, potential buyers should know that for some people, this mattress protector makes them sweat in their sleep. Otherwise, it's a good product. Fits the bed nicely (about 18") with no pulling or sagging, and it is also pretty thin which is a plus since it doesn't compromise mattress feel. :)

love it, washed before use as recommended and fit the bed perfectly over my 3" memory/gel foam topper i have on top of my mattress. there is no "crinkle" noise like on other liners i have used and it is soft and cant even tell its there. i havent had any spills or messes yet (thankfully) but it has the membrane lining so i am sure it would do the job its supposed to do if something happens. i recommend getting this protector if your looking for the added insurance of protecting your mattress but still want comfort.

Top line: This cover works, period. Great value and performs flawlessly.. Good: Being somewhat thin out of the box, I feared this mattress would be merely water "resistant", not "proof". After several thorough tests by my toddler, I can report my fears totally unfounded. Also excellent is the comfort level, that is to say it is undetectable in both feel and sound.. Bad: The elastic on the cover is a bit chintzy.. Other: This is not a wraparound cover--no zipper! Leaks from the side (or underneath??) may not be protected.

review_title: while excellent, was extremely expensive and I always hated that
review_body: Having worked in the mattress industry, I know the importance of protecting a mattress. The product we sold, while excellent, was extremely expensive and I always hated that...it stopped people from purchasing something I feel is much needed. Even if one does not eat or drink in bed, we sweat and we loose skin. It's great if you have allergies, also. This product is EXACTLY like the expensive ones we sold at a third of the price. I have two so when I change sheets, I can change my protecter without having to wait on the wash cycle (I don't change it ever sheet change, though). I've gone as far as to even purchase protectors for my pillows. I sleep with a temperpedic pillow...it cannot be washed. This saves me!

This mattress protector did the trick for a great price - which I purchased to add an extra layer of protection between my sheets and the mattress surface itself;  the cover fit snug and easily adapted to the size of the bed; the material itself is very comfortable and adds a very minor amount of cushion between the mattress and your sheets - which was preferable for me as I like my bed firm;. Fit: Overall the mattress protector fit well - somewhat baggy in corners but was easily hidden under the mattress; install was easy enough for one individual to do without pulling or snagging on any corners;. Packaging/Delivery: The sealed container was similar to buying sheets - a plastic cover with a zipper - which held the product without any major creases or odd patterns when unfolded; the packaging materials did not leave any strange or chemical smells/scents on the product which can typically be the case with linen material - I would still reccomend washing it before use;. Overall the product is a great investment to protect your mattress purchase - this product is definitely not impervious to liquid stains/spills - but you will obviously be better off in case of an incident; I would reccomend this mattress protector to anyone who is knew to the market or product type - this is a great place to start for the price. I paired this mattress protector with a new mattress - both my first purchases - and I can say this product is indeed worth it

review_title: No leaks, easy to wash and dry.
review_body: I bought two of these when we bought bunk beds for my children (ages 6 and 4). I was looking for something light and durable, but that would protect the mattress on hot summer nights and from potential bed wettings by my newly potty trained kid. So far these have performed perfectly and held up well against a bedroom that is often 80+ degrees at night and two very active children. They've been peed on a few times, and it never leaked through. At first I hung them up to dry. After a few months use, I got more adventurous (i.e. lazy) and tossed one in the dryer to see how it did. I've been drying them ever since without any issue. I even bought another one when we got a bed for our third child.

This is the best mattress cover. We have a 4 year old and a newborn and this has saved our bed from spills, potty training, diaper changes, and everything in between. Most recently, an entire water bottle was spilled and the quilt, sheets, and blankets were soaked and the mattress was completely dry. It’s lightweight, easy to clean in the washer and dryer, and (most importantly) it doesn’t have a crinkly, plastic sound or feel. We have these covers on every bed in our house and they have held up!

I read all the revues for this item, hoping everyone was right because the cover we had for our new Temperpedic bed just was horrible. We have been sleeping on this cover for a week now and we love it. My main problem was that the cover that was free with our new bed was slippery and crunchy. My sheets would all be crumpled in the middle of the bed and it was difficult to make the bed with out pulling everything off first. This new protector is near perfect. It stays on well, is not slippery, doesn't bunch up, and stays cool. It's not noisy, it has a nice terry cloth top. Spilling my water on it, it dried pretty quickly and did not seep onto my new mattress. I would buy another of these no problem, luckily I don't think I'll have to worry about that for a while.
Paper towels..
Great
Good

review_title: Buy in bulk no lugging around
review_body: Delivered right to my door
because I don't have to leave home, it come to my door
Good

review_title: Amazon delivered  my order in two days
review_body: I love bounty select paper towels.  I use them in the kitchen as well as the bathroom.  The towels are very handy for cleaning or quick pickups.
delivered on time with good packaging and as expected Bounty is the best paper towel
Now these are definitely great bounty rolls! Would totally buy from this seller again!
I like that these towel are in two sizes and tear easily. Also, there is no strange odor as I have found with other paper towels.
I love buying this every couple months.... I buy it about every 6-8montha depending and it last along time and does the job
Great value and price. This pack would last me and my family for two months because we got though paper towels pretty wuick
Smell's like rotten Fish...I've never had paper towels smell like anything much less this awful but somehow they've managed to make a perfectly functional paper towel that smells like rotten fish.

Why would you want to haul these around in the cart, then into your car, haul it in your car, and unload it out of your car - maybe in the rain when you could have the UPS guy bring it to your door??  'Nuf said.

You won’t save any money by buying these cheap paper towels, because you have to use 4 times as many of these vs. Costco brand.  They Are super thin and weak, and absorb very little.  When you pull them apart, they rip, rather than separate at the perforation.

review_title: Good quality and holds liquids like other well known brand
review_body: Worth the price, don't see a reason to spend more on brand name paper towel. Good quality and holds liquids like other well known brand.
Not like they used to be. They lure you in with a great price before they substitute with a cheaper version.

Just ok for for paper towels... Pretty thin even for 2 ply and the perforations only work a third of the time.  I got so frustrated with them they have been banned to the garage only and I went and bought better ones at the grocery store....

review_title: I like the select a size because most of the time
review_body: I like the select a size because most of the time, I don’t need a full size, so these rolls last longer. Strong and absorbent.

Great quality pillow for the price. No, its not a high end down pillow, so for the reviews that say it wasn't fluffy enough, perhaps you're shopping in the wrong place and in the wrong price range. This is exactly what I was looking for to use as throw/decorative pillows on my couch. They fit perfectly into the 18" covers I purchased (separately), and I will definitely be buying additional pillows for other rooms.

They serve their purpose, great couch pillows for the price, just throw a cover of your choice on.  They aren't incredibly soft or fancy, but they are not cheapy either.  I'm happy with them, I have animals so I don't buy expensive ones and these are quite nice.

review_title: I'm amazed at the quality for the price
review_body: I used these pillows with 18" x 18" pillow covers for my couch. I'm amazed at the quality for the price! They're nice and poofy and don't squish down much at all if you lay on them. I would definitely buy these again.

review_title: These pillows are nice enough and they are plump but I'm trying to ...
review_body: These pillows are nice enough and they are plump but I'm trying to figure out how to get them to fill in the corners.  I purchased covers and would really like the filling to fill in completely.  I  will be happy to have the pillow less plump if it will fill in the corners.  They suggested to buy a size up but that would have been much plumper than I like the pillow for the sofa.  If the corners fill in in the next month I'll give them 5 stars.
This pillow is nothing fancy, but it does the job. I bought this to fill a 16x16 pillowcase, and works just fine for my needs.

Decent cheap pillow form. Nice and full, fills my pillow covers bought on amazon perfectly. Definitely a "budget" pillow fill, cheap fabric.. but it's made to go inside a pillow cover anyway so who cares. Good firm filling, not lumpy, and extra full!

review_title: Very nice for your favorite pillow covers!
review_body: Love them...be careful, when you throw a few under the bedspread and lay on them, you may not want to get up. I recently injured my back and they were a huge help in getting comfortable enough to go to sleep.

In the description they tell you to order a 16 x 16 cover. However, while trying to put into the cover the cover ripped. To me the size is true to order.  Because I ordered the oversized pillow it  ripped the cover.  You need to change the description to true to size.  I'm very disappointed in the description. I'm glad that I mistakenly only ordered one. I will order another one, however, I will order a 16 x 16 for my 16 x 16 cover.

Ordered two 18x18 pillow forms. Received two 18x12 pillow forms. 18x12 isn't even a selection, but that's what I got.  Now I have these two rectangular pillow forms to go with my decidedly square pillow cases.
It is perfect. I didn't receive the directions until after I got the pillow. But, it didn't matter. It fit the form I had perfectly and I thank you for making such a good product.

These are soooooo pretty. I had a hard time understanding if they would fit my sliding glass doors and they do. They have many patterns of twinkling  to choose from and the wiring is transparent so its not a bunch of ugly green or white wires hanging in the view during the day. I paired them with the Wemo smart plug Amazon had a special on and so I plugged the lights into that and programmed them to turn on at 7:30pm every night. I live in an apartment complex so this is an excellent and beautiful way to get light on the patio at night since there are no outdoor outlets and a lovely effect inside, too.

I hung this in my bedroom on one wall it covered most all of the wall floor to ceiling. It is skinny clear thin soft plastic strands with little delicate lights that are soft and glowing at night. I LOVE them! They plug into the wall and worked right out of the box. I turn them on every night and have had no issues. The only thing I don't like is there is a clunky square remote box that hangs down on the wall half way down. You cant hide it. I don't know what they were thinking. It should be long enough to hide it on the floor at the bottom. That's the only reason I took off 1 star.
Terrible. Very cheaply made and came defective
Some of the coating for the wires are missing so some strands dont light up.

I’m obsessed with these string lights! They’re exactly what I was looking for. I used twist ties to hang them to the curtain rod. Some people mentioned the cord was too short but mine was much longer than others I saw posted. It reaches perfectly to the outlet I have on the ground and the control switch sits perfects on top of my headboard. I guess I just got lucky but I really do love these! Exactly what I was expecting!

Love Love these lights! I’ve hung them in my pool area and they give such a cool look at night. Very easy to hang, but one piece of advice; hang the wire first before untieing each string of lights. If you hang it first and then unravel each string of lights it goes easily and doesn’t get tangled up. I loved them so much I ordered 5 more to use in my front yard draped over my balcony near the entrance. It is very cool because you can hook them all together and then just use one power source to plug all of them in. The different light setting options are a great feature too.
I plugged them in and by the next day they broke

review_title: The different effects are awesome! There are so many to choose from and ...
review_body: These are quite long! I got them to hang under my daughter loft bed, but when I attached them beneath her bed, there was still 2 feet of lights on the floor. So I hung them from the ceiling instead and they were just the right length. I should have measured before I bought them, but oh well. The different effects are awesome! There are so many to choose from and the little button is easy to use.

Great lights! I only like one of the settings, where it twinkles. I do wish the twinkling speed was consistent (it speeds up gradually then suddenly gets slow again). The slow twinkle is so dreamy, but unfortunately it speeds up and gets a little crazy looking.. I also wish that there was an off button! There’s so many settings attached but you have to unplug it to turn it off.. However, overall I am satisfied with it. The lights don’t get hot and they were easy to set up.

I bought these for my daughters 17th birthday. I kept them in the box until the night of the party. I unboxed them and carefully got them set up without tangling them to oblivion which was no easy feat. They had multiple odd connectors of questionable craftsmanship. Well big surprise I plug them in and nothing. I check each of the clear connectors and the black one to the control box. I tried pushing the button, which felt like it wasn't connected to anything, holding down the button. Nada!! Very disappointed. I really wish I would have tested them when they first came in and definitely before I spent 45 min hanging them...

We recently bought new curtains and needed a steamer that I can easily store and will be powerful enough to remove the wrinkles from blackout curtains. 🤔 After reading many reviews and having experienced other name brands through volunteering at charity events, I decided to give this new brand a try. It is very well designed; easy to operate and it softened/ removed the wrinkles from our blackout curtains. Some drops sprinkled but it didn’t matter to me because they kind of helped with the job. I used filtered water but next time I’ll try with distilled water. Great product!
Just got the steamer I hope it last me a good couple of years.

Works great so far, heats up fast and gets the wrinkles out. You would need to refill it if you wanted to do more than 2 garments at a time but I think the small tank is better because it's lighter and easier to manuver. Barring some unforeseen issue I would definitely recommend this.
I have used the steamer with few garments and it is light, effective, and easy to use. When the first steamer would not turn on, the company sent me a replacement - no questions asked. Thank you !

After great reviews and being tagged as an Amazon Choice product I have to say I’m disappointed. This little steamer barely holds enough water to do 1 garmet and constently spews water all over my clothes. On the + side it does heat up fast. Mediocre at best.

Easy to travel with.  It is not as powerful as a stand steamer, but we used during travel in the U.S.  It worked very well to freshen up clothes taken out of luggage.  Use only distilled water or the like and hold straight.  It won't sputter as the bad reviews indicate.

I bought this because I hate ironing clothes.  Typically I don’t buy clothes that wrinkle but after a recent 1500 mile move it turns out I had a lot of wrinkled clothes.  This works great!! You have to hold it very close to the fabric to get the full benefit and I couldn’t be more pleased! It’s easy to use, small yet powerful.  You won’t regret this purchase!

The tank is a bit small, but enough for one man sized shirt. I do like that the device is small because it's easy to store. T-shirts are EASY to do, thicker fabrics take longer but they do eventually get straightened. I haven't tried wrinkle releasing spray yet but I heard that it's great with a steamer.

My husband has needed one for a while but I was worried they wouldn't work. This one is great! We were both suprised and impressed. He can't always make it by the cleaners for his work shirts but this worked great and quickly! Love it!
Love it and so does my granddaughter.Very quick service as well.

review_title: The real things are worth it!
review_body: Excellent product. Knock-offs never work as well. The real things are worth it!
5 stars
same as the one from supermarket
Great product for the price. Definitely worth buying
Will keep on buying!
Works well in picking up all the dusty debris that quickly accumulates, here in my SoCaL abode.
I need refund money to my account
Box was completely smashed inside cardboard box
perfectly worked
great price

What a great value for the money.  I had bought a luggage scale since I was traveling out of the country with gifts for family and needed to be 50lbs or less.  Due to the large size of the suitcases, the luggage scale was hard to get an accurate weight as the luggage would turn when lifted.  I bought this scale and it was so easy to stand on the scale, get my weight, then stand on it again holding the suitcase.  Absolutely spot on and I didn't have to incur any overweight luggage fees which had happened in the past.. The scale is very slim, lightweight and looks great in the bathroom!  I love this scale and would buy it again!

review_title: I already had a good scale, but purchased this as a deal over ...
review_body: I already had a good scale, but purchased this as a deal over Christmas for my other bathroom.  It weighs about 2 lbs heavier than my other scale and appears to retain the last weight measurement for a period of time.  For instance, I weigh myself with clothes on and then when I remove my clothes and weigh myself, there is no difference.  If I weigh myself about 15 minutes later, the difference registers.  Odd.

review_title: Very Imprecise. Shows weight in increments of 0.6 lb.
review_body: The scale seems to be very imprecise. It only shows me weight in increments of 0.3 kg or 0.6 lb. I didn't care initially when it showed me the exact same weight for many days in a row. But, I decided to do a test today.. I used a water bottle to check its precision. I measured my weight with the empty bottle and got 150.0 lb. Then I filled up the bottle in small increments. The weight stuck at 150.0 lb for a while and then jumped suddenly to 150.6 lb.. Also, I have it placed on flat hard floor and never moved it. I also calibrated it like the desciption says.

I was really excited when I got this in the mail since there were a lot of positive reviews. Once I started the calibration process I noticed there was an issue. I couldn't get the scale to set at 0.0 pounds. It kept reading 300 something pounds when I step on, sometimes lower sometimes higher, but never less than 200. I am a petite woman who weighs around 99 pounds, so this was very very very off.. I tried to problem solve by following the manual and looking up alternate methods online. Still nothing. I had my friend try it out thinking it was just me, but they couldn't get it to work either.. I'm sure this is a great scale if you get one that actually works. However, after this experience I'm not sure if it's worth it for me to purchase from this company again.

review_title: Simple, yet convenient and highly accurate.
review_body: We have a mechanical scale in our bathroom that we've had for years and we've known that it wasn't all that accurate, but we figured that it was good enough.  Lately, however, we've started eating healthier and exercising more in order to lay a good foundation for our kids as they get older.  I had read how having a good, accurate scale and keeping track of your weight regularly can help you maintain your fitness goals, so when I saw that there was such a great deal on this scale I figured it was time for an upgrade.. I really like the size of the scale itself.  It's big enough to stand on without losing your balance while trying to check the read-out, and the bright blue back-lighting on the display makes it really convenient and easy to read.  As far as accuracy goes this matches up almost exactly with the scale at the doctor's office, which I would hope is correct.  Another great thing is the option to switch to kilos just by pressing the button on the underside of the scale.  For my wife, who grew up in Taiwan, converting everything from pounds over to metric is a real pain.  This has been a great purchase as far as I'm concerned, and I can definitely see this making the difference as we try to meet our goals.

I bought this scale to use at our cottage so I could stay on track on vacation. It varies by 3-5 pounds within seconds. I put it next to our very expensive, high quality scale and weighed everyone in the family.  What I discovered is that the heavier you are, the more inaccurate it is. What a terrible buy.  Put in the extra money to get something decent.
Best scales you buy for this insignificant price. Ended up ordering a 2nd set as my daughter and her husband loved ours so much !

I had owned one previously and had no issues for a couple months, everything was working great and I was content with the product. Unfortunately I had some people over one night and someone broke the scale and it shattered, it's glass understandable. Since I was happy with the quality of that one I didn't hesitate and ordered a new one but I am disappointed. Every time I get on the scale the weight is different by 2-6 lbs. Every time with no consistent pattern. I have tried on different flat surfaces to see if that's the issue but it is still always off. I have replaced the batteries as well. I would appreciate some troubleshooting information or a replacement please.

I had an old analog scale that I knew was off by several pounds after many years of use. I replaced it with this model, based on the high ratings and sheer number of reviews. Very useful and accuracy seems to be spot on. I love how the reading starts to blink once it's finalizes its measurement and how the display continues to show the reading for several seconds after you step off. Perfect for someone who wears glasses but don't have them on when they weigh themselves because, like me, they're just about to step into the shower. I thought the glass would be slippery but it's perfectly fine and I've never weighed myself with wet feet. Happy so far!

review_title: I have only had a chance to use the Elekcity Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale twice so far but I love it. I am hoping it may be that ...
review_body: i have been dieting my whole life and have used many scales.  I have only had a chance to use the Elekcity Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale twice so far but I love it.  I am hoping it may be that one thing that will keep me on my diet and help me keep my weight under control.  For the small price I paid I have received a Beautiful Scale which is light weight allowing me to store it after I use it with out any effort.  For the first time I look forward to weighting myself.  As part of my effort, it does not matter what the scale tells me just so that I record and keep track of my weight (Good or Bad).  This information will hopefully help me stay on my effort to lose weight.
They did not have enough Gain/Febreeze for me could barely smell it.
These our on our subscribe and save list, love the scent and quality of these bags
Garbage bags what else can you day
Good Brand Smells So Good Strong Bags. Received On Time Well Packaged. Highly Recommend Them
Cheaper and delivered
We have this on subscription as it works great at keeping the trash IN the bag vs spilled out by being cheap. The nice, fresh smell is a great plus as well.
Love the scent! Perfect for retail store.
Great product and delivery
Works great

review_title: finally a garbage bag that doesn't stink when full
review_body: finally a garbage bag that doesn't stink when full!  I love glad bags, they are durable, and easy to use and withstand my children stuffing making extra room in the bag so they don't have to empty it.

review_title: Good quality. Soft for your bottom but not linty
review_body: Good quality. Soft for your bottom but not linty. As good as the national brands. Will make this purchase my regular subscription.
No not at all. I received 6 rolls for $23!!

review_body: Don't get it twisted....these paper towels are CHEAP! But hey, that's why you're here. If you tend to use too much and want to switch to bulk at a good price, this is it.

review_title: Better than bargain brands at a bargain price!
review_body: These are MUCH better than store brands, but arrive at my doorstep for bargain brand price! I'm very happy with this set up.

review_title: I don’t care for these paper towels wouldn’t buy them ...
review_body: I don’t care for these paper towels wouldn’t buy them again, you go through them quickly as you have to use a full sheet.
Great paper towels. Did not know you can get them much cheaper at your local Sam club.
I love these paper towels for the price. They do a great job and last a long time. One order will last a us, a family of three (one baby) about three and a half months.

Unbelievable how you could get cheaper paper towels that are very durable and stand wetness! We use this a lot for everything mostly in the kitchen. this is such a strong piece! would stick with brand forever!
Love the price and love the paper towels. They are thick and do the job. You’re crazy to spend more on any other paper towels. These are awesome.
Great service and great product.  My wife uses too many of them when I order this way.  Only reason I'm not buying them again.

review_title: I DEFINITELY recommend them for engine building and general cleaning
review_body: Do not use for automotive paint or washing your car. It's a bit low quality microfiber. But, I DEFINITELY recommend them for engine building and general cleaning. When they're dirty, stick them in your washing machine at the hottest temperature you can with some detergent and a nice heaping clump of oxiclean or something. Then stick on your dryer on either air tumble or mega-low heat tumble. Perfect little towels.

Size is 12" x 15.25" instead of 12" x 16" as stated but they're still good size and nice quality. They didn't pill after first wash. They're perfect for cleaning. I only have to use very little cleaning product and the stainless steel stove top look new. I only use water to clean kitchen counter and other stainless steel surface. Wish the white color was a different/darker color for cleaning rags.

review_title: Doesn’t leave a residue and or streaks on stainless appliances.
review_body: My biggest peeve is the rag residue left behind on black appliances and streaks when cleaning stainless appliances. I’ve tried other microfiber cloths which haven’t lived up to the hype. These cloths don’t leave the residue behind and are great with preventing the streaking/ smearing with cleaning black and stainless appliances.. Happy with this purchase and will continue to buy.. They wash up well too.

review_title: These are a great size for various purposes
review_body: Bought these because I needed some all-purpose rags to keep around the house. These are a great size for various purposes. I like having  separate colors, because I kind of divide them up for use that way (it's easier to wash them based on their use that way). I use some to wipe my dogs' paws because with their absorbency, I can keep them damp without having them drip all over the floor. I don't think I'll go back to cleaning with anything other than a microfiber cloth. Love these for my stainless steel appliances, too.

review_title: These reusable microfiber cloths have held up after 10 washes and still going. I love them!
review_body: Great deal and multi purpose uses. For about $.50 a piece that's a great deal because It's reusable with so many uses around the house. So far, been using for:. - cleaning my kitchen counters; bathroom sink and counters. - drying dishes. - cleaning carpet stains. - drying my car after a wash. - great for cleaning and wiping down windows and window seals. - polishing my wood furniture. - general dusting. - wiping off floor spills. I can go on and on because I can use this for (almost) anything and everything. I'm very surprised on the one star reviews because this product deserves more than that. I've even washed and dried them more than ten times and it still held up for more use. I still have a stack of unused ones so I'm definitely getting my money's worth out of these.. I highly recommend them and will be ordering more when these run out, a long time from now! GREAT BUY!

These cloths are amazing! They are huge and hold so much liquid. They do not pill or leave fuzz. They are great at cleaning windows- no streaks! I use them all over the house, from cleaning and wiping windows, mirrors, and surfaces, to cleaning my 11 month old after he eats. They are so soft on his face, they are softer than a baby washcloth, and clean much more effectively. I think we might start using them in his bath as well because they are so much bigger and softer than baby washcloths. They wash up great and come out looking like new every time. It's also great that go get so many in a package, really cost effective! We don't have to go hunting for one of these, we just keep a pile in the kitchen, laundry room, and each bathroom. Thanks, AmazonBasics! These are so worth the price!

I use these to wash my car. Theyre pretty much only useful for drying off the car when I use ONR. They are terrible for anything glass. Also, I was expecting them to be thicker and have more substance. Theyre just plain, thin microfiber towels. Id recommend these for simple jobs, but for real work like getting no streak marks on the windows for your car, use real microfiber towels.

These are good microfiber cloths, and as always with AmazonBasics a great price:performance ratio.. You get a ton of these, and they are bigger than you expect, so we've got a few in each bathroom in the house, tossed a few in our vehicles, anywhere it could be handy to have one. You get enough in this pack that you can use them for really dirty jobs too, and toss em if you don't think you can get them clean. We have only rarely done this, but it's good to be able to do so without feeling like you've wasted money.

Great towels for the price, if you're looking for super high quality ones, these aren't it. I like that they have different colors so you can use them for different rooms of the house. Wish you could buy a pack of one color only if you wanted since I use the blue ones the most, but that's ok. They do breakdown after awhile. Depending on how often you wash them, the faster they need to be replaced. $12-14 for a years use works for me.

I have been using these as wash clothes now for several months.  They do a fantastic job on my face--nice and soft, yet remove my facial cleanser completely.  Comparing them to similar towels I've purchased they are much softer (that's how I can sort them from the dryer).  When I'm not paying attention I am very annoyed to find one of the garage cloths in my face towels!  The only disadvantage (which all of these types of cloths seem to share) is they act like velcro--they will grab prickly things (like dried leaves or sticks) and not let go.  So, I try to wash these in a load with other "inside" things.. Update 25 May 15..... These cloths continue to be somewhat repellant to water.  They will absorb water, but not without a bit of work.  I had assumed this would go away with repeated washing, but it did not.  Therefore I've dropped them one star.

review_title: had rupture, broken side line before use. it's been falling apart so many times.
review_body: it's a garbage! period.. I thought it's good deal at the beginning. but it fell apart! so frequently! It's not because I put too much stuff in it.. I checked the unopend bags, found many of them had a rupture, broken line. etc.. Buyers be aware " dont buy this unless you want to clean your floor"!

review_title: Get this if you need alot of sturdy trash bags for your kitchen
review_body: Mega pack says it all. Get this if you need alot of sturdy trash bags for your kitchen. Great brand that consistently delivers quality
So disappointed that the bags have been redesigned into flimsy junk. Have used for many, many years, but never again. Total waste of money as of early 2018. .

When Glad says guaranteed strong they were not kidding! In a house of 3 toddlers lots of things get shoved into the trash can and even with all that force this bag did not even tear! They come in two rolls which make for easy storage. They tear away box is also great for accessibility and does not take up much room wherever you keep your trash bags. Also when the bag is closed their is not any foul odor sneaking out. I will be buying these from now on!

I don't understand how this has so many positive reviews.  These bags are so flimsy.  I fill them with cat litter and literally have to run to the outside trash b/c they will rip.  I assumed "guaranteed strong" would be able to hold a cat litter, but maybe I"m wrong.  If that's the case, I have no idea how to throw it out.  I guess for regular trash that doesn't have anything slightly heavy they're okay.

review_title: These used to be good garbage bags
review_body: These used to be good garbage bags.  I started getting them with the subscription but the last 2 boxes I got leak.  If there is any liquid at all in the bag, it just leaks out and I do not see any holes in it.. not sure why this is happening.. I would swear it is seeping through the plastic.. that is what it looks like anyway.  I won't be buying these any longer.

Never thought I would be calling a trashbag awesome, but this one definitely is. I recently had a birthday party at my apartment and used these bags to collect all the bottles and cans. Some of them still had liquid in them and they continued to weigh down the bag as I added them. However the bag didn't even come close to ripping. It kept everything contained and I was able to quickly and efficiently clean the apartment

Obviously great value for purchasing bulk, but the quality ain't bad either.  Some reviews wrote about tearing, and how the box now advertises it uses less plastic.  I see the same advertising about less plastic, but haven't noticed the bag tearing at all after going through about 6 so far.  Then again, I don't stuff it to the brim and then some either.. I use a Simple Human 40L trash bin, and this bag works perfectly.  Maybe not as perfect as the Simple Human bags designed for it, but still good enough and definitely much less expensive.

review_title: Great deal but they rip open 25% of the time.
review_body: Great deal - but rip open 25% of the time. We do not overload them or put in sharp objects, but come on. This is a name brand and I often have the half-full bag just tear right open half way down the stairs. It's inexcusable. I will never use Glad again.

review_title: They hold up to cardboard edges, easy to tie shut. Good price.
review_body: I can pack a lot of trash with edges, and the bags hold up. 13 gallon is a small kitchen trash can about 3ft tall, one foot wide and 10 inches thick.. Good price.
Item as described-good product at a good price. Arrived promptly.

review_body: Best paper towels I've ever used! They're more like a cloth. They're so thick that you can't use them as a coffee filter if you run out and need a quick coffee fix (found that out the hard way, haha!).

review_title: These sheets are super hard to tear off the roll
review_body: These sheets are super hard to tear off the roll. They often rip in the middle. It’s almost like how tape sticks to itself.  The sheets really stuck to the roll so you have to pull them away carefully.

review_title: Great quality paper towels, good roll size too.
review_body: I love these paper towels. They are thick and the size of the rolls are good, especially compared to other brands. You can't beat the pick a size option, it sure is a big plus.

review_title: LOVE these - best paper towels ever
review_body: LOVE these paper towels.. my favorite brand and type.  They're soft, flexible and absorbent.  My local stores stopped selling this kind, so thank you Amazon for having them!

The rolls are not as thick as you expect them as outlined in the description. Otherwise, they are as described and very soft and durable. I’m very disappointed because I didn’t think it was a mega roll as depicted.
viva is a better quality than bounty, hands down.
These are my favorite paper towels. I love that they are cloth like. I could probably get bounty or something for cheaper at costco but I'm obsessed with Viva.
these paper towels are Very difficult to unroll off the tube, had been many years since I had purchased these, but Not again, you get what you pay for !
I gave this product one star. When pulling the towels off the roll they stick to each other and it becomes a constant hassle trying to retrieve just one at a time. I'll stick with Bounty.

review_title: The outer side appears like a low knap terry cloth
review_body: This protector is fairly thin.  The outer side appears like a low knap terry cloth, the underside is very shiny and plastic in appearance.  If you are looking for something that allows airflow or cooling you probably want a thicker (and more expensive) mattress protector.  Despite all that I have not found that this makes the bed feel warmer nor does it seem to retain body heat.  There is no plastic feel and it is completely silent with no crackling sound.  The elastic runs the entire perimeter so it stays on the mattress well.  I have not washed it yet so I cannot comment on other reviews that state it takes awhile in the dryer.  Good product for the price.

review_title: Not for a older child with bedwetting issues
review_body: This is used with a child dealing with bedwetting issues.  We had another mattress pad with much thicker batting inside that was able to absorb the nighttime accident.  The absorption of this pad was not as good.  The product was fine for the sibling who didn’t have the problem.  The pad was easy on and off which made it possible for the child to change bedding independently.

review_title: great for a king size tempurpedic mattress
review_body: This has been a great mattress cover. Our old one had a funky plastic layer to it that would make us warm at night, and then for some mysterious reason, it started flaking off onto the mattress. After researching mattress covers over a year ago, we bought these for the kids' twin beds. They have been great so we decided to treat ourselves to a new one for our mattress. It's been great. We haven't noticed a temperature difference and it stays on way better than the first. We have a tempurpedic king size mattress, this fits the corners perfectly, never comes off on its own, and doesn't lump up anywhere.

review_title: Does exactly as it is supposed to!
review_body: For a true mattress protector, this is REALLY nice. The part that covers the top of your mattress is a PUL (plastic) material, fully encased in a nice terry cover. If you manipulate the cover a bit, you can certainly hear and feel the PUL, but it is really slight. Again, for a mattress protector, it doesn't get better than this. I've read some reviews of this cover being uncomfortable, complaints of being able to hear and feel the plastic through the sheets, etc. Don't confuse this with a mattress TOPPER that is made specifically for your comfort. This cover is made to protect the value of your mattress from the yuckies. If it's really that bothersome, I think you could probably put a mattress topper over this protector and then top with your sheets. I personally don't feel that's necessary. Also, I do not recommend washing this protector in anything but cold water. As a mom who cloth diapers and has experience with PUL products, the plastic will definitely crack and warp with hot water, any bleach products or even fabric softener.

Very nice mattress protector, fits well - seems like good quality.  Was tested immediately by a child who became ill (I won't go into detail), and held up (nothing soaked to mattress).  We have it covering a 12" memory foam mattress - so its a little taut.  I did not give it five stars because i felt it firmed up the mattress a bit, and warmed up the top cooling layer of the mattress.  As time progresses (a couple of weeks) the cover is starting to soften/stretch and the mattress getting less firm (which is good).  Not sure any cover would allow the cooling gel through unless its sold specifically as a temperature regulator.  All in all - pleased with purchase and will keep it on the bed.

review_title: It was a perfect fit for my Ikea queen size bed which means ...
review_body: I bought this on the strength of two Twin XL protectors that I bought a while back. It was a perfect fit for my Ikea queen size bed which means little chance of wrinkling under the sheets unless the elastic edges came to be untucked through excessive movement. The top of the protector is a nice, soft towling which does not rustle at all. Out of the box, there were no odours that I could tell although I did wash before putting on the bed in any case. It's waterproofness hasn't been tested yet but, at a minimum, it'll keep the matress dust free.

I just put this on tonight. While it hasn't been "tested" yet, I did pour a small cup of water onto the cover. Since this one has a terry cloth cover, it absorbs  moisture right away, not allowing it to pool up om top of the cover.  Perhaps, the terry cloth top is what will make this cover speak, as opposed to the Protect a Bed one I had, allowed moisture to soak through. I will have to update this, once it has been properly tested. When I poured the water on the cover, it did not penetrate through , so, so far so good!

I thought this would cover the entire mattress as in sliding the entire mattress and then zipping it close.. Was thinking of returning it BUT OMG my dog had an accident and threw up on my bed (she's sick) the waterproof part is real.. My mattress was safe. I'm keeping it. I love it!

review_title: I bought this for my new California King sized memory ...
review_body: I bought this for my new California King sized memory foam mattress. Based on other reviews, I started by washing and drying it first thing once I received it to help it fluff up. Once I had all the other sheets on over it, it definitely doesn't crinkle. However, it does make a sort of swooshing noise. 10/10 for protection and quality, but 6/10 for noise. It's not as noisy as a lot of reviews here make it out to be, but it's not dead silent. The reality is, if you want true water proof in a mattress protector, you're not going to find one that doesn't make noise. You just have to decide if the protection is worth the extra noise.

I bought this to go with a 12 inch queen sized mattress and it fit perfectly. It has a lot of fabric underneath and good elastic to get a good snug fit. It doesn't make noise or change the texture of the bed noticeably. I hardly notice that it's there, but I'm happy to have the added protection in case I revert to childhood embarrassments or spill my drink that I definitely promised myself I wouldn't drink in my new bed. Perhaps this added confidence is to blame for my lack of self discipline.

review_title: I love these paper towels and I can't see spending alot ...
review_body: I love these paper towels and I can't see spending alot of money for something that will do the same job as the expensive ones.

review_title: Pretty good - but so are wasable rags
review_body: The best I have found under Bounty. But Bounty just feels wasteful to me since it's almost like a piece cotton. You have to think of the environment and that this stuff has to biodegrade.. Actually, I have a stack of white washrags that I keep in my cabinet. I just have been using those when I can and since I have to do laundry anyway, I just throw them in when they get too wet. It doesn't take up space, saves me money and it much less wasteful and harmful in the environment.. I keep these on hand for emergencies though. I have 2 toddlers.
Excellent service and great delivery to front porch, not to mention above average drying capacity/price of paper towels.Thank you. Will spread the word among my friends.

review_title: The quality is "good enough" for most purposes
review_body: These paper towels are of "good enough" quality and priced more reasonably than  premium paper towels.
Honestly these aren't the best quality paper towels, but for their price, they get the job done.
it does exactly what it was manufactured to do

review_title: it was a better deal than Walmart
review_body: Decent paper towels and with subscribe and save, it was a better deal than Walmart. The only downside is finding a place to put them all! I won't down rate the product for that though. :D

review_title: Makes my pillow cases look great!
review_body: This is my second purchase for this pillow. Obviously, I love it! Great quality, awesome price and it makes my cases look amazing. It was delivered on time and it was packaged very well. You will not be disappointed with this pillow insert.

I don't know why they suggest 2" larger. I have a 20x20 and I order the 22x22. When I put it in, the insert is so big that I think it tore the cover a little bit. Also It looks too fat for my pillow cover. bad size guideline.

review_title: Poor quality, not size or shape described.
review_body: Terrible quality, lumpy filling in a cheap paper thin cover. Cover is square but pillow inside seems to be round as the corners are completely devoid of stuffing.  Also, size received 2 inches smaller than that ordered. Packed poorly for shipping, arrived in plastic bag that had completely torn open on one side. Total garbage, don't waste your money.
The pillow was nice and plump! I got this 20x20 pillow to fit inside an 18 x18 pillowcase so that the pillow would look nice and “full”. It worked perfectly!

review_title: Just what I was looking for..
review_body: It was a very nicely made pillow...I crocheted  my new great granddaughter an afghan and covered the pillow with the same coloring.  granny square...It made a very nice set....I was very pleased with it...

As you can see  in the photos this pillow is poorly stuffed. The foam does not reach all the corners despite trying to force it there. One corner is also inexplicably dirty with something like machine grease righ out of the box. Definitely don’t get this and think it will fill a 26” x 26” case. It leaves mine mostly empty!

These are not great, there is no stuffing in the corners of the pillows at all so my pillow covers look a little sad with empty corners. I tried tugging the stuffing into the edges but it didn’t help.

review_title: Good quality but a bit big
review_body: UPDATE:. 9/11/16. I'm updating these pillow to 5 stars because they're actually NOT too big for the pillows I got below.  See the elephants, those have the 20x20 in them and they're PERFECT for them.  I think if you get cotton shams, that are 20x20, then get inserts that size, but if you get canvas shams that are 20x20 (with the birds on it below) get 18x18 because the canvas run smaller.. These pillows are nice but too big! I'm returning them because I do not see how my pillow shams will fit them. In the pictures I have these pillow shams (which I love by the way!) seem way too small to have these inserts fit into them. The inserts in my pretty shams are actually my old inserts and even though they say 20X20 they're made out of feather, so maybe they are smaller?. I may try to pull off one of my pillow shams but honestly, it's such a pain to get the inserts in I don't want to. I will probably just go to Walmart and get some inserts.  I ordered 4 more pillow shams, the giraffes, 2 different kinds of elephants and a peacock feather.  They will all be the same size as the pillow shams in the picture.. Anyway, I'm going to look into 18X18 inserts, I really am not a fan of stuffed pillows as much as seemingly some people are.. Overall? These pillow inserts are fine if you can fit your 20X20 pillow shams into them.  If not, aim for 18X18 pillow inserts and save some $$.

review_title: Poor quality. If you are looking for a cheap ...
review_body: Poor quality.  If you are looking for a cheap quality pillow insert buy it at IKEA and you'll pay a third of the price.. This pillow insert is filled with an insufficient amount of cheap,  thready textured and clumped stuffing that appears lumpy in a pillow cover.  If you try this pillow insert in a smaller pillow cover it becomes a firm mass with tight lumps throughout.. Save yourself the time and effort and don't buy this product.

review_title: Very happy. Only ping is that I followed the product ...
review_body: Opened up the packaging and they fluffed fully up!  Very happy.  Only ping is that I followed the product suggestion and ordered 18x18 for my 17x17 cover and they are just a little too small, still.  Not sure if I would have bought 2 sizes up if they would have fit still.  But it's not the end of the world.  I'm still happy!

my room doesn't have lights and I was trying to find an alternative for it. I fell upon LED lights, I order it and it works, all lights. They're not very bright but it does light my room well enough.i recommend buying both the LED lights and the decorating clips they suggest.
Beautiful! They work great!

Perfect! Just word of caution: be careful when taking these out of the package. They are packaged in such a way so that the consumer can avoid becoming tangled up amongst this string of lights. I recommend having a plan before taking the spools out of the box & then taking them out one section at time as you hang in the intended area. Works wonderfully and cycles between different settings. Also has set different options for lighting on the battery pack. I’ve seen similar lights sell for up to $75. This is a great product at a great value!

review_title: EXTREMELY DIFFICULT - spent hours untangling and when I FINALLY ...
review_body: EXTREMELY DIFFICULT - spent hours untangling and when I FINALLY achieved this, I plugged it in and NOTHING-  then I noticed a loose wire which connected to nothing.

These lights are gorgeous! The strings were too long for my window so I taped the bottom and brought it back up to the top doubling the volume. A little time-consuming to do it like that, but it was worth it. Looks like a window full of stars behind my sheer curtains! Very pleased and would recommend.

review_title: Poor choice for twinkle star curtain
review_body: Poor choice for twinkle star curtain...I bought it for my guest room and the lights don't even light up very bright and half of them stopped working after the first month.

I absolutely love these. They totally exceeded my expectations and looks beautiful. The cord to plug them in is a little short and it is black (so it is hard to hide the cord) but other than that-great product and I will be ordering a second.

I ordered two of these. One came in a warm yellow light and the other came in a bright white light. I haven’t been able to reach the company but would like them to send me another warm yellow. The mix looks horrible together!

review_title: but they are so nice that we'll mount them in our basement full time
review_body: Bought these for Christmas, but they are so nice that we'll mount them in our basement full time.  These lights don't come with the curtains, so we bought the sheers separately.  Make sure to be careful when unpacking the light strings as they tangle very easily.  I highly recommend that you leave the strings in their bundles until you are ready to mount them or sew them to sheer curtains.  If you're careful regarding hanging/mounting, then you will be very pleased with these.  They also have several light effect modes e.g., for flashing, fading, etc.
Awesome lights with a ton of different light patterns.

review_title: Very pleased with the ISTEAM steamer
review_body: Very pleased with the ISTEAM steamer. Didn't have high expectations since it's a small steamer and it was so cheap. I bought it to steam a comforter with horrible wrinkles that I haven't been able to get rid of. It worked great!

review_title: Mixed results.  Had to return it, unfortunately.
review_body: I had to return this steamer because it did not produce continuous steam.  It kept turning the heater on and off every couple seconds, so the steam was intermittent.  However, the steamer did not spit and bubble like so many other steamers seem to have problems with.  So it seems to be a good steamer other than the problem I had with it turning on and off constantly.  I don't think this is the way it is supposed to be.  The manual says it is supposed to produce continuous steam, which is definitely was not doing.  I think the steamer I had was defective in some way, which is disappointing.  I think it would be a good steamer if it wasn't for that.
I'm pleasantly surprised on how well this works. For a small steamer it is pretty powerful. I really don't have any complaints; it heats up pretty fast and I can steam about 2 blouses for each use.

This steamer is great!  It’s small so great for travel, heats up quickly and is easy to use.  Steamed 4 average shirts with 1 full tank.  Make sure to keep it level or more upwards, tilting it downward will cause it to spit hot water.

review_title: This is a nice little unit
review_body: This is a nice little unit. It works very well. You should purchase this item. I'm glad that I did.

This is the greatest ever. My first steamer and I love it. It is totally replacing my iron. I also use it for sweaters that you lay flat to dry and end up with some folds in them. I do use distilled water and rinse and dry it between uses. Wished I had gotten this years ago!

I will tell you I was pretty much prepared for this thing not to work as I expected, but it did !! It is awesome, light weight, easy to hold, nice long cord & it really gets out the wrinkles. I figured it would get out large wrinkles, but I used it on a blouse that would have needed to be dry cleaned before wearing to get the wrinkles out, and it worked !!!

It's perfect size for small quick project.  I have a short video to add of me doing a backdrop.  I seen a few reviews saying that it gets the material wet. If you overfill, it will spit out water. There is a max fill line. If you do a lot of steaming,  you might want a bigger steamer.

I love this little steamer. Simple to use and works great. It is sooooo light weight, I took it cross country and my daughter will be taking it to Europe this week.  It might be a few more $ than others, but others are heavier.  It will work at home but you'll have the option of traveling with it. Also, this is from a small, growing business that exists thanks to the passionate work of people with disabilities.  Double winner! Can't comment on durability as I've only used it for 2 weeks but no reason to think it wouldn't be durable.

I bought this for my 23 year old son who is starting his first job after college!!! Finally heard from him and he loves it. So he doesn’t have to look crinkly and doesn’t need an ironing board. He sounded very, very enthusiastic. So it is a winner.
Very good product
The quality of the product
Love it
Like the Sweeper/ Vac combo a lot

review_title: Picks up every particle Roomba misses
review_body: Picks up every small particle Roomba misses: pet hair, my hair, cat litter, dirt, and stuff invisible to the eyes. My hardwood floor and tiles feel extra clean after I use both the dry and wet Swiffer pads.

review_title: Great for picking up cat hair and dust
review_body: Great for picking up cat hair and dust, price is a bit more expensive than my local warehouse store but the benefit of not driving into town is usually worth the difference.
I use swiffee almost daily. These pads are the best at keeping the dog hair at bay that piles up on my hardwood floors
No reason to miss this good deal
Always a go to for dusting 👍🏼
These work very well on my floors.

review_title: Different reading every time I step on
review_body: This scale is beautiful but highly inconsistent. When I stepped on I panicked because I weighed 6 lbs more than I usually weigh. I knew I couldn't have gained 6 lbs in 3 days so I stepped on again and was my normal weight. Then I stepped on again a few seconds later and was 4lbs over my weight. So I grabbed a 5 lb dumbbell and stepped on. It told me I was 3lbs lighter. This scale cannot be trusted. I returned it and purchased the "Surpahs Shiny Small Lightweight Digital Bathroom Scale w/ BMI Calculation". That one didn't have as many reviews but I found that it had a sturdier base and it gives me the same reading every time I step on.

Recently I moved into a new home and decided my old analog scale had seen better days. I found this scale with great reviews and decided to give it a try..   Starting with the looks, it's awesome! I like the sleek slender look of the scale. The display is easy to read and it really dresses up the bathroom..   As for functionality, it works well. The digital scale is spot on. In fact I weigh my cats on it by weighing myself then weighing myself holding the cats. Since I have a cat that keeping her weight up is important, I really appreciate that I can get a reading in the tenths..   This was a nice update for my bathroom and it didn't cost a fortune to do it.

Seems like the scale "remembers" the previous weight if it was very close to the next.  Very close to my doctor's mass scale.  I was worried that it would look dirty or break easily, but my 5 person family (3 young kids) hasn't broken it yet and it is easy to clean. :)

review_title: This is a really nice scale how ever I have a manual scale at ...
review_body: This is a really nice scale how ever I have a manual scale at home and I have an eye level doctor scale at home. Both scales shows my weight 6lbs less than The Etekcity Digital. I weighed myself on another manual scale and it read a differnt weight then the Etekcity. I weighed my self on a flat surface in my kitchen. I gave three Stars because the scale has a very nice sleek look. I didn't like the fact that this scale was not smudge proof. I wanted to return this scale and get my full refund. But my sister ended up taking it. This scale is not for me.

review_title: Peace of mind with good support
review_body: When the scale arrived from amazon, I was really disappointed when it didn't really work. It would give me readings from 80 lbs to 380 lbs with no consistency. Resetting the device and all attempts to re-calibrate it did not fix the issue. Aka, it was a piece of garbage with no utility.. At this point, you have to be wondering if I accidentally clicked 4 stars. Well, luckily, with the order comes a slip from Etekcity that has all the relevant contact information to customer support for you. I sent them a quick email asking if I was doing something wrong in calibrating the device (I gave them proof of purchase of course). Instead of emailing me back an instruction booklet, within 1 hour I got an email saying that a new unit was on the way to my address free of charge (with expedited shipping no less). I didn't even have to give them back the broken scale.. Needless to say, the replacement scale works great and is very consistent in the measurements. I had read other reviews that said repeated measurements gave a variance of a couple tenths of lbs. But, mine measures the same weight each time with no variance, which is very nice. It's always fun to weigh yourself before dinner, eat, and then weigh yourself again to see how much you ate. ;). I gave a rating of 4 instead of 5 only because the first unit did not work and I had to wait longer than expected for what I paid for. But overall I am very please, and am surprised at how well Etekcity handled the situation. Props to them.

The scale is very fast and repeatable. The lighted background makes for easy reading. The scale itself is stable and doesn’t move around. The weight measurement display is continuous, showing the progression through multiple consecutive fast measurements. The scale looks for consistency in the measurements (try to put just one foot on it and you’ll understand what I mean), and once it sees that required consistency it averages some consecutive fast measurements and displays a final result. Shifting your weight across the scale surface will not throw off this scale. Really the best digital scale I ever tried.. Of course, just like all other digital scales, this scale has a hidden “repeatability enhancement” feature. The scale remembers the last weight it measured even when going to sleep. If the next measurement is close enough to the previous one, it will ignore the new measurement and just present the previous one again as a final measurement. You can test this by weighing yourself once, and then holding a small object that will add a little to your weight for a second weighing. The scale actually measures and quickly shows the new weight but “switches” to the previous measurement as a final reading. The good thing is that the decision threshold with this scale seems to be very small at ~0.5 lbs.
