Right away this small threshold hints at the actual repeatability of this scales measurements (or at least at its manufacturer confidence). My previous scale not only didn’t show the measurement process, but it also needed to see at least a 3 lbs change before agreeing to actually show a different number.. Again, this is the best digital scale I ever tried.

I have been using this scale for a couple of months and I can't really complain.. I bought it as it was the cheapest scale that would display the weight in kilograms and had good reviews.. PROS:. - Pretty cheap. - It can display the weight in pounds or kilograms (there is a button on the back, see attached photos). - It's relatively light, so it can be easily moved around. - It's stable when you step on it, as it has rugged rubber feet. - It has auto-on functionality: you just step on it and it will immediately display the weight. - Batteries included. CONS:. No cons yet; I know some people reported that it easily shutters if a corner hits the wall when moving it, but I just placed it in a corner and never moved it so, fortunately, no problems so far. Will report back if that happens.

Bought this to keep track of my weight, as I'm on meds that can cause weight gain.  This product definitely helps me with that.  The blue LED display is clear and when you step onto the middle of the scale, wait a moment or two and your weight will brightly flash.  I'm about 215 lbs and it handles my weight just fine -- I don't worry about breaking it when I step on.  This unit also is consistent.  Within the period of about 30 minutes, I weighed myself three times and my weight came up the same every time.  The key is to stand in the middle of the scale with your weight distributed evenly on each foot.  Do not use this on carpet, as it will distort your readings.  I use mine on a hardwood floor.  The glass gives this a nice touch and it looks sleek.  I can't speak to the battery life, as I've not owned it too long, but it does include two batteries for the unit.. All and all, I'd say this is a great value for the price.  It doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles, but if all you need to do is track your weight, this unit gets the job accomplished for a reasonable price.  I would definitely recommend this.

‘‘Tis is by far the very best and light weight scale that I have ever purchased. The packaging was awesome and very protective to safely arrive to me. As the company already had two batteries ready to turn on by pulling a plastic strip, I easily stood on the beautiful black, shiny scale and instantly the weight appeared in a very easy window with black bold numbers and sky blue background. I now have a new morning friend and for $20, this is a GREAT Amazon deal. Buy one or two for the kids. I’m very happy!!!

review_title: Great value for a great scale
review_body: I was worried about buying a new scale. My old one stopped functioning correctly. It was an old non-digital scale that wouldn't balance correctly.. Scales are expensive and I didn't want to just settle on one. I found the Etekcity Digital Scale and loved the sleek design in the photos. For a low price, I decided it was worth a shot.. It came packaged in a smaller box inside the Amazon box. Included with AAA batteries to power it. I've had it a little more than a week now and use it everyday.. It looks great, functions awesome and is easy to use. You literally just stand on it, the scale wakes up and within 3 seconds it displays your weight. It doesn't make any noise like beeping. This scale is awesome and I'm glad I made the purchase.
Works pretty well with the smells and all.
Great trash bags at great price

Fair price for a great  product. Love the way they smell. Strength and durability is great and it's good to have lots of garbage bags on hand so you know you have a fair amount of time before you run out!
Price was write

Love these garbage bags, Have gotten them for years, will never use another kind. My bags don't rip, even with super heavy loads full of glass bottles and cans. And they smell great and help to neutralize stinky garbage odors very well (like food packages and diapers) Great price for a pack of 100 too!
Cheaper than Walmart and Target, and I didn't have to leave my house. They smell good, are slightly on the thin side, but I bought them to save money and knew what I was getting. Great deal.
The only type I’ll purchase!
Keeps oder away for quite some time.
I like this size garbage bags for my kitchen.  So tired of those smaller ones.

review_title: Force flex is better than these
review_body: These bags rip way too easily from simple use. Will stick to the force flex.

review_title: Plenty Ultra Premium Full Sheet Paper Towels
review_body: Good product, for the price. If Plenty doesn't go crazy now, with their prices.

I thought these paper towels would feel "cheaper" and be less durable, but they are surprisingly strong and hold up well. I'm very pleased with my purchase and would buy these paper towels again--they're a good value for their price.
DO NOT READ NEGATIVE REVIEWS!!.. These  are not cheap or flimsy...very strong,GREAT deal!!!
I love these paper towel. They are absorbent and thicker than the paper towels that we used to have. Will definitely be buying this from this day forward.

review_title: Thick and absorbent love for your hands
review_body: I love these paper towels. Very nice quality. Not tissue paper like the rest. Other paper towels you have too take so many, it's such a waste.Really an excellent product

review_title: Not Enough Paper On The Roll
review_body: The roll of paper on these is SMALL. I feel like I was always changing the roll.  Quality of the towel was good but wont purchase these again.

review_title: small compared to approx same price per roll at ALDI
review_body: Rolls seem small-ish compared with either Sparkle or our current favorite from ALDI
The roles were small and had to use a lot of them to clean up anything.  They were also very thin and did not  tear evenly.
Not much to say about this. They are paper towels that work. Fast shipping
It's really good quality papers, now I am happy. 2 days ago ordered it again

review_title: I have found them to be incredibly useful for cleaning my apartment
review_body: These towels have been a godsend.. I have found them to be incredibly useful for cleaning my apartment. I read that some people didn't like the assorted colors. This should be used to your advantage. While I am not a germaphobe, I do prefer that certain surfaces do not contaminate others.. I have used them as such; white (will show uncleanliness first) for drying dishes, wiping counters and surfaces above waste level, and pretty much any use that could consequently come into contact with my mouth; yellow is used for floors and general area dusting; and blue only gets used in my bathroom or my outdoor patio. Recommendation: use the color variations to keep things sanitary.. These towels absorb well and they are heart enough for scrubbing. If they get nasty (bathroom usage) you can afford to just throw them away. I buy the 36-pack, so the unit cost is roughly $.45-$.50/cloth.. Paper towels can get so expensive, and they are often not well suited for many jobs. I am also trying to become more environmentally conscious. These things are mader from petrochemicals, but they do see repeated use.

they are ok but I have had microfibers from other brands which may be a little more expensive than this one (well if it is on sale from time to time and the price will be similar) but the quality will be much better than AmazonBasics. These fiber cloths are thinner and smaller but less plush...

review_title: Excellent cleaning clothes as well as handy kitchen hand towels.
review_body: I really like these multi colored cleaning clothes.  Not only do they work well, but I have found that I really like them to use as hand towels in the kitchen.  They are easy to quickly change to a clean one and they are not so expensive that I feel bad about changing & washing them frequently. I use some colors in the kitchen and some for scrub jobs that I don't want to mix with Kitchen towels.

I bought these to replace some microfiber cloths that were ruined someone with good intentions washed them with fabric softener. You get 24. That covers my kitchen/dining, bathroom and common areas. Love the fact that they're different colors that way I can assign cloths to rooms by color.

review_title: You get a lot of cleaning cloths for the money
review_body: For general cleaning these cloths are fine, but when they are classed as "Amazon Basics" that is exactly what they are:  Basic!. They are microfiber and hold quite a bit of water and wring out almost totally dry, so that is a good feature. They also seem sturdy so each cloth will probably be "in service" for a decent length of time.. They are a bit scratchy and I was not expecting this quality from a microfiber.  We actually ordered the package to use for gun cleaning and they are just fine for that purpose.  They would also be fine for general washing and scrubbing, but not for personal use - although I'm sure they aren't intended for that anyway.  I gave them only 3 stars because even though they are just  "OK"  the price seemed very reasonable when we bought them.

Washed them all before use. Left a fair amount of lint and fuzz when I was trying to dry my car and such. Overall, not the best... we’ve been using them as extra cleaning rags, and they work great for that.

review_title: Thought these would be great to clean and dry my cars
review_body: Thought these would be great to clean and dry my cars. I was wrong. They leave numerous scratches in the clear coat. I'm sure with professional paint correction it could be fixed but that was not what I bargained for. I would not recommend these for similar uses. I'm sure they have plenty of other good uses though. Just not what I was hoping they would do for me.

review_title: I would like to give 5 star but it's not good as ...
review_body: I would like to give 5 star but it's not good as the one that has 3 microfiber model.. Those are smaller and less thick.. If you wish to have better absorbing liquid go to Amazon Basics microfiber that has only 3 pcs coming in a good small box.. I will include later some pictures for consumers as myself to have better understanding.

review_title: Saves Money, Paper, Water, Household Cleaners
review_body: These are big, and they wash up really well. I use them instead of swiffer disposable wet and dry cloths. Then I wash them.. The only thing I do not like about them is the way they feel when I touch them. The whole thing about micro fiber is that it's the weave of the fabric that makes it so absorbent and so clingy with dirt and dust. To, me, it feels like tiny little claws. Just a very creepy texture. But it is great for cleaning.

review_title: Works great. Great price - Update: Just OK towels
review_body: Works great. Great price. Washed once so far and they work just as they were brand new. You can tell they won't hold up for very long though since they are so cheap.. Edit : Little over a year later and I still have most of the 48. I do like these for the price but I don't think I will buy again. After you wash them they fray really bad and its hard to fold them cause the corner won't come undone. They still do the job well but there are better options. I personally prefer the Kirkland brand because they are bigger and the quality is a lot better. I would suggest these to a friend if they are looking for a cheaper bulk option. I still do use these just not my favorite! They were a 5 star when i first got them now I think they're a 3.

These garbage bags are pretty strong and give some stretch. I had had them rip on me once or twice, probably because there was something sharp. I'm a big fan on the drawstrings, as they make it really easy to open and close the bag. Overall they do a good job!

I feel silly writing a review for trash bags, but I feel it's important that people know these bags can hold a LOT.. I own two cats and have two very large litter boxes. I change the litter entirely every two weeks by dumping all the old litter into one of these bags, about 12 pounds of litter per box. These bags easily hold all 12 pounds of litter and makes an unpleasant chore a bit more bearable.. I use them for my recyclables too and they have yet to disappoint.

Pretty standard garbage can liners. Hold up well and don't leak. The only thing I don't like about them is that they have a scent. for those with allergies to fragrances I would not recommend this product. If you do not have a problem with fragrances I would recommend this product

review_title: These are okay but wish they were longer or that they gave the length in the description
review_body: Good deal on these.  Unfortunately the description did not give the actual dimensions of the bags. We were looking for some that actually were long enough to reach the bottom of our waste can, but these don't quite reach. Solved the problem by placing a small cardboard box in the bottom of the can to support the weight of the garbage without pulling the top of the bag out of the retainer in the can.

review_title: Very please to find my regular product on Amazon
review_body: Since I discovered Amazon Prime and Prime Pantry, I can now have so many of the regular things I buy delivered right to my door. Glad is the brand I've always used and I was so happy to find this at such a great price. It's convenient when you are getting older and aren't as mobile as you used to be.

review_title: These are sturdy bags that keep odors out and trash in
review_body: These are sturdy bags that keep odors out and trash in.  They feel much stronger than the average kitchen trash bag and don't rip easily.  Highly recommended.
Buying bulk keeps me from running out and having it sent to my house ensures I have them when needed.  Good product.

I got a box of these on Subscribe and Save, and I'm about halfway through the box.. I give this a 1-star review because the draw string often detaches when I try to tie up the bag. (What I mean is, when I start to pull out the draw string, at least one end simply pulls all the way out, so it is not able to close the top of the trash bag.) It has happened frequently enough that I have had to adopt the assumption that it WON'T work when I am ready to remove the bag from the trash can. I haven't documented how often it happens, but my gut says it is roughly a 50% break rate.. I'm looking for an alternative for my subscription.

review_title: horrible, perfume-y chemical odor that gives me a headache ...
review_body: These bags are SCENTED. It says this nowhere on the packaging or in the description, but they most definitely have a notable, horrible, perfume-y chemical odor that gives me a headache and makes the trash smell even worse. Glad, please label your packages! Switching back to the generic Target brand bags that work just as well and have no scent.

review_title: Fragrance does not belong in garbage bags
review_body: Bag function seems okay, but there's a perfume fragrance which is NOT conveyed in the writeup. I would never have bought it if I had known.
One of the better prices I've found on these paper towels.
Outstanding quality/Great Price and shipped right to my front door with Prime!  Love it!
Way better than generic stuff
Great paper towels for the money
Good value for great paper towels
I love Brawny and especially by the case

review_title: These are my favorite paper towels
review_body: These are my favorite paper towels. The pick-a-size feature is great, and I like Brawny's weight and absorbency. The lumberjack is a bonus.

review_title: Brawny Paper Towels, Pick-A-Size, 16 XL Rolls ...
review_body: Love my Brawny but Amazon was out the last couple of time I tried to order.... Thank you,. Dorothy Peterson
Durable and obsorbant
On par with bounty —good towels! I buy either these or bounty depending on pricing.

review_title: Never have to buy bulky paper towels again
review_body: Perfect again Amazon thank you
Very Over Priced. Was surprised at the lack of quantity. If I would have realized I would have purchased elsewhere.

Not much you can say about Bounty paper towels.  They're the best known and best loved brand of paper towel...and for good reason.  While they aren't as soft and cushiony as some other brands, they're extremely tough and absorbent.  Plus these are super giant rolls that should last a long time.. Personally, I really love that these are perforated into smaller sections because, while I may never use a single 5.5" piece, sometimes you need just a little bit more than a full sheet but don't want to waste two entire sheets.  Having the roll broken into smaller pieces is both economical and environmentally responsible.  I should add, however, that some people (like my husband) absolutey hate the "Select-a-Size" rolls.  So that's something to consider when you decide whether to buy these or not.. One thing I do want to point out, the advertising for these describes them as "Quick-Size" and suggests the towels are divided into pieces smaller than traditional "Select-a-Size" sheets but that isn't really the case.  Each perforated section is a little more than 5.5" - exactly half the size of a normal sized towel.  As far as I can tell, all other  "Select-a-Size" towels are 50% the size of a regular sheet.  No biggie, but just wanted to point out that there's nothing particularly unique about the size of the sheets here.. Basically, you can't go wrong with Bounty

I have used several different brands of paper towels from store brands, Viva, Scott, etc. I find that Bounty is the better paper towel. The only paper towel that comes close to Bounty is the Viva Strong and Soft- like cloth paper towels but I feel like they are too much like cloth for what I usually use my paper towels for. Bounty does absorb spills quickly and is great for my overall usage. I especially like the pick/quick size which makes them more economical for my family's use. I also notice that one roll of this type of Bounty lasts longer than any other brand of paper towel that I have used.. Many times I can even reuse the Bounty paper towel for a downgraded cleanup job- ie dry my hands-wipe the counter, wipe something off the floor, clean off the trash can then into the trash, etc. I love using Bounty Quick size and I will continue using them.

review_title: I question whether these are Bounty
review_body: With 6 children we have been using the Bounty half sheets for a long time. The price was good for the 16 pack using the $5 coupon and subscribe and save. These paper towels, however, are quite thin ( unlike our previous purchases of Bounty over the years ) and even though they are cut as half sheets the perforations are not uniform in that they don't go from top to bottom. We are constantly trying to get 1 sheet and getting one and a quarter or one and a half or two sheets. They almost never tear correctly. Its unlikely we will purchase this again because I have better options at Costco or other vendors packages on Amazon.

Bounty offers a good paper towel. I used them all day long (I know--so sad) because my older dogs have, well, 'issues.' So I'm blotting pee up off the carpets, wiping stuff off the floors, and using these paper towels for pretty much every cleanup job in the house. I also keep a roll in my car. Seriously, you NEED a roll in the car--SO handy. This box comes with 18 large rolls--a lot to store--so some are in the cupboard and the rest are still in their Bounty box in the garage.

Bounty is one of two brands of paper towels we use (Sparkle is the other) and is the most absorbent paper towel we've found.  Having them delivered to our door, at just about the same price as in the stores, is also a plus.  These paper towels are slightly smaller than the select-a-size that we've also used, but this doesn't detract from its usefulness.  I use these in lieu of sponges to wipe down the kitchen sinks and counters.

We love bounty. I know it's a tough call when compared to bargain brands, and we actually usually buy bounty and a bargain brand. We use the cheap stuff for minor spills or putting under water glasses, and the bounty for major spills, cleaning icky greasy dishes or pots after making orange food like spaghetti. I hate what that does to a dish cloth and this way I get all the gross grease and color on the bounty and toss it, works great.

What can you say about paper towels? Nothing to get too worked up about. These work fine; Bounty are of course more absorbent than the more generic brands. Interestingly, we compared the sheets from these rolls to the Bounty paper towels we get at Costco, and the Costco ones are about an inch wider. But these "Quick Size" are just as useful, and with more sheets a roll will last longer. Win-win, I suppose.

review_title: It’s Bounty, the quicker picker upper
review_body: I really like the “select a size” of these papertowels.  My kids don’t seem to understand the concept of using only what they need and not overdoing.  These help them control their usage a bit better (not perfectly, but better).  They are strong and durable and useful as napkins, cleaning, or lining a drawer or cabinet.  Perfect!
Great product for the price
works great
Thanks
The best for me.
Dixie Is paper plates
Seller shipped damaged plates, the box was not damaged on the outside, but several plates were damaged inside. Would not recommend.
Price was better than store
none
Love it
a

review_title: They need an O-Ring to seal them, but then they work great
review_body: They work well AFTER you get an o-ring to seal them.  After seeing the issue others have, water leaking AROUND the filter instead of going through it, and making very certain it was correctly seated, I put a thin rubber o-ring around the filter (most hardware stores carry these) which is reusable (I've had one o-ring for 7 filters so far).  The o-ring makes seating it firmer as I push the filter in, and SEALS the filter so water must go through it.  Get a thin one, it must fit between the filter and the wall of the insert area.  I put the ring about 3/4" from the top of the filter, then push it in, and I can feel the o-ring "rolling" up the filter as I push and it seats the filter in very firm and tight.  **See pics.  This about a 2" o-ring, and they are cheap.  Brita should use this idea and send a small o-ring with each 3 pack or pitcher..  I think people who are complaining about the water quality don't realize the water is leaking around the filter and not being filtered.  After the O-Ring, it takes MUCH longer for the water to go through the filter, so I know it's working.

If you have a Brita jug, you'll probably need a pack of these.  I live in San Jose, and the water here is ridiculous.  It comes out orange sometimes, and it smells like rotten eggs.  We did a water test and we even called an inspector to test it as well, both said the water meets the standard (whatever that means).. The filters help a lot.  The water comes through clear, tastes fine, smells fine.  After about a month, there's a definite layer of a powdery orange something on the bottom of our dispenser and so I clean it and switch out the filter.  The package says to switch the filter out every two months.  No, we don't go through an exceptional amount of water (it's just my husband and myself, and I drink less than a glass of water a day ... no joke, yes I know it's not healthy).  We tested a sample of the sediment water as well, the test found nothing harmful and we're not dead yet so I guess we'll just keep drinking it, whatever it is.

review_title: ... accumulated about 8 of these thinking they would be better than the standard filters
review_body: I unfortunately have accumulated about 8 of these thinking they would be better than the standard filters.  Not sure if this first one is a dud but the Total Dissolved Solids stick I have for this has this filter doing zero incremental TDS removal vs what comes in from the tap.  I was 108 coming in and 105 on the filtered side so basically nothing.. The standard filters I have take my water (from a different floor) from around 102 to around 78-82 range.. The water definitely is going through the filter and it is certainly slower than the standards but I am not seeing a reduction in tds at least on this first sample.. edit - having had these for a while longer now, I will say, they have a funny plastic kind of taste to them vs the regular filters.  I think they are all destined for the garbage.  Am not going to buy these ever again.

The Good: I can’t believe how good water can taste! The regular Brita filters did nothing for the taste of my water, & I was just about to toss filters, pitcher, and all when I saw this new filter. I’m actually drinking water that I dont have to choke down for my health.. The Bad: I cannot believe how long it takes to filter 1/2 of the pitcher - an incredible 14 minutes! My regular Brita filters took about 5 minutes. So dont fill this pitcher if you need the water anytime soon. Best to fill it and forget it. Waiting for the water to get through the filter is like waiting for grass to grow!

review_title: Filter does not stay sealed tightly in place...certainly not water tight.
review_body: I've read all the answers from Brita to the comments posted by unsatisfied customers about the filter NOT staying sealed tightly. I know about first rinsing a new filter in cold water for 15 seconds. I know that you need to line up the filter with the grooves. I know you then push down hard the filter so it locks in place - so called! AFTER HAVING DONE THIS, the filter still pops up a fraction causing water to leak through the sides of said filter. Now, I am 6'5", 250 lbs. I lift weights 4 days a week. I am not a weak duckling. Yet, time after time, even after pushing down the filter with all my strength, the filter will not stay tightly secured in place. Why there is no rubber ring for added sealment remains a mystery to me. Why they didn't design this to "screw" said filter in place so it is water tight (versus just dropping the filter into the pitcher and pushing down), is a mystery to me. And, even when the filter does happen to seal a little tighter than it normally does, as soon as I move the pitcher about (to pour water for example), the filter will pop up again. The design is flawed, plain and simple. I do not have a bad device per say, it's just that they did not design the filter housing with effectiveness.

review_title: Unusable for daily water filtration. Only usable in EXTREME situations due to slow drip
review_body: I had really high hopes for this filter. Given what happened in Flint, MI I am even more weary of drinking tap water filtered through standard filters that do not filter lead. I saw this filter and I really wanted to try it out instead of the typical Brita filters since these filter more and last longer.. However, this filter became unusable after a couple of times filtering. We are really getting just a drop almost every second which makes this usable only in EXTREME situations where you are desperate to filter some of these particles that other filters cannot filter.

review_title: Unacceptable – Either a Defective Product, or False Advertising
review_body: I’m a lifelong Brita user so I was thrilled to see they finally made a countertop filter that catches lead!  I followed the set-up instructions precisely and at first everything seemed fine.  The water filtered a little more slowly than the regular Brita filters, but no big deal, and it tasted great.  However, within 2-3 weeks, each filter in this two-pack slowed to a CRAWL, barely filtering a single batch of water in 8 hours (!).  I then looked up the official Brita instructions for unclogging these filters and followed those to a “t.”  That didn’t help one bit.  Shortly after trying to fix each of the two filters, black flecks flooded out of them (see first photo).. Now, the box specifically advertises “no black flecks” (see second photo) and “lasts 3x longer than standard Brita filters” so to have two of these filters last at most 3 weeks each and then vomit black flecks – this is either a defective product or false advertising.  I see on here a lot of people have complained about similar problems and Brita just offers coupons for money off your next purchase.  That’s ridiculous.  Refund or replace, Brita!

Didn't work!!! Water didn't even squeeze thru the dratted thing when brand new, first week. Total junk.. When the handle on my beloved snazzy-looking Mavea filtering carafe broke, I only opted for a Brita so I could get this specific supposedly-gets-out-all-the-things filter, and after working in a sad, slow, anemic fashion for a day or two, it started letting approximately one drop thru every 10 minutes or so.. Only in a universe in which I needed a pitcher of water a week would this be acceptable. Please refer to accompanying pic, with full top reservoir, and perfectly still surface of the water accumulated below. Note there is nary a drop falling down to disturb the surface, grr.. Now, since I can't even use it for the reason for which I bought it,  I'm irate every time I have to look at the Brita pitcher, into which I've replaced the normal carbon doesn't-do-much-but-improve-taste (but you know, actually lets water thru!) filter.. With so many people reporting the same unacceptable product performance, why is this product even still on Amazon?  And why is Brita putting out so many hunks of useless plastic and labeling them filters??  Boo, hiss. >:/

review_title: It fits if you do this! I thought I had the wrong filter model at first!
review_body: I have been using Brita filters for years. At first this filter, which is shorter than the latest filters for full-size pitchers, didn't seem to fit: The filter has only 1 groove and did not fit the cross frame of the pitcher, and didn't even seem to go down all the way to the frame. I almost wrote an angry email, then I tried 1 last time to insert the Longlast filter, TWIST AND TURN AT the same time WHILE PUSHING DOWN and the single groove of the filter did catch 1 part of the cross frame of the pitcher and lock in place. It is tightly sealed, although you can see that 3/4 of the bottom of the filter is not touching the cross frame. Fitration is slow but good and the seal is good. I bought this filter because of the multiple failures in lead contamination testing in schools around the good old city of San Diego. I will not go back to any filter that doesn't take care of lead. I took out 2 stars for the stupid design. Some people in the RnD department at Brita need to go back to school to learn the basics of ergonomics and customer satisfaction. They must have been on their phones checking Facebook and Instagram in class and taking selfies during the lectures.

review_title: Much better price than at my neighborhood supermarket
review_body: Bought a new Brita for someone in our household who's convinced tap water is officially the worst thing ever, even if where I live is *renowned* for its tap water ---- so, needless to say, I wanted to make sure I wasn't spending crazy amounts on the filters when I was happy with my tap water to begin with.. I hadn't comparison shopped them before, beyond what was available on Amazon, but felt like the 3 pack was a decent price online... so went for it.. Let's just say I went to the supermarket  recently and saw how much a pack of three replacement filters were there.... and got total sticker shock!. Needless to say, I'll continue to buy my replacement filters on Amazon.. (As for the quality of the filters: they're official Brita, and Brita really does make a difference -- especially if you don't live in a location with tap water as good as mine. But if you have good tap water, then I really don't think it's necessary -- but your mileage will vary!)

review_title: What happen to the giant roll, this is a big roll which seems smaller each time I order it...disappointing
review_body: These rolls are far smaller than they used to be, I like the GIANT rolls rather than this 'Big' version I'd gladly pay some extra for more paper on the rolls.
These paper towels are pretty good. They are tough and soft. My only complaint would be that they don't absorb a lot. So that is a down side.

viva paper towels are better than other brands because they don't feel like paper towels, they feel more like cloth also I like the shorter perforations so you don't waste a whole towel for small wipe ups.

review_title: Love the texture of these towels
review_body: Love the texture of these towels.  Almost feel like fabric.  They come off in 1/2 sheets which is good since they are so absorbent.
So soft, like fabric. Soft enough for to wipe baby's face during meal times without irritating their skin.. The other brands, even bounty quilted, feel like cheap rough paper compared to this.
Although a cheaper paper towel, this has worked so well! It's surprised me at how absorbent it is, and I really appreciate the half sheet sections. Helps with less waste!

review_title: I particularly like the choose-a-sheet version because a little can go a ...
review_body: Very soft and durable. Can even be reused. I particularly like the choose-a-sheet version because a little can go a long way.
We like the option of using 1/2 sheets that this product offers - no more wasting an entire towel on a small spill or clean up!

review_title: I love that I can get these shipped to our house ...
review_body: I love that I can get these shipped to our house as needed. They're soft enough for little faces, but strong enough to clean up some pretty gnarly messes. The price is nice, too!

review_title: Just started using these. I like them.
review_body: I used to always buy the sparkle brand but gave these a try. They feel more like a cloth than a paper towel. I personally don’t like how they stick to one another, but that’s just me. They do a great job.

review_title: We are very happy with it so far
review_body: This SafeRest premium mattress protector fit on our oversized queen mattress perfectly without any difficulty trying to smooth and stretch it out to fit all four corners, and the company gave very specific wash and dry instructions on the package (95/200*F warm or hot wash, low tumble dry 55/130*F max, do not dry clean, do not iron, and do not bleach).  We are very happy with it so far.  Our queen size mattress is a Spa Sensations 12" Memory Foam Comfort Mattress ordered online from Walmart, and it is a bit larger as one of our queen size fitted sheets was very hard to get on our mattress.  I was worried the protector may not fit as well, but it does.  As a side note, Mattress Firm sells a very similar mattress, but Walmart was much cheaper.

This is the second time I've purchased one of these.  The first one has been so great that I wanted to be sure to find another of the same brand.  It's held up through many washings (large dog).  Not going to lie -  I have even bleached it and ran it through the dryer a few times without any issues.  I'm buying a second one so we can put it on the bed right away while the other one is in the wash.  I had another waterproof cover but it is slick and it makes the sheets pop off the corners of the bed.  This one is silent, non-crunchy, and causes no issues at all.  Our mattress looks as new as it did when we bought it 4 years ago, thanks to this mattress pad.

Honestly,  a 5 star item.. I just got a new puppy and my older cats Her and have been making their territory all over the house which includes my bed. After the 3rd time of cleaning it in one day I bought this protector and it's amazing! They peed on it with in an hour of arrival and nothing got on my bed!!! It's wonderful. I ordered a second one right away so I wouldn't be with out one. I just throw them in the wash and I line dry mine. I don't want any heat on plastic. So far been washed 3 times and still in wonderful condition. Highly recommend. Going to buy another for my daughter and the guest room.. Honestly not bad to sleep on. I do hear a bit of that plastic noise when I move around but nothing bad at all.

I purchased this item to protect my boyfriends mattress because we have several cats and a dog, and accidents happen.. Despite being a rather large/thick, pillow top mattress, this cover has ample room to cover the top of the mattress.  I believe that this could easily fit a mattress that is a few inches thicker than his.  I'm quite thankful to find such wonderful coverage in a mattress cover that doesn't zip around the mattress, but rather one that simple slips over the top.  Due to the amount that stretches under the mattress, even when our fitted sheet rides up on the mattress the cover stays put.. My main point in purchasing this cover was due to it being waterproof.  I was concerned that it may sound crinkly, like some other waterproof covers do, however this cover does not make a single sound.  And the top of it is actually extremely soft.  As of right now, I'm not sure about the extent of it's waterproofness, as we haven't had any spills or accidents since the product has been on our bed, however once that happens I will be sure to update my review.. - - - - UPDATE - - - -. The waterproofness of this mattress cover was finally put to the test during my vacation last week!!  As previously stated, their are several cats in my household and whilst I was on vacation with my family they occupied the house.  Even though I had someone coming in to feed and water them, I did not ask them to clean the litter boxes in the home.  Our Siamese cat is particularly finicky as he gets terribly upset if the litter boxes are not cleaned everyday (I think because one of my female cats doesn't cover her poop and it stinks).  So, he took it upon himself to tinkle on my bed.  I'm so very glad to say that not a single bit of it leaked through the the mattress below, if I could increase my star rating beyond 5 I would do so.  This cover completely protected my mattress from having any of his little anger tinkle on the bed itself.. Also, it was incredible easy to take the cover off to wash and dry.  Washing and drying did nothing to damage the integrity of the cover (which I washed/dried according to the instructions).  Also, it took virtually no time for the cover to dry so I could remake the bed.  This is a wonderful mattress cover.

review_title: It really is 100% waterproof ~ works perfectly.
review_body: The SafeRest mattress protector works beautifully. The first time I put it on the bed, I put extra protection underneath ~ just in case. No need! It was completely dry underneath the SafeRest protector, and this was after an overnight “accident” by an adult who has occasional incontinence. Sorry if this is TMI, but it was a lot of liquid, and this mattress protector kept 100% away from the mattress and the other unnecessary layer I had put underneath.. Now that I know how well it works, I’m ordering another ~ so I’ll always have a clean one ready to put on the bed. (It’s important to follow the washing directions, and since you can’t use too much heat in the dryer, it takes quite a while to dry.). Well worth the cost ~ I recommend this highly.

review_title: It fits well, seems to help dust allergy and I don't even notice it
review_body: Five stars based on initial impression after several nights of use along with the Hospitology Sleep Defense System pillow encasement.  I've lived with a chronic, year-round runny nose my whole life, carrying tissues wherever I go.  I finally achieved some sense of normalcy after the advent of non-drowsy antihistamines and steroid nasal sprays, which I use daily.  Fixing my deviated septum was a painful, but huge help in fixing the related congestion issues.  Having not seen an allergy doctor since my childhood decades ago, I went in for an allergy test a couple of weeks ago, and I was surprised to discover that I wasn't allergic to the pollen that plagues the region, but dust.  The doctor recommended mattress and pillow encasements, and he happened to be affiliated with a company.  How convenient.  :)  I did some research, and encasement is a medically-recognized treatment, so it was definitely worth buying some kind of encasement.  My doctor's recommended brand,  Allergy Guardian, was rather pricey, so I decided to shop around.  My wife and I have adjustable TwinXL beds, so the cover choices in that size are rather limited.  SafeRest offers that size, and the reviewers mostly say they don't even notice it's there.  I get warm at night, so that's important.  I was concerned that it doesn't provide total encasement, but it does have elastic all the way around, so it tucks under and keeps everything fairly well enclosed.  It's supposed to be water-resistant as well, so that's a bonus.  I finally ordered the SafeRest based on it coming it being available in TwinXL, having many positive reviews, and being reasonably priced.  I don't notice any plastic feeling under the sheets due to the terry-cloth layer, but it doesn't hold in my body heat enough to cause me any discomfort.  After the first night of use along with the pillow encasement, my sinuses weren't all gunked up like they normally are, so there must be something to this encasement business.  When I got up an around, the dust from the outside world hit me, so this is not a cure-all.  However, I do recommend this mattress protector for dust allergies.

I slept on our new mattress a few days prior to adding this protector. The mattress is a cross over model of springs on the bottom with a foam topper. The mattress really hugged my body and was very comfortable before putting the protector on. The protector is not noisy like I saw in other brand reviews but it did take some of the comfort out because the mattress doesn't quite form to our bodies as it used to.. I was happy with the seller communication after I ordered the product.

review_title: I suppose I can't imagine a material that could be terribly "protective" without being made of something that wouldn't crinkle .
review_body: At first I was a bit worried when this went on to the brand new mattress because when I ran my hand over the material it made quite a crinkly sound. But once the top sheet went on and all the blankets and my weight on it, I have yet to hear it in actual use.  I suppose I can't imagine a material that could be terribly "protective" without being made of something that wouldn't crinkle at least a little bit to the touch.  Makes sense right?  As for comfort, I "wasn't allowed" to lay on the new mattress before  this protector went on, so I can't truly compare comfortness before and after installation.  However my memory recalls the mattress being a little softer in the store. The cover isn't capable of being so tight or strong that it could actually suspend my weight above/on top of the coils enoghh to affect comfortness so it is likely just a figment of the imagination.

review_title: Fabulous mattress cover.  Works as advertised if you follow manufacturer's washing and drying instructions
review_body: This is a great alternative to those really expensive waterproof mattress covers.  It is very thin and easy to work with and I would imagine if you used it on your bed the way it is meant to be used, it would be unobtrusive and therefore comfortable for sleeping. I use mind to keep a leather sofa covered when not in use.  There are wet and muddy dogs living with me and there are cats who occasionally take revenge and seek the most expensive items in the house to pee on.  This is rare, but it does happen.  So this cover goes on the sofa when humans aren't using it (and even when they are). It really is just so thin, which is what I love about it.  It drapes perfectly on the sofa.  The bulkier mattress covers just didn't fit for my purposes very well.. Now you might think that this is a stupid review for a mattress cover given that it has never actually seen a mattress in my house, but I think I'm well qualified to speak to the virtues of this thing because I believe it is much more sorely tested on my sofa than on the average bed.  Nothing has gotten through to the sofa when this cover is in place.  And, it seems pretty tolerant of punishment as well.  One of the dogs is a bit of a frenetic digger and digs herself into the sofa before settling down.  This mattress cover hasn't torn.. So why not four stars?  Simple, I find it a bit annoying that I have to wash and dry it with so little heat lest we lose the waterproof properties of it.  This is a large queen sized item and it take a lot of drying time when only low heat is used.  Do I think this is a good purchase in spite of that?  Absolutely.

This is my favorite mattress protector. We have purchased three different brands for our potty-training childrens' beds (twin).. Other brands either shrunk in the dryer r te protective backing melted and made holes, although each one claimed to be dryer-safe on the low setting. Also, some other brands require you to dry the mattress protectors separately, which is inconvenient considering how many laundry loads I have with two children potty training and an infant. This one is very washer/dryer friendly.. The terry cloth top makes it comfortable and quiet. The top isn't quilted and thick as I would prefer, but the brands I have tried with that feature have shrunken and are difficult to dry as there is so much excess water between the protective layer and top.. This is by far our favorite waterproof topper that has never failed us! The value is great too, as other brands were more expensive.
The best paper towel in the world.
There’s nothing to dislike, they get the job done, either is cleaning the mirrors or a dinner napkin or cleaning those nasty spills.
I will be ordering this again soon.
Love how they last. Really good quality
Good buy.
My Fav pack of paper towels, the thickness and size & texture!!
Good value
Great value
But let’s be honest. They’re paper towels. How do you mess up paper towels?
Thid is a great deal for what you get!

review_title: Never shopping for paper towels in store again. Why ...
review_body: Never shopping for paper towels in store again. Why would I when I can get them shipped to my door! The quality of this brand is thick and durable. Can’t complain about the item one bit.
Ordered via subscribe and save, and some of the rolls smell like a wet dog. They don't look like they got wet, just smell awful.
Easy home delivery!  Love the choice to select just the right size.  Very strong and great product.
Very affordable and great absorbency.  I love the pick a size feature.  We use them for napkins as well.
Item exactly as described and received in excellent condition.
I didnt receive paper towels. I received a bunch of quilted toilet paper instead.
Good product for the price. Could have a bit more absorbancy but hey, you get what you pay for.
This deal is a staple in our house. I never but paper towels in store anymore! These are thick aborbant and last!! They are all white which is fine with me and you can't beat the price!!
They aren't the greatest but they're not the worst either. So they will do!

review_title: ... but this one is less expensive and just as good from a quality standpoint
review_body: You could go to Costco and buy their brand but this one is less expensive and just as good from a quality standpoint.  Plus I don't spend all that extra dough on stuff I don't need.

I purchased both the 24 x 24 and the 26 x 26 pillows.  They came in separate orders doubled over and crammed into the boxes.  The pillows are inserts and do not have covers.  The filling is just a batting that did not fill the corners.  I bought them to fit specific pillow covers and eat was too small to fit the covers the seller says it would fit.  All in all they are poorly made and I cannot recommend them.

Great, fluffy pillows. I was super confused when I opened the box because they were compressed in a way that made them look rectangular, but they puffed up and took shape as soon as I got them out of the plastic.

review_title: Did not fill the pillow case completely
review_body: Extremely disappointed. I bought this for a decoration pillow case I bought. The case was 18x18, the pillow was supposed to be 18x18, but doesn’t even come close to filling out the case. Will not buy from again.

review_title: Looks like picture after you get the plastic wrap off and allow it to puff out
review_body: Came in an air-tight package.  I almost sent it back before I realized that it is actually bigger than it looks. Not real comfortable but is going in a decorative pillow case so works well.
The pillow was not very fluffy. I bought this to go with my new pillow covers and I wish I would have bought a pillow at the store instead. It got the job done but I wouldn't buy another one.
I needed a little throw pillow for a sham cover that came with my bedset. This pillow filled out the sham perfectly, and is comfortable to boot!

review_title: They are over stuffed which makes it hard to get ...
review_body: They are over stuffed which makes it hard to get them inside the pillow cover.  Squeeze them so they are smaller before inserting them in the pillow covers or you may break the pillow cover zipper as I did on one pillow.

I needed one extra pillow and this one is very soft; most importantly it keeps its shape - unlike the saggy Ikea throw pillows I initially picked up.  Still meaning to replace those with 3 more of these, but my dog and boyfriend like sprawling out on the saggy ones.
I thought this pillow would be a square pillow like in the picture. It's not... Had to return it. I needed an 18x18 and this is not it.

Perfect for the price! I bought 2, unpacked and fluffed them, and then stuffed these into 18x18 pillow cases. They're plump and awesome. Without a cover on, they come off as cheapy and you wonder at first if they're going to fluff up, but leave them out for a little bit and then stuff them into a smaller case and you'll be amazed.

I redid our guest room into my own relaxing she-shed. 😀 I put the lights up side ways and used the tiny command hooks to secure the wires. Fit the wall perfectly. I also plugged the lights into a foot switch so I can just tap them on and off. These are great. I'll probably do this in our master too with the larger length.

I used these lights as part of a backdrop for my wedding. I used sheer curtains in front of them and had them on behind them and they looked so beautiful. I loved all the different settings that it features and everyone at my wedding was impressed with the creativity of the backdrop. They really added a cute charm to it!

review_title: Beautiful, but hard to put up and take down
review_body: The lights are definitely dazzling.....once they are up.  I bought 9 sets to go around the outside of my carport for my wedding reception.  They are a bit difficult to get them up and untangled.  I encourage you to not take the twist ties off of the lines until you have them set up where you want them.  For the first string I took off all the zip ties and could not tell which way was which and they got all tangled.  These lights tangle very easily.  If you take them down and want to reuse them, you should put the zip ties back on them BEFORE you take them off of the wall or wherever you hang them.  Otherwise you will be untangling the lights until the rest of your days!  Once they are up, they are beautiful and well worth the work.

review_title: These look GREAT in a dorm room
review_body: However, the length of the cord connecting the mode box and the adapter really doesn't make sense and wasn't well thought out. I have never encountered a wall that had outlets either in the middle of them or near the ceiling. The lights are very very pretty and I luckily have a flag to cover up the extension cord I will need. They are actually perfect for a dorm room because they're not too bright, yet not too dull. I plan on putting pictures behind them to spice it up a bit. I am a little scared to unravel them from the box I put them in for winter break (technically not allowed to hang stuff on the walls) because they do get tangled very easily, but really all lights do amiright? The different modes are a big plus because it makes everything a little more interesting. All in all, they're great lights. You just need a little extension cord.

review_title: Lots of issues in regards to hanging it up
review_body: Terrible light. No instructions to hang up properly and very difficult to try and hang up especially when the plug in outlet is at the very top of the light with a very short outlet that did not reach the bottom of my outlet. Did not work properly. I am highly disappointed. I contact the seller for a refund because I wanted to return the item. Customer service was not helpful at all and cannot resolve the issue.

review_title: They made the photo backdrop for an upcoming baby shower ...
review_body: They made the photo backdrop for an upcoming baby shower really sparkle and shine!  I ordered the warm lights and they are very bright and they shine right through the plastic tablecloths I put up, which is exactly the effect that I was hoping for.. Thanks to other reviews, I left them tied until I had them where I wanted them and then undid the ties to let them down.  Since I was just testing them out to see the effect, I folded them back up and put the ties on again before taking them down.  It was a simple procedure to do and will make putting them up again a breeze.

review_title: Perfect lights to pair with sheer curtains!
review_body: UPDATE:. After about a month of pretty infrequent use, one of the strands no longer lights up. It’s in the middle and appears to still be fully connected to the other strands (that are still lit), so I’m not sure what happened. These were so great and I’m really disappointed they don’t appear to last long.. ORIGINAL REVIEW:. I bought these to pair with sheer curtains behind my bed. I could not be happier with how these look and the dimensions of one strand were perfect for my space. The color is really a warm white which is what I wanted for my bedroom. All of the twinkling options are great too. They were also easy to install with command hooks, just make sure you listen to the reviews and don’t untie all of the strands at once.. The power cord is a little short, but even if it reaches to an outlet it sticks out pretty far (even more so since I added an outlet remote plug). This meant that I couldn’t put my bed flush up against the wall, so I ended up using an extension cord anyway.
lit up once then turned off and never worked again. tried putting it in different outlets and still nothing.

review_title: I’m so happy with these lights
review_body: I’m so happy with these lights! It took a few minutes to get them unraveled, but using zip-ties to hang them made it quick and easy. My house feels so cozy now, just in time for the long winter season.

Beautiful lights! There are various settings from steady on to blinking to fading, and all it takes is a simple touch of a button. I used this to make a photo backdrop for my future sister in law’s bridal shower and it was a huge hit! I plan on hanging the lights behind the headboard of my bed to make it a little more *magical* I did read a previous review that recommended you keep each string of light tied up until you’ve hung the main wire, which is excellent advice to prevent everything from getting tangled.

This steamer is awesome! We took it with us for an out of town wedding and everyone was coming to our room to borrow it for their formalwear. It lasted much longer than I thought it would on a tank of water and heats so quickly that there’s really no wait time after filling. We absolutely love this product!
waiting for 2018 model

review_title: It's great for a single garment or for travel
review_body: This is small. Really small. As in you can do one garment at a time before you have to refill it small. So just keep that in mind if you buy it. It's great for a single garment or for travel. But I ended up buying a floor model that better meets my needs.
Excellent! really works on getting those wrinkles out F A S T!

I got this for my daughter and she is absolutely delighted with this steamer.  The plastic is sturdy and it feels like quality construction.  She loves the way it steams wrinkles and creases out of clothes.  It works well with light to medium weight fabrics - hold it right against the material!  It is not strong enough for heavyweight fabrics.

review_title: This is super handy. I keep it in my bathroom and ...
review_body: This is super handy. I keep it in my bathroom and quickly steam out wrinkles. You have to refill after each piece but honestly that's because I don't want a big steamer taking up space. I could easily travel with this. It also heats up very fast.

This product works great and is small enough to be mobile. The original one inreceived did not work, so they sent me a new one which works perfect. You have to provide a little tension when steaming the shirt but looks great!

If you are looking for a steamer that is heavy duty, this is it!  And it is small enough to fit into your suitcase to travel.  I had ordered this steamer for a trip to Europe and had used it a few times, and as I said, it worked great.  Unfortunately, for some reason, it stopped working.  I emailed the company to let them know.  They were extremely apologetic and within a week, I had a replacement.  The customer service, the professionalism and the response was first rate.  I really appreciate companies who stand behind their products and put their customers first!!

review_title: Heats up very quickly, perfect for travel. Small size but lots of steam
review_body: I bought this for new clothing that had been folded and washing didn't remove the wrinkles. This little steamer is boiling in less than a minute and it takes any wrinkle out. Small enough for a tote even to travel. Love it.

Gets the job done perfectly! I like to use a little Downy wrinkle release spray to freshen the clothes and make them smell like laundry but it is not necessary. It steams two tops before I need to refill. Make sure you empty between uses or the chamber could get moldy. If you tilt it to far forward it will also leak and burn you but this is explained and shown in the pamplet
very good for dust. easy for clean the dust.
good price, works great
Work as promised, do the job and help to keep the floor clean
useful, like it.
Good value

review_title: Easy to use and they work.
review_body: They work and easy to use.
good
A lot for the money.
Love it! So easy and cleans so well

review_title: I always love those. I put them under the running water
review_body: I always love those. I put them under the running water, squeeze them out and pour Vinegar or Peroxide on the floors and mop it up with the Swiffer Pads.

Works good. Just didn't like the number when I stepped on it😣😣. Updated review,. This scale is stupid. I stepped on it 3 times and got 3 different numbers. I put 10 lb weights on it and it gave 9.4 the first time, then 8. I don't care how cool it looks. I really want my money back now.. Had to raise to 3 stars even though the product didn't work properly the customer service was hassle free and great. Would purchase different products in the future. Thanks

review_title: Excellent Built Quality - Nice Display too
review_body: I was in need of a Weiin scale to track my weight on a daily basis. though it is little high price, I love the built and quality.. Look and Feel - 10 out of 10. Quality - 10 / 10. Delivery - On time. Price - slightly higher than other few models. Package - 9/10. Measuring Unit - Both LBs and Kgs

I hesitated to purchase this scale, because some people "dissed" it's accuracy in different locations. The first thing I did when it arrived was to weigh myself in about 973,581 different parts of my apartment. (Okay, perhaps I exaggerate. LOL) I weighed exactly the same every time! (What are these people doing? Snacking between weigh-ins? Putting the scale on top of a sofa?) Someone else complained about water spots. Hmmmmmmmmm. Something on the floor of a bathroom gets water spots? How shocking! :)  Another awesome feature of this product is its packaging. The delivery guy literally THREW the package over my railing, and it came crashing down so hard and loudly on the cement ground that my next door came out to ask if I was okay! The scale works perfectly!

review_title: Magic scale on my floor, tell me who the ladies adore...
review_body: ...Etekcity built a scale that says its me ;).. All jokes aside this thing is pretty solid! I want to point out that everything about this scale is GLASS!!! That being said, I'm personally going to keep it in my bedroom away from other solid immovable objects (such as the toilet) to avoid any potential accidents. I'd rather be safe than sorry.. I've read a few 1 star comments about this product and I feel it is my civil duty to point out a couple of things:. 1) you should NOT place this on carpet and then step on it! Any scale won't work correctly on carpet but this is made out of tempered glass. Placing it on carpet will not only give an incorrect reading, but will also put more pressure on the scale itself on any point and will therefore break!. 2) This product is made out of glass. Be aware of it's surroundings and ask yourself if you and your scale are safe around that sketchy looking porcelain fellow next to you.. The feet on the scale will keep it from sliding around; but if it happens to "bump" any solid object, no matter how slight it may seem, it will more than likely break. Keep that in mind. 3) I don't have an answer for a dysfunctional LCD screen, but from what I understand, the company is more than happy to send you another one (as long as you follow the guidelines). I've never been excited about a scale in my life and I can't wait to keep track of my personal progress with it. It looks great and to some degree, kind of motivates me to see smaller numbers everytime I step on it.

review_title: ... (both in weight and in height/feet size) finding a good scale is hard
review_body: as a larger person (both in weight and in height/feet size) finding a good scale is hard. This scale reads consistently accurate compared to my doctor's scale, and has allowed me to fine tune my diet faster. I know the scale only reads in every .2 increments, but at how large of a weight I am, those decimals aren't a huge issue. My other scales would be off by 10-30 lbs due to my weight. these flipflop by .2-.4 at the most between back to back readings.

review_title: Not perfect, but also not expensive
review_body: I'm probably not alone when I say I purchased this to track my new year's resolution to lose weight.  I wanted something with a digital readout, so I could track even those fractions of pounds.  I am not a small man and was hesitant at first to step on this scale even though the capacity is 400lbs.  I'm not sure why though, because this scale feels like a quality product straight from the box.  The LED is bright and the glass is sturdy.. As far as accuracy is concerned, I probably wouldn't buy this for any scientific experiments or official weigh-ins, but it is fine for home use.  The scale is consistent when you re-weigh yourself, meaning if you step on and off 3 times it always returns the same weight.  This may also be an issue though.  For example, I have weighed myself before and after urinating on multiple occasions. Sometimes the weight dropped and sometimes it didn't change at all.  Logically if you urinate for any significant period of time, the weight should drop. I have also weighed weights that I have to test if it is off at all and the weights were always within .4 lbs, so it is accurate from that aspect.. Even with some of the accuracy questions, this scale is fantastic for the price.  It looks very stylish and durable.  I enjoy looking at the numbers go down every morning when I step on it, which is why I wanted a digital scale in first place.  I'm already down 4 lbs and never had so much fun using scale before.

review_title: Works well but design is terrible, hardly designed to last very long!
review_body: This scale is attractive and easy to use, but it's also heavy, slippery, made out of glass, and extremely easy to drop.. I realize that old fashioned even digital bathroom scales aren't made any more, and they all seem to have the same design and be made out of glass, and that is the ONLY reason why I even bought this.. I hate this design.  Bring back normal bathroom scales!  I am telling you.  If the thing is "mod" and "minimalist" we'll find it easier to lose weight?  Of all the excuses!

I was having a problem with my scale giving inconsistant readings. After I left a review here I was contacted by the company. I tried their suggestions for improving reading consistancy. Unfortunately they did not work. I was so discouraged I put the scale in the recycling. They reached out to me and offered to replace the scale. I told them I no longer had the old one. They provided me a new scale anyway. The new scale works fine and gives consistant readings. I use an Etekcity scale in the kitchen for controlling portion size and it works perfectly. I highly recommend this company and their products. It is rare to find such an exceptional level of customer service these days. Etekcity is a great company with great products. Buy with confidence!!
I sent it back. Every time I used it, I got a different reading -- wildly different.

Working in the medical field I am aware that weight changes from day to day and even within a day. So it's disappointing that this digital scale, which measures to the 10th of a pound, would display the exact same weight for me for many days in a row. Every once in a while it will show my weight fluctuating up or down a pound or less, but the next day it always returns to the previous same weight. If you are just looking for general numbers this might be an ok scale for you. But if you want exact weights while trying to gain or lose weight, be advised to choose a different one.

review_title: ... bags are convenient with built in pull ties for easy close and
review_body: These Trash bags are convenient with built in pull ties for easy close and carry
These bags work very well, does not break easily even when stuffed
These our my family's favorite garbage bags. They hold a lot and are able to be stretched when we want to throw an extra thing or two in them. They also have the extra bonus of smelling good!
Bags tare easily.

review_body: They hold up to our trash needs and have a slight to moderate febreeze smell to them that seams to mask a small amount of odor.

review_body: just as advertised !  no issues or complaints !!
Works as expected
great price for a great product

There is something different about the material/durability used in these vs. the bags you can purchase at a store. When purchasing these in a store I don't think I've ever had one rip, but these are much less durable. Buy in store!
Strong bags,, but the Gain odor is a bit much for me!
Great quality just really wish there was an option for half siz sheets. I feel at times I dont need a full size sheet and have to tear half off.

Having Auto ship of this product saves me not just gas but an extra couple of trips to the supermarket. You can actually save more than buying to the whoesaler like Sams club and Costco. I like that each sheet is very absorbent and you don’t need to use that much. Will definitely continue my subscription
The quality first, then the price, but not enough papertowels on the roll
They work great and are at a wonderfully affordable bulk price.  Can't tell any real difference from them and a bigger name brand like Bounty, but maybe we're just not messy enough?
Almost as good as regular Bounty.  Buying by the case is the cheapest price I've found anywhere online.
Great product just good as name  brand STRONG HEAVY JUST WHAT I NEEDED GET JOB DONE  FOR PRICE
These are great especvfor the price. Comparable to Bounty Basic

review_title: Be sure to read the description close all the way through
review_body: Not really what I expected.I guess it is my fault I didn't read the info on the towels close enough.Rolls not as big as I thought they would be and not the select a size I was hoping for.I won't buy this brand again.

review_title: Good, but rolls are not double size. The old size.
review_body: Good thick paper towel, bu smaller rolls
Bought these in November. It's mid February now and we still have plenty. Very convenient and cost effective.

review_title: To save you from reading the full review yes we love the towels
review_body: I didn't make immediate review, I wanted to run them through several uses and wash cycles.  So here's my review after taking 7 towels one per day in the kitchen and three wash cycles.  We bought these towel in an attempt to go greener and quit using paper towels.  To save you from reading the full review yes we love the towels.  They are a great size and fit for our kitchen.  Very absorbent when you dry your hands you can feel the water wicking.  They performed every task in the kitchen above expectation in the three week we used less 1/4 of a roll of paper towel and that was mostly out of habit.  After three was wash cycles (really 4 we washed per instructions before use) they still look and perform as new.  So if you are looking to save a tree we highly recommend these towels.

I bought these because I want to cut down on paper towels.  They are light weight, but sturdy and wash well.  I did end up cutting off the tags as they got in the way.  I love cleaning with microfiber towels!  I love that there are three colors.  I can use the white ones in the kitchen and colored ones in the bathrooms.  I like keeping them separate.

review_title: they do not wash as well as I would like, the edges tend to curl quite a bit ...
review_body: I've used these cloths at my own house and others, and they are not on par with different brands of microfiber cloths I have used. I have a set that have been used/washed regularly for a year and they *still* leave behind small fibers on glass; and this is the major downside for me. Also, they do not wash as well as I would like, the edges tend to curl quite a bit making it a little difficult to get them folded neatly. However, for the price, they are still a good value and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend them for general cleaning applications.

These little rags are great for cleaning! I use them in lieu of Swiffer pads, and they clean wonderfully!. Aside from that, it makes cleaning a lot easier as you can colour code your cloths to different applications...for example, I use the yellow for the floor, and the blue for counter tops.. They're a great price, and are excellent rags

review_title: Used it on glasses, TV, mirrors, Nintendo DS, more
review_body: I've seen microfiber cloth packs at Costco, but never did buy them since I wasn't sure of if they'd work for us and because their bundles have far more than I thought I'd ever use. This purchase at Amazon was pretty much an impulse buy, but not one that I regret, at all.  We've used them on pretty everything made of glass or have glass-like surfaces including TVs, computer monitors, iPads, photo frames, glasses, ... and have been absolutely amazed how quickly they clean and with so little effort. Before I got these, I used to run a damp paper towel on my TV to get rid one layer of deposit, and then follow up with a lint-free cloth to clean up the water spots. And even then I was never satisfied with the result. Now, I simply run a microfiber cloth over my TV and I'm done in one short pass.  I especially love the fact that I don't need a screen protector for my iPads any more (those supposed protectors mar the look of those beautiful screens).  Others have written that more expensive ones work better.  Perhaps.  But these are all that I need!

review_title: Great for pretty much any purpose
review_body: Great for pretty much any purpose. I use them for my face, as my towels tend to be a bit to rough and can cause irritation to my sensitive skin. I would recommend them to anyone with particularly delicate skin. They aren't just good for the body however, I've found they are fantastic for cleaning glass and mirrors (without needing windex which always seems to leave smudging). All you need to do is lightly damp it and then clean the windows with the wet part of the cloth, and dry with a dry one, and you will have no smearing on your windows and mirrors. I'd imagine a larger size cloth would also be great for drying and washing the car, though these are a tad small for that task.

These are ideal for household cleaning tasks, are a perfect size and easy to handle.  They wash well, their colors are nice and they leave no residual lint.  I am very happy with them and would confidently say you would be too.

I must begin this review by saying that this is my first experience with microfiber cleaning cloths... I decided to give them a try because the lady that cleans my work office literally loves this type of cloths to clean around the office. With that just said... I am really disappointed. I don't know if my disappointment is with this particular item or with microfiber cleaning cloths in general, but I would definitely not buy this item again. I was not expecting a "wonder cloths", but based on the feedback that I got from the cleaning lady about this type of cloth, I thought that my experience would be better than the one that I get with regular kitchen towels or 3M cleaning cloths. Giving three stars because they do look nice and do the job, though.

review_title: Great Price, Decent Quality, the Quantity Will Go Far!
review_body: I've seen several people say these are cheap and barely qualify as microfiber. I am no professional in saying what real microfiber is, but for the price and quantity of the this product, I sure am impressed. They are very lightweight and feel wonderful. They have done a great job at dusting and soaking up messes so far, and I look forward to using them in the future. My brother has used them to clean dust off of his computer and computer parts with no problems. They do seem like they might easily come apart if they get caught on something like a nail or something similar, but I have yet to come across a problem like that. I definitely recommend these cloths!

I am disappointed in the AmazonBasics Microfiber Cleaning Cloth - 24-Pack. They are okay, but not great and fell short of my expectations. They are not nearly as absorbent as the microfiber cloths I’ve bought locally. They are thin and not very effective as drying my wet car.

review_title: No longer fits around my garbage can!
review_body: I have been ordering these garbage bags for a while now, and much to my dismay, they have been changed. They no longer fit around the bin in my garbage can! Why the he!! would Glad change something as basic as this!? Now when I attempt to line my garbage can, the bag tears, and is pretty much useless. SO disappointed. I guess it’s time for a new brand.

I just love these garbage bags, I had thrown away alot of trash, after reviewing ya'll on Amazon. I had simply put a broken DVD Player, and a broken VCR Box and by taking the change of using these trash bags it held both of them, it never broke through. I will recommend my friends to use them. It didn't fell me, I know it won't fell them. Instead of giving it 5 stars, I'm giving it 100 stars.. Thank you for having them on Amazon, Because in the stores they ARE way to expensive for me to buy, I like it online better because it's cheaper.

halfway through the first box, every bag was defective...there was a faulty cut about 2-3 inches below the string tie that ripped opened as you tried to open the bag and put it in the can. I believe i deserve a refund, and I hav pictures.... now i just have to ade through the bs, to find out where to file a complaint! any advice or suggestions welcome!

We loved Glad 13 gal kitchen garbage bags- but these with the BLACK PULL STRING are AWFUL. I don't even know if you can get regular Glad Red string ties anymore. But FORCE FLEX ARE TERRIBLE. DONT WASTE your money on this garbage.
I love having the string to tie but these can barely hold any weight without tearing. I'm very disappointed and thought glad was better than that :(

review_title: Gets the job done. But not the best.
review_body: They do okay for garbage bags. They don't really stay around my garbage can lid which is annoying. They always fall off and down into it. They also smell funny, like plastic. Other brands don't have these weird problems. Probably won't buy again in the future. But they get the job done.

review_title: No more busted and leaking bags!
review_body: What can you say about trash bags?. Since my children like to play the game of how much can be stuffed in the trash can before it has to be emptied, these have come in handy. No more busted and leaking bags as the children race for the door. What is it about emptying the trash before it is over flowing?. I like the convenience of ordering these through the pantry. Knowing that they will be delivered to my house is one less thing I have to remember to pickup at the store.

review_title: I can fill them higher and not worry about breakage like the cheaper ones and there are so many
review_body: I was skeptical, didnt't want to spend so much for garbarge bags, but it was worth the spend. I can fill them higher and not worry about breakage like the cheaper ones and there are so many, the box is lasting me a looong time.

Just when you think it's full, I use my 230 pound girth to stuff it down even further. It's certainly a project to get the bag out of the garbage can after I've compressed it, but these bags have yet to rip or tear.

I don't buy any other brand of paper towels anymore. I use these paper towels to clean up messes and they never fall apart on me. And now I've been spoiled by the choose-a-size. I love that I don't feel like I'm wasting a whole paper towel, if all I need is half of one.
They are paper towels. I am really not sure what else can be said? They are well-packaged and work just fine. It would be nice for Bounty to find some way to package these without plastic.
There is  rolls in this pack. These are family rolls/large rolls or 80 extra sheets. We always buy Bounty. They are stronger and better paper towels.

review_title: So much less waste with select a size

These are great because I have more control over how much I am using without having to tear paper towels in half all the time, which is what I do with other brands and full size sheets.

great item for the price . strong and durable.

love it
