No dishes to wash?  What's not to love.

I rarely ever say I hate something, but I hate this filter. It takes SO long to filter a pitcher of water. If I fill it at night it will still not be filtered in the morning. We drink several full pitchers of water a day and this filter cannot even filter one pitcher in a day. I have filled it in the morning after filling my kids water bottles and there will still be water in the top filtering that evening if I leave it alone all day. It is long lasting because you can only filter one pitcher a day 😕

They're okay. We have the big one sitting in our fridge and the water is definitely cooler and crisper than tap water. It's not quite bottled quality, but that could have something to do with the filters.. My one issue is that it's quite challenging, and a little annoying, to track when the filters need to be replaced.. Three months isn't a great measurement, since some times we refill it every other day and sometimes every other week. For the price you pay for these, you'd think that they can install some smart-chip that tells you when to replace a filter.. Still, we have one so we like it enough.

review_title: Be aware of how slow this filter does its job ...
review_body: Be aware of how slow this filter does its job.. I threw away the first one because I thought perhaps I had some sediment in my water which perhaps clogged it up (there had recently been construction on my street's water lines). Afterwards I started filling a plain pitcher first to settle out any sediment if there was any issue. Even with that precaution, the filter has still become very slow within a perhaps 30 uses. It is presently running at a rate of about 10 drips in about 7 seconds.. As long as your expectation of the speed of this filter are realistic, it's ok. I assume it is filtering lead though I have not tested it...

Arrived as pictured but.... I'll second at least one other purchaser and warn that this version of the filter does have a very annoying flaw; it does indeed frequently slide (up) out of the tube area meant to hold it. Of course, then the unfiltered water is able to stream along the sides and into the lower reservoir, mostly nullifying the purpose. If you simply try to push the filter back in, the water that made it between the filter housing and tube/upper reservoir wall acts like a lubricant, causing the filter to slide out of position even easier, more often.. For a simple, free fix, I cleaned and placed one of those rubber bands sometimes included around bundles of vegetables at the grocery market around the crown of the filter to increase the diameter and function as a seal. The caveat, it's very difficult to position the rubber band because, based on my testing, it must hug the very top edge of the filter for optimum results. Unfortunately, crown is slanted and smooth enough to cause the rubber band to slide down effortlessly. Hopefully, this method lasts throughout the life of each filter. If so, I can deem the hassle acceptable.

The Brita Replacepment Water Filters are for my 97 year-old mother.  She lives on the Gulf Coast of Florida and her grocery store was out of filters, so I ordered the three for her so she would have the ability to keep her Brita pitcher full of water through Hurricane Irma.  When I ordered it showed a delivery day for last Friday and then switched to next week but Friday morning it changed back and she received her filters in time to have them for use this next week.  I am very happy with the delivery of these on-time for to meet her needs!  They were also over $5.00 cheaper than they are at the local store.

review_title: What REALLY is Advanced About It?  Very Little IMHO.
review_body: I purchased a Brita filter that came with an Advanced filter but I bought an extra one just to have on hand.  It's been a long while since I have owned and used a Brita filter (or any filter for that matter) so this Advanced filter is something new.  From reading the description it seemed like it was a revolution in the old soaking of a new replacement filter and all that jazz.  But in reality there really isn't much of a difference between the old replacement filters and the Advanced ones in my opinion.  The "advanced" filters only mean that you don't have to soak them for (I can't remember the exact time) about 30-45 minutes.  I also can't remember off the top of my head the exact price difference between the old filters and the Advanced but there is a price increase for the Advanced.  If the difference is significant (say, more than a few dollars) I'd say save your money and just buy the non-Advanced ones.  With the Advanced filters you still have to run it for a few minutes under the faucet and you still have to throw out (or as Brita suggests: use it to water plants) the water from the first two or three filterings.  So really does that make it "Advanced"?

So, Brita filters are great. I was testing these baby’s out the other day. Unfortunately, I sometimes hate how slow the water comes out and all, especially on a hot day. Sometimes you just want cool refreshing cold water.  So, filled some containers this summer, with filtered brita water, right? I put them in the refrigerator. Friends came over on the weekend. They all drank water from these fancy glass containers I have. They were all like, dang, where you get your fancy water from? I was like, its Brita baby! They were all flabbergasted. I think Britas got some new customers.

review_title: Great tasting water that’s filtered clear and clean
review_body: I’ve been using Brita products for many years and have always been a happy customer. These filters are an update to the old design. They filter water really well and are super easy to use. They are advertised to fit all Brita pitchers. Although I cannot comment on this as I now have a new style pitcher. They fit right in and stay put until they need replacement. They’re rated up to 40 gallons, but that is relative to where you live and that water you have. I usually replace mine every three months with two people using the water pitcher. It’s recommended that the filter is rinsed under running cool water for 15 seconds before installing it in the pitcher. I then discard the first two filtered batches before using it. I’d recommend rinsing the pitcher and wiping it on the inside during the filter replacement since microscopic sediment settles overtime.. I got the 3-pack here through Amazon and it usually averages around five bucks per filter unless there’s a sale or a coupon available. I would recommend buying these directly through Amazon as some third-party sellers do sell fakes. Trust me, I’ve run into this with these filters and shaving razors. Generally if these are purchased through a trusted seller or a brick and mortar store, then it’s the real thing.. I’m very happy with these filters. The filtered is clear, clean and tastes great!

I love these filters. I drink over a gallon a day and buying water bottles was getting a bit expensive and annoying (having to buy 2 cases a week and then running out without knowing). These are the 2nd set I buy. The first set of 3 lasted me about 4 months. So I would say a month per filter which in my case is great considering I was spending over $20 in water bottles each month. It is very convenient and inexpensive. And I can have cold water everyday without having to remember to put more water bottles in the fridge after I take one.

review_title: Fake? Or did Brita just go way downhill?
review_body: I haven't bought true Brita filters in quite some time. Way back when they used to be shaped differently. I have instead gotten the cheaper generic brands but I tried these during a sale figuring the price per filter was only slightly more than the generic ones I was used to.. Well, I don't know if these are knockoffs, or if Brita just went ridiculously cheap on their low end filters. Because these are not filtering a damn thing. The water flows through them like it isn't even there. It is as if the filter is just a colander without and filtering material to slow it down even more.  Of course, I opened one, so I can't return it. But these are the last Brita filters I will ever purchase. Back to store brand knocks offs. Half the price AND they actually work.
I got tired of cheap paper towels that rip and feel like sandpaper.  These are so soft and very durable.  Worth the extra money.

review_title: Very Strong and Soft Paper Towels.
review_body: This product is so good, I can even use it as a substitute Kleenex for my nose.  Thank you. It is really handy!

review_title: Just feels weird and sticks to itself. Not strong
review_body: Days like.  Cloth but they feel weird. Roll sticks together. Not very strong for cleaning. Won’t order again

review_title: Smaller than usual rolls with more absorbant sheets.
review_body: These tear to a small size but they were small thin rolls yet plush sheets but not what I was expecting like with Bounty. It's just not my thing.
These really are the best paper towels.  They tear off perfectly nearly every time and truly can be used wet more than once.
These feel almost cloth like. They are soft enough to even use on a baby’s face. We won’t go back to scratchy paper feeling, disposable hand towels again.

review_title: These are ok. They are absorbent enough but when ...
review_body: These are ok. They are absorbent enough but when cleaning glass and mirrors, they leave LOTS of fuzz since they're made to be more "cloth-like".

review_title: The best - can actually REUSE like a rag
review_body: The best of all paper towels! You can actually use one, rinse it out like a rag, use it again, rinse again, etc., so long as you don't scrub some really rough surface.

review_title: I love these paper towels but should be called fabric towels ...
review_body: I love these paper towels but should be called fabric towels as they feel and work like cloth.  They may be a bit pricey, but worth it.
The best paper towels on the market! They are soft and strong and very absorbent! I don't use anything but these!

I did my research on mattress protectors before I chose this one.  Reviews do help, so here is mine.  This item does have a nice waterproof material (soft this pliable plastic) on one side an a terry cloth layer on the other.  There was no vinyl odor when I removed it from its packaging.  I washed and dried it according to their instructions, cold to hot wash settings depending on your needs, and, dry on low with other towels or sheets.  I suppose this would insure that you do not damage the plastic waterproofing.  Totally reasonable.  I purchased a different brand of mattress pillow top pad, for my old mattress, earlier, where all the value was in the pillow top itself.  I say this because the elastic around the Stearns and Foster pad that surrounds the sides of the mattress ripped immediately as I put it on.  Terribly thin and delicate.  I was so impressed and delighted with the sides on this SafeRest protector because it is so well manufactured and of high quality throughout.  So we have protection for our new mattress but can still benefit from our new "euro top" mattress.  Life is good.  Great product, SafeRest!  I highly recommend.

This mattress protector is thin, lightweight, and smooth. Doesn't make noise when tossing and turning.. I bought this for my daughter's mattress. She is fully potty trained but will have an accident once in a blue moon if she doesn't pee before bed. Well, the first night this was on, she decided to test it out. I was scared at first because her mattress was also brand new and this mattress protector was the only protection. But the mattress was completely dry after her accident.. I washed and dried it with the rest of her bedding and it came out just as nice as it looked when I first put it on.. I highly recommend this mattress cover to parents and to anyone who might accidentally spill anything while in bed!. I'll be getting one for each bed in the house!

I got a daybed and put it in a living area to be used for reclining, reading etc. and then as a bed for a guest. I purchased the SafeRest as a cover/protector for the mattress. I am very happy with the purchase. The cover fit perfectly and is soft and works well with the cover so that you wouldn't know it was there. I won't have to worry about damage being done to the mattress, or it not being good quality when used as a bed as it continues to protect. Nothing has spilled yet, thank goodness but I feel confident that the protector will do its job! I would buy this cover again and will recommend it.

I hardly ever write reviews, however i'm writing this one because i actually had this put to the test. I bought a new mattress and wondered whether I really needed a protector. Im so glad I decided to.. I only had this for two weeks, when the other night my black lab decided to sneek into bed with me one night. Well apparently sometime in the night he got sick and vomited all over the bed. I was horrified when I woke up and saw the mess. I thought for sure it had leaked through into the memory foam and ruined my new mattress. However much to my surprise the mess did not penetrate the cover and my mattress was unharmed. The only reason i won't give it 5 stars is because I was unable to fully get the stain out of the cover. I don't blame the protector because this mess would probably have stained anything. It's comfortable and definitely saved my mattress.

I am pleased with this purchase!  It is thin and easy to put on and take off of the bed, easy to launder (I washed in cold and dried on low), soft and comfortable under the bed sheets (does not cause sweating), and completely waterproof.  I washed it before using (as recommended), and was very happy with it on the bed.  Just few days later, my 2 year old had an accident right on my bed.  In the past, if this sort of thing happened, I've had to remove the sheets and a huge, bulky mattress protector -- which took up all the space in the washer/dryer (so I had to wash/dry it separately from the dirty sheets) and it took forever to dry (plus it was rather difficult to remove and put back on).  But with this protector, I easily stripped it and the sheets off and could easily fit the sheets and protector together in the wash.  Underneath, the mattress was as dry and clean as new.  Quick, clean, easy.  I'm very happy.  I will be buying more for each of my kids beds.

Great waterproof mattress pad. At first sight, you don't think it could work, but it is has thin interface of waterproof material on the other side of a soft thin terry cloth side. We have had these pads (bought two) for my elderly father to keep his bed topper dry. It has saved the day many times over. I recommend you place this on every bed you have if you have any risk at all of it getting wet. The other thing I like about it is the thin layer of protection so that there is no crinkling or noise, it is actually like waterproof fabric. Very cool.

review_title: It still works great. There have been a few times liquid has ...
review_body: I had tried other mattress protectors with little success.  They always seemed to leak through. I had an amazon gift card so I decided to try ordering one.  I did some research and decided on this one.  I did not have high hopes.  We are potty training and have a lot of accidents overnight.  I have had this for more than 6 months now.  It has been washed a lot.  I follow the instructions and wash it on warm, dry on low.  It still works great.  There have been a few times liquid has leaked through, but overall it works fantastic.  I am planning on purchasing one for all the beds in the house, just in case.

I love this mattress protector. First of all, it fit my king size mattress perfectly, and I think it’s priced fantastically. I sweat a lot while I sleep, and I know you shed a lot of dead skin cells etc. during the night, and since washing your mattress seems to be a bit difficult I felt like this is the perfect solution. The material is thick but comfortable and breathable, nothing will get through it, BUT it doesn’t make me extra hot or anything like that. I have a beautiful doggy that sleeps with me so protection between my mattress and her is also a must. I have a memory foam mattress and this in no way affected the feel of my mattress. My mattress is about 12 inches wide so it fit fantastic, it has space for a thicker mattress yet still fits my mattress. IT MAKES NO NOISE!! Overall this was one of those must buy items for me, it extends the life of my mattress tremendously.

This is an AWESOME item!!!  It REALLY works!!. This is SO much better than the old style waterproof mattress cover that was uncomfortable and make the "crinkle-crunch" noise all night every time you move or roll over.  My little boy still has trouble with peeing the bed, so this is a MUST!  the top of the cover is a very soft, plush material that you could actually use in place of a fitted sheet (since this is effectively a waterproof fitted sheet), it's THAT comfortable.  The underside is a plasticized type material that provides the "waterproof" function.  The entire thing is very thin and you will actually wonder, "will this really work?" - it SO DOES!!!  Completely machine washable and dryable!  I just throw it in the wash with other towels or sheets, then throw them all in the dryer (it will dry much better with other items than alone, so that it gets tossed around the dryer better, rather than just clinging to a side).

Works pretty well.  I would say 100% waterproof is an exaggeration.  It will block liquid for a short amount of time.  If your kid wets the bed and tells you about it right away so you can take the cover off then it's fine.  If he wets the bed and just takes his wet clothes off, moves to a dry part of the bed and falls back asleep and you don't find out until the next morning, well at some point it eventually soaks through.  I don't think it was designed to repel liquid that long.. The good part is that it doesn't feel plasticy so to me the trade-off is worth it.
A lot of savings!
Always reorder this paper towel
Can’t beat Bounty’s quality and with Subscribe and Save Its a perfect match.
great deal, lots of towels
This is our favorite brand of paper towels!
Good quality. Easy to store in bulk and convenient to use
Cleans the mess with one swipe.

review_title: Can't go wrong with quick size
review_body: It's Bounty,... of course it's good!

review_title: Its very good I can order what I need and it's there
review_body: Its very good  I can order what I need and it's there
I like having plenty of paper towels
Very thin and the don’t tear easily. But for the price, what did I expect.
Sorry but these are only meh. Not horrible quality but decent. Kind of thin and tough. Don’t think I’ll purchase this brand next time.

The product is fine. This is regarding the packaging. The photo is how it was delivered to my house. On the bottom it is almost completely open as well. Surprised it got here with none of the rolls missing. Paper towels do their job.
paper towel quick what can I say. second time have ordered - good price good value. Sure better and thicker towels, but not at this price
Wonderful paper towels. Absorbant, strong. Wouldn't buy anything else.

review_title: I don't like the fact that the price changes a lot on ...
review_body: I don't like the fact that the price changes a lot on this item, but every once in a while I can get this at a great deal, but the item itself is wonderful, I don't use anything else

review_title: Rough, falls apart easily and not that absorbent
review_body: Rough, falls apart easily and not that absorbent. Probably best used to wipe up sticky, gooey, messy things like glue, caulking, or material that needs to be disposed of immediately. Half size sheets allow easy conservation of towels. Do not use on your face or other sensitive areas of the body. This is the second least durable, least absorbent towel product I've ever used. It is by far the roughest.I would not use this product again.. These are not really a kitchen product. But if you want half sized sheets that are cheap and used quickly then tossed, this might work in a shop.

review_title: Great deal - select-a-size is the way to go
review_body: My wife loves these - great price and the select-a-size is a huge cost saver.
Just as expected. Not sure what else to write. It's a big box of paper towel.
I appreciate the deal that I get and the convenience. This product works well and I will continue to order them.

These 18x18 pillows are great ! Just perfect for throw pillows , I bought covers for them on Amazon and just love them too , I would buy more of these pillows as I already bought 4 for my living room ,
These are absolutely adorable & fit a standard pillow perfectly! The problem: the first time you wash these the black writing fades drastically. Such a bummer!

review_title: Nice amount of give to the pillow
review_body: Appreciated the instructions on what size to buy. I was afraid it would be too big but it fit the case I made perfectly. Nice amount of give to the pillow.

review_title: This is a good poly filler
review_body: This is a good poly filler, nice and thick, but soft.  I'm not purchasing down filler anymore due to the cruelty of removing down feathers from ducks.  I'm very happy with the three polyester pillow stuffers I purchased!
Well it's fluffy, but not fluffy enough to fill the 18x18 sham. Tough to tell though, what with every reviewer's opinions being different. I guess it all depends on the sham you buy.
Thanks. As pictured

review_title: Initially they fit good, were snug
review_body: Bought two of these pillow inserts in size 24"x 24" for two pillow covers that are smaller (22" x 22").  Initially they fit good, were snug, but over time (6 months) they seemed to have shrunk (did not wash). My pillow covers are now much too large for the inserts inside. How can this be when the covers are 2" smaller than the inserts?  Not happy that I have to order new pillow inserts.  Would not recommend.
After using these for a few months they are completely flat. I will have to replace them. They are good enough for decoration but we use them in the couch and they just didn't hold up.

review_title: Go with the same sized pillow
review_body: I ordered four of these inserts in 18" x 18" for my 18" pillows. The fit was perfect. The shape was exactly what I wanted without looking overstuffed.

review_title: You get what you pay for
review_body: I thought I was getting a great deal but the pillows feel cheap. They don't fill the pillow cases. I spent $13 and I'm much happier.

I purchased two of them. One of them doesn’t work at all. If I’m being completely honest, I don’t have the time or patience to un-duct tape the lights from where I put them, and put them in UPS in time for the return to be valid. There should be an option for me to just request a new product for free. The item doesn’t work and they would just throw it away, anyway. I wouldn’t mind as much if there was more time for me to return it. Kinda upset that I wasted $17, but I can’t find a contact email anywhere, so I suppose I’ll complain publicly. The set that does work looks very nice.

review_title: Many lights don’t work. Short cord.
review_body: 20% of the lights do not work unless you jiggle the strands just right and then don’t move them. The Plug cord is too short and ends up high. You’ll need an unsightly extension cord to run UP YOUR WALL to plug this in.

Ordered 2 of these. One works great and the other didn't work at all. I ordered these to a friend in the US who brought them to me in a different country, so I had to wait for them and couldn't get the broken one back on time for a refund. Very dissappointed. If you live outside the US do NOT order from this company because their stuff might be BROKEN. I am waiting for a esponse from the company. If I get a refund or a new set of lights I will change my review.

review_title: Nice and a good value too
review_body: So cute... and perfect for our party needs. I bought several, but only needed one. Took about 10 minutes to get them straight and hung up, so not too bad. The are "warm" lighting, not the usual LED bright blue/white look... so that was great!

review_title: Easy cute way to spruce up the room!
review_body: The strands are much further apart than in the picture.  There are only 10 down strands connected to the length across the top.  We ended up doubling it over itself. We then made sure to place the second layer of strands alternate from the first layer.  She is very happy and was pretty easy.  Took us about 30 minutes including the unwrapping and curtain measuring and everything.  Also we used the small clear command hooks on the wall to secure both the lights and the curtains.

I LOVE these. They were so easy to hang, I just wrapped them around my curtain rod and viola. They come wrapped up nicely so nothing gets tangled. My cats are obsessed with them tho so beware of animals destroying them. They have several great modes and I have gotten lots of compliments on them when they are in twinkle mode.

One of the strands did not light. Despite this, it looks cool behind sheer curtains. With it already being broken, I'm not sure how long they'll last. Because of this we will probably find a different product for our wedding backdrop.

review_title: These are beautiful, my complaint is that the cord from the ...
review_body: These are beautiful, my complaint is that the cord from the ceiling to the ground is only about three feet long so unless you have an outlet at eye level you are going to need to use an extension cord. also there is no way to turn them off without unplugging them, I ended up putting mine on a timer so they would turn on and off at specific times.

These were super pretty while they lasted. I've had them installed in my front window for about 2 to 3 weeks set on a timer and they won't turn on anymore. It appears that there are some damaged wires, not sure if this was from our own use or a manufacturing issue that lead it to be more delicate than most lights.

review_title: Really Cute Lights, But Came With Packaging Opened
review_body: We just bought these lights 2 days ago and finally hung them up, and I couldn’t be more pleased! It goes well with our living room and perfect for our college apartment. The only issue i had was the fact that the item wasn’t new. The packaging wasn’t sealed and there were some defects on two of the bulbs. Other than that, we’re happy about our purchase!
I love that this item is small,lightweight and powerful, but the working time is too short 😕

review_title: I t removes wrinkles very well!
review_body: The steamer is the answer to my prayers.  It actually does the job. Although I like to iron,  I like steaming better.  It is great for daily issues as well as traveling with wrinkled clothes issues.  Thank you fro a simple good product that works.  J. Craig
I love the way that this steamer is fast to warm up and does a fantastic job on wrinkles. I also love the fact that this is a company that hires those with special needs.
I like the ease of operating the steamer. I steamed my husbands dress shirt in less than 5 minutes. It turned out great! The steamer will be packed for all our travels.

review_title: First time for me to use a seamer so I ...
review_body: First time for me to use a seamer so I have nothing to compare it to. But it seems to run out of water rather quickly and I find it spits water when you first start it up. I bought it for the thrift store that I volunteer at to press the clothes that come in, I do think it will be helpful.

review_title: First unit defective but fast customer service response and ship time got me a properly functioning product very quickly.
review_body: I received this steamer yesterday 4/5/18 and was really looking forward to using it on a trip next week. I filled it, heated it and used it on my husband's work shirt and it was amazing! I was so impressed that I had to try it again so I grabbed a knot cotton shirt from my closet. This steamer just spewed water all over the place. It was still in the fill zone but was boiling and spitting water like a rabid dog. It was disappointing for sure. I will give it another shot but, sadly, I think this one is going back.. UPDATE 4/16/18 - After my original review, the company contacted me to say it sounded like my product was defective and they sent another one immediately. The second unit works as expected and doesn't spit boiling water, so I'm updating my review.

review_title: Great product would be better if it held more water
review_body: Works really well. Only complaint is that it doesnt hold enough water to get through one shirt completely. But it isnt hard to refill and Works quickly.

My first impression was that it was a lot smaller that I thought it would be. But so far, so good. It's quick and easy to use. It  only holds enough water to do a few articles of clothing. I think I can fully steam 2-3 shirts and 2 pants. That works for me though.Just a few things to note: It takes a few minutes to heat up. There's no trigger to release steam like a iron... It constantly goes. Overall, it gets the job done. It's perfect for last minute de-wrinkling.

review_title: It was quick easy and did a perfect job
review_body: I purchased one for me and one for my daughter.  I used it right away.  It was quick easy and did a perfect job.  Not a wrinkle in less than 3 minutes. No effort at all.  I love that I don't have to iron anymore.  I also love that it is small.  I can bring it with me on vacation.  Most of ALL, thank you for hiring the special needs.  I have a son who has special needs and I am grateful when employers understand.  I will purchase from your company in honor of the special needs.

review_title: whereas a heat gun can overheat the window tint film adhesive making things possibly worse. This unit worked great for this
review_body: Interestingly, I purchased this steamer for the purpose of removing window tint from a vehicle that failed a MD state inspection for window tint being too dark (MD can be quite lame).  Using a steamer as opposed to a heat gun is preferred because the heat stays around 212-Deg F, whereas a heat gun can overheat the window tint film adhesive making things possibly worse.  This unit worked great for this.  It was just the right size and weight for one hand, while the other peeled the film away from the glass.  Great price too.

review_title: Unscented Dry Swiffer Pads work well with iRobot Braava 380t Robot Mop
review_body: I was having trouble finding FRAGRANCE-FREE dry Swiffer pads in stores, so I am glad I found these on Amazon. I attach them to my . , which I also love, and now it's so easy to keep my hardwood and tile floors clean, without any irritating perfumes.

review_title: They work especially great on hardwood floors
review_body: I've been using a Swifter Sweeper with dry sweeping cloths for years. They pick up everything. They work especially great on hardwood floors.You don't have to drag out a vacuum for a quick touch up on hard floors. I have two huge never-ending shedding dogs. In a few minutes, you would never know they were in the house. Great product!

review_title: Keeps dust out of the air when cleaning. I use them in my hand to wipe.
review_body: These really do work so well! I had a sample pack that came in with a Swiffer kit I bought for school. I used the dry wipes to clean bookshelves in the library. The dust was picked up and did not swirl around in the air. Now I use them at school all the time! No matter how dirty they get, I can really get up more dust with them. I also have them at home and my housekeeper loves them! Less chemicals. Less papertowel. Less dust in the air.

review_title: Great dust cloths!  I buy them regularly when I run out from dusting with them!
review_body: I buy these regularly, as they really work to pick up dust.  Dusting is much easier with these and then no other product is needed, just wipe these over anything, as long as the surface is relatively smooth.  I don't use these on the floor with a mop, I use them as dust cloths.

review_title: Unscented Swiffer Dry Pads. This is the right one.
review_body: We have used, and loved Swiffer Dry Pads for years. Amazon offers so many options. We prefer the unscented. By checking the per use costs, we found this item the best value. So, jump right in and get yours.. I recommend this exact box, for you.. Enjoy.

review_title: these do a fantastic job. I have two cats and a dog ...
review_body: Compared to sweeping with a broom, these do a fantastic job.  I have two cats and a dog and even after sweeping with a broom, I followed up with these and it grabbed so much more.  I use these dailys now then sweeping and it makes it so much quicker to get the housework done daily.

review_title: Handy and fast for picking up that fur/dust, etc.
review_body: Housekeeper uses them every other week or so alternating between a wet mopping and using the Swiffer. The boxes are easy to store and do a decent job of picking up various types of fur/lint/dust.

I love the product but will not be ordering again because we live in a front street apartment in a busy section of the city and the refills arrived in original thin packaging.  Bright green and name of product on package for anyone walking by to see.  What?  Why?
Works as intended. Picks up dirt really well. I attach it to my Swiffer and use hard floor cleaner.

review_title: Great for dog hair and light dirt and sand
review_body: I have a large dog that is a shedding machine.  These help me keep the dog hair under control between vacuumings.

review_title: Reading will vary by +/- 2 lbs within a few minutes in same location... accuracy?
review_body: My floor is uneven in some places, so I've weighed myself all around the apartment to see where the weight reads the same, thinking those are relatively flat and dependable locations to continue to weigh myself.  However, I will weigh myself in the kitchen, then the living room, bathroom, etc, and return to the same spot in the kitchen, oriented in the same exact direction, and the weight will be +/-2 lbs.  I know my weight doesn't fluctuate 2 lbs in 6 minutes.

review_title: It’s accurate and comes with a bonus feature.
review_body: Tells me exactly how fat I am. Not thrilled but it does it’s job and I can appreciate that. Also has a multipurpose feature; put it in front of the pantry and it does a good job at blocking you from the chips and cookies.

review_title: Hundreds have been sold to happy customers
review_body: Having read some of the other reviews, I have the following to say: Maybe "German technology," however it was actually Made in China. The 2 included batteries were also Made in China, but so what?...Lots of good stuff is Made in China. When the batteries (2 triple AAA's) wear out....Insert new ones....No big deal, me thinks. BTW the batteries are to be positioned with their "butt" against the spring, as is usually, if not always, the case. Therefore they can be inserted in the dark. All this being said, it is good looking and works as advertised. Zero it by stepping on it and waiting for signal to mount....Zeros, as in 00. Love the back light! Gives accurate and consistent readings, which stabilize within seconds after mounting. Contains CAUTION: "Slippery when WET." Nicely packaged. Looks like it will be easy to clean with glass cleaner. Instructions are included. Only time will tell how it works out.

review_title: Etekcity Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale - AWESOME!
review_body: We "LOVE" this scale and am thrilled with this purchase!  With our previous scale we would have to tap first to light it up and would see it provide different numbers every time you stood on it, got off and got back on!. With the Etekcity, you step on the scale, it lights up and immediately shows your weight by flashing!!!  I went to the doctors office the other day and when weighed there it was exactly what I weighed before leaving home!  This scale is a keeper!!!

review_title: Gets a ballpark reading somewhere near the actual weight; but still weighs the same thing as two different readings.
review_body: I got it to replace a digital scale that clearly doesn't weigh accurately because it weighs the same thing and gives two separate readings.. Unfortunately, so does this one.  Oh well.. (Last Saturday, I weighed myself and got 165.0 and 163.4 pounds.  The other scale that has similar problems weighed me as 163.2.  So the 163.4 on this one may be more accurate than the 165.0.  But what did I weigh actually?  This scale clearly isn't up to telling me.  Neither is the one I got it to potentially replace.). I hope I can find one that weighs to hundredths of a pound instead of tenths and always weighs the same thing with the same reading!. I'd pay double for one that does what I paid for this one.

I am very disappointed and dissatisfied with this scale. When I inserted the batteries that were supplied the numbers on the scale were just going willy wonky. I set the scale on a flat service and tapped it to get it to zero out and it never did, the numbers just kept increasing and decreasing. Finally I just put different batteries in it and it zeroed out. However, when I stepped on the scale, it never gave me a reading, the numbers just scrolled. Ugh, I just need a decent scale! I set the box aside with the intention of returning and the next day my husband had thrown the box with the special shipping material away! I just chalked it up as a loss and money down the drain. Do not recommend this product.

Frustrated with the scale.  The digital display is too small to be seen if you're a) tallish and b) if you need glasses in the morning.  The weight display is very sensitive to where / how you're standing...if you shift your weight the scale won't lock in so you really need to remain still...very annoying.  That said, this is a no-tap scale and I did check the accuracy against a known weight and it was within 1%. Very thin but nice construction and it looks very durable.

review_title: Couldn't ask for a better scale
review_body: After not owning a scale for several years, I wanted to get something that wouldn’t break the bank, but still be pretty accurate.  I’ve had this scale for a little over 2 months now, and it works perfectly!  Many digital scales I’ve owned in the past would be so inaccurate that I’d have to step on them 3 or 4 times, and then average out my weight.  This brand, it doesn’t matter how many times I step on it, the reading is the same every time.  It’s heavy enough not to slip around on the floor, and I’ve already dropped a few items on it, and so far, luckily the glass seems to be strong enough to withstand some amount of abuse.  While this isn’t an expensive scale, it certainly doesn’t look “cheap”.  It’s very modern looking and blends in seamlessly into the décor of my bathroom.  Great product!

review_title: The output is backlit making it easy to read even in the dark
review_body: Simple but effective, not an complicated to use, automatically turns on when stepped on. The output is backlit making it easy to read even in the dark. Scale is precise to within a tenth of a pound, which is good for any average user trying to track weight. Very sleek appearance and the scale was reasonably priced. The scale came nicely packaged and included the needed batteries. Overall a excellent purchase for the price.

review_title: Very accurate scale .... possibly too accurate
review_body: Great scale. I love the digital readout. Much easier to read than the old one that my Grandma gave me from the 1980's. I had to count the little lines to see how much weight I had gained. I decided to buy a new scale when my brother in law told me that my 1980's scale was off. As expected, I was excited to think that I weighed less than what my old scale showed. To my surprise, he was right, the scale was off. However not in the direction I had hoped. My old scale actually showed your weight 6lbs lighter than you actually were. This scale is accurate.... too accurate. Now I know I weigh 6 lbs more than I thought. I was disappointed. Not in the scale, but in myself. You would think that I would make changes to my diet and exercise with the new information. Wrong. I still weigh the same. The scale is now hidden underneath the dining room cabinet. Thanks!
Some bags had a hole in them, wasn't usenbale.
These are our normal use kitchen bags, and we're happy with the quality and value provided.
Smell is stronger than I expected but after all I can't smell garbage)
This scent is the same that I use for everything all through the house- laundry, air fresheners, etc. good stuff! I like having so much too, ain't no body got time to run out of trash bags!!
great buy for the money. will last a very long time being single.
So these are supposed to be scented...they’re not.
Best bags on the market!
Great price

review_title: I love Glad anyway so having the extra bonus of an ...
review_body: I love Glad anyway so having the extra bonus of an amazing scent is always welcome. The scent is strong enough to overpower the trash, yet light enough to not overpower my nose.
Love Glad bags and love scent of Gain!  Who could ask for more?  I love them considering we are talking about trash bags!
Great, durable, affordable, and I love that they offer in bulk!

review_title: You get what you pay for!
review_body: They’re ok quality. Run out fast but the price is fair. Please let me know if my reviewed helped you or was helpful
Great paper towels for the price! I was expecting thin paper and it’s much thicker than store brand.
Great quality paper towels for the price of these!  Will purchase again.
Great quality paper towel. Honestly it's the same quality as bounty, maybe not quite as soft but works great!
These lasted a while, not as thick as other brands but gets the job done

review_title: It's paper towel. If you want paper towel buy ...
review_body: It's paper towel.  If you want paper towel buy it.  If you don't want paper towel don't buy it.
Great paper towel.  Will continue to subscribe and save
Nice alternative to Koch brothers products. Satisfies a need.
Good price, but the towels tear unevenly. A minor annoyance.

review_title: Decent quality for a good price
review_body: These are by no means the best microfiber cloths I've ever bought, but they are certainly good enough.  Unlike higher quality microfiber cloths, these have serged edges rather than hems, so over time they may fall apart faster.  Also, they have that unpleasant stick-to-your-hands quality that cheaper microfiber always seems to have.  However, those complaints aside, I am surprised at how nice they are given how inexpensive they were.  You may want to wash these when they arrive; some of mine had minor smudging on them (dirt?) and some scraps of material caught in the folds.  I washed mine, and they came out fine with no warping or shrinkage.

review_title: Was expecting these to be softer
review_body: I really did not like these. I was expecting softer cloths like other microfiber cloths I have. I was planning to use them to wash my face, take my makeup off etc. These are too rough for that purpose. Previously I bought microfiber kitchen cloths and they were much softer so I am a bit confused why this is so dramatically different. They're not terrible and will work for cleaning but I was disappointed it was much rougher than other microfiber products I used.

review_title: Good value but the yellow towels bleed color in the wash!
review_body: In an effort to save water and energy, I tossed mine all into one wash. The white towels came out light yellow, darn! I bought this set for the white towels but now I have blue, yellow, and light yellow towels. Oh well. Still a good value for the price but wash separately if you want to keep the white towels white!

They're just okay. The cloths aren't very dense, thus a lesser level of absorption compared to more premium cloths.. The description also states that it doesn't leave lint, this is false and certainly leaves a bunch of lint.. I use microfiber cloths on my eyeglasses and mainly got these for household purposes as well as my eyeglasses. They leave a bunch of fibrous lint. Definitely not recommended for glassware or eyeglasses.

The towels are extremely thin - perhaps the thinnest microfiber I have ever seen. Towels are starting to die after just a few uses.. Amazon Basics products are usually no frills but good quality. This product is an exception. I won't bother to send these back - but I will not buy again and I dot recommend these to anyone.

After washing the cloths one time, I noticed significant wear and tear. The ends started curling upwards so the cloths do not lie flat (not a big deal, but just an FYI). The cloths are a huge lint magnet. Bits of fluff and lint will get stick in the ridges of the cloth. Using a lint roller does not work. I have to manually pick out all the pieces of lint with my fingers.

review_title: Great deal on a bag of rags
review_body: I use these on my Mustang which is basically the greatest supercar on earth, so you can trust them on whatever pile of junk you're driving.. Added bonus is that you get three colors so you can keep them separate. One for drying the car, one for drying the wheels and one for drying your tears as I peel off with your girlfriend.
Excellent value for microfiber cloths. There is some shedding when I first started using them before their first wash. This was only a real problem when buffing chrome or washing windows.

they are electrostatic, so they dust well! but they are thin, so when wiping, it wrinkles and crinkles up. if you do the light test, it shows it not best quality. Great for dusting, but not polishing or glass or mirror, as it streaks dust, even if i use a sepearate cloth to dust first (i am a house cleaner). disappointing polyster/polymade ratio: 90:10. should be at least 20% polymade. if you want cheap cloths for dusting or to aply product with (like wood or leather stuff, this is your product

review_title: These towels are awesome. I use the blue ones to clean the ...
review_body: These towels are awesome.  I use the blue ones to clean the inside of my car (leather seats and dashboard).  I use the yellow ones to towel dry after washing my car.  They are not as good as a giant sham-wow, but using about 5 will do a great job of drying the car streak free.  They also ring out water easily and can be re-used.  I use the white ones for dusting and cleaning my house.  They are the perfect size and useful for many different things.  They are thick and soft and have been through the wash numerous times and have not worn out yet.

review_title: Decent strength garbage bag. Sometimes you have no idea what you ...
review_body: Decent strength garbage bag. Sometimes you have no idea what you are going to get online. I bought some cheaper garbage bags once that would literally tear giant holes just from GENTLY removing them from the can. Ever since then, I've been particular about getting strong ones. These are strong without being overpriced.

Fairly strong plastic, not very many times the bag has leaked on us. We have had many bags filled with bottles and cans and have not experienced much of a problem. My main issue with this bag is it does not stay wrapped around the top of our trash can. We have have used many different brands and most of them don't fall into the bottom of the trash can. Great price though.

Good bags that I get with the Subscribe and save option delivered free each cycle. I do wish they were a little stronger but they seem consistent with other bags around. Heavy or full bags can cause the the pull/tie to rip free if you're not careful. This size is perfect for the standard size kitchen garbage can. Overall it's a decent value.

review_title: A good brand, with good service
review_body: Probably could have paid less elsewhere, even with Prime, but the free delivery was great and the bags don't leak or get holes in them. We make a lot of trash since we're changing diapers a lot, and these bags keep us from having to constantly change out the bags. They are fine for holding messy, wet garbage, and though they don't control odor, they never promised that they would. They're worth purchasing again.

review_title: The best and cheapest way to garbage bags
review_body: I have this on Subscribe and save for every 3 months. This is the strongest and the quantity of 90 makes it the cheapest way to order garbage bags. I researched Amazon for this for about an hour. The ribbon closure also works great

review_title: My go-to garbage bags. They're really strong and hold a lot
review_body: My go-to garbage bags. They're really strong and hold a lot. I feel like I can stuff a lot of trash into one bag without fear of the bag ripping. And they don't leak like a lot do.
can't beat the price, exactly as pictured and arrived on time with no damage, fit my garbage can great, puncture somewhat easier than I had thought they would

I purchased this prduct on 12/06/216 and began using it. So far, I ave encountered several bags that are defective. The seams are not joined on one side leaving it open and useless. The box (container) says the product is guaranteed, but there is no information on how to contact the mfgr tor reporting the defect..
OMG! I have an 11 gallon garbage can, and the “13” gallon bags may be 13 gallons, but that are not tall, at all!  They are wide and useless.  Wish I would have seen reviews before purchasing.

review_title: I'll never buy cheap bags again!
review_body: I grew up with a mom that bought the most inexpensive of everything, so I never really thought that a more expensive garbage bag was worth it...I was wrong. These bags are totally worth it! The pull strings never rip out, and I've never had a leak. They were priced well too since I do the subscribe & save option

I love bounty but I like the full size paper towels only

Dixie is one of the most go to paper plates in my house. We rely on the sturdy and thick plates a lot during the summer. We have a lot of cookouts, dinners, and celebrations. It prevents us from washing dishes over and over. I love the Dixie plates because they are never boring and they always have some sort of nice design on them. It keeps it stylish and that way people at our gatherings do not feel like they are getting cheap plates. We are southerners and we love to cook, so we need a plate that is going to hold some food! Dixie plates do the trick every single time for us. The economy pack usually lasts us a couple of weeks or more. They do not get soggy and tear apart which is a great detail that we look at when we make the purchase.

liked

I love these plates. The print is cute and they’re sturdy. Perfect for when you really don’t feel like doing dishes!
Dixie makes a good produce

review_title: "New and improved" filters. Not even close Brita!
review_body: I wish I could leave this zero stars. Ever since Brita changed their filters things have gone downhill. Before this our water tasted really good from our pitcher then they went to these new and improved filters which is a joke, and now our water tastes like salt and chlorine. The bottom of the filter has a disgusting smell after two weeks. We have stopped using this pitcher sadly, because we loved it, and we will never buy anything else from Brita. We are going to look in two different alternatives now. Beware. Don't waste your money on these if you have this pitcher!!!!!! We tried all three and all three filters were disgusting after following the instructions!! For the sake of your health get something different!!!

review_title: I at least think it's better
review_body: If the filter does indeed work for as long as they say, then it will be worth the price. I also like that there is no charcoal mess with these. I can't run a water purity analysis, but it certainly tastes better than the tap and the heavy chlorine smell is gone. If you are bothered by the amount of time it takes to filter the water, keep it topped off. Another reviewer said it well (and it makes very good sense): longer filtering time equals better filtering. If nothing else, I feel better about the quality of the water compared to the standard filters where it appeared the water was just running through and picking up a little charcoal flavoring.

review_title: Be Prepared to Feel Smug about What a Great Purchase You Made!!!
review_body: The water from my tap is so thick with minerals, etc., you could practically chew it.  However, these filters--in combination with my basic Britta pitcher, scrub the water so that it is clear and fresh-tasting.  I can't see any particulate matter in my water after it passes through these filters.  Furthermore, given their capacity, I can use mine about two months before replacing them--and I use them even for clearing my cooking water (who wants dull-tasting sauces?).. Once I gave my coffee maker a through cleaning, I began to exclusively use the filtered water in my morning coffee, which tastes richer, livelier and smoother.  It really is like getting a new coffee maker.. These replace all of my bottled water and create a much smaller environmental footprint.

Waste of money.  I bought these refills in addition to the pitcher.  I was sick for a month, couldn't figure out why, then I read more reviews on line.  100's of folks had the same horrible gastric symptoms, headaches, and didn't know why until this commonality was discovered in a group.  I cannot say for sure, but when 100's of people are having the same complaints while using, then the symptoms cvompletely go away after stopping... you be the judge.

I love that these filters remove lead. That was my number one reason for buying them. A little pricey but living in an old house where the water can be discolored at first, these filters add a level of comfort knowing I’m drinking clean water. However, I purchased these on February 14, 2018 (happy Valentine’s Day to me...) and on March 4, 2018, it takes nearly an hour to filter the volume of water a standard Brita pitcher holds. One. Drip. At. A. Time. See the video attached. That’s my reason for 3 stars. I did not expect the filters to take THAT long. You have to be really cognizant of how much water you have given how long it’ll take to filter. Not great for cooking or washing vegetables (you’ll run out of clean water too fast and it takes too long to filter).

review_title: Do not buy unless you like waiting 3 hours after each refill!
review_body: I'm only giving this product 2 stars and not 1 since it does filter the water... eventually. I have had this filter for a month now and it is a real pain every time I need to refill the pitcher. I thought buying this filter rather than 3 at a time would save packaging and also not have to think about replacing a filter every month or so. If I had known that this filter would take about 3 hours to filter water every time I filled the pitcher, I would have kept ordering the regular filters. I understand that since this is a longer lasting filter, that the filter will take longer to purify the tap water. But waiting 3 hours each fill up is beyond excessive. It's gotten to the point that I can't possibly keep this for another 2-4 months until I need to replace it. It is aggravating to say the least. Especially since it's summer and we drink a lot more water this time of year. We might pass out from dehydration before the pitcher fills with cleaned water!. I have taken the steps that other's have mentioned: taking out the filter and hitting it a bit to get air bubbles out (doesn't help), re-soaking & running the filter under cold water for 15 seconds (doesn't help) and I've made sure that the filter has been properly inserted and created a seal.. Bottom line, this is a filter for water and it does just that. But a 3 hour water fill up is unacceptable. I have been using Brita filters for at least 15 years now and have never had a problem like this one. I will be replacing this filter with the regular filters from now on. I just wish I could get my money back for such a crummy product.

I bought the 3-pack filters elsewhere. However, I found that the new filter style leaked some water down the side of the filter after the install, instead of going through the inside element. After looking at it, I pushed down harder on the replacement filter to seat it correctly. The upper lip of the replacement filter is now just below the lower lip of the housing. That fixed the problem. Now all water exits through the four holes in the filter bottom. The older filters did not require as much elbow grease. Hope this helps those complaining about leaking filters or tap-tasting filtered water. We've enjoyed our Brita for years and I hope it continues to last.

Brita is my favorite brand of water filter! I generally change my filter every 2 months (without letting the filter dry out) and it has made my tap water taste so much better. This 3 pack is the perfect amount for me and having back up filters available is ideal for busy schedules since this ordering a new filter slips my mind now and then. In the correct type of pitcher, these filters will fit snugly, creating a water tight seal that will allow efficient filtering. The price for 3 filters is pretty reasonable and they are worth the money to have drinkable water at home. One thing to note is that on this item's sales page it says that you do not need to soak the filter prior to use. However, the instructions that come with the package says that you should soak the filter before use! This is not that much of a hassle and it helps to get rid of any black flecks that may come out. Overall, I would highly recommend this product and other Brita brand products.

Brita replacement filters - what more can I say.  They work well in my UltraMAX reservoir.  The only issue I've had is that occasionally one will pop loose if the water volume in the post-filter area gets past about 3/4 full. This usually happens after the filter has been in use a while, so I am not sure of the cause (the container never gets moved, so it isn't being bumped loose).  Not a big deal, by any means, but it is annoying.  Also, with the most recent lot of filters we bought, I've noticed that there is a definite "bleach-y" odor to the water if it sits in the reservoir for more than about 48 hours.  I would say it is simply the city flushing the water system (we filter our tap water), but the odor isn't present when I draw water from the faucet.  It doesn't seem to affect the taste, but it isn't very appealing, either.  Since we use this water primarily for the coffee pot and making iced tea, it hasn't really been a big deal.

While I like Brita and I like that these last a long time, they take FOREVER to filter water. I have a large tub style one and I can fill it with water at night and there have been times where it has still had a little water left to filter in the morning. I'm hoping that means my water is nice and clean but you do not get to drink quickly.

review_title: Great Paper Towels but not a Great Price
review_body: I love these paper towels. They are great for cleaning as they hold up better than other products. These are much smaller rolls than I purchase at Walmart. I was able to use a coupon so it made it worth purchasing on Amazon but Walmart has a better price.
These are good at soaking mess but horrible texture and rip easily. My kids have a hard time getting them off the roll because they cling to one another
My favorite paper towels, wish they were cheaper like when they first came out... but worth the money lobe them. They are the best...
Super soft and strong. It sticks to itself though, like velcro...makes it kind of makes it a pain to tear along the perforated line.

review_title: These work great and on subscribe & save price lower than other ...
review_body: These work great and on subscribe & save price lower than other brands and comparable in price to Walmart, saving me another trip there. Love my subscribe & save stuff!
Love these paper towels.  They're really strong.  I have a bad habit of leaving them in my pockets and they even survive going through the wash!

review_title: I use this soft towel for massage face sheets or ...
review_body: I use this soft towel for massage face sheets or wiping mirrors - they are soft and an upgraded paper towel.
Good deal on strong paper towels. The select-a-size is the only way to go. This is my go-to brand.
I HAVE 3 HUSKY PUPPIES AND I CAN SCRUB WITH THESE SO I FEEL LIKE A COMMERCIAL. . tHESE ARE GOING TO BE THE ONES I BUY FROM NOW ON
we ordered entirely too many but these are great, hearty, soft paper towels

review_title: It feel like literally just a thick normal cotton bedsheet
review_body: When we bought our memory foam mattress-- the sales person of course pushed their $250 mattress cover to prevent stains (which voids the warranty). No way was I paying that much.. Our previous traditional mattress had a mattress protector on it (and it was an expensive one!) and it felt plastic-y to lie on and made you sweaty when you slept on it.. This mattress cover is soft, doesn't feel plastic-y and allows your body to breathe (no sweat!). It feel like literally just a thick normal cotton bedsheet.. This mattress cover in fact felt so non-platicky that I worried if it would actually prevent water absorbing onto our mattress from, a toddler who peed in our bed.. Well got to test that theory pretty quickly. The toddler pee had been soaking on our bed for about an hour until I noticed it. Took off the sheets, this mattress protector-- and felt the mattress. Bone dry. Perfect.. I washed the mattress protector in the washing machine than dried it in the drier. And it still was soft an undamaged and good as new.. Overall, a great  buy.

My boyfriend is a "hot" sleeper and he tends to sweat throughout the night. I was reluctant to purchase this product for two reasons: (1) Was the material breathable? (2) Would the fitted sheet style "slip" throughout the night?. When I received the product, it was packaged nicely and neatly and when I removed the protector from its bag, there was no horrid smell to it (no plastic smell, no chemical-y smell). I was also nervous to see how this would fit over our king-sized mattress; but we have been using the product for a few nights now and there is no problem with the protector sleeping. It is breathable, too, and my boyfriend has yet to notice that I added a mattress protector to the bed!. I have yet to wash this mattress protector, but I will update once I wash it a few times.. I also have yet to test out whether this sheet is actually liquid-proof, but I'm sure a drink slip out of our hands and onto the bed one of these days.. So far, so good!

review_title: great sheets, comfortable and protects mattress
review_body: I bought this for my son's bed and i am impressed with the quality.  I was worried about the quality since the price seemed really low, especially considering i paid more than twice this amount for my son's waterproof sheets for his crib mattress!  But the quality is great and every accident he had in bed protected the mattress.  He also has a deep mattress and these sheets fit perfect.  The top side of these sheets are a terry and the bottom side is lined with plastic.  These sheets do not make a crinkling noise, are odorless and are comfortable to lay on.  Because one side is made of plastic i only air dry or dry on the coolest dryer setting which takes several hours to half a day.  This will ensure the longevity of the sheets, but causes a problem when my son wets his bed at night.  To resolve this problem i had to buy a second set of sheets, so highly recommend buying 2 sheets instead of 1.

review_title: I can't tell you how much I love SafeRest Premium Matress Protectors
review_body: I can't tell you how much I love SafeRest Premium Matress Protectors! I have them on every bed in my house now! My husband and I got a new mattress last summer, and I ordered this immediately and put it on the bed. I was glad I did too! Just a couple of nights later, my son came to our room during the night and got in bed beside me. An hour late he was throwing up all over the bed. As soon as I got him calmed down, cleaned up (this is no fast or easy task- to clean up a sick child), I pulled off the sheets. I just knew the new Matress was going to be ruined, but guess what!?! There was not a drop on it! NOTHING soaked through that mattress protector! In my astonishment, I ordered one for every bed in the house. I bleach them every two weeks or so, and they are still holding up like magic- through bedtime accidents with my boys, more sicknesses, and night sweats. Simply amazing!!!! A year later, my mattress still looks brand new!

review_title: This mattress pad does a great job of keeping me comfortable and eliminating that sweaty ...
review_body: I needed a waterproof mattress pad to protect a memory foam mattress topper I'd purchased. I was a bit apprehensive after having slept on regular plastic sheets in the past and finding myself sweaty and hot from the plastic and cold where I was away from the plastic cover, despite having sheets on the bed. This mattress pad does a great job of keeping me comfortable and eliminating that sweaty hot feeling you get from laying directly on a plastic cover. Because it is waterproof and plastic lined, it does make a slight amount of sound, but nothing noticeable to me when I'm resting. It's been well tested with my kiddo spilling his drink on my bed several times and I can say that there was no spill through the pad onto my mattress. It also washed very easily.  I highly recommend it!

Good price on an essential bedding product. This protector is unnoticeable under the sheets (e.g. no stiffness, rustling noises, odor etc.) and has saved my son's mattress countless times (potty training, anyone?). It's generously sized to fit even thick mattresses, but this is not a hinderance in fit for mattresses of average thickness. PRO TIP: I have two so I can alternate between them when my son has an accident in the middle of the night and I don't feel like doing 3am laundry. Given the fact that they're so thin and unnoticeable, it's really  amazing how much liquid they can stop! These types of protectors have really come down in price over the years so there's no excuse not to own one. Addditionally, I have one for my own bed and buy these for family members that have children. It's sort of an essential thing that no one really thinks about--except when it's preserving your $$$ mattess!

review_title: No noise and happy with it.
review_body: I am very sensitive to noise so I was concerned when I read a review that said this cover might make crinkly noise because of the plastic side. The reviewer further said that in fact it didn't make any noise upon use, which was why I decided to buy it. So I was somewhat dismayed when I took the cover out of the package and heard the crinkly noise. I've slept on it for 2 weeks now and I don't hear the noise at all. So I am very pleased with the product. I've thrown out a waterproof mattress cover in the past because I couldn't stand the noise it made every time I moved in bed. This SafeRest cover is a keeper.

I purchased this to protect my Mom's box spring and mattress from bed bug damage.  Although we had a re-infestation, this cover did protect the box spring and mattress very well. We did get a small hole in it, but I don't know if it is because it got caught on the bed frame when we were squeezing into the frame. It has a good, tight and strong zipper which keeps any bugs from getting through.  When we were removing it, I forgot the zipper was there and just cut it open, turned inside and placed it in a sealed trash bag for disposal. We did wash it once and it held up very well. However, it was so stained with bed bugs matter that we decided to dispose of it and put on a new one. It could probably be priced a little less, but it is a good mattress cover nevertheless.

Oh my GOSH! I had put on this mattress cover on as a precaution after deciding to buy a $1200 mattress. Well, fast forward several months later. My friend and her two dogs decided to stay. One dog is a rescue and prone to UTIs. Lo and behold, she jumped on my bed while I was reading. Felt something wet and warm and realized she had DRENCHED my bed in pee! I was absolutely FURIOUS! I was so upset until I realized a few minutes later that I had put on a mattress protector. Peeled off the top later and voila! My $1200 mattress was untouched! A bit warm from the pee but COMPLETELY dry! I am astonished! This is truly an amazing product!!!

review_title: Very high quality and happy with the way it saved my bed on more ...
review_body: Very high quality and happy with the way it saved my bed on more then one occasion (spilling a whole cup of milk and my daughter wetting the bed once).  Ending buying another for my other bed as well and it's well worth the investment! This is a must for any bed you have.  You can spill anything and it will make sure it doesn't reach your mattress.  When i first touched it after the milk spilled, i thought there is no way that the mattress is dry, but i removed the sheet and i was just shocked at how well it protected it.
Number One Go To Product. These Last Me The Longest !

Bounty makes good paper towels however my favorite towels are Viva.. These are huge rolls but I do not find they last any longer than the smaller ones ,which sounds crazy. As will this too sound crazy but  I think it is a psychological thing . You see that huge roll and use more .. I also  think  the manufacturers are playing games with consumers . They keep changing roll sizes, 2 rolls of this size equals 4 rolls of that size, and you have to read carefully as to how many towels are really on each roll, but the manufacturers know people are busy souls that do not have time to read all the crap printed on the package. Especially Bounty they have more different kinds/sizes , bounty basics, and all the packs that have  the this many rolls equal that many rolls, quick size, family size, select a size etc. etc. etc. Gets confusing and tiresome.. What I do not like is that they are wound too loosely on the cardboard roll. You go to pull one off and they just keep unrolling.

review_title: Not a new product, just less of it.
review_body: The new sheets are 5.7" wide versus 5.9" wide in Select-A-Size. So now there are fewer sheets per roll, plus the sheets are narrower, so we get fewer square feet per roll, Select-A-Size was 142 sq ft, these are 124 sq ft per roll. This amounts to 12.7% less Bounty for our money. Same old industry shrinkage routine. Put a new name on it and give us less for our money. I won't cancel my Subscription with Amazon, I just am tired on corporations saying something is a new product when it's not. It only new feature is the "new product" size is a fifth of an inch narrower, plus there are fewer per roll.

review_title: Why change something that didn't need changing?
review_body: Since I couldn't find my regularly ordered huge select-a-size rolls anymore, on the Amazon subscribe & save program, and they were offering this "new" version instead, I went ahead and purchased it. It said 2 = 5, the same as the other ones did, and it also showed the select-a-size logo on the package. The only difference that I noticed is that it said "Family Size" and "Quick Size". I have been using the huge select-a-size rolls for years and really loved them. They were perfect for my needs. This "new" version has made the sheets too narrow. WHY take something that was perfect and mess with it???. This new version makes me think of that old saying, "If it ain't broken, don't fix it"!! I can't imagine that they could think that the average customer wouldn't notice the difference. Do they take us for fools? First they did that with toilet paper, making the sheets smaller and too narrow. Most of the companies did that, one after the other, thinking that we would have no choice but to buy it anyway. Thankfully, Costco still offers regular sized rolls of that. I hope that all of the other companies don't soon follow in the footsteps of Bounty and change the size of their paper towels also. Greed and profit seem to always win out over quality and convenience nowadays.. Too bad that I purchased the 12 rolls of this, thinking that I was getting a good deal. Perhaps they think that if the sheets are very narrow, you will be forced to use two sheets instead of one for many tasks and use it up more quickly that way. I find it very deceitful to use the same terms, 2 = 5 and select-a-size, to describe a smaller quantity of an item and to trick people into perhaps not noticing that they are getting less of it and paying more. When I use up these 12 rolls, I will once again search for the original huge rolls. If I can't find them, then I will most likely have to change brands.

review_title: I love Bounty, especially with the Select-a-Size sheets.
review_body: I love Bounty, especially with the Select-a-Size sheets.  I've tried other similar products and found all of them lacking in some way or another, and from those unsatisfactory experiences have long since reached the conclusion that with Bounty, while there may be a little bit of premium in terms of cost, they are worth it.  For me the 2 pack bundle are perfect for taking into work and keeping handy.  As suggested on the packaging, those two roles have about as many sheets of paper towels as would be in 5 individual rolls of most other products, so a 2 pack bundle for me would last a good while.  On the bigger bundles I have a minor issue in terms of storing the rolls, though there is a bit of an advantage at most places in terms of a discount for buying in bulk.. While I wish these were less spendy, again, I find them worth the extra cost and spend on them as needed.  5 solid stars for durable paper towels that tear off in convenient sizes.  They do what they are supposed to in terms of absorbing liquids or holding up for use when scrubbing and cleaning.  What else would you want from your paper towels?

review_title: Sparkle paper towels are good to use but they are thin and you have ...
review_body: Sparkle paper towels are good to use but they are thin and you have to use a lot of them to get the job done.  They also do not have a lot on the roll.
I have this product on monthly subscription I like the sparkle brand the paper towels rip off in half sheets and a roll last my family of 6 about a week

review_title: Our first try with this brand
review_body: We love it!  Finally a towel that actually tears where it is supposed too ... also cleans up, and soaks up just fine!  Great product and great price.

review_body: My latest package ordered in February is not the same paper towels I've been getting for years. These are now thin fall apart stink and are absolute junk. Why does a company that has a quality product change into a bunch of crud and then affect customers. I am not the only one as you see from the reviews.  Bye bye.

review_body: Amazing product, couldn't be happier of it !!! It changes a lot my whole room when I turn it on !!! Would definitely recommend it
