review_body: I bought 3 sets of these: 1 set for each of my daughters and 1 set for my step daughters. It took an hour just to untangle ONE set.  Three of us looked like idiots trying to straighten out these lights!  Also, the power cord is WAY too short, in turn...we have to use an extension cord that has to hang about a foot from the ceiling!  It would be MUCH nicer if the power cord was clear, instead of black.  Other than those issues, the lights are beautiful all lit up!

review_title: That's an easy fix. The lights look gorgeous but they weren't ...
review_body: It's my fault for not reading the long description to see that the curtain didn't come with the product. That's an easy fix. The lights look gorgeous but they weren't as long as I expected. I actually expected the cord to be way shorter based off the reviews I read, but I think I have to measure it to see if they include that length within the length of the overall description. I bought 4 so at least I get some extension, but I just wanted to clarify for future buyers who may use them for an event like me.

review_title: Easy to set up and Brightens the room
review_body: Very easy to set up using the Command wall clips. Should show an add-on in the description. It is and yellowish white giving a soft feel. Lights up the room while not being super bright and burning your eyes. I have only only had It up for a day so I can not say how long it lasts, but I've had it on for many hours and it's no where close to being even warm. If you look at the photos you can see the lights are a rounded square shape so it doesnt look like Christmas lights and does emit light through my curtain which is moderately thick. It gives a blurred light. (not in photos). The reason for a 4 star is because the lights stick out more making a more messy look which isn't exactly my style, but is what I did expect from these lights.

I loved these lights! We hung them in front of a white sheet and had a fun photo session for a birthday party! I was super impressed with the quality. We left it up and kept using it for 10 days before I finally put it away. The lights blink in a few different set patterns which I thought was fun. I couldn’t believe how great these were for such a great price! Exactly what we wanted.

review_title: Cute, dainty, beautiful but hanging them.....&!#¥?
review_body: These lights turned out to be adorable; however I almost had a nervous breakdown detangling 300 fairy lights to hang. My husband made small wooden blocks painted to match our daughter’s wall and those were my saving grace. Be sure to measure the end that plugs in and contains the on/off control, and hang it somewhere easy to reach, and then brace yourself for 5 frustrating hours of laying out the light strands. It almost killed me. I cried twice, but overall, they are adorable!

Perfect window lights to set the holiday mood (or if like me I have them up all year in my art studio and reading nook areas). They have multiple light speeds and were NOT tangled in the box, like many I have received in the past. They were nicely packaged and each strand was banded so not to tangle.

For the price, this thing is amazing! We set it up during the X-mas season to give our decor just another POP and WOW factor for the inside of the house and its just amazing. It adds just the perfect amount of ambiance to the decor. It was easy to set up and the I love the many different light settings! We love it so much we kept it up after the season and turn it on when we just need some ambient lighting for T.V. watching or movie night. It truly makes any area look magical.

I almost never write reviews because I can’t remember to but made a special note here. These are pretty and lovely and convenient except THEY TANGLE SO EASILY. BEWARE. I opened them willy nilly casual and it took me easily an hour and a half to detangle. Halfway through hanging them I considered just jumping off the deck I was hanging them from. I’d have saved myself a LOT of energy if I had been methodical in my approach. That being said, will order again because if the aggravation of tangles is removed, these are phenomenal!

Guys to be honest this thing look really nice and small, but i have used it only once then it start throwing water and i don’t know why I didn’t put too much water or little bit of water, i put normal amout of water but it just throws water i made sure it closed properly. And, i wait for a whole 3 5 min but the water ran out and nothing happened.

I purchased this steamer because it is small and easy to pack when taking trips. It seems to have replaced my iron for most things. It will steam two shirts before needing to be refilled. I love it. Very convenient.
We haven't used it extensively yet, but a couple of shirts we used it for came out nicely. The devices is surprisingly small. Will update after some weeks of use.

I was excited to try this product because it just seemed so convenient. I was wrong. I was steaming a shirt for over 30 mins waiting to see results. No wrinkles ever came out. I thought maybe the material is just thick? So I tried it on a much thinner blouse and nothing. All it did was make the clothes damp and not much else. It was worth a try though.

I initially received a faulty steamer, but upon contacting customer service and explaining the excessive water spurting issues, they sent me a replacement steamer. I can say that the steamer heats quickly, provides a steady steam flow, and is compact and lightweight — much easier to handle than ones I have previously owned (handheld and floor models). Great customer service and so far convenient and efficient product.

this thing is faster and easier to use than an iron. the only downside is that the water tank drains fairly quickly, i didnt take the star off for that as i knew this was a smaller model with a smaller reservoir. I took the star off because filling the reservoir while steaming can be a little troublesome as you have to remove the top part and it gets hot. so you kinda have to let it cool down a little before filling it.. overall - good product, would recommend

review_title: but this little guy is great! Works really quickly and efficiently

Can make it through a few items before you have to refill it. Only minor issue is sometimes it spurts water and depending on what you are ironing, it can leave behind some water marks. But, a wonderful substitution for ironing or throwing something in the dryer to un-wrinkle.

This little steamer has made things so much easier for me, so much better than getting out the ironing board and ironing things. I put the clothes on a hanger and go over with the steamer and am done so much faster than ironing! Highly recommend!!

Good deal! I always use them to clean and like this system...

Maid loves these. We are in a house with a black lab and several cats. Glad to have Swiffer Pads around here. They pick up the hair so well. Won't be without them.

I got this for my second bathroom. It's a nice product - it works, it's accurate (as compared with other scales I have) and it has a sleek and shiny modern design. Tip: putting the scale on a hard surface isn't enough - make sure the surface is level, and that all four feet are resting solidly on said surface. Otherwise, you won't get an accurate reading. And keep the glass cleaner/paper towels handy - this scale will show smudges and water marks quickly. Not a knock on it, just an observation.. Minor nitpick - the display (and backlight) take way too long to turn off after you step off the scale. Wastes battery life unnecessarily, in my opinion. Other than that, I'm happy.

I've had this scale about 6 months. It displayed weights accurately, the display was large, clear and bright and I liked the look of it. Today I heard a loud bang in my bathroom and when I went to see what happened, the scale had shattered spontaneously and pieces of it were all over the floor. There was nothing that could have fallen on top of it because it was under my sink at the time (see pictures). I'm very confused about what could have happened, but I am absolutely not going to trust this brand anymore.

I have had this scale for about 6 months now and it is incredibly inaccurate. I can step on the scale, weigh one thing, step off the scale, let it clear, get back on and there is a 5 lb difference. I use it on my flat bathroom floor so there is no issue of it not being on level ground. Super frustrating. Would not recommend.

I bought this scale through Amazon.  This is NOT a paid review.. I picked this model for its sleek look and low profile.  I'd just redone my room so I wanted something that looks especially nice.  This is PERFECT.  The design is modern but understated.  The scale fits under a dresser when not in use.  It is easy to wipe clean.. The scale is ACCURATE.  On the day the scale arrived I had been to the doctor for a check up and had been weighed on 2 separate scales in the office, one digital and one weights on a slide bar.  They agreed.  When I received this scale in the afternoon I weighed myself and the result was the exactly the same weight.  It has been consistently accurate over the weeks I've been using it.. I give this scale a five star rating for looks and functionality.

review_title: I hope the company has taken steps to correct this issue and that they honor the warranty even if something like it shattering s
review_body: Not always accurate you can step on it one minute and it gives you a reading and then the next minute it changes even after a reset recalibration.  My fear is after reading the other reviews that it might shatter into 1 million pieces and that's frightening since I have small dogs in my house and now I'm afraid to leave it out in when I'm not home and it just suddenly shatters  potentially causing harmful injuries to me or my pets.  I hope the company has taken steps to correct this issue and that they honor the warranty even if something like it shattering suddenly occurs.  Reading other reviews it seems like other people have not had such great customer service and success in them covering warranty related issues such as just simply working as it should and not breaking apart .  Just wish I had more confidence in the product after now reading some of the previous reviews, We shall see within the next year how it goes.

review_title: Different number every use (within seconds apart)
review_body: I’ve tried this on all different surfaces and it doesn’t seem to be accurate at all. It tells me I’m 10 pounds less or 10 pounds more every time. It takes forever to get your results. It’s hard trying to figure out how much more you have to lose when it’s like this. Would recommend looking at other ones

review_title: Inexpensive but great quality scale - does the job
review_body: My husband and I, though living in our apartment for 8 years now, have never owned a scale. We, like many people, have made resolutions to eat healthier and lose some weight this year. It's hard to track weight without a scale, so we purchased this one. We picked it because it was sleek, inexpensive, and seemed to get good reviews.. After having this scale and using it (kind of obsessively) for a week, I've lost 4 pounds and I'm happy with the way this scale works, the accuracy, and the design of it. It's not flimsy and it doesn't creak or squeak when you step on, and looks very nice tucked in the corner near our exercise bike.

review_title: Can’t return my battery sucking dud
review_body: I regret buying this from Amazon because I got a dud and can’t return it. I bought this in August and at first was thrilled with it. Since then I’ve had to replace the batteries 3x already (after deciding to purchase this one after reading a review that the batteries last over a year. I literally put batteries in a week ago and they’re already dead. I weigh myself once a day or less. Now what? This problem didn’t even come up until outside the return window.

review_title: Fortunately for us it did not break while one of ...
review_body: We bought this scale because the digital display was easier to read that our old scale. Purchased in January. Left on vacation in April and came back only to find that the glass top had completely shattered. Very mysterious. The house was completely empty the entire time we were gone. The scale is rated up to 400 pounds but both my wife and I combined don't weigh that much. Fortunately for us it did not break while one of us was standing on it suffering a serious injury. This is tempered glass and is designed to withstand extreme impact. But I have now learned that if the glass has flaws in it it can spontaneously shatter. Perhaps Etekcity should scrutinize their glass manufacturer.

review_title: Works as advertised, and is reliable. A big improvement over my old ballance scale.
review_body: Ordered this scale based on reviews and the vast number of people who ordered. Been using for several months andf I am not dissapointed. I see that many accuse the scale of having memory. It doesn't. If I step on it multiple times, I get the same reading. If I pick up an object that weighs half of a pound and step on the scale again, the new weight is indicated. No memory. Please be aware that scale has a resolution of 0.2 pounds.
Thanks..

review_body: Love the scent wish they were a little taller
Product as described

they are strong and keep out the bad odors

Good quality and good price , definitely I would buy again in future ,,
Great quality paper towels for a very good price.  These are thick and absorbent.
Love this one, first time I tried it and will buy again is absorbent,  resistant and the sheets are big.
This has replaced all other brands in our house. Excellent towels, just like _ounty.
The rolls are to small. I was going to return them. Instead I decided to use them to see about their absorption. Not bad for the price. But I will not repurchase.
basic product; no complaints.  who doesn't love paper towels
I love these. So convenient to have on board!
I assumed it would be the half cloths sheets but was whole.
Very happy with this !!!! The amount of paper rolls I got, lasted me months and months and months!

Use for car crap when Im in the garage. Only 1 got scuffed when it got caught on a sharp edge. Still very usable just has a couple of loose threads hanging out of the towel itself. I already machined washed a few and they came out great so no issues so far. Oh and its 24 so Im not complaining at all haha

review_title: WARNING: Dye in Yellow Cloths Will Run
review_body: These are just basic microfiber cleaning cloths.  They're acceptable for the price, but they're hardly top-notch cleaning cloths.  If you buy them, the best advice I can give is to wash them before using them.  Our batch lost a lot of fibers initially, and the yellow cloths gave up yellow dye when they got wet.. It really seems like someone at Amazon should have tested these.  I was not very pleased when the yellow cloths started leaving yellow streaks on my white bathtub.  I got it cleaned up before anything got stained, but if you wash the entire pack in a single load, you'll notice that the yellows come out at little less bright, the whites come out at little more yellow, and the blues pick up a green tint.. Bottom line: these will do the job, as long as you don't use them immediately after opening.

review_title: Supersoft Towels that are perfect for any job.
review_body: Uses:. I bought these with the intention of using them for drying my car after washing.  When I recieved the towels I was suprised at the quality.  They are very nice towels and are very soft.  I used these to dry my car and they worked very well.  They can soak up a good amount of water and are very durable.  I have also used these to clean my cherry kitchen cabinets.  They are very soft so they wont damage the wood.  They were perfect for cleaning up grease splatter that managed to get on the cabinets.  They are also perfect for dusting around the house.  My wife has been grabbing these to dust just about everythign because they are so soft that they wont damage anything.  One neat use that I have found for them is washing my dog.  I dont want to use an expensive bath towel to wash my dog so I grab 2-3 of these and they work perfect!  They are good for a scrubbing and great for drying the dog off.  They absorb well and any odor can be washed right off in the washing machine.. Washing:. I have washed these multiple times and they have not gone down in quality at all.  They stand up to the washing machine very well.  I just throw them in warm and tumble dry low.  No loose threads or thinning of the towels that I can see.  I have to say I was very suprised that they held up so well for this price.  They dont stain easily either.  Of course they CAN be stained, but for most jobs they stains come right out.. Final Thoughts:. If you have ever bought any "Amazon Basics" products you will know that they put out very high quality products at very reasonable prices.  The price of these towels is so low that they are basically disposable if you want, but the quality is so high that you will find yourself grabbing them for all kinds of jobs.

review_title: Almost makes dusting fun! Work great
review_body: I have been using these for several months. They are the best dusters I have ever used. They work great for washing dishes and other cleaning uses. The directions say hang to dry but I accidently put in dryer and they are fine. I don't really understand the negative reviews. The size might be smaller than some microfiber cloths, but are plenty big for what I need.
Absolutely love these things! LOVE THEM! Just make sure to rip the tag off before you use it on your car as it may damage the finish.
These are great!  They are the best cleaning towels I have used thus far and they are very good quality.  Also the maintenance on these towels are so easy.

I bought these for my mother because she loved mine so much.  These things are fantastic -- they have next to no lint, unlike paper towels, and I cannot tell you how many paper towels I save now by cleaning with these.  I washed them with detergent that has the fabric softener built-in, and that was a mistake -- they are not as absorbent now and lost their "grabbiness."  They work much better if you wash them alone (they grab lint from other towels and clothing) and do not use fabric softener on them.  We use these for cleaning reading glasses, wet and dry dusting, cleaning windows, drying dishes, drying the car.  They'll keep working great if you clean them properly after use.
I don't know, I'm not crazy about these. Compared to other microfiber cloths I've had in the past they seem to leave a lot of lint behind. But they're really good at scrubbing.

These are small.  They are the size of a hand towel and are thin.  They are 12" x 15"  in size.  They become soaking wet very fast.  I used them to help wax a car (removing the wax)  because of their small size I had to use three of them to finish the job.

review_title: They are very durable and launder nicely. The 3 colors help me remember which cloth ...
review_body: I am surprised by how well these work! I had low expectations, but I use these microfiber clothes all over our home, car, garage and camper. They are very durable and launder nicely. The 3 colors help me remember which cloth is for which job, white for glass, yellow for wood and blue for other surfaces. I have been using them for months with no issues.

review_title: Not all that extra strength honestly. I could have ...
review_body: Not all that extra strength honestly. I could have got more bang for my buck but I had to try them out.

review_title: These are great trash bags - they are actually very heavy duty
review_body: These are great trash bags - they are actually very heavy duty. My boyfriend and I cook a lot, do many DIY projects and are constantly filling up these trash bags to the fullest. They can hold a LOT of weight, which is good. It promotes less waste and you don't have to take out the trash as often.
love these, no smell to them and they dont rip easily

Excellent quality & Made in USA.. These are exactly the same bags you find at your local grocery store but at amazon they are $3 cheaper. They haven't leaked or ripped open even when quite full (I use them in my kitchen). Not sure why some people are saying that these are made in Mexico, the box I received says made in USA.
This is the first time I actually use these bags I normally bought them for my daughter so I finally tried them and they're definitely worth the money they are very strong !
Great for putting trash in.  Much more useful than the sandwich bags I was using.
The part of the bag around the cinch ties always comes apart.  Which makes the cinch useless...  I am not going to render these.

True terashbags arrived on time, in tact, & as advertised. I really likee true closeable preferated front to open them. Ittt comes with 2 rolls of bags in the box. They're super strong & don't have that nasty cheap plastic smell.

These fit my trashcan well and seem to keep odors at bay when you cinch them and tie (they close pretty tight).  They don't seem to rip at the seam around the cinch as much as other brands have, that's why I keep buying them over and over again.  They are of medium thickness and resist many tears - there just are some sharp edges that cut anything they come into contact with... cut plastic packages, bamboo skewers...

review_title: Dependable Glad Trash Bags always on hand at our house.
review_body: I have this box stored under the kitchen sink, under the garbage disposal plumbing. Fits well, and I can get a rectangular shaped trash can in front of it. Never run out of trash bags again. Get this mega size and the kids will never be able to delay emptying the trash due to not having a fresh replacement on hand. No excuses!

I like these paper towels, how they seperate and how absorbant they are.
Love the product but the price is too high

Can’t beat the price for durable plates
love the size!
Love these plates as they are very sturdy.
Dixie makes good paper/plastic plates.

review_title: Removes the lead and that's why I use them...
review_body: These filter out so much more than the standard Brita filters.  Particularly lead which is important for me in a old house out in the boonies.. I go through a gallon of water per day - so getting four months out of one filter is nice.. However, there are no stickers to help remind you to change out your filter - would be nice...

This review is for Longlast filters.  Which are definitely not long lasting!  I purchased 3 Longlast filters and a Brita 10 cup pitcher.  My usage is about 1 quart per day.  I used the standard filter that came with my pitcher first and it lasted about 4 months before I decided to change it and installed one of the Longlast filters.  In less than a month it was filtering so slowly that it was barely usable, i.e. several hours to filter a quart of water, and then it got even slower over the next week or so until I was forced to change it.  The next two Longlast filters were just as bad.. I found some information on the Brita web site suggesting the Longlast filters could get air bubbles trapped inside and a procedure to re-soak and squeeze the filter cartridge to release the trapped air.  This procedure did not make any difference.  There were also a lot of negative user reviews of Longlast filters on the site from other users.. In my experience, the Longlast model lasts about ONE-THIRD as long as the standard filters, not 3 times as long as advertised.  Stick with the standard filters!

Did a great job at first but within 1 month, slowed down dramatically. Took 20-30 minutes to filter a pitcher. Now, at 2 months, it barely filters at all. Its slower than a drip. I fill it at night and let it go all night. Not practical, or useful. Unless the filters can be cleaned or cleared, it is too slow to get clean water. My water isn't hard or that dirty, so I was expecting these filters to last and be efficient. Kind of a waste of $$ and frustrating.

These are a newer design than the filters I have previously purchased. The new shape makes them easier to grasp and install. You also no longer need to soak the filters prior to use, which I find more convenient. The newer design seems to filter the water much quicker which is great for my family that can go through a pitcher very rapidly. I have also noticed that there aren't any of those unsightly black "floaters" in my water anymore.. As for the functionality, these filters make my tap water taste much better and remove many of the impurities and toxins. Given the amount of water you can filter, this is not only a much more cost effective solution to bottled water but also more environmentally friendly one.. Overall, these are great filters at a reasonable price! I will be purchasing more in the near future.

Total junk! Takes over a day to drain once.  Unacceptable!I can't even believe this product still exists.  If I could have, I would have given NO STARS.  It was slow to begin with and only got slower and slower.  We go through about 4 fills per day(about 2 gallons) in our house(with the regular filters).  This filter was always slower and would take over an hour to drain one time, even when it was new.  But after a month or two, it began to take multiple hours to drain once. Now, I realized that I can fill it at night and then in the morning, it's drained less than half way.

review_title: Non-Brita filters and they just aren't as good unfortunately. These new Brita filters also do not ...
review_body: Tried the cheaper, Non-Brita filters and they just aren't as good unfortunately. These new Brita filters also do not require a 15 minute soak in water,. you instead just run cold water over the water filter now for 15 seconds and it is ready to go. Also, there are so far a lot less black flecks in the top of the Brita canister and the water tastes great. Overall, to save a $1.50-2 (ish) dollars, the off-brand filters are just not worth it, my guess is they do not contain as much activated charcoal, I base this on my vast knowledge of water filter technology and science background that comes with being a communications major, so basically, nothing, but the filter is great.

review_title: Does not get rid of limescale
review_body: These don't seem to work as well as the regular Brita filters. We have very hard water. The regular filters will keep limescale off my electric kettle until it's time to change it. I do have to change them more frequently than in other cities. But these long last filters leave a limescale powder after the water is boiled. The water tastes fine but there's grit in my tea.

review_title: Cut the time it takes for the water to filter through by at least 60%
review_body: I was very unhappy when the package arrived because these filters didn't look like the ones I'd been using for years, nor did they look like the ones pictured.  But when I went to use them, I was delighted!  Formerly the water trickled so slowly into the pitcher and you had to wait around to put more in.  With these filters, the water fills up the pitcher SO much more quickly.  One hopes the quality of the water that has gone through the filter is just as good...

review_title: I'm a little disappointed because I thought it would last longer
review_body: I refill my Brita twice a day. We drink a lot of water but we also the filter water to give to our dogs. The description said this would last the average house hold 6 months so I figured it would last us 3 months because the normal filter were lasting a little over a month. I bought it June 4th and the light on my Brita is telling me it needs to be changed soon. I'm a little disappointed because I thought it would last longer. I think I'll give it one more chance and reorder a new one. I'll try to remember to update my review after I try again.

review_title: Will never buy these again, complete waste of money
review_body: These "longlasting" filters are not longlasting at all. Ours became unusable after like two months: It was so slow that it took hours to fill up the water pitcher.. Brita's customer services gives you all kinds of useless tips to mitigate this problem. You are supposed to put them in water, rinse them, squeeze them etc. Nothing works. Just search for "brita longlast filter slow" and see for yourself. You will find a lot of angry comments on Brita's website as well. We will keep our Brita water pitcher, but we will definitely never waste our money on these again.
Nothing crazy here, just a simple good paper towel that is worth the money.
I've always used Viva towels.  When you're cleaning up a cat mess, there's nothing worse than to have your towel disintegrate.  Viva towels are softer and stronger -they just are.
The towels tend to stick to the roll. Could be the humidity where I live, but I never had the issue with other paper towels.
Great product and an even better price. We won't buy anything else
Best paper towels around. They are strong but soft at the same time.  Do not rip apart. I’m willing to pay the price for these lint free towels. Even my husband likes them!

review_title: I loved these paper towels but they have changed something recently ...
review_body: I loved these paper towels but they have changed something recently to the inside roll and with that it became a pain to use these towels on a holder. I had to switch to a different brand.

review_title: These paper towels are not like the Viva towels I received from Lowes Foods
review_body: These paper towels are not like the Viva towels I received from Lowes Foods. Those from Lowes Foods are clearly softer and denser.
These towels are a good value and very absorbent.  But, there is this odd chemical smell that is off-putting.

review_title: The only towels I will buy
review_body: Love this paper towel, it's so cloth-like and the case has lasted a long time.

review_title: I don't like it but it's a great product!
review_body: I don't like the product because it's like cloth instead of paper. I prefer "Sparkle." It's a matter of preference. That being said, it's very good paper towel and arrived on time.

I purchased this to replace a padded mattress cover, and so far, I like it!  My mattress has thick padding so this is just to protect my mattress since I don't like having just a thin fitted sheet on top of the mattress where I can feel all the stitch patterns of the mattress.  Also, I have long hair and I go to bed with my hair wet so if I treat my hair, I didn't want it to ruin my expensive mattress.. Since this is just a thin mattress protector, it's easy to wash and put back on the bed.  I don't have to worry about breaking a nail trying to stretch it out to fit around the extra thick mattress.. As for the noise, you can hear the plastic a tiny bit, but unless you have amazing hearing and you lay your head directly on it without a pillow, you won't even notice it.

This mattress cover is truly waterproof and it doesn't feel like plastic which I love. We put this on our king memory foam bed and because we have kids and do movie nights in our room there is bound to be spills at some point. Lets just say my 4 yr old has split like 3 times since I bought this and there are no stains on our actual mattress cause this thing literally blocks the fluid! It washes easy in the machine and feels like a normal mattress cover. So I was skeptical at first but is truly waterproof!

review_title: Excellent Product - Worth Every Penny - Buy 2
review_body: Bought this for a hospital bed as the covering of the bed was irritating the skin and causing heat buildup during the night.  Wanted something that would fit the hospital bed easily which this does with its adjustable side.  The night sweats are gone, the irritation is gone and as an extra added bonus, there is no longer a need to re-make the bed daily due to the regular twin sized fitted sheets not staying on the bed.  They stay on the bed now, because as I've always been told as a quilter, 'cotton holds hands'  and will stay affixed to each other and not slide apart and off the bed.  Has improved sleep at least 95% if not more.. This is an excellent product that I would recommend to anyone with or without a hospital bed.  I'll be buying another one for my daughter soon as she does have allergies and I believe this will help her a lot.. Washes well with no noticeable shrinkage, retains original size, and fit after going through the dryer on normal setting.

The mattress cover fits our Serta king sized mattress (with a pillow top) well.  It attaches like a fitted sheet and the sides are long enough to tuck under the mattress so it doesn't slide around.  It's sturdy and doesn't look like it would tear easily.  I've washed it twice so far and the seems are still intact.  It has been able to protect our mattress from stains and seems waterproof so far.  I was worried that with the plastic, it would be noisy, but it hasn't been an issue.

review_title: Life Pro Tip:  Grab an XL Size of Suspenders WITH Update!
review_body: UPDATE:  8/9/2015. Our son has now had stomach bug for about 6 days (yes ~ we've taken him to the doctor) and he has thrown up approx 4-5 times in bed.  Everything from ground up hot dog to blueberries & strawberries!  This mattress protector has done AWESOME!  Nothing has seeped through, and serious stains washed out without issue!. We just purchased a 2nd one to keep on hand!  Absolutely love this product!. ________________. Life Pro Tip:  Grab an XL Size of Suspenders (the ones that keep your trousers up) and use on the underside of the bed to hold this mattress cover in place!. Originally purchased for our 3 year old who just transferred over from his crib to a full size bed!  Works great, and luckily, we haven't had to test whether or not its waterproof yet! :)  A++  Will buy another when our 1.5 year old is ready to move up!

review_title: need proper care when washing and drying but can't replace mattress such easily.
review_body: It saved our mattress many times since I bought it about 6-7 months ago. It must have item if your child is while in potty training or just about finishing it.  It slightly feel warmer maybe because of this water proof processing, it's not a matter in winter but maybe feel hotter in summer in that case if you put another cover or sheets on, it may reduce the feeling of heat.  Anyway, you can't replace mattress such easily, better use it to protect it from bed-wetting.. It is stretched quite well but water proof process(back side) may be broken before the clothes part is fully stretched, when I pull this mattress cover, I feel like that.  (top part and side part are different and side part are not water proof, have children sleep in center as much as possible). Washing is ok doing normal way but after spin dry, be careful pulling it out from the wash machine because water still remaining a lot in this mattress cover, pulling it up may stretch it too much and water proof process may be broken. just turn inside-out to try draining water and spin again and repeat it if necessary. (I usually do regular spin dry twice). When I dry it in drier, I usually use less heat for short time just to rise temp in drier drum and turn to fluff air and repeating it for a half day..... maybe I am doing too much careful though.... It require proper care, it's different from 100% clothes mattress cover but with such proper care, washing will not be a problem and again, it saves your mattress for sure.

This is the best mattress cover that I've found. Not only does it snug the mattress, take care of wetness and allergens but it keeps the bed's sheet in place. I had bought another brand of a mattress cover last year and it tore and didn't fit properly BUT when I received this SafeRest Premium Hypoallergenic Mattress cover, put it on the mattress, added the bedding and slept on it that night, I knew this was what I was looking for. Also maintenance for the cover is Excellent and it's easy to keep it clean and fresh.

this is a good quality mattress cover that will probably work very well over time.  It is not, however, a complete mattress cover - it only covers the top, sides and part of the bottom.  Perhaps the product listing made this clear, but I bought the product thinking I would be sliding the mattress into a full cover with a zipper enclosure.  I don't know if this will keep the rotten dust mites away from me at night or not, but I hope so.  There is no problem  with the cover otherwise, just make sure you get what you want.

First mattress protector I've ever purchased.  We bought a new Sealy mattress and got this protector based on reviews and it's holding up to its name and quality.  I can tell it's there, but makes no crinkle noises and doesn't change the feel of our mattress. We've already had to clean it because of our kids and it was very easy to remove and clean. Fits our 15" mattress very nicely and our fitted sheet fits over it like there isn't anything there. We will be buying one each for our 2 kids.

review_title: Heavy duty mattress pad, not for the faint of heart.
review_body: After reading some of the other reviews, I think this was an over zealous purchase. I just wanted something to fit my new memory foam mattress and provide good protection. This does that, but for people who might experience unforeseable biohazards in bed. The underside is rubber and very protective I’m sure and the pad washes well without falling apart but it does make noise when you move and it sleeps hot. I took it off the bed folded it up and put it away for future use if necessary.

review_title: Good quality and potentially a good value when buying in bulk
review_body: We typically go with a local generic brand as they tend to work almost as good as a name brand product, but for much less.  That will vary, as some generic stuff is completely useless. However, we've found that the price for buying in bulk and the high quality of the Bounty Paper Towels may be worth jumping over to name brand.. You've got smaller sized sheets, which have enough absorption as a normal sized sheet. Which means using less paper towels, buying less, and potentially saving money. Although in some cases, we found the need to use two, versus one larger sheet. So it really depends on your uses. For us, we'll need to crunch some more numbers at the time these are on sale.. Try out a single roll, compare to your current brand. See what makes sense as savings can add up over time. I like these and consider them recommended.

I have been buying Bounty select-a-size paper towels for at least 10 years now. In the last year I have noticed the paper towel sheets getting thinner and thinner. The most recent batch I bought from Target is so thin some areas have translucent spots.. I happened to buy another bunch from Costco and noticed theirs is significantly thicker, kinda like the Bounty I had come to love. Their select-a-size sheets are also wider, which we do not care for since the smaller ones work just fine. With these you will run out of the roll faster. Given a choice I would get the Costco one again. For now I will try another brand. Maybe Viva?

review_title: A great deal on well made paper towels.
review_body: These towels are perfect for cleaning around the house. The rolls they come in are quite large, much larger then I usually get.  Plus they come in a two pack.  If you buy this family pack, it comes to $4.83 per two pack, or $2.42 per roll.  This comes in a large box and it comes with 6 packages of 2 rolls of paper towels.  They hold water quite well, and unlike other cheaper versions won't break down after a couple swipes at the stain.. If your looking for a bulk version of paper towels, this is a really good deal.

My parents told me for years that the generic was just as good.  That was for pretty much everything, not just paper towels.  As I've grown older I've discovered you get what you pay for.  Bounty is great.  It wipes up spills so much easier and with less paper than generic.  Plus you can tear off as little or as much as you need.  There are rarely half-sheets with generic brand.

review_title: There is a difference in paper towels
review_body: There is a great difference in paper towels.  These Bounty towels are thick and strong, and I love that they are divided into the half sheet sizes, so you're able to only tear off the amount you need.  These are also larger rolls, so they may not fit on a standard or smaller paper towel holder.  Really good product.

I am brand loyal.  When I find something that works I stick with it, regardless of what else might be on sale, and these are my paper towels!. Select-a-size is perfect to cut down on waste.. Definitely recommended.

I normally dislike half-sheets because whenever you want to pull two, they are so thin you only get one but these are thicker so they are sturdier when you pull them apart.  These are much thicker than my normal brand.

review_title: ... towelse are reasonably priced and they pick up spills easily. The absorb far better than anything else that ...
review_body: Bounty towelse are reasonably priced and they pick up spills easily.  The absorb far better than anything else that I've tried.
I like the sizes and absorbency. It also doesn't leave streaks on glass
These have spoiled me, I can't stand one size paper towel sheets now (of all things).

review_title: I like that one that tear off as much as one needs. I usually don't need a full size...
review_body: Always buy these in large quantities since I have a lot of pets.
We are terrible people for the environment. A roll of paper towels lasts about 3 days in our home so I went for this cheap bulk package. Large box as expected. No complaints. Will definitely reorder.

review_title: A great deal for the price
review_body: A great deal for the price!  I have reordered these paper towels a few times now and love that I get so many in one order.  One order easily lasts me months.  The paper towels themselves are of good quality and I have had no issues.  Will continue to reorder!

review_title: Great price but they aren't as strong as other brands ...
review_body: Great price but they aren't as strong as other brands but definitely not as thin as others. A good middle of the road paper towel.
With a big family and three kids these are a must have around the house!
I have been buying this product for over a year, usually pleased. However, this time, got bulk with moldy /cat pea like smell.

review_title: Would recommend great for the price too
review_body: Paper towels were great. Doesn't take many tocean up a big spill. They are absorbent and the roll is large and sheets are had sheets which give you the option to choose how  if of a piece you need without waste.

review_title: Not satisfied, they are not giant
review_body: Not satisfied,they are not giant rolls
For the price, this is well worth it.. 1 small piece is enough to dry your hand.. not as smooth as bounty though, but you got what you pay for.

review_title: Sparkle for me from now on
review_body: Very good savings.  Bounty from costco is what I used for many years.  Sparkle has less embossing and less soft but the paper thickness feels the same.  Prices are about the same minus the costco membership and time and fuel.  (I'm using less and less of costco.)  Sparkle is definite winner at 57 square feet per roll (24 rolls) and losing bounty at 67 square feet per roll with 12 rolls.  I don't have to do the math.  Using these for the new bird cage and the fact that it is rare times when the entire sheet is soaked, I never needed twice the absorption.  Small sheets tear off easily
Great Pillow,,,,Know I know why this is rated so high,,,Great quality and nice pilllow,,The filling is just right,,not to flat and perfect firmness,,I will buy again!!  5 STARS!!!!!
Received 4 of these in the mail today and immediately ordered 4 more. Will order more in the future...

review_title: Fine throw pillows, would purchase again
review_body: It's not the comfiest pillow ever but rarely are throws so it's pretty much on the high end of what I expected. Would buy again.

review_title: Open it and fluff it up!
review_body: i was annoyed after I had my first look at this pillow.  It was half the size!  Had to double check my order to see the the right one was ordered.  Upon opening it, it filled out to the right size!

review_title: ... of the plastic so it can "expand" its a great pillow, leaving it in the plastic like I ...
review_body: Once u take it out of the plastic so it can "expand" its a great pillow, leaving it in the plastic like I initially did it was hard and uncomfortable

review_title: You're getting what you pay for...
review_body: I wish my pillows looked like the picture. The stuffing is uneven and doesn't fill out the corners. I'll replace them.

Very thick and fluffy, perfect if you like a fully-stuffed/ over-stuffed pillow. I've got no problem with the size as in other comments, it fits perfectly well with my same size cover, though it will take some time to put in the cover. Good price good quality.

This pillow sucks, there is barely any stuffing and the pillow i got looks like it has little blood spots. They look like they are bed bug blood spots, they are tiny little blood dots spread out. Very disappointing product this should not be in the "best seller"
Good for decorative pieces would not use for anything else.
Get what you pay for.  I was expecting a bit more quality in the product; seems already had strings hanging out and looked like they would give at any moment.  I sent it back.

I love these lights they r so pretty, I almost want to leave them up year round lol...they were actually long enough for my windows as well which takes 108in curtains to cover.. most of all I was vacuuming and accidentally vacuumed up a piece of the lights...and it still works!!!!!

These lights are of good quality and as advertised. They are a soft white and look just like the picture. Although, to span the whole door way (which is the width of two french doors) the lights are a little more spaced out than the ones in the picture.  Lightweight and easy to hang, I highly recommend.

I really liked this product. I am buying it for a backdrop for my daughters wedding this summer. The only issue I have is that it looks like there is a missing string of lights on one corner. Where the string of light should be is just a short wire with some kind of clip attached to it. Don't know the purpose for it, but it should be at the end so it doesn't look like a string went out.

review_title: These lights are so beautiful and very very easy to work with
review_body: These lights are so beautiful and very very easy to work with. I used them in my garage for an extended party area. The soft lighting it provides made the room look amazing!!!

These are nice curtain lights. They were very easy to set up and I love the various modes. My husband was not happy with our electric bill after decking the house out in Christmas lights, so I've been slowly replacing our lights with LED ones. These will work great for our front window and the patio in the summer.

Quickly arrived!! I have been on a light kick lately. I love these lights. they are so beautiful. I put them up in my bedroom with some fairy lights I also purchased and it looks absolutely amazing! I love having all my lights on at night after it gets dark out and I turn off all my lights around the house. Happy customer!
Got the lights strung- plugged them in, and no light...

Really beautiful lights, they look really amazing in my bedroom window. They seem really well made and the light is a pleasant shade, not that horrible blue light that you think of with LEDs. My only critique is that the controller doesn't turn off the light, just changes the different blinking settings. You have to go and unplug them from the wall to actually turn them off.
Love these lights!! Used a single set behind a sheer curtain for a Photo Booth and it worked perfectly!! Pictures attached!

review_title: Great idea. Too tall to use in a standard ...
review_body: Great idea. Too tall to use in a standard room. And I thought the lights would be closer together.. I also thought it was an actual curtain as preceived by the photo. But it is just a wall of lights and the gold shimmer you see is their fabric. Not even close to represnting the photo. My error for not investigating more.

review_title: Don't let the size fool you!
review_body: This machine is small, but mighty!! I have never had a clothes steamer before, and looked at quite a few before deciding on this one- so glad I did...it works great, and is easy to use!

Love, love, love this steamer!  Received it quickly, it was well packaged and works really well.  So far I have used it to take wrinkles out of my shower curtaiins, tablecloth and clothes and it works perfectly!!
It is light weight which is what I wanted. Good quality. Would buy again.

This steamer works ok, not great though. It runs out of water quickly and leaks water onto clothes. There is enough water I. The steamer for about one garmet worth of steaming at a time. I’m buying a different one

review_title: Great, especially for size. Patience needed.
review_body: Light weight, great for traveling. Steams well, but you have to hold it close to the cloth but not too close or you’ll melt it. You have to find the best angle to get the most out of it. Found that it uses the water pretty quickly, had to add more water after less than 10 minutes. Getting small or deep creases were fine, but ironing a whole wrinkled dress took a while.. I only gave it 4 stars because it will take a while to fully get all the wrinkles out. I do recommend this though, especially for travel.

I got this as a gift for my sister and she absolutely loves it. Said her clothes look perfect and it saves a ton of time not ironing. I chose this one because it has an auto shut off to help prevent the anxiety of did I shut it off before I left for the day???

review_title: The steamer works great. It is small
review_body: The steamer works great. It is small, compact-travel size as stated in the description. It does tend to spurt water if filled to the max point. It is not meant to be tilted or last for more than two garments, size depending. If you are looking for a steamer for more heavy duty work, this is not for you. I prefer not to accumulate too many things or large objects that are difficult to store. I am happy with my purchase.
Excellent product.
Works really well, light weight, I will take it on my next trip. Even worked on very wrinkled Jeans.

review_title: I have used this steamer once and it did not ...
review_body: I have used this steamer once and it did not do an outstanding job.  Because of this I have not used it again but have not given up.  Will try again at a later time.
Exactly as described.
Don't buy the imposters when you can get this bargain!
Essential for cleaning tile, vinyl, wood, and bamboo floors.  Package has enough wipes for a month of cleaning.
Use them all the time. They are fabulous!
arrived soon great for cleaningdusy
Monthly subscriber - gotta have these!
BOY! I sure needed these.
use them everyday
Great product with fast delivery.  Really picks up dust and pet hair.
The best product

review_title: Good beginnings ... hoping for a long life
review_body: After reading tons of reviews I decided to take a chance.  Scale arrived this morning carefully boxed and safe.  Stepped on it and it worked immediately and repeated the weighing process like others did in their reviews.  Got the same weight each time.  It was also the same as the doctor's scale 5 days ago.  Good start!. The scale is slim and sleek.  It is housed under the vanity in the guest bathroom.  It will be used every day by one housemate and weekly by another.  It is the basis for a weight loss strategy we are trying... fingers crossed.

After going through calibration from pulling out the scale a few inches from its place to be able to use it, it takes several times to average out a weight, because it says something different within seconds, varying by pounds per session every day. Additionally, it tends to read you as lighter if you stand an inch or two off center from  the display. It’s like being back with the old 1970’s style scale I grew up with, just less rusty. Retuning.

review_title: Great customer service and this scale works well
review_body: UPDATE: The company reached out to me after I posted my review and offered to send a replacement scale. I have had it for awhile now and its not having the same issues as the first one did.  Great customer service and this scale works well.. ORIGINAL REVIEW:. Arrived on time and looked exactly as I expected however about a week into having it now its malfunctioning and giving error messages.. the only way to reset is to pull the batteries out.. and then the problem persists... now i have to buy another scale...

review_title: Quality build, accurate results, incredible value!
review_body: This was an excellent purchase. Very sturdy item that has a high-quality feel to it. Don't let the price fool you! This is not some cheap item that will break after a few uses. It is made of strong glass while still being quite lightweight. The scale is very responsive and displays a reading immediately, though of course you should wait a few seconds for it to stabilize and show a final weight. The backlight is a huge bonus, as my shadow covers the display and would make it hard to see the readings without it. The design is also very sleek and allows it to be placed in just about any bathroom without clashing with the current decor. Auto on/off is also helpful. True, it does not display body fat percentage, but measuring that through a scale is not very accurate anyhow, and for this price, it already offers plenty. I would certainly buy again, although I doubt that I will need to.

This scale is a stylish addition to the bathroom, it weighs accurately and tells me more truth than I want to know :-)  The Body Tape Measure was a nice bonus. The digital readout is easy to see and it is a very durable scale. The glass is not flimsy nor prone to chipping. Great purchase for the money, I"m really happy with it!. Now I just need to work on getting those digital numbers a bit smaller...

I bought this scale in October of 2015, and I have used it about 4x a week since I purchased it.  I don't have any serious complaints.  There is one slightly annoying thing though.  I have to kind of step on the scale and get off then let it zero before I step on for my real weighing.  Sometimes I forget and when I step off I see an error after it shows the weight of "C" which just reminds me that I didn't "get it ready" for the real weighing.  Now I think I have this issue because I keep the scale on the shelf - I have to take it down and place it on the floor each time I weigh.  Anyway, it isn't a big deal.  The original batteries and still in the unit.  I would recommend to friends.

Accurate and portable this scale is the cat's meow.. My secret was to realize that I was a cheater on my. bathroom scale and bite the bullet and come clean accepting. that I would be two pounds heavier. This scale is easy to read, affordable and true.. Stand up straight, and your weight will show up when you get off. My intention now. is to weigh my self in the morning each day and do so in loose clothing. That means losing. another 1.5 pounds over my goal and add another week to my diet but it will be worth it.. THE SCALE FITS PERFECTLY IN MY SUITCASE POCKET AND I CUT A THIN SHEET OF FOAM TO PROTECT THE SCALE IN TRANSIT.. I will buy another to keep just in case the manufacturer discontinues it!

review_title: Light, works, and looks really cool.
review_body: Delivered on time. Works straight out of the box. So far provides the same reading/weight analysis every time I step on it. Very low to the ground so there is not much of a step. There is a warning sticker about not using it after the shower due to the slippy glass surface. So just be dry when using it. Looks cool and it is very easy to read.The body tape it comes with comes in a handy plastic tube so its not flowing all over the place when down checking measurements.

I bought this thinking my old scale was broken. Turns out, I just put on an alarming amount of weight. So it confirmed that my original scale was working, and for that I'm really grateful. Now I have two functioning scales which is a bit redundant, but I guess I can forever test their accuracy now. So this scale works great, and if I had bought the original scale on Amazon, I'd be saying the same thing about that one.

We love this scale. My husband has embarked on a fitness and weight loss regiment and whoa get out of the way.  Tragedy struck when he realized my really cute silver art deco scale with foot prints on the top of it was weighing him under.  (I'm thinking whoo hoo.... who cares if I'm really 5 lbs heavier at least I feel amazing).  He did not see the humor in this.  And honestly art deco is not his style.....  And the previous scale is off by a percentage of weight so he was ticked off that I too did not actually weigh 5-7 lbs more than I believed. ( I did wonder why my doctor's office weight was always more, even accounting for clothing.  Does anyone else want to strip down b4 they weigh at the doctor's office? I would except them moved the scale to the hallway.)  Any hoo back to the review.  Great scale.  Consistent numbers... like I weight myself 3 times in a row & its the same number.  Super easy to set up, worked right out of the box. Sadly hubby's weight has plateaued.

review_title: Cheaper than paper towels and easier on your car too!
review_body: What can I say , these are great to have around the house .  They are perfect for the car, boat , RV and everything in between.  We buy these all the time and love them .  Keep in mind they aren't to be used forever and if you use nasty chemicals and gunky stuff on them , they will be destroyed but I assure you , it is much cheaper than using paper towels and more eco friendly.  Do make sure you wash them prior to using them and don't use bleach , softener or harsh soap on them ( I just use hot hot hot water )

review_title: Bough to wash and dry the car with. Once ...
review_body: Bough to wash and dry the car with.  Once these are done I'm going back to the cotton cloths you find at hardware stores.  The dirt does not wash out of these so the next time you wash your car with a towel, you can potentially scratch it up.

review_title: Microfiber cloths in general have worked better than standard small towels
review_body: These have worked well for keeping in my pocket to clean off paintball gear between games (while waiting on a sideline after being shot out). Microfiber cloths in general have worked better than standard small towels, but these cheap ones like this (and the ones hanging on the shelf at Publix) worked better than most other microfiber cloths I have tried (including some hanging on a shelf at Wal-mart), most being supposedly better quality towels.. The only downside to the microfiber cloths, for my use, is that they are like velcro for the small plant bits that they pick up if I drop one on the field or wipe off a piece of gear that has more than just paint on it. Getting those bits off afterwards takes a lot of time and washing doesn't seem to help. That's usually the point where I just dispose of them and use another.

review_title: buy but check out why they are good for not. Great for house cleaning but not great as a normal wash cloth.
review_body: I loved them when they were first new.  I like them now but they are only perfect for just cleaning.... They pick up lint and all kinds of debris and stores it in their .... not sure what to call it.  The feltish type cloth....  I had to purchase some true cotton washcloths.  On another side of things it says to not dry them in a dryer.  I've accidentally dried a few with not worse for wear but am still worried as to why.  They cling to other clothing like static electricity is part of it bit it's not. It's just the fibers of the cloth.  I would buy them again but only for a wash and such solely for house cleaning and throw them away etc..

review_title: Average & similar to many others but content is different.
review_body: These are average & much like others bought at similar retailers yet these have the polyamide 10% & polyester where some are all polyester. I wish in descriptions there was mention of the advantage of either content. These should be adequate for most household uses.

After reading the mixed reviews I was iffy about ordering these. But, in an effort to save money & stop using paper towels I went ahead & ordered them anyways. They are so soft and larger than I thought. I looked them over & none of the towels had any holes or defects. I even talked a few people into buying them by sending them the link. I washed them & started using them almost immediately. They're great for cleaning up messes around the home. I would order these again!

review_title: I'd buy them many times over
review_body: I bought his at least two years ago. I use different colors for different uses. So blue is uses in the kitchen for dishes and counters. The white is for bathrooms. The yellow is basic dusting. This helps keep cross-contamination to a minimum. I love the cleaning power. For fingerprints on walls, all you need it a damp one. No chemicals needed. They work great and come at a good price.

For the price, these are pretty good.  I would compare their absorbency to a doubled-up Bounty paper towel.  And that's about how we use these cloths--in place of paper towels to be more environmentally friendly.  I got the 24-pack, and I can say that I wish I would have gotten fewer.  The blue and yellow colors don't run or fade in the wash, and they air-dry really quickly after washings.  If you're looking for something to use in your kitchen for things you'd usually use a paper towel for, these are perfect.  If you're looking for something to clean and use for heavier-duty uses, I'd go with the Eurow Microfiber Cloths (http://www.amazon.com/Eurow-Microfiber-Commercial-Towels-12-pack/dp/B004XVNDL0/ref=sr_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1398656294&sr=8-3&keywords=eurow+microfiber)--they are larger and more absorbent.

Larger than some I purchased from another retailer, these are very nice. Our household went paper towel-free nearly two yrs ago when we went to using microfiber cloths almost exclusively. Color-coding is important I feel so having three colors will help to ensure a bathroom cloth will not be used in the kitchen & so on. The only thing we use paper (leftover fast food napkins) on is exceptionally greasy items or something so gross I don't want to "deal" with it. These cloths will undoubtably last as the former ones did making their price point a win for my budget.

review_title: great for mops that use disposable wet pads
review_body: I use these for my swiffer type floor mop.  The pads with cleaning solution just smear dirt around and leave slime on the floor from the chemicals.  I spray the floor with vinegar water solution and the clothes attached to the mop soak it up along with the slime and dirt.  I used this to clean up after the chemical type wet pads.

review_title: Save your money - without a doubt, NOT WORTH THE MONEY!
review_body: We moved from a municipal water supplied city in the Midwest to rural Massachusetts where we rent a home.  The water source is from a well; one high in dissolved solids; so much so that all water-related appliances are stained or coated with a heavy film of rust.  When we initially ran the water to flush the lines, we noticed a strong smell of rotten eggs emanating from the sink in the bathroom.  After checking the inline filter, I decided to change from a paper filter the landlord provides to a charcoal-impregnated commercial filter we pay for.  I believe this to be in my family’s best interest.  This helped remove most of the water issues.  We then filter all drinking water coming from our sink (using our Brita Pitcher) so, our water is double-filtered.  We bought the filters in MARCH of this year.  After using up our supply of regular Brita filters, we changed over to the Brita “Blue” filters hoping to make our drinking water safer yet, taste better; while removing all hint of iron and the smell of Sulphur.  The first one made it to May 24th as it became very slow to filter - not NEARLY the six months advertised.  However, I attribute this to the high sediment in the water - but the main filter should get 99% of that out!  Today, June 19th, it now takes the second filter TWO HOURS to filter ONE filling of the top of the Pitcher; and it takes two fillings to fill the pitcher!  Our family of four goes through plenty of drinking/cooking water every day.  This cannot go on.  I believe we will be looking for another brand filter as the regular Brita filters do not do the job well enough; while the blue filters keep more contaminants out, they do not seem to last very long.  NOT worth the money!

review_title: Stick with the regular filters, not the long last...it takes too long!
review_body: It takes entirely too long to filter the water as compared to the regular filter. I have to schedule fillings so that it doesn't annoy me: right before I leave for work, or right before I go to bed. If you are making a large amount of coffee and pouring a couple glasses of drinking water for guests...you're out. I'd rather stick with the regular filters and change them out more often because the filtering tastes the same and it doesn't take as long.

review_title: Lasts long because it takes forever to filter
review_body: Summary:. - Don't buy these, especially if the water with which you fill your pitcher has a lot of air bubbles in it. - If your water is already pretty clean and you just want to improve on taste, stick to the standard filters. Pros:. - Lead removal. - No more carbon dust. - Same fit as the standard filters. Cons:. - Prone to air locking (clogging up due to trapped air). At 19ppm, measured using a . , I'm fortunate enough to have pretty clean water straight out of the tap, but I've always used a water filter to improve the taste. I decided to give these a try because of the added perks of lead removal and extended lifespan. With the exception of being blue, the filters looked and installed just like the standard Brita filters. They no longer have the issue of carbon dust and particles leaking out of them and you don't need to pre-soak them before installing.. At first use, I could see that the Longlasts filtered water slower than the standard filters, but not so slow that it was a concern. Over the course of a month, however, the filter would take longer to filter with each fill. At its worst, after an hour, it still wasn't done filtering. After three months of planning my schedule around how quickly my pitcher would filter water, I tossed the filter and installed the second of the two-pack. I thought that maybe the first filter was a fluke, but after a month, the second filter also stopped filtering water.. After some research, I read about how gravity-based water filters can suffer from "air locking," where small air bubbles can get trapped and essentially clog the filter. I suspect whatever Brita did to the Longlast versions of these filters increased the potential for air locking. I tried some of the suggestions that Brita gave to other customers experiencing the same issues, such as tapping the pitcher to shake out some of the air, and while it helped, it never resolved the issue.. After tossing out the last one, I went back to the . . Ultimately, I went through the two Longlast filters in four months, which is a far cry from the 12 month promise.

review_title: Don’t buy this! Worst filter I’ve ever used.
review_body: I have never been so disappointed with any purchase ever! After 10 days it began filtering one drop at a time ever 2-3 seconds!!! We’re a family of 5 and drink a lot of water. I didn’t expect it to last the full 6 months but 10 days is ridiculous! I literally have ur filtering all day long and try to save as much water as possible in a pitcher. It takes hours for a mere 16oz to filter. If I need to pour a cup of water while it’s still filtering, the unfiltered water pour into the cup making it completely pointless! I would’ve paid twice as much for a product that works, but to sell a product his useless is disgraceful. Don’t buy this!!

Nice to get these filters at a better price than the stores. They fit the Brita Pitcher perfectly and filter the water quickly. Glad I purchased them as they arrived prior to the hurricane and allowed me to filter and store about 10 gallons of water. This was a great safety net to have along with the bottled water we had on hand. We also use the filtered water for coffee in the morning and it makes it taste much better than unfiltered water.

We have used this product since mid May 2017. We have had zero problems with it. It took out tastes and the water is wonderful. So glad they made it so that the lead is minimal. I just ordered a 2 pack today. I've read reviews where people are not happy with it but we have had no problems at all. Pitcher fills the same as it always had, in just a few minutes, no floating filter or ay problem at all. Maybe it's the pitcher model these people have but for us 5 STARS

I can't believe I purchased these filters without first reading the negative reviews.  The negative reviews are TRUE.  I installed the first filter on July 18, 2018 and could not believe how long it took to empty the reservoir.  Then, on August 1, 2018 it STOPPED WORKING.  This is 2 weeks for a filter that is advertised as being good for 6 months.  Also, the taste of the filtered water is not as good as I expected it to be.  Bottled water is better.  After being a long time Britta user I am looking for a new filter system.  With all the bad reviews it seems like either Britta or Amazon no longer care about their product or their customers.  Maybe Mr. Bezos is more concerned with his space efforts than his company.. September 1, 2018. FOLLOW UP REVIEW. Following my critical review I was contacted by Britta and given a telphone number and a reference number.. I called the number and was given the option of a refund or receive a replacement 2 pack of Longlast filters.  Since I have had a long and satisfactory relationship with Britta I chose the replacement option.  BIG MISTAKE!! The replacement filters were as defective as those I received originally.  The first filter was installed on August 17, 2018.  By August 30 it was taking 6 to 8 hours for the reservoir to empty through the filter.  AND there is now a blotchy, streaky substance on the interior of the white reservoir.. When I initially called Britta I was told that about 10% of their filters from an un-named manufacturer were defective.  What are the odds that I would get the defective ones a second time?. BUYER BEWARE!!

Fantastic water filter, and when Brita says "advanced" they aren't blowing smoke.. I was disenchanted with Brita back in the day - the filters seemed awfully fussy to set up, and they seemed to need changing quite often.  So far I haven't had any issues with these new filters.  Priming it took 15 seconds - no joke - and it was pretty much ready right after priming.  That's to say, I didn't get any black dust or floaties in the first few loads, like I did with the older filters.. So I'm back to Brita.  This is a good filter and it does a good job.

review_title: Does NOT work with the Brita Ultramax
review_body: I really want to like it, but what a disappointment. Even though I insert it super snugly into the water filter container, it doesn't stay in. Every other time we fill it with water, the water goes through way too fast. We lift the lid to check if it's sitting correctly, and lo and behold, it's "popped out" again. Yes, we are seating the filter in the correct way, but no it doesn't stay in. We have a Brita Ultramax, and have never had this issue with our regular water filters. Really bummed that we wasted money on this.

review_title: Probably good quality for what they are
review_body: These are probably dependably quality as Brita has always been, but I returned them because the pitcher I bought them for and with was marred. Keep in mind that Brita water filters do remove certain substances to a certain degree but not as much as a ZeroWater filters. Brita filters are cheaper and last longer but remove less. You might want to find out about the quality and contents of your water before deciding on which is best for you. I've had Brita for years and got this after we were burglarized and moved to replace those that were stolen when my son suggested we should filter the LA water. If you have pretty pure water but just don't like the taste, these are probably good for you.
