review_title: It has an excellent fit for the mattress
review_body: I ordered this(my wife rather) along with my new queen sized bed. It has an excellent fit for the mattress; I tend to toss and turn a lot in my sleep regardless of comfort so sheets as well as mattress protectors tend to pull loose from the edges of the bed. The mattress is 12" in depth and it has yet to slip from it and actual does have ample material to hold a mattress of even larger depth . As far as the product goes it appears to be of genuine fine quality( I don't fear it tearing or being damaged during washings) and thoughtful in design in regards to protection. The uppermost layer does genuinely feel like terry cloth, which isn't the ideal texture to sleep on for myself yet it is quite breathable. Its multiple layers assure me that it will be protective and additionally do not retain heat as strongly as I had originally thought it would. However I've yet to have it prove its value from a spill, child created incident, or a long term evaluation of how the product holds up against general use.

review_title: Couldn't be more satisfied! We initially bought this in twin size for ...
review_body: Couldn't be more satisfied! We initially bought this in twin size for my toddler who was potty-training. Of course, being that he ended up in MY bed every single night, I realized pretty quickly that I needed a queen-sized pad for my bed too! I now own 4 of these - two twins and two queens, because there have been many times when the one being cleaned isn't ready in time for bedtime!. I have washed these many, MANY times and dried them in the dryer too. They are holding up just fine, and trust me, they are put to the test pretty regularly in our house! My 5-yr-old is still not fully trained at night. He wears pull-ups but leaks are still fairly common.. They don't crinkle, they don't make us hot, they wash well, and they do what they are supposed to do. What more could you want?. When it's our 1-yr-old's turn to start potty-training, I will be buying more of these for her bed too!

review_title: Waterproof pads to Protect all your mattresses.
review_body: This product is the best way to protect your mattress from accidental spills or young children going through potty training.  (We have four young grandchildren.)  I have bought several of these pads before with good results.  They are thin, comfortable, and flexible with a terrycloth finish on the outside.  They wash normally in warm water/cold rinse, but dry on cool temperature or air dry.  I dry them half way on cool in the dryer, then let them finish drying loosely on top of a spare bed.  I just leave my  waterproof pad on the mattress at all times, but put another regular padded/quilted mattress pad over it.  The normal quilted pad gets washed regularly,  The waterproof pads get washed only when necessary.

review_title: Saved my valuable mattress. This is so comfortable and just about perfect, if you have a good mattress.
review_body: I've gone through so many mattresses in my 73 years. Many were expensive... and disappointing. Finally I found a memory foam mattress with a bamboo content top at a fraction of the cost of my deluxe name brand mattresses. 10 years later I'm still on that same mattress. For months I've sat on just one side, dressing slow healing wounds on my foot. You'd think there would be a breakdown on that side, but no, the mattress is as solid as the day it was new. The only problem was a mattress pad. Again, I've gone through a few of those, but none would satisfy. Finally I ordered this one, based on the good reviews. I could hardly believe how nice my first night's sleep was! I though I would miss the padding from the other pads, but it was a delight to just have a smooth comfortable surface to lay down on. A couple of nights ago I had a nosebleed in the middle of the night without knowing it. In the wee hours of the morning there was a large spot where the blood had settled. I sprayed it with water, to keep it from drying, and moved over so I wouldn't be on it. My wife washed the sheet and the pad that morning. Needless to say, the pad protected my wonderful mattress and all was as new again. I am so very glad I have this mattress protector. It is very worth it.

This is an amazing product! For the price I would recommend it to anyone. I have a special needs child who wets the bed and is not a toddler anymore. His size makes his accidents a large mess. This is not only a totally waterproof product but it does NOT have that plastic feeling that tends to make a mattress cover hot and uncomfortable. We have a memory foam twin mattress that is thicker than the average and the twin XL fit perfect. This has made our lives much better and clean up easier. We work everyday towards a totally toilet trained life...but until we get there this product is a must! I am ordering a second one. Thanks for a great product with fast delivery!

I recently bought a bed (also off Amazon - scary buying a new bed online, but it turned out great for the record) and decided I needed to get myself some stain insurance in the form of a cover. After looking around at Target and Walmart, I figured I would pull up Amazon to check what the internet had to offer. The SafeRest protector is cost competitive (if not cheaper than most walmart/target brands) and has fantastic reviews. I can't speak to bed bugs or anything, but it already saved me from staining my new mattress once when a guest spilled their drink on my covers. Absolutely recommend.

review_title: They did not have the opportunity to wash it before putting it on the bed but found that laying it out on the spare bed for a day after unpacking it allowed to expand nicely from it's tight packaging
review_body: I ordered this for my elderly parents. They did not have the opportunity to wash it before putting it on the bed but found that laying it out on the spare bed for a day after unpacking it allowed to  expand nicely from it's tight packaging. The two of them were able to get it on the bed, it fit snugly & they were able to get their flat sheet on over it without difficulty. They have not reported any spills or accidents yet so can't comment on they wetness protection but we are satisfied so far.

Received in the mail, promptly washed it alone with cold water, and dried on low.. ***Please note that the instructions say to wash on the DELICATE cycle and DRY on LOW***. The package states if you don't do this it will likely be damaged, which I believe.. I let mine dry on low for about 40 minutes and felt that was probably too long, I suggest checking it at 20 or 30 minutes instead.. Pros:. I like the cover, I will hopefully never have to test the waterproofness of the cover.. Construction appears above average, with a nice "terry cloth" surface. Had a pretty cheap one before that was tearing at the top and the edges, so this seems to be a lot better.. Bought this with our new Casper mattress to protect it and it fits well.. Cons:. A bit expensive for a cover, but seems to be worth the cost to protect a new mattress.. Middle of The Road:. Though I would overall agree with other reviews that it is not "noisy" per say, but if you remove your pillow and move around right on the mattress you can hear the waterproof layer shuffling a bit. This is not a real issue since most people will have a pillow, but if you sleep without a pillow for some reason that is something to be aware of.

I'm very happy with this purchase. I really didn't want to spend money on a sub-par product, and I was a little nervous since this was more economical than some of the other options on Amazon. However, I do not regret this purchase at all. I like that it is not crunchy and doesn't make any sound. You cannot tell that it is on the bed.. I purchased the king size, and it fits well. It did seem kind of loose when I first put it on, but it stays just fine especially with a regular sheet over it. Hands down, I would purchase this over more expensive options.

review_title: Not hot and full of plastic.
review_body: Perfect size for our new King Size Nectar mattress.  After spending $1000 on a Sealy Beautyrest Mattress and having it cave 2" over a 5 year period, this mattress protector was a necessity.  We had Sealy come and do their "sinking test' on our mattress but because we had stains on our mattress (we have kids but never thought about such an expensive mattress sinking so far so fast), they refused to do anything.  Their product was faulty and we paid the price because we didn't protect it with a mattress protector.. I refused to make that mistake again so when we got the new amazing Nectar mattress (like sinking into sleep- it's amazing- no more back problems!), I decided a mattress cover was an absolute must.  This one fits perfectly on the mattress and we don't even notice it.  I had a mattress pad at one point and it was so hot from the plastic that we threw it away, this one isn't plastic, it's perfect.  We haven't had any spills yet so I can't tell you how well it holds up but super happy with the way it feels and looks.  The other reviews I saw really reassured me that this one was the best option for spills though.

Bounty is pretty much the gold standard for paper towels. You all know they work completely as described but these have a couple of added advantages. One, the perforations are set closer together so if all you need is enough to clean a small mess you don't have to waste a full sized sheet. Tear at the second perforation and you have a full size paper towel for a larger job. Two, these are double size rolls so you don't have to change as often. Also you aren't using two cardboard cores.
My favorite paper towels.
As expected.
Paper towels
There was ants all over the outside of the box as well and all through the individual paper towels. We brought the box inside before we noticed and ants were all over our kitchen floor
Thicker so I have to use less and picking the size makes the rolls last longer.
Good quality paper towels. They have an extra perforation so you can use them like napkins!
Always reliable Always good
product is not the quality or amount of last order, amount of paper towels less than before. A big ripoff. I will not order these online again

I ended up tossing away the rolls that were exposed , because I didn't feel comfortable using the paper towels . This may not bother other people. Other than that , the actual  product was good .

These stuffer pillows seem to be a good quality and are nice and full.  Used them on my couch to replace the pillows that were inside of the pillows that came with the couch, because they had feathers in them and I'm allergic to feathers.  So this looks just as good or better than what was in there to begin with.  Don't hesitate to buy.

review_title: Nice, fat, pillow stuffing. Just like I like it!
review_body: What can I say? Super fat, super durable pillow inserts. I read so many reviews on other pillows and heard about flat pillows, and saw photos of inserts that looked like pancakes. Well, this insert was SO FAT, it almost didn't fit in one of my cheaper pillow covers. Exceeded my expectations.

review_body: Ordered 2 18x18 pillow inserts...got two rectangular don't care about the size!  I am tired of having my time wasted with incorrect shipments and then hassling returns.  What is so difficult?  Also, can't submit negative feedback...the app suddenly develops a "problem"
These soft stuffer pillows are perfect for several of the pillow cases bought here on Amazon. Hypoallergenic is important if you know of someone that has allergies..

review_title: These pillows are fabulous - great quality and prompt delivery
review_body: These pillows are fabulous - great quality and prompt delivery!  Ordered two this time but. will definitely be ordering more.  5 stars all the way!

review_title: The 2-pack was fine but the individual 24x24 was not the same
review_body: I ordered the 2-pack and one additional 24x24.  The 2-pack was fine but the individual 24x24 was not the same.  It was not vacuumed packed and was distorted.  It also was not same shape/size so now it doesn’t fill the pillow covering.
Purchased this insert as a set with the 18x18 El Paso Designs pillow cover.  Insert is way too small to properly fill pillow cover.  Am returning for credit.

review_title: ... fit perfectly inside a 18x18 pillow case and are nice and soft and cushy
review_body: These fit perfectly inside a 18x18 pillow case and are nice and soft and cushy. Ordered these without really knowing what I was getting and I couldn't be happier. Super satisfied and will probably ordered these again if I need more pillow inserts.

review_title: Exactly what I asked for and worked perfectly in a ...
review_body: Exactly what I asked for and worked perfectly in a pillow case I ordered.  Still holds to form, even though it was shipped flat in the package, but bounced out perfectly!

review_title: then this is perfect for you
review_body: This is a *very* fluffy pillow. Just fyi. If that's what you're looking for, then this is perfect for you; if you want something with a little more "give", try elsewhere.

My daughter is going to LOVE them!! I'm not quite done but the lights are beautiful. The settings are pretty neat too. They fade in and out or blink and a few other settings. I would definitely buy these again and highly recommend them.

review_title: Took some time to hang them for the effect I wanted, but very pleased.
review_body: They are so beautiful. I hung them behind my white somewhat sheer IKEA curtains and the effect at night is GREAT! It took some clear tape and thought to figure out how to hang them so they wouldn't conflict with opening and closing the curtains. I strung them so that they are hanging on the curtain rod posts, but not the curtain rod itself, if that makes sense. Very happy.

So the picture they must have used about 2 or 3 lights overlapped to make the whole wall filled in with lights. But in reality they are about a foot apart in distance. Still, super perfect amount of lighting for a bedroom. Soft yellow lighting an evenly distributed so there are no shadows coming from the ground or ceiling. It makes the room glow but a romantic glow I guess. If I get more string lights for like a party or something I'll for sure order these bad boys.

review_title: Not even, more or less 9 feet.
review_body: Mine must have been used before. I don't remember how the box was, but whoever tied/made it didn't measure correctly. I still made it work after 30 minutes of work, and it still works to this day, but it was frustrating.. Update: the seller contacted me!. The message/email was very nice, unfortunatly I already spent all that time hanging it up and re-tying it.

My only complaint, if any, would be wishing there were more strings than there are, like maybe separated by 3 inches instead of 6 which would make it even better, but I'm probably just being greedy. It's beautiful and looks great in front of my window.

These lights are awesome! Used for a photo booth. I just suggest taking out and unwinding carefully so they do not get tangled. They have multiple light settings for the lights to blink in various patterns.

I’m a college student who bought these for my apartment and they are absolutely perfect. Good price, easy to hang up, and they give my bedroom a beautiful effect. I’ve only had them for less than a week and have already had a handful of people asking me where I got them. The one problem I have with the lights is that the plug/control box is at the top of the lights, meaning you will need an extension cord in order to plug the lights in. Luckily the main setting is something I’m happy with, but I’m also not tall enough to reach the control box, so I’d need a step stool in order to change the setting, which is a bit inconvenient. But overall I am very happy with my purchase!
A great set of lights for adding instant decoration and sparkle to backdrops. We used plastic hooks and strung this across a ceiling for a 'starry' effect.

review_title: The different settings are fun to play with
review_body: The lights are definitely not as warm of a color as the image shows, but other than that met all expectations! The different settings are fun to play with!

review_title: My daughter loves them. Great speed options and easy to hang.
review_body: My daughter loves these lights. Advice to all...DON'T UNTIE THE BUNCHES UNTIL YOU HANG THE MAIN LINE,easier to manage that way. I ordered 3 more to wrap around all 3 walls. The speed options are great too! I attached 2 photos you'll see the true length at the end of the stand.
I changed my initial rating from one star to five—my first unit didn’t work well and customer service fixed the problem for me. Great  product, great customer service.
Just used this for the first time and it works wonderfully!  You won't regret buying this one!

Smaller in size than I expected, so water steamed very quickly and was gone very quickly- even before it finished on one shirt. It didn't do the trick on the one shirt I needed it for. Probably just as much work as ironing honestly. so disappointed

I bought this steamer for travel and it fit into my suitcase easily.  Using distilled water and turning it on, it is ready to go in less than one minute.  I can steam several shirts in one use and the results are amazing!

review_title: Don’t use right before you leave
review_body: The steamer is a perfect size to travel with. You do need to be careful when steaming it does spit up gobs of water at times during steaming. The previous reviews said that and listed ways to remedy it like: hold it level, don’t overfill.....it happened even when all caution was applied. I wish it worked better because I love the company’s story that’s why I ordered it despite the reviews. Maybe yours will be better?

Surprisingly powerful steam for this small unit.  Handles well, easier to use than my floor model, & eliminates wrinkles quickly.  Wish it held more water, but lasts long enough for most jobs & size makes it very convenient to pack for that trip.

review_title: Great steamer for home or travel
review_body: Very happy with this steamer. It's similar to one I bought a couple of years ago, and I considered getting a different type since my old one is in storage somewhere, but the reviews were really good. This one seems a little easier to use and handle than my older steamer, and very straightforward. Sometimes, like a standard iron, steamers can spit water out unevenly, but that hasn't happened with this one.. If you're looking for a compact steamer, I think you'll be very happy with the size of this one. The price is very fair and prime shipping makes it an easy choice if you need one quickly. From the time of turning it on, it takes about 1 minute to produce steam. The only person who wouldn't like it is someone looking to do more than 1 item per fill; this is for smaller tasks or refill a few times. Very glad I chose this one!
I returned this product because although it literally boiled the water inside, the steam did nothing. I tried it on cotton, satin, and even a thin sheer polyester.
This small, lightweight steamer is perfect for quick touch wrinkle removal  I always try to look my best and this steamer helps me do that.  I highly  recommend this product.
Save your money. This steamer is very ineffective and hard to use..easier to get a small travel iron. It did not get the wrinkles out of a simple blouse after a full tank of water.
Cleans well and easy to use.
As advertised.

review_title: With more than 2, 000 positive reviews, it ...
review_body: With more than 2,000 positive reviews, it might seem that there is not much more to say.  However, my mother's caregiver's suggestion regarding the use of this scale has to be unique.  My mother is not able to stand on a scale, and we have been unable to weigh her for over a year.  Hospitals have wheelchair and bed scales, but will not allow us to weigh her if she is not admitted.  At her caregiver's suggestion, I purchased two of the scales.  BTW, he is a big, strong fellow.  With one foot firmly planted in the center of each scale, he lifted my mother and held her in his arms while I recorded their combined weights on each scale.  I added the weight from each scale and subtracted his weight to get her current weight.  This will be helpful in managing her care going forward.  The scales performed perfectly for this application.

Looks good...very sleek. Accurately weighed my weights, so I'm assuming it's accurate when weighing me! (Okay, it also gives me the same weight as my non-dig scale.) Very happy with this purchase. Oh. As far as "getting a card offering free merch with a good review:" there was no such card in my box. Only the same type of card I see in all of my non-book orders..."if you like our product, please leave us positive feedback. If there's a problem with your purchase, please contact our customer service to give us the opportunity to make things better."

review_title: The scale looks good and is accurate and consistent
review_body: The scale looks good and is accurate and consistent. It takes a moment to light up in order to weigh, mostly because it is not clear where to tap, (I end up using my whole foot and stepping on it) and then, it takes a bit too long for the number to go away. This of course only an issue for those wishing to keep their weight a secret. I have to wait for it to disappear, being one of those secret types.

Inaccurate. I get a different reading every time I step on this scale. I am trying to lose baby weight and I can step on this scale back to back and get a different reading each time. What good is a scale if it doesn't do it's job? It LOOKS nice, but I don't need a scale that looks good and doesn't work

review_title: Scale that can measure weight "once" & accurately!
review_body: This scale weighs you accurately, is easy to read and doesn't require you to step on and off several times to eliminate the old weight number and then determine the new!  It is easy to pick up, light in weight, strongly lit to read numbers- - can't ask for more!  It is glass, so certainly could have breakage if dropped, etc but why not treat it carefully?  Best scale we've had for a long time! We really like it!!!

review_title: We had bought another brand from a store with good reviews, but it stopped working within a week
review_body: We had bought another brand from a store with good reviews, but it stopped working within a week. We took it back & ordered this one with Amazon. It was delivered promptly & it has been working very well. It is light weight which we love since we have back problems so it is easy to handle & lift. You can see the large digital numbers really clear without a problem. We are very happy with this bathroom scale.

My boyfriend and I are both on diets—I'm trying to lose weight, he's trying to gain it—and this scale is completely untrustworthy. We both get wildly inconsistent results when we try to use it. Just this morning, I weighed myself four times and got four different weights: 158.1, 165.2, 170.0, and 162.0 (in order of when I stepped on the scale). That's a 12 pound range. He has gotten similarly widely ranged results. To be clear, we placed our scale on a tile, bathroom floor and we have not moved it since putting it in the bathroom. Also, he and I have both calibrated the scale by stepping on it, stepping off it, letting it tare to 0.0, then stepping on it again. This is not a case of user error.. This is very frustrating if you are tracking your pounds and want consistent results. It's only really good for making your bathroom look like you care about health enough to own a scale. If you want to know your weight within 12 pounds, this thing will give you some utility, but if you want anything more consistent, invest a few more dollars and get a better scale. I'm returning this thing ASAP.

I had a scale before I decided to purchase this one, it constantly gave me an error message whenever I decided to try to weigh myself no matter how or where I would place the scale. I decided I would no longer have to deal with that scale with so many options on the market, and did some searching around amazon for a decent replacement.. After checking around to see what was decently rated scale, my decision was finally made. This was the one to order. Thanks to prime, i received it in the two days with absolutely no hiccups. I opened the box and took the package out. Nice and compact, no packaging was wasted with this scale. Took it out and tossed out my old scale. Placed it on the nice flat surface of the bathroom as I didn't want to get a fluctuating value coming from using it on a carpeted area. The readout on the display was correct.. Decided to test it out more, moved it around the bathroom just to make sure it would have the same readout. Thankfully it did so I could just a proper place to put the scale and keep it there to properly and accurately keep track of my weight.. As an overweight man, I was mildly afraid that stepping on the tempered glass surface would cause some kind of damage. I had never done so before in my life. Thankfully nothing happened, and the scale itself felt incredibly sturdy.. After giving it a go for weeks, I decided to try to weigh my large dog on it by comparing the weight readout on my own to the readout while carrying my dog. It worked very well for this too. So if you ever wonder what something may weigh and it's too wide or weirdly shaped you can go ahead and do a comparison to get a very accurate number.. I'd recommend this scale over many others i've tried. The scale hasn't failed me in the seven months i've had it, and i'll be sure to report any issues with it promptly.

review_title: Exactly what we needed, looks great
review_body: This scale is just what I was looking for. Looks great, has a backlit display, and provides quick/accurate readings. I don't need a scale with any fancy features, just one that I don't have to hide when company comes over, and I know will provide a reasonably accurate reading.. The only negatives I would have for this scale is that the glass has to be wiped down every couple days because it shows smudges and dirt really easily. You also need to make sure it's on a flat surface or you will get really weird reaction readings, but that's probably typical for any scale. Either way, I'm satisfied with my purchase.

review_title: Good for the price, no frills
review_body: Purchased this scale to replace an old dial scale that had issues with the inner load springs after years of use. Overall, the scale seems to be solid so far.. Pros:. - Size - It's thin enough to slide out of the way under a vanity (if yours doesn't hit the ground). - Easy On - Step on it and it will kick on. - Seems to be "pretty" accurate (see cons). - Sleek design and glass make it very easy to clean. Cons:. - The only issue I have with this scale thus far is that it seems to round the weight a little bit. I seem to always be XXX.8 even though if you watch the numbers it will start out with a .4 or .6 and then finalize as .8. I have only had the scale for about 3 weeks so I will keep checking on this, but I found it odd that it would not read exact.
Rolls are a little "light" and the quality isn't as good as something like Bounty but its okay for the price and gets the job done.
Great deal for a nice product. These are very absorbent and tear off easily.
Great value, thick sheets
The quality is the same as brand names! I was very skeptical but the reviews don't lie!
Great deal and paper towels are very good quality. Makes my life easier so ty 💜

review_title: It would get 5 stars if the price was better.
review_body: The thickness and strength is very decent. It would get 5 stars if the price was better.

Good quality paper towels that I've been using now for about 4 months.
Thinner than I expected. Not likely to purchase again for cost/quality comparison.
Rough paper, but tough and absorbent.

review_body: We use lots of paper plates etc.  One of these 100 quantity lasts at least 6 months at our house.  Two adults and no kids or we would use more
I was so happy to find this big box of trash bags as it seems i am constantly buying more. Thanks!
Great amount of bags for the price.
It is one thing to have your clothes smelling great with Gain, but now your trash?? Really helps to mask odors and when I grab a new bag it actually really smells good!
Perfect
These bags never disappoint. Very strong and keeps the odor contained.
Don’t break.
It's a nice garbage bag that seals in the odors.

review_title: Not the same as the ones I get at bj's ...
review_body: Not the same as the ones I get at bj's. Only 1/2 force flex and top was larger and didn't fit as well
There good trash bags.. I like the fragrance

Great cleaning cloths!  I personally hate touching microfiber, I really dislike the texture - BUT - when it comes to cleaning microfiber towels pick up so much more than traditional terry cloth towels.  These cloths work great for cleaning, really good at grabbing dust especially.  The blue and yellow did bleed a little in the wash - the white cloths now look a little dingy.  This doesn't both me, since they're just for cleaning, but if it would bother you just wash the white ones separately.  Would definitely purchase again.

I just got these yesterday and they are the perfect size for my Swiffer sweeper/mop. Since there are 24 of them I should be able to always have clean clothes to use. Better to use and wash than to have to spend nearly ten bucks every payday for the wet Swiffers. You get 24 of those in a box and I use 2 or 3 or more to mop my house. That gets kind of expensive. Now I know I can use as many cloths as I need and throw them in the wash to reuse again. I purchased these on the subscribe and save program so more will be coming when I am ready. BTW, my entire house, while small, is tiled. Well, except for the 2 bedrooms. With 4 dogs coming in and out all the time it gets quite dirty!

review_title: Just what I was looking for.
review_body: I love these!  Plus they are great to have under the sink in every bathroom and the kitchen.  I use them for cleaning, wiping spills, and wiping the rain off the dog.  I give them to my kids and they go around having a blast dusting because the dust actually sticks to the fabric and does not fly everywhere.

I was excited to receive my towels so quickly (it said it would be 3-5 weeks) in just days. Wow, this is a serious number of cleaning cloths. Exceptional value to get 24 towels for such a good price.. I've been cleaning all kinds of stuff with these microfiber cloths. It worked great on my telivision and other electornics. I had some water spots on my car that these little cloths cleaned right off. Nothing really exceptional in the kitchen or bathroom, but it seems to get the job done just fine. So happy I bought these. I thought how will I ever use 24 cleaning cloths, but I love them, so I had to pass some out to my friends and family so that they could enjoy these cloths too!

I manage a commercial cleaning company and we use these every day.  They work great for cleaning windows, and wiping down every other surface imaginable without leaving lint behind.  They wash well and hold up to a lot of abuse.

review_title: I bought these as facial cleansing cloths/towels to dry off ...
review_body: I bought these as facial cleansing cloths/towels to dry off with, because there are so many in a pack that I can use a fresh one every day. They worked really well for getting off oil from OCM without feeling too harsh and scrubby. I gave 3 stars though because they are absolute lint magnets. No matter what I washed them with they always ended up with little nubs of lint everywhere, and my hair and cat hair all tangled up in them too. Once they started leaving lint on my face when I used them, I had to stop.

review_title: No need to buy wasteful paper towels!
review_body: I use these cloths for all of my daily cleaning and drying dishes. They are awesome and you get a bunch for a great price! Microfiber cloths at normal stores are so expensive. These are high quality. They wash and dry well. I no longer need to keep paper towels in the house because I use these for everything, including cleaning glass and mirrors. They don't leave any lint behind. I've been using this pack for about a year. I will definitely order another pack when all of mine are worn out. You can bleach all of them and the colors stay intact!

I bought these for two reasons: I'm sick of buying so many paper towels, and rumor has it that microfiber cloths clean better, anyway. Rumor was right. These cloths pick up all sorts of gunk and are durable. They hold up well after washing (remember! no fabric softener with them in the wash!). It is kind of a pain to have to wash them instead of just throwing them in the trash, but even though I'm not the greenest girl in the world, even I feel a little guilty about using so many paper towels. I use these for general cleaning, and have different sets designed specifically for glass/mirrors and dusting. They're all great, and over time, will save you money. How great is that?. P.S. I still use paper towels for the bathroom cleaning, because, well because otherwise that's nasty.

review_title: They get the job done right!
review_body: I ordered these AmazonBasics Microfiber Cleaning Cloths to use to apply the Meguiar's D15601 Synthetic X-Press Spray Wax on my automobile. They prevent the car’s coat from being scratched and leaves lint and streak free results. I recommend them to anyone who takes pride in keeping their automobile looking good all the time!

First of all, the colors are far more vibrant than depicted here.  That said, these cloths fall short in quality as they are not the more desirable 80%/20% ratio of fibers.  They are quite thin but do an adequate job with most applications.  Per some of the reviews I gave them a vinegar soak to set the dye and pre-washed them, I have not experienced any of the dust issues or the transfer of color mentioned by some others.  They have washed well so far and air dry in a few hours.. For the price, these cloths may suffice but my first choice can be seen in another of my reviews and I will likely never reorder these.
I have used these bags for years and they are tough.  The drawstrings don't rip apart when you tie them tightly and if you over stuff the bag it can handle that.  Money well spent!
great buy, and really strong
these hold garbage as well as any other trash bag.  if you have garbage, consider holding it in these.
Good price with prime pantry

review_title: Decided to stop buying cheap bags that rip and buy ...
review_body: Decided to stop buying cheap bags that rip and buy these pricey things and what do I get? A whole box of defective bags that come pre-ripped for me. There's a hole in the seam at the bottom of every one I pull out of the box.
they leak a lot
Kept ripping.

There is no other paper towel that has the power that bounty does. I tried a bunch of others, but I am back to this even though they are more expensive
Taking care of my elderly parents, we go through a lot of paper towels.  Bounty is a good paper towel. Like getting a case at a time.
Bounty is my favorite paper towel and I get them on Subscribe and Save.  I only gave 4 stars because of the price.
This should hold us over at our cabin rentals for a few months.  Will be purchasing this product again in the near future!

SUPER disappointed because the filtered water is actually really delicious - better than the regular filter. However - I returned and requested a replacement filter because it stopped filtering properly and I thought it was a one-off situation. These filters are super poor quality and I the second filter stopped filtering properly even much sooner than the first. Returning both now and going back to the regular filter. It takes up to an hour to refill my pitcher. No Thanks! I and my dog need fresh water.

review_title: Does not fit in the pot well and it filtered very slow
review_body: It does not fit well. The water drops one little drop at a time. Took forever to filter the water.. After I tried several weeks, the update is I have to rate it as 1 star. It only came out one drop at a time slowly, took 10 hours to filter an half pitcher of water. I only tried one so far, maybe another one is better.  It comes as a set of two. Turned over I can see it is not like other filters have 4 holes, it only has one out hole that is the reason filtered so slow.. I will never repurchase it for sure.

review_title: Works well love that you don't have to buy so many or ...
review_body: We own a Brita Ultramax Dispenser and don't have any of the issues people are complaining about.  Works well love that you don't have to buy so many or replace them as often.

review_title: I opened the second one and its completely fine now. But unfortunately i need to contact brita ...
review_body: I have the pitcher 5 cup version i believe. Its small and red. Anyways, I ordered the long lasting one and the first one i opened is weirdly put together. It keeps popping out. I opened the second one and its completely fine now. But unfortunately i need to contact brita in getting another replacement out of the two i ordered. The one on the left in the picture is the defect.

I have always been a fan of the Brita filter, and I loved the idea of a longer lasting filter. But this filter drains slowly to the point where I would fill the pitcher the night before, and the next morning, after a good night's sleep, it is STILL DRAINING! Otherwise, it seems to perform as it should from a taste/smell standpoint. But the glacial pace of filtration definitely gives me pause as to whether I'd stay with the "longlast" filters, or go back to the more reasonably draining but shorter lasting filter.

Brita filters are amazing. I am in college so I don't have easy access to good tasting, filtered water in my room. Using my Brita pitcher and these filters makes it easy to fill up the pitcher with tap water and get clean great tasting water. I have tried to use generic brand filters before, but they really do not compare to these Brita filters. The taste is amazing and they last a long time before needing to be replaced. I also really like how the pitcher has a notification system to let you know when to swap a new filter. The price on Amazon is also a great deal.. I highly recommend these filters for anyone who uses a water pitcher filtration system.

I received this timely and I was thrilled about that since I was on vacation and I didn't want to be buying bottled water everyday.  I already had the Brita and this put me in a good situation to get filtered water quickly.  This is a great idea for those of us who are out of town and don't have filtered water available at the vacation spot. My daughter taught me this trick of using a Brita and I won't go anywhere without an extra filter.

review_title: Clogs quicly; Brita offered minimal help.
review_body: The quality of water that comes out of these filters is fantastic, but they clog within a couple weeks for me. I live in New York City, which is known for having darn fine tap-water, so it's not like I'm shoving lake sludge through these filters. Fortunately, Brita has been generous enough to replace the filters as they know there is a problem with them, but the solution to that problem has been delayed repeatedly. Bummer!. EDIT: Brita eventually stopped replacing their faulty Longlife filters so I'm downgrading the review to 1 star. The filters are too expensive to replace every 2 weeks, especially since they ought to last 6 months. I hope Brita gets their act together with these.

Brita water filters do exactly as they claim, they filter water where your plain tasting tap will taste as fresh as a filtered bottle of water. At first I didn't think it was really filtering all that much, but the taste was noticeable, but after you switch it out according to their calendar time, you'll notice the new filters are filtering faster meaning you old one had become gunked up with whatever you would have been drinking had you not used one of these. Overall much cheaper than constantly buying a case of water, and more environmentally friendly than all the plastic you would have wasted. Go you!

one star because no lower rating.. After 5 weeks and maybe a gallon or soof  water filtered, the filter flow through time very very very slow..  it took more the 5 hrs. to filter one qt. of city  tap water.  I took out the filter from the britta pitcher , shook it , tapped it against the drain board and returned it to the pitcher for the same result.  This product is a disgrace to the seller and manufacturer .  I paid extra for extra service and got less than what I would have gotten from the cheapies I have bought in the past from Walmart. Not a satisfied customer in the least sense of the word. Does Walmart sell Pure?
These plates are so durable and large enough for a full meal. The price is great also
Nice size, pretty sturdy.  Ordered for the office and they do the trick nicely.
Great quality plates, and love the fact I can have it on auto order that way is one less thing on my list to do.

review_body: Plates are very thin.  Quality not as described.  I will return

Very good price and very good product. Stores would not like  this review...even  SAMS or COSCO>>>>>> just check prices... I certainly did !!! Always order this product fr Amazon if you use  lots of Paper plates!
Very happy
Was left out in rain when could of been put on covered porch-everything drenched

How can you go wrong with a name like Dixie? Not here in Georgia. They are an excellent paper plate and I sang "Dixie" all the way to the grocery store to buy a pack of 24 for $2.35. Then along came Amazon with a pack of 24 for $1.72 each if you buy a box of 10 packs. Who can turn down an offer like that for some of the best top of the line 10" paper plates? Not me. I figure the box of plates will last at least six months but when they run out I will be back to Amazon to buy some more. We may talk slow but we are very fast to catch a good deal.

I love these plates. They cost a little more than others and there is a reason why, they're very durable. Cheaper plates don't hold up well and some are so thin the food leaks through them. These plates do not do that! They're great if you have kids to use for snacks, if you're having a picnic, eating at the park, etc. They're also great for pizza night, sandwich night, and when you just don't want to do dishes.
They work fine on left overs
The best paper towels on the market!
My favorite paper towel. I don’t like buying any other brand.

review_title: These paper towels are hands down the best. We have 3 great dane puppies so 1) ...
review_body: These paper towels are hands down the best. We have 3 great dane puppies so 1) they're still potty training and 2) they make BIG messes. These feel like a cloth and really absorb everything really well. These are definitely our go to paper towels. And we go through a lot so we like buying them in bulk.
My fave paper towels. I buy generic on almost everything except these.

review_title: The best paper towels we've ever used
review_body: The best paper towels we've ever used!!! Always buying the Sam's Club (Members Mark) ones but we use FAR less of these to clean the same messes. The only brand we'll use from now on!

review_body: Rolls are a lot smaller than I thought they would be but Viva are great paper towels.

I'm not impressed, especially with how good the reviews on these are. A few people told me the quality is lower than it used to be, they are less thick and cloth-like. Never a good idea to lower your product quality!

review_title: Does not tear as easily as the other "select a size" I appreciate
review_body: Thick, soft, absorbent.  Does not tear as easily as the other "select a size"  I appreciate that

review_title: I love these but they stick to each other so you ...
review_body: I love these but they stick to each other so you have to find the end each time you want to use one
the best ever.  soft, can substitute to toilet paper and tissue.  Keep a roll in all my vehicles..

I used the protector right out of the box (my little old lady of a dog has occasional accidents and I don’t have the heart to kick her out of the bed!) and did not find the noise to be a problem, though I’m usually bothered by such things. There is a note included that suggests washing it first first to reduce the issue, and specific washing temp instructions. Also while it seems like it should work, I (fortunately) have not had any doggy accidents or spills so I cannot attest to how well it does its intended job!

Washed and dried per manufacturers recommendations and it has so far been waterproof! My son sometimes has his diaper leak, so this is a life saver. It even protected against cat urine! We bought one in December that turned out to not be water proof at all, and I spent hours trying to save his mattress. So I was very skeptical when buying and using this, as we've been let down before. But, I'm very happy. We will be buying one for our king size bed, as well.. Now, if only they could make a couch cover, we would be over the moon!

Seems well-made, fits correctly, didn't stink of plastic very much when taken from the package, doesn't make crinkly noises, and doesn't make me sweat in bed (like some other waterproof covers I've tried).  I've run mine through wash and dry a few times with no issues.. When my cat horked up a very wet hairball on my bed I had no worries about the mattress. However I had to wash the cover of course, and since this happened about 3 AM it was an inconvenient time.  I realized that while I had spare sheets and spare blankets, I didn't have a spare mattress cover for middle-of-the-night incidents.  So I ordered a second one to keep in the closet.. You might consider that if you need one of these, you actually need two, so a clean one can be available at a moment's notice.

review_title: Great reviews on this mattress protector so I gave it ...
review_body: Great reviews on this mattress protector so I gave it a shot. It looks good and feels good. You won't notice it's even on the bed. The one thing I didn't consider when researching these was if you have the cooling gel in your mattress this protector will cancel  the cooling effect. I tried  it two nights with it on and both nights I was sweating. If your a warm body like myself,  you may have the same issue.  If your a cool body then this will probably  fit your needs.

review_title: This mattress protector is a good deal and from everything I can tell
review_body: This mattress protector is a good deal and from everything I can tell, completely as advertised. I purchased it to protect a queen size memory foam mattress. It is soft and easily put around the mattress. Speculation about whether it's waterproof or not is something I cannot answer as I have not spilled anything on it. However, there appears to be a couple of layers of material, including one that I thought might be impervious to liquids. My fear that it would be noisy and crinkly was laid to rest after I put it on the mattress and sat down. Still not convinced I laid on it and heard nothing. I didn't tell my wife that I'd put this protector on and she was completely unaware. Excellent product at an excellent price. I'd buy again...

review_title: Great product! Will definitely buy again.
review_body: This mattress protector is wonderfully soft and works surprisingly well at keeping liquid from reaching the mattress. (I learned very quickly that puppies need to be taken outside _immediately_ after being released from their crate. It is not wise to attempt a brief play session on the bed first...lol) Although I was quite annoyed at having to strip the bed of its comforter, fitted sheet, and allergy bag, I was so grateful that the 4th layer, this mattress protector, although quite soaked with puppy urine, did not allow a single drop of liquid to pass through and onto my mattress. I can attest that this mattress protector washes up well. (Be sure to dry on low heat, so as not to damage the waterproof material.) I am also tickled at how easily it goes onto and fits my extra thick mattress--the elastic sides reach far beneath our Queen-sized bed, so it stays securely in place. After 3.5 years of use, I noticed it's time for a replacement. The waterproof material on the underside is starting to crack, and my stain release spray soaked right through. I am pleased-enough with this product that I'm purchasing it again.
Great price and easy to put on . I would recommend this for someone .

I have to admit that I purchased this mattress cover mostly on the strength of the reviewer who gave birth on it with no problems whatsoever.  I'm delighted to say that this cover seems to be all that, not that I'm planning on delivering any babies on it.  It fits well & is deep enough to comfortably hug the sides of our deep mattress.  The top is comfortable & doesn't sound plastic-ey at all, like others we've used in the past.  I know that any spills or cat hairballs won't stain our mattress.  I passed on other competitors because reviewers indicated that they fell apart in the wash, but I expect that the cover will wash & wear well, based on the other reviews.  I'm planning to update my review once I get it washed.  So far, so good.

review_title: Water stayed on top of like when water is hitting umbrella
review_body: I have two of these(full and twin) and so far I never have any spills but since I thought I'd test it. So what I found out is that it is temporary waterproof. I poured cup of water and it didn't go inside. Water stayed on top of like when water is hitting umbrella. But, when I was wiping them off I patted with towel and rubbed it to wipe, the protector got little moist not the mattress. The point is that I'm not sure if it will stay totally dry when accident happened and was soaked for a while. But when you have accident and had to remove it soon it is fine.

The SafeRest mattress protectors are excellent! I have one for every bed in the house.. They don't make that plastic-y noise and are very thin and soft. They're effective even though I can't even tell they're there!. In fact, they are so comfortable that I use more than one on the same bed for my toilet-training toddler! Here is what I do: I put one mattress cover, then a fitted sheet, then another mattress cover, then another fitted sheet. When accidents happen at night, I simply remove the top fitted sheet and the top mattress cover to reveal a fresh, clean, already-made bed. My toddler has a clean bed to return to in under a minute!
They are towels
Great product
Bounty/amazon switched dash purchases from the huge to family. The price is the same but there is about 10% less paper.  I will be canceling my dash button!

review_title: Save your money and purchase the original Select a Size...you don't need the aggravation.
review_body: Sorry but these are really thin, scratchy and doesn't pick up anything.  You cannot get it to tear off the roll at the perforations correctly, but instead just tears where ever it wants. I am a lifetime user of Bounty (select a size), but if Bounty is changing to the Quick Size Paper Towels...they lost me as a customer.  Save your money and purchase the original Select a Size...you don't need the aggravation.  If I could give it a minus zero, I would.

review_title: Not the same quality as the ones I previously ordered.
review_body: In the past I always ordered the Bounty select a size huge rolls.  The last time I tried to do that I got a message that said they were no longer available and were being replaced with the Quick Size.  I decided to give them a try and I have been very disappointed.  The towels are thin and not very absorbent.  As a number of people have commented, they say select a size on the roll but they tear unevenly.  Sometimes you get two towels instead of one and sometimes they tear unevenly.  I am going back to ordering the ones I was originally using.  There is less waste and they do a better job.

As the photo shows without ambiguity the “Family Size Rolls” do not contain the same amount of product as the Huge Rolls. The change in the “single sheet size” was indiscernible in using the product and doesn’t justify the manufacturer hiking the price on the Huge Rolls. Fewer towels = Buying more sooner. Greedy move.

Over the years of buying paper towels, I have found you might as well go for broke and buy the big guys! These do work pretty good! I can get them wet and wipe floors up and all kinds of things without it falling apart! Kinda like the commercial lol So for now this is the brand I will buy!

Arrived on Labor Day which is a plus and came nicely boxed nothing was crushed and now I probably have about maybe 2 months maybe 3 months worth of paper towel. We go through a lot of paper towel in my home and this is a great price point plus I love the brand and it comes to your door and you don't have to drag it home from the grocery store. All pluses for me highly recommended.

review_title: Bounty makes the best resistant and long lasting paper towels
review_body: Bounty makes the best resistant and long lasting paper towels. I like to clean my kitchen with paper towels and spray cleaning products. I do not like to spread the germs with the cloth towels. These towels are my first and last choice. I can clean everything form mirrors to bathrooms with them, and they will not leave tracks on my glass top stove range, or mirrors. Best deal for your money.

To spare myself the hassle of lugging large bundles, UPS delivers 20-roll case of BOUNTY QUICK-SIZE PAPER TOWELS to my door. Saves a little money. The best part is having a wad or half-sheet of these "quicker picker upper" at the ready for wiping major spills, finger tips, and sink when I'm done.

review_title: Works just as good as the big name brands for a much better ...
review_body: Works just as good as the big name brands for a much better price.  Why pay more for an equally good product.
dont buy these, worst quality paper towels ever. you get what you pay for

review_title: too expensive for what you get.
review_body: These are NOT "Giant Plus Rolls" - disappointed, I will not purchase again.  Don't waste your money, too expensive for what you get.

review_title: Not the big brand name, but respectable
review_body: Used to be a Bounty-committed buyer.  Tried these - they're not exactly like the big brand name, but serve very well.
What a great value!  I will never buy paper towels from the market again!  I love having a great supply and never running out!
my favorite paper towels

review_title: Saw reviews saying these smelled like mold or like fish
review_body: Saw reviews saying these smelled like mold or like fish. I believe I got the fish/urine scented rolls. Not buying these again. Thanks.
Will not buy again

review_title: Strong and thick enough.  Like the half size option.
review_body: Wipe up all messes.  Like the half size option.
Best towels for the price and this is a repeat order

review_title: If price is your thing, get these.
review_body: These pillows are decent but didn't last on the fluff factor. They are getting pretty flat over the last three months of leaning on them.
It works very well. I put it inside a pillow case.  It's a bit soft, but I expect that for a couch/decorative pillow.  I would give it 4.5 stars if I could, but they won't let me give half stars.

soft, firm and cozy, these little pillows fit perfectly in the decorative pillow cases I owned already and they look beautiful on my couch and on my bed. They are comfortable enough to rest my head on too. Great value and quality.
Great pillow form for my needlepoint tapestry.  Arrived quickly, too.
Nice insert, but it is not very full. I ordered the 22 inch for my 20 inch pillow cover and it still doesn't fill it out in the corners. Otherwise, an acceptable item.
Just as described and came to my door super fast!!!! I was excited to use them for my new pillow covers. Easy to insert. Would buy again!

Good value pillow.  Bought the 24" to fill a 20" pillow.  Looks good.  Only call out is that the corners of the insert are not well filled.  Had to try and shift filling around inside insert.  Not too successful.

No complaints!  Nice and clean (no smell), fluffy and moldable for comfort, but not so soft that it smooshes down.  Following other's suggestions, I purchased a 26x26 for an approximately 24x24 cover for a full/fluffy look.

I totally love these inserts. My friend sent me pillows from Ireland and I asked her not to stuff them to save postage. I found these on Amazon and truly they are the best. I was so happy that you told me to order a size larger than the covers. Worked perfectly. Again many thanks!
Very good "filler" pillows. Firm, thick, not skimpy on the stuffing like some kinds. They don't smell funny or feel weird. Good value for 2 for $7.99!!

review_title: Buy these but do not undo all off the ties until the top is hung!
review_body: I just put these up tonight in our living room and they are so pretty. I love the different lighting options but I chose to leave them on constantly for a more relaxing light. I was surprised at first because they are not like the battery-operated fairy lights I have seen before but are a little bigger and heavier LED bulbs. As others have said: do not indo all of the ties until you have the main top piece hung.. In my case I bought a Mainstays Cafe Window Curtain Rod 28"-48" in Bronze, Mainstays Marjorie Sheer Voile Curtain Panel in Artic White Color,  and Home Details Curtain Rings (clips) in Bronze from the local big box store. I had already hung the curtain and then easily attached the lights with the curtain ring clips. I have mine plugged into a plug-in timer so they will automatically turn on and off.  They add a nice romantic ambiance to the room and allow is to watch TV with just a little back light. I highly recommend.

review_title: These are very pretty, exactly what I was looking for
review_body: These are very pretty, exactly what I was looking for. You definitely get a lot of lights and a lot of length, it's a really great deal for the price. The plug is at the top so I folded the lights in half so that the plug was down at the floor so I didn't need to run an unsightly extension cord up my wall. The only reason I didn't give this a full 5 stars is because the lights get tangled so easily, it was a real pain for me to get them up. But once I got them up they looked amazing!. Two Month Update: Two strands stopped working already and the whole set flickers. A little disappointing.

review_title: They add a beautiful ambiance to any room
review_body: These are so cute! They add a beautiful ambiance to any room, we have them up as holiday decor and we used them as a backdrop for a selfie station at our holiday party. One stand worked well on a large window, we've had them up for a few weeks and they are still going strong. Used an extension chord to hook them up as the chord is short as everyone else has shared.

So far so good. After reading some of the reviews I was a bit nervous but they all work beautifully. I took care taking them out of the box and made sure to hang them before unraveling each strand and didn't have any problems with tangling. My 12 year old daughter is in love with them and so far they withstand the occasional tug from the 3 year old. Very pleased with this purchase!

These were a really nice touch at the baby shower when the sun went down. Word to the wise.. do not take off the little twisty ties until you lay it out straight. We took off all the twisty ties and then had to sort through all of the strings. I love how it had multiple setting too.. twinkles, flashing, etc. I will probably use these at my house now that the baby shower is over!

I love these lights.  I used them for Christmas outside under the eaves on my deck.  I think they would be lovely inside too.  I like how easy it is to string multiple sets together.  I also like the different settings for blinking.  The only thing to be aware of is that the electrical plug will not fit into the end of conventional set of Christmas lights so if you are trying to use them in combination, you might need an additional extension cord.

These are beautiful! They were very easy to put up. Each strand was individually twisty tied so i put the whole string up on the wall and then untied each. My only issue is that the wire going into the plug is black! It stands out pretty bad. All the other wire is clear. Not sure why they would make it that way.

I purchased these lights because my daughter wanted twinkling lights for her room. She loves them!! She likes the fact that she can string them on the walls or above her window with curtains. She also loves that there is a remote that controls the the lights... to keep the steady, twinkling, plus other settings. All in all, a great product.
Worked for maybe 5 minutes then stopped working completely.

Love these lights, and they come clipped up so they don't get all tangled up.  Definitely recommend leaving them tied up until you have hung them, then let the strands down.  Love the options of the patterns, only wish they came with a remote.
This is such a handy compact tool. I can't believe I didn't get one of these things sooner.
I hate to iron. I won't iron. I was skeptical this tiny thing would do the job. It works great!! It works on all my garments. A keeper!!

I actually chose this steamer over another brand because of their policy of hiring the disabled. And I was blown away by how fast and how well it works. It's super easy, lightweight and it takes out the wrinkles while not giving that overdone starched look. I love it and am only sorry I didn't buy one sooner!!
This steamer steams clothes just as well as our Jiffy. I love were of use and portability of this steamer and look forward to taking it with us on upcoming road trips.

Great little steamer!! Easy to use for many things and mine did not come with instructions, so the manufacturer sent out a full set of printed instruction by overnight FED EX!! I was shocked and extremely happy at the same time!!!
We returned it didn’t do anything, husband went over wrinkles like 10 times just made the shirt wet and hot

This worked well and would be excellent for travelling.  If I was going to purchase again, I would buy a bigger one as this one runs out of water fairly quickly.  No other complaints, works as expected and a nice item to have for those clothes you can't/shouldn't iron.

When looking for a travel steamer I first went to Bed, Bath & Beyond. The products they offered were bulky. The iSteam is perfect size.. Take care not to overkill with water...leave room for the water to boil
Fantastic steamer! I use this all the time.

review_title: I am very pleased with this product and I would recommend it to ...
review_body: The steamer heated up fast and got all the wrinkles out of my wedding gown. I am very pleased with this product and I would recommend it to a friend.

review_title: Genuine Name Brand. Work Very Well.
review_body: Pads are genuine brand name and work well.
As expected, theyre Swiffer sheets. Cleans up all the pubes.
They are great
great price
Exactly what I expected.
They work great
great deal!

review_title: This is for dusting not cleaning, mopping
review_body: They're super thin I don't think this is what I was looking for to clean the floors.
Always happy with them
Good for new cleaning supplies

I’ve had this for exactly one day and I am unimpressed. I have stepped on the scale about 20 times and each one is a different weight and there is a difference of up to 15 pounds within minutes of trying to get my weight. My husbands came out about 20 pounds too light (he happened to go to the doctor this afternoon so we know his actually weight). Then we weighed my kids and it said my five year old weighed more than my eight year old (she is clearly much smaller) and it took forever to even have the numbers settle on a weight. It’s on a hard, flat bathroom floor. There’s no reason for this and it’s not worth sending back refunds. I spent $20 on garbage apparently.

This is the worst scale I have ever purchased. No- this is the worst scale I have ever even USED. First I weighed myself (146.4). Then, immediately after, I weighed myself holding a few books and got three pounds LIGHTER! Next, I weighed myself three times in a row and got three different weights (135.4, 139.2, and 143!) I've read that it helps to "recalibrate" so I took the batteries out, left them out for two minutes, and tried again. Still the same miserable results. I would not recommend this scale to ANYONE.

I've been focusing on my fitness and overall health lately. I bought this scale so I could track my weight loss, and it definitely does the trick. It's very consistent. The only caveat is that you want to make sure your weight is centered - sometimes when I hold my hands slightly away from my body, that affects the reading. However, I think that is a plus, that it is that sensitive.. Physically, the product is sturdy and discreet with a sleek design. It's low enough that I can store it underneath my bathroom sink/vanity, and I can also easily pull it out to weigh myself every morning. There's a little bit of grip on the bottoms of the feet, but it's just enough. It doesn't interfere much with pulling it out, but my scale always feels steady and firmly placed when I step on it.. Good product, would purchase again.

This is a great scale.  It arrived quickly. Easy to read in the dark. Goes to 400 pounds.This scale is so good I bought another one.!. my Second scale arrived quickly, nicely packaged.  One nice thing about this scale is that it will zero in on a set weight.  No more rocking back and forth while the numbers go up and down.  I'm assuming it is settling in on an average weight.  And once again I'd like to mention how easy it is to read in the dark.  the blue LED read out is perfect. It is an excellent value.

Awesome scale. I was looking at some much more expensive digital zcales when this showed up as a lightning deal. I bought it on impulse without knowing anything about its quality. I figured at the price it would not be great, but I could risk it. I am totally pleased with the quality the weight seems very accurate I don't have to sit and wait I can just step right on it's a fantastic piece of equipment. It appears well built it looks sleek , I will probably seek out this brand in the future.

review_title: Only lasted a year and a half - update
review_body: Update: etekcity immediately contacted me and sent me a new scale free of charge! Back up to 4 stars they go for customer service! Hoping it was a fluke as this new one works great!. Well I'm updating my rating for a 4 to a 2 star. A year and a half later it has stopped working. I can SOMETIMES get it to work by stepping one foot on first and then put the rest of the weight on. But even that normally takes 3-4 chances. As for the great rating this has, I could have a dud, the reviews could be fake or other people don't come back and update their review once it breaks. Maybe it's worth the risk to you?

This thing worked fine for 5 months and aligned with what I weighed when I would go into the doctor. Lately (last two weeks or so) the scale has been creeping up in weight so I've been reducing calories more and more then finally going zero-carb and maintaining an 800 calorie deficit. I woke up and weighed in this morning then worked out for an hour at the gym while consuming exactly 1/2 gallon of water during. I weighed in at the gym at 15lbs less than the scale reported on an empty stomach first thing this morning.. tl;dr I bought a new scale this morning and threw this one in the trash.

This is an attractive scale and is small enough to slide out of the way, under a cabinet which is nice, but it totally sucks. When I pulled it out of the package and set it on the floor I got on it and was informed that I weighed 134 pounds. I was a little surprised that I supposedly had gained 5 pounds in two days. Got back on it and it said I was 129.5. Hmmm. I stepped on it a third time and I was 131 pounds. That was all about an hour ago. I'm now 128. My weight fluctuates but not within a 20 second to one hour period. If you're looking to get a ballpark weight for yourself, this will be fine. If you actually want to know how much you weigh, buy a better scale.

review_title: Great scale and easy to read
review_body: Got my scale today and already love it! I'm currently 20lbs down in 6 weeks with a revamped diet and exercise.  My old scale broke so I had been borrowing my mother-in-laws scale that was a balancing scale.  Weight this morning was 214 and weight tonight on this new scale was 214 so I'd say it's accurate.  :) no more guessing what number it's on and the digital numbers are bright and easy to read.  Very happy with this one already

review_title: The scale looks and performs EXACTLY as hoped, and of course, shipping with Prime was extremely fast.
review_body: Right out of the box, it looks pretty nice and seems quite durable. Just remember to remove the plastic isolator from the battery on the bottom, or it won't work!. With that said, it's a scale, so you don't want to be rough with it, just because it seems durable.. Immediately I stepped on it and was hoping for a lower number, go figure, so was my wife. We were both disappointed with the numbers we saw after a winter of laziness and over-eating, so just to be sure, I grabbed some rarely used weights and decided to test the accuracy of the scale.. First, a 10 lb weight......reading was 10.0 lbs. After a few seconds, it zeroed out...... Second, I added a 5 lb weight.....reading was 5.0 lbs. After a few seconds, it zeroed out...... Third, I added another 5 lb weight......reading was 5.0 lbs. After a few seconds, it zeroed out...... When I removed all (3) weights totalling 20 lbs.......it showed a stored reading of 20.0 lbs. EXACT ACCURACY, to the 10th of a pound!!!. I repeated the same test, and got the exact same result.. Damn......time to get back to hiking now that it's warming up. lol. Here's a tip!. Go to your orders on Amazon, and get the order number. Go to the Etekcity website and sign up, go to your email inbox and confirm the account.. On their website, go to the warranty section, and enter the order number. Then your product will be warrantied for 1 year (read the details, of course). You have just 7 days to do it.

I have purchased many microfiber cloths. We use 50/100 a week on peak cleaning days. When they arrived I put them in the washer in cold water. They ALL rolled up on the edges and shrunk. Very thin and after the 2nd washing 75% are unraveling. Rarely do I post reviews however, if you use microfiber cloths daily in your business don't purchase this particular brand. Terrible and I'm very disappointed.

review_title: Good for cleaning, color bleeds - wash each color on it's own at least 3 or more times on a heavy cycle before use.
review_body: The cleaning ability of these is very good, they grab dirt really well.  I'm not happy with the color bleed.  I washed them multiple times to try and get out the runny dye they use.  The white cloths color is ruined, it grabbed the color of everything else so I'm not happy about that.

These cloths are very efficient and great to use, although make sure you hands are not to dry because the cloths catch on any chapped bits. They are efficient and an appropriate size. It's nice to have multiple colors (3) so you can assign them different roles, and yet have many replacements.

Shipping was super fast, and these are very descent cloths.  Never had them before, but wanted something for my tv and small device screens.  Worked perfectly.  I will be buying these again as soon as the ones I have need replacing, although they are washable so shouldn't be too soon.. They are fairly big, which is especially nice for the 55" LCD TV... can spray part of the cloth with the cleaning solution (for LCD's) I got from monoprice, clean the screen quickly, then use the rest of the cloth for drying and polishing.  Perfect size I think.. Also, my cell phone screen has never been cleaner!  without cleaning solution... just wipe and go, like brand new

These are great for cleaning. I use them to clean and buff my granite countertops and appliances and they make them look like a million bucks.. The only downside is that you need to line dry them instead of putting them through a dryer cycle. They suggest washing all the towels before use, so the drying the first time around was a pain, but after that washing 2-4 cloths a week isn't a big deal.. Also, I have accidentally put some through the dryer, and nothing too major occurred.

I got these for my Swiffer Sweeper Cleaner Dry and Wet Mop, works great if a little big which is fine. Can use them for pretty must anything though. I didn't think they were too thin like other reviews said and they seem pretty sturdy and can't complain with that price.

review_title: Do not use on sensitive surfaces unless you're some sort of sadist
review_body: So glad I tested these out on the lip of my trunk before I used them on the rest of my brand new BMW. These things scratch BAD. Do not use on sensitive surfaces.

review_title: Great cloths for cleaning, saves on paper towels!
review_body: These are the best microfiber towels I've ever used!  Slightly larger than the cheap ones I used to buy @ the grocery store, they are the perfect size for home cleaning!  A dampened cloth even removed the soap scum from my shower door.  No harsh chemicals needed!

I actually hate how these feel in my hand --but I hate that about most microfiber cloths. If your hands are at ALL dry they sort of catch on every tiny bit of dry skin which is like a nails on the chalk-board feeling for me. Gah! But, they do a great job and they are a great buy. I just wear gloves if I'm dry dusting with them. If I'm wet dusting all is well.

review_title: This is a great value for the money
review_body: This is a great value for the money.  I use these for kitchen, bathroom, and garage.  These are great size for small cleaning job and will replace paper towels.  Instead of throwing these out, like paper towels, just wash them and reuse.  I waited three months before posting reviews so I can see how these will hold to daily use and I am happy to report I am still have 24 and did not have to throw any out!  I got these on subscribe and save for delivery every six months but at this rate, I will have to skip next delivery.  Overall great product and very reasonable price.

These bags are just like you'd buy at the store but you don't have to do the leg-work to load them into your cart, get through the checkout, unload them when you get home...  Do all your household goods shopping online and save yourself the aggravation of having to make a trip to the grocery store for miscellaneous items like these.  You won't regret the purchase.
