After seeing these filters, I thought it would be a great deal. Filter more water with less frequent filter changes. I was wrong. I have a 10 cup Brita pitcher and with the other filters (white ones), it would take about 5 to 10 minutes to filter. With these new ones (longlast), it takes an hour to Filter through the same amount of water. I will try the other filter that came in the pack and hope that the one I'm using is just defective, but it is very frustrating waiting so long for water, when with the other filters, it would take a fraction of the time.

review_title: Inexpensive solution to better tasting water with few chemicals
review_body: These are great for removing chlorine odor and taste and the bare minimum level filtration.  As some have noted, there is an issue with the filter not sealing the non-filtered water from the clean water tank.  If you put more water in the tank after the reservoir is full, water pressure will allow the two tanks to mix.. In order to prevent this, I wound several turns of Teflon tape around the rim of the filter. This prevents introducing unfiltered water into the lower reservoir.

These filters are nice, I guess. Don't have the tool advertised to measure the amount of minerals left in my water but based on taste, my water tastes fine. One of the two filters noticeably filtered slower than the other. Perhaps the way things were packed internally were different. Because of this annoyance, I removed a star. Other than that, they came individually wrapped and sanitized. Will consider reordering this item(s).

Initially, I thought this would save money from having to change water filters as often but these simply don't filter very well.. I still can taste the chlorine in the water after it has filtered.. Plus, the first water filter clogged up right away (I thought maybe it was defective) so we tried the second one in the pack and it flows better so far, but still not as good at filtering the water as regular water filters.

I'm basically reviewing the Brita system.  I've tried several of the off brand filters to try and save some money, but the only filters that I have come across that reduce TDS are the Brita brand.  Of course, there is Zero Water which is not an economical solution IMO and also reportedly has reported issues with turning the water acidic before the filter is "spent" and is still removing solids.  At any rate, there must be a DI resin in the Brita filters that the generics that I have tried do not have.  And this is the thing that I think is unrealized ... the Brita system does reduce total dissolved solids.  It is not just a particulate and carbon "taste" filter.  TDS out of our tap is around 150.  First pass from a new Brita cuts it in half.  Second pass cuts it by about 60% more.  I mix Brita filtered water, half and half, with distilled and need to get the Brita filtered water TDS down into the 30's so that, when mixed with distilled water (0 TDS), the mix is below 20 TDS.  I drink almost nothing but water and my water has to have virtually no taste at all.  Below 20 TDS, the water is taste free to my palate.  My wife drinks water with a little of the flavor that comes in the small squeeze bottles, and she drinks tea.  One pass through the Brita is fine with her.  Between the two of us, we get about 10-14 days from a Brita filter.  No where near 200 gallons, or whatever Brita claims.  But again, I have some strange requirements.  At any rate, 10-14 days is about the time where it takes 4 passes through the filter to be able to get the TDS down low enough for my palate (20 TDS or less, mixed with 1/2 distilled) and it becomes too much of a chore.  Probably not a bad thing to change the filter more often as the pitcher gets cleaned frequently.  The bottom line is that we really aren't saving much money using the Brita system over buying bottled water.  Maybe a few bucks because we don't need to buy spring water for my wife so it's convenient to only have to lug 3 gallon bottles of distilled from the grocery store each week for my finicky palate and no spring water since my wife is good with the Brita.  We haven't tried the PUR or any other system.  And we wont try the Zero Water because of the reported issues with low PH acidic water (sour) and the cost of the filters.  All in all, the Brita system works pretty well for us and the filters don't cost an arm and a leg.  We've been using the Brita for 3 or 4 years now.  There are often good deals here on Amazon for 5 or 6 packs of the filters too.  Not perfect, but a pretty good system for us.

review_title: These worked fine - for about a month
review_body: These worked fine - for about a month.  Then they started filtering so so slowly, it would take hours to fill the pitcher.  I went through four of these, thinking each time that the last one was a lemon and surely this one would last the advertised 6 months - but nope.  I mean, maybe they're still technically working at 6 months, but I shouldn't have to wait half a day for a single pitcher of filtered water.  I would suspect that this is due to our very hard water, but I didn't have this problem with the regular filters - they would slow over time too, but not that much that quickly.

review_title: Do not buy the "LongLast" blue filter! It'll never last more than a month.
review_body: This experience left a very bad impression for Brita product in me.. I started to use the blue last-long filter when I replaced one of my white filter early in July 2018. The first blue filter only works for two weeks then the water stop dripping even if I left it overnight. After taking out to wash/flush/shake/tap, it was still not working. I first thought it was my fault at some point. So, I changed to the second blue filter on prime day. It worked fine in the first week, water dripping fast enough. Today is exactly two weeks after prime day. The water almost stopped dripping through my second blue filter again.. How I use the blue filter?. I first filtered New York City tap water through the white filter in one Brita Metro pitcher. Then I poured the pre-filtered water into the next pitcher installed with a blue "Longlast" filter. I filtered 3 to 4 Brita Metro reservoir-size of water through blue Longlast filter per day.. It doesn't even survive 1 month. Brita claims it lasts 6 month? maybe, if you plan to filter laboratory quality ultra pure water at home.

I don’t get it. There are so many of us that are distressed about the extremely slow speed of this filter, and others who love it. Are ours defective? Why isn’t Brittany responding to all these complaints? It’s too much trouble to return the damn thing. Just another piece of Amazon-generated landfill.

I used this with the classic 48 oz. Brita pitcher.. On the plus side, it filtered water for six months. However, my experience has been like others who describe their experiences with slow filtration. We first noticed it a few weeks after putting it to use. We dealt with this by storing our filtered water in bottles. However, when we had high demand (like parties) it was was extremely frustrating to have to wait. There would be evenings I would fill the pitcher, then discover that it had not finished filtering in the morning.. I want to support a product that generates less plastic waste, and I hope the company can work out the flaws.

I'm glad to see that I'm not hallucinating how slow these long-lasting filters are. I had to spread the first three "breaking in" fills over a few days because the pitcher was so slow to fill. My first refill after the fourth fill took more than an hour-it started with one or two drops of water at a time and, I think, sped up (relatively) as it filled. Very strange.

I also loved that they were going to ship right to my house. It really helped me and my family get through a difficult time. They will make a return visit this summer when we make frequent trips to the pool. I won't leave home with my Dixie everydays!

No more washing dishes, just toss them when you are done.. Become civilized use these plates...

review_title: Built the same as more expensive "Premium" covers
review_body: I purchased this waterproof mattress cover when I purchased a new mattress for my kid's room.  I actually purchased a twin and a full size cover at the same time because, well, I was purchasing those size mattresses on the same Amazon order.  I didn't know anything about this specific brand of cover other than what was being said in these reviews and that the price seemed really good.  I have a Protect-a-Bed mattress encasement on my bed that is vinyl-free and has the terry cloth material and I have been very impressed with it for the past two years so I purchases the SafeRest cover knowing it was made of similar materials.  The SafeRest Premium covers I purchased look exactly the same as my more expensive Protect-a-Bed cover that has kept my mattress safe after countless toddler accidents.  Although my SafeRest Premium has yet to see any accidents or spills, I am confident that it will be able to serve it's intended purpose.  I am so confident, I recently purchased my third SafeRest Premium for another twin bed.

Nice mattress cover.  We made the investment in a $2000 tempur pedic and this was A MUST WITH KIDS AND PETS.  So far we have had vomit, pee , spilled drinks etc....NO ISSUES.. This cover does as it says.  Our mattress looks as good as it did the day we bought it!  Remember after a years worth of washing it's best to replace your protective cover!

review_title: Used every single day for 3 years!
review_body: Used every single day for 3 years by my eldest daughter.  It is truly water resistant (there were a few potty accidents when she was three), and have since purchased a spare.  I love this mattress cover, and if you have small children, you will too. Be aware that it will take a little longer in the dryer to fully get dry, because the cover is so water-proof.

I'm sure that seems like an exaggeration, but I have a very fussy 17 year old dog that has become incontinent. So while I'm at work I have to protect all surfaces. I have purchased 10 different protectors and she moves all of them out of the way to lay down because she doesn't like how they feel. With this it actually stays on the mattress (on top of the sheets) and KK has no problem sleeping on it. I have purchased 7 total so I can change them out daily. I'm so thankful I found this!

Love these mattress covers. I got the first two for my son’s bed when he was transitioning from pull-ups. Easy to remove, wash and dry. No odor to the cover. Feels soft. Protects the mattress really well! Not sweaty like plastic mattress covers. I liked it so much I bought one for my master bed for dust mite protection. Very comfortable- even in the summer months. I’ve bought this one for my guest bedroom. I’ve never had any of the covers tear or breakdown in any noticeable way.

review_title: The product does work but I have outlined the downsides
review_body: This is a good product in that it does protect the mattress. I have pets, so accidents do happen. I have found that nothing has gone through the cover, so I only need to throw this in the wash.. The downside of the product is that it feels hot.  The rubber or latex or whatever the lining is makes the mattress hotter.  Also DO NOT PUT IT IN THE DRYER.  Again, because of this rubberized lining, it peels if you put it in the dryer. I line dry it.

review_title: Works great! Just bought my second one
review_body: I was doubtful at first even after reading many reviews. My dog peed on the bed and I only discovered it later in the day after work. The pad protected my bed and although theee is a faint smell of pee, there is no stain at all. This has definitely dropped my stress level by a ton.. You can wash this in hot water but use only medium heat in the dryer. I bought another so I can rotate as I’m sure there will be another pee incident at some point.

review_title: Protect your investment with SafeRest Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof Mattress Protector
review_body: I purchased one matteress cover to test it out. It has saved my new matteress from many different accidental spills. It is very easy to wash & dry following instructions. There was a yellow spot that did not want to come out so I used some peroxide & it looks like new. This is one of the best products, in materials & dependability, that I have purchased in a long time. I have 3 new king mattresses & 2 new 4" memory foam toppers for the twin beds & they are all covered with protection from the King & Twin Size SafeRest Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof Mattress Protector.

review_title: Not noisy & fits great (even with mattress topper)

I purchased 3 queens in another brand based on reviews (and that one didn’t have stock in king) and this was the second choice based on much research and reading complaints in reviews of others being noisy.  I sleep on the bed nightly and have never heard this one.  I only purchased because I Airbnb my home occasionally and didn’t want anyone spilling or staining my mattress.  So far great and it held up to 2 washes already.

review_title: Definately saved the day and the mattress too.
review_body: I was holding off on giving a review because I hadn't even washed the cover yet but now I would give it 10 stars if that were possible.  I got this during the summer when we purchased a very expensive memory foam mattress.  A few days ago we had a very unfortunate accident on the bed and I was sure it was ruined.  Not only did the mattress cover keep any stain off the mattress but it washed completely clean with no hint of a stain; something I can't say for the sheets.  While I'm reviewing I want to mention that this is the first mattress cover that has deep enough sides to tuck under a 15" mattress.  I am going to order others for the extra bedrooms in the house.

review_title: Found these on amazon and thought it was a good deal for the price
review_body: I have been searching for 12x12 pillow for a long time now. Found these on amazon and thought it was a good deal for the price. Well, the pillows do fit my pillow covers, but they do not fill in the corners and leave bunny ears in the corners. I have just started to use, so have to wait to see if they hold all the punching and throwing by my little wrestlers.

These pillow inserts are great...firm, but not too much.... I bought 2 other pillow inserts at our local store & they were too soft...these were perfect...& fit the pillow covers... I would definitely buy again... great service..thanks!

review_title: Worked fine with Home Brilliant Decoration Corduroy Plush Throw Cushion Cover
review_body: Worked well with the Home Brilliant Decoration Solid Red Soft Striped Velvet Corduroy Plush Throw Cushion Cover we bought from Amazon. Puffy, soft and filled the cover well without being too stuffy. Recommended...

review_title: It came bunched to fit better in a small package
review_body: Cozy and light weight! It came bunched to fit better in a small package, but sprung back into shape quickly out of the package.

review_title: This pillow insert is cheaply made and poor quality. I have no idea how it got ...
review_body: This pillow insert is cheaply made and poor quality. I have no idea how it got so highly rated. The filling is lumpy and is about 3-4 inches short from reaching the actual corners or the insert. I ordered a size larger than my actual pillow cover and it still didn't fill the cover. And there was absolutely no filling in the corners. Save you money and buy a better insert elsewhere.

review_title: Cheaply made, plus the description says to buy a ...
review_body: Cheaply made, plus the description says to buy a 20 x 20 pillor for an 18" pillow cover. Did this, it doesn't fit.  Ordered a diferent pillow through Amazon, almost the same price, but the quality far exceeds this pillow.  Plus, it will cost almost $8 to return the item.

Per suggestion, I ordered a 20X20 pillow for my 18X18 pillowcase, and am very happy with my purchase. The pillow is super soft, wasn't overstuffed, and I had no problems fitting it into my pillowcase.
Seems to be poofy and sturdy enough but suspect it may not last. The filling doesn't reach the corners so you'll want to put extra stuffing in your pillow covers to compensate.

These were very easy to hang and use and they looked nice and worked properly.. They are not super bright I had planned to use them as a photo back drop during the day time but although it was an overcast day it was to bright from the daylight to notice the lights were on. But in the evening and night it cast a pretty glow.

review_title: Highly recommended, great set of lights!
review_body: Love these lights! They look so amazing on our window and are easy to put up. Quality is great, I have no complaints. I love the various flashing options- twinkle, steady on, fade, combination and more. Definitely a great purchase.

Real nice.  Be careful. THEY TANGLE EASY. May I suggest that once you have it unraveled, fold each strand separately and tie a twisty for storage.  Currently, mine is sitting as a big glob of tangle.  One day when my nerves are not shot, perhaps I will take the time to unravel.  The lights are nice and bright and all of the blinking functions work.

I love these twinkle star lights! I ordered them for my daughter's 1st birthday photo shoot and they looked great hanging behind light backdrop. I will be reusing them for future photo shoots and as decoration around the house. I recommend them for anyone looking to add nice little accent lights to backdrops, windows, patios, living rooms, dorms, you name it.

Attached these to the top of a backdrop for my daughter’s first birthday photoshoot. We used a plastic white table cloth and streamers to complete the background. It worked perfectly! Very happy with this purchase.

These are beautiful lights!! So long and they emit a nice soft light instead of a harsh bright light. I highly highly recommend this product. The reason I gave them four stars instead of five is because of the plug. The plug is towards the top and on a very short amount of wire, so you need an extension cord to plug them in. Also, while the lights strand is clear/white, the plug itself is black and bulky, which really stands out. Still love them though!!

I thought I had to return the second strand because when I connected it to the first one, nothing happened. Realized you have to connect the clear female connector rather than the first one. Anyway, got two and they are soooo much better than I expected. In fact, I think they are way underpriced for the beauty and quality. Not tacky looking at all. I hung them along the wall of my wine cellar and they make it look magical.

review_title: ... I just have to unplug and that's just a bad design to me
review_body: Man this is kinda silly but there isn't a setting to actually turn the lights off I just have to unplug and that's just  a bad design to me. I use them as a back light for the wall behind my tv and I don't want to have to plug and unplug all the time

review_title: Good for parties, not for bedrooms.
review_body: Too much space between each strand and the rope is obvious. These are good for parties and stuff, not so much for decorating a bedroom.

review_title: These are awesome. They aren't as tightly packed as the picture ...
review_body: These are awesome. They aren't as tightly packed as the picture -- I suspect its a picture of two curtains laid over each other. But they have a bunch of twinkle settings, they cover out full patio door, and can easily be decorated to look christmasy without being so inherently christmasy that they don't fit for anything else. We are leaving them up to brighten our house for the winter.
I absolutely love the Isteam! It's made my mornings much faster and is perfect on curtains!
Great compact little steamer. Heats up fast and is effective. I love that the company cares about and supports those with disabilities!

I love it! I bought a holiday dress for my daughter. The instructions said no ironing!  What??? The skirt was all wrinkled. I ordered the isteam and the wrinkles came out in minutes. So easy! I heard the company hires employees with disabilities. That’s wonderful. I definitely recommend this little (but powerful) steamer!

This is an impressive petite steamer that would easily travel in the smallest of suitcases. The steam is powerful and is produced in less than 60 seconds. Handling the device is comfortable and not weighty or cumbersome. I used the steamer with water filled to the minimum line to try it on a very wrinkled shirt. Though I didn't spend a lot of time trying to get out every wrinkle, the results were amazing. I'm pleased with this purchase and would recommend it.

I just bought my steamer a couple of weeks ago and have used it several times, it’s a little smaller than I expected but it works Great!!  I am sure it’ll be great for when I travel as well.  I don’t feel as I can give it a five star for durability but simply only because I’ve just owned it for a couple of weeks
This broke the first time I used it. The good news is it has a warranty. I will update once that is worked out.

review_title: Little steamer makes a huge difference!
review_body: This little thing is so convenient. All you have to do is fill it up with some water and hit the power button. It heats up quickly and steams a couple of garments in no time! Don’t expect to do your whole wardrobe in one sitting, but great for before work or before going out in the evening! Perfect little accessory that makes a huge difference!
Great for travel.  Small but does a great job.

review_title: This steamer is light and does the trick - just ...
review_body: This steamer is light and does the trick - just wish that the water tank were  bigger so I could unwrinkle multiple items without having to replenish water.

review_title: It works great! Did exactly what I needed it to
review_body: I ordered this to get rid of the wrinkles in my photography backdrops. It works great! Did exactly what I needed it to.
I love this product and is great for the price

First of all, these are not for a wet swiffer like some people said. These are super paper thin. They are soft but for light dusting, not a wet swiffer. All they do with the wet swiffer jet is rip and roll around on the plastic floor piece. The plastic ends up rubbing on the floor. These would be great for a light dusting.

Generics do not cut it.  These are the best you can buy and only should be buy if you're a swiffer fan like me.  They work excellent on laminate flooring and some tile.  If you have a wide grout line on your tile it will on frustrate you.  It picks up hair and fine dust particles with ease.  This is strictly for dry use only.  I read a review where someone was trying to wet them.  If you get a cloth rag and ring out the water you can use it for a "mop".  I do not recommend using these wet.

review_title: I don't like anything about it
review_body: I don't like anything about it. What I actually ordered, by mistake, was Swiffer Dry Clothes. What I needed to order was Swiffers Dusters Unscented. I don't have the info before me but according to your info they are still available. They are NOT "dusting clothes." I think I could have ordered refills, which would have been fine, since I actually still have the plastic holder that these refills fit on: It is plastic, about 18" long, yellow handle and a pronged white holder on which the Swiffers fit.  Now, when it's too late, you have shown me the exact items that I want! I'm not at all sure I want to go to the trouble to return these useless Swiffers clothes, but at least I can make a fuss!. I can't do anything with the "Headline" below: If you mean for me to tell you, I got the wrong item. Is it too late now?

review_title: Fits the Muji cleaning system too!
review_body: Absolutely love this! I used to sweep all the time and I hated doing it, but with this I just go around the house with it real quick every morning and only sweep once a week. It just keeps the floors more clean in between sweeping. I mostly pick up hair and dust (which are my main problems), I don't think it's the best for bigger crumbs or sand, but I don't have kids or pets so crumbs are not a huge issue in my house.. I don't use it with the Swiffer kit, I have a cleaning system kit that I got from Muji. I ran out of the dry floor sheets and didn't want to order online or drive 40 miles to go to their store so I tried these instead. They work just as good, if not better.

I like this product overall. It cleans up a lot of dog hair (We have 2 dogs who shed a lot.). I use them on linoleum with cleaner and cannot fault the product overall. If I had any wishes for improvements, they would be: pads slightly more durable (for disposables, they are exactly as advertised), a trio of  scrubby strips (like a Scotchbrite (tm) type strip (I know this would only be good for linoleum, not hardwood and laminate), and a slightly wider pad surface (even an inch would help). Again, this product works exactly as advertised ... I just wish it exceeded my needs.

We tried few other "Swiffer wanna be" and the quality is no where near the real thing!. Besides the perfect fit to the Swiffer mop,these pads are tough and can take a beating,unlike the imitations out there that rip after a couple of runs.. One more thing worth mentioning is the fact that they're odor free which might be a plus for some people that don't like the smell of cleaning supplies.. All and all,it's a decent buy and highly recommended.

review_title: These do a good job of grabbing dust balls and anything else on ...
review_body: The wife loves using these. I don't. I'm old enough to have always used a broom so I don't see the point of paying every few weeks for a new box when I can use a broom for years. BUT! These do a good job of grabbing dust balls and anything else on your floors or harder to each areas where you can't get to with a broom. I try to hit a lot of areas with it as it seems wasteful to use it in one room and throw it out.

review_title: Skeptical but definitely a great product!
review_body: I am a huge wet jet fan but I was skeptical about the dry sweeping pads. I had read some reviews that said it doesn’t pick up hair well and let me tell you, I lose hair like it’s going out of style and this is the only thing that has made me not want to shave my head! It picks up hair SO well! Not to mention other small particles, dirt and dust. Of course this cloth pad isn’t going to pick up large items but it will still push it around like a regular broom.. Also a huge plus - I just attach these bad boys to my wet jet (just don’t spray, you’ll regret it).
I've used these for years.  Even after vacuuming these pick up a lot and I have a GREAT vacuum.  I use these for dusting and for the floor.  A product I don't want to be without.

I have been using this scale for well over a year, and it works perfectly. It is very accurate. It usually matches what the doctor weighs me at when i go. It does not take up too much room and seems to be durable.

Really nice scale. Good looking, thin profile, and easy to read.  Only negative I can think of might be how chilly the glass feels on a cold winter morning. Ok lowering rating after a few days of use. I have found that the scale changes my weight each time i step on it.  If i step on it 3 times in a row...3 different weights. Sometimes with as much as a 4 lb difference. Not cool!  I gave even tried zeroing/recalibrating it each time... Same results.  Sad...i really liked this scale.

The display is blurry when standing on the scale. The angle of the display is wrong for a person over six feet tall to see it clearly while standing on the scale. If we, my son and I, bend down or get off the scale and stand behind it, the display is clear. I am disappointed.. Update: Etekcity contacted me and replace the scale with a new one at no charge. I am delighted with their customer service and the scale works very well.

I bought this to replace a crappy one I bought years ago at a Rite Aid. I would step on it 3 times in a row and get 3 different readings varying as much as 3 pounds. I have noticed a temperature issue, in which different temperatures will cause it to weigh things differently, but it's at least consistent enough between readings for my purpose. All digital scales will have this to some degree as well, considering it's an effect on the quartz resonators used to measure. Being consistent with your timings will help to alieviate this (as the room in which you weigh will likely be roughly the same temperature at the same time each day.

Really confused trying to use this scale. If you take out the batteries to reset it, the scale shows a 10 pound gain from your previous weight. After a few days, the weight drops 10 pounds again. And guess what? If you take the batteries out and reset it, YOU GAIN 10 pounds again. No clue what my weight is at this point. Seems extremely unreliable. I do have the scale placed on a flat, even surface (no carpet). No clue what the deal is :/

The scale is a piece of junk,it worked for about a week and then it stopped working.The company wants you to send them pics to try and figure out the problem instead of returning your money.Amazon refunded my money not there company

We purchased this scale back in November 2016 and it worked great for the first few months.  We were using it to track our weight loss as we were going through a fitness phase.  After that, the scale read so inaccurately.  We always weigh ourselves in the morning right before breakfast and within 5 minutes, it gave us different values every time!  Ranging from +/- 10 pounds - which is pretty drastic!  We hated having inaccurate readings to log so we've since then stopped using it.  I checked it again today and same thing -- stepped on the scale, it read 109.9.  Got off the scale and back on again, 104.2.  I held a pot to change the weight, put the pot down, and then it read 107.6.  What's the deal?? So frustrating...

review_title: First time using scales that use battery. Welp, ...
review_body: First time using scales that use battery.. Welp, apparently my weight varies by 1-5 lb everytime I pick the scale up and put it back down.. Not sure what the problem is, but I am wondering how this has over 4.5 stars as average rating over 8000+ people.. Anyone know how to solve this problem, I doubt it's just me... edit:. Also does not open when I put low weights on it. (Such as 5 lbs) I saw another person that did that and it worked. Wonder if mine is defective.

Super nice scale for the money!!! Well constructed and accurate. I replaced an older more expensive scale with this scale, the Etekcity scale is far superior than my old scale. I am very pleased with this purchase. I will update if I find any future problems.......I am not expecting to have to do that though.

I will 1st say that prior to the incident my husband really liked how the scale worked and it would have 5 stars, but a few months ago I heard a crash in our hall bath (I was alone) and with hesitation I went to see what happened, there were pieces of glass everywhere! I have no idea what caused it I didn't find anything near it and couldn't think of anything that could have fallen that I missed. It was hard to clean up and I had a shard under a fingernail that had to come out and yes I cried! Anyway, if anyone else has had that happen I would love to know. The scale was very nice and functioned great prior to it shattering by itself.
Best paper towels for the money. Comparable to bounty

review_title: Can't beat the price for this quality
review_body: Excellent paper towels and great value.  Just wish they were choose-a-size
great price for quantity and is very absorbent.

review_title: For the price the quality is more than fair. ...
review_body: For the price the quality is more than fair. Larger sheets, certainly absorbent and straightforward. From someone who despises a poorly made paper towel this doesn't seem to be one.
These are strong and absorbent, just what I needed. Great price too.
love these towels will always buy
Great product for the price. We have it on auto ship/
Heavy Duty, not that thin junk. Very happy with this bulk purchase

review_title: Much better priced than the expensive brands
review_body: Totally worth it. Much better priced than the expensive brands. Will buy again
I love these papertowels. They are just as good as name brand like Bou nty but half the price.
Smell so good
They hold your trash.
Great trash bag and great scent for the kitchen.
I like these durable and good sent.
Good product. Sturdy and easy to open. Tie string works well too.
delightful aroma
Hate to shop...LOVE AMAZON PRIME and all the great products with great prices I'm discovering available!
Good product
smells great!
Last a long time and does not break.  Happy with purchase.

I got these mainly to clean the screen of my phones, and they work great for that, a couple of wipes and the screen is 100% free of dust, and smudges.. I also use one to polish my shoes, another to clean my glasses, and one that I wrap my iPad in when I don't have a case on it. For the price, I will be ordering a couple more packs of these as they have many uses, and are cheap enough to throw away if they get too dirty (shoe polish).. If you're using these for electronics, shake them out first (like you would crack a wet towel) to get rid of the excess fibers in the cloths.. Great value for the price!
Very thin and may scratch your car paint.

Bought these to compare them to the CostCo microfiber packs that I usually purchase.  I use them for household cleaning, washing dishes, and detailing car interiors.  In comparison to the CostCo pack, the price is about the same, however the AmazonBasics are both thinner and smaller (size wise).  For comparison, the CostCo pack has a much plusher and thicker fiber feel and are also a more usable size (16" x 16" - CostCo vs 10" x 4" x 13" - Amazon) for my purposes.  I would recommend skipping these or purchasing a thicker Amazon version of these microfiber cloths.

review_title: They are perfect for all kinds of cleanup and go thru washer ...
review_body: I’ve only had them for a week but I’m loving them and getting rid of my old stuff.  They are perfect for all kinds of cleanup and go thru washer great.

review_title: Fairly priced synthetic cloths for a variety of household tasks
review_body: I use these with electronics, polishing our air hockey table, and for cleaning bicycles. Previously I had bought similar packets of cloths at Microcenter but this was a much better deal and the cloths work just as well. The packet is large enough to last me a year or longer.

Okay, these cloths do not compare to high end competition. But then again, you aren't spending $15 a piece!.  For the price, I am extremely happy. When I got them, I was a little scared to use them, thinking they would be instantly stained. But so far they have cleaned up really well! Only one of the white ones shows a stain... I do wonder why anybody would make cleaning rags light colored, but that is my only beef with these cloths. I love how microfiber cleans... it doesn't leave all the lint, and picks up dirt so much better. These rags won't clean as well as a finer woven cloth, but they are much much better than a regular rag.
Just rags. Not good for buffing/polishing. Very thin and leaves a significant amount of lint residue on the vehicle more noticeable with Dark colored cars. Would not recommend for polishing

To be honest, I don't know why I bought the 24 pack.  I'm microfiber rich now.  These are very nice towels, and if you care for them as instructed and don't wash with other types of cloth I expect they'll probably last the rest of my life.
I bought these for cleaning my eyeglasses because I kept misplacing the one cloth I had before. I'm happy with them.

review_title: Good workhorse towel, but not the finest grade.
review_body: These are great for all-around tasks and things where the absolute finest grade towel is not needed. Glass, interior, wheels, and things like that. However, my vehicle has very soft paint and these will/have actually induce some fine scratches and swirls. I would still recommend them just for the value and because you don't really want or need to be using a premium edgeless towel for everything, and these fill that void nicely.
These trash bags hold up well and are a good value for the price paid.

The ties are not evenly across from each other. Not sure if this is "Amazon" flaw because I've never had this issue with store bought Glad trash bags. Bags still work well, but an obvious manufacturing flaw
This is a good product, the strength is amazing, I have bought this product over and over gin.
I mean, they're trashbags.... But they are the best quality trashbags for a good price.. Never had a rip, believe it or not!  Will order these from now on!
This has been the worst bag ourchase. 90 bags and they all split in exactly the same place. Don't be tempted by buying a brand name.  Dollar store bags work better for us.

Product is good quality and is as described. I use it not just for our kitchen garbage but also for accumulating donations to take to our local charity, and also for storing shredded paper until I can recycle it. It holds up to all of those uses and more. This is a great item to get through the Subscribe and Save program. I have it delivered every three months or so.

Nothing too exciting here...  It's a decent trash bag that feels like a sturdy material and decent drawstring.  I've only have one of maybe 15 drawstrings break on me.  I use these for cat litter and they work well.  I also got a heck of a deal on a large amount of them, and that's why I bought them.

review_title: These r WAY better than Hefty trash bags
review_body: These r WAY better than Hefty trash bags. Never again will I buy Hefty. Glad ALL the way. Hefty rips at the top, Glad doesn't. And NO it's not because I packed too much in the bag. Great price for the value

Excellent quality, these drawstring bags are very helpful in the kitchen. We bought cheaper bags thinking we could save the money but they would break all the time causing us to use more than one often. Well, we didn't have a problem with these bags. The plastic material is strong and has a little give so they won't break easy if there is a lot in one bag. Definitely worth the extra spent!
These rip every time I use them. Always along the seam. Only good for a round can and doesn’t fit my rectangular bun (that’s why they rip).
Good strong paper towels arrived on time and ingood shape.
Brawny.... whats not to like
Best paper towels on the market.....
Long lasting good value.

review_title: good quality and they are strong
review_body: Always a fan of these towels, good quality and they are strong.

review_title: Excellent XL Pick a Size Paper Towels
review_body: Very happy with these! The quality and price were excellent!
Good buy.
Best paper towels
Best Buy, I love this product, great value.
Plenty of rolls for a few months!
I only use Bounty!
Great big box of paper towels.  Just what I ordered.
Good paper towel
I keep buying
Good product.
Best paper towels.
Good product.
Lightning delivery for a great product
Good deal !
Great deal.

review_title: After 3 hours I finally finished filling the 3rd waste pitcher and now I’m on to the 4th which ...
review_body: I read that these run slow but I thought I would still give them a try because it filters out more things than the original filters. However, these things are unbelievably slow. I tried all the tricks to get air bubbles out but it doesn’t matter. These filters are so slow they are unusable. After 3 hours I finally finished filling the 3rd waste pitcher and now I’m on to the 4th which is the first drinkable pitcher, but it’s running so slow now that it’s going to take at least 2 hours to fill this one. I already ordered regular filters to replace it. All-in-all I spent money on something that is supposed to last 6 months but realistically only lasted me one day. These are terrible

New filter design but fits even older style Brita pitchers.  I really can't tell a huge difference between the old and new, but it seems these are slightly better and keeping the charcoal bits from getting into the water.  Frankly that never bothered me much, because in Japan we would put who pieces of charcoal into our pitchers to make better tasting water so getting charcoal bits was totally normal for me (and let me know the water had been treated too!). A tip: These filters are sold in a variety of pack sizes, but the largest isn't necessarily the best deal.  Make sure you check beforehand which is the best deal.  When I purchased, the 3 pack was cheapest per unit.. 5 stars.  No need for bottled water here!

I've thoroughly washed and dried my Brita dispenser before and during the cycle with both filters in the pack. Each time it adds visible brown/rust colored particles to the reservoir within the first couple days. How am I supposed to think it's effective when it is visibly making the water dirtier than when it started? I've trusted Brita in the past and always had clear, clean tasting water with the standard cartridges (the only reason I give 2 stars), but this is concerning. It makes me want to switch to a different system.

review_title: Great price! Beats other retailers by far!
review_body: Excellent price for a 3-pack of large Brita pitcher filters!  I have a Brit’s pitcher that I use filtered water to make cold brew coffee in the summer instead of hot coffee.  Filtered water makes all the difference in great tasting coffee!  The price for this 3-pack here on Amazon is several dollars cheaper than it is at Walmart & Target or grocery stores!  Will be ordering more when I use these up!

review_title: I wish I had checked the reviews but it never ...
review_body: I wish I had checked the reviews but it never occurred to me as I've used Brita filters (the white ones) for years without any issues.  Then a little over a month ago, I bought the blue two pack because they claim to filter out lead as well.  I started using them both a month ago.  One at work and one at home.  The work one gets more use and stopped working last week.  I bought the pitcher home, cleaned everything and rinsed out the filter.  Nothing.  Multiple times I tried to get it to work and each time I noticed black residue in the top part of the pitcher.  I haven't seen it in my home one but from my experience with the one I used at work and what I've read here it's just a matter of time.  Time to research other water filtration products.  Actually, ten days after writing the initial review the second one stopped filtering as well.

A picture of the bottom of the filter would be very helpful. From the side view provided, it looks like it has the slots on the bottom that fit my pitcher. I've had that pitcher about 6 years now, and i don't remember what pet name they have for it, and sure don't have the box. Any tags or writing on the pitcher are worn off.. Anyway, this was the wrong replacement and I had to return it. A pain. Probably works good in the right unit.

The filtered water is not as clean as the ads described. NO need to test with TDS test, because you will effeminately found here were many black stains in the pitcher and you have to wash then pitcher every few days.... garbage filter

Typical standard Brita replacement filters. These generally will last about 4-6 weeks given the hard water that comes out of the faucet. I use the Brita pitcher water to wash fruits and vegetables . For drinking purposes I prefer the Zero water pitcher and it's filters as they filter the water till it's at least identical to bottled drinking water standards which is higher than what the Brita filters can do.. Brita pitchers are better made than the Zero water pitchers which are made with a thinner plastic so they crack easily. After using my full size Zero water pitcher once, it split so I took it back to Walmart where I had bought it, and exchanged it for the smaller pitcher which was a slightly thicker gauged plastic. Amazon has very competitive prices for the Zero water filters!

Worked great for all of 3 days, then would not pass a drop of water.. UPDATE:  I contacted Brita, who suggested the following:. 1. Tap the pitcher while there is water in the reservoir to dislodge any trapped air that may be in the filter.  Any bubbles that float up from the filter while tapping are an indication that this solution is working and that water flow will improve.. 2. Remove filter, tap it firmly on a solid surface and/or shake it for a few seconds, then re-insert.. 3. Re-rinse the filter or soak filter fully submerged for 15 minutes.  The new advanced filters do not need soaking; however, soaking may coincidentally improve the slow flow issue.. None of the above made any difference, so we tossed the filter and tried the 2nd one from the pack - a few days later, it stopped working too.  Brita's response was offer us coupons for future purchases.  Thanks, Brita, but I do not need more defective filters.. UPDATE:  Replaced the Brita with an Aquagear, and very happy with it because it actually works.. UPDATE 2:  Aquagear had same problems.  I give up, none of these advanced filters seem to actually work reliably.

Use these filters in the Brita pitcher and find they eliminate totally the chlorine smell and taste.  Each filter lasts us at least two months and we drink a lot of water.  They are much cheaper than the filters sold in our local supermarket, which did not always have the filters we wanted.  So, six filters lasts about a year and eliminates multiple trips to the store.  A really good buy!

The price is considerably lower as compared to buying from the local grocery store especially when adding them to your amazon subscription. These paper plates are well made. You won't have to worry about your plate bending and losing your food to a mess to clean up . It's not necessary to use 2 or 3 of the flimsy thin plates that all too often one of my kids dinner would end up on the floor. A very nice treat for our dog. With both my wife an I working full time every once in a while it is very nice to not have to do the dishes after a meal.

I'm a busy, busy man and I definitely don't have time for washing dishes.  Plus, my wife nary lifts a finger in the kitchen.  Now, don't get me wrong, I cook and I use the good stuff, but I cheat like crazy with these Dixie HD Paper Plates.  A dish for the steamed broccoli?  Never.  They get a paper plate.  In fact, anything that I don't feel like washing gets one of these bad boys.  They're big and the coating helps them stand up to moisture.  Don't let those crazy Chinet people tell you they have something better.  I've seen something better and it's these fine Dixie paper plates.

review_title: quality and strength in a paper plate
review_body: These are good quality plates - very strong and no need to double plate. I can even cut tomatoes on the with a sharp knife and no leaks. I love these plates so much I decided to put them on subscribe and save. Great for when my grand kids come over to eat. Easy cleanup for me. I like that these are sturdy paper and not styrofoam. They have a light coating to help keep them leak-proof. Other paper plates are cheaper but fall apart and leak too easily. These Dixie plates are the best!

I subscribed to these because they are slightly cheaper than similar ones at Walmart from a cheaper brand and they work decently but they can't hold much weight. Basically everything I put on it other than very lightweight items (such as bacon/scrambled eggs) causes the plates to bend and snap. I didn't expect them to handle really heavy items but I can barely use them for hamburger helper or even add grits to my plate for breakfast. They handle liquidy foods pretty well though.. Not sure if I will continue my subscription because I'm only saving $1-2 I think and I definitely prefer Walmarts brand.

I purchase these plates often from a local store, but the price on Amazon far beats local store prices. These are the only paper plates that I will use- they can be put in the microwave (for quite a long time, too!), and hot foods do not break them down. We even eat foods on them that require cutting with steak-knives, and they do not slice through or break. These plates are about the size of a standard dinner plate, so you don't need to worry about fitting a full meal on a tiny paper plate.

These aren't bad plates if you are looking to foods that have juicies that you don't worry about mixing.  Me, I use these for medium rare steaks as well as burgers, hotdogs, potatoes, salads, etc... but I don't like how the juices from the foods will leak out and into my other foods (especially the buns).  I have no problems with leakage as they are thicker than normal paper plates however next time I plan on using the Chinet plates for steaks as it will absorb the food juices.

These are pretty good plates for the price.  They don't fall apart and such like some of the super cheapies.  Also, I haven't noticed anyone doing that horrible thing where they use 2, 3, or even more plates at the same time.  Those cheap deals go right down the drain when people start doing that.  Overall I am quite satisfied with these and will continue to reorder as long as the price stays decent.. -CR

review_title: I am only reviewing this product since I am bored waiting while on chat with Amazon support
review_body: I am only reviewing this product since I am bored waiting while on chat with Amazon support. Also because I read a review that stated they need 3 plates to get "strength" to them. My wife and I eat off of these often and we use steak knives most of the time, and only once while cutting an ear of corn in 2 did I rip the plate.. These plates are strong and durable and work very well. I can carry my food (piece of meat and a side like rice, corn or mash) without having to hold it from underneath.

We like to use paper plates.  We have small children and full-time jobs, and a dishwasher that stays full of sippy cups, bottles, and lunch box supplies.  Paper plates make life easier for our busy family on-the-go.  These meet our family's need for convenience, and are also sturdy enough to trust our small children to carry the plate to the table (or backyard, or dining room, or living room floor...) full of food (they don't fold in half, or leak, or any of those terrible things).  If you are looking for convenience and durability, this by far meets those needs.

review_title: Not happy, but they are decent plates
review_body: Kinda torqued.  These are not the plates that were pictured in my order.  I bought paper plates over the internet because we had found some that matched our indoor and outdoor kitchen colors and they became impossible to find at the stored here.  Found a pic of them on Amazon, ordered them and got these instead.  Not happy, but they are decent plates.  THANK GOD I didn't buy tons of them!!!!
They're linty but very absorbent - good for counters but not for glass surfaces.
I get this on subscribe and we love them!

review_title: great product and great time on delivery.
review_body: Got what I asked for at a great price delivered in a timely manner. Couldn't be better.
Weird paper towels, hard to pull off the roll, thin
Good bye
Good towel when you don't want to reuse cotton cloths.

review_title: Favorite paper towels for a cake decorator!
review_body: Best paper towels ever!  Super absorbent.  Great subscribe and save price!
dosnt feel good to the touch! dosnt dry at all.
Best paper towels ever.
These are my favorite paper towels. They're thick and clean up any mess. They don't fall apart like other brands. I'll never switch back to any other.

review_title: Easy to put on, easy to clean, cat still alive.
review_body: I bought this because my cat throws up a lot. But why put it over your mattress when you can put it over the top blanket and protect all of the coverings and not just the mattress? That's what I use it for and am happy to report that even you have bulky coverings, the size chart still works and the product should still fit over everything nicely with a bit of slack left still. It's nice only having to wash this product instead of everything. I don't know what the recommended settings for laundering are because I never read those, but it does just fine on hot water and hot dry so you can be sure everything comes off and have it clean and ready to use again.

Don’t understand what the fuss is about these things! They are not waterproof at all! When my kids pee in bed, it leaks all the time even though I followed the instructions for cleaning and care to the T. A bad product! Don’t buy it!

Out of the package it fits very well, nice and tight.  The design looks like it would fit even the deepest mattress.  I have not tested the effectiveness of the waterproof design yet...I occasionally eat/drink in bed, and haven't had spill yet since buying.  the only con I see is that it MAY not hold up well when washing...the sides are made from a sheer fabric that doesn't LOOK all that sturdy.  I'll be washing in delicate mode to be safe.

I am so very happy with this purchase!  My queen size mattress is very deep...fitted sheets that are supposed to fit up to 18" mattresses are usually not deep enough.  I received a very nice heated mattress pad for Christmas and wanted to protect it "just in case" from any spills.  This cover is perfect!  It has a thin terrycloth-type surface that fits perfectly and the stretchy sides secured under the mattress with no problem.  It doesn't bunch up or migrate... exactly what I was looking for!

review_title: Excellent product, so glad I purchased it.
review_body: This is exactly what was advertised. I would buy from this company again. My wife and I have never slept better and we don't get as hot as we used to on a mattress without this product. Highly recommend this, not only to protect your investment that you made on a mattress, which can be quite pricey, but will also give you a good nights sleep.

These work for protecting my new mattress and do not add any additional noise or discomfort during sleep.  They do however tend to shift around on my Queen memory foam mattress a bit, especially while utilizing my adjustable frame, which is why I've removed a star.  Get these if you want your mattress warranty to stay intact.  The sales person informed me that simple soda stains will in fact void your warranty - as stupid as that is.

review_title: 5 spills and accidents and it still works!
review_body: It works really well.. My daughter has has 3 accidents, 1 bottle of milk spilled, one sippy cup full of water spilled..  The bed cover caught it all - Not one drop of fluid leaked onto the bed.. We just wash as instructed on the tag after every spill and the cover keeps doing its job.. We have since purchased 3 more. Two for my Queen and full size beds in the RV and also one for my CalKing bed at home.. My Cal King Tempurpedic has survived 2 accidents because the little one sometimes comes in late at night with growing pains or sneaks into the room with a drink in their hands.. This has saved us from having to purchase new mattress.

1/5 the price I paid for an inferior protector sold at mattress firm. I have already had this protector save our bed 3x since I ordered it 3 weeks ago. 2x daughter puked on the bed and this protector saved our mattress. Yesterday morning her diaper leaked and the protector kept urine from getting to our mattress. Good product, will buy more for the other 2 beds.. Update: Lasted 10 months and began to leak after about 20 washes... Daughter destroys the bed with vomit almost 1x every 3 weeks. Just ordered another protector 07-11-17

I bought this in case my baby's diaper leaked since I'm tired of spraying mattresses with Lysol and dealing with gross yellow stains.  Not only has it held up to multiple leaky diapers and sippy cup spills, but one day while we were out, our normally well-behaved dog decided to climb up there and pee on the bed. And the mattress still looks brand new! A quick machine wash and dry and the cover is back to new every time. Cannot rate this highly enough.

review_title: Heavy duty mattress protector that won't crinkle
review_body: This is the second of these mattress protectors we've purchased, and they're great. Our daughter sleeps in bed with us and we needed something that would keep our mattress clean without bunching up under our sheets or feeling like we were sleeping on crinkly plastic. This mattress protector is nice and soft and actually makes sleeping more comfortable, while also keeping our mattress safe. We bought two so that when one needs to be washed we can still protect the mattress.. PROS:. -soft. -nice, deep pockets (easy to put on the bed). -heavy duty protection. -stays put under the mattress and won't bunch up. CONS:. -none so far

review_body: I’ve danced around with other brands but, hands down, Bounty is the best.
How can you not be happy with paper towels? Thick and great.
Great price for the paper towels.  Love Bounty.  Highly recommend.
This is by far the best paper towel I have ever used.

review_body: You can get the extra large sized ones at walmart for 4.99 so you're not really getting a good deal.
I love to buy in bulk and not have to worry about running out so these are great. Plus they get delivered to you so you don’t have to pack your car with all these paper towels
Have used them for years. Convenient size towel.

Our house consists of 3 messy girls, 2 cats who hack hairballs frequently and an elderly, diabetic pug. We use paper towels on such a regular basis, it’s not uncommon for us to stockpile them. We switched from using generic paper towels to Bounty recently and I’m so glad we did. We don’t go through nearly as many as we used to which saves us - it’s great! Plus, these hold up great when scrubbing on carpet - super durable. We’re super happy with this purchase and love having them sent right to us!

I use these at a restaurant and at home.  They hold up well, are absorbent and clean up messes.

review_title: I did not like anything about this pillow insert
review_body: I did not like anything about this pillow insert. Poorly made. Extremely cheap materials and quality. A paper bag would serve as a better coveringing then the cheap synthetic used. My finger went though it while putting it in the pillow cover. It is being returned.

review_body: Nice for the price but not functional.  Went flat within a week or two.  I turned them into pillows for my dog’s bed

This was a perfect fit for a pillow case I had bought for my boyfriend. He loves it & im glad he no longer has towels stuffed in the pillow case! Lol!
The outer material is like a pillow you get ok a flight. So cheap! The filling even feels cheaper. So disappointed.

review_title: open the bag and fill your pillow
review_body: be smart people! open the bag and fill your pillow with as much as you want! I have bought a 20x20 for 18x18 and looked bad, so I did the service myself.

review_title: Didn't ship in an appropriately sized box.
review_body: I guess it's the right measurements I ordered....but it's hard to tell because the pillow was SQUISHED into the tiniest box. It's not a great quality pillow - so now it's all bunched and lumpy. We ordered a King comforter the other day that came in a box the size of a coffin. Now this comes in the tiniest box? Okay....
Perfect for any 18”x18” pillow cover. Lightweight, holds its shape, and comfy! Will definitely buy more of these.

I bought the 24 x 24 pillow insert since the description said it was best for a 22 x 22 sham cover, but this insert was a little too big, I had to force it in.  It doesn't have the foam feeling, its very bulky and not very soft. Maybe the West elm sham covers are different?... it does the job as i guess... but not what I was expecting.

UPDATE 4/23/2018. These lights have been hung up in our backyard for just over a month... We live in Southern California where it’s been 80-100 degrees pretty much everyday, and yet the other night we went to plug them in, the turned on, then immediately off, and they wouldn’t turn back on no matter what. We even checked them out the next day to see if we missed something, and we couldn’t figure out why they’d only last for a month!!! SUPER frustrating to waste money on something that you don’t even get your money’s worth from. Maybe they shouldn’t be advertised as indoor/outdoor lights, maybe they’re really just indoor lights if you want them to last... that’s why I did so much research to find ones that were ok for outdoors, and clearly these are not them. So becareful if purchasing for anything outdoors... Don’t recommend!. OLD Review prior to 4/23: These are great outdoor decor lights! they come sectioned off with twist ties to keep them untangled and for easy hang up. But if you discover your boyfriend has taken all the twist ties off at once to try to hang them, it won’t be so easy! I recommend you take them to the location you want, and untwist tie them as you are hanging them up. It will workout much more flawlessly! Purchased these lights as a small part of the backyard remodel and glad I did. They are such long light strands that I ended up twisting them back upwards to the top of the fence for each strand and it gives off a lot more light! Its been about 2 weeks now and with a decent amount of rain, over several days, and they are still holding strong! The fact that they have different modes for the lights is also a plus for different events or modes. All the modes are listed on the little power box so it’s easy to refer to. Great value for these. Even during the day you don’t notice them much, they kinda blend in which is great they aren’t an eyesore. Nice lights at a nice price and really made your backyard pop!

This is the second time I ordered these light and they are amazing!! The first pack I ordered for my baby shower was great with the exception that one light string was busted and had to not use it amd find a way to hide it. But that was easy tuck away fix. I had to order again because my sisters dog decided to chew my lights up. This time the lights came perfect and they were soo beautiful when up!! They were for a wedding. I recommend this product 100% and will order more from here if i ever need more!!!!

Love these lights. They add the perfect ambiance behind my bed. They have ten strands. I just wish the cord for the plug was longer. I needed an extension cord which kind of hangs awkwardly in the middle of the wall. But you could probably hide with a sheet curtain maybe.

review_title: Wayyyy too much work. I thought they were already ...
review_body: Wayyyy too much work. I thought they were already connected to the curtains. But nope, I spent over and hour sticking safety pins everything trying to get this thing to work

The image is a little misleading. The strands of lights are more spaced out, but it's still really pretty. The settings are kinda weird, I don't want them to flash, so I leave it on the steady setting. It's exactly long enough to hang across the bay window by my bed and have plenty of room left for the plug to reach the outlet.

Absolutely love these lights! They're incredibly easy to put up, and just look so nice. I initially got these hang in my bay window for Christmas, but these can work year-round. Highly recommend, and will likely be getting another set shortly.

I love these lights. They were all functioning perfectly when i received them and I haven’t had any issues yet. They came wrapped perfectly in the box. To hang them up, I laid the string out on the ground without unwrapping the hanging strands. Then, i clipped the line up to my backdrop and then unwrapped the strands.. I’m currently using them for some photos I’m taking at work, but will probably put them up in my room when I’m done.. My only issue was that I was expecting warm-toned lights; the ones I got were a cool white, but I may have missed an option or just not read closely. In any case, they work perfectly for what I needed them for!
Came tangled and fell apart.

review_title: ... cover the ceiling in our apartment and they are great. The only problems (which I knew about after ...
review_body: I bought several of these to cover the ceiling in our apartment and they are great. The only problems (which I knew about after reading the reviews) are the black controller box needs to be longer and need to have an "off" switch instead of just unplugging it. I still love them and they are perfect.

review_title: I am so very happy with my lights
review_body: I am so very happy with my lights,  I bought 4 sets of them for my daughters wedding,  they are very pretty, only one thing i wish was different, i wish it had a setting for a slow twinkle,  it is either fast or slow,  but i just had them stay light with no twinkle.  they were perfect!

review_title: I rarely give negative feedback. not a fan. ...
review_body: Update: I wasn’t using it correctly, now that I mastered the steamer, it works like a charm.. I rarely give negative feedback. not a fan. was wanting something simple to rid sheets, duvets, and curtains of wrinkles. NO

review_title: All products should be like this product
review_body: This product does it's job.. All products should be like this product.. For real, though, it works great.

This little thing is awesome! I took it with me to Las Vegas so my friends and I wouldn't have to walk around with wrinkled blouses and dresses. It takes awhile to get a few articles steamed, but beggars can't be choosers! Definitely worth the money!

review_title: Don't forget to get Steamer Gloves
review_body: Works quite well, has nice lengthy cord (6ft-ish?). Burned hand twice before I gave up to get "gloves".
It left a weird white stain on the shirt but it came out from washing. Other than that it worked really well

This is a really great steamer for the $$!. It heats up quickly, very lightweight and quiet.. It doesn't require to hang the item up somehow if you want to get a really thorough ironing but if it's just for smoothing down the front and back of a shirt/dress/pants then it works perfectly.. Not for heavy duty though.. Awesome product!
Since it is travel size, is smaller than what I was expecting, but it works great! One water charge allows you to steaming 2 Women’s blouses!
Works fine, but needs to be refilled sooner than expected and doesn't fully get out wrinkles.  I don't own an iron so this is better than nothing, but would prefer a more robust steamer.
Very easy to use, heats up quickly and works well. Keep in mind this is a portable steamer and is best for shirts, it did not work as well on my velvet curtains.

review_title: My boyfriend and I love it so much
review_body: This is our second one! My boyfriend and I love it so much, we both needed to have one with us at all times! :) I'm a wardrobe stylist and the iSteam is simply the best portable steamer on the market.

Product came quickly, and it does the job. I don't have carpeting in my home, and I live in the city, so I constantly have to dust (or is de-dust the right word?). Either way, having a Swiffer makes it easy to clean. Every time I use these sheets I marvel at how much dirt and dust it captures.

Thinner than a paper towel... Not sure why these are needed for the dry mop. They are so thin, it often takes a few too get the job done. I use these with the irobot. I'm going to detach back to the reusable ones. They are thicker and clean better.

I brought a rubber broom which was supposed to be heart on pet hair,  I put it to test by dry swiffing after, the 1st pic shows how ineffective the rubber broom was, the 2nd pic shows how effective the dry swifter is.

review_title: Great product to clean your hardwood floors with
review_body: These are great, they don't fall off of my Swiffer and stuff sticks to them. As advertised. I like that they are odorless, too, as we have some sensitive sniffers around here.

review_title: Really great improvement to method of cleaning compared to the old ...
review_body: This picked up more dust than I would've thought. Did not need to wet mop before using. Really great improvement to method of cleaning compared to the old bucket and mop.

Love it for my tile. But the wood floors it gets really wet at the beginning and then dries up quickly.  I just wet it a little to finish up the floors and it gets the surface dirt. I still need to scrub with a bucket if really dirty.

I use these almost every day because I have three dogs and they make plenty of messes. I also use the wet ones too, but these dry ones are great for everyday use. I like to have it handy on rainy days when water can get tracked in the back door.

review_title: ... our iRobot sweeper and it’s been combined together doing amazing work on our hardwood floor
review_body: I use this with our iRobot sweeper and it’s been combined together doing amazing work on our hardwood floor! Recommend!
If you have a swifter this is great for picking up dog hair!

review_title: The numberof pads is just right.
review_body: I use these all of the time.  I like the number that come pads in this box.

review_title: Pro tip: Avoid when wet. You will slip
review_body: I was THISCLOSE to giving a 1-star review because there's no way I weigh 180lbs. Unfortunately, the scale is 5-star material and I do in fact weigh 180lbs. You win this one, Etekcity.. It is extremely easy to use:. Step on to turn on. Step off. Step back on to weigh. Stare at self in mirror until you feel adequate amount of shame. Guys, it's a scale and it works.

Far from accurate, but close enough for long term trends. Had this scale for three months, nearest accuracy it will weigh to is .2 of a lb in theory but it doesn't measure that close. Weighed myself tonight, then used the bathroom, was well hydrated so there was a lot, weighed again and it was the exact same.. So like I said it isn't greatest accuracy, but overall it will get you in the ballpark.. Update: according to manufacturers this scale is accurate to nearest .3 of  (.6 lb). They emailed me shortly after my review. I stand by my assessment, good for ballpark area, but .6lb isn't going to show you possibly a week or two of results.

It worked great for two months. Now, I can get on and off three times and get three different weights. The weights are usually in a 1 - 1.5lb range. So, it works, and it’s not wildly inaccurate. But I expect a scale to show exactly how much I weigh, not “around” how much. You have one job, scale. Do it right. Particularly as I’m working on losing weight, it’s frustrating to get these ranges instead of solid numbers.

review_title: It's perfect if you want to hide it away under something ...
review_body: This is a sleek and lightweight scale. It's perfect if you want to hide it away under something else or let it sit inconspicuously in the corner.. The display is bright, with a large font. Once it gets a final reading, it keeps the numbers on-screen for around 10 seconds.. The glass top also feels sturdy. I don't have any hesitation stepping onto it, even at the edges.. The only critique is that the weight it reads can vary a bit depending on how you stand on it. For someone just casually tracking their weight, it's probably not an issue. For anyone trying to measure more accurately, I'd recommend doing 2-4 readings in a row to see what comes up most often.The variance is always less than a pound but it is a bit odd.

This is a very slick, beautiful scale, arrived on time and as described by seller. It arrived very neatly packaged and well protected as it is very delicate. It comes with batteries which is a plus! All you have to do is take it out of the box, put batteries in, and step on it. Make sure it is set on hard even floor. The reading is quick and very accurate. There is no button to turn it on, it turns on when you step on it, it reads your weight and the numbers start blinking. Once it stops you can step off of it and that's your accurate weight. After a decently short while it will turn off on its own so you don't have to worry about it. The lighting on it is blue and the scale itself is black and clear in some parts. I would highly recommend this seller and this product.

review_title: Bought this scale to replace an Eat Smart Scale that I had
review_body: Bought this scale to replace an Eat Smart Scale that I had. I was a little hesitant to buy another digital scale. My Eat Smart Scale would show a "C" and I was constantly getting on and off to get a reading. Tried to glue back the little leg of the scale that came off from getting on and off. Purchased the Etekcity Digital Body Weight Scale and was happy to see that the bottom of the scale was one piece with the legs built in. No worry about lopsided scales. Very easy to read and so accurate, I get weighed weekly at Weight Watchers and the weights match. Very happy with this purchase, highly recommend

I bought this scale as a replacement when mine finally died. I love how flat to the ground it is. It has a lit, digital display. I also like how the number lingers for a few seconds after you step off. Sometimes, I’ll weigh myself without my contacts in and I have to lean over to read the number afterward. It’s a sleek finish, so it will collect foot/toe prints, but that’s not a big deal for me. Amazing scale for the price!!

review_title: Complete malfunction on day of delivery itself
review_body: This product is not worth it. We received ours and were very excited to use it. However, the weights displayed on the scale were completely off. We put the scale on multiple solid flat surfaces and each surface was giving us a different number. Even the lbs to kgs button stopped working. Every time we wanted to convert from lbs to kgs we had to remove the batteries and restart the machine. We bought this product due to the fact that it had so many good reviews, but we were highly disappointed with what we received.

review_title: Nice scale, great that you can just step on and read the weight.
review_body: When looking for a scale, I wanted one that I could just step on and it would display the weight without first having to turn it on. This scale works this way. The numbers on the screen are bright and easy to read. Comparing the weight readings to a doctor's appointment, this scale reads within a pound of what the office said. I am happy with this purchase and for the price, I would recommend this scale.

review_title: Is this accurate? Maybe, but I like it.
review_body: I really like this scale, it's sleek and I love the lit display but I do have to admit, you have to get on it 2-3 times to get an accurate weight. I feel like the first time I step on it, it's anywhere from 2-5lbs different than the 2nd and 3rd try, but #2 and #3 are always the same number. Who knows, maybe it's just telling me I weight less so I get off it.
Not really a great price.
Good Quality

review_title: Cleans a lot more than I do
review_body: A very dourable paper towel at a conservative price.
These are not brawny!  but darn close second.  gonna save my money and keep purchasing these!
Good for price.  Very thin. But works well for light uses.
good price. good quality
Plenty of papers towels in this giant pack.

review_body: These are great quality and at a fantastic price! I only order these now, they are thick and absorbent like brand-named paper towels.
These are great quality
Cheap but lots of them and very functional quality. I’ll keep buying.

great price and beats carrying from the store.

review_body: I bought these as a housewarming gift for a family member. They recently called to let me know how much they like them and how durable they are! I use the same brand myself and I definitely agree that they are tough. I also no longer have issues with trash bags slipping off, like with some other brands.
Great product
