Buen producto...buena relación calidad y precio
Great deal!
great Item
The febreeze scent is REALLY strong
Big size delivered to your door ! Second time ordering. The scent of again is wonderful!

These towels were exactly what I was looking for! Absorbent, quick drying, great quality and so many of them! If you're trying to reduce paper towel use or just want a better chemical free way to clean buy these! You can't beat the price.

They're microfiber cloths--which is awesome. They are all I'll use on my car, so having a big package of them like this makes it much easier for bigger projects like waxing the car. They are wonderfully washable and I think you can use these for just about forever.

review_title: Good Microfiber Cloths for Basic Dusting and Cleaning
review_body: The texture seems a little different...not quite as soft and smooth as another one I have. I think they will still work ok. I'll wash them first in cold water. Maybe that will soften them. For general cleaning and dusting, these should be just fine. I'll save the other softer one for my television, which is all I've been using it for anyway. I wanted more microfiber cloths for dusting and washing my good china, etc. These should work well. I was pleasantly surprised to have received them a day sooner. I'm happy to have so many extras and will give a few to my daughter. The price for these is unbeatable.

review_title: The swiss army knife of towels!
review_body: Amazon makes these so ridiculously easy to order, its almost simpler just to get a new 24 pack then it is to wash them all. I use these for everything, I have 2 packs roaming around my garage somewhere. No lint or weird fabric strands when cleaning windows, work for getting grease off of things, work for wiping down the mower, polishing the stainless steel bbq, I even used them with a leather cleaning kit to polish my leather hat. Come to think of it, I have yet to find anything these won't clean, with the correct chemical application.

I absolutely LOVE these microfiber cleaning cloths.  My windows and mirrors, and glass table tops almost sparkle now, and cleaning them is SO much faster and easier!  One wet cloth to clean and one dry cloth to dry.  With windex and paper towels, I'd have to do them at least twice and still there were streaks.  With these microfiber cloths, I wash once, wipe dry, and I'm done.  And I can get them all clean, no streaks, in less then one fourth the time!  Dusting is a breeze, and just general clean up is so much easier and faster!  I gave four each to my daughter and my two granddaughters to try and they are also very impressed.  So, I just ordered the 144 pack!  I can't praise these microfiber cloths enough and I HIGHLY recommend them!!!

One day while cleaning my bathroom I realized how many paper towels I had used and just thrown away. It seemed really wasteful and I knew there was a better way to clean without using old tshirts as rags. I don't have a surplus of old towels and honestly, I wanted something softer than a terry cloth towel to clean my bathrooms and kitchen.. In comes AmazonBasics microfiber cloths! A large set in three colors so I can keep my bathroom cleaning cloths separate from my kitchen ones.. While cleaning, these do a great job of absorbing liquid and work well as a scrubber with a little elbow grease.. I usually have one hanging in the kitchen and wash it after 2-3 uses (of wiping down counters, oven, sink, etc). When using to clean the bathroom it gets washed after one cleaning.. I only use Method cleaners so I'm not sure how they would work with heavier chemicals, but I would imagine they would work just as great!. They do shrink a little after washing but that's expected. Stains wash right out.

Towels are fine but someone at Amazon can't count. There should have been 24 towels! I received 7 blue, 7 white and 7 yellow. I was never that good at advanced math but I believe that totals 21 towels?

review_title: I completely disagree with the bad reviews I see here
review_body: I completely disagree with the bad reviews I see here.  I use these every single day.  They are not as big and thick as a beach towel, but that's not what I am looking for.  I need something to clean my glasses, clean the screen on my iPad, have a rag in the car, etc.  For me, these are fantastic.  I keep one on my desk, in my car and in my backpack.  Don't let the bad reviews fool you - these are great!

Very good microfiber cloths. Bought two packs and essentially stopped using papertowels all togther.. One trick....DO NOT MACHINE DRY THEM. I looked it up, and if you let these guys air dry, they maintain their static cling much longer.. One of the best things about these towels is you can dust with them without them being wet, but once you machine dry them, the static is lost and they are regular soft towels.

Unless you, your entire family, and all of your pets are bald... I don't recommend these cloths.  My house is clean and so are all of my other linens. These, on the other hand, get so linty and hairy!  I've never had this problem with any other item I've ever washed.  I had washed these cloths and intended to use them to remove makeup and my entire face got covered in fur.  It doesn't even seem to be static cling that causes it -- the cloths physically trap hair and fuzz during the washing/drying process.  I guess that's what would make these great dusting rags, except that you'll never get the dust back off of them without manually picking it off.. As an aside... since the time that I purchased these, I've read that microfiber cloths are contributing to a massive amount of plastic fibers polluting the environment.  They are ending up in our oceans and have been identified by some studies to be the most frequent pollutant.  These fibers are even found in microscopic particles everywhere around our homes, which we are inhaling and ingesting.  Something to think about. I will personally be opting for 100% organic cotton cloths in the future.. [...]

Tried the new longlast filters and very disappointed. The water tastes like metal, I've never experienced this with the regular filters. Going back to those.. Updated to 3 stars, looks like the filter didn't fit properly and so none of the water got filtered. Will try again and see if the filter stays put.

These filters do not work with the Brita Ultramax pitcher. They were terrible. They didn't last even as long as a regular filter. Very disappointed they just stopped working after about 6 weeks or so. The regular filters will last at least 2 1/2 months to 3 months. When I researched whether they would work with a UltraMax pitcher it said yes, so that is why I decided to try them. Very disappointing. Don't recommend at all.

Very disappointed with these. Thought they might save me some money and cut back further on how much plastic I threw away, but it was just money down the tubes. They stopped filtering after just a couple of days. Tried the fix described in other reviews to no avail. Seriously, save your money and stick to the regular Brita filters. At least they actually give you some filtered water within a reasonable amount of time.

I didn't experience any problem with installation, tight fit no need for a rubber ring or other crap people talking about. Noticed difference right away. New long last filter removed sewage taste of my water which was present when I use old white filters. I also noticed much slower water flow through the new filter hopefully because of better filtration.

This NEW style FILTER for Brita's Water Pitcher is not of the same standard as the premier  style. The filtration  process is faster BUT , it doesn't  clean the water as it used to.I belive that this style of filter is much cheaper to manufacture than the premier ,at the COST OF HIGH QUALITY. The only good thing about this new style of filter is that the little knob-like piece atop the filter makes it much easier to remove the filter from the pitcher...

I think they meant new and improved for Brita, not for the customer. Water seems to move through these more quickly than the old style. Yes, its been inserted correctly. Even after a week of use, water still moves through the filter noticeably quicker than the old style. I image the less time the water spends in the filter, the less its cleaned. Does Brita put less carbon in these than the old style? I've used Brita filters for years, these filters do not clean the water as well as the old ones. I can taste the difference. I have not noticed any specs of carbon in the reservoir though, that is an improvement. I cannot recommend this.

Just got the filter so can't speak for the longevity, but i do notice a bit crisper taste to my water. It does drain a bit slow compared to a regular filter, but that hasn't been an issue for me. I'm a HUGE water drinker so the fact that it filters out more things from my water and lasts much longer is a big win. Buy one if you drink a lot of water.

review_title: Works better than the cheaper units but...
review_body: ... just a little on the slow side.

review_title: filters dont last more than a month or two. ...
review_body: filters dont last more than a month or two.  they eventually clog completely or take hours and hours to filter a single jug.. i contacted brita about this and they sent me some replacement ones claiming they were defective.  but of course, same issue on these replacements.. i will finish using whatever filters i have and then switch to a new product.

review_title: So far so good. We have used Brita filters for years and ...
review_body: So far so good. We have used Brita filters for years and I like the taste of our city water after filtration. I decided to try these longer lasting filters because I am, frankly, terrible at remembering to change the filter so a higher capacity filter can only be a good thing. So far the water from the pitcher still tastes good.

I use Dixie paper plates for our convenience. They are easy to use when we are busy. The Dixie brand holds food well without leakage. The quality is good and you can use a knife to cut your food without cutting through the plate. I rated this at five stars because other brands did not do so well holding up while eating your food. I recommend these plates because they are my favorite ones. Hope you give them a try.

review_title: Sturdy plates which will do the job for Thanksgiving, with all the Gravey and Stuffings!
review_body: Strong sturdy plates, which I love.  I cant stand the Styrofoam flimsy plates which break, or you need several to hold one plate of food. Also the Styrofoam pieces break off into your food when you use a knife and fork.. These are normal size dinner plates. Whether your expecting guests for dinner, a party, or just being lazy, these plates do the job, and you only need to use one!.

As paper plates go, these are very solid.  They may cost a little more, but there isn't a need to double or triple stack them like the cheapo alternatives.  Unlike their foam counterparts, these hold up well to the microwave.  You would think that paper would be a bad idea with wet-ish foods, but I've never had a leakage problem.  They are a bit smallish; I wish they would move up to 12"!

review_title: ... & they don't fall apart or leak> I was amazed! I really didn't need to wash it but ...
review_body: These can be washed & they don't fall apart or leak> I was amazed! I really didn't need to wash it but I wanted to find out. Also they go in the microwave very well with no damage after wards & they do not bend & spill food like many other brands. They are strong! I'm talking about heavy foods, big helpings, not sandwich or salads. I highly recommend & will  continue to purchase these.

These plates a very good. They hold up well in the microwave to warm left overs. Dixie is a very good product. We use them for meals, snacks that doesn't need a bowl. It sure save on dishwashing. These are excellent for company. The print is very pretty. They are a good size 10 1/16 holds a lot of food. Try I think one will like the quality & convenience.

Lots of young relatives and their little friends always seem to want a snack after school or when they play from one end of the neighborhood to the other on weekends. These paper plates hold up well, leave me little clean up, and the snacks keep the children happy and energized. I order my Dixie Paper Plates from Amazon's Subscribe and Save Program.

These Dixie HD (high definition?) paper plates work exactly as described. I am able to load a bunch of food in the center of the plate, and still see the nice graphics. The plates are stable enough to allow the use of a knife and fork which is a big plus. Switching from porcelain plates to these paper plates has saved a lot of water usage during the California drought. We also avoid landfills by having bonfires on cool evenings. A weeks worth of used plates gives us hours of warmth and enjoyment. I work hard to put food on the table and Dixie makes it that much easier.

Unless you are in need of ridiculously China like, super expensive plates, these are the best paper plates around. Have been for years. Other brands have scaled back the size of their disposable  plates. Thank goodnessDixie has not followed suit. The price is as expected. I recommend these plates for those who like everything to be easy. That's me.

The only difference is that I can buy from Amazon instead of Wal-Mart...which is okay by me. The product is exactly the same as I would have gotten locally, just a larger quantity.

These 10" plates are the perfect size for everyday use. They are strong and durable. They are coated so they microwave well. They are a really good price on Amazon, and on subscribe-and-save they are even better price! We will continue to use and purchase these as they are a great fit for our family and we use these constantly. Thanks!

review_title: One of the best waterproof mattress pads out there
review_body: I love this mattress pad for a number of reasons; just got a larger bed and have 2 of these now.  I like having a waterproof mattress pad, but I hate other models that a) stink of vynil b) crinkle and c) fall apart when you wash them, or have their waterproof layer shift. This model does none of the above.  It also does NOT add bulk to the bed.  The full elastic makes it easy to get it on and KEEP it on.  Yes, this would also work with a moderate pillowtop mattress.  I don't have a pillowtop but there's enough give in the elastic skirting to probably accommodate up to 2" or 3" of pillowtop or a foam topper.. It washes up very nicely also.  I usually send my laundry out (hello NYC) at a dropoff service, and they tend to abuse the heck out of anything you send them, and my last one of these for my fullsize bed stood up to at least 3 years of abuse at the laundromat (and was in perfect shape when I got rid of it; my old one just didn't fit my new bed).

A bit small for our memory-foam king mattress (though our sheets and blankets are too -it’s the mattress, not the product), but still protects it well. We’ve had several puppy accidents on the bed, and you wouldn’t even know by looking at the mattress under this cover. Easy to wash (we use hot cycle with soap and bleech in the washer, and a hot cycle in the dryer), holds up well and looks exactly as it did when we received it several months ago, even after multiple wash cycles. Also quite comfortable; can’t even tell it’s there!

I received this yesterday.  Upon opening it from the package, it was flimsier than I thought it would be.  It was not as "fitted" as some other reviewers have indicated, but it fit on the mattress upon tucking it underneath. The reverse of the protector had a heavier plastic lining, which I assume is what catches the moisture before it gets to your mattress. I like that feature.. I washed it before placing it on the bed because it had a plastic smell.  The smell mostly came out upon washing it.  I washed it on a "cool" normal cycle and dried it at medium heat.  It dried in one dryer cycle for me. It also dried well; it still fit on the mattress afterwards and was intact.. All in all, I would recommend this item to others.  I should mention that I contacted the company selling the item prior to my purchasing it to ask a question and they responded promptly and politely.

I love this mattress protector.  It is totally worth the money in my opinion.  It washes up well and is very comfortable, not too cold or hot  This is the second one I've bought, but if you wash  and dry it every couple of weeks it will last for at least a year or so.  The top protects well and it stays put.  I would give it five stars except for the fact that the sides are just mesh and if you spill something near the edge, the side of mattress will still get wet...

Quality seems fine, but I didn't realize that "fitted sheet style" doesn't zip closed around the entire mattress.  My mistake.  But what is the point of protecting a mattress from dust mites if the dust mites can get into the mattress?  I purchased this early for my son who's going off to college and only just opened the package to wash.  Too late to return.  Will have to search for a new one (and one that protects against bed bugs.  Didn't realize that this one doesn't.)

review_title: Wasn’t Waterproof for Us- SAD DAY!!!!
review_body: I am so mad/sad right now. My son climbs in bed with us almost every night and wets through his diaper about once a week. I had high hopes for this waterproof mattress cover, but alas, it failed me last night and now my mattress has another pee stain on it.

It's difficult to give a review at this stage of using this item as not much time has passed.  What I can state is that it appears to be of the same quality as the first one purchased when the bed was new.  It does look identical, but is not the same brand.  I do not find it hot or crinkly as others have stated, and we do not have air conditioning!  If it lasts as long as the first mattress protector (about 7 years), I will be very happy.  Also, this one was $10.00 less expensive than the first, so that is a plus.  I would recommend giving this product a try.

We bought this to protect the mattress from long-term stains, but also as a safeguard against our pet having an accident on the bed. Sure enough, there was a "wet pet error", which was fairly voluminous, and this protector completely saved our mattress. There was no stain at all, and only a small trace amount of wetness on the mattress - and we are not sure how long this worked, because we weren't home at the time, but it's estimated at least 2-3 hours of wetness. A small amount of baking soda on the mattress and it's now good as new. Thanks SafeRest!

review_title: Great mattress protector!  Waterproof! Saved my mattress!!!
review_body: This mattress protector has been a lifesaver.  I have allergies and originally bought it for that reason.  However, my dog recently has had several pee accidents on my bed and my mattress would have been ruined without this protector.  It is completely water proof without a crinkly feel.  It does have a slight different feel than just a sheet on the mattress but you get used to it very quickly.  I bought other brands for my children's beds and they all have that same feel but this one is my favorite.  I have washed and dried it many times and it still looks like new.  I would definitely recommend this protector and in fact I'm getting ready to buy another one.

review_title: This is a wonderful mattress protector
review_body: This is a wonderful mattress protector, and I now have two of them on two different beds in my home.  I enjoy this protector because it gives excellent waterproof protection to your mattress without the awful vinyl "crunch".  I've tried a few other covers, and they all either made terrible sounds, or just felt like I was sleeping on a tarp. The smooth top of the SafeRest means you won't ever hear or feel it.  You may not think you need a waterproof mattress protector past the age of 5, but you'd be surprised how many little spills and accidents can add up.  An unexpected bloody nose in the middle of the night shouldn't soil your $2000 mattress.  Finally, the safe rest mattress protector gives a nice snug fit on any sized mattress.  As I use a foam topper this is something I really value, as the mattress protector holds the foam topper in place and keeps it from sliding off to one side when moving around.

review_title: Beautiful indoor ambiance- excellent product for the price!
review_body: I love unique lighting and ambiance in the home and these lights are perfect! I currently have them hanging over the front two windows of my house from the inside (although they can probably be used outdoors too) and the view from the street makes my home welcoming and magical in an otherwise dreary and boring neighborhood. I just purchased these lights and I'm about to purchase another few sets, they're beautiful and perfect for the price. ALSO- a helpful tip is to keep the bundled strings of lights together until you hang up all the lights, otherwise it becomes tangled and frustrating- I was happy that the lights were pre-bundled in their box for much easier display set-up!

review_title: ... Steamer for the first time today and I absolutely love it. With cold weather approaching
review_body: I used my Isteams Steamer for the first time today and I absolutely love it.  With cold weather approaching, it was time to get out my sweaters and I was dreading ironing them. Then I remembered my steamer which arrived a week ago.  I steamed 5 sweaters in less then 3 minutes and they had lots of wrinkles, some very deep,  but  now, "presto!" they look great.  This steamer is so light weight and easy to use that I've decided to steam my  remaining sweaters (and there are lots of them) the night before or even the morning of the day I wear each of them.  What a great tool!  It also will be easy to pack and is small enough it won't take up much space or weight.  No more worry about wrinkles!!!

the whole family loves it.

review_title: Its just a really good scale
review_body: Ive had unreliable digital scales before and i gotta say it is the most frustrating when youre trying to get am accurate account of your progress.. OLD SCALE. I step on the scale. It gives me a number. I step on the scale again immediately after... It gives me a completely different number. This scale is accurate and consistent all the way through.

review_title: It worked great at first but after a month or so it ...
review_body: Scale is attractive and sleek but that is where the positives stop. It worked great at first but after a month or so it consistently showed different weights. Step on the scale and weigh one weight, step off and back on weight 5lbs less. Step on again weight 5 lbs more. Step off and on again and weight 7lbs more. There is no way to tell what is accurate. It's a huge disappointment because I might as well not have a scale. I wish I had read the negative reviews closers before I purchased this product.

We've have the scale for 9 months.  It gets used on a weekly basis from toddlers, kids, teens, adults.  It's sleek modern glass top is great with the easy to read digital features.  It works great for us and it was even fun for the kids to weigh a 5lb bag of Haribo gummy bears on it.  : ).  It's a nice feature in the bathroom.  The only thing I would change is the rubber feet.  They are not acid free and have discolored my bathroom floor, (leaving 4 yellow spots), so I keep it in the same location so it doesn't ruin anymore of the flooring.  Overall a great product/scale that we would recommend and definitely buy again.

review_title: Finally a simple accurate scale at a reasonable price!
review_body: I have tried many of the different types of digital scales, but was disappointed with most of them. Some have buttons to push, remember your previous weight, check your BMI etc. Lot's can and does go wrong with those. I wanted a good quality scale that you simply step on, get your weight and go. This one fit the bill, it uses standard AAA batteries instead of those hard to find button cells. It turns itself off after a few seconds to save battery life. It's accurate and easy.

This is a really nice scale. It has a very sleek and modern design. It also slips away for storage very easily and turns on with very little pressure applied.  And, it is instant read. You don't have to wait for the scale to process your weight.. Etekcity also has very friendly customer service. They sent an email after our purchase just to make sure everything was ok with our product.. Keep up the good work.

review_title: Sold!  Loved the simplicity of set up!
review_body: Works well - unfortunately it lies, or at least that's what I'm telling myself.  :P  In all seriousness, we open the box, install the batteries, set it on the floor and it worked.  That simple.  This was appreciated as we were wary of the electronics of it all as we just retired our 24 year old dial scale and all new techie stuff make us kind of nervous.  Would purchase again and felt the price was great!

I bought this because of the good reviews and the fact that it is made of glass, making it easier to clean. However, I took it out of the box on the second use and it was broken. I weigh about 200 lbs, and it was reading 111 lbs. I checked, and it was reading pounds and not anything else. It hadn't gotten moved very much or banged around, so I don't see a reason why the product was reading so different. I do not recommend this product, and will not be buying from this brand again.

review_title: I particularly like this scale because when she steps off the scale
review_body: My mom has heart failure, and I need to weigh her everyday.  I particularly like this scale because when she steps off the scale, the weight is clearly displayed so I have time to see the reading.  She can't stand very well.  Yes, I love it.

I purchased the scale on a whim since it was the deal of the day and was pleasantly surprised by how lightweight it is. My previous scale was large and clunky so it stayed in one spot in the house, but I can move this around to meet my needs. I don't use it for its conventional purpose though, it's mainly to check the weight of my newborn. The scale is pretty sensitive so it picks up on the smaller weight changes and I can see that she's steadily gaining biweekly which is nice. I like that it lights up as well, so if she's snoozing I can step on the scale with her without turning on the lights. It also comes with batteries, which is a plus because I didn't have to go out and buy any. It gets the job done at a great price, I'd recommend it.

This product worked great for about 3-4 months.  It was always accurate.  Then out of nowhere it will never give us the same reading twice.  Step on and it says I'm 116, step off and let it reset, step back on now I'm 135.  It's been giving us a 35 lb variation in both directions.  You can take 10 readings back to back and not one of them will be a duplicate.  We've tried moving it to make sure it's on a flat surface, changing batteries, etc... nothing works.  It also used to give the same weight regardless of where your feet were... now it varies largely (you way more if your feet are near the edges and weigh less if your feet are close together in the middle).

review_title: great price for the amount of paper towels you receive
review_body: great price for the amount of paper towels you receive. i would recommend the subscribe and save for even more discount
Very easy to use and did a good job.
These are great paper towels at the cheapest price I have found.  I would compare to Bounty.
The product is great, and they are definitely good for universal use.
Love this product. On my rotating list. Works just as great as leading products.

as expected
Good value.
Best ever. Best price. Why would you buy anything else?
I like the little bit of built in fragrance. Its nice to counteract any garbagey smells that occur.

review_title: One star for Glad on this one, what a miss.
review_body: Mine smelled terrible... We couldn't stand the fake synthetic smell, my wife had me throw them out of the house.. I ended up relegating them for use in the garage and outside the house projects.. I think the idea is fine but they need to rethink that stench.... Had I bought them bags at a brick and mortar store I would have taken them back and return them for sure.... I hope this helps someone.
item as described,fast shipping

review_title: Too much lint for windows. Good for general cleaning.
review_body: Bought this for windows, only to find out there are window specific microfiber cloths. This item left too much lint behind, which shows when the sun comes through the windows. Great for general cleaning of countertops, floors, etc.

Not the highest end microfibers you'll ever use, but the quantity and price is right. Extremely useful to have around, and cheap enough that you don't really mind if you have to toss one it gets too grimy/dirty to use again.

I purchased these microfiber cloths because I have decided to do away with wasteful paper towels.. I like that these come in a large pack of 36 for a very inexpensive price.. I also like that they come in different colors, it makes it easy for me to sort which ones are for which jobs around the house.. They are also very absorbent cloths, but I feel they don't really clean better than a regular old t-shirt/scrap cloth.. I like that I can re-use these by rinsing them out, and they do dry pretty quickly just hanging on a clothesline/edge of my sink, etc.. I do not put these in the dryer after I have put them through the washing machine (per instructions) so I have hung a little drying line in my laundry room which is nice. I have accidentally put a couple in the dryer and I can tell they are damaged/worn out/pilling much faster than the rest.. Overall, if you need these for regular cleaning jobs around the house I would definitely recommend them, especially at the great price point and overall usefulness of the product.

I used to use Swiffer .  before I found these.  They are cheaper if you just want a quick rag to use and throw away, and way more versatile than a Swiffer.  I have had no issues with dust and dirt escaping these rags.  You can also wash these and reuse them, unlike a Swiffer.  At less than $0.40 each, its a no brainer switch for me.

These are great cleaning towels, a perfect replacement to paper towels for cleaning. You can use them on pretty much any surface.  They aren’t the thickest microfiber cloths I’ve had, but they work well and so far seem durable.

I swear by these. I use them for everything: cleaning, inside and outside of the car, I even use one only for my glasses.. The are pretty awesome. they absorb well and clean and shine windows/glass the best. I would definitely recommend these for all purpose use!
Just exactly what it says it is. I use them for polishing cars and cleaning eyeglasses

review_title: Great microfiber cloths for any use
review_body: These are nice fluffy microfiber rags. However they are not sized uniformly and some tend to be smaller than others. I buy them for cleaning and to have on hand for projects around the house. For the price I don't mind if one goes missing. I would not recommend washing them with anything else but microfiber on high heat, that would make them not as absorbent or effective at scrubbing. I would prefer my nicer Norwex cloths for regular cleaning as they have a better quality fiber

Nice size for bath hand towels, kitchen towels, napkins, dusting, and wiping my dog’s wet feet. Wash in Purex white, add vinegar to the rince cycle, and they look like new again. They were serged well, and they were consistently sized.

review_title: Good For Cleaning VCR Video Heads:
review_body: I bought them because the VCR part of my DVD/VCR Combo Recorder/Player is not functioning correctly. The video tape starts to play, then the video goes off. I hadn't used it in a long time, the video heads need cleaning. I hope this will solve the problem, because I would like to see the many cassette tapes I have.

review_title: Glad Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, 90 Count
review_body: I finally used up all my cheapie bags that always leaked and tore easily.. It is nice to use a Brand Name that is thicker, tougher, and quality product!. I like the quantity and since I ordered.. I recommend this product without reservation.. Plus using Amazon's "Subscribe and Save" the cost is reasonable and better than the grocery store.
Good value and quality and it’s delivered right to your door. What more can you ask?

I bought these bags when they were available for $9. 90 bags for $9!! Can't beat that, when they're such high quality. These are my favorite bags, I've never had any problems with them. I like to stuff my garbage bags super full, I don't go easy on them and these bags can actually take my abuse!

These are my go to garbage bags. I get them on Subscribe and Save. However, I got a bad box where the handles are not completely sealed in the edge on one side. It's a big box so that is a lot of defective bags. I'm dealing with it because sending something back that is so cheap and heavy isn't worth the effort.

review_title: Love this product because of its durability! It’s what I always buy!
review_body: Love this product because of its durability! It’s what I always bite!
I love these bags. My family tends to stuff a trash bag to the fullest and so far, I have not had one tear on me -- not one single time. They are very durable.

review_body: These bags are strong. I’m on my third box and not one bag let me down  No holes  when I use this bag  I feel confident that they’ll be no leaks to the garbage can outside

review_title: Good quality and smells good. Reasonable priced
review_body: The trash bags are good quality and smell good. 5 star products, occasionally breaks if gets too heavy but overall good products.
Glad products are always, in my experiences, the best. Very strong - have never had one split open on me regardless of how much weight the debris.

Finally!  A decent trash bag that doesn't smell like fake flowers or some other repulsive scent.  I'm not sure why they think they can cover up the smell of trash with the smell of fake flowers. These do their job and don't make me gag.  The dirty diapers do that job well enough on their own!
NO-Much less than before for MONEY

review_title: Takes a long time to filter the water.
review_body: Not a fan of these - which I purchased because I thought it would make sense to spend a little more upfront and not have to worry about replacing my Brita filters as often. This would make sense, except for the fact that they take a significantly longer time to filter the water. I've come back over an hour later and most of the water is still sitting in the top of the pitcher, unfiltered. You're better off just buying the original filters, unless you like waiting hours for your drinking water to be ready.

I love the Brita pitchers but the filters go along with them, so I guess I love them too.  I have had really good results with my Brita and am finally free of buying bottled water in place of the terrible stuff that comes straight from the spigot.  For a long time I held off and laughed at people using and praising their Britas but no more.  It really works.  Finally good tasting water at home.

review_title: Great tasting water, just make sure it’s secure!
review_body: I love these long lasting filters. I think they work even better than the normal ones. The only downside that I have seen so far is that they don’t fit securely enough so that if the pitcher is close to full, the filter pops up and unfiltered water gets through. I wish they were more snug. I never had that issue with the normal ones.

review_title: It takes VERY long time to filter the water
review_body: I live in MA (where the tap water normally has ~70 ppm impurity). I bought this product from Amazon and installed in my Brita water dispenser (the old version, I bought it 3-4 years ago). It took me very long time for the water to flow through. For example, one-gallon water can take me more than 10 hours to be filtered. I ended up to throw it away after ~4 gallons. It does not work!

I like this filter. Reading what it could filter. I use it in combination with the normal Brita filter. I would use this fiter first then with all the filtered water, I pour it into anothe pitch (with the normal filter). There is a difference in the water.. However, the whole filtering process for Longlast is just way too slow. It takes over an hour to do  one pass of filtration. That's just not acceptable.  The first 10 days of use, the filter was fine but now (the filter has only been used for 1 month), it is filtering literary one drop of water every second.. For filter: I give it a 4 stars. For speed: 1 star. So overall,

I followed the included instructions and the first one worked perfectly. It lasted for the advertised time. Unfortunately, the 2nd filter could never filter the water properly - it would take over an hour to filter one refill of the upper tank. After several agonizing days, I had to replace that filter from a set bought in a store.

While I feel that the filter is doing its job, it takes FOREVER!  I thought we would save some money by getting the long last filters and not need to replace as often.  But it's not worth waiting for.  When you fill the reservoir, it takes over an hour to drain which then only gives you somewhere between 1/4 and 1/3 of a pitcher of water.  We're a family of 4.  We fill 1-2 water bottles and then have to wait hours before anyone can get more. We'll stick to the standard life filters in the future so that we don't get dehydrated waiting for the next sip of filtered water!

review_title: extremely slow to let the water through
review_body: I don;t know what's up with these filters, I'm not sure if they are letting the water through the filter or just seeping around them. Sometimes they pop up and out of where they are seated in the pitcher. Most of the time it takes 24 or more hours for the water to go from the top compartment to the bottom compartment.Maybe I got defective ones.

Don't have to set the filter in water, good to go straight from the package. These filter water faster than the original filters and last SO much longer. Water tastes just as good for longer than three months whereas I feel I need to replace others after 3 weeks. Good deal. Only longlast filters for me from here on out.

review_title: Filters very slowly after one month
review_body: UPDATE 7/25/18: After reading Wirecutter's review and statement from Brita that my problem was an anomaly, I bought these again. This is STILL happening. After a few weeks I need to fill the reservoir the night before for it be filtered by morning! Never buying again! I'm curious why, if this is an anomaly, the CSR from the first 2 I bought said it may have to do with "bubbles in my water." This is strange. I live in NYC and wonder if this is happening to others here--sounds like a strange excuse.. PREVIOUS REVIEW:. In my experience, these DO NOT last 6 months or 120 gallons. After only 1 month of using the first one in the package, it took more and more time to filter through. And it's just me using it. By now, only 2 months after first use, it takes nearly 8 hours for the water to go all the way through the filter! Calling for refund/replacement.
Junk. Ya Need 2 or 3 of them if you put Anything on your Plate! And good Luck trying to Cut Anything on them!!! No Good.... Look a Little Harder.

review_title: What can I say? They're paper plates. Exactly ...
review_body: What can I say? They're paper plates. Exactly as I needed and expected them to be. I bought them for the snowflake pattern for a holiday party and they held all the food just as I hoped they would.

review_title: decently sturdy for most everyday meals
review_body: decently sturdy for most everyday meals. would not recommend for a thanksgiving meal piled with everything unless you were careful because these are thin and are not chinette style thickness, but they work really good for the price, best I have found for everyday use.

These plates are definitly a great buy!! I have been purchasing them for several months now, I like the large size and the fact you could cut a steak on the plates and not worry about slicing through the plate or juices leaking through the plate...great for use in microwaves as they do not loose their shape or stregnth when reheating foods..I definitly will keep on buying these plates!

review_title: I received wrong color plates. Need it for holiday ...
review_body: I received wrong color plates.  Need it for holiday party and it was late due to inclement weather so I had to use them.  I added picture to show everyone what I received.

Sick of washing plates all day so I got these lol. I would say you could wipe them off and reuse them, they're very heavy and sturdy and keep shape really well if you're putting a lot/heavy food. I wouldn't necessarily rinse and reuse because they stain, but you could use it all day for non-staining food!
These plates were a lot more flimsy than I thought they would be.

Being my age (73) and living alone I love using these paper plates.  It helps to cut down drastically on the amount of dishwasing I have to do.  This is a great product and doesn't leak, whether I cook something in the microwave or on the stove.  They hold up even when using a knife.

Strong paper plates. Nice size beautiful design. I only buy these. I've tried others but they are so flimsy or just plain expensive. These are great for picnics, gatherings, parties or for people like me that have a family and try and keep the housework minimal so I can spend more time with my family.

review_title: Since it's just my husband and I now and I ...
review_body: Since it's just my husband and I now and I have arthritis, these have been time savers for me.  These are dinner size.  I've been using them for summer salads.  If the food is hot, I usually put a glass plate under it, but the plate stays clean because the food doesn't soak through.
Love the quality

Very soft... almost too soft.

review_title: Great mattress protector for a reasonable price!
review_body: This premium mattress protector for my new king mattress was exactly as described on Amazon. I washed it as per the instructions given, and it came out perfectly.  The deep pockets worked well for our 14.5 inch mattress. There was no odor or noise from moving around while lying down on it. When I tested it by pouring water on it, the thin terry surface absorb the water, and the polyurethane barrier on the opposite side stayed dry.  This protector should keep my mattress from liquid damage as far as I can tell. It looks well made, and my order was delivered quickly. I've only had this product for a week, so I don't know how it will hold up over time.  The price was very reasonable, and I recommend it.

review_title: Convenient way to protect the bed from kittens
review_body: We're working through some potty problems with our new kittens, and wanted something to protect the bed from accidents while we're out of the house.  So instead of using it as intended, we're turning it inside out and putting it on top of the covers.  (The underside of the top is a flexible plasticky fabric.)  It's worked really well!. All told, we're pulling the topper over about 15-16" of mattress, topper, and linens.  The mattress protector has very large pockets, and fits securely over all of that.  When there's an accident, we just toss it in the washer -- no special considerations needed, though it does take longer to dry than most bed linens.. I think that it would also be comfortable to use as intended.  The top is a nice terry cloth, and the sides are thin enough that they wouldn't add any bulk.. UPDATE:  We did start using the cover as intended, because one of the kittens is still having morning accidents.  Still very pleased -- it's easy to put on, makes a good moisture barrier, and has held up to tiny claws and many washings.  It does take a long time to dry, so we bought a second one for quick swaps.  It may make the bed a little warmer than normal, but not enough to bother me or my husband.

review_title: Because you can't stuff your mattress in washer...
review_body: I purchased this to keep my mattress clean and to replace a previous protector I owned - you can put this in the washing machine and clean it like bed sheets, but it stays in place despite tossing and turning.  It is comfortable to sleep on, and it has been holding up well over the past few months.. I don't know how well this would hold up to someone having an accident or spilling something on it, but for normal mattress protection this works just fine.

I tried sleeping on this without washing it first. Bad idea. Omg I was sweating buckets. I then washed it and it's a bit better. Still not as breathable as my mattress without it.. But it's not a torturous thing as it had been. But that's not why I've detracted a star. My sheets will not stay put with this thing on! I thought it might be the new mattress that we bought.. But no.. I pulled the cover off to wash it and didn't put it back on for a few days and my sheets were fine. As soon as I put the cover back, everything was sliding everywhere again. Oh well. It does what it's meant to do, that's what I need. I can deal with the sheet problem.

I love this mattress protector.  I've gone through several hoping to find the perfect one.  This is it.  Let me just say first of all that it does not crinkle or make any noise when you move around on the mattress.  Completely silent - but waterproof.  Yea!  Next big issue with me is finding a cover that's deep enough that I don't have to struggle to completely cover the sides of the mattress.  I hate all of that tugging.  No problem there.  It covers well with extra fabric should it shrink over time.  Don't worry though.  There isn't extra fabric hanging down or anything.  Lastly, some of the mattress covers I've owned were so thick that they were hard to get in our washing machine.  We don't need padding with our mattress.  We just need to protect it from our three labradoodles.  This cover is perfect.  I highly recommend it.  It is also thin enough to use over a mattress pad if you need the padding and want to protect it.

We have two of these covers on our mattresses and we like it very much. It keeps the mattress clean without making it hot to sleep on. The coating on the back doesnt make any noise while your lying on it either. It stays in place without any trouble. I've washed and dried it many times without any visible wear and tear also.

review_title: Protector yes! Pad or cushion NO!
review_body: Fits the mattress well.  It is a bit rough and no cushion or “pad” to speak of.  It is more of a protector than mattress pad, but then that’s what it says “protector” not “pad”. Just be aware of the difference, it is my fault for not reading closely.  The good thing is it will protect and the roughness makes it stay in place well.  The side that is up is like a rough terry so over time and washings we’ll see if it pills and gets uncomfortable, right now it is new and fine.

This is a excellent mattress protector. It has no vinyl so you don't have to worry about it making a bunch of noise as you move around at night. It's also very soft to the touch and comfortable to sleep on. I have kids, so I knew I needed a great mattress protector for my new memory foam mattress or my kids would probably stain it in a matter of days. They can get messing as most parents know. Now I don't have to worry about them when their hanging out in my room. I recommend this to everyone. Don't find out the hard way that you need one.

review_title: sad to see that they don't come in crib sizes
review_body: We have 3 for my son's bed and now one for ours as well. They won't prevent a leak if there's a giant puddle just sitting on them, but they do contain about 90% of my sons night time leak accidents which has significantly reduced the frequency that I wash sheets. We wash them all and layer liner then sheet set, liner and sheet set 2, liner and sheet set 3. Most of the time I just have to pull off the top set of sheets and liner and the next one is ready to go. These make my life so much easier. I even looked to get a couple for the crib for the next baby, sad to see that they don't come in crib sizes.

My use of the mattress cover is actually on top of my bedclothes but under the coverlet/bedspread. With dogs, hairs shedding and other undesirable things can filter through to my sleeping territory.. This mattress cover is the absolute best protection that I have found. No dog hairs come through the waterproof side at all. Not only that, but the underside (the waterproof side) feels very silky, very pleasant to the touch. Not at all like plastic underside I've seen on my other mattress covers. Another bonus for me is the top of this mattress cover is a flannel-like fabric that keeps the cover/bedspread in place no matter how often the dog(s) jump on the bed. I like it better than the padded/quilted version.. An excellent find for me. Plan on ordering a couple of backups when the budget permits so that I can replace the cover currently on my mattress itself and have a spare for laundry day..
Durable, easy select a size, long lasting. I feel confident when cleaning spills and drying my hands or items down.
I love Bounty, especially this size, arrive in perfect condition.  I do order several times.  Thank you
