I ordered two of these pillow to use as decorative on my couch. They are exactly what I expected, except they are really soft and comfortable! I mean you can actually lay your head on them and use them and they hold their shape! And when they go flat... they fluff right back up!
Came collapsed in a bag and immediately fluffed once taken out of bag!. Great Quality!

review_title: Fit the pillow covers I bought great and arrived very promptly
review_body: Exactly what I expected and needed! Fit the pillow covers I bought great and arrived very promptly!

It's great for a decorative pillow which is why I purchased it. If you want a primary sleeping pillow, then that is not what this is for. Looks fluffy and has good shape, but will not stand up to heavy use.
Exactly as posted!  Great product, quick shipping.
Lightweight, easy to stuff into a case, and hypoallergenic. It's a good price and product.

review_title: It's a good low cost pillow to throw onto your couch
review_body: It's a good low cost pillow to throw onto your couch. Does take some time for it to break in and get comfortable, but good stuff.

review_title: These were great! I used them for a photo booth background ...
review_body: These were great! I used them for a photo booth background at my baby shower and they are so fantastic I am going to use them in some decorating as well.. My only complaint is they tangle REALLY easily, but if you pack them back the way they came, they are manageable.

They look great! I only wish the outlet chord was all clear (its black) and a little longer. The lights themselves are small and dainty so they look perfect against the wall or mixed in with curtains. I also love the opportunity to be able to connect them! Great lights, I would recommend these to a friend. They would look great as a "picture wall" for many college apartments.
Would give it a 0 but it was not an option. After a tremendously long wait for shipping (on Amazon part), put them up, used them once, looked beautiful. Then they stopped working.

Sooo easy to work with and they are magical. I love these and have recommended them to many of my friends. There are multiple flicker settings but I love how classy and romantic the steady lights look. Love them!  I’ve set them on a timer so I get a little joy when they come on and I can admire them.

I bought 2 of these for my bedroom to line my wall and they look so great! Would recommend hanging them with the lights tied as they come out of the box instead of untying them beforehand. That was a hassle! I hung them with white thumbtacks to blend with the wires and they look really good. 5/5!
Love these... exactly as listed. My cord was long enough to hang down and across the floor, my plug is in the middle of my bed on the wall. The control box, I stuck to the wall with a command strip.

review_title: They're not as bright as I would like them to be
review_body: They're not as bright as I would like them to be. They did work perfectly fine. The 7 settings it has don't look very different, the way they blink are way too similar to tell apart, in reality its as if it had 4 different settings. They looked really pretty but don't brighten up a place it that's what you are looking for.
Put them behind my headboard. So far, so good. They are very long, so I ended up doubling them up. I think the picture here is closer to that doubled-up look than if I left them long.

My husband hung this up in my office for me and it is so pretty to look at! I love it! The plug reached my outlet; I did not need an extension cord. We used clear push pins to hang it up. I really like all the settings available. Super satisfied with this purchase.
Great lights, simple unpacking. Great variety of patterns. Bright enough to light up an entire room. Creates a wonderful ambience. High quality and easy to hang.

review_title: Very good! Just hang the shirts up in front of ...
review_body: Just used it today for first time. Very good!  Just hang the shirts up in front of me and steam away. Love that you can de-wrinkle anywhere in the home without having to move an ironing board around. I just keep a pot of water and scoop with me for more convenient refill.

This is well made and light weight.  It is so small though, it doesn’t hold enough water to steam a seriously wrinkled garment.  I had to fill it three times to steam one ladies shirt.  It’s probably great for travel but I can see where you might want a larger more traditional, professional version for home use.

review_title: this one was nice that it didn't spray as much water
review_body: I've had several handheld steamers, this one was nice that it didn't spray as much water, but I only had it for 1 week before it stopped working. The light would still turn on when plugged in but the steamer stopped producing steam. The water reservoir is also much smaller then other handheld steamers I've had in the past. I am returning this broken one and plan to re purchase the other brand I had previously.

review_title: tried it on my fiance's dress shirt and it could not have worked better. It's extremely easy to use
review_body: I bought this steamer to take with me to my destination wedding in Vegas to steam my dress.  I received it today, tried it on my fiance's dress shirt and it could not have worked better.  It's extremely easy to use, heats up very quickly, and I was able to do his entire shirt with just one fill.  It will work perfectly for our wedding attire and well into the future.  Goodbye iron, hello steamer.

This was my first time purchasing and using a travel steamer, so when I read the reviews on this product I decided this was a good buy, and I wasn’t wrong. I took it to my nieces wedding and it worked great! I steamed all the groomsmen shirts and they looked wonderful. It’s a great product and I have no negative comment or complaints. I would buy it again.
Great product. So easy and light weighted. Perfect For traveling
Super handy; I use this often.

I like the small size of this steamer, as I keep it on a shelf in my closet ready for touch-ups. It’s very easy to handle because it’s small, and my hands aren’t strong enough to hold a big water-filled unit. It’s perfect.
Gotta say for the price this thing is amazing and work great while I was in Cuba  on vacation , definitely use distill water..

review_title: Small head... so it takes a little ...
review_body: Small head...so it takes a little longer to steam a garment...but powerful! Thank you!
good for small space.
Easy clean my house

review_title: Best way for fast and easy cleaning.
review_body: Saves using my cloth towels. Wipe on furniture and floors. Works great.

review_title: Great for dog hair and everyday cleaning
review_body: I am obsessed with these cloths - I don't think I'm doing the Earth any good with how many I use in one cleaning session (I'm known to use 6 of these at a time to just do the floors).  I have two dogs and a very hairy husband (not to mention my own personal shedding issues) and every time it picks up hair in every nook and cranny of the house.  There's something oddly satisfying thing to see all those dust bunnies from under the tables, beds, and furniture being swept away with these cloths - sometimes I feel like a wizard banishing the dusties away.
These are great for me as I have 2 dogs and 2 cats. So easy to just run around the house gather all shedding pet hair.
Great to work with
Perfect size for my swifter dust broom and swifter vacuum, and dusting by hand.

review_title: Best quality, pick up a lot of dust
review_body: I use Swiffer wipes for quick hardwood floor sweeps in between vacuuming and mopping. They're the best quality. I just wish they were biodradeable/compostable.
Great for capturing loose dirt and dust on hardwood/laminate.

We are DOG people and have hard wood floors.  No other product has compared to the quality of the Swiffer sweeper!  We use this every day to keep our floors clear of dog hair.  I've tried all sort of other products - always go back to our Swiffer.

review_title: You get what you pay for.
review_body: So i bought this scale because it was pretty cheap. After about a month of using this its now showing incorrect values. I tested alongside my brothers more expensive scale and its always off by ten lbs. It was right on point at first. Now its off all the time. Even when i calibrate it. My advice is buy a more expensive one. Unless you just need it for a month.. Update: changed the batteries. Still no good

review_title: This Scale Outweighs the Rest - I love it
review_body: This is the best scale I have ever used.  It has clear digital numbers that light up so they are easy to see.  I never have to worry about calibration.  It takes up very little space and is much slimmer than my previous scale so it fits neatly under a cabinet without blocking the door.  I use it almost every day to keep track of my weight. My daughter even used it successfully to weigh her squirmy toddler.  It recorded his weight quickly before he could jump off and run away!  All in all, I would recommend this scale to anyone who wants to weigh themselves with convenience, accuracy and no hassle. Highly recommended.

review_title: This scale changes my weight every few seconds, absurd!
review_body: I thought this was a good scale but I've started to notice that my weight seems to fluctuate wildly. At first I was concerned for my health, but now I'm realizing it's the scale itself! This morning for instance I was 108 the first time I stepped on it. Then the next time I stepped on it (20 seconds later) I was 114, followed by 118, followed by 116, and finally 112. This thing has no idea what it's doing and so if you want to play a game with yourself I supposed this is the scale for you, but if you want to actually track your actual weight and progress in exercise or diet or whatnot, stay away.

Due to government service and personal health reasons, I needed a home scale that would be extremely accurate. I have used the old fashioned bathroom scales in the past and found that my weight was off by several pounds from those scales compared to the scale the government weighed me on, a gymnasium style scale. Now, that I have been using the Etekcity Digital Scale for several months I have found that the weight this scale displays for me is exactly the same as the scale at work and at my doctor's office.  With this scale I am able to monitor my weight everyday and keep track of my health accurately. The Etekcity Digital scale is exactly what I needed.

review_title: Completely inaccurate. Tested both with weights and body. Don’t waste your money.
review_body: Completely inaccurate. Tested both with weights and body. Don’t waste your money. Scale was off by more that 10 lbs after comparing my weight from a doctor's appoint yesterday and digital scale at the gym. I replaced the batteries just in case and got the same results. I also checked for any damage or cracks and everything looks to be in good condition. Maybe I was just lucky enough to get a bad one. Still, I would not recommend this.

It looks good, with a sleek minimalist elegance. For the price, I expected a mediocre product; but out of the box I was impressed with it and couldn't wait to put the batteries in it. I have had it for about four months now and it gives accurate, repeatable results. The back-lit numbers are easy for me to read, and that's saying something there. It sits beside my tub and gets some shower drips and splatter; the strong, tempered glass is easy to clean. I got a "please review this product" reminder and when I went into order history and saw how little I paid for it, I was impressed all over again.

review_title: Not quite sure how accurate it is,
review_body: Not quite sure how accurate it is, but it seems only a pound or two off so I'm ok with it. 5/5 (update) I've used this scale for about 2 months now and it definitely does not work correctly. No matter what time I weigh myself, morning, night, after eating, before eating, clothes on or off, it always shows the same weight. Never even fluctuates an ounce! Don't think so! Shows there's a one year warranty, but finding the information is a challenge in itself.

I have had this scale about a month.  My last scale would give me all different weights in a row if I kept checking, so I never trusted the weight it would give me.  I hesitated to get another electronic scale for that reason.  After reading tons of reviews, I decided to try this scale.  Thus far, I have been very satisfied with it.  If I weigh myself multiple times right in a row, it will give me the same weight each time.  It's attractive looking (though very slippery if wet, so be careful!).  It is a little larger than I would prefer, but I can live with that for a scale that works well.

review_title: Many scales later, this is the one for me!
review_body: This scale is fantastic. I have had many scales over the years and yet I have never had one that was back lit. I usually go a bit higher in price to get a bunch of different features, but this one met my immediate needs. It is very thin and light but has amazing traction so that it does not slip around on my tile floor.I weigh myself daily and this scale is right on par with my one that just died. I can not attest to the higher weight use on this item as no one in my house is over 175lbs, but it appears to be very sturdy. If I had to choose anything to knock it would be that I didn't know it existed before I spent all that money over the years on unreliable items

review_title: The results was not exactly correct.
review_body: The design is great but the amount of the pounds is not exactly correct. Like, the first time my pounds is 95 but after few minutes I tried again, my pound go up to 102, Then I tried one more time, my pound go down to 94. So I don't know should I trust this Weight Balance. It made me so confuse with many different results. It's not a correct and perfect Weight Balance.
A bit cheap
works pretty good but don't last long........wish they had the half sheet option
Great product!
Comparable to Bounty or Brawny, less expensive, I like the normal size rolls and full sheets. I will get these again.
For a cheaper paper towel they are really good for spills etc.  I would buy again.
non quality

Good quality product for the price for sure but NOT as good as Kirkland Costco brand. Great value at the price point and better than most but if you can go get the Kirkland brand. Best I’ve ever used. Convenience factor is why I’m giving 4 stars.
Very good
as expected!
Rough texture and thin. Won't buy again.
love it
Keeps the trash can super fresh and these are reasonably priced!
Perfect fit.
good
great
Hate to say it about trash bags... but smell nice.
Product smells great.
Not crazy about the scent. I prefer a scent free garbage bag. But I do like that the oder is controlled.
Strong, lovely scent. I buy them over and over again.
Good value and they are stretchy and smell good for garbage bags.

review_title: Not the best quality of microfiber
review_body: Microfiber isn't the best quality, but the quantity of towels included makes up for that. For someone like me who is very particular about car detailing, these might not be the best for use on painted surfaces. I use these primarily to clean door jams, plastic trim, interiors, and wheels.

Great for dusting.  These work with the iRobot Bravaa for sweeping.  I tried mopping but I think it is heavier than the Bravaa covers when wet so it's doesn't fully replace.  But much much cheaper.  Downside is the cleaning, it does such a good job of attracting dirt it wants to stay in the clothes even after the wash.

These cloths are good quality microfibers, for significantly cheaper then I find them for elsewhere. The pack size works quite well for me since I use these for everything from pc, tablet, and  cell phone screens to detailing my car. I also frequently replace my microfiber cloths, so at this price, replacing them has become a lot more affordable.. Definitely buy these if you are looking to clean you electronics, they work beautifully.

review_title: But my product came in perfect and I was able to use it to clean ...
review_body: Solid product. Check your product as soon as it arrives, for defects being shipped. But my product came in perfect and I was able to use it to clean my car and house. Cost effective too.

They work, good for cleaning, but not very well, and they wear out quickly. Running them through the washer and dryer might leave you sad. I would recommend the Zwipes microfiber cleaning clothes, as they are the same cost. This is something Amazon could improve.

The description for these towels says they measure  25.4 x 4 x 33.02 in.. In fact they measure 12 x 15,5". They feel good, but I haven't had them through a wash cycle yet.. The size is very disappointing.

Outstanding product that I use for cleaning guns.  One side is smooth and the other side is like terrycloth.  Works more efficiently than rags.  One cloth lasts a long time and will handle a lot of cleanings.  I don't throw them in the washing machine because the toxic chemicals used in gun cleaner will go down the drain and get into the water supply.  I throw them out and they go to the garbage dump.  They aren't expensive and do a great job.

review_title: These cloths might be perfect for your needs, but I don't like their smooth texture
review_body: These cloths might be perfect for your needs, but I don't like them because of their smooth texture.  I prefer an absorbent cleaning or drying cloth with a rough texture, similar to cotton or cotton-polyester blend washcloth.
These cloths leave more lint than I have ever seen a microfiber cloth leave. It’s frustrating.
I like them because I don't use as many paper towels BUT dirt and debris get stuck to them and it is almost impossible to get it off - even after washing them 2x.

review_title: I am very disappointed with this order of Glad Trash Bags
review_body: I am very disappointed with this order of Glad Trash Bags. They rip and garbage spills out on the floor. I have ordered these same bags in the past and have had no problems. Not sure what is wrong with this order. I am going to dispose of the entire box to be sure I do not have similar messes. I will probably switch brands.

review_title: Ok just don't make them too heavy
review_body: These are good. The top string is very thin and stretches too much so you can't make these too heavy but I do recommend them.
Unable to use because of the smell.  They must be stored with fragrant products because they smelled like perfume, had to give them away.  If you have MCS like me, I would  not purchase them
These were ok. My son is rough on things, just wondering if there is a replacement  for these?
These bags are durable, especially the drawstring comes very handy. Wish they have 10 gallon size too.
No tears and I tend to FILL the can!
Wish they were still folded so I could grab a stack instead of one at a time from the rolls. Other than that they are strong trash bags. That's all.
These were good bags, however, could have purchased cheaper at Walmart but if you filling a box the price isn't that bad that you should leave out.. They worked well and are strong.  Arrive on time.

We go through a ridiculous amount of kitchen garbage bags and these bags have been great. We have tried other store brands and this is definitely our pick. They fit great in our trash can and can fit a good amount even after its full in the can. Have not had a problem with leaks. It does rip if you shove cardboard or such at times. Would definitely recommend and amazon price is better than B&M prices.
This is a strong bag and it last
These paper towels can handle everything!
Great deal
I think the description was misleading.  You are not getting 32 rolls.
Love these paper towels
Alot for your money!!
I like they hold together well
Good price, strong and doesn’t leave pieces of paper everywhere. Will continue to order.
Better-price-at-Wal-Mart
Great paper towels, great price. Unbeatable.
I used to be a bounty girl, but these are so much better
I like the small size cuts

review_title: I have tried all the brands but Bounty is the best. Amazon Bounty sheet size is perfect
review_body: Always buy ONLY Bounty. I have tried all the brands but Bounty is the best. Amazon Bounty sheet size is perfect. in Costco same Bounty select size the size of each sheet is much bigger, I guess the size is vary by the store.
We like the select a size.
I like the size and quality of the towels.

review_title: Great price for a great towels
review_body: Great towels

review_title: Used generic for years and spent more... we’re a Bounty house now!
review_body: Our house consists of 3 messy girls, 2 cats who hack hairballs frequently and an elderly, diabetic pug. We use paper towels on such a regular basis, it’s not uncommon for us to stockpile them. We switched from using generic paper towels to Bounty recently and I’m so glad we did. We don’t go through nearly as many as we used to which saves us - it’s great! Plus, these hold up great when scrubbing on carpet - super durable. We’re super happy with this purchase and love having them sent right to us!
I think the huge rolls are bigger.
I did not know they would be so huge. They will not fit any of my paper towel holders.. I have no idea how this happened and I'd love to know how to not order these again.. I need the smaller ones.
I knew how much I was getting but seeing it in person is a satisfying feeling. It’ll last you a good while couple months or even longer
Love this item! Will it be available for Subscribe and Save?

I've been using the Longlast filters for about two months now and it went from great to "why did I get this" fairly quickly. I initially bought the filter to hypothetically buy fewer filters in the long run and to filter out lead from my water. The filters initially work like the regular filters, but after about a month, the flow of water went from what was expected to unbelievably slow. I will fill the pitcher up overnight, expecting all the water to flow through by morning, but that doesn't happen. Only about a quarter to half of the water is filtered overnight (7-8 hours). I can't believe how long it takes to filter through about 2-3 cups of water. It's ridiculous! For how much these costs, it's unacceptable how long it takes for water to be filtered if you're using it regularly.

I purchased this on Aug 5th, I don't remember when I popped this in, but over time it slowed down to a crawl, and today, December 5, 2017, it completely choked and stopped.  It did not last 6 months, it barely lasted 3 months. There's no way I got 120 gallons filtered out either, I'm barely home to drink the water. Lets help the 2nd one lasts the advertised 6 months.

I can't comment on how well it filters, but wow is this slow. I need to wait maybe half an hour for a full reservoir to filter through. Definitely won't be buying this again.. Brita reps: You keep responding that this is a problem with "highly aerated water, which most people don’t have in their homes". You should clarify what you mean by this, as from what I can tell it can mean carbonated water or water that's been infused with oxygen. Also, this doesn't seem like as much of a fringe issue as you're implying.

Purchased the Longlast pitcher & additional filters. the First one clogged within a few days and would take 1 hour to fill from the reservoir.  I tried another filter and decided to use a TDS meter to compare readings.  Tap water was at 90ppm, filtered water from Brita LongLast was at 89ppm.  Bottled water from poland sprint read 36ppm.  For what it's worth I've been using Brita for over 10 years and while there was a noticeable difference in the taste of the water from the traditional Brita filters, the LongLast filters seem to be defective & are only pushing out the same quality tap water which we're putting in.

review_title: May as well buy three at once!
review_body: Because in America, we drink our water straight from a $40 filtered pitcher kept in our $2500 stainless fridge!  Seriously... bought these, they're fine, and it's one less thing to worry about on my to-do list.  Until I run out, at which time I'll buy these exact same filters.  Or until I grow tired of my kids not refilling the pitcher and putting it back in the fridge and chuck it and go back to using the sink faucet.  At which time I'll probably have at least two of these left and I'll probably keep them around for years because they're perfectly good, so why throw them away?  But I'd still give them five stars because it's not their fault my kids are lazy.

I bought these to replace the original filter in my Brita that lasted a good three months. Within two weeks the filtration rate fell to where it took over half an hour to filter a single batch. Now it's closer to an hour less than a month out and I was forced to replace the "longlast" filter in a third of the time as the original.. Update: After that first batch, I went ahead and got another pack.  This time, they lasted the full time.  It was likely a bad batch, so I've upped my review to three stars--quality control is obviously an issue.

review_title: I lost my trust in Brita. Please read.
review_body: I was disappointed. The filter started to drip only a few drops at a time after only two days.  I contacted Brita and they said it was air trapped inside the filter and told me of a remedy.  It didn’t work. I believe now that the water that made it through May have seeped around the sides of the filter. This, possibly, drinking unfiltered water.  I feel like I wasted my money.  But worse, my trust in Brita is shaken. Don’t mean to sound dramatic.  But, I trust my daily water to them.

review_title: Great tasting and easy to use
review_body: I have seen many negative reviews on this set of filters and I can assure you they are the real deal and work wonderfully. This is my third time purchasing them and will continue to donao. You simply rinse the filter under cold water for 15 seconds - they do say that the first three pitchers may have the charcoal debris but we just use them to water our plants. The taste is great - we live in South Florida which is known for not so great water.. We even purchased a water kit and the brita filters keep our water ph balanced.. I am not sure what people mean by a poor seal - I have never had this issue but it is plastic on plastic with water - for us it doesnt slide unless we angle it too far upside down.. I will also add this is the water I use to make my son’s baby formula and it has been perfect.

This filter makes my water taste wrose than straight from the faucet plus it takes about 20 minutes to filter water that fills up half the 10 cup pitcher. So for a full 10 cup pitcher i need about 40 minutes. The standard replacement filter are MUCH more quick and don't make my water taste nasty. Very disappointed

This product is a complete waste of money. It will work properly (filtering time) for about the first week or so and then become painfully slow with its filtering time. It now takes over two hours to filter 2 quarts of water. I will never use this product again.

Best deal around, these are full size plates, 10 1/16 and there very sturdy so you only need one. and they had the same plates on sale at walmart, 20 in a pack, they were on sale for $2.50 so you'ed have to spend $30 for 240 plate and these cost me $19.... Very good deal

Boy do these come in handy. They're the best, strong, don't get soggy like the cheaper plates. I wouldn't use any other brand paper plates again.I've used Pasta and with Sauce and they're great. They arrived on day expected and were packaged very well.. Thank you Mary Lou Lion

Price could be a little better, but for the convenience of having it on Subscribe & Save and not having to haul it home from one of the big club warehouse stores, has been worth it for me.. They're thick enough to handle most things, but as with any other paper plate, if it's greasy or liquidy, you need to double up the plate.

I love these plates. They save me from having to do extra dishes, very sturdy, doesn't absorb liquids, no need for two plates per person, and they're such a great deal on Amazon. Costco sells 165 of the same plates for $17.39. I just checked their price yesterday, July 19, 2016.

Who has the time to do dishes everyday? These are great, a large size, holds a decent amount of food, holds up to microwave and liquids well. What more could a person want from their paper plate? I have these on subscribe and save because it's just too easy having these on hand.

THESE PLATES ARE SO STURY AND I DO NOT HESITATE TO SERVE ANYTHING ON THEM, WHEN I'M NOT USING MY CORELLE.  WHEN YOU BUY CHEAPER PLATES, YOU END UP USING MORE THAN ONE AND WITH THESE, YOU CAN REST ASSURED THAT ONE GETS THE JOB DONE.  I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM.

A lot more sturdy than many others. 'Wet' foods will not deform or weaken them. The only bane is hot foods, heat bleeds through the bottom bad and can burn hands underneath. I just double the plates up if serving something really hot to keep hands insulated.

In my house, we use paper plates on a pretty regular bases. We switched from less expensive plates to these ones because we thought we'd only have to use one at a time, reducing waste. That did not happen. We still had to use several to avoid the plates collapsing.

review_title: it worked good for what I wanted it for which was pizza
review_body: These are decent plates.  I would not put a lot of food on it unless you double them but, it worked good for what I wanted it for which was pizza, finger foods, cookies, cakes, chips.

review_title: Medium sized paper plates that are great. No leakage
review_body: Medium sized paper plates that are great. No leakage. The high sides reduces spills. We really like this size for our family. We used to buy the larger size, but we switched to this size because we get more as far as quantity, and it helps us control our portions.
These are very thin and tear easily  not very helpful for cleaning up

review_title: Strongest, long-lasting and durable paper towels on the maeket!
review_body: Strongest paper towels on the market!  They will hold up almost as long as cloth.  Great value! Make superior napkins!
I will always be a viva customer. They are soft and more absorbent.
Love
Awesome! Works great and efficiently!
Odd soft cloth.
good
So soft! My favorite paper towels!
My favorite paper towels! So absorbent and soft. Sometimes I'll use them in place of a tissue.
Arrived as expected.  Love viva!

review_title: Really last 10 years (or more if you follow washing instructions)
review_body: Our first SafeRest was sold to us at the mattress store about 10 years ago.  It worked so well, we got 2 more for the kids mattresses too. Ours protector finally started falling apart so I got a new one here on Amazon.. What I like best about the mattress protector:  it prevents liquid penetration into the mattress (from sick kids vomit, dog barf, cat hairball, night time accidents), is not bulky or take up space under tight fighted sheet, doesn't make me sweaty, and most importantly it does not crinkle or make any noise.  Now I will admit that my last protector probably failed because I have used bleach in my laundry when washing it (about twice a year) and the instructions clearly warn against this.

review_title: WOW. Durable. Keeps mattress brand new.
review_body: Amazing. I bought this months ago & came back to write a review. In the middle of washing my sheets there was an accident with some pink sunny D. I have yet to wash it yet but I cannot believe it did not sleep through to the bed one bit! Not even on the edge. So thankful I bought this now. It’s a one time purchase that will save you a hassle in the long run. Especially when you have a memory foam mattress.

review_title: Had a flood but my mattress stayed dry!
review_body: I recently bought this cover for my bed and two weeks later my hot water heater, which was in the attic above the bed, burst and flooded my house. Hundreds of gallons of water came through my ceiling, including the ceiling fan above the bed, completely saturating my bed. Once I pulled all the soaked bedding off, I carefully removed this mattress cover and my bed was totally dry. I couldn't believe it! For a purchase of under $30, it saved me thousands in not having to purchase a new mattress. I would so highly recommend this cover and will be purchasing more for the other beds in my house. Great product and worth every penny I spent on it!

review_title: This literally saved us a ton of money
review_body: We got a new dog who is on our bed occasionally, so we thought a waterproof mattress protector would be a good investment (just to be safe).. As luck would have it, our dog had projectile diarrhea on our bed not even a week later. Plus a huge puddle of urine, and I think some vomit might have been included as well (it was kind of hard to tell at that point). It took it happening one or two more times before we realized our dog had an odd, mild case of separation anxiety that results in her releasing bodily fluids (and sometimes solids) on our bed. Needless to say, she's not allowed in our bedroom when we're gone anymore.. Back to the mattress protector - it did it's job pretty well. During the first episode there was some slight moisture from the urine that made it's way onto our mattress. It was negligible, but I wouldn't assume this can completely handle everything thrown it's way. Still, it did a pretty fantastic job. It cleans very, very well. It's not noisy or stiff, and I usually forget we have it on our bed. A surprising bonus is that it also helps to keep sheets on the bed if your sheets have a bad habit of coming up at the edges. It's also stretchy and has deep pockets, so it should fit even very thick mattresses.

review_title: Does a good job! Mine lasted 5 years at least...
review_body: This waterproof cover has sort of a terry cloth finish on one side. It is soft, and quiet, just as hoped! No crinkling noises from plastic! It really is waterproof, and It's washable!  I had owned one for about 5 years with no problems until my spouse put it in a clothes dryer on too high of a setting. That sort of melted the plastic side of it, ruining it.. It is waterproof, which sort of annoys my husband who sweats a lot. At least it does protect his mattress from all his sweat!. As long as you don't put it in a hot dryer (low setting works fine) it should last for 5 years without any issues at least!. This cover slips over the top and sides of a mattress, much like a fitted sheet. It comes in the "hard-to-find" twin-XL size, and fit our deep tempur-pedic mattresses just fine.  It is pretty reasonably priced compared to other brands I have seen.  I am going to send one off with my college student to use on their dorm bed. Should work perfectly!

I have 4 of these, 2 twins and 2 queens and they're great.  They have a soft top and it doesn't make noise like some other mattress protectors do.  It also doesn't move around that much, like I've seen other protectors move/slide, so this is super nice because it stays put and I don't have to continuously pull it down or around the edges.  I would highly recommend this mattress protector-it does what it says!

I bought this for my mother-in-law’s home since my young child sleeps over often. No more rubber sheets or hot, loud, and uncomfortable plastic. This mattress cover is so lightweight, so soft, and so liquid-proof she bought another one for her other guest bed! Launders well and it really does work (protects mattress from spills and accidents). Great product. Great quality. Great price. I would definitely buy this product again.

I bought product for an unusual reason. I have a rescue cat that had urinary issues. She would pee in my bed. I did not get the whole queen mattress covered. The mattress I had was very old, so I replaced it and looked for protection for the new one. The protector along with the cat getting adjusted to new home has kept my new mattress in great condition with no "horrible" smells. Even though it looks like she is over peeing in the bed, I keep the protector over the very top blanket. A little insurance policy...

The king size saferest waterproof mattress cover arrived on time and is a good fit for my bed. We have toddler so thought of testing it by pouring water on it. True to its name, it didn't allow water to seep into my bed. We are happy with the quality of the cover and highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for reasonable price and good quality.

Absolutely love it!! It has PLENTY of extra so it stays UNDER the mattress without coming off. It doesn't have that nasty crinkly sound every time you move. And it doesn't feel like we're sleeping on a cover at all!! We haven't had anything to test the waterproof ability (thank goodness) yet, but I feel very confident that it will hold up to its 5 star ratings!! This covers amazing and amazingly priced!!! Don't hesitate you won't be sorry!

review_title: I'm pretty sure I bought a size that was a couple ...

When it arrived it looked more like a rectangle but once removed from the bag and fluffed out it is a perfect square for my pillow case. Shipped quickly and excellent customer service.

Good value and exactly what I needed.  Nice fill.  Only thing I did not like was the covering.  Looks like it could snag via a fingernail when inserting into the pillow covering.  I'll just be careful.
good fit.  Wish they were a little softer but they work for what I needed them to!

It worked perfectly as a stuffer for a souvenir Monet pillow cover I bought in Paris~! The cover measured 13x13 inches, and this insert filled it to perfection. Very happy with it. Great price delivered to my door in short time.

review_body: My daughter bought these for her dorm room and they are so pretty. I like that there are different settings. The strands are a little more spread out than shown in the picture so it really doesn't form a curtain - but still pretty.
Loved these. I bought them to set the stage for my kiddos Christmas photos. They have several different settings and the lights have a warm glow. Very nice!
Excellent product from packaging to looks. Connectivity is simple. Make a beautiful curtain.l ordered one and immediately purchased a second one. Very well made.

Edit: 1 month after purchase, they have just completely stopped working altogether. They were great while they lasted, but there is no good reason they should have stopped working. They stayed in my window the whole time without tampering. That is the reason I adjusted my review and star rating.. These are so great! The wires themselves are quite long, but when folded in half, it creates a much fuller effect. Perfect in my front window for Christmas!

He's sick and I know it would have made him happy to see. Unfortunately, as I was setting it up last night, it didn't work RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX. It was stuffed up into a tiny box, no instructions, and a tiny good-for-nothing diagram that you couldn't read with a magnifying glass. If you're willing to take the chance, go ahead, but I think it would be wise to shop elsewhere.

review_body: This little steamer is powerful! It works great, heats up quickly and it is small so you can tuck it away when you are finished. After reading the reviews I was so excited to try it out. I grabbed one of my husband’s wrinkled shirts from his dry cleaning bag and within 5 minutes the shirt was free of wrinkles. Thanks Isteam for making such a quality product. :)
These ready doake a difference when cleaning. They pick up tons of dust and dirt

So the scale itself is beautiful. I have had it about two weeks. It works. I appreciate that it is so accurate and doesn't round off the the nearest half pound like my other scale. But... the light. It lasted four days, four weigh ins. Then never turned on again. That is the whole reason I purchased this scale because of the light and it just burned out on me. No I would not get this again. I will keep for now because it still works outside of the blue nightlight burning out... but that's what I get for buying a cheap product online

Color me impressed, both by the scale and by the customer service.  The scale is very attractive and remarkably accurate.  It weighs in 10ths of a pound and the sensitivity is such that, if I have a beer or lunch, I can capture the result immediately.  For anyone on a diet, this little jewel is great for providing positive reinforcement, one tenth of a pound at a time.. The scale dose need a solid surface to work well.  I tried initially to use mine on a thin rug, but got conflicting readings.  When I wrote the company asking for advice, they simply sent another scale --- now that's service.

I've had several scales the past few years but they all showed different weights depending on where I stood on it.  I needed a scale that is fairly consistent and simple (I don't need all the bells and whistles of other scales) and this one is perfect!  I like it so much I even purchased another one for a birthday gift for a  friend who was having the same fluctuation issues on her scale.

review_title: Hard to turn on, otherwise good
review_body: I have owned many scales over the years and this scale is, by far, the most difficult to turn on.  Not just a tap, but more pressure is needed to turn this on.  UNLESS you apparently tap it in the most perfect place...still haven't narrowed that spot down yet.  It works well, once it's on.  The turning on process is super annoying though.

I have not owned a scale in 30 years but circumstances required I purchase one. I scouted out different scales and saw this one, decided on it as the price was within my budget. Wow I love this scale!! It is unbelievably LIGHT weight, safe and easy to use. Also the readout is bright and large. It's very sturdy despite its light weight and can handle up to 400 lbs. If you are looking for a reasonably priced easy to use scale that is consistent, this is it.

review_title: Excellent value and ease of use, appears to be accurate
review_body: Was getting some suspicious measurements on my older home scale, suspected possible malfunction.  Bought because the sale was too good to pass up.  Nice looking and simple operation.  Turns out my old scale and this one agree  to within less than 0.3 lbs.  Perhaps both are wrong, but I doubt it.  Slightly smaller than my other scale.  A bit weighty due to the tempered glass top, but not bad; less than it's predecessor.  Very pleased with it.  I weigh people in their homes as part of my work and may consider using it for that, though it may prove not portable enough or as durable as an all plastic one for carting around.  Still, such a great value at $15.99.

review_title: slip out the battery protector and it is good to go
review_body: As advertised.  Take it out of the package, slip out the battery protector and it is good to go.. It is a good-looking device:  thin, durable and very accurate.  If you are near-sighted, you can step on the scale, wait for it to flash your weight, then step off and get a closer look.  The display keeps the results up for a moment or two.. If you are married or living with a foreigner, the lbs/kg button is on the bottom which is not so convenient and takes some fiddling to switch between measures.  I tend to leave it on kg and convert to lbs on my phone if I REALLY want to know....

Losing weight can be difficult when you can't monitor your progress. For most of my life, I have been slightly overweight. Now that I am in college I have the chance to become a healthier and happier me! There were a lot of times I was set on losing weight but ended up quitting because I felt I was making no progress. Now that I have this scale, I can finally track my progress!. This scale came on time and was nicely packaged. I've had this scale for about two weeks now and have already lost 4 pounds with proper diet and exercise. To make sure you get accurate results, you need to place the scale on a hard flat surface (no carpet, it messes up the result) and step on it until the number flashes a few times and stops. If you step off and then on again right away, the results will not be accurate. You have to wait until the number resets.. What I like about this scale is the sleek look and the bright numbers. I use to have a non digital scale that was annoying to use because the numbers were hard to see from a distance. If I crouched down to read them, the number would change. With this digital scale the numbers are very easy to see. And if I wasn't wearing my glasses, I could step off once it weighed me and then look closer at the number (which lingers around for a few seconds).. The only thing that I do not like about this scale is the fact it is made out of glass. I am a very clumsy person and ended up dropping it onto concrete, completely shattering it. This is not the fault of the product, it was mine. If you are clumsy as well, I would advise you to be careful.. Overall, lovely scale! I can't wait to be a healthier me.

We just got the scale, but are impressed with the way it looks and the ease of use.  It is very sleek and "pretty."  I really like the fact that it uses AA batteries instead of one of the disk style batteries.  Also, I REALLY like that you can just step on it and get your weight.  We had one of the scales that you had to tap first and it did not work that well after the first month or two.

"Step and Read" is more like step and I can't read! At 00.0 the LED is nice and bright and easy to see then I step on the scale and the LED dims to an unreadable level. I weigh 190 lbs so I'm not taxing the high end of the specs. I messed with it for a half hour. No improvement so back to Amazon it goes.
good as a bounty in my opinion

review_title: Color my world, or at least my cloths. ALL WHITE (cloths) IS NOT ALRIGHT
review_body: The quality is okay, but it is VERY MISLEADING showing there are a variety of colors. For the 2nd or 3rd time in a row (I didn't know it at first because I shipped these directly to an employee) THE CLOTHS I RECEIVED ARE ALL WHITE.  My employee says she has to wash them twice to get them to look clean.  How about truth in advertising????  Or at least the Amazon photo should represent what you get.  This was my last order of this product until they can guarantee me there are colors other than JUST WHITE.

Great used dry to clean eye glasses  and touch screens. Follow the laundering instructions. We use white vinegar to soften our clothes that stain from drier sheets and now these as well. Our first batch from YEARS ago finally got replaced with this purchase. Last a very long time.
Hemmed on all four edges, nice thickness (for the thin variety of microfiber cloth), good quality for the price and quantity.

review_title: I've been very pleased with these cloths
review_body: I've been very pleased with these cloths. They are true cleaning workhorses that have been useful in reducing the use of paper towels in my home. 24 seemed excessive when I first ordered them but I like being able to use one for a messy job, rinse it, and throw it in the laundry, knowing that I have a bunch more on hand. These cloths are sturdy without being too thick, very absorbent, and lint free. Worth the price.

review_title: Do you clean on the FLY?
review_body: I have 2 sets of these so that I can have a full set in each bathroom and one set in the kitchen.  These are great to just grab and clean.  I don't care for the fact that they need to be washed in gentle and not dried, but we make due.  These are able to truly clean with just water, or even water and vinegar.  If you are a FLYbaby, these are the great alternative, and cheaper, to the purple rags.  The price here is EXCELLENT!  Get them on subscribe and save a couple times to save even more!

review_body: These are a fantastic deal. While not quite as soft as some micro fiber I have purchased before. They are eminently suited for cleaning which is the intended use for which I purchased them. The colors are accurately represented. The size is just right for a dish or dusting towel. The price is almost enough for me to give it five stars, but I felt it only fair people know about that one deficiency (softness).

review_body: I own other micro fiber towels.  I have a sports car that I pamper and im not comfortable using these towels on my car.  They are to thin for my taste.

Yep, these are very thin like others have mentioned but they suit my needs.  I use a spray on polisher and use these to work it in, then use a better microfiber for the final touch.  I've washed them once and they held up ... we'll see after more washings.  For what I need/use them for, they're okay.

We have used these bags in our kitchen trash can for years and we are satisfied. Tried an off brand from and they do not hold up as well as these. The con: While these bags are still generally better than competitor, they seem to tear easier than the older ones.
Fits perfectly, never had a broken bag yet, large count of 90 lasts me for at least 3 months. Will purchase again.

review_title: Did not receive the bags that are pictured/described here.
review_body: I was specifically looking for the bags labeled "Drawstrings stronger with less plastic" that were the number one rated trash bag by Consumer Reports. While the description for these did not have "drawstrings" in the name, they seemed likely to be the bags Consumer Reports was referring to, and show a photo with the label "Stronger with less plastic." The bags that I received do not have that branding indicated on the box or description. They are labeled "Glad's #1 value" and "Guaranteed Strong." Nowhere does it mention on the packaging that these bags use less plastic. In fact, they state that they have "thicker plastic for leak protection." See my photos for more information.
I ordered this using a digital DASH button. Saves time at the grocery store. Garbages are my daughters chore, and now when the bags get low, she can get on my phone and reorder herself.

Good value, they work well.  I have had them rip a few times at the top when we are struggling to get the trash bag out of the can (one of these days I am going to be smart and drill a hole in the trash can so we don't have the vacuum issues).
Pretty strong bags. The black loops on the top make it very easy to pick up and take out. It does not tear because of those black loops.

These are high quality bags that very rarely tear and easily fit in our kitchen garbage and recycling bins (we just use it to empty out the recycling, then that becomes the next week's garbage bag so none get too stinky). These are great trash bags and I highly recommend them.

Great value realy good absorbant paper towels this is a bargan

review_title: Great quality paper towels for all your needs.
review_body: What can I say, I’m cheap overall. I don’t mind paying for quality but I normally just use my paper towels around the house for cleaning the bathroom, quick spills and those dirty little jobs. Most the times I buy the good old cheap generic paper towels since I’m just going to throw them away. Bounty however has changed my outlook on them. I am really impressed with this product. The quality of them are thick and nicely made. They absorb stuff well. I was able to clean my bathroom mirror, bathroom sink and wipe down the toilet all with basically the size of one sheet of my generic paper towels which I would’ve used close to 10 or more to do the same job.  Let’s just say I was impressed on how well they held up. The only disadvantage I saw was using it to clean my mirror first it did tend to leave some streaks that my generic paper towel does not. I’m guessing it’s something that it’s made out of.  The select a size is really nice to pick the right size for the job. I was overly impressed with the durability and usability of this product. This is a big box of paper towels and each roll is like a supersized roll compared to the cheap ones I normally use. Overall I absolutely love this product. I think I will be investing the money in the future to continue to use them.  Overall the cost is about the same as you can use a lot less to achieve the same results.  Well done Bounty!  You have a new customer for life.

review_title: Bounty is Consistently Good, and the "Quick-Size" is Perfect
review_body: Our family has used many different paper towel brands over the years. Although I grew up using Bounty at home, I typically just pick up whatever is on sale at the local supermarket for my own family, often with mixed results. Bounty has been the one paper towel brand we’ve used that is consistently dependable, strong, absorbent, and versatile enough for multiple jobs. So I was more than happy to try out this pack of Bounty Quick-Size Paper Towels.. The pack contained eight 2-roll packages for a total of 16 rolls. I really liked that the sheets were perforated at the smaller “Quick-Size” which I measured at 5¾ inches by just under 11 inches. The smaller sheets are more than enough to handle most jobs around the kitchen and beyond.. I’ve used these sheets for just about every cleaning or drying job around the house. I keep a roll in our car, which has come in handy on more than one occasion already. Beyond the great job that these paper towels do on spills, they are also good for wiping down and drying glass because they don’t leave lots of little fibers like some other paper towel brands. They also do an excellent job absorbing oil and grease. The Bounty paper towels are so strong even when wet that sometimes i'll even use the sheets to soap up my pans to preserve their teflon coating. These Quick-Size sheets have worked very well for all our family’s needs.

review_title: Great Pick-Up In A Convenient Jumbo Size
review_body: Through years of trial and error, our family has concluded Bounty makes the best paper towels.  Now they’ve gone one step further by making bigger sized rolls.  I store extra paper towels down in our basement---anything that saves me from repeatedly going down there is a plus.  Like mega toilet paper, these last about twice as long as regular paper towel rolls, and getting them in bulk eases up shopping time too.. A regular Bounty (Select-A-Size) roll has 84 sheets per roll.  This Quick size has 143 sheets per roll.  I’m not sure they’ll work with some newer style roll holders, but they fit just fine in the old-fashioned holder that hangs under a shelf in our laundry room.  Width wise—a regular roll measures about 5” across; this quick size measures about 6” across.  The trade-off is this jumbo roll is slightly smaller in sheet size than select-a-size (11" x 5.9" versus 11" x 5.7").  You’ll never notice that negligible difference when cleaning up messes—one sheet still gets most household jobs picked up fast and effectively.. The photo shows the difference in width between this quick size (on the left) and a select-a-size roll (on the right).

review_title: Bounty is awesome, and the Quick-Size is just slightly smaller than Select-a-Size
review_body: First - Bounty is an _excellent_ paper towel.  I have purchased them for many years and have always been happy.  They absorb well and hold up great.  They don't tend to shred or fall apart on me...ever.. I switched to their Select-a-Size rolls several years ago, and I think that they're simply half the size of the "regular" sheets.  I like being able to use less paper when I don't need a full sheet.  These Quick-Size sheets are a little bit smaller than the Select-a-Size (just as tall, but not quite as wide).  For most things, these are just fine, and (once again) I like using less paper.  At first, I thought that these would be too small for some things - but they really haven't been.. I applaud the move towards using even less paper, and if you like the Select-a-Size, I say give these a try to see if they'll also work for you.  They aren't that much different, honestly, but they do save a little bit of paper on each towel.. Also, these Family Rolls are about the size of whatever I've been buying for years at Target, so they don't seem too large to me and they fit on my paper towel holder just fine.

These are paper towels. Bounty. Good brand. Anyone over a certain age will remember "Rosie," the upbeat but harrowed waitress played by Nancy Walker, "The Quicker Picker Upper." There's no escaping that iconic commercial when considering this product.. These are good enough. No plastic -- all paper. The price is solid (since that changes, you'll need to sort that out).. I've them to clean up marinara sauce, a coffee spill, and as a napkin. You know, the usual.. I keep a roll in the trunk of my car and in various rooms, so having a lot is helpful. You may need fewer, but if the towels will get the job done.. Anthony Trendl. anthonytrendl.com

Bounty is the ONLY paper towel that works for my family.  We actually live in a zoo, we have 3 dogs and 2 cats.  I am constantly cleaning up messes that they make.. The Bounty Quick Size has lasted longer the other size Bounty that I've bought in the past.  This quantity, 16 family rolls, equals 40 regular rolls.  Our new puppy is having a HARD time with training.  Bounty is great at getting all the "trouble" that he leaves with a very limited amount of paper towels.  I love the select a size, so if it's a small mess, I can use what I need.. Bounty is THE paper towel to buy, I have used only Bounty for years, honestly.

review_title: They are easy to tear from the roll and also they don't ...
review_body: We normally buy our paper towels from Costco because of the thickness and the value and upon using these bounty towels I think we're going to make the true switch. We're a family of 6 and have constant messes to clean up and these bounty paper towels haven't let me down yet. They trap so much liquid that I don't have to use half as much as I normally would to clean up messes. They are easy to tear from the roll and also they don't rip into tiny pieces when you have to really scrub something, these are sturdy towels. Such a great value and will continue to buy. Highly recommend

I have used Bounty on and off over the years, and I have always been a fan of their quality. These paper towels are strong, durable and get the job done. Because of the quality, these well work and are much less wasteful. I find myself reaching for them more than I had full size sheets for smaller spills where a full sheet would have been too much. I even grab them as napkins for messier meals and they are great for that too! They are much thicker and better than a generic store brand, as well as some other name brands. They do not shred on tougher jobs. I highly recommend them.

What a huge rip off! Just received box of 16 rolls of Bounty- quick size. Always buy select a size, but this time ordered quick size by mistake. They try telling you it is more sheets; they don't say that is only because they are smaller. They are also thinner. Today's shipment has 124 feet, while select a size has 142. Big difference! Very unhappy with this change! So much better when select a size available. Next time I need paper towels I will try some other brand. Have been Bounty customer ever since they started which is a long time.

review_title: I've looked online and the best advice was to shake it or tap it upside ...
review_body: This filter is painfully slow to filter water. It was slow when I first popped it in, after rinsing it out with 3 pitchers full of water as per the instructions.  It's been a couple weeks now and I'm ready to toss it. I've looked online and the best advice was to shake it or tap it upside down a few times then put it back in the pitcher but it hasn't helped.

review_title: Better than no filter at all, I guess.
review_body: I really wish the Brita filter system was designed better. Seriously. They don't even fit in the pitcher properly; they occasionally fall out if you pour the water at too steep an angle. These filters aren't even consistent in quality. I'm having to return the most recent one I bought (here on Amazon) because the water pours right through it way faster than normal, and then still tastes like chlorine. Oh, Brita. I think I'm going to have to invest in a better water filtration system.. These don't even filter fluoride!

review_title: The normal filter that came with the pitcher did better than this
review_body: It's only been about a month and this filter is already slowed to the point of only letting water through one drop at a time--or not at all. I've tried soaking. The normal filter that came with the pitcher did better than this, and I bought these items together back in December for a Christmas gift so I'm now past the return window for the longlast filters even though I'm less than a full month into using the first of two that came in the box. Not happy with these!

review_title: water flows nice, and I didn't end up with stuff in ...
review_body: Followed the instructions to a T and didn't have any issues.  They seat properly, water flows nice, and I didn't end up with stuff in my water.

review_title: Do not buy Brita Longlast Filter. They're more like "Brita Neverfilter"
review_body: These Brita Longlast filters are really, really terrible. On our second day, it took over 1 hour to filter through the first fill of the reservoir. I called up Brita customer service and they acknowledged that there is a design problem that their engineers are now trying to fix but they don't yet have a solution. The problem is air bubbles are building up pressure within the filter slowing down the filtering and sometimes preventing it from filtering. I'm returning these for a full refund and will not purchase these until a solution has been implemented.. Buyer beware: DO NOT BUY THESE!

review_title: Not Long Lasting - Standard last longer
review_body: Lasted a fraction of the time standard Brita filters have lasted.  Not LONG lasting in the least.  Burned through 2 in 2 months.  Normally 1 standard one would last me 4-5 months with typical use.

review_title: ... regular Brita filters for years and I have been happy with them
review_body: I have used regular Brita filters for years and I have been  happy with them. I use the filtered water only for making tea and coffee.  I bought a box containing two of these new filters from  Amazon.  They are are junk. Don't wast your money. First of all it is slow, really slow. It takes a long time to filter the water.  But that's not all. I use an OXO electric water boiler. it is made of glass and you can see the bottom of it. With regular Brita , I see scaling at the bottom of the water boiler every month and a half. Sometimes two, depending on my usage. With these filters I began seeing them only after three days. So far I have used descaling liquid 3 times in about two weeks. Here is an important question: Are these filters filtering anything?

These are thick, well-made quality towels. I have several that I ordered a few months ago. Other than shrinking slightly the towels still look great and have held up well with laundering. Ordered more recently. I looked for a long time to find these. I would highly recommend them.

review_title: Not sure if it's a new design, but these ...
review_body: Not sure if it's a new design, but these are different from the filters I purchased from Costco. The water flows very fast through these filters, while my previous ones "dripped" at a slower rate. Not sure if that makes a difference in the way it filters the water, but it just seems weird to me. I will stick with Costco next time

review_title: WATER RUNS OUT THE SIDE . NOT THE BOTTOM. DONT WORK ON ALL BRITA PITCHERS OR CONTERTOPS DISPENERS...
review_body: don't fit pitchers. if you look at your filter holder in your pitcher , the water needs to flo out the bottom , the long last filters the water flos out the sides , so it don't work , I wasted 20 bucks buying these when they say they fit ALL BRITA PITCHES AND  CONTOER TOP DISENERS ,BULLS^@T...as you look at the filter here the water runs out the sids  of these filters , so if you have 1 of these water picthers . dont buy these filters . they DONT WORK..

The only plates I buy. The only plates I use. They are sturdy enough to hold a regular sized meal and add a cute decorative touch. Worth the money and great for summer bbqs or small gatherings when you don't want to spend a lot of time on clean up.

larger size and very sturdy - does not give way when carrying it loaded with goodies.  if used for greasy foods, the grease stays on top - does not penetrate through the coating.  great for the  microwave and superior to plastic or styrofoam.
I have been using this for years. My family runs thru them. They hold up weight wise, even when food is microwaved. Does not fold from being heated. Also a good bargain bundle.

I love these plates.. My family is pressed for time a lot and we use them all the time.. I'm just a little disappointed in Dixie's quality control.  The top pack of plates had the first seven all messed up and the wrapping opened. I've attached a picture.. I'm not going to give it fewer stars as this is the first time this has happened and I've been buying these for years. I just found it very off par.. These plates hold up to anything but soup! Truly the best paper plate out there.

review_title: I CAN EASILY FEED SOMEONE IN A DIFFERENT SPOT
review_body: DON'Y LAUGH, BUT I FEED MY 3 CATS FROM THESE.  IT CUTS DOWN ON SPATS & SOMEONE HELPING THEMSELVES TO THE OTHERS' FOOD.  AT LEAST THEY WAIT UNTIL THEY'VE LEFT.  I CAN EASILY FEED SOMEONE IN A DIFFERENT SPOT.  NICE BIG STACK OF PLATES.

What a great deal for paper plates in bulk!. My boyfriend and I choose to buy paper plates occasionally because if we're microwaving a small snack, our heavy duty real plates have had trouble with cracking, so we use paper plates. We also use paper plates if we've run out of dishes and haven't run the dishwasher yet. We try to avoid it whenever we can, but we have these at home to use as a backup.. This brand in particular has been our go-to lately. The plates are pretty thick, so even when you microwave something slightly liquidy, the goo won't seep through the plate and onto your table. An old brand we used had to be doubled up with two plates in cases like these, so I'm glad we no longer have to do that.. Similarly, the thickness helps when using a knife on this plate. Unlike with other paper plates, these plates don't tear easily when you cut on them.. Overall these are very useful paper plates. This was a great quantity to just store in a cabinet somewhere for a pretty great price.

Thick, no leaks, large plates, and works perfectly well for home use. They're almost too large. I'm used to a 9" plate, so these seem too big, but that's nothing to knock off a star for! Good plates. I'm subscribed to them.

review_title: Too thin - Only good for very light foods
review_body: These plates are too thin. You need to use 2 for many meals so they don't collapse or bend. Also, they jammed them into the box so that about 20 of them got mangled and had to be thrown away. I like Dixie generally, but not this particular plate. I will buy the thicker plates they sell instead.

review_title: Almost better than expected.  Don't ever use just one single paper plate, regardless of the brand.
review_body: You can reuse the support plate that you have under your food plate, and not worry about whether your lasagna. is going to end up on the white carpet like in the commercials.. I'll buy them again in a heartbeat.

Do you hate doing dishes? Are you in college? Do you not understand how that stupid dishwasher works? Are you a man?. These plates are exactly what you're looking for.. These plates are 10-1/16" of pure food holding perfection. These plates have a fancy design on them so breaking them out for a party is like wearing a tuxedo t-shirt to an interview, it shows you are fancy, but you still know how to party. These plates are nice and thick so you can load them with way more calories than you should be eating: perfect for those lonely nights while you sit around wishing you had more friends. The 240 pack is actually 10 packs of 24 plates. This is fantastic because every time you start to run out of plates you suddenly realize that you have more plates, and your mood is suddenly heightened and you're ready to eat even more food!. If you are a lazy man with a significant other in your life like me, then your significant other will love the fact that they have less dishes to do now, and might even cook more! This can benefit your life in ways you can't even imagine.. When you buy these plates, you're not just buying round paper food holders, you're buying a better future and happiness. Go ahead. Add it to your cart. You will not regret this decision.
Perfect, just like cloth
Great deal on these paper towels. Much cheaper than the store.
Perfect
The absorbency of the paper towel is okay.  The select-a-size is good.  But, what I don't like is that you need to use two hands to get the towels off the roll.

review_title: Viva is the best most long lasting paper towel. They last longer.
review_body: Love Viva.
These are the only paper towels we use and I really appreciate having them as a S&S product.

review_title: Small rolls... not really what i was ...
review_body: Small rolls... not really what i was expecting..... also amazon is ridiculous shipping this giant box, in another box.... wouldn’t reorder.
Great price and works great for us at work....we use them to smooth out cakes
These are thick paper towels, and they work well and last a long time.
good deal

This is a super thin matress protector that I bought for my two year old who was moving from a toddler bed to a full size. She sometimes leaks through her diaper and I needed something to completely protect the mattress (and it's warrenty). On the third day, it happened. I felt the top of the protector and it was wet. I felt underneath and it was cold - but not wet. I felt the mattress and it was also cold, but bone dry! It was a decent leak, so it's doing its job!. As far as smell, I did not notice anything too unusual once I put it on the bed - and I'm pregnant right now, so my nose picks up everything. There's also no sound when my daughter rolls around on it. AND she's a jumper, and it hasn't moved out of place on the mattress. It's designed for deep mattresses, so her 8 inch mattress has a lot of extra underneath, but it does not bunch up on the sides, it fits great all underneath the bed. I washed it in cold water and dried it on low heat and it came out looking the same as new. I will buy this brand again for kid #2.. Please note that this is a very thin protector and will not add much, if any softness to the bed. That's not what it's for and not why I bought it.

We needed a mattress protector for our new custom-made camper bed. We bought a king-sized protector from one of the big chain bed stores a couple of years ago for $135.. I was skeptical when I ordered this item but the price seemed worth the risk. WOW! It's almost exactly like the expensive cover on our king bed, at a fraction of the cost. Hopefully we'll never know if it works or not but, with a small dog joining us on camping trips, we will probably find out sooner rather than later.

My daughter has been using the mattress protector for a few weeks now and she had an accident the other night (wet the bed a lot!) I did what probably most parents do in the middle of the night and threw a thick blanket over the wet spot and put her back in bed. The next morning I stripped the bed and was sooo pleased that not a bit of wetness was on the mattress! There was no smell of urine either. The mattress protector did its job wonderfully. I washed it on normal setting then hung it to dry. I don't know if that's what the instructions said to do but I have ruined mattress protectors before by drying them in the dryer so I played it safe. It's not the softest mattress cover I've felt but it goes under a sheet so that doesn't matter to me. It fits her 6" mattress with tons of room to spare so it would fit a much thicker mattress. It does not come loose or off the corners at all. I would definitely recommend this product.

I did  not rate specific features b/c only put it on bed yesterday and have not had to test the durability or ease of cleaning.  It looks good, made well and fit the bed perfectly.  I was glad of washing instructions as I would not have thought of protecting the waterproof feature.  I was surprised the pad was not quilted - again impossible w/waterproof backing.

I love this mattress protector.  I was a little hesitant when I read that it had a terrycloth surface, but decided to give it a try anyway.  It is very comfortable.  The sheets don't move around underneath us as non-slip surface of the protector seems to hold them in place very well.  This is very important to me as I do not have a deep pocket mattress and find that the sheet and mattress pad would bunch up after just one night.  I have washed and dried it by machine a couple of times now (though the directions state to hang dry) and it still looks and feels like new.  I also like that it is thinner than a quilted mattress pad and takes up much less room when folded.  It seems to be truly waterproof, yet doesn't feel or sound like a plastic lined cover would.  I will be ordering another one of these.

I'm so glad others are so detailed in testing the product and updating after washing.  I did buy this item based on the reviews here, and the price was right.  I wanted something to protect our brand new almost-$2,000 king mattress set from stains because their warranty almost sets up their customers for failure because they void their warranty if there are stains on it.  However, because it's new with all this great techno stuff, I also wanted to make sure that we can feel the actual mattress we paid for, and for us it's true that it doesn't interfere with us feeling our actual mattress.. It doesn't have a scent.  It is made of a very thin terry cloth on one side (touching the sheets) and a plastic cover underneath (touching the mattress).  It fits like a fitted sheet, so it is not zippered and therefore technically wouldn't keep mites out.  Once you put the sheet on top of it, you can't hear the plastic when you move around.  Our mattress is 14" and includes a pillow top, and it fits well.  So that we can always have a clean one around, we're buying a second one!

review_title: Well-fitting mattress cover - a really good choice!
review_body: So far, excellent. I washed/dried the mattress cover before putting it on the bed. Perfect fit. I selected this particular vinyl-free cover hoping it would be quiet. My previous cover was "noisy" kind of "crinkly" and because it was just a top of the mattress cover it shifted all the time. This fitted cover looks like it fits the bill. My expectation is it will be infrequently laundered and, therefore, perfect over time.

This is the third one of these we've bought: two full size and one twin XL. They do a great job of protecting the mattress, they don't bunch up, they fit our deep mattresses, and they've held up well with frequent washing. They're great. My only complaint is that my four year old opened the box, saw the picture of the family smiling in bed on the front of the package, and now he thinks that is a product that allows us to all sleep together in one bed. Yay, no sleep for me tonight. :-)

We bought a new bed, and I immediately ordered this cover. It shipped quickly and arrived in time to wash it before the new mattress was delivered. Despite being King sized, it easily fit in my small washing machine with the king sized sheets. It did take a little bit longer to dry, though, but the very plush terry fabric came out nice and soft and didn't feel crunchy, so I didn't mind. It fit the extra deep mattress very well and I was thankful to not have to work very hard at stretching it over the mattress.  My husband, baby and I climbed into our new bed and settled in to sleep. Around 2 am, we woke to the unmistakable sound of baby gagging and before we could react, our new bed and linens were filled with vomit. After cleaning her and ourselves up, and making up the guest bed, I removed the linens and was pleased to see that this cover did exactly as it promised: our new mattress was completely untouched by baby puke. I only wished I'd purchased a second one!

review_title: rigorously tested and mine works great
review_body: I bought this product because I wanted a waterproof mattress protector that was still breathable (i.e., not just a plastic bag on the mattress), and I’ve been impressed by it. Other reviewers have reported some amount of crinkling noise, but I haven’t noticed any.. Even though other reviewers had mixed experiences with its water resistance, I decided to buy this mattress protector anyways because the customer support responses seemed accommodating. After it arrived, I did a quick test of its waterproof qualities by stretching a portion over a bucket, terrycloth side up, and pouring a small amount of water onto it. The water didn’t soak through, which is great!. I’ve repeated this test after each time that I’ve washed it to the same results, but I’d still recommend testing it before putting it onto a bed to avoid potentially damaging a mattress if some problem has occurred with it!
Don't use anything but Bounty select.
