review_title: This is my second purchase and I loved the first set
review_body: Have not used them.  I will do so at CHRISTmas time.  This is my second purchase and I loved the first set.
Comfortable, light, love it, I sleep with my head on it. Don't know what else to write about it, it's a pillow!
Good-quality pillow. Fit perfectly in the case I bought separately. I sit on this thing 40+ hours/week and it stays plump!

review_title: The sad thing is when they put the fillers together
review_body: The sad thing is when they put the fillers together,they didn't fill the corners,so the cushions are all floppy eared.not to happy about that.

review_title: Great pillow! Contrary to reviews and suggestions
review_body: Great pillow! Contrary to reviews and suggestions, used for an 18x18 pillow cover. It looked great! I’m afraid if I went up a size in the pillow it would have been too puffy. With that being said, this is solely decorative for me
This pillow insert is super fluffy and was perfect for my throw pillow!
GREAT PRICE, WORKS GREAT, COMFORTABLE. FIT INTO THE PILLOWS AS MEASURED.

review_title: They work great for that purpose
review_body: These pillows are being used to protect stage lighting in a case.  They work great for that purpose.

review_title: There were no corners just a round ball of stuffing ...
review_body: There were no corners just a round ball of stuffing.  I even tried pulling stuffing to the corners and didn't really work. Hope it evens out with use.

review_title: Love ANY hypoallergenic. Needs more stuffing for comfort though.
review_body: Love hypoallergenic but not the most comfy. Good stuffer for your duvets. If you want more cusion I guess price goes up. Welcome to corporate U.S.A.

Very long! Floor to ceiling, great quality. Doesn’t get hot. I was able to hold it up in my dorm with 7 tiny command hooks. Only wish is for a remote or button to turn off without having to unplug! 10 very cool strands :)
I will be returning this item. The lights were not a warm white, as advertised. They are a cool white, as in a blue-ish tint instead of a yellowish tint to the light.
Perfect for my small apartment! These lights added such a cozy touch to my dining room! Let's just hope my cats don't try to play with them.

I didn't really read up on this product before buying, but let me just say that I was delightfully surprised! The lights came fast, and are beautiful! I didn't even know that they had multiple 'light settings' until I recieved them. All of the settings are super cool. Definitely an awesome buy.

In love with these lights! Easy to hang an easy to work daily. I have them hanging above my bed and they are gorgeous. Multiple settings such as fade, blink, strobe, etc. but I mainly just keep mine on with no blinking or flashing. It is easy to control the setting with a simple hit of a button and the controller is at a perfect length (not near the top where it is unreachable if hung up).. I get compliments on them from guests all the time and I’ll be ordering more now to use in my wedding. Added the perfect touch to my bedroom, would definitely recommend.

review_title: These are so fun! Easy to hang - I used command hooks ...
review_body: These are so fun!  Easy to hang - I used command hooks in the small size.  A little tricky to unravel but they are tied up in bunches.  Once I figured that out, easy.  The price you cannot beat.  I only needed one set per window, and you get 2 sets per box.

I bought these for a play and they looked great on stage! We needed pulsing stars and the setting for that was perfect. However, I'm trying to use them in our spring play and one set I bought just isn't working at all. They're not very durable if you plan on taking them down and moving them often.

review_title: very pretty lights plug is at the top and vendor should ...
review_body: very pretty lights  plug is at the top and vendor should have made cord long enough to plug in since most plugs are not near the ceiling.  (venue I held sweet sixteen party at did have plugs near ceiling was able to place three panels over one strand so one strand covers a lot

I love these lights so much! I originally bought it for my living room balcony but decided to use them for my bedroom and I loved them so much I bought another set for the living room but this time in cool white. For those saying the untangling process is bad, it really isn't. All you have to do before you unwrap the wires is hang it across wherever you are gonna place it and then unwrap the dangling wires. It's that simple.
Exactly what I expected, so happy I get them. I placed them all around the Christmas tree. these are beautiful and work great.  would order more!

review_title: I wasn’t expecting much but I love this thing
review_body: I wasn’t expecting much but I love this thing. I may never iron again. Quick and efficient, read the instructions and follow them.
It is just the right size, heats up quickly and works well

review_title: I purchased this because they employ disabled people and I ...
review_body: I purchased this because they employ disabled people and I want to help.It was a gift to my daughter and she loves it.

review_title: This is a fantastic steamer! I love it so much I ordered ...
review_body: This is a fantastic steamer! I love it so much I ordered another one for my daughter! Great device fir a great price!

review_title: Very easy to hold and work
review_body: I had tried the steamer over the weekend. We were out of down for a wedding and my daughter in law has one. I borrowed for our clothes we packed. I loved it! It is easy to use and it works!! As soon as I got home, I ordered one for myself!! Great product

review_title: My second one for a gift!!
review_body: So easy to use. I love my steamer! I order another one for my father n law for his birthday. Works perfect!!! I love how you can pack it up and take anywhere. It’s a must get.
I loved the idea of steaming my clothes instead of dragging out the ironing board and iron . This steamer is fast , effective and a little water goes a long way ! This steamer is a quality product !
I’ve used this a total of 4 times and it’s alreadt broken.

review_title: ... this steamer only once so far but I was happy with the results
review_body: I have used this steamer only once so far but I was happy with the results.  I tried this on a knit/sweater which I didn't want to iron after washing it.  Very fast and easy to use.  I think it'll be great for trips and for quick touch-ups without having to bring the iron out.

Great steamer, heated up quickly. I was able to steam a blouse and pants that were each quite wrinkled in less than 2 minutes. Small and easy to use. Would definitely purchase again. I’m glad to have been able to buy a product from a small business that supports people with disabilities

I have waited 6 months to write this review and my original liner looks as good as the day I hung it. No mildew or rust. The magnets have weight and stick well to the bath. So I replaced the liner in my other bathroom with another one of these. Excellent value and quality.

I have been buying those mildew free shower curtains from [...] and had to replace them constantly. I'm excited to have this curtain liner... it is a whole lot sturdier and well I haven't had it that long but I'm sure it's going to last way longer then those cheaper ones.. I love that it is thick and does not billow. I previously had thinner ones and when my elbow would hit them while washing my hair, it would billow inward and then cling to my arm and body. Since I have long hair and it takes a while to lather, condition, and rinse, the billowing and clinging was very annoying. This one stays where it is supposed to!.  I just throw it into the washer with a couple of towels. Then I throw them all in the dryer for just about 5 minutes (just till the vinyl is warm) and then hang the liner back on the rod to dry. One edge of the hem seemed to collect a tiny bit of water and mildewed. I put a drop of chlorine bleach down the hem and it vanished. I love the clear curtain because it lets in light and I don't have a light above the tub. I hang a decorative shower curtain outside of this liner!!

review_title: This is a great heavy duty shower liner
review_body: This is a great heavy duty shower liner. For the price, you get great quality, I only need to replace this about once a year and they stay in awesome shape. Would recommend.

review_title: You Shouldn't Be Disgusted When You Take A Shower
review_body: My previous shower curtain was disgusting.  Purchased from the infamous "W" store (whose door I never darken again), I allowed it to accumulate mildew and soap film until it was physically revolting to take a shower.  I loved the many positive reviews for the LIBA SHOWER CURTAIN, so a few weeks back I purchased this item, and enthusiastically hung it in my tub.  I shower daily (sometimes more than once), and after several weeks the LIBA is just as clear, clean, and fresh as the day it was hung.  Plus I love that it's totally clear and lets the bathroom light in.  Talk about illuminating!. Time will tell if this curtain will continue to repel bacteria and be mildew resistant.  But so far so good!  I really lather up when I shower, so plenty of soap goes on this liner; thus far it looks as clear as the day it was delivered.  Clean and clear:  That's what a shower curtain should be.  Looks like the LIBA SHOWER CURTAIN is right on the money.. ~D. Mikels, Esq.

My experiences hanging shower liners has not been exactly pleasant over the years. They are often pungent, unwieldy and poorly crafted. Installing this shower curtain, I'm pleased to say, was nothing like past experiences. This item is very well made, making it an excellent value when you consider price, and had the exact number of grommets as the curtain it was protecting. This could be mere coincidence, or there was some sort of consensus or standard set in the shower curtain/liner industry, but it made me a very happy customer. I often hung these things only to realize I ran out of rings halfway through installing the liner, leaving the rest to hang into the tub like a depressed relative of Gumby. To top this off there are no harsh vapors when you open the bag and the magnets to an admirable job keeping the shower liner moored to the tub wall instead of allowing it to do that creepy, floating ghost curtain thing...you know...where it tries to stick to you? Anyway, even if you're unfamiliar...rest assured it doesn't do that. Great product.

THIS IS THE BEST SHOWER CURTAIN EVER.. Not only is this shower curtain CHEAP, it has been amazing and really staying mold and mildew free. I am so sick and tired of buying every single "mildew resistant" shower curtain I can find. It is so annoying to have one for a month or so, only to see it get wrecked and dirty and impossible to clean. So far, I have had the same one up inside of my shower for 6 months, only needing minor cleaning on a bi-weekly basis. I find using a magic eraser really helps too. The metal rings at the top have come off, but mainly that is my fault because I pulled down on them and broke it.

review_title: Strong plastic; no toxic fumes; not enough magnets
review_body: This is a fairly heavy plastic vinyl, with none of the toxic scent of most vinyl shower curtains.  No scent out of the package and none while showering.  I would give it 5 stars except that it only comes with 3 magnets and they are not strong enough to prevent billowing of the curtain while you are showering.  I sort of "paste" it to the tub by running the shower head the length of the bottom of it and this does a fairly good job of keeping it from coming lose and sticking to you (yuck!!!).  It was a good price, but definitely needs more magnets.  I asked the company if they made the same curtain with more magnets, or ANY curtain with more magnets, and, alas, no.

This product does what it says. I've had another brand of a mildew resistant shower curtain before this one. I kept throwing the old one in the washing machine to find that I've had to wash the curtain every two months due to mildew buildup that caused the area by my shower to smell awful. I finally had enough and looked for mildew resistant curtains on Amazon to find this one. I have had this curtain in my shower for over six months now, and I haven't run into any issues with mildew or mold. The curtain stays clear, due in part to rinsing it after every shower. Overall, I am very satisfied with this product.

Have had this up for about a month, as I wanted to test it before reviewing.  NO MOLD!!!  The liner I previously owned has to be washed and bleached often to keep mold from growing (which, in turn, made it rip and had to buy new ones often).  Will be using this one for as long as possible, but will continue to purchase this.  Also, no "chemical" smell and is made from PEVA - very important to me because I have a toddler and baby who also use this shower/bath combo.  The clear is definitely "clear".  And the price is great.  Highly recommended :). The only "complaint" is the bottom does gather up if you aren't careful to pull it all the way from the middle to the edges.  But I haven't found one that works perfectly yet.

review_title: Took a full year to get moldy! Impressive
review_body: Writing a review today because it was time to replace the shower curtain finally. Looked up my order history to find the same one, and saw I bought it in August 2015. It started finally getting moldy last month, I've just been lazy. It lasted a year in a bathroom that has fairly bad mold issues, plus that's way longer than I've ever had a shower curtain last ANYWHERE, so I'm pretty pleased with it and happy to buy another.. I wish the little metal eyelets didn't rust -- I don't know WHAT they're talking about claiming it's rust-free, because uhhh, NO -- but it's not a big enough deal for me to dock a star or anything. Never had any rust get on the cloth curtain I keep over it, it just stains the plastic hooks it hangs from.
it works great, except on a COLD day. let it warm up to room temperature

This scale is very nice looking, however after few months of usage this scale started giving wrong readings within at the same time. To get correct reading you will need to get on and off like 4-5 times and whenever it shows same reading, then it's correct one (but not at the first try, and not even second). It's kind of annoying and I probably will look for replacement.

I’ve had this a few months and already it’s difficult to “wake the scale up”.  As in, you have to press it hard in one specific corner to turn it on.  When I first got it, a gentle foot tap anywhere on the surface would do the trick. It measures accurately (I assume, no crazy numbers have popped up) and is small/light/sleek so not too bad for the price.

review_title: I was looking for a good digital bathroom scale for a decent price
review_body: I was looking for a good digital bathroom scale for a decent price, and I'm glad I found this one. It's super sleek, so it matches my modern bathroom. It's accurate when I compare its results to my weight on the beam scale at the doctor's office or gym. There are a ton of reminders on the item page and in the box to put the scale on a flat surface- this is true for any scale. Also, I saw questions about if the glass is sturdy. My whole family has used it, and some of them are 300+ and it hasn't had any issues.. If anything happened to this scale, I would purchase the same one again.

review_title: Responsive and easy to use; lacks expected accuracy.
review_body: This scale is sleek, very responsive, and easy to use. It's also way more accurate than my previous one which had about a 5 pound margin of error.. However, I've noticed that it's not exactly as "high accuracy" as advertised. I weighed myself before peeing to test it, then proceeded to pee out about a cup, which should weigh about half a pound. It didn't pick it up at all. It read the exact same weight after I lost the half pound.. It is usually accurate enough to notice when I unload my pockets though, so I would say the margin of error is probably within a pound. Not bad, but what's the point of having .1 pound differentiation in the readings when it's not even accurate to within .5 pounds?.

Great scales! Easy to read numbers, for us older folks with eyes not as good as they used to be. In fact, maybe I see the numbers TOO clear :( Kidding aside, it's lightweight, easy to store when not in use, just perfect for the money.

review_title: This scale will shatter if you aren’t careful. Not safe with kids around.
review_body: This scale worked just fine for us. Sometimes it would give a much lower reading and we’d just try again and then it’d give what I assume is a more accurate reading. But just know that this scale can shatter much easier than you think. I lifted it about one foot off the ground to get something out from under it. My 11 month old slapped it and it crashed to the ground and shattered to pieces! I grabbed my baby up and he was fine. We won’t be buying another glass scale while we have young children. 😊

review_title: There is something off about this scale.
review_body: There is something off about this scale.. I like the design, like the display, and have no reason to think the pounds are inaccurate. But the ounces/number after the decimal is weird. First off, when first stepping on the scale to calibrate, it always says 3.4lbs, no matter what I put on it. So I think this first number is just a display (not real). Next, I've been weighing myself everyday for 3 months straight, and this is what I've found: the scale only ever displays: 147.6, 148.2, 149.0, 150.2, 151.0, (etc). NEVER 147.8, 149.6, etc. I actually wrote these numbers down and am referencing my list. So I think the scale is not actually precise down to fractions of pounds, and it just displays a pre-determined number after the decimal to make it look fancier. But again, the pounds themselves seem accurate so I don't have a problem with the scale overall.

review_title: Great price, good accuracy, but feels a little bit flimsy.
review_body: I recently purchased this scale for my bathroom - and overall it was an amazing purchase. I bought it expected something mediocre (after all, it was less than $20!) but when it arrived I was extremely pleasantly surprised.. The good:. The price: For under $20, I couldn't be happier. I wanted a basic, bare-bones device that would tell me my weight, and I got it - except with a slick finish and an aesthetically pleasing design.. The design: This scale looks absolutely gorgeous - it has a very nice gloss finish, but doesn't smudge too badly. Overall I'm very happy.. The experience: Putting in the batteries (which were included, by the way!) was very easy - no screwdriver needed. There was a pushbutton on the back that could be used to change it from lbs to kg, and it was very easy to use. The actual operation of the scale is very nice too: you just stand on it and it turns on automatically, and displays your weight.. The bad:. The surface: The surface is very slick and smooth, as I mentioned previously. It looks fantastic, but I can imagine it would be very slippery if your feet were wet (as if you'd just come out of the shower). A minor issue, but something to consider.. The flimsiness: My one major complaint with this scale would be the flimsiness. My roommate described it as "standing on an iPad". When you step on it, the body flexes and shifts - which is a little bit unnerving. The scale is rated to 400lbs, and I have no doubt it will easily withstand that, but it does make me a little nervous every time I step on. Again - a minor complaint for an overall amazing product.

Inaccurate. I weigh myself and know the number is wrong because it's approximately 10lbs less than the gym. Then I re-weigh myself 2 minutes later and I get a different weight. I can hop on again 2 minutes later and it's yet another weight. The scale is on a flat surface, so that is not the issue. Getting ready to return this now. It's useless.
Never run out
use this to clean !

they are wonderful I love these they are perfect for any job

Recently found out how great these are to clean with!  No lint!

Great for almost anything. Soft, absorbent, and great for dusting. I get these on Subscribe and Save and they are inexpensive enough to discard when used for especially dirty job. Otherwise. They wash beautifully for re-use.

I used these to clean my vinyl LP records.  These are much larger than I thought which ended up being perfect for cleaning records.  Make sure you tear off each of the tags (which came off easily with a quick pull).

What a deal! These absorb water really well, and can be wrung out to the point of having very little in them. Then they make great dust cloths, as the small amount of water that remains evaporates from surfaces very quickly. I really like these!!

Great price for the microfiber cleaning cloths.  I use these for cleaning my records.  They work great and will last me quite a while.  Just make sure you wash them when you receive them and don't use fabric softener or dryer sheets to dry.  I also keep one in my car to wipe down the windows and clean the vapor residue from them.  Seems to work really well.  Overall, a fantastic purchase as these are usually much more expensive.

These microfiber cloths are the same size and quality as others you'd order from Staples or Costco for more money.  Amazon Basics does a good job offering them for less then their competitors.  I've used them to clean my electronics and to wipe off fingerprints off my cars and am happy that i bought them.  The price and the quality and the quantity cant be beat. If you found my review helpful to you please click the yes button below. Thank you.
These are good microfiber towels.  I took 1 star off because they drop little balls of fabric on you and whatever your wiping off.

Purchased these multiple times over the years. I use them for detailing the interior of vehicles, works great. They are thin and you should expect these to be the type of towels you use a few times then toss, but they are soft and very affordable. Definitely would recommend these!

Sheds like crazy. I used it in clear glass at first and it got lint everywhere which was VERY noticeable! Not doing that again! I ended up using it only for my stainless steel kitchen appliances and brushed nickel hardware.

Worst microfiber cloth I have ever used. It is very coarse - if you swipe it over wood surfaces, it actually latches onto tiny splinters (not visible with naked eyes) on the wood. That is ridiculous.. This kind of quality actually makes me doubt the line of AmazonBasics products in general.

I've used these garbage bags for years in the kitchen and wouldn't switch unless I had to. They are super strong and hold up to a whole bag full of glass bottles without ripping. I have confidence I won't end up spilling everything all over.
These Trash Bags are terrible I would not recommend to anybody. The picture shows that the bags have red drawstrings but what I got has black drawstrings not the quality I normally buy.

When you find yourself in a rushed cleanup situation where even a little leak could lead forensics right back to you and put you away for life, accept no substitutes.  Costs a little bit more than the generic brands but worth every penny.
It is a pretty standard white plastic trash bag.  I've been buying these for years.  The hold trash.  The price is right.
I think i might got a defect box. The black strings are not at the right place. I can not pull the bag to close
Quality is not there. We've purchased these bags in the past and they were great. New ones are so thin and rip easily, also leak.
This box of bags is not as strong as another glad bag I buy. It’s the one that ties at the top with no string.
Strong and easy to use. Awful, awful smell.
Strong and hold up under heavy loads.
Really strong. Recommend it.

Love these towels.  They're incredibly absorbent, you can wring out the water from a spill and reuse them again, and they're perforated at the smaller sizes, so you can tear them according to the size of the mess you're cleaning.  Bonus for parents:  if you've got little kids tearing the sheets, the smaller "quick size" helps make sure they don't waste paper by tearing excessively large sheets for small spills or cleanup.

review_title: These are great paper towels if you like the different sheet sizes I prefer full sheets
review_body: My family uses these all the time. We have kids and you know what that means"" That's right, lots of messes to use these great paper towels. Bounty has been the number one choice when it comes to paper towels. These have cuts on them so you can get a small piece of towel if you don't need a full sheet. Im not a fan of these type but they are good towels and you cant go wrong buying Bounty"

Slightly smaller sheets than our usual pick-a-size paper towels (Kirkland). They absorb well and I find that I use fewer paper towels than when I'm in a bind and have to buy the cheaper brands so I end up saving money. Love the convenience of having them delivered to the door if I'm unable to drive the 45+minutes to our warehouse club. Overall, very pleased with these paper towels.

I am huge fan of Bounty Select-a-Size because I have rarely ever needed a large sheet so the Select-a-Size was perfect.  These Quick-Size seem to be a little bit smaller than Select-a-Size which makes them even more perfect for my needs.  The paper itself seems to be similar to other Bounty paper towels which makes them stonger and more useful than most other brands.

These are better than average paper towels.  One bothersome thing is the perforation holds a bit to tight so if I go to pull off one sheet, I frequently end up with two.  While these are of decent quality, I prefer the Costco brand paper towels which are of better quality and lower price.

I purchased Viva and Bounty at almost the same time. Bounty wins by far. The Viva is very hard to unroll. You can't just pull it from the holder. It takes two hands. Bounty unwinds perfectly and I love the half size sheets. Bounty will definitely be my go-to paper towel from now on.
The paper towels are strong and absorbent. I like that the perforations allow me to choose either a small piece or a large one. The textured surface makes it easy to wipe off tough stains.

review_title: First of all I loved the price with slickdeals but above all
review_body: First of all I loved the price with slickdeals but above all, I love the strength, durability, and softness. I have always loved BOUNTY but have 1 roll that's equal to 2 is awesome. If I had the same deal as before, I definitely would be ordering them again.

I use these instead of the kitchen sponges that tend to get so nasty smelling so easily. Using these paper towels,  I know I'm not cleaning with a bacteria laden sponge. these towels ROCK. I wish my local Kroger store still carried them.
These live up to the hype/advertising and work really well. I also love the quick size option so you don't waste a whole paper towel on smaller messes.

Had to get myself a new set of the old school filters. After about a month, this filter stopped letting water through and it would take about an hour to fill in a pitcher. After contacting Brita about the issue (their site is plagued with this review, I came to find out), their answer is to regularly do a process of taking out and cleaning the filter on your own. Don't waste your time, just change the filters more often

Buyer Beware!!  These are not long lasting.  The first one clogged after 3 day use.  It barely dripped out of one corner and each filling took about 50 minutes to drip through.  The second one clogged too.  I bought the regular white ones a week ago and that one is still going strong. These don't work!  Do not buy!

WATER TASTE BETTER, TOO!  BUT AFTER TWO DAYS THE FILTER STOPPED WORKING.  SAME THING HAPPENED WITH NEXT SIX LONGLAST FILTERS.  CONSTANTLY POPS UP ON THE LARGE SQUARE CANISTER.  THE LARGE SQUARE CANISTER CANNOT BE DISMANTLED FOR CLEANING; GUNKS BUILD UP AROUND THE CANISTER.  UNABLE TO CLEAN THREW OUT THE TWO LARGE SQUARE CANISTERS AND SIX LONGLAST FILTERS.  NOW USING ZEROWATER

review_title: Not happy with this--slow drip compared to the old style white ones.
review_body: Not happy with this type of filter. We were using it and it drips so slow compared to the other white ones that don't last as long. Not sure if this was just the one filter we got or if it is for all of them. I used one filter for a couple months and got tired of waiting so long for the water to drip through so just tossed it. Not anxious to try the other filter just bought the white ones. I was disappointed since I thought it would be nice to have a filter that lasts 6 months.

I only came back to brita water filters because Walmart stopped selling their generic version of their filter!!!. I live at the beach and the water here is very hard....  and it is noticeable when you put the water in ice trays and freeze them. The brita takes away the taste and makes ice taste normal BUT this doesn't do as good as job as the generic brand I used to buy from Walmart... (which is no longer made.. and they only sell Brita brand now...). I really liked how my ice used to be tasteless AND clear.... BUT the brita filter isn't bad... some of the ice blocks are somewhat clear, and whats important is that the water tastes good still....

review_title: These are great but for some reason doesnt really last long
review_body: These are great but for some reason doesnt really last long. I'm not sure if its justthe batch that I got but the first one clogged up in 2 weeks and the 2nd kne which in currently using ..seems to be on its last leg. I bought the blue longer lasting ones so we will see how that goes

I bought this on January 28th and had to throw it out on May 7th because it stopped working. It did its job for three months, but I was disappointed that the filter didn't last longer. For context, I fill my 11 cup brita pitcher about once every two days, and I'm a single person household. Thus, I truly thought I was going to be able to utilize this filter for longer than the 6 months the descriptor had said this filter tens to last. At the very least, the three months I did get to use it, it worked well, and the water was filtered clearly and quickly. Moving forward, I won't be buying another one of these filters and intend to look into getting a 'zero water' filter instead.

review_title: Removes the undesirable lime from our drinking and cooking water.
review_body: Have used this product for years.  We used to have a well and the Brita cleaned the water.  We had it tested every two years.  We now live in an area where the water, while it passes all tests for potability, it has a very high amount of lime.  Enough, that when you boil the water there is always an accumulation of white calcium (lime) it the bottom of the container.  Using the Brita removes enough lime that there is no accumulation in the container.

I took the plunge and bought the three month filter because i always forgot to change the filters after the month and it would drag on into the next.  This would be great... BUT.. it takes FOREVER to filter.  Literally drips like a leaking facet.  Drip.. drip.. drip.  it takes 15 minutes for a pitcher to filter. Not like the original ones.

Extremely disappointed in the long last filter. It takes over an hour (or more) to fully filter through which basically makes my pitcher worthless. I've never had this problem with the normal filters after over a decade of use. I've seen other reviewers saying the same thing about this filter. How did you screw up so badly Brita?

They are made from sturdy material that isn't at all like Styrofoam (THANKFULLY since I HATE the sound of styrofoam when it rubs together)  They are a great price and a major time saver for busy moms!!

review_title: These plates are amazing! We buy the huge pack of them every ...
review_body: These plates are amazing! We buy the huge pack of them every 2 or 3 months and are our go to product for plates. We hate dishes, who wants to clean every single time you eat? these I have had liquids and whatnot, no seeping through. Highly recommend these

review_title: Sturdy plates. I have eaten steak and mashed potatoes ...
review_body: Sturdy plates.  I have eaten steak and mashed potatoes off a single plate with no issues of leaking or tearing.  If I were to walk around and have to hold it, I may double up.  But I use these all the time for bbq food.

Paper plates are durable and the quantity for the price is unbeatable, even through a local wholesale club. The extra added perk, they are delivered right to my door under subscribe and save every few months.

review_title: Fantastic quality and for the price
review_body: Fantastic quality and for the price, amazing.  We use these 1 to 2 times a week for easy clean up at our house.  The size is perfect too.  Definitely recommend.  Also, these are not to large, this is the size to get.  The 8" is to small.
I use these all the time. Heavy enough for those burgers and so forth. Only need one for not leaking thru, compared to cheaper ones that need 2-3 plates.

review_title: NO!  Don't like these. Deluxe much better.
review_body: Not happy with these. The Deluxe are much better. I ordered these as a substitute because they didn't have the Deluxe which I've always ordered. These are thin and close to floppy. The Deluxe are nice and sturdy.
Finally, I was able to find "regulation size" dinner plates online (I am not good at judging size).  This pack is huge and well worth the money.  Cheaper than I've seen in any store.
Great for the guy who doesn't like to do dishes. These were also small enough to help with portion control on top of making my life dishwasher free.
Big plates that are sturdy enough for any type of food, and doesn't soak through or leak.  I prefer paper plates to styrofoam, and these are my favorite type of paper plates.  Great bargain.
Handy

review_body: I love Viva so i figured it would be smart to order it in bulk and get it through Amazon.  This paper is a lot rougher than the Viva I buy in stores.  I'm disappointed I bought a lot of it.

The best paper towel ever!!!! Used only Bounty and then switched to VIVA... no comparison... great product Amazon... wonderful price

review_title: Great quality, not noisy and lightweight.
review_body: This is our fourth (one and a spare for both beds) and they’re great. Waterproof without being noisy and they don’t make you feel hot. Only complaint is that the waterproof-ness makes it harder to dry as water tends to get caught in the folds in the washing machine. This would happen with anything waterproof, so it’s not really a criticism of this specific product, more a concern with the category. Deep pockets for my tall mattress!

review_title: Waking up to warm pee?  Not good.  Mattress Protector?  Does the job!
review_body: My 3-year old son put this mattress protector to the test last night as he was sleeping with me.  There are few things less pleasant than being awakened from a nice dream by the feeling of someone else's warm pee invading your PJs.  My PJs aren't waterproof, but this mattress protector is.  I was able to strip the sheets and the protector off and no pee made its way onto the mattress (and this wasn't just a little pee leakage...this was full on, laying face down, bladder emptying INTO the mattress pad).  The real test will be how the thing holds up to repeated washings.  I'll update this review after a few more incidents...because they're bound to happen.. One negative is, this thing does sleep a bit warm.  That's the reason for the 4 stars instead of 5.

review_title: It does its job - no complaints
review_body: I bought it to protect my mattress against my sometimes leaky pets (If they're going to yack, they're going to run up onto my bed.  It never fails).  My previous mattress cover was constantly coming off, which is irritating in the middle of the night.  This cover is very roomy, and covers all corners and a deep mattress.  Hopefully I'll never have to find out if it works against bed bugs and other critters.

review_title: I LOVE THESE! They are soft
review_body: I will be honest and say I wasn't expecting much. We have been through several different types with our three boys who will all be six in December. Once we got the new beds we decided to once again try something different. I LOVE THESE! They are soft. You can't even tell you are sleeping with something between the sheet and the mattress. One of our boys had a big issue with that with a previous one. Anyways, so the time came we had to wash one. It held up great!!!!!!! Love it!!!! Well worth the money. The boys are happy and so is this mama!

We got this a few weeks ago for my toddler who's potty training, and whose sippy cups kept leaking. We've had a few incident where water poured on the bed (like the sippy cup may as well not have had a lid on it. All the sheets were soaked and even had a bit of water pooled on top. The top of the mattress protector was sopping wet but underneath the mattress was bone dry.. We've only washed it once, so I can't comment on its longevity. But so far, so good! I'll update the comment if it washing ruins its performance. But I probably won't update if all's well.=). Also, we got rid of that sippy cup!

review_title: Wonderful product at a very fair price
review_body: I brought an elderly parent home to live with me and had to get suddenly serious about mattress protection.  The SafeRest Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof Mattress Protectors are just wonderful and fit my needs perfectly. I immediately reordered for every bed in my house and some extra for the laundry closet.  The top of the pad is a soft thin cotton terry that wicks away moisture to the waterproof underside.  No plastic feeling or sound at all. It washes easily and dries on low heat. We then purchased a more comfortable adjustable bed with a memory foam mattress in lieu of a hospital bed.  The memory foam mattresses are thinner than the deep pocket mattress norm now. After receiving SafeRest through Amazon I was surprised to see the same type mattress cover at the mattress store for $119 each! That's almost four SafeRests at Amazon prices! Stock up! (If you have a deep pocketed mattress, no worries.  The pockets on the SafeRest are deep - 18", but easily stretch bigger if needed. The side material is pliable and easy to stretch.) The thin memory foam mattress solution is not to buy the outrageously priced specialty sheets, mattress covers, etc., but to buy the inexpensive mattress clips or straps that make all sheets and mattress covers a perfect fit. I read that some adjustable bed users have trouble with the linens coming off at the corners, but the clips and the SafeRest mattress covers are great.  And even older mattresses get an instant level of protection from dust, mites, and other creepy things you might not be able to see. A great purchase, and I'm about to buy more.

I got this for our new bed when I was pregnant because I had a fear my water would break in the middle of the night (it did!) It's been through baby poop and pee, cat puke, tons of breast milk, and even period blood. Our matress is still stain free and stays dry, so glad we got this.. Wish I had kept the package for washing instructions though

Love it!  I have a senior cat who likes to, ummm, show her presence.  I just got a brand spanking new mattress and hadn't gotten my new bedding.. so I had a sleeping bag covering it.. LUCKILY they are semi water proof.. and my matress was not harmed.. so I thought.. I need to find a protector.. but I HATE the plastic/vinyl feel and sound.. HATE IT.. so I was a bit leary as to what I would find.. this one claimed to be noise free and not feel like vinyl.. .. ok.. so.. skeptically I purchased one.. and my new bedding.. Thinking.. with new bedding, and a new mattress she wouldn't feel the need to make a statement.. i put the SafeRest on under my fitted sheet just in case...  well.. the very first night Miss Roxanne decided she had something to say.. I really wish she'd use her words and not her urine to speak.. needless to say I was MAD!.. I pulled everything off.. to find.. drum roll.. NO PEE ON MY MATTRESS!! Woot woot!! SO.. I ordered 2 more so that when I have to pull them the next time (cuz you know there will be a next time) .. I will have another to put on immediately instead of waiting for the wash and dry.. Thank you!!

review_title: When theres a very bad storm or fireworks
review_body: We have an old and terrified Chihuahua who we let sleep in our bed.  When theres a very bad storm or fireworks, she often pees in said bed. This has been amazing at protecting our mattress. I highly reccomend it.

I bought this for my king size bed a year ago. We have kids, pets, and I'm clumsy as well :) It has lasted us this year and is still in great condition. It goes over our 4 inch sleep innovations mattress topper, it fits great on top of all this and makes the bed as whole more comfortable. It was very affordable, especially compared to some of the name brand items. I was skeptical about the waterproof part because it didn't "seem" very waterproof. My son crawls in the bed with us at night sometimes and he has peed more than I would like!! Every single time nothing gets past this protector. Not one drop!! I love it and would recommend it to anyone!
