Good value for the money compare to the B brand which is very strong and absorbent.
Arrived on time. Exactly as described. Would buy again
The corners are empty, so if the pillow has sharp corners, they will look empty. I'm trying to pull the filling out to corners. They are well filled.
These are great for the price! Very full and comfortable. I used them for inserts for outdoor covers.
It's not great quality, too puffy in the middle of the pillow and the corners dos not fill up the pillowcase..  The price is good though

This insert is perfect for those cute pillow cases you find online.  It is durable and has the perfect amount of pouf, and is just sturdy enough to hold a nice full pillow shape.  So happy to have found this!
I've purchased a bunch of these pillows and will be buying more for gifts
Perfect for my use. Make sure to read the description to know what size pillow to buy for your specific case size.

review_title: I was doubtful but it's perfect
review_body: I wasn't sure if it would truly fit my 18 x 18 pillow sham, as recommended, but it's perfectly stuffed! Also a plus that it's made in the USA!

18x18" worked perfectly for my 16.5 & 17.5" (measured laying flat) pillow covers that I bought in Thailand. They are firm, full and not looking like basketballs. Quick shipment although 3 separate boxes for 3 pillow inserts meant 3 times as many text messages regarding shipping, arrival, etc.
Arrived squished but plumped back up after opening

review_title: It fills the case just like it should & looks great
review_body: I ordered this for a pottery barn pillow cover & it worked perfectly.  It fills the case just like it should & looks great.

They’re super long. I still have extra space at the bottom. I brought the strands closer together but they can be really spaced out. Otherwise I am happy with this purchase and would recommend. We will see what happens in a month or so.
Fantastic item perfect for our back window!
Bought these top use as a back drop for our Christmas photo booth.  They are exactly want we wanted.  Great product, woudl recommend!
Fit exactly in my window!!

They are lovely lights, but the wire that plugs into the wall is awkwardly short and you just have the controller hanging half way down the lights. Wish it was long enough to hide. Also the electrical plug sticks out horizontally which makes it difficult to plug behind dressers and what not. But otherwise beautiful addition.

When the lights arrived they were very hard to untangled. I used them once. The light wasn’t as illuminating as shown. The lights glowed more white than yellow. After the first use, I removed them and put them on a table indoors. I then had a very hard time untangling them again. One of the strings came off. Now only every other string lights up and only every other light of the string that works lights up.

review_title: ... was skeptical of the product from the packaging (the poor job with the graphic design reminded me of knockoff ...
review_body: Though I was skeptical of the product from the packaging (the poor job with the graphic design reminded me of knockoff products)) the product itself is great. It gives the impression of durability, the lights give off a warm glow, and the strands aren't too noticeable. One thing that could be improved are that the flashing patterns cycle through speed changes, and it would be nice to have a consistent speed setting too. Additionally, the power strip could be a bit longer.

review_title: I love these hanging twinkle lights
review_body: I love these hanging twinkle lights. I used a curtain rod from Target and sheer curtains from Ikea to hand behind the bed and give a cosy feel to our guestroom. Though the lights aren't very bright, we've gotten a number of compliments.
Amazing I really love it I'm very happy with it .

review_title: made my home really cool. Decent cost but give your house a pretty ...
review_body: made my home really cool.. Decent cost but give your house a pretty good !!. Easy to put . Love it.
So easy to use and gets the wrinkles out fast!
Great power for a small steamer. Great for travel.

The first time I tried to use this after filling it with water it started to boil for a minute or so and then it stopped and never worked!  Very disappointing and I was left with wrinkly clothes on my trip.  I need to purchase another one but it won't be this brand!  Returned it!!!

review_title: Great design and very easy to use
review_body: Heated up quickly--had enough water to steam two shirts, one of which was very wrinkled linen.  Great design and very easy to use.  I did buy a bottle of distilled water to use with it as our tap water has a lot of minerals--very happy with my purchase!
The wife loves this thing. She gets the wrinkles out of her work cloths with this almost every day
Works great! & so much easier than ironing! Good value for the price.

review_title: ... received my steamer within days and I am very happy with it
review_body: I received my steamer within days and I am very happy with it.  Works great and produces steam very quickly.
It works nothing functionally wrong with it but i thought it would get hotter and easier to remove wrinkles. You have to leave it at one spot for a very long time.

review_title: Works great... replaced a large clunky steamer.
review_body: Works great... replaced a large clunky steamer.

review_title: Great for small quantities of clothing
review_body: Works well! I think it’s perfect to have on the road with you for a few shirts. However, since I discontinued taking my dress shirts to get laundered, I need to invest in a larger steamer with greater water capacity. I did 8 shirts with this steamer and although they turned out nice, it took several refills.

I docked one star because it kinda stays folded up and doesn’t flow or lay nicely against the outer curtain/tub lining so it kind of pokes you while in the shower/ lets in the breeze underneath. This can be adjusted by moving it since it’s magnetic- also how I found out my tub is magnetic. I wish I would have thought about having kids prior to wanting a nice clean looking interior curtain.. In my house we often sneak up on one another and try to scare them. Well, before this curtain I could see them rustling the outer curtain and be able to hold the inner curtain against the shower wall... but now... it’s clear. So they can still see me. Naked. This isn’t the products fault though, it was obviously listed as clear. I just learned for next time and will be reordering a foggy one.

This was not as thick as I anticipated for the price. There was a tear on the top edge but it wouldn't interfere with effectiveness so I didn't bother returning. The magnets/weights are very helpful though.

review_title: Does its job right!  No chemical smell!
review_body: There really is no chemical smell, it is THICK but clear, and it does a great job keeping shower water where it needs to stay---in the shower and not on my bathroom floor!  I had always used the cheap $1 liners before, but they would tear so easily and stink for a week or so after putting it up.  I've only had this up for a week, but it's definitely 5 star from what I've seen to this point...I'll update if it lets me down!

These were great-- I didn't even realize I was getting 2! The price is SO reasonable!!! At the store I usually shop in for household items 1 liner cost around 15 bucks and these are much better anyway- I love that they are free from nasty chemicals!! Thank you!!!

review_title: Very RIGID and not standard length
review_body: Bought based on positive reviews but was very disappointed in quality and feel.  This shower curtain liner is very rigid and not flexible and also seems short as I have installed on a standard height rod and it is only about 2" tops into tub which may lead to water leakage.. Will be returning.

review_title: This shower curtain liner was easy to put up
review_body: This shower curtain liner was easy to put up, and I am very happy that I chose this one. My house runs off of a well and the water left residue on my last shower curtain but since I bought this I have not noticed it having much effect on this liner. The material that it is made out of seems to be a much higher quality then the last one I purchased. The magnets at the bottom serve their purpose and keep it in place and away from me while I shower and the thickness is perfect, it's not thin so it doesn't wave all around but it's not too thick to the point that it bunches up awkwardly like some liners do. I'm very satisfied with it and I thought the price was fair as well. When It inevitably becomes time to purchase a new liner I will definitely order this again.

Is a decent shower curtain liner. Don't know how long the anti-bacterial claim will last (they never are indefinite) but I liked that the curtain did not give off a strong odor as some others have in the past. Price was right $10 or so, and it went on easy. Hope to get a few years out of it without the telltale signs of bacterial growth/mildew.

This shower liner features brass rings.  The diameter of the brass holes is too small to fit over the plastic snap on rings that support the curtain.  I'm not sure how long it will stay up so I need to buy new rings. I'm rating this durable since most liners last about a year before you need to clean them with a bleach product to eliminate mildew.  Overall, it was a chore to install, something that should have been fool proof.

review_title: The liner itself is good, so far held up against mildew forming and ...
review_body: The liner itself is good, so far held up against mildew forming and sheds water well. A bit disappointed with the magnet though, it's not really working, The steam from the hot shower keeps blowing the liner up, sometimes the magnet can help keep the liner in place for a few minutes, but most often not. I hope there will be more magnets or stronger magnets, then the liner will be perfect.

review_title: Nice Weight and Good Self-cleaning Properties
review_body: I can't attest to the mildew resistant part, as I've only had it two weeks. However, this is my first clear liner and I quite like it. I have a pretty shower curtain and it's nice to see it from both sides. It also hangs nicely and doesn't come cling up against me like some liners I have had. It also seems to sluice clean of soap and shampoo residue very well. I was afraid it might get cloudy but so far, still clear as a bell. And the reason I got the clear liner this time is quite pleased with it too--my cat loves to sit on the edge of the tub and observe in faint astonishment, but before, he kept having to poke his head around the edge of the liner which let water out (and onto him). Now he can sit in safety and observe.

review_title: Accurate right out of the box
review_body: Great scale!. The only place I have to keep a scale in my bathroom is behind the door.  I used to have to pick up the old scale (which was also digital) and lean it against the wall after using it. This one has a slim enough profile (7/8" tall) that I can leave it on the floor... my door has a one inch clearance and swings open right over it.. Accurate right out of the box too, I checked it at my Doc's office.

I bought this scale because I had a an analog scale and couldn't tell what my weight really was.. Pros:. Accurate. Attractive. Affordable. Has a tenth to see how close you are to losing that next pound lost. For the price and the appearance, even if it's off by a few tenths, it is accurate. I haven't noticed it being off by any, however.. Cons:. Smudges easily. It is glass, so smudges should be assumed when purchasing the scale.. I've had this for a month and can't see any reason not to buy another, should this one fail. If it does, I'll be back to let you guys know.

review_title: Nice scale but with inaccuracy in weight
review_body: I do like the scale of the digital design ,slim and sleek look with the black glass like background and easy to read display. The only thing is it seems to change the lbs. of my weight when ever I step on it.I do everything right in stepping on it and having my feet exactly together evenly for a proper reading. I keep getting different amounts as if I lost weight instead of gaining weight! I am trying to gain weight and reads different amounts such as being off about 3- 5 pounds. I want to seem as though I am making progress not doing the opposite!

This Scale arrived on time and packaged perfectly. Instructions were easy to follow. This scale has the capability to change from pounds to kilograms. I wish it would calculate the amount of kilograms to a stone. Because in Europe horseracing jockey's and athletes say their weight in stones. There are 5.35 kg in 1 stone=14pounds. So if a jockey weights 8 stone he would be 112 pounds.. 112 pounds would be 50.8kg. = 8 stone.

review_title: Lol, this product is a joke. I guess ...
review_body: Lol, this product is a joke. I guess I should have expected it to not work properly since it was only 20$, but it gives a different weight each time even if you weigh your self a few times back to back. one time itll show 220 the next time itll show 250. Spend a little more for a working product

review_title: I enjoyed this scale for the first 6 months I've had ...
review_body: I enjoyed this scale for the first 6 months I've had it -- large and easy to read numbers, easy to clean finish, great appearance, etc. -- but in the last month (product owned for 7 months), it began to fail to settle on a weight and it shuts off/times out before displaying a final value.  I can reactivate it several times and wait until it finally displays an answer, but the value displayed may vary as widely as 15 pounds lighter or heavier than yesterday's value.  I have changed the batteries, cleaned and relocated the scale, etc., to no avail.

review_title: I accidentally bumped the corner of this scale against the ...
review_body: I accidentally bumped the corner of this scale against the toilet and it shattered all over the place. It's made of safety glass, but what a pain in the butt.

Simple, easy to use scale. What more can I say. It's a scale, it weighs me accurately. My favorite aspect of this scale is the step and read feature. With my old scale (which died), I had to first step on it to turn it on, then wait for it to zero, then step on it. I didn't always get the timing right and spent a lot of time stepping on and off, which isn't what I want to do before my shower!. The numbers are big enough for me to see without my glasses - though if my vision were any worse, I'd have to wear my glasses to weigh myself. I'm moderately, but not extremely, near sighted.

review_title: scale no longer switch from kg to lbs, not consistent weight
review_body: Black color collects dust easy. not consistent. sometimes it is off by 2 to 3 kgs when I step off then on again.. The button to switch from lbs to kgs does not work no more.. push lbs to kgs button sometimes switches after n pushes sometimes not at all.. 1year 7 months i have the scale so far.. Buying another scale not this brand

Read all directions. Placed on tile floor. Stepped on, stepped off to “00” it out. ( calibrate) stepped back on. 93.2 lbs. ( this can’t be right!) stepped off, stepped on waited for 00. Weighed again. 108.8... ( nope that’s not right either) after repeating the same thing 6 more times ... I never did receive the same number twice. My older ( not digital) scale has me somewhere around 100 lbs. disappointed.
GREAT DEAL

These may be for you if you want thin, weak paper towels that you will end up using the times as many as you would of you'd just bought name brand towels. I was dumb enough to believe the good reviews...bit was I wrong. They must have encouraged Everyone who worked at the factory to write in with positive reviews because I can't imagine anybody in their right mind thought this was a good deal.
thanks
Decent paper towels

These paper towels have become my favorite.  For about a dollar a roll, they are affordable.  I also love that they tear at the perforation easily, a necessity since I am a mother of 3 small children and usually only have one hand to do anything!
Great price, great paper towels! We order these about every 2 months!
Well it does what it's supposed to do..
This Was A Great Buy Will Be Ordering Every Month!!!. It's Just Like Bounty At Half The Cost!!
Good price as described

I researched and compared all sorts of paper towel options.  This really is a great quality paper towel.  It's very thick, durable, and full size without perforations for smaller towels.  It feels somewhat like a waste at times, as far as how much towel I am throwing away, but, with subscribe and save it is the same or better than the low quality towels purchased in the supermarket.  This is definitely the winner - I would even put it better than Bounty because those have the perforations and these are full size towels on thick rolls - and I have used them for a lot of tough items. Only need one towel for big messes, and they are big enough to fold over and use as paper napkins.
They are very resistant and keep the doors locked in the trash can. I will never used anything else
It's all in the bag.....trash that is, and I love the clean fresh scent of Gain.  Garbage that doesn't smell  Wow
Excellent
Strong bags with odor shield..win win
Holds well without breaking. Keeps the smell away.

review_title: The bag's good. The freeze scent is
review_body: The bag's good.. The freeze scent is, eh, not really pleasing. It actually disturbs if you are sensitive.

review_title: OdorShield is a plus for this purchase.
review_body: Ordered the big size so I won't run out of trash sacks.  Glad they are making them now with OdorShield.
Favorite trash bags.  smell nice, tie easily, and are sturdy.
Good quality, durable and so much less expensive than buying these at the store.

review_title: Dogs love it. Easier to order through Amazon than to ...
review_body: Dogs love it.  Easier to order through Amazon than to carry myself.

review_title: Ordered my second set. Great quality and value
review_body: Very nice quality, they wash well too. I have a car detailing business and those work great, I presoak them then wash them in the washer on hot, heavy duty,  and then in the dryer on low, delicate, they come out nice. Once you take off the label/tag these towels wont leave any streaks on a car.

review_title: Great alternative to paper towels and sponges
review_body: These microfiber cloths are a really good alternative to paper towels and sponges.  You get enough in the package so that if you choose to only use once, you'll have plenty before you have to wash them.  They are very good at scrubbing up messes.

I love these cleaning cloths! I use them all the time when cleaning and love having spares due to the fact that there are so many in a pack. The only slightly irritating thing is my underwear always get stuck to them in the dryer, but that simply the material and has nothing to do with the quality. AmazonBasics strikes yet again! I'll probably order another set in 5 years when these cloths potentially wear out. ;-)
Use these cloths for detailing my vehicle. They fray a tad but overall seem good quality and you can't beat the price. Amazon for the win!

review_title: thinner than I expected but okay
review_body: towels okay but could be a little thicker  other than that they work great

review_title: These microfiber cleaning cloths work great. They are super soft
review_body: AmazonBasics did it again!  These microfiber cleaning cloths work great.  They are super soft!  I use them to clean my microfiber couch.  I spray some Windex on them to clean my couch.  It makes my couch look like new!. If this helped you please click YES!

review_title: I was determined to keep it clean so I got these and have been really happy with them
review_body: I used to only clean with paper towels- I know, I’m a monster. When I moved into my new house, I was determined to keep it clean so I got these and have been really happy with them. The cloth is a good size and there’s plenty of them. I wish they came in different colors!

Despite following the care instructions, these last their softness after a few times in the wash. They're also a pain to take care of, as they can't be put in the dryer and must be air dried or hung out to dry. Not worth it for something that doesn't stay soft. I've downgraded them to cleaning rags and have started putting them in the dryer anyway, since it doesn't matter how soft my cleaning rags are. They work well for that, but if you're looking for something soft to use on your face like I was, I'd recommend a different product.

I use these to lightly exfoliate my skin each morning and they work really well for that. I have occasionally used one or two for cleaning/dusting around the house and they work well for that too (though I wouldn't recommend using the same cloth for both). They do tend to gather dust and hair during the wash and I wish that weren't the case, but that's the nature of this kind of microfiber. All told, a worthwhile product for my use.

Arrived on time and as described. The assorted colors are great when running through chores- yellow is for dusting, white is for cleaning and blue for drying. In the past, all my cloths have been the same color and easily get mixed up; i.e. "is this the dirty or clean one".

review_title: Great product at a value price point
review_body: We have been using these for a number of years and just went to this particular version for the value price point.  They have been great, hold up to very heavy and tough objects that could rip a normal bag.

review_title: Glad Tall Kitchen Drawstring trash bag
review_body: The thickness of the plastic is thinner than expected.  Fortunately, I haven't encountered breakage. It has a draw "cord" which is convenient.. Good price for 90 bags.
I stuff my trash bags with clothes and these trash bags are exactly what I need

Great price for these bags. Thought I had messed after the purchase as I checked the price at a competitor (not sure if I can name them) then realized I had ordered 90 bags and the ones at a competitor was priced at 50 bags. Figured I saved about 8 bucks and change.

review_title: Nice Product at a Nice Price!
review_body: Much better price than at the big-box stores, and they work well - as long as you don't pull them too quickly out of the trash can. This causes the top portion of the bag that holds the drawstring to separate from the bag itself. The kitchen bags from Sam's Club do the same thing, so it's a common issue - just take your time!

review_title: These are hands down the best trash bags that I have ever purchased
review_body: These are hands down the best trash bags that I have ever purchased.  The price was great and they are very durable.  I like that they have a tie top as well.  Very easy to handle when taking to the outside trash can.  No leaks.

review_title: Just carry all in one Bag
review_body: Holds all you stuff in and does not break. Will buy more when needed.

review_title: I put it to the test
review_body: I would buy these again, and plan on it. Glad is a great brand in general and I have never had any issues. I stuffed my first bag full with pizza boxes and it didn't rip. My son dragged it through the yard to the trash and it didn't bust or rip. For those reasons alone I'd say purchase it! The drawstrings work well too and the bag doesn't have any weird odor like some bags do.
This box was defective.... the black plastic “string” part that is meant to pull open & then used to tie up bag was stuck to bag. Very annoyed n disappointed.
The garbage bags are a plus and work great for lining my garbage cans. I love to have them on hand and get them every 2 months.  It works well and I never run out.
These are huge rolls great stock up price!!
I love this product

review_title: For the price they are just as good as Bounty
review_body: For the price they are just as good as Bounty, but their price has gone up since I added them to my S&S, so they get replaced with less expensive rolls now.

What is there to say? They are really absorbent and with two young kids we go through rolls pretty quickly cleaning up food and milk messes all throughout the house. Alexa recommended these and they are currently our default paper towels we have delivered via subscription.
Great paper towel....does a good job cleaning up.  Out last other's.
GOT THIS ON SALE WHICH IS A RARITY! MY FAVORITE PAPER TOWEL BUT SOMETIMES THE PRICE IS TO HIGH FOR MY BUDGET! WELLMADE/ DURABLE. I RECOMMEND. FAST SHIPPING.
Wht I ordered and at a god price and delivery
I get these on my subscribe and save
very satisfied with purchase
Very good product!

review_title: thick and durable - our family brand
review_body: These paper towels are thick. Good enough for cleaning our chalkboard or cupcakes that didn't quite make it from the oven to the kitchen table. this is our family brand.
I have to get someone to shop for my needs. I find ordering in bulk to be most convenient. Bounty are great towels. I'm set for a while.
I like the huge rolls. I don't like these paper towels are petty thin compared to the same brand from  the store.
Tired of buying terrible paper towels.. bounty knows the secret to being able to quickly picker up things
The Bounty is excellent. The box that these came in is a bit bigger than I expected. Excellent!

review_title: The one thing ones expects in a paper towel this producy does
review_body: This paper towel does the one thing one expects it to do which is to clean up messes.
Can’t go wrong with Bounty! Super absorbent and so we use less paper towels overall.
I love bounty--  the best quality , and a a case shipped to the door. --its wonderful.
we love this paper towel and are so happy we can do subscribe and save with this!
This is my second time ordering these. They were on sale and I had a coupon making them a really good value.

Purchased a 2-pack.  Both filters clogged after a couple of uses and neither fit well.  Sadly, I opened the package late and missed the return date.  I do not recommend these filters.  After reading some reviews here, I am not alone in the negative experience with these filters.

review_title: My regular filters get used way longer than suggested, ...
review_body: My regular filters get used way longer than suggested, I won't lie about that.  So when I found these longlasting filters I was excited.  After about 1 month of regular use (3 person household ) the filter slowed down to a literal drip. I seriously mean one drip at a time. I'm betting off saving ny money and buy the regular ones.

The filter stopped working after 1 month. These are supposed to last 6 months! It got to the point where water simply would no longer flow through the filter. I would not recommend this product. Very expensive and disappointing for what you get.

Filtered water slowly for about 2 weeks, then Stopped completely.  Took the company’s advice.  Banged on the thing with water in the reservoir.  Removed it, banged on it and replaced it.  Worked a little bit. Clogged again in a day. Also had a tendency of dislodging itself.  Came back more than once to find it floating in the reservoir.  Gave up tonight.  Went back to using the old white filters.
Less than a month of use, very clogged.

I bought  these because I’d like the  longlasting Idea.  The  The fit is terrible, it does not seal properly and if there’s too much water in the picture the filter starts to float. Until the fit is correct it I will not purchase these filters again. They were both package and they did arrive on time.

review_title: Filters clogged up in less than two weeks!
review_body: I live overseas in an area with a lot of calcium in the water, so I buy filters each time I'm home in the states to bring back overseas. Each of these six-month filters clogged up and stopped working within two weeks, and one clogged up in under a week! I tried multiple methods of unblocking the filters but no luck. I looked the issue up on the internet and apparently this is not an uncommon issue with these filters. I will stick with the one-month filters from now on as the one-month filters have never had this problem.

I have been using bottled water for several years - refilling the bottles periodically at our local Wal-Mart. Then I got a Brita pitcher and found that I could have well filtered water at a fraction of what I had been spending. I now use my Brita-filtered water exclusively for cooking and drinking - the three pack filters from Amazon are inexpensive (and less expensive than I can find them locally) - and do an excellent job. I don't even try to keep track of how much water goes through each one. I use one for a month and then replace it. If you have any doubts about the quality of the drinking water where you live, I strongly recommend that you get a Brita and a supply of filters from Amazon.

review_title: Filter is So Slow It's Unusable
review_body: Very very very very very slow. See how painful it was for you to read my first sentence? That's how painful it is to wait for this thing to filter water. Usually takes about 30 to make a pitcher of water. Considering you can use that up in five minutes and want more - you're going to end up using your tap anyway.

review_title: "Longlast" Means Very Long Wait for Filtered Water
review_body: Clearly this is a defective product.  It worked for a week, then it started taking over an hour to filter half a pitcher of water.  This should only take 10 minutes at most.  These filters are advertised as lasting for 6 months, and it didn't even work properly for 6 days. Our water is not unusual or full of particulates. I tried the company's solutions for removing air bubbles, and those methods did not improve filtering time. I am returning this product as defective.

I HAVE BEEN USING THESE DIXIE PLATES FOR YEARS.......NOT BIG ON WASHING DISHES!! LOL. VERY STRONG AND DURABLE. I HAVE TRIED CHEAPER BRANDS...NOTHING COMPARES TO DIXIE. GREAT PRICE. FAST SHIPPING. I RECOMMEND.

review_title: These are my favorite paper plates
review_body: These are my favorite paper plates! They hold up really well and don't feel like they are going to bend or leak. I've even cut food on them easily without issues.. I highly recommend this product!
These plates are excellent. They are nice and sturdy and never leak. I use them in the microwave without a problem, but  there is condensation from the heating I usually double up just to be safe.

review_title: Sturdy plates, rim is great for preventing juicy/runny meals from spilling
review_body: Fantastic plates at a reasonable price. These plates are sturdy and the rim on them is such that I can put things that are "runny" in them without fear of spilling things on my desk. I am a student and eat at my desk often. Similarly, live on a budget, but the plates are good enough that I can use them for any meal including those that require lots of cutting with a knife. Sometimes I even re-use the plate for different meals in the day (the horror!).
Their good plates, what more is there to say. Their strong enough not to fall apart if you pick them up with food in them, and not made of a material which will melt in the microwave.

I have been using paper plates ever since my dishwasher broke. I am too lazy to wash dishes by hand. These are heavy duty plates and don't fall apart like cheap paper plates. They are fine for microwave use.

review_title: Great paper plate at a great price
review_body: Just the right size for a disposable plate, and more economical that buying one, and cleaning it in the dishwasher.  This is a heavy duty paper plate that does not absorb liquids, and collapse.

review_title: Good plates, does its job well
review_body: These held up ok, I would have to double the plates depending on what I'm serving. It was a great deal so not much complain here. They seem thinner than the last batch I ordered. I liked them none the less.
Meals are easily enjoyed when the  paper plates have some strength to them.  These fit the bill and glad I can go to the pantry and find an abundance of paper plates for the next few months.

Great plates for grandma an toddler to use through out the day. About a medium weight. Great for dry food and light food. Fruit can get soggy after awhile. Not recommend for wet food. Floral design is cheerie.
Good Product
Yes! Better than bounty!

We love these paper towels but when we order from amazon, the quality is lower. Specifically, the towels stick together. Very frustrating for how much they cost. This has happened the last 3-4 times we ordered from Amazon. Will be buying these paper towels from brick & mortar stores in the future.
These paper towels are by far the best you could buy. They're practically cloth/microfiber, and they pick up EVERYTHING.

review_title: Hard to peel apart if in a rush although good towels
review_body: Great absorbency.
Best paper towels.
same with these paper towels love the thickness of each towel you tear off
My absolute favorite paper towels!
Truly the best

review_title: I used to love these towels but they are now a complete WASTE
review_body: Do NOT buy!!!  I used to love these towels but they are now a complete WASTE!!! What in the world was the company thinking when they changed them?!?!?! There is no similarity to a decent paper towel!!!

I have a really firm memory foam mattress from Ikea, and while it gave me the back support I needed I was often waking up with an arm asleep or hip pain because it was too firm. I've had this for a few weeks now.I expected this to be softer than my mattress but a bit firmer than it is, so it's taken some getting used to because it's so soft. I don't have the hip and arm problems anymore, and my lower back feels okay, but I'm still trying to figure out the best pillow to go with it for my neck.

review_title: I am super happy with this mattress pad
review_body: I am super happy with this mattress pad.  It is cottony and comfortable and the sides are super long!!  I have a really deep memory foam mattress and NOTHING would to stay put ... until this product came along.  The sides are super long so there is plenty of room for shrinkage lover time.  The fit on my super deep mattress is very loose so in the morning it is still in place.. The sides are not made of the allergy guard fabric, for me this is not an issue.. It is lightweight and that means it will fit nicely in the washer and dryer!!  I just got it so it is too soon to address durability, I will update if I notice any issues but I see no reason for concern at this point.

Our mattress is about 17" tall and this covers it no problem.  Stretches nicely without pulling or gathering and has enough material to stretch over the sides and tuck under the mattress. There is no crinkling noise at all and doesn't feel plastic-y.  Ordered 2 and put them on our bed and the guest bed. When we purchased our mattress several years ago, we also bought a mattress protector from mattress store  - I paid almost triple the price of this protector - and this is the same, if not, better quality.  Will purchase again when needed.

Just bought a brand new mattress and I am pretty concerned about protecting my warranty. I received the waterproof Protect-A-Bed mattress protector with my mattress,  but it was so loud and crunchy (and got terrible reviews for waterproofness) that I took it off and replaced it with this one. This one is not quiet and has a terry cloth top I hate, but after I put a mattress pad over it and sheets, I didn't notice it so much. I do think having it tight on my bed has made my already too-firm new mattress even more firm.. One star removed because I haven't tested the waterproofness and can't speak to that as of yet.

review_title: I have had it for about three weeks and I am satisfied with it and would recommend it if you have ...
review_body: Purchased a new adjustable bed and my old cover was worn out and bunched up under me I purchased this cover it fits perfectly and is very high quality. I have had it for about three weeks and I am satisfied with it and would recommend it if you have a memory foam mattress.

We initially bought one of these for my son a little over a year ago. Being a young boy we knew we needed some type of mattress cover to keep his mattress safe from any accidents. We chose this cover partially for the price and because of my son's allergies. We have been very satisfied with the quality and durability of this cover. It has held up we'll to a 4 year old. It does it's job of protecting the mattress well. We have since bought a second cover for my daughter's mattress. We are completely satisfied and would definitely purchase this product again.

review_title: This has been a great mattress protector
review_body: This has been a great mattress protector! I got it because we co-sleep with my two babies. We have had everything from leeky diapers to water bottles filled with water spilled on the bed and my mattress has stayed clean! Easy to wash and has held up with time.

I have only had the mattress cover for a week.  So far it is not noisy or hot.  I got it because, like another reviewer commented, my dog occasionally gets sick on the bed.  He hasn't done that since I put it on the bed so I can't speak to the waterproof protection aspect of it.  It is very thin and fits nicely on a thick mattress.  So far, so good.

review_title: Good quality product for the money.
review_body: A fabulous product right out of the box.  Fit like a glove and was very easy to put on. Hens and seams solidly sewn. Stretch fabric under the mattress with no tugging or folding.  Soft top is delightfully comfortable.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone wanting a good quality product for the money.  No lint, no dust, and no smell.  Makes putting the sheets on so much easier.

My main concern when getting a cover was the plastic feeling and sound that old covers used to make. This one is quite the opposite. It's completely quiet and you would never know I have a cover on my mattress by the feel. With that being said, the main reason for my 5 star rating is that it survived the ultimate test: my roommate's cat peeing all over my bed. It soaked all through my bedding and onto the cover, but the cover completely kept it off of my mattress. Those of you with memory foam mattresses know once moisture is in there, it's never coming out, so I was very happy and impressed that this cover actually lived up to its claims. It was also easy to clean and came out spotless. You can't beat this cover for the price!

review_body: These were not up to my expectation as indicated when I bought them. The pillows did not fluff out to the ends like they said they would.
These pillows fit perfectly into my 18 inch pillow covers. Did not under stuff or over stuff the covers.
After removing it from the plastic bag it is shipped in, the size does come out correctly. However, it is a little flat from the compression of it in the bag. Very impressed by fast shipping time!
Pillows were perfect for the shams I ordered and arrived on time! Be sure to check the sizing chart--if I hadn't done so, I would have ordered the pillows too small for the shams.

review_title: Making decorative pillows the easy economical way!
review_body: These Stuffer Pillows are perfect in every way. The pillow cases I purchased fit so well from corner to corner. I will be buying a couple more soon. This is much more economical than buying pillows ready made!
It's perfect. I'm so pleased and will remember your company when I need more.  Thank you for the quick delivery.
Fits my sham I bought perfectly!
Pillow came deformed.  Tried and failed to reposition the batting. Way smaller than size described.26 was really a 23. Bought 2 both the same.

review_title: Great fit for the pillow covers I purchased
review_body: Great fit for the pillow covers I purchased.  Did not size up and glad I didn't because these fit perfectly! Happy with my purchase and would purchase again!

I received my package today.  Opened it and immediately spotted black areas inside the pillow.  It appeared to be dirty spots on the cover at first, but when I looked closely it was part of the stuffing.  I couldn't return it without checking first.  I decided to make a little whole and pulled the synthetic fiber a little to check what the black spots were.  It could have been pieces of black thread.  Everything single possibility was going thru mind.  I wasn't going to keep the pillow with black spots all over for sure, but I needed to know what these black spots were.  It could have been mold for all I know.  Well, I decided to check and it was pieces of hard dirt all over.  Inside the pillow.  This is really disgusting.  The systemic fiber was dirty and the company used dirty fiber to stuff these pillows.  I had enough with checking one.  I'm sure returning both.  I will not be buying pillos from this maker again for sure.
The orientation of the electrical plug won’t fit in any of your standard weatherproof outlet covers making this nearly impossible to use outdoors for anything other than a one-time event.

Absolutely love these they're perfect. They don't hurt your eyes with a bright light but they give you enough light to be able to read and things like that if you only have these on in a room which was exactly what I needed. They remind me of stars.

review_title: not that bright led cool fluorescent light and also not that yellowish light
review_body: The reviews are correct.  This string of lights is worth every penny.  The different settings are delightful and the hue of light is just right:  not that bright led cool fluorescent light and also not that yellowish light.  It's a perfect warm white.

review_title: Looks just as described... I hung them ...
review_body: Looks just as described...  I hung them under a valance to add some lighting in my loft area.  It's a little time consuming to get them hung up because there are some many strings of lights to keep straight.

I really love these lights. I actually thought the wire would be thinner like the fairy lights but I still like them they way they are. Work perfectly so far and the end string was long enough to reach the outlet. makes my room looks very cozy at night 😁

These are very small, lightweight. Everything was tightly bundled and it was not tangled at all. I strung the line out and then undid all of the strands . I used them for a lighted canopy above our bed and I’m in love . Very pleased .

review_title: Cool but be careful to not get them tangled
review_body: Very pretty but tangled literally 5 seconds after I opened them. Took me ages to finally come up with what's in the picture lol. The different modes sold me though. I love the slow one that looks like fireflies.

review_title: These are pretty nice. The strands are not very close together
review_body: These are pretty nice . The strands are not very close together. The picture makes them seem like it’s a curtain of lights

The light settings are great! They arrived quickly and all strands work. I used 3M small clip hooks to attach the top behind the headboard canopy and just wrapped them around the footboard canopy. They look great when lit and unlit!
Love these lights, but I felt like the picture was a bit misleading. It's not as concentrated as there was huge gaps in between each light string.
Awesome steamer, works really well. The only think is that the water in the basin doesn't last very long. Other than that, compact and great for traveling

review_title: Works very well for the size and price!
review_body: This steamer works quite well as long as you hang the item being steamed and hold the steamer upright.. This steamer heats up quickly and took out all the wrinkles in my husband's thick khaki shorts.

review_title: Great! Offers powerful steam for its size and price
review_body: Picture shows t-shirt before steaming, after steaming, and day after steaming!. While probably not the most powerful and effective steamer, for its price, does the job very well! Heats up very quickly, and doesn't burn me or anything else. Going over one spot once reduces the wrinkle greatly, but you have to go over it a few more times for it to disappear. Pressing the steamer literally up against the fabric helps, eliminating the wrinkle completely. No drips as well! I just wish this thing would be bigger and hold more water, but it is good for traveling, and heats up new water fast

review_title: It does the job and is great for storage
review_body: Got this for my daughter to be used in her dorm room.  It does the job and is great for storage.

review_title: This is a very good product so far
review_body: This is a very good product so far. I have used it 3 times and so far, so good. It heats up very quickly and works great.
Really great little product. Very helpful for my curtains

review_title: Great way to remove wrinkles in everything, beats ironing!
review_body: Love this steamer; use it on new draperies I purchased, worked beautifully!  Uses it on linen slacks, husband’s dress shirts!  I’m sold!

review_title: Great steamer, and awesome customer service!
review_body: I had an issue with my first steamer, and the customer service was amazing!  So responsive, and they sent me a new steamer at no cost to me at all. The steamer is awesome and works like a charm!  Great product!
It works beautifully and I thank you for hiring disabled persons. I will look forward to purchasing other products from your company!
If you don't have one, what are you waiting for?

Highly recommend.  Every shower liner we get seems to mildew regardless of what we do to try to prevent it.  This one has been great!!  We have had it about 6 months and no issues.  The shower hooks slide easily.  Great great purchase!!

review_title: so good. I like the gussets at the top which ...
review_body: I can’t yet speak to it being mildew resistant, but so far, so good. I like the gussets at the top which help to keep the hooks from tearing through it. I’ve had no issues there. As others have stated, the magnets are pretty pointless and not even heavy enough to weigh it down much. While I don’t have any trouble with it riding up, it does billow in quite often. For $10, though, I can’t really complain. It does what it’s supposed to and keeps water inside the tub.

This shower liner is the best! Around! Mold and Mildew not gonna keep you down!. Seriously this curtain is the best. it is thick and durable. doesn't give off any smell. It is amazing!. I am moving to a place with 2 bathrooms soon, 10/10 would buy again for the second tub!

This is a good product for the money.  My bathroom is not the best lit one in the world, so the clear liner, matched with a somewhat less than opaque shower curtain, lets in substantially more light than my previous liner.  Also, the material is (so far) resisting any mildew or mold, which was a huge issue with previous liners bought at Wal-Mart and bed/bath stores.  The magnets don't stick to the sides of my tub, but I don't blame that on the product; that has more to do with the coating and material of the tub itself, so be aware it may be hit or miss for you as far as the magnets working properly.  Otherwise, I feel this is a nice value, and it seems like it will last a bit longer than my previous ones.  Time will tell.

review_title: Mildew resistance was the reason I ordered
review_body: This shower curtain liner is pretty stiff plastic, & hangs pretty short inside my tub. If it is mikdew resistant on the long term, I will be happy. I ordered a different brand with that promise, & it did not deliver. It was a science project in about 8 months. Hope this material performs as promised.

This is a review for. LiBa Mildew Resistant Anti-Bacterial PEVA 8G.... LiBa  - Clear shower curtain liner.  Not flimsy.. Works like a champ, looks good, is holding up just fine.  No funky smell out of the box, so it's a winner.  WIll buy this one again if and when I need another.

I've had it for a couple months now. To advertise the grommets as rust-free is 100% false. 50% of the grommets on the one I received are already rusting. Thought it was my hooks but after taking a closer look, its definitely the grommets. If you don't mind changing your curtains periodically because of rust/damage, then this is a decent buy. Otherwise, spend a few more bucks and get a higher quality product that isn't falsely advertised.

review_title: Quality is what matters and these have it!
review_body: These shower curtains are awesome.. Really happy with the purchase.. They are staying really clean and clear.. LOVE the grommets too. I did not get them on the fabric curtain I bought to go with this one.. The grommets are what earned them 5 stars.. Really great quality.

review_title: The plastic is so hard!! Also, it ...
review_body: The plastic  is so hard!! Also, it has 15 holes on top for hanging..  Most shower curtains and packages of ringshave 12.  Wish I could send back but I through out the packaging.

review_title: Yea it's an excellent shower curtain at a fair
review_body: Yea it's an excellent shower curtain at a fair, good price. Recommended. I am happy with it. All its points listed are true.

This is a good quality scale that I use weekly.  Have not had any problems with it all.  Just keep in mind that all scales can be off by a small amount.  I use to monitor if I am maintaining weight, losing weight, or the unwanted gaining weight.  Also recommend that people don't check weight everyday as that will drive you nuts as you see your weight change on daily basis and by the time of day.

Straight to the point, this scale is accurate to the tenth. Once you step on, the bright LCD screen will display your weight toggling between tenths on both the higher and lower sides before calibrating for the most accurate measure. Then it will stop after a couple seconds and simply reveal the weight upon the scale. Love its accuracy!

review_title: I like to check my weight daily
review_body: I like to check my weight daily, naked, just before stepping into the shower. I record it in the Apple Health app, and periodically export that data into a spreadsheet where I can correlate it my food log and try to spot trends or problems. (Yes, I'm a data nerd).. I've got a professional physician beam scale that I bought several years ago, but it is too big and awkward for the small bathroom that has my shower, so resides in the bigger bathroom on the other side of the house. I don't want to walk naked all the way across the house and back for my morning weigh in, especially on cold winter days, and so I bought this Etekcity scale for the shower bathroom.. It works well and simply. Step on it, wait for the numbers to stop changing and start flashing, and then step off and read the result. It sells for cheap, but does not give the impression of being cheaply built.. Occasionally I've had my doubts. For instance, a while back I seriously pigged out, eating a whole pizza (3.5 pounds of pizza!). My next morning weigh in showed a new low weight, under my previous low by about 1 pound. I thought, "What the heck is wrong with this scale? Surely I'm still carrying at least a pound or two of that pizza around...", and so made the naked trek across the house to check with the professional physician beam scale...and it too showed a new low. In fact, according the physician mean scale, I was about 0.5 lower than the Etekcity scale claimed!. That has been the consistent pattern whenever I've directly compared the Etekcity with the beam scale. The beam scale consistently reads about 0.5 pounds lower than the Etekcity.. I don't know if the beam scale is right and the Etekcity reads a little high, or the Etekcity is right and the beam scale reads a little low, or if the truth is in the middle with the beam scale a little low and the Etekcity a little high.. What's important is that doesn't really matter. If you are buying a scale to monitor your weight for health reasons, what matters is consistency, not absolute accuracy. If your scale tells you are 1 pound heavier that you really are, or 1 pound lighter, or whatever, as long as it does that consistently you can accurately figure out changes in your weight, and that is what you really need to know.. I've been using this scale daily since I bought it 9 months ago, and it is still going find on the original batteries. Sometimes I use it more than once a day, when I have a reason to think that there has been a major intake or outflow of mass (South Park fans will know what I'm talking about...).. I'm giving this 5 stars for now--it works consistently, it sells for cheap, but does not give the impression of being cheaply built.. When the batteries finally die, I'm going to replace them with Eneloop rechargeable batteries. If it handles those fine, I'll leave it at 5 stars. Some devices get confused with rechargeable batteries, and start falsely reporting that you need to change the batteries. If it does that I'll come back and knock off some stars.

I use to think this scale was really cool, until I noticed it's variations in weight within seconds. I step on it and get a weight. I move it 6 inches and it will increase by 3-4lbs. Move it again, changes by 2-3lbs. Move it again, same thing, weight changes again. There's no consistency, so I really don't know what my true weight is with this scale.

The scale absolutely does not work. I have re-calibrated it and tried different batteries; it displays the wrong weight for myself and my housemates as well. It is about 20lbs off and when you calibrate it, it always sways the values. I'm very disappointed in this product as it has resulted in a complete waste of space and money.. Amazon states I cannot return it because it was a "Deal of the Day" item. I will be especially wary of these items now...probably avoid buying them altogether.

review_title: Basic bathroom scale, looks good, and works well
review_body: The picture accurately captures how nice this scale looks, very sleek and easy to leave in a convenient place (rather than having to hide it away). It's super easy to use, just stand on the scale and wait until the numbers stop flashing. You don't have to "tap" on it first to turn it on, but it works that way too. The backlit numbers are large and easy to read. The numbers hold for a few seconds and scale shuts off automatically. I weighed myself several times within a few minutes, and I got the exact same results every time, so the readings are quite reproducible. For a basic bathroom scale, it looks good and works well.
Does not show correct weight. Scale is off by few pounds. I used a 10 lb and. 5 lb bag, but both time it showed weight few pounds off. Too bad this cannot be returned and now I am stuck with it.

Seems to work pretty well; is off from the scale at my gym by 1-2 pounds (I weigh myself there, walk home 15 minutes, weigh myself on this scale in the same clothes) It can be hard to get consistent readings, though, even on solid ground. But it will at least give you a good ball-park weight within 1-3 pounds, which is fine if you're just trying to maintain weight, or if you are trying to lose/gain and just commit to only weighing yourself every 1-2 weeks instead of daily (which can fluctuate anyway due to meals, digestion, water, etc.)

Bought this scale because it had good reviews and a fair price. I have been using it for over 6 months now and I have had zero issues.. You just step on the scale and in 2-3 seconds it displays your weight by flashing the LCD value. I have tested its accuracy and precision by stepping on and off the scale several times to see what kind of statistical variation I could record. So far, I have not seen anything statistically significant. Its an accurate scale and worth the money.. I recommend this scale. Its simple and reliable.

review_title: Nope. Completely inconsistent within a 30 second span
review_body: Not sure what these good reviews are about. This scale is awful. Weighs under my actual weight, if I move it and re-tare it, it changes by 10 lb. then if I get off and get back on, it’ll go up or down 5 lb.. This is junk.
Great quality for the price. I will definitely buy more, I was using bounty which is very expensive compared to this one.

Trying to reduce waste by using fewer disposable.  So far so good.  I love the way they clean.  Trying to create a new habit of reaching for the cleaning cloth rather than a paper towel or even a Handiwipe.

When I purchase a cleaning tool. I have expectations that the tool can be properly cleaned, sanitized, and stored either through heat or chemically with bleach.  The cloths  care labels state a cold water wash and no bleach.  While I happily ignored this and sanitized with hot water after an initial cold wash, I am not happy with the lengths required to uncurl and flatten the cloths after every wash. (this has occurred from the beginning).  I am relegating these to a single use  grunge cloth item.  Very disappointed because the remainder of a set of microfiber cloths purchased elsewhere years ago have held up well,  and I was hoping the same with this lot.
The material is somewhat thin & not fluffy as expected but can be used as a good polish cloth & also to clean up mess in the house...still a good buy.

Packaging was acceptable (nothing fancy) and shipping was quite okay . . no complains there. The clothes are well made with good quality material. I've been using it for car wash, all purpose wipes in the kitchen etc . . . works great. When dirty, just toss them in the washing machine and it comes out as good as new.

review_title: Very nice for cleaning many different things
review_body: Very nice for cleaning many different things.  And especially good for cleaning museum quality glass (on my framed pictures).  Dusting, washing windows and mirrors, polishing faucets, etc.

I grew up using old cotton t-shirts for rags, but these microfibre cloths are unbelievable. They are crazy good at removing scum, dirt, and dust. Cleaning plastic surfaces is finally as easy as it should be. I can put them on a swiffer and effortlessly dust or mop my floors. I have even started washing my dishes with them.. I will give these as a house-warming at every possible chance.. Two washes were necessary to remove fibre particles from the cloths.

review_title: This picky lady LOVES these clothes!
review_body: Am very picky when it comes to dish clothes so I must say I absolutely LOVE these cloths! Very absorbent, size is perfect to use as a dish cloth or as a dish towel, works great on windows and mirrors, as dust clothes and am sure I'll find many more uses. It's true that the ends roll up somewhat after washing but when folding I just stretch them out a bit and they go back to normal, not a problem. For the low price I will definitely order more to use in the bathroom as face towels then stock a few for later.

review_title: Cleans fingerprint oils from screens beautifully
review_body: Bought the 25-pack, which will probably last me a very long time.  Works great for cleaning fingerprints off screens of smartphone and tablets.  With regular cloths or even tissue paper, I found when I cleaned an iPad screen or my Galaxy phone, all it did was smoothly smear the oils from my fingerprints, not actually remove them.  These microfiber cleaning cloths leave the screen sharp and clear.  Wish I'd known about this long ago!

review_title: The good: Doesn't leave lint The bad
review_body: The good:  Doesn't leave lint. The bad:  These have a velcro like texture which causes them to stick together and I don't like the feeling of them on my hands.
What a great value! I needed a big pack of cleaning cloths & these fit the bill. I use them dry for dusting & wet to wipe up after the baby. I go through about 10/day so I appreciate a larger pack!

Love this bag, doesn't break and ties shut. Also having 90 is nice, less likely to run out. Wish they would put a different color tie or bag when there are about 6 left as a reminder, or even a piece of paper saying order more now.
The top of these bags seem to be perforated. Everytime we pull the drawstring to close it, the top of the bag rips and leaves a big hole so the bag won't close.

review_title: Inconsistent quality in my limited (2 order) experience.
review_body: I've purchased these twice through the subscribe and save program.  First box was great - no issues.  Second box now easily splits on the seams and has leaked as well.  Very disappointed in this.  I will likely cancel future orders as I now seem to have a box of bags that I can't trust.
Great value for the amount of garbage bags. Strong gets the job done.
I used to use glad all the time, but could afford the prices of them for so little. This was worth every penny. Now I dont have to worry about trash ripping through anymore

Nice bags! Never leak or break open. My kind of trash bag!

review_title: Does seem to improve taste, smell, and quality.
review_body: These filters do the job, I assume, they say they are doing. I live in a university dorm and the water from our sink is less than optimal in my opinion. To help combat the taste and chlorine smell, I bough the filter and a pitcher and have been getting non-smelly, unclorinated water which I love. The reason I took off one star is because of two reasons:. You need to replace the filter when your water does not taste nor smell "clean", do not always go by the indicator light on your pitcher. It's simply "pour sensitive" and just counts how many times you pour water from the pitcher and eventually says you need to change it.. 2) Despite following directions not to pour water directly onto the filter during filling, large specks of carbon like to detatch from the filter and float around inside the filtering basin. Not that big of a deal, but not awesome either.. Overall I am very satisfied with my filter and encourage the use of this product to help reduce plastic bottle waste.

review_title: Great product, easy to replace works well
review_body: Great and Easy to use replacements. I keep these around all the time as I use my Britas filters daily.. I have ordered many of them, and never had any problems.. -They are easy to open and used. BE SURE TO FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS- SOAK THE FILTER BEFORE USE. This will eliminate black specks floating in your water.. They last for the prescribed amount of gallons of water.. They are safely packaged and never tampered with which is important for water filters.. Great overall product, saves me tons of money on clean water!

This review is for the long last filter. At first the filter worked as expected. However, after a months use its performance has significantly deteriorated. The filter now takes a very long time to filter the water. I would fill up the pitcher before work and it would still be filtering after 9 hours.

review_title: Terrible filtration rate after just a few weeks
review_body: The idea of a longer lasting filter is fantastic, but these are fundamentally flawed. After only a few weeks of using them, the filtration rate slows to a crawl, taking multiple hours to fill a medium-size pitcher. I contacted Brita to have them send us a replacement, in case we just got a bad batch, but they had the same problem. I'll be returning to the regular filters. Hopefully Brita will come up with a Longlast model that works.

review_title: The carbon particles escape out of the filter and get ...
review_body: The carbon particles escape out of the filter and get into the "filtered" water. Followed the directions to a T. These are definitely an inferior product to those that come with the pitcher itself, as I had no issues with my original filter. I purchased the 3 pack in store and so far the 2 I have used leak carbon partials from the start.

These filters are great for filtering out the bad taste of city water. I use them in a small pitcher. The filters last about 6 months for me and I fill up the pitcher 2-6 times a day. I can't recommend the these filters enough. I wish I could have all of my water run through one of these filters. However, I live in an apartment and can't install a full filtration system. Having this is great.

review_title: Are these made to fit the Everyday Pitcher?
review_body: I bought these to use in a Brita 10 cup Everyday Pitcher.  These Longlast filters are an inch or more shorter than the standard ones and do not fit flush with the filter chamber in my pitcher. The water, as it filters, does not seem to pass through the filter evenly.  With my last filter the water came out in four consistent streams.. Am I using the right filter replacement for my model? I really want to like these.

These filters are wonderful!!. We live on an island and the water is treated with chlorine and who knows what else.. The chlorine smell and taste isn't there as well as there is no hard water residue left behind.. The water tastes great too!
Not sure if these are legit or fake.  Takes literally hours to filter my 8 Cup Brita.  So I have to fill the reservoir before I go to bed for water in the morning.  How is this possible???

review_title: the filtered water is great, which is the only reason it gets 2 ...
review_body: Add me to the list of people complaining about how painfully slow the longlast version is. Been using it for a couple months and it's always been slow, but now it literally is only letting a drop or two per second through. Sure, the filtered water is great, which is the only reason it gets 2 stars. But waiting hours to drink it kinda negates most of the benefits.
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B008R6LO5O/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_31

review_title: These don't soak up liquid like a lot of other paper plates
review_body: These don't soak up liquid like a lot of other paper plates. I use them nearly every day. I serve my toddler lunch on them because IF a plate happens to land on the floor it won't break. It's really nice.

These are always much more expensive at the stores in lesser quantitys due to the high quality of the plate.  Getting this in bulk saves me time and cost and these plates can hold everything you throw on them...

Love ordering paper products in bulk and this was one of my best orders. They are the larger plates that you can actually fit a large portion on for those with a good appetite and they are still strong and hold up!
Good for greasy, gooey or slimy stuff. The coating keeps stuff from sticking or soaking through the paper. These are excellent for using in the microwave to heat leftover pizza, sandwiches, etc.
No complaints. Great plates. Large enough for a great portion/fits pizzas, etc. and is very durable. Definitely great to have on lazy days when you don't want to do the dishes/have company over.
My favorite plates. Glad they are available through subscribe and save.
I bought these for my office-mates and they were so happy to have them as a go-to lunch option. They do not bend easily and are strong enough to hold a plate of delicious mac and cheese.
Great Dixie plates!!! Possibly the strongest on the market with a more smooth feel than the others, like those eco plates made by Chinet. Those are great but sometimes you need a pattern!!
These are better and cheaper than the Costco ones

review_title: Don't like the feel or way the product works
review_body: I do not like the way the product feels or works and wanted to return.  I purchased by mistake not realizing the consistency of the paper. When i wanted to return, the only way would be pay for the return shipping.  I thought as a prime member i get free returns.
It's sh** paper what can I say

These are great paper towels. They are really durable and tough. they really do feels like a cotton cloth. When wet they really hold up and don't fall apart. I could use it to clean the counter and then rinse it over and over again and it will hold up. My only problem with it is that on the roll, each sheet really clings to each other. What I mean is that I use a paper towel holder that is under the counter mount and the holder has the wand the holds the roll of paper towels. each time I try to tear off a sheet the whole wand would fall off from the base. It drives me nuts. That does not happen with other brands I use. usually the wand is so secure to the base I usually have trouble removing it but When I use the Viva towels it does that. I think it is because the really compress the roll so tightly or it is the the cloth like texture that creates friction to itself.
Ok product, after wiping there is lint everywhere. Holds up very well, but will not buy again.
I love these paper towels, they are the best.
fine
absorbant!
I love these paper towels!!! Once you use them you'll NEVER go back!!!
It was fine but I ordered too much
Cheap

I just bought a second one of these for my son's twin mattress.  My first one was for our king bed.  I have been happy with it and it seems to protect the mattress well.  4 years and no stains.  We have had accidents in my bed due to children falling asleep there.  No issues. The fact that I did buy a second one demonstrates that I have been pleased with it.  I do think that it breathes better than most.  For those afraid of a mattress pad failing, I would recommend layering them.  I also take the gerber or circo crib mattress covers which are really just a rectangle of protection and lay it under the child's bed sheet directly where we would have the most issues.  That way, you can just wash that little one rather than a big one in the case of an accident.  Wash according to directions.  I have always hung mine to dry.

This is a great product, reasonably priced, and very high quality. I washed it before putting it on my daughter's bed. The material washed well and held up great in the washer and dryer; not like the previous one I purchased from another manufacturer.  The padding added an extra layer of softness under the sheet while protecting the mattress from spills or other accidents. I ordered a full size and the fit was perfect for the 10 inch mattress.

review_title: It's soft, it's cool, and it's not crunchy!
review_body: I've had several mattress protectors over the years. Some were just a thin layer of white plastic that would ripe whenever 2 people climbed in the bed and it created heat. Then there were the ones that I'd buy at a major retailer with a hefty price tag and they'd hold heat and crumpled after 2 washes. But so far this mattress is surpassing the others, it's not hot, it's not noisy (I forgot to mention the sound that the plastic one made everytime I'd climb in and out of the bed, ugh), and honestly I forget it's there. It doesn't disturb my rest and it blends with the mattress perfectly. It's soft, it's cool, and it's not crinkly or crunchy! It's also reasonable priced.

This was entirely different than I had expected but I am pleased with the product so far. In the past I've purchased Waterproof Mattress Protectors that are quilted on the top (i.e. puffier, with a bit of padding). That was really what I expected.  I looked back at the product description and photos and what I received is what is pictured, although it's difficult to determine that from the pictures and description. (There is a photo of a woman laying on a bed with the protector on the bed. It isn't really close enough to see the actual surface detail of the product.) I would personally rather have a quilted top protector with these features the SafeRest one provides: breathable, noiseless, fitted sheet style, fits up to 14 inches. That being said, this protector is true to all of its claims - and to me it is VERY important that a protector be breathable and noiseless as well as waterproof - so many are NOT. I would definitely purchase this product again for a child or kids bed.

This is a very nice mattress protector! I washed it before putting on the bed and followed the instructions to dry on the low setting - it hardly took any time at all. The pockets are deep and so the protector should go on easily, no matter how big your mattress is. For what they cost these days, the cost of the protector is a small price to pay for knowing you have done your best to prolong the life of your purchase - and this protector is very reasonably priced. It arrived right on time. All in all, a good shopping experience!

review_title: Very good and great price - won't last forever and that's ok
review_body: I purchased this to replace an older, very similar pad that became worn on my husband's side of the bed. I guess he moves a lot in his sleep because the waterproof lining basically fell apart (again, not THIS pad, but a similar one). I cannot recall the manufacturer of that pad but it worked very well for many years and just got worn overtime. This pad seem nearly identical and I expect the same life out of it. That being said, my mattress still looks brand new and there is zero smell or wear issues with it- it seems brand new. That's why I searched out the SafeRest pad and the price was significantly lower on Amazon than other outlets. I would purchase this again (and in about 5 years I may have to.)

review_title: Great, would recomend to my grand mammy.
review_body: This is a comfy cover. I actually forgot it was on the bed until I saw that I never wrote this review. It took a week or so to get used to but now I dont even notice it. It does not make much noise or feel like plastic. It stays on the bed well and is easy to clean. It seems like a quality product and after several months of use it has held up well.

The mattress cover came within the expected time frame & was super easy to get on the new memory foam mattress we had just purchased. Just having the waterproof protection gives me piece of mind that my new mattress is going to last.. My husband is a "free perspirerer" & there are some nights where he has had to changes his bed clothes in the middle of the night because he has soaked what he was wearing.. The mattress cover has already protected the our memory foam mattress from getting just as damp as my husband & that's what I was looking for. Two thumbs up & five stars.

Noise and plastic feeling have been mentioned in previous reviews. I'd have to say there's a very slight plastic feel - not against your body but it's there when you move around. I found the terry top soft but a little on the warm side for me. We did wash them before using.. All that being said, as a protective cover that doesn't really "feel" protective, it does the job. On our first 2 nights in our brand new adjustable bed our pup had accidents. Really messy accidents. Nothing made it through to the mattress and it cleaned up without a stain. One other note - I'm pretty sure this will fit just about any mattress thickness. Very stretchy sides.. Overall I'd give it high marks.

review_title: the sheets go on easily over it and it doesn’t make a sound
review_body: We have a co-sleeping 11 month old, so not having a mattress protector is a recipe for disaster!  While the waterproofness of this protector has not yet been put to the test, I can remark on several other features. It fits very well on our thick double pillow top mattress, the sheets go on easily over it and it doesn’t make a sound. I was worried it would be hot, but we can’t really even tell it’s on!  Washing and drying was not a problem, just follow the instructions!  I sleep much better not having to worry that a leaky diaper (or other fluids produced by a little one) is going to ruin our mattress!
Great value.
quicker picker upper hasn't failed me yet!
Nice

They work

Cheap paper at quality price.
