review_title: It is comfortable and, so far
review_body: This pillow doesn't have an offensive or chemical odor. It is comfortable and, so far, has been durable. I would recommend.

review_title: Just as described...pretty common Euro size.
review_body: Just what I needed.  Right size and decent quality. As described.
I purchased for a pillow cover I also bought on Amazon. I was nervous it wouldn't fit or not look poofy enough, but it does the job. Perfect for what I needed!

review_title: So glad I got this stuffer pillow and thanks for recommending ...
review_body: So glad I got this stuffer pillow and thanks for recommending  sizing up one size from the pillow case, it gives it a nice plump effect......not wimpy, or slouchy at all.
Came unwrapped. Due to this, I had to wash it. When I did, all of the cotton come out. Waste of money.

review_title: Exactly what I wanted at great price
review_body: Great value and great product.  I have purchased several and they fit the covers I have for this size pillow perfectly and stay fluffy a love them!  Will continue to purchase when I need more
I ordered the 26 inch pillow and received a pillow that is 22 inches. The material is VERY cheap! Look at the photos to see this cheap material.
Do not recommend.  I've had these pillows out for over a week now and they still haven't shaped out.  They are just not the best quality.

I made this purchase to fill a custom-made cover. It is nice and fluffy. There is very little to comment about as it is a throw pillow. However, it is worth noting that the texture of this pillow resembles the ones received on airplanes. Once it's under the cover, you will never know the difference.
Works great for my decor pillows, I just buy cute covers separately
Looks great in oir living room. I placed these lights against the blinds and it's starting to look like Christmas! Great price too!

review_title: Very disappointed as I needed 8-9ft as advertised
review_body: The lighted area is not as long as advertised- its closer to 7ft. Very disappointed as I needed 8-9ft as advertised.. This information IS in the descruption, but in case you missed it the length of the unlighted section to the power plug is very short. You'll need an extension cable to use on most windows unless your outlet is right next to what you need.

review_title: Holds up to rain, snow and being frozen
review_body: Installed it outside before Christmas.  Still working over a month later.  It has been rained on, snowed on, frozen. Good deal.. It was longer than expected, leaving the ends on the floor where they might get stepped on.  Probably have been stepped on, honestly, but no problems.
After a month or so of use one whole string is out, and a few of the individual LEDs have gone as well. Pretty disappointed.

Looks awesome & romantic : ) my husband loves it. The only thing I didn't like was that it has 6 different settings (twinkle effect, flashing effect, etc.) & it won't stay on 1 setting, except when you put it on the still setting.

review_title: Hang as is! Then take apart lol
review_body: Would buy again again and again if didn’t already have two sets set up in my living room. BUT don’t make my mistake. I unwraveled them before I hung up and it became a huge tangled mess. Made a 10 minute job into a 25 minute job. Felt very very dumb. But once I untangled and hung I was ecstatic with the results!
Using them for my Christmas decoration.

review_title: These lights are beautiful! Wonderful edition to our front windows
review_body: These lights are beautiful! Wonderful edition to our front windows. Longer than we needed them to be, but just wrapped the ends with a twist tie and they look great!

I bought the lights plug them in and they worked, hung them up and after about 5 minutes of them being on the lights out of no where shut off. I tried a different electrical outlet and still nothing also tried to screw each bulb back in to see if a bulb just needed to be screwed back in but still nothing, also tried messing with the wires to see if i could put something back in place but nothing could get them back on. guess there cheap for a reason. But gotta day they were beautiful when they did work for that 5 minutes.

I was very excited to get the lights. It was a little time consuming hanging them up but they looked beautiful afterward. After a couple of days, the lights started flickering and turning on/off. Finally, they stopped working altogether. I was very disposed to have only enjoyed them for a couple of days before they gave out.

review_title: I am not happy at all with this steamer
review_body: I am not happy at all with this steamer. It spits hot water out of spout & got my floor all wet, each fill did not last 10 minutes, & did not get the wrinkles out. I filled twice & had same results both times. I am going  to send back which is a pain. I should get a full refund & just dispose of it.
The steamer works great!

review_title: This product does not work! Not sure if I ...
review_body: This product does not work! Not sure if I just happened to get a defective one, but as soon as the water heats up, it just shoots ALL of the water out of the steam holes! I made sure not to fill past max fill line, but as soon as the water is hot it immediately shoots all of the water in the steamer out so it's empty and can't be used.

I bought one for myself and one for my mother. We both love ours! It’s very easy and convenient to use. I didn’t have any problems with water spilling out. It heats up VERY quickly. Small reminder, this is NOT an iron. Don’t expect iron results, but you can expect great results :)
I can say this works better and faster than my stand-alone steamer that cost 6x as much. Heats up quick and does get rid of wrinkles.
Great little steamer. Heats quickly. Hold enough to steam one really wrinkly garmet, or a couple garments with light wrinkles. Worked great on my new curtains!

Works as represented.  Convenient, lightweight, easy to use.  Small enough to travel with, though haven't done that (yet; just got it).  Capacity limited by size, but is adequate.  Time will tell about durability.

review_title: I was really happy with this steamer but it broke down after 6 ...
review_body: I was really happy with this steamer but it broke down after 6 months of irregular use.. NOTE: I ended up receiving a new replacement one and it works fine. Hoping it works well for more than last!
Dripped. I returned it.

It’s works pretty decent for the price paid! Works really well after like 5-10 minutes of steaming, but when first starting, it takes a couple tries to get the wrinkles out. Other then that it’s pretty nice! I definitely would recommend especially if you need to get the job done but don’t have much cash on you.

This shower curtain is very nice.  It has magnets it in that help keep it in the tub since we have a curved shower bar. A nice frosted curtain that still lets in a lot of light.  We use it as a liner behind a fabric curtain.

review_title: -It did not smell bad when I opened it
review_body: I have the frosted Liba shower curtain.  I have had this for a few months and have taken note of the things that are important to me when I buy shower curtain liners.. -It did not smell bad when I opened it.  It did not need to be aired out before being hung in the bathroom.. -It is thick enough to be a stand alone shower curtain, although I do use it as a liner.. -It has metal grommets so it remains on the shower curtain hooks without ripping off.  The grommets have not rusted over time and still look nice after a few months.. -It has not developed mildew or any sliminess.. This is a good shower curtain liner that I would purchase again.  I was given the opportunity to purchase this product  at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.  My opinions are my own and I am not compensated for reviews.  This is a shower curtain that I absolutely would recommend to my friends and family.

We bought this a few weeks back to replace our older and worn out liner. This one is great, the bottom corners stay in place so that the curtain isn’t flailing open in the shower. It’s also incredibly easy to clean and does a great job not holding on to soap scum on its own. It doesn’t require much maintenance other than just a quick rinse down when you’re done showering.

review_title: I bought stuff like an adult!
review_body: I've had it for a while, wanted to make sure it works where I live. My previous one I bought at a store wasn't mildew resistant and it got covered in mold due to poor vents and a humid environment. This one works great, so far it still looks brand new and I've had it for a while, it's a lot thicker then my previous one. I'm really happy that my second time buying one I went for quality, because I feel like a real adult in my first place with keeping gross things away and things clean.

Very nice 12 grommet shower curtain liner. I don't recall how many liners I looked at (for my 12 grommet curtain) that either wouldn't say how many grommets they had or only had 10. I wouldn't mind if this liner were just a bit thicker.. however, overall, and considering the very reasonable cost I am very pleased with this curtain and will buy again when the time comes.

review_title: The nice thing about this is that they are weighted to ...
review_body: I typically have to replace these yearly, regardless of whether or not the are "mildew/microbe resistant". They all end looking the same a year in, with discoloration at the bottom. The nice thing about this is that they are weighted to prevent the curtain from blowing in during your shower

review_title: Almost a year and still clean, great buy, way better than cheap Walmart liners
review_body: I’m pleasantly surprised to have had this curtain almost a year and see little to no residual soap scum, let alone mold or mildew. I clean it monthly with a shower cleaner followed by mold and mildew inhibitor, but even so, it’s impressed me by far outlasting the cheap Walmart liners I used to get that had to be replaced every few months. Highly recommend.
PROS. Totally mold and mildew resistant!. Affordable. Thick/Heavy/weighted. CONS. None!. Please mark this review as HELPFUL if it assisted you in making a decision!

Great shower curtain.  Not too thick, see through plastic works really well instead of opaque fabric so more light comes through.  Magnets along the bottom are great.  Grommets nice too.  Very happy with product.
Wish it was a little longer due to the height of my shower, but works perfect! Make sure you check the width and height of the product, prior to purchasing!

The weight varies depending on where you stand and how you distribute your weight (heels, toes, whole foot, etc.) After two years, the scale stopped providing accurate weights. You can stand on it and get one weight. Get off and back on and weigh 40 pounds lighter (or heavier). We tried new batteries and get the same result. I expect scales to last longer than two years.

Although the weight is accurate, it is difficult to read the numbers while standing on the scale and I have to get off and band down close to see it. It's not about needing glasses or such, it's that the light is too bright and the blue is too dark which masks the numbers. I wouldn't recommend purchasing this scale. I would return it, but I threw the box away. I'm a very unsatisfied customer.

I love the look of this scale and it's very sturdy. However, it occasionally gives an incorrect reading. It's always a significant difference, though, so you know to just step off and on again. The instant reading is great. With my last one, I had to tap it, wait until it went to 0, and then step on. It took forever, so I'm very happy with this one!

Just got it today, works great so far, will update my review if I find anything else!. Update: have been using for a couple days now, works fantastically. I was able to walk into the scale and as long as I wasn't shifting my weight, I got a consistent reading down to the decimal point. If you get on and don't stand straight or start shifting your weight you may get an inaccurate result. This would ring true for any scale.. The design is nice and clean with a sleek glass top and clear display, would look great in any bathroom.

ACCURATE scale! I happened to go to the doctor the day after it arrived. My weight on this scale was spot on with my doctors scale! Some of the reviews I read were negative on the accuracy of this scale which caused me to hesitate before I actually decided to purchase it. I'm so glad I bought it... I love everything about it! It's just beautiful and well made!

review_title: The scale is sleek and nice. It is nice to be able to step ...
review_body: The scale is sleek and nice.  It is nice to be able to step on the scale and get an almost instant rating.  However, I have kept this scale side by side with my old scale to check accuracy and this scale seems to fluctuate a lot.  It may be .2 or .4 but it is not consistent.  If you are just looking to check your weight once a week and are not concerned with .2 of a pound this will work great.  However, if you need to keep a closer watch on your weight and know that is accurate because you are evaluating how various foods react to your body, it probably is not the best choice.

It's taller than my old one(that I got from walmart), the batteries are easy enough to get, (which I will this weekend,) and it's ability to weigh as a digital one is remarkably fast. I barely stepped on it and it immediately weighed that pressure. I stepped on, and although I moved, unlike my old one, it adjusted to that pretty quickly till it seemed I held still long enough for it. Instructions were simple. Pull out plastic battery-blocker from the battery door, place on a dry floor, and boom! Measured.. For KG, there's a button that literally has, 'kg,' above it. Easy swap.. As it says, comes with a measuring tape, (which everyone interested in health and fitness should focus on!) and as other reviews have said... this thing is wonderful.

Sleek.  Goes with any decor. The scales these were bought to replace a scale that would give a different number every time you got off and back on.  Even five pounds different in thirty seconds. These scales exactly the same every time.  These were a needed purchase in our household.  Very pleased.  Great value for price.

I am really impressed with this scale, especially considering how cheap it is.  I don't think it is the greatest scale ever, but for the price it is solid.  I usually push it once and allow it to 0.0 out and turn off before I do my first weigh-in.  I usually weigh twice in a row from there to make sure my weigh-in is accurate t is usually consistent between the two weights.  It is fairly light and easy to position in a flat area.

review_title: Initially I loved it because of the number it showed but on a real note, this is a great scale and I'm crazy picky about scales!
review_body: So this is the second scale I've purchased in about 2 months or so. I really wanted an accurate scale for a while now, simple in that it wouldn't log my weight for the next person to see (I'm a young single female - I don't want unsavory to my standards weight numbers popping up when some boy comes over and goes to my bathroom haha) Call me typical but that's probably the only area I'd say I could be called such lol.. Anyway back to the actual point of writing this - I scoured through so many reviews before I finally bought my first scale and it already does not work any longer (it is under warranty but I personally think it's a pain to send back something that is somewhat minimal on the scale of expensive items) so I decided to just buy a new one and not be crazy about trying to find exactly  which ones best.. However, I will say that if you're like me and feel weary at times when seeing a ton of reviews written by people who received a discount or free product in exchange, I'm here to be one of the ones who paid full price and have no incentive to be writing this. I just want to help others like me who never know what's quality and what is all smoke and paid reviews with no true assurance of whether you're going to end up with a good or bad product.. This scale I chose rather quickly after seeing it was rather popular items in percentage of high satisfaction (without any sneaky 50% 5 stars 30% 1 star type items like many others I've come across) and also because basically it met exactly what I was looking for. Normally I would've shopped around longer but considering the scale I spent forever deciding on broke just by trying to change the batteries, I just went for it.. First, let me say that I'm only biased at my first love reaction to this scale due to the display of such a pleasing number upon first stepping on it. Haha :) but on a more serious note, it's proven to be an optimal well-functioning product; it's very sleek, came in perfect packaged condition, and for me is consistent in accuracy of my day to day weighing. Before writing this I saw reviews stating it wasn't accurate for others so I actually just went to test it tonigh and it came back the exact same weight to the .0 digit which I honestly wasn't even expecting nor planning to fault it for if it hadn't. If a scale is consistent within 1 pound, I consider it good quality so this is just bonus points once again!. But to end this accidentally long review here - honestly, if you want a scale that gives an accurate weight, looks very nice and minimal/sleek, and doesn't have a ton of extras that you aren't needing or wanting like myself, I would absolutely say buy this one. I'm very glad that I did and am about to go admire my current weight after submitting this!
Great product and price!! Cheaper than Target!!!
Nice and thick. No half-sheets, which creates some waste.

review_title: The Best Paper Towel. Just Right
review_body: Strong but soft paper towel. It doesn't  feel like a wet noodle when wet like that major name brand paper towel.
Set this up on auto delivery.  Strong and it very absorbent.
I'm really happy with the quality of these paper towels! Super absorbent!
Great for the price have them on auto ship!
Good price. Great product.
Great value. I thought the towels would be flimsy. Not so. Happy with purchase and will buy again as needed.
Love!
Great consistency towels and affordable price!
Very good with odors
great for holding garbage until disposal.
Great buy Great smell
very strong
I love always having fresh trash!
initially a strong smell while replacing the previous bag.
love the smell of the bags but the elastic is not that great on them.
Love garbage bags that smell good.
Smell great when you first open the bag but doesn't seemed to help with an odor.
I buy all the time

review_title: Great but don't use bleach nor wash them with anything else. I subscribe and then throw them away now, but I've earned the right
review_body: These are wonderful -- I confess I "subscribe" to them and use them for the dirtier, greasier cleanups and then toss them rather than wash them. But when I was caring for my ill husband, the color-coding helped with bathing and I washed them then. Just don't use bleach, wash blue with blue, etc, don't wash with anything else. My well-meaning son washed them all together with bleach, and their "magnetic" slightly antiseptic qualities were ruined!

review_title: I have purchased many different brands of microfiber cloths and I think these are a great deal. They are fairly thick and durabl
review_body: Decent quality microfiber cloths. I have purchased many different brands of microfiber cloths and I think these are a great deal. They are fairly thick and durable and clean very well. Some of the other brands were thinner and did not last nearly as long. Also when detail a car in the hot sun the heat didn't go right through these like some of the other brands.. These were purchased to detail golf carts and cars.
Started falling apart after first washing

These are wonderful cloths that can be used to clean and shine just about anything!!  I use them to clean my glass stovetop, wash windows with just water ( no more harsh chemicals), sinks, mirrors, bathroom and kitchen tile, dusting furniture, tv tablet and computer screens, counter tops, and other things that I'm sure I am forgetting.  I toss them into the washing machine and dryer and they are ready to go all over again.  These microfiber cloths are truly one of the best inventions ever!!  I highly recommend them for cleaning anything and everything!!
Love these towels. Very durable, easy to wash, reusable... They are very soft, I use the whites to clean my face, blue for clean the house and the yellow as a napkins... just perfect

Great for the price. The instructions say to wash them before use and I would definitely recommend you wash them before use first. They aren't very absorbent but do a great job for cleaning the interior of your car and drying the outside. The fact they come 24 to a pack and are pretty cheap makes it nice to be able to throw them out if they get too dirty.

Woohoo! These microfiber cloths make me excited to clean. The size is perfect (not too big, not too small) for everyday use. The pricepoint is exceptional--less expensive than Wal-mart and better quality. While the thought have receiving 24 microfiber cloths was daunting, I love that there are so many. It helps ensure that I regularly change cloths ensuring better hygiene. In our house, we use the colors as a coding system (white for kitchen, yellow for bathroom, blue for other stuff). They are washable, but they definitely work best when they are fresh out of the package. Don't put them in the drier! Don't use fabric softener!
Great low priced option. We use these to clean the house and they are holding up well. Soft and won't scratch nice furniture and glass.

review_title: Great mid weight cloths - Good Buy
review_body: these cloths are different colors but they are all the same middle weight material.  i have assigned glass cleaning to the white, counters to the blue and yellow to heavy more dirty tasks.  the labels are irritating and i carefully cut them all off so when doing mirrors etc i don't have that drag on the surface.  also this helps when laundering.  they wash very nicely with most staining coming out depending on what they were used for.  having 36 is splendid and this is a great buy.  at first i thought i was going to have to get some of different weights but these do it all - love them.

These are not the Brita refills that I bought in a store. I have a cover that tells me when to change filter, but this version comes to a point sort of, sand my counting cover will not fit over it. Next time I will make I buy the right kind.

New version water flows through faster, and still has partial chlorine taste. Old version was not like this. It seems that Brita is cutting corners now so i returned filters and decided on Zerowater instead.

review_title: Another defective item. Was QA downsized?
review_body: Trickled to a drop a few seconds after about a week of use, like many other reviewers. Wow Brita, product design and signoff really screwed up royally, and I mean big parade royally. Been enjoyedyour products for years, despite being not the best in lab tests.

I purchased these thinking it would be great not to replace the filter every 2 months. I have been using my new filter less than a week and from the start, it takes more than an hour to filter one standard size pitcher. Usually when using a new one, it filters water pretty quickly and only when it needs to be replaced does it filter slower. This filter started off filtering slower than the standard replacement filters do after months of use.

review_title: Bought these because they were recommended by Wirecutter
review_body: Bought these because they were recommended by Wirecutter. Literally takes up to six hours for water to go through the filter. What is the reason for this? We've now had to go and buy the old kind of Brita filters and have had to simply absorb the cost of these. Extremely disappointed.

Love my Britta, these filters are super easy to install.  I wish there was some place to record when you changed it last, or just remind me when to change it.  I love how they do not leave little charcoal bits floating in your water.  They are quite economical, especially compared to purchasing filters for your refrigerator.  If I didn't need that one for ice, I would do with out, and just use my britta

review_title: I bought these because they're the only Brita filters that ...
review_body: I bought these because they're the only Brita filters that remove lead from drinking water. After about 2 weeks they stopped filtering and it would take about a day to get an entire pitcher's worth. I threw it out and put in the second filter from the pack. The same thing happened about 2 weeks later also. I wrote to Brita who said they had "reformulated" to fix the issue and sent me a free 2-pack. So far I haven't had any issues with the new filters direct from Brita. My problem going forward will be trusting that whatever filters I purchase won't have the same issue.

review_title: Not the Brita I used to know.
review_body: DONT BUY THIS HORRIBLE PRODUCT!. I've been using this system for three years so I'm familiar with it. I ordered a three pack and noticed Brita made some changes -- terrible idea!. The water it produces still reeks of chlorine and now the package says, "a healthy level of flouride." I'm not sure if consumers understand, there is no healthy level of flouride for the human body  It's a toxic chemical that should be spit out of your mouth after use.  I never use it.  Do your own  fluoride research is horrible for humans.. So here's the absolute deal breakers or me ... I make my own kombucha like product and the truth is, my product will NOT culture in chlorinated water. No, it won't. Chlorine kill bacteria and good bacteria.  Usually my product it will culture over night.  Well the culture have been killed by this  so called "filtered" water.  So if the culture gets killed you get the idea.  In my world Brita, now you fall under the category of untrustworthy corporate liars! Made in China I'm sure.. This world is falling apart.. Don't buy this lousy product.

USELESS; WILL NOT BUY AGAIN. In the "space saver" pitcher (no fancy lights or gizmos), it worked for two weeks, then slowed to a crawl. Brita's response to the 40+ unhappy reviewers says "We are looking into the clogging you reported and believe that it’s due to homes with highly aerated water, which most people don’t have in their homes.". Agree with other dissatisfied customers: why doesn't Amazon sell the regular filters anymore?

review_title: Does not do a good job of filtering water
review_body: Ok, so they are durable, easy to install and easy to use...but the real question should be "do they really filter the water well?". And the answer is NO!. After 5 or 6 uses, the water starts tasting crappy again.
This is great for summer.  You have a good supply for those picnics  and suppers in the yard.  I love my dishes,  but so tired of loading and unloading them after each meal.  Use and toss.
Perfect for their intended use! Well built and durable, I just wish they threw out themselves :). Highly recommended!
Brace yourself. It's a lot of plates. The plates arrived in a box. I unpacked them and I'll use them as needed. This is a lot of plates so be sure u have space to store them.

review_title: These are good, not as good as the Dixie Ultra
review_body: These are good, not as good as the Dixie Ultra. The Ultra seem to be thicker and more sturdy. With these ones I have to either double them or use one of those Paper Plate Holders.

These plates are horrible. Normally we get Dixie plates from Costco, but I decided to get them in my prime pantry box. I really wish I wouldn't have. They don't hold up as well as the others, and seem to fall apart easily.
Thin and not as sturdy because of that but functional still

review_title: These plates are large like a standard dinner plate
review_body: These plates are large like a standard dinner plate. The pattern is nice and they have enough weight to hold up even under messy food. I thought there were going to be too many plates in this pack, but it was perfect for a party and then some left over for later!
Usually prices on paperplates online is ridiculously high.  This is a little better price wise but I spent much time looking since my orders are almost all onlin

review_title: No Leaking Through, Strong to Hold Up to Food, and of Good Quality
review_body: These works just fine, don't leak through, and are pretty solid to hold up food.  Quality plates that were used with wet foods and tomato sauce, so I would recommend these!
Great products always come from Dixie. These plates are no exception and the timing on the shipping was excellent.  Would recommend and will reorder as needed.  Thanks.

review_title: These are superior to overpriced national  store brands
review_body: We (shamefully) go through a lot of paper towels. The cheap ones aren't worth the money so I always look for coupons for Bounty or Viva, large bulk packs. Presto! popped up on my app and I compared prices at different stores for the name brands. I compared length, package content, etc. As much as I love Amazon, I took a chance. I love these towels. They are strong and absorbent. If someone didn't see the packaging they wouldn't know it was a big overpriced store brand. I highly recommend these towels. I put the toilet paper on subscribe and save as well, I will review on Jan. 4th!

The diameter of the hole of these rolls is 40mm. The outer diameter of the roll is 140mm. The halfway point between those is a diameter of 90mm. The average circumference of each layer of paper towel is therefore pi x 90 = 307.44mm. Using a micrometer I have determined that the thickness of a single paper towel is .64mm. Since there are 50mm of thickness on each side of the roll, there must be 78.125 layers of paper towel, i.e. 78 layers with an overlap of .125 of the circumference of an average layer. With an average circumference of 307.44mm, the total length of the towels must be 24018.75mm. The width of each sheet is 6", or 152.4mm. This means there must be 157.6 sheets. Rounding off, 158 is a fair representation of the number of sheets on each roll.. I can therefore confirm that these rolls are, according to my calculations, indeed huge.. They also seem to be strong and absorbent, but I haven't confirmed that mathematically.

-higher price than Kirkland and other commercial brands. -thinner than those brands mentioned....would say it felt like a thick and strong “toilet paper” Not paper towel. -been a loyal Prime member for several years..disappointed. ...gave away to our friends to try in case they might like it (still helping Presto advertise) but yes $40 gone in the air! will not buy again

review_title: They are good. Not as strong as bounty so don't expect ...
review_body: I only buy bounty but saw the reviews and wanted to try something new.. They are good. Not as strong as bounty so don't expect them to soak up everything. The are also not as soft but not super hard like others.  No odor like others. Leaves a little lint behind.

I love all things Amazon, so I was thrilled to hear about their private-label household line, Presto! I am really picky about paper towels and almost exclusively purchase .  , but I was intrigued to try this out. And I'm pleasantly surprised that it is a really close, high-quality substitute! My favorite feature is the Flex-A-Size, because we usually don't need a whole sheet for household messes (cleaning little faces and hands, wiping up a spill, etc...)  It has a subtle design with no logo, which I also really like. I think we'll be making the switch as the price is very comparable, too, at $39.99 for 24 count (12 packs of 2 huge rolls.)

review_title: The towels were fine, but more expensive than leading brands at local ...
review_body: The towels were fine, but more expensive than leading brands at local stores. So I discontinued my Subscribe & Save of this item.

I wanted to give these a try because many reviewers compared them to Bounty, which I find to be the best for the kitchen. Presto is wonderful and if I didn't see the label I would think they were Bounty. A great paper towel at a bargain price!
costco kirkland is worth it. quality is ok paper is not thick

Not really sure what to say.  They’re huge rolls of paper towels.  They dry hands and clean spills.  Good quality, the rolls last forever even with 3 kids, 2 dogs, and an infantryman haha!  It’ll take forever to run out, but I’ll definitely buy again.
Strong and good quality paper towels. I love the flex size option. The product was delivered a day sooner than promised. I am very satisfied with the purchase and transaction.

review_title: This has so far proven a wonderful purchase. I got this before my first baby ...
review_body: This has so far proven a wonderful purchase. I got this before my first baby arrived for all the baby goo and so far this has kept milk and baby poo off my mattress! I’m so glad my expensive mattress is saved from stains and wetness. I’ll be getting more in the future. Also it’s not hot to sleep on, and I even had this on when I was extremely hot during my pregnancy. Highly suggest this purchase.

We love it! It does not change the feel of the bed, soft, smooth and is a nice addition to protecting our matress. We have dogs and they like to mark there territory and this protector saved us in the first week of our new matress. The fit is nice, secure and most importantly it is comfortable.it was important to me not to be sleeping of something that feels like a plastic protector and this exceeds the goal for comfort and natural feel.

This is the second mattress protector I have purchased, and I am thrilled at the quality.. I have used them before, as I have a cat with litterbox issues, and let's face it. It's LOADS easier to wash a sheet than a mattress.. This cover is ideal; not only is it super protective but you don't even know it's there! You wouldn't think by looking at it that it's waterproof. But it is, withOUT using a vinyl backing! I have used that style too but it always bothered me feeling like I was sleeping on a toddler's or hospital bed - that noise of the sheet drove me nuts. This is noiseless, lightweight, and durable.. As a bonus it's allergen protective too. Definitely a great deal, and I would highly recommend to anyone.

review_title: Perfect for Expectant Mothers - and Beyond!
review_body: We bought this mattress cover at the advice of a friend - she said it was a really good idea to get a mattress protector when you are pregnant, in case your water breaks, which can ruin a mattress.  I was indeed in bed when my water broke and am very glad all that fluid was not soaked up into our mattress!  Afterwards my MIL took it off and washed it, and we've put it back on the bed in case anything else child-related threatens our mattress!  It is not noticeable at all (no noise or difference in our sheet's friction).  It's a great product, and a good value.

review_title: Haven't tested waterproof but fit and feel are spot on
review_body: Does not add additional heat to mattress.  We have a memory foam mattress so heat dissipation is already a concern for us and I barely notice this cover is even on.  It sheds heat well and is not loud (contrary to some other reviews).  We haven't had to test how waterproof it truly is yet and hope we never have to.  We adopted a young american bulldog and were worried about him having accidents in the bed so in my opinion this is cheap insurance for our mattress.. As some others have said the instructions for washing this say to dry it on very low heat but I have read many recommendations that say to NEVER DRY IT.  Just let it air dry, the heat from the dryer affects the waterproof membrane and apparently it doesn't take much.

I find mattress protectors essential in my home, as I don't like exposing my mattresses to the wear-and-tear of life and spillage. Enter, this mattress protector! It's soft on the top-side and has the waterproof material on the underside. This mattress protector fits the depth of my mattress easily, and my personal favorite feat, is that it's not noisy nor does it feel like plastic. I don't feel like or hear sounds as if I were sleeping on a plastic-wrapped chair! It's an awesome mattress protector, and the price was right.  The business, as I've learned, is small and family-owned, so I'm happy to support this business who makes awesome products! I love my mattress protector; it's already protected the bed from sodas and even (TMI Warning) menstrual leakage. Rest assured that your mattress will stay safe and clean.

This is a nice product.  The big factor for us was how deep the sides were.  Our previous mattress cover said that it was rated for our thickness of mattress but it didn't fit well at all.  This one fits great and even has a bit extra room.  Living in the South it gets humid and unless you run the AC non-stop you get sweaty sometimes and that's just how it is around here.  We have "air you can wear" so we use a waterproof mattress cover to keep the mattress nicer for longer and this one works well.

He grew!  Yes, grandson's have a habit of growing and at 6' 2" the old twin daybed in our guest room would no longer suffice for him or my other tall descendants.  I didn't need or want a really expensive new mattress, but did want something comfortable in an extra-long twin.  This mattress took 3 days for the foam to puff up and fill out the full advertised length.  It also needed a couple of days to air out the foam smell.  It is not super firm, but it is very comfortable.  More comfortable than the previous twin mattress that cost much more!  It arrived on schedule, cleanly packaged.  It definitely was a good buy and is exactly what I needed for the grandchildren that are all taller than I am.  You will need a platform or some type of frame, but it is a nice mattress!

review_title: Fits Well and Doesn’t Affect Mattress Comfort
review_body: Bought this to protect a new queen sized mattress. My wife and I were told that the mattress would be covered by the warranty so long as we did not stain it and recommended us buying a mattress protector. Rather than buy an overpriced one from the salesman we opted to look on amazon.. This is one of the first options that came up on the search and it had a lot of reviews with a majority of them being favorable. Ordered it and a few days later we had it in time for the arrival of our new mattress.. I was concerned that the protector would either be plasticky or like paper and would feel stiff or make noises on our new mattress. I am pleased to say that it is neither stiff or loud and we don’t lose out on any of the benefits of the new mattress. It installed as easy as a bed sheet and as you can see from one of my pictures, it easily fit over the very thick mattress.. I haven’t tested the water/stain proofing yet which is the major reason we bought this but I will test it with some water and update my review. Right now I like it and am glad I didn’t spend twice as much from the salesman. For the fact that it doesn’t change the comfort of my mattress while protecting it and does it for a reasonable price I can happily recommend it.

review_title: but I was amazed. As soon as I saw the spill I ...
review_body: I hardly ever write reviews, but I was amazed. As soon as I saw the spill I just assumed, this is the moment when I will regret wasting money on a mattress protector.... I was wrong I want to buy another one!!

review_title: Subscribe and save bounty paper towels is the best productivity hack!
review_body: I’m unashamedly a loyal bounty customer! I am a paper towel junkie because I refuse to wash my hands and dry them on a community towel that has had other hands dirty and clean as well as Lord only knows what else wiped, spilled, or cleaned up with it. So of course I have tried every brand out there both generic and name brand and I can promise you these are the best there is and when you actually compare the price to what you spend on the generic brands, you will see that the initial cost of the generics is lower but you need twice as many towels to equal what you use of the high quality bounty towels, it’s actually less expensive to just get the bounty to begin with and save yourself the extra trip to get more of generic you ran out of halfway through the month!
The best out there.

These are absolutely stunning!!!  I wanted to use these lights for Christmas, but I love them so much I will use them all year around.

review_title: They are adorable and one of my favorite purchases this year
review_body: Exactly as pictured! I was worried the cord would be too short based on other reviews. It was not, it could have even been shorter for my space. The different settings all work, left on for a few days by accident and they didn't give off any heat. They are adorable and one of my favorite purchases this year!

It is beautiful on my window curtains! Lovely twinkle fairy-tale feel to the living room that i love! Only bad thing is i have to click the button 8X to get it to the normal still light setting and not the flashing options.

review_title: These are awesome! I bought these to set up a wall ...
review_body: These are awesome! I bought these to set up a wall of lights and sheer curtain behind my little cousin's bed and she loves it. It replaced her nightlight and she uses these in all her Snapchats with other friends. There's multiple settings, too.

review_title: Super bad packaging & first impression, but at least the lights work
review_body: The product itself seems to be okay, long strings of lights and everything works, though as other people commented not as plentiful as in the pictures. Immediately had a very bad impression of the product from open, really beat-up packaging, cardboard all broken and the plug/controller wasn't even inside; it seemed like a very old or used/returned item upon first receiving. Makes company seem less professional and trustworthy, so I was glad that the product worked.. Agree with other reviewers that the placement of the controller for the lights is not very convenient, more toward the top of wherever you hang the lights. Also wish that there was an on/off switch along with the controller options on the controller box.

Soon as they came in I checked them out because of so many bad experiences I've had with other orders from Amazon. These lights are BEAUTIFUL & I absolutely LOVE them. I'm an event planner & I ordered these for an upcoming event.

Beautiful!! I have them hanging up behind my tapestry and they light up my room just enough at night. Not too heavy to where I couldn’t easily hang them. Love the different modes too. Only complaint I would have is that I wish there was an off button & you didn’t have to unplug them to turn them off, but that’s a small thing compared to how great these turned out.

review_title: Big fan of these Shower Curtain Liners!
review_body: I got one for my daughter's shower and it stays clean, so I decided to get another for my shower! Does not stain, easy to clean, and durable!

review_title: SUPERB QUALITY! NO SMELL!!! 5 STARS, YES!!
review_body: IN MY LIFETIME I HAVE HAD 100'S OF SHOWER CURTAINS SO I SHOULD KNOW!. NO SMELL, SO I FELT SAFE USING IT RIGHT AWAY. ALSO THE QUALITY OF THE PLASTIC MATERIAL IS SO GOOD, THAT WHEN I FINISH AND WIPE IT CLEAR OF WATER AFTER MY SHOWER, THE WATER COMES ROLLING OFF FAST. I LIKE THAT, SO THAT I DON'T HAVE TO KEEP WIPING AND WIPING AS IN THE PAST.  i'M THINKING OF GETTING ANOTHER ONE IN ADVANCE FOR THE FUTURE, IN CASE THEY EVER SELL OUT I'LL BE. PREPARED. I LIKE CLEAR SHOWER CURTAINS ONLY. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS BRAND AND AM GRATEFUL I FOUND IT WHILE SEARCHING.. THANKYOU MERCHANT LIBa!

It's a shower curtain...not much to say really. Its a clear thick plastic with magnets at ends. Seems  sturdy. Of course it's very wrinkled from transit and I suppose that will take a while to clear itself out. I hope it resists the mold as it claims but time will tel. Happy for now.

I don't love the extremely weak magnets on the bottom - the curtain billows and will touch you when you shower. Some people are really averse to this, so if that's you, I'd look elsewhere! This is my second curtain - I have not had any issues but I have two bathrooms now. These do get some haziness from the hard water/soap scum at the bottom, but I have never had any issues with mold, mildew or smell.

review_title: so good. I usually use the cheaper thin liners in ...
review_body: So far, so good. I usually use the cheaper thin liners in the shower, but then we got cats.... This seems to stand up to kitty antics fairly well (I do chase them off if I hear them playing with it, though). I think they are fascinated with how the magnets are "suspended in thin air".

Love my new clear shower curtain liner! Ever since the movie Psycho, I have had this 'thing' about taking a shower and not being able to see outside the curtain. All those movies where the woman get murdered in the shower haven't helped either. :) This shower curtain and a sheer cloth curtain have really made a huge difference. Also make the shower feel so much bigger. The grommets are just the right size to easily slip over the curtain hooks and the weight is perfect.

review_title: The thick material and reinforced hanging holes is what I ...
review_body: The thick material and reinforced hanging holes is what I noticed straight away and appreciated. Unlike less quality products, this one will definitely last a long time. Combined with the mildew resistance and anti-bacterial construction, it will also need very little maintenance. Just what I need in a bachelor pad!

review_title: I am very satisfied with it
review_body: This shower curtain liner is exactly as described by this company. I am very satisfied with it. There was no weird oder or powder coming from this liner. It was perfectly sized for our shower stall and the quality of the liner was excellent. It wasn't to thick and heavy but also not to light to where it would float up while showering and stick to my legs. I'm a happy customer with this product.

review_title: I like the grommets as the super-light liners I have bought ...
review_body: This is a much heavier material than the super-light liners I have bought in the past. I like the grommets as the super-light liners I have bought in the past have had to be replaced due to splitting around the holes which had no grommets. In addition, this material is heavier (to the point that it does not flop open with the heat from the hot water) which is a definite plus.

review_title: I like the clarity of the material
review_body: The curtain has been up for about a month, so this isn't a long term review.  I like the clarity of the material, it lets in a lot of light and is easy to see through.  Water just beads off it.  The magnets aren't very powerful and don't keep the curtain in place, but that hasn't been a problem because the material is stiff enough not to move around a lot on its own.

review_title: 70lbs off despite calibration (and yes I was using it ...
review_body: 70lbs off despite calibration (and yes I was using it on a hard, level floor). Also, batteries were almost completely drained when it arrived and needed to be replaced immediately, which was frustrating to say the least. Will be returning.

review_title: They gave me and accurate and easy to read display
review_body: Just got my scale and it was the simple as pluging in the battery and and stepping on to the scale. They gave me and accurate and easy to read display. And after stepping on and off several times and roe within a couple of minutes so I got the same weight within a pound or less bitch she is pretty good considering the last one I tried a different brand gave me different weights of up to 10 pounds.. I really like the slim design of the scale but it seems like it's very sturdy and will hold up especially considering I'm still over 300lbs. I'm actively working out dropping pounds so I needed something to actually track my progress with and this scale has done the trick so far.. For the price I'm extremely happy and I'm going to recommend this to my brother who is also looking for a new digital scale.

When I received my new body weight scale I was surprised how pretty it really is! The pictured looked very nice but it is even more so when you see it, nice accent in my bathroom! I works quickly and accurately right from the start. I have very limited space and have to store it sideways and with the sleekness of the scale I can fit it in the smallest of spaces! Also I received it within 2 days and it was well protected, which I was worried about since it is glass.

I really love the scale and how it shows to the nearest 0.2 lb. The only issue that I have noticed is that sometimes I'll take 2 or 3 readings just to make sure it is consistent. I have a few cases where it will read 2 lbs heavier, and then I do two more readings that are 2 lbs lighter.. One year update: My biggest complaint and I dropped the number of stars to 4 is that this scale has what I call a "pre-C" reading and a "post-C" reading. I stepped on the scale this morning and was provided a number that I didn't like. I saw the scale display a "C", and then 0.0, and then stepped on again, and I dropped close to 3 lbs. So, as I start my annual ritual of trying to shed some pounds again, which number do I keep track of it, or do I average them? Sometimes, I can't get the "C" to display so I may have just to skip those days.

So far I'm very unhappy with this scale. It is depressingly inaccurate. Every time I step on it I get a different reading. I bought this based on the reviews and I have been horribly disappointed. I have been using this scale for quite some time and find it incredibly inaccurate. The reading varies depending on where I stand on the scale and where on the floor I place the scale. I can weight myself six times in a row and get six different readings.

review_title: Best Digital scale in the under $25 price range
review_body: Before this scale I had purchased 4 other digital scales. Some lasted a. few months, one even a year but they all were junk. You had to get off. and back on 3 or 4 times and average the readings to get your weight!. I LOVE the Etekcity Scale. It has had an accurate reading right out of. the box and more than 6 months later is still working great. I am even. considering buying one for my daughter in Oregon. I highly recommend it. not only for its accuracy but its nice styling. The price is perfect too.

After owning this scale for just 12 days I am coming back to redo my review.  This item worked well out of the box and looks fantastic! but, after only 12 days it has already started to deteriorate.  I usually only weigh myself one time each morning to track my weight when i get out of bed.  However i recently decided to weigh myself at least twice and found that this scale gave me different measurements each time with a difference of over a pound!  I did not have any time between measurements so I should have weighed the same both times.  for people who just want a baseline estimate of weight this would work great. I use this to track my weight and adjust my diet to achieve a 1 pound per week weight loss and as such having a scale that deviates 1 pound in either direction is unacceptable.

Just wanted something to help keep an eye on my weight and as far as I can tell, it's pretty accurate. Edit: Took off two stars because it broke after less than one year of light occasional use. I picked it up and moved it a few feet while cleaning, then put it back, stepped on it, and was initially elated when it registered me as 10 lbs lighter. Sadly it registered different weights every time afterwards.

review_title: Good scale and very good customer service
review_body: I have only had it a few days, but it seems wonderful. so easy to read. And customer service is great. I couldn't figure out how to open the slot for batteries and called customer service who answered right away and patiently waited on the line with me until the batteries were in place and we determined the scale was working fine. I am very pleased.

I liked this scale at first, until a few months in, I realized how inaccurate it was. Every now and then when I stepped on and off, my weight would change anywhere from 3-9 lbs. When this happened I would switch the batteries and hope that the problem would fix itself... it didn’t. Every time the scale is moved, a different number shows. I weighed myself before a doctors appointment once, and I was 5 lbs lighter at the doctors than on the scale at home. This is extremely frustrating, especially if you are trying to lose/gain weight. And no, these are not weight fluctuations, because the numbers literally change in seconds.

review_title: If we did not uses towels like crazy here they would be fine for everything your ...
review_body: The amount for the money is a bargain! With three young boys....There were "Plenty" of towels on a roll. Just not the absorbency we needed for those messy spills. If we did not uses towels like crazy here they would be fine for everything your kitchen, shop, or business may need.
Thanks
Perfectly fine.  Strong and why pay more?

review_title: Not as absorbent as I like. But ok
review_body: Not as absorbent as I like. But ok . Have to use twice as many as regular Viva paper towels.
Great product, great price.
small rolls
My wife and in laws live these! My only wish is that you could rip them in half!
nice

review_title: Great value, delivered to your door
review_body: What can you say, it's paper towel
convenient
Love the smell.
Good quality bags.  The perfume is a bit strong.
Fresh scent and sturdy bag. Hold a descent amount of item you don't need.
Love having them delivered at my door.  Great strength & quality.
Only thing I use. What a deal!
Smellllyyyy. Like really strong scent and it doesn't last that long...
Love these garbage bags!
Keeps the stank out
They don't smell as strong as I expected, which is actually nice!
Works great and is very strong.

review_title: Best price and quality for your essential cleaning rags!
review_body: Cheap clothes for your cleaning needs!. I use this cloth to clean and maintain my Concept 2 rower. I'm glad it comes in multiple colors so I can distinguish which rag is for Windex and which rag is for the oil for the chain for my C2 rower.. I'm very glad Amazon decided to sell these for such a good price!

I love these little towels, the price is amazing and I've shared them with friends and family. I use them to clean the center console in vehicles, they let some dust get by but they can take fingerprints off the screen, smudges off anything, and they do a reasonable job at dusting too. I even use them to clean water marks off the exterior of the car post wash, leaves very few streaks and works quite well.. They're also great for dusting around the house and collecting dust when you buy in this quantity.

These cloths have revolutionized my cleaning world. They're super soft and they don't leave any lint or residue behind. They wash well and don't pill up. The colors stay vibrant after washing. I use them on my counters, windows, and wood and they work great on all surfaces. They dry quickly and resist getting sour or mildewy. No more paper towel waste for me!

review_title: These are my favorite things in the whole world
review_body: These are my favorite things in the whole world!  I use for every thing.  I use Yellow for babies butt.  Blue for cleaning and white for in the kitchen.  They work so amazing for sticking on your swiffer and will do the whole for before having to rinse.
Followed instruction and washed in cold water air dried. Absolutly worst micro fiber towels I've ever tried to use! Total waste of money! DO NOT BUY!
These are soft and they last a LONG time! I own a thrift store and use these constantly! I love the Amazon brand ones because not only are they cheaper, they're higher quality!

review_title: The price was great. But the quality was a let down
review_body: I bought these almost a year ago.  The price was great. But the quality was a let down.  I could not clean my glasses with these as these cloths are too coarse.  But for "other" cleaning they would be OK.  I just had the expectation that these were real "mirofiber", and they are not.  So I gave some away and kept some for basic cleaning.  I really like Amazon products, but this one just wasn't what I expected.

Took one cloth out to clean a couple of pair of glasses. Was really excited about how well it worked. I didn't even need the fancy cleaner I ordered. Excitement didn't last long. As I started folding the cloths to put them away I find several with stains. I've been impressed with AmazonBasics. This surely "stained" that... Pun intended.

As described - basic microfiber cleaning cloths.  Generous size, no glaring defects in manufacturing.  I picked these up for under $9.00 (24 pack)  with Prime Free Shipping and am well pleased.  3 stars for the towels, additional 2 stars for the price I paid -YMMV.

Great value! I wish that I could have gotten just one color, or that there were other color scheme options, but these are otherwise perfect. I use them to wash my face every night and they are holding up very well to frequent use.. Due to the nature of the cloth, they tend to get a bit linty in the regular wash, and cling hard to other items in the dryer, so I try to separate them into their own load. Do not use fabric softener (sheets or liquid) with these, it compromises the quality.
Do what they are meant to do, have never ripped or made holes while stuffing them.

review_title: We use Glad brand and have tried other brands just to return
review_body: We use Glad brand and have tried other brands just to return. They hold us well to heavier trash and don't tear easily even with sharp corners of trash. I love the tie top for quick and each trash removal.

review_title: A long time staple in our home, most reliable, strong , and easy to gather up and take to the outside trash can
review_body: Have used these for years, we love them, and trust them to handle the load without breaking.  Also appreciate the drawstring, makes it easy to keep the mess inside the bag when it is time to take it to the outdoor trash bins. These are a staple in our home, we have found nothing we like better.
Fits all the trash in the bag

review_title: Box is not bulky and can store easily.
review_body: Packaged well and no issues with the bags.  They come in two rolls inside of the box.  Box is not bulky and can store easily.
All of the bags ripped on the sides. Stay away from this product; Amazon and their timely shipping were the only good thing about my experience with this product.

review_title: Instead of the drawstrings being on the side like normal, they were on the front and back
review_body: Our last package was defective. Instead of the drawstrings being on the side like normal, they were on the front and back, which really screws things up when you try to tie up the top.
Alright new glad bag user here! The commercials I thought we're joking but holy craaaappp these are strong and can hold a ton. I'm so happy I bought these bags.

review_title: Just can't do these anymore - constantly tearing bags or ...
review_body: Just can't do these anymore - constantly tearing bags or the tie strings pop off when pulling the bag out from the can. . . going back to Hefty without a doubt.

review_title: Will not order 90 count bag again!
review_body: First time ordering the 90 count tall kitchen bags but not again. The box was open on BOTH ends. The individual bags can not be pulled out one by one due the the sides being opened. I used masking tape to close box and opened the top but tape had stuck to numerous bags.
Another great buy form Amazon.
Liked the product but don't want the automatic order any more. Thanks

review_title: top quality paper towels for a premium price
review_body: We sometimes buy these Brawny pick-a-size paper towels as well as the much cheaper Sparkle pick-a-size towels. Both are made-in-the-USA by Georgia-Pacific. "Pick-A-Size" is a trademark of Georgia-Pacific, so anything with that label is made by them. Sparkle costs about 1 cent per sheet (107 sheets per roll), while Brawny costs 1.4 cents per sheet (140 sheets per roll). . What do you get for the 40% price premium of Brawny? Interestingly, the paper sheets are a different size. Sheets from both products are the same height, but Sparkle is 1.5 inches wider. Brawny is a higher quality, more dense and sturdy paper. It absorbs more water and doesn't break up as quickly when soaked.. Which product should you buy? I admit that we mostly buy Sparkle because of the price. Sparkle is better quality and cheaper than the generic brands that the local drug store sells. Most of our paper towel jobs are pretty small and one sheet (or even a half sheet) of Sparkle is fine. We do have a few rolls of Brawny lying around when we have a series of large jobs (like washing windows). Otherwise, we'll just use 2 sheets of Sparkle for occasional big jobs.
500 sheets less than the 24 pack of large rolls for the same amount of money, that's 4 rolls missing, I don't think this is a good bargain at all.

We use a large number of towels at the New York New Jersey Trail Conference -- coffee and food spills from the brown bagger contingent, other messes from what the boots drag in. We tend to be strongly conservation minded, and the pick a size feature is very popular here.. As a not for profit, we will take whatever is donated, but several of us indicated that were very pleased with these towels for our fairly rugged use.. Robert C. Ross. April 2017

These seem to be really good quality paper towels.  They are absorbent and don't tear easily.  They also did not contribute to streaking when my wife cleaned a window with one.  They come with the perforations that let you use half size towels and we find that size adequate for most things around my house.  So, your roll will last a lot longer.  Not much else to say about a paper towel.  These look good to me.

review_title: Consistent Product - Same Size - Same Price
review_body: This is one of my long-standing Subscribe & Save products.  The price remains stable.  The product is the same, packed the same way.  It hasn't become smaller, or fewer in number.  I love that the rolls are in 'twin packs' inside the shipping carton.  They can be stored on a shelf, outside of the box, without worry that they will gather dust.  They are always packaged solidly and I've not received any that were damaged.

review_title: Good solid paper towels.  Great for every day home cleanups.
review_body: Good solid paper towels.. There's not a ton you can write about paper towels.  But what you can say these are a good at.  They don't fall apart in your hands with too much water, and they do a great job for regular daily kitchen cleanup.  Been a customer of another brand for a long time, but I tried this brand this time, and was quite pleased.. Definite candidate for future purchases.

This is exactly the same Brawny paper towel found in other offerings. They are all: "pick-a-size," great absorption ability, soft, thick, strong, durable, quality, 2-ply paper towels.. The difference here is size of the roll. "XL" here means it's equivalent to almost two regular-size rolls (XL: 64.15 sq ft; Giant: 52.25 sq ft; Large: 43.08 sq ft; and Regular: 38.10 sq ft).. They come as a 2-pack (128.30 sq ft) and this offering is for 4 2-packs. At $30.99 (Amazon price at the time of this review) it's a good deal (not a great deal, but a good one; we've seen this locally for as low as $1.47 per roll).. Even though this is an XL roll it still fit my under-cabinet paper towel holder with no problems whatsoever (one reason may be that it seems to be wound tighter to keep the diameter manageable).. We were already fans of the Brawny line; we like this one as well.. 5 stars.

These are by far the BEST paper towels I have ever used! Viva, Sparkle and even Bounty do not compare to the durability and absorbency of these towels. They are a little more expensive, BUT Amazon regularly runs deals on these so just keep an eye out and purchase when they have their coupons/deals. I highly recommend Brawny!
i like the fact that i can teaar off a smaller piece
Very easy great deal nice to have it come to the house
As advertised
Great
Excellent

review_title: Select a sheet saves paper towels
review_body: Very absorbent and the half sheets are often enough to do the job so that saves paper and money
Very nice product.
Thanks

If anything, Brita pitchers are underrated. These filters are essential to making yours work. At 60 days per filter, the purchase took me all of 5 seconds to click the add to cart button. It sure beats lugging those cases of bottled water through supermarkets and you don't know what's really in those bottles anyway.. We don't even need to talk about the environmental "green" aspects of using these over the bottled stuff either.

review_title: Spend the extra money on these vs generic or store brands...they're worth every penny.
review_body: I tried a couple store brands of "replacement" filters for my Brita pitcher. Never again. They took forever to filter the water, there was lots of carbon dust, the water just didn't taste as good, and they had to be replaced more often.. These are more expensive, but they're worth every penny. In fact, given how much more often I had to replace the filters, I'm not sure I actually saved any money buying the cheaper brands.. I'll never buy anything but genuine Brita filters again.
After about a month of use, filter particles started leaking into the water -- the pictures speak for themselves.

review_title: A quick solution for poor water quality. Quick, effective and economical.
review_body: These are wonderful. They last for approximately 2 months, and improve the taste, content and appearance of your water.. I had a serious sulphur problem wth my water. When heated, it smelled bad enough to make you gag. There was enought sulphur in the water to cause some stomach upset.. I am only renting, and did not want to go to any great expense for such a hopefully short term problem. Unfortunately, the problem proved to be long lasting. A friend solved the problem with the Brita Classic water pitcher. You change the filters every 2 months, and you're good to go. It's easy to clean,too.
No, this isn't going to last long. I've had this for two weeks now and I can't stand the speed. It takes forever to filter. I'm going to throw the longlast filter out and go back to the regular one.

review_title: Likely used-reconditioned filters, don't last more than a few days
review_body: These were the first replacement filters I used after my new Brita pitcher needed a new one (for the first time).  The original filter lasted two months of pretty heavy use.  This replacement is indicating a replacement within two days.  I think these are used filters and no good.  Don't buy them.  You get what you pay for, old story.

I’m going to keep this short and to the point, this is not as good as regular Britta filters for one very specific reason that I’ve heard from others and have experienced myself, it produces a strange plastic like flavor that is very unsavory. I have put at least 9 gallons through this filter so far and the plastic flavor is still there. Not recommended.

review_title: Ok if you truly need this much filtering but real slow
review_body: This is a 2.5 star product. It is supposed to filter out a lot of extra stuff as compared to their regular filters. It is also supposed to last much longer between changes. I believe all of that but i also know that it takes hours and hours to filter water.

review_title: A Good Option for Brita Pitcher Filters
review_body: The filters are working fine for improving the taste of city water, and I haven't noticed much carbon residue if any in my water. I don't think the Brita pitcher is a very robust water cleaning system, but it does seem to work as advertised.. Even though the style of this filter looks different from what I had been buying previously--the shape of the top has changed--it fits my pitcher the same as my previous filters.

One filter lasts 3 weeks Max. First few days of moderate use it will filter a liter of water in a few minutes. After that the amount of time it takes to filter a liter of water increases exponentially. By week 3 of moderate use it will filter a liter of water in 8 hours. Would not recommend this product, just get the regular filters they last about as long and half the price.

review_title: The only problem was that one package of plates were slightly crumpled on one edge but otherwise fine. Not enough to call about
review_body: Everything I was expecting.  The only problem was that one package of plates were slightly crumpled on one edge but otherwise fine.  Not enough to call about.
Love these Dixie plates.  They are the larger size which is great for big eaters.  It was also a pack of 80 so they last my family a decent amount of time.  Will buy again.
So glad I got these. I needed some paper plates and kept forgetting to buy them. These came really fast, are very sturdy, and the price was pretty good too. No problems here.
I use this brand of plate all the time. I have never bought in bulk before but it seemed like a good deal. The plate is sturdy and does not get floppy like other plates
I LOVE Dixie paper products! I'be tried so many other off brands but you get what you pay for. These plates are my favorite and durable enough that I can reuse them!
I messed up how I read the listing, and wanted the 8" plates.  These are sturdy, and have a moisture proof backing.  They are fine, but I prefer the smaller size.

review_title: Great Small Plates for the Price
review_body: Love these plates and the price on Amazon.  Sometimes they will come with a coupon as well.  I use them primarily for our baby dog's food.  They don't hold a lot of food or large helpings of food as they will bend or fold over.  However, they work perfectly for what I use them for.
Wife hates them because she wants me to use real plates.  I love them because I don't like washing dishes.

review_title: These plates can be microwaved and hold up well under ...
review_body: These plates can be microwaved and hold up well under a full meal. They are not flimsy and do not fold in under the weight of food. I have ordered them several times.
Can't live without these! I buy these frequently and they are the best I have tried. The handle hot or cold food and don't begin to "wilt" after a while.

Read the reviews, and took a chance.. These paper towels deserve the praise they have received.. No silly frills - pretty pictures, embossing, or perfumes.. They simply do the job as described.. Individual sheets slightly larger than standard pick-a-size/select-a--size sheets.. Definitely with the money!. Highly recommended!

review_title: Now consistently takes 3 half sheets to dry my hands after washing them whereas with Bounty 2 half sheets were sufficient.
review_body: I thought I liked them until I realized that with these paper towels it now consistently takes 3 half sheets to dry my hands after washing them whereas with Bounty 2 half sheets were sufficient. This adds up in cost and has been causing us to empty the waste basket in the bathroom more frequently. Therefore I conclude that they are not as absorbent. Maybe it is not fair to compare an economy paper towel to Bounty, but Bounty is what we have almost always used prior to trying this Amazon Brand.

review_title: I have been a bounty user for awhile now. ...
review_body: I have been a bounty user for awhile now. I thought I'd try based on the reviews. It compares equal on all categories next to bounty, including the select-a-size size (its the exact same size) i will be buying these from now on!

These paper towels are a really crummy and are priced ridiculously high. It pains me to have to write a bad review, because I am one of Amazons biggest fans! But, they have really missed the mark on these. I can get the same amount of Bounty rolls for 1/4 of the price also from Amazon, which I recommend that people do instead of getting the Presto brand.

review_title: Cheaper than Bounty but not as absorbent or strong
review_body: Usually cheaper than Bounty "Flex-a-size" or "Quick size" but not as absorbent or strong. A Bounty "Flex-a-size" sheet full of water weighed 27 grams, whereas a Presto! sheet full of water weighed only 20 grams--that means it absorbs 6 grams less water per sheet. Furthermore, whether wet or dry, the Presto! paper towel tears more easily than Bounty. Search for "best paper towel" online and you'll see Bounty tops most reviews.

While the smaller sheets are meant to save money, the perforations that separate sheets don't work well. As a result, we often get 3 sheets instead of 1. So, we are now spending more money on paper towels instead of less. Disappointing!

review_title: Great quality and value for paper towels
review_body: I wasn't sure what to expect from these, as we usually go with the big brand names, but honestly, they are great quality and work just as well as any paper towel we've used. Being able to choose the size of the sheet I want to use is a plus, as well, and they make both great napkins and spill-cleaners. I'm pleased enough with these that I'll continue to get these through Subscribe & Save and forgo my monthly Costco paper towel purchases from now on.

I was a bit skeptical on ordering these, as I am very picky about paper towels.  I love the fact they are plain white, as I am not a fan of prints.  The quality is great!  Thicker than most, so they hold up well.  They leave zero lint behind.  I have had issues with other paper towels that do not tear along the perforations, these separate from the roll perfectly every time!  I will be ordering Presto paper towel from now on!!

review_title: ... - I believe packaging says 2-ply but they feel like only one ply as a reviewer said below
review_body: I must say I was expecting more from these towels - I believe packaging says 2-ply but they feel like only one ply as a reviewer said below. I’ll finish my order but I’m switching back to Brawny select a size. I think Brawny is even better than Bounty!
Not as absorbent as I would like -- not enough of a price difference to make up for this.

review_title: I use this protector different than intended. I put ...
review_body: I use this protector different than intended.  I put a plastic mattress protector over my foam mattress with padded mattress cover on top, then sheets, comforter and bedspread on top..THEN I put the SafeRest on top of all that.  So if my cats get in a row again and one (the one with kidney problems) pees on the bed at least everything I purchased new since the last accident is safe.  It is attractive enough to be seen and with pillows etc up at the top of the bed, no one knows.

review_title: Good product for a good price
review_body: We ordered one of these for my five-year-old son's twin bed as he still has problems wetting the bed at night. Only once did any moisture go through to the mattress and I'm still not completely sure why that happened since he hadn't had a terribly big accident and he was in Pull Ups. Besides that confusing moment it has worked pretty well. It's nice that it's not noisy and crinkly like the old school mattress protectors used to be and it's soft. The price is reasonable too.. My son had a bout of stomach flu one evening and it did a good job of protecting the mattress from that nastiness as well. It washes up nicely and there doesn't seem to be any adverse affects from washing and drying it regularly. We went ahead and ordered another one for our smaller son's twin bed as he is about ready to transition out of his crib.. All in all I would recommend this product.

review_title: It washes well and does not leave any lint/fuzz nor does it smell like burnt rubber after a run through the dryer
review_body: We have an older dog who loves to hide in our king size bed whenever she gets scared. During a recent thunderstorm, she slipped in and sure enough, a few minutes later there was a wet puddle in the middle of our bed!. We quickly took off the top sheets and the waterproof mattress protector and was relieved to see that not one drop had leaked through and onto the actual mattress.. It washes well and does not leave any lint/fuzz nor does it smell like burnt rubber after a run through the dryer. We highly recommend this product!

So I don't usually write reviews, but I am making an exception here.. My 4 year old just got a new twin "big girl" bed. She's daytime potty trained, but not night yet. I knew I had to get some kind of mattress protector for her bed. I came across the SafeRest Premium on Amazon, and it got decent reviews. I wanted something that wouldn't feel too "crunchy".. I got this product quickly, and immediately put it on her bed (before washing it).. Wouldn't you know, two days later she wakes up and peed through her pull-up.. I ran to the bed, crossing my fingers hoping this mattress pad didn't fail me, I don't want her new mattress to be pee covered already!!. The mattress pad was soaking wet. It doesn't look good for the mattress. I peel the pad off the bed, and run my hands all around the mattress, and....DRY!! Bone dry, actually! I was very impressed.. I only bought one at the time, so I had to wash it immediately, so of could put it back on for bedtime.. I washed it in cold, with the rest of the wet sheets. I usually would not put it in the dryer, and would hang dry it, but I needed it to be dry quickly, so I threw it in the dryer. It came out in one piece, clean and dry.. I'm very happy with this product, and will definitely buy another.

This is a good quality cover. It does not come with a zipper. I should have read the description more carefully. I will keep it and use it on another bed. I did have to purchase a zippered mattress encasement from elsewhere. I hope this helps someone purchase items they need. Once you wash this cover it does take a while to dry so be please be patient. Well worth it!

review_title: Based on other reviews I felt like this was the best product to try
review_body: This purchase was for my 2 1/2 year old boy who kept insisting he didn't want to wear a diaper to bed at night anymore. Based on other reviews I felt like this was the best product to try. We've had this on his bed for two weeks now without any accidents so I can not comment on the effectiveness of the leak barrier, however the cover fits well on his full size bed perfectly. His mattress is a pillow top and has a 2 inch memory foam on top of that. This has actually helped to keep the memory foam topper in place which I'm very grateful for since it used to be a headache keeping it in one place. Also, you can't feel this under the fitted sheet, no noise, no difference. Wouldn't ever know it was there.

This is my second SafeRest mattress protector - they are great and do the job. I had a behavior issue with my cat 2 years ago which is what prompted me to get one of these.
