The cat is happy now and no issues since then but it's great to know that if I accidentally spill wine ;) or something it won't ruin my mattress. We also use one in a young boy's room and it's been great there. You would probably still want a cushion-y mattress pad on top of this one if you like ultimate comfort - that's what we did and it works well - I consider the SafeRest as the first line of defense.

I put together a new bedframe and mattress yesterday and used the mattress protector for the first time last night. Verdict: comfortable with none of the crinkly noises that other people complained of. Just make sure you wash the mattress protector before first use and you shouldn’t have any problems. If I ever spill something on my mattress, I will provide an update on how the mattress protector fared.

review_title: Love it Love it Love it
review_body: Love it Love it Love it!!!. Protects mattress pad which is too bulky to put in my washer and always have to take to laundry mat!. Only wish I knew about this item before I wasted all my time and money at laundry mat and purchasing. new mattress pads when they fell apart. This cover is perfect because you can easily wash and dry it at home.. I use it over my expensive mattress pad saving it from multiple washing/drying at laundry mat, and the expense of replacing. the mattress pad. It fits easily, noiseless [no crinkling sound] and is so very comfortable! I purchased this protectors for my. king and queen beds. I've even purchased an extra one for future use [just in case it gets discontinued].

I ordered this for our tempur pedic.  We had another brand that was suppose to be under warranty that had started to pull apart, surprise surprise the warranty would not cover it.  It was about 7 years old.  I called the company we purchased it from and they informed it would not be exchanged but I could purchase another one for $120.  I came to amazon and found this Saferest cover for a much more reasonable price. The two covers were very similar.  It fit perfectly and does not make noise.  We have only had it a couple of weeks but so far I am very satisfied!
For us Viva is the right paper towel

review_title: Great paper towels, with good strength and pickup capacity
review_body: Great paper towels, with good strength and pickup capacity. Cuts into 1/2 sheets that can double as napkins.
Best paper towels by far!

review_title: I do like the Choose-A Sheet
review_body: I would have preferred the Viva Vantage, but apparently I ordered the wrong ones. However, I do like the Choose-A Sheet.
These are the smallest rolls of paper towels I've ever seen... lol!
Best paper towel ever! Soft and durable!
These are simply awesome paper towels.  They are soft, durable, and highly absorbent.  I won't buy any other paper towels, and I think they're worth the slight premium.

review_title: I love it, I will definitely continue buying this
review_body: I love it, I will definitely continue buying this, it is thick enough to clean pretty much everything. It feels like real cloth when using for any mess, so your hands stay clean.
Good
I love the towel like material. A little goes a long way!
Love the new quick size!
Absolute score on pricing and quality.

These are by far, my favorite paper towels!! Perfect for so many things whether you need a little or a lot. The roll size is great and they last longer than any other brand I’ve tried. They are not too thick and not too thin. I love not having to go to the store for things like this also and I recommend these to anyone and everyone!

review_title: I’m a Full Sheet kind of User
review_body: I do not care for the tiny half sheets. I am a full sheet person. Bounty is the “Only” papertowel I will buy. I haven’t found another anywhere close to being as absorbent. I only wish the full sheets dominated the market because I’m finding it more difficult to purchase them.
While this paper towel is soft & absorbent, the rolls are too large 2fit in our towel holder.  Very, very poor & inept Marketing ...

Not positive I’m getting the same number of rolls every time (need to double check that) but I. love love love having the cabinet filled with enough paper towels to last a while! Hate running to the store for one item; mega size, too. Brilliant!
nice
Bounty is hands down the best paper towel! I especially like the select a size feature. You won’t go wrong with this product.
kinda big for a tampon :(

Cancelling my subscription upon notification that my previous choice-- they actually called it "Old Version", with caps!)-- was no longer available and therefore that choice was being "converted" to this one, which according to reviews is both smaller and more expensive.  Nice try.  Thanks but no thanks.  I'm not buying it.
ok not at all firm

review_title: I bought 6 to go into pillowcase I bought and they fit perfect! I will be buying more
review_body: The stuffer pillows I received are truly the nicest stuffers I have bought. I bought 6 to go into pillowcase I bought and they fit perfect! I will be buying more!

I received my order five minutes ago and when I opened the item the stuffing was protruding from the unopened bag. There is a 10-inch gash in the pillow. This part was face down and opposite the end of the box I opened, so I know it wasn’t from opening the box. This was part of a gift for today, so I am highly disappointed and upset over this.
Exactly what I needed and I received them in two (2) days.

review_title: No problems, worked great with the case
review_body: Bought this to go with a pillowcase for a friend of mine. No problems, fit perfectly.
Feels hard & lumpy. Too uncomfortable & understaffed.
Size exactly as described. Stood up to children fights and much abuse. Very nice pillow stuffer.
I know it's decorative but it barely filled out my pillow cover ...  just not worth the money!
I bought this pillow for a sequence pillow case I got for Xmas and it worked perfectly!
I thought it was a memory foam pillow. Will not be ordering another one.

review_title: Throw away your iron and ironing board
review_body: Works beautifully.  No need to iron!
This steamer would start to boil the water in the reservoir and soak the garment with too much water with the water also running down the outside of the steamer. I will be returning this product.

review_title: It's super easy to fill and handle
review_body: I've never had a steamer before.  It's super easy to fill and handle.  I love it!
My wife uses it in her wine room to seal the tops of the wine bottles
Works as described. Does what it needs to and no more.

review_title: Easy to use, quick to heat up
review_body: I used the steamer to take window tint off of a car window.  Works well.  Make sure to pay attention to max level indicator on sight glass.  I went by arrow on outside on plastic housing on first use.  If you go over max level it will stream water out of the nozzle.
The clothes gets easily wrinkled after steaming
I love that this company uses people with disabilities to make their product. I am very happy with the steamer. It’s compact, easy to hold, great for traveling and gets the job done!
Works great especially when you're busy and on the go
It’s really easy to use, just follow the simple directions!

review_title: Not nearly as many lights as in the photo.
review_body: It would have a much higher rating if the lights looked as full as it does in the advertised photo. There are 8, maybe 10 strands of lights. It does what I wanted it to do, but would have liked a more lush look.

review_title: It is awesome! I do wish there was a off button
review_body: A lot of the reviews said this product came tangled. Mine did not! It is awesome! I do wish there was a off button, instead of having to unplug it every time I want the lights off. But besides that, Great product!

I will be installing these in my daughter's dorm room. When I first ordered them, I was nervous they might be too bright because there's so many of them but was pleasantly surprised to see how small each bulb is and there are multiple settings including a dimmer version.
Love these! It has many light features (blinking, constabt, and several other combo). I used clear command hooks to gang them. It’s on my closet door. I wanted to use it as a backdrop.

review_title: looks amazing on my wall behind my bed
review_body: took a minute to unravel, but worth the hassle! looks amazing on my wall behind my bed. i started it from ceiling

review_title: Don’t buy these/doesn’t look like the photo
review_body: Not at all like the photos, it is way too spaced out and the strands are way too long, I can’t even use it so I’ll probably just send them back I’m super disappointed in this item!!

review_title: Love these. I used them behind sheers for porch ...
review_body: Love these.  I used them behind sheers for porch and Eiffel tower curtains.  Add great ambiance!

Lights were terrific. Packaged great, easy to unpack and we found it very easy to re-package as long as we followed how the manufacturer packaged.  Do not anticipate any tangling when we go to use them again. I do wish it only had the steady burn as the only option but, maybe sometime I will want to use one of the other options and I will be glad I have it.

review_title: Perfect! They were hung behind the curtain panels used ...
review_body: Perfect! They were hung behind the curtain panels used for the backdrop at my daughter's wedding. I couldn't be happier with how they added to the ambiance!

review_title: Great for a wedding shower backdrop
review_body: Considering the price, it turned out pretty nice. Like the other reviews said, it's a lot longer than I expected and each individual light string were father apart than in the product picture. But it definitely worked for my setting. I bought small clothes pins and put pictures of the bride/groom on each of the strings.

Good shower curtain liner so far, and looks just as expected. I'm rating four stars just because the 3 magnets at the bottom are super light and weak - they don't hold well if there is a puff of steam, A/C kicks on (air blows near the shower curtain), etc.

review_title: wish it was thicker and little shorter in length
review_body: Looks nice! Easy to install. Wished it was a little more thicker and softer in the way it flows. But, it serves the purpose. Mold and mildew resistant is good! My showers are 5ft long and I had a to fold 1 feet at the end. But, it doesn't bother me. I still like it.

review_title: This one had good reviews regarding mold resistance
review_body: I read product reviews before deciding on this shower curtain.  This one had good reviews regarding mold resistance.  The transparent, smooth surface looks like it will not harbor mold spores very easily.  I didn't realize it  was transparent when I ordered it, but that's OK considering that I will be free of a mold.  If you like a transparent shower curtain, this is the one for you.  If you wanted an opaque shower curtain, look elsewhere.

Just got, it will post more later down the road and see how well they hold up.  But they are well made, metal grommets are well placed and properly installed, so ripping and tearing the liner won't happen.  But it looks great, hangs perfectly, we will see how they work long term and follow up.

Contains water. Material is durable enough to not stretch or break. The weights on the bottom could be heavier because they seem as if they're not even there. We don't wash (we replace it for new) these so I cannot comment how well it washes out stains.
So far so good. I've had it for a few weeks and I haven't had any problems. It's a tad bit shorter than expected but it's good enough and serves its purpose.

Well darn, I seemed to have missed any mention of this NOT being machine/dryer material.. Much thinner than I thought it would be.. I am sure it would fit the bill for someone looking for different qualities than I wanted.

I love how clear this shower curtain was its almost like not having one there but I know I will not have any water get out of the shower, and there was no smell to it when I opened it which is very nice.

review_title: THIS IS ABOVE THE AVERAGE LINER. IT IS HEAVY ENOUGH NOT TO FLY EVERYWHERE WHEN THE SHOWER IS ON.
review_body: PEFECT TO PROTECT THAT SPECIAL SHOWER CURTAIN. IT IS HEAVY ENOUGH FOR ALL IT. CLAIMS TO DO!!! IT IS AN ANTI-BACTERIAL SHOWER LINER..... THIS IS A PERFECT LINER,  THIS LINER IS ALSO THE BEST I HAVE EVER SEEN.. KEEP MAKING THE WITH PEVA I THINK THAT IS THE SECRET.

review_title: Good But Magnets Are Borderline Adequate Size & Position. Frosted Means One Can See Shapes
review_body: Magnet at each end of the bottom of curtain could be a bit bigger, so they cling to your tub quicker.. Also, We wish those two magnets were closer to each end of the curtain, rather than inset several inches.. That would seem to help more easily place each end of the curtain where one wants to seal out water.  But they work OK as they are.

review_title: The product is good. Aesthetically speaking I like the blue display and ...
review_body: So I got this in the mail yesterday. It arrived later than expected. They promised me a certain date but it arrived two days later. Anyways, that aside, The product is good. Aesthetically speaking I like the blue display and black body. It is very slick. One thing to keep in mind that DO NOT weight yourself while the machine is on carpet or any soft floor. The material underneath it will absorb some of your weight and the machine will claim that you are 30 lbs lighter. Always weigh yourself by keeping this on hard wood floor or tiles.

As others have said, when I first got this - it was accurate. We tested it with several things, and it was always spot on. Now however, You can take it around the house to various places, (all hard floors) and get completely different readings, up to 3 lbs difference. You can also simply move it to the other end of the bathroom for an instantly gratifying 1.5 lbs of weight loss. I have to admit, I find myself moving it around just to get that extra lb off. However, it is close enough for me, as I am just looking for a ballpark figure.

This is a great scale for the price. Shipping was very quick and it came shipped with a battery (that still has juice a month later). I was using a vintage scale before but I wanted a digital scale so I could see day by day exactly how my weight has fluxuated. I looks very sleek in my bathroom. I have a tiny bathroom so I love how it easily stands up beside my toilet. I also like the nice grips on the bottom four corners so it doesn't wiggle around. The one con is that the glass does get grimy easily but I just wipe it down once a week or so when I wipe down my bathroom mirror. It's also pretty durable, I've dropped it on tile a few times and no harm so far!

After owning this scale for only a few months, the batteries died.  And then another pair of batteries died. And then another.  The scale is stepped on only about once per day and in less than a year and a half, it has gone through at least 6 pairs of AAA batteries.  It's a waste that has nothing to do with the age of the batteries (brand new) or the brand of batteries (different brands). The only constant is this shockingly inefficient scale.  Something's definitely wrong with it and we will be replacing soon.

We were scared to use it at first it looks like it would shatter if we stood on it. But it was just fine. Works great, not heavy like the old scales. We like the look of now we know it won't break lol. I looked at a lot of scales but so many got really bad reviews. This one as long as it not on carpet it will work fine.

review_title: Added two stars for customer support
review_body: Just quit working a couple months ago.  Nothing happened to it, fresh batteries, just sticks at 0.. I posted this review and it was noticed by Etekcity.  Their support staff reached out to me and replaced the scale free of charge.  I added two stars to my rating based on that alone.

review_title: Simple product, high quality, great Value.
review_body: Simple and Easy to use. What a scale should be for a great price!. Before purchasing this scale, I was quite frustrated with two other scales I had purchased at big box stores with fancy labels and endorsed by various institutions (you know what I am talking about). They were not accurate-would literally fluctuate a couple pounds within weighing a couple of seconds within each other. And while I do not just want to bash other products...the point is, is that this scale delivers consistently and one does not have to worry about accuracy ever. Very happy with my purchase and anyone looking for a scale to do what it is supposed to do-weigh you. This is the product.

This scale worked pretty beautifully for about 2 weeks. Now it fluctuates a few pounds when I weigh myself a few times within a minute or two. I'm not sure if there's a problem with the scale or if I'm somehow doing something wrong, but I do try and keep my feet in the same place each time.

I had reviewed this recently as poor. However, the Etekcity contacted me via Amazon and sent a new scale that is working fantastically! Even without the high accuracy and elegant design of the scale, I would have to give the seller 5 stars for their excellent customer service that went above and beyond their warranty obligations. This scale is highly recommended.

There's nothing NOT to like about this scale. The design is elegant, is not heavy at all, the price is reasonable for what you're getting and the fact that it is digital helps to pin-point your weight with precision. Of course, because it is a digital scale you'll need a pair of AAA batteries, but the first pair will come with the scale. On the downside, because of the digital nature of the scale, if you try to use it in a uneven floor (like carpet) your weight is going to be inaccurately calculated, so it is imperative to use this scale on tile.
Not bad for the price however I prefer a thicker paper towel and one that is select a size
Best, most reasonable paper towels ever, will purchase from now on.
Very absorbent
These are the best. Thick and super absorbent.

review_title: as good as most paper towels
review_body: Practical and handly
decent price for a bulk purchase towel
Very happy with delivery service and product quality

Wasn’t sure what to expect from the quality, but my husband and I love them. They are strong and also soft. I was worried they would feel like cardboard and be cheap, but we were pleasantly surprised.
Just a paper towel did its job
GOOD
Everything
Good quality
This is a great bag, love the gain smell!
Keep the odor down in trash can
Tremendous value compared to the brick and mortars in my area. They hold up to heavy loads.
Great fit and great scent.  It actually does help mask the scent of nasty garbage!
The scent takes away the yucky smells of garbage.
Very good bags.
Great Bags
It's scented bags, what else can I say? They hold up as Id expect Glad to.
we have previously rated these
Very thin sheets so I will stick with Bounty moving forward.
Received item The bottom six rolls in the box we’re soaking wet and had black mold growing on the paper towels.
Paper quality is not good
They do what paper towels do.
Lots of paper towels last forever!
I'm sure these are good paper towels, but they smell like perfume, which gave me an instant headache.
Great deal!
As expected. Saves time shopping.
I don’t find them that absorbent. Although it is a big roll, that nice huge roll is gone quickly because you need at least 2-3 sheets to do the job.
Best Bag I've had in the kitchen in awhile,swallowed up all the old meat I had in the place, couldn't believe how much stuff I could jam in there with out it bursting
Used for a very long time.
Not as strong as the one with the red tie string.. The bag got a hole in it right away..  We use this for kitchen trash only, not any heavy stuff.
EVERYTHING SOUNDS GOOD!
Perfect for my needs. Good product, price and quick ship. Thanks!

These bags are more durable than most brands which is good, because we have a habit of cramming as much into the trash can before we take it out as possible. I have even dragged a very full bag across the floor without it tearing.
Does the job, hold trash

review_title: Not strong at all tall kitchen bags
review_body: I usually like these bags but almost everyone ripped at the side.  some were ripped without even putting anything in the bag. they sure weren't strong.
Love the price for the quantity.
Bad bags are annoying. These are good bags.

review_title: I switched years ago from a leading brand
review_body: Oh, Brawny pick a size, why did I spend decades snootily thinking my brand better until someone gave me a roll of you to compare? Please never change as I can't live without you, even though I try to mainly use greener alternatives, sometimes I just need a piece of paper towel and you are the perfect size and do your job so well. Thank you.

review_title: You just can't beat using a Brawny towel for anything
review_body: We have cats.  One is a triple layered Maine Coon/Tabby mix. She's like Linus with the blanket always there, only with her it's silk like fur everywhere, all the time and now that it's hot where we live and fans are blowing, it's unbelievable.  A cheap paper towel just won't get it in our home because if you have ever picked up a wet fur ball with a cheap paper towel, well, it's not pleasant.. We have used Brawny for as long as I can remember.  Sometimes, when another brand is on sale I'll get it, but always go back to Brawny. I love the Pick-A-Size because it saves so much waste in using a big paper towel to wipe up a small item on the counter or wherever. These are soft and more absorbent and I love them for wiping out the stainless steel kitchen sink after doing the dishes.  One towel will do both sides and the faucet.. And, for dusting!  I use a damp one to run over the counter and shelves and we have Tiffany style glass lampshades that love to catch and hold on to cat fur in the air.  A damp towel and it's gone :). When I got these towels I was using a generic store brand and sometimes it would take 3 or 4 to do a job, whereas it would take 1 with the Brawny so cost wise I save money using them because I use so many, but not  as many as I would with a cheaper, less absorbent brand.

review_title: As good as the more expensive Bounty
review_body: I like this product - really comparable to the thick and popular bounty.  Love that you can select size.  Only issue is it's a little wider than Bounty and doesn't sit right under my sink paper towel holder

We needed paper towels and we both had colds and no one wanted to make a run to the store.  These were a featured item. Price was decent and they showed up in two days. They are good paper towels and I'd buy them again.
Got these after a lead from Slickdeals.  They are definitely paper towels, and my wife's favorite brand, so with the Slickdeal and S&S, this was a very good deal.
These are the only paper towels we buy, after trying many. We love the smaller sheet size. They are very absorbent, not rough, and hold together when wet.
If Mama ain't happy, ain't nobody happy...
These are just the handiest. Strong stay together with scrubbing select a size. Big supply rolls do not require filling paper dispenser so often.
What is not to love it is quality.
Best paper towels, but can be pricey.

review_title: Not happy with microfiber for cleaning
review_body: The more I use microfiber cloths for cleaning, the less I like them.  They are good for rubbing out dirty spots, but don't absorb water very well.  Not good for washing windows at all (too many streaks).  I am going to go back to using cloth daipers.

WOW what have I been missing all these years. These are super cleaners. I am getting these on s/s every month. You can tell they are slightly cheaper than some other microfiber cloths I have had, but they really soak up the water. I use them everywhere. If one is too dirty, I just toss it. Highly recommend these.

When it comes to my vehicle, I do not use cloths sparingly. I ensure to avoid cross contamination, and this often means tossing out microfiber cloths like tissues.. Amazon Basics' cloths are a good solution for me. The cost is fair, and the quality of the product is on par with most other brands. Standard, up to par, quality. If you seek an over-sized version, and/or a more dense version, look elsewhere. These are your standard microfiber cloths.

...small, thin, useless. You can actually watch your TV through one of these things. (The TV will be a little blurry, but still watchable.) These rags are about the size of a washcloth, but not as useful. I’ve bought microfiber cloths elsewhere--they were great--these are not.
These microfiber clothes are perfect for cleaning, polishing and any thing you don't want to leave lint streaks behind.  Wear very well and have so far resisted staining.
AmazonBasics Microfiber Cleaning Cloth pack of 48 is well worth the money.  It will be a long time before I run out of these much used cleaning and polishing cloths.

I ordered these for general cleaning, and specifically to use on a solid oak table. The care instructions call for a soft cloth when cleaning. These towels fit the bill. They are soft micofiber, and clean extremely well. They are super absorbent. They go through the wash and dryer fine. The white ones look dingy after awhile, but that's what happens with white cleaning rags. I recommend washing them before use, as they have little fuzzies on them when new out of the package.. The price for these is great and they are just what I need. I will reorder if I need more in the future.
Good all round purpose product actually use in a small hand towels for guest in the bathroom. Work great for cleaning off iPods iPads and TV screens as well great for polishing glass, lint free!

These microfiber cleaning cloths are wonderful. They are absorbent, fuzz free, very soft and nice colors too.  I have used them to dust with, to polish silver with, and to clean mirrors with.  I was amazed how well they work.  Someone mentioned the "annoying tags" on them.  I just cut those off!  Simple resolution. They are a very nice size and I received the amount ordered. Great price for a very good product.

review_title: Cut down on paper towel cost
review_body: My fiance loves using paper towels and we go through them super fast. Since I bought these cloth, we saved a lot on paper towels, money and environment. I use these for washing the dishes too since they pull out the dirt easier than the regular sponge (i have stove top glass pots) I use these cloth for everything including wiping my dog down before he gets back into the house. This cuts down the frequency of washing the dog and he actually enjoys being rubbed down with the clothes. They pick up dust and dirt really well too. I think it's worth the money.

Purchased 2 months ago for use in my RV, but it works so well I use in in my home too. In the home, I mainly use it for my coffee maker. I literally refill about every 3 days. Water tastes great and it’s easy to use.  Fits nicely in the door of the refrigerator. I think it’s great and would purchase again if something went wrong with the hardware.

GOOD EVERYDAY PRICE  for  "Advanced "  BRITA  Water Filter Pitcher Replacement  (3-pack) , -  by Brita, .. same price as local retail store,... w/Free Shipping, per Amazon Minimum Order.  Like the  Newer  "Advanced"  Non pre-soak, Brita Filters,  ...* Per Instructions on each individually packaged filter :  " Rinse with Cold Water for 15 seconds, prior to use.  Carbon Dust Common 1 - 3 Fills".  A Satisfied Customer :)

The water in the city I live in is GOD AWFUL. It has so much chlorine that they might as well be scooping it out of a public pool. It's undrinkable if you have taste buds. This filter is great. The water tastes like water again and I can finally hydrate myself without feeling like I'm choking down bad tasting medicine. Highly recommend this if your city provides you old public pool water as your water source.

review_title: Very slow filtration speed, might take hours
review_body: Unfortunately, this item is a complete disappointment. Previous filters (short-term) were wonderful. I wanted to try these new filters. When I filled the pitcher with the water the speed of the water coming out from the filter was way slower then the old ones. After 2 days pf use it completely stopped working properly. It could take hours to filter 1 pitcher of water. If all of those filters are the same, then I would definitely not recommend those to anyone.

Filter worked great for three months and then all of a sudden was dripping extremely slow (pitcher wouldn’t even filter completely overnight). Was very disappointed as I paid extra for a longer lasting filter. Installed the second one today. Will see how it goes.

The long last filters are hit or miss. I got a few that didn’t work properly because they would take over an hour to drain one pitcher of water whereas one that’s not broken will have a whole pitcher filtered in about 10-15 minutes.

review_title: Strange taste now with new filters
review_body: Just started using the new Brita water filter. The water flows past the filter too fast. Also the filter has a strange taste. It stays with you for a while. Tried the filtered water and did not care for the taste. Tried the water straight from the tap. The tap water tasted softer with no aftertaste. Can't use the Brita water filters any longer. Just don't trust the taste of the water. Is there any one that has also experience this strange taste situation.

These Brita filters are amazing. They work extremely well and I feel like they last incredibly long, so really the 3 pack is just in case you happen to filter a lot of water and you need a back up. This is something I always like to keep on hand and I would recommend that other Brita users do so as well. They only take 15-20 seconds to rinse off and insert into your pitcher! I have to say this price is a lot better than I have seen in store too.

As a long time user of the standard Brita water filters, I thought I'd take a flier on these longlast lead reduction filters.  My experience with both of the filters that I purchased was that they are much slower to filter water to begin with, slow down to a crawl within a week or two, and then completely clog within a month.  I will be going back to the standard version.  I can't comment on their ability to filter lead or other contaminants, but the water tastes just the same with the standard. Oh well.

Can't beat that new filter taste right out of the fridge.. I admit, we use our filters waaaaaaay longer than they are supposed to since we use them mostly for taste since our water tastes pretty bad, but I really like these suckers. Plus the new design seems to make replacing them easier and cut down on the black floaters.. They also run the water through really fast, so you are only about a minute away from an easy pour for a new glass if you just refilled it.. Got the 3 pack and will probably last us a while.
these plates are a great value ,very sturdy plates an hold up to the messy wet foods we sometimes have, i have bought these many times an will buy more
Love being able to buy large qty at such a low price. Plus they are my favorite plates because the are pretty durable without out breaking the bank.
What can you say about paper plates. They are a lazy persons best friend. It's nice to be able to buy these without having to go to Costco.

review_title: these are very good for the price
review_body: these are very good for the price, I have already purchased 3 different times and will do so in the future. keep some quality paper plates at your house.
Very durable. Have used them a couple times with different meals on same plate. :-) Yes. I'm cheap.
Love the plates and usually buy them from Costco. Several bundles came significantly bent and basically damaged. I went back to buying them from Costco....for about the same price.

review_title: These are the perfect little plates for dessert at my daughter's party
review_body: These are the perfect little plates for dessert at my daughter's party.  There are plenty of them! The design arrived as pictured, and I was happy about that.
Great quality plates. very sturdy and they do not leak/soften easily. Shipping was fast, arrived undamaged, and overall a great purchase! highly recommended.
We got sick of doing dishes and we hate those cheap paper plates, so we use these every day for every meal. Get some and take a break from dish duty!!

I am disappointed.  Paper is thin and doesn't absorb as name brands do.. These are perfect for little hands that need drying or faces that need a wipe.  Don't expect more..  I've put this on the counter for the kids to use and went back to my name brand for the kitchen counter.. This brand of Bathroom tissue is a much better product.

I usually order the bounty select a size big rolls but decided to give these try. The name presto! Is corny but the absorbancy is fine and they tear well. The rolls are a regular size so I feel like I go through one in a day (I have kids). The real downside to these paper towels is the packaging. The box they ship in has the flaps completely glued down. Normally I wouldn't even mention something like this but it's a hell of a struggle to open it and break it down for recycling. For that reason alone I may just stick to bounty.

review_title: switched from brawny paper towels.  works great!
review_body: actually these are not too bad.  we used to use brawny paper towels before switching to these.  working good so far.

Both my wife and I started using these about a week ago. She uses them for the normall kitchen duties plus some other cleaning up. I use them in various ways for some silverware and other hobby work. We both agree the towels are very strong and absorbent, and if not better at least as good as the top name brands. Will soon put them on auto reorder list

review_title: Presto brand " pulls" ahead other brand. I choose this, Presto!
review_body: I switched from Charmin to Presto brand because of the low "dust" they have compared to the other brand.. Soft enough to use as tissue. Very good value especially when subscribed to.

These Flex-a-Size Huge Paper Towel rolls are pretty strong and double layered. At first i was skeptical, because we had always bought Bounty Select-a-Size Paper Towels. They are no longer an Amazon Prime item so we tried another kind which we did not like, but the Presto Flex-a-Size towels are great. Pure luxury. Sabiene :)

review_title: Great paper towels at an affordable price!
review_body: Bounty or Viva is my preferred brand of paper towels but they are expensive. So I decided to try these Presto Flex-a-Size paper towels when Amazon introduced them. I love these paper towels! They are strong and do not  "melt" when you dry your hands like other "off brand" paper towels do. Thanks Amazon for introducing the Presto brand! Try the Presto brand of paper towels and toilet paper, you can't go wrong!

review_title: Great quality but not the best
review_body: I love amazon and I really wanted to love these but they’re just not as great as bounty which I usually use. They aren’t as absorbant and just feel a bit lower quality. To be fair, they are still great quality and I would buy again but they’re just not the quality I need to clean up after my 3 year old who is constantly making messes.

review_title: Gave Presto! a shot.  Still prefer Bounty.
review_body: Decided to give Presto! a shot but at the negligeable difference in price (very disappointing) and lower product/construction quality (as expected) I’ll stick to Bounty Mega Roll Select-A-Size.  These feel and seem similar to other generic store brands i.e. Wegmans, Costco, SAM’s Club, etc.

Read some reviews that said these were as good as Bounty. They are very good paper towels. I have reordered as they work well. I’d say they are just a step under Bounty in terms of absorption but most certainly do the job. If I can get these a couple bucks cheaper than an equivalent order of Bounty then it is definitely worth it.

Works!!!  We purchased a new mattress for our 2-year old who is 98% potty trained, except for a few random accidents during the night.  We purchased this protector to keep the mattress from being ruined from even one accident or even sippy cup spills.  Our little one just had a potty accident in the middle of the night and the bed was bone dry!  It is very reassuring to know the several hundred dollar mattress is saved from accidents by this amazing protector!  As one will read in the description, it feels like terry cloth on the sleeping side and a very smooth vinyl (almost like a tablecloth with the same protection) on the mattress side.  It also fits the mattress very well with no slipping or pulling to fit.  VERY PLEASED!!

review_title: Used on Amerisleep memory foam mattress
review_body: Did research prior to purchasing and this was recommended for memory foam mattresses as most absorbent & quiet. I do not have any other mattress protector to compare to, but it does seem very thin and relatively quiet. It does take away from the soft texture of our memory foam mattress (amerisleep S4), but I doubt there's a better option. We don't have a mattress pad (don't need once our mattress is so soft and don't want to take away from the feel anymore), so we lay right on the mattress pad. It does take away from softness slightly and the noise sounds like a track suite pants from the 90's rubbing together. You get used to it. Overall, good product. Haven't tested its absorbency yet, but I do have a dog with occasional incontinence so knew we had to get something.  I wish the top layer was softer, it feels like a cheap quality wash rag

review_title: So good I bought another one
review_body: Just upgraded to a bigger bed, so I needed to buy a new mattress pad. I have used the queen size version on my previous mattress without any problems so I bought the same one in a larger size. This is a thin mattress pad, so if you're looking for some extra cushion, look elsewhere. We have 2 little kids so we wanted something to protect our mattress from the occasional illness or accident. After one washing (following manufacturer guidelines) I tested the waterproofing by pouring a little water on top. The water beaded off the terry cloth top but soaked in, but the waterproof material layer kept the mattress and my hand dry. The edges of the pad are a different material and I didn't test if it was waterproof. The pad is quiet when you move, unlike some waterproof mattress pads. It make the bed slightly warmer, but not enough to make it uncomfortable. This mattress pad gives me piece of mind when my kids come in to snuggle. I would definitely recommend to others.

review_title: All I really need...basic but well-made
review_body: happy to have found this right-priced mattress protector.  perfect fit for my king bed, doesn't slip off corners.  I had become dissatisfied with my high-end, high-priced mattress protector made of thick "breathable bamboo" which was supposed to provide cooler "more airy" sleeping.  It didn't, but the real problem was it was so thick it would not fit in my high capacity front load washing machine.  After a while I became disgusted with the fact that I couldn't wash it, so began the search for another.  This meets all my requirements:  waterproof, hypoallergenic, comfortable, and easily washable.  It is basic but well-made...all I really need.  If you are looking for thick and plush this is not for you.  But I learned my lesson -- thick and plush means you can't possibly launder it.

Old mattress protectors were essentially giant plastic bags that zipped around your mattress. They were a pain to put on, and half the time ripped before you got them zipped up. This one from SafeRest goes on a like a fitted sheep, but has a super soft top layer that you could really sleep on by itself without using a sheet over it. But on the underside is a thick layer that looks like it would stop any liquid from actually reaching the mattress. Super easy to put on and wash if needed. Would definitely buy again.

review_title: Using 6 months now, and totally water proof, soft comfortable and cool.
review_body: I'm impressed it's very soft. I get hot flashes, but the bed cover does not heat up with me, so it keeps me comfortable. I spilled my 32oz water bottle on my bed. All of it spilled. My quilt and sheets were utterly soaked. They had to go through the wringer, then the dryer Twice to get dry. But the mattress stayed dry, and all I had to do is dry the the cover surface with a towel, like it was a table. Mattress was totally protected. I've been using it since October. It's an Excellent product.

This mattress pad fits really nice on the king size bed. not to tight & not to loose. We have a new pillow top mattress & I do not want it to get damaged by coffee spills, body sweat smells, three little dogs sleep on the bed & definitely do not want doggy odors to seep through to the mattress. The mattress pad was laundered before using the first use.  Took forever to dry in my extra large dryer.  I missed the instructions on putting a towel in the dryer with it.  It would not dry on low heat after two hours & finally put it over shower rod to finish drying.  One of the things I really like about this mattress pad as compared to other waterproof type mattress pads is that it is soft & flexable & not crackly sounding.  The top is a terry cloth fabric.  I wish the sides were also waterproof too.  One of the problems with waterproof mattress pads is they do not breathe......my husband is always hot even though I have put two regular mattress pads on top of this waterproof pad and a quilt, he still is hot....I am not...I am just fine :)  So far quite pleased with the pad.  Will do an update next time I launder it & use a towel in the dryer per the instructions :)

review_title: Was skeptical but no pee soaked through at all!
review_body: Definitely a great purchase!  My dog peed on the bed 3 nights ago and we spent hours soaking it in vinegar/covering with baking soda and then vacuuming that all up.  I came on Amazon that day and purchased this cover even though I wasn't thoroughly convinced it would work completely.  But that dog peed on the bed AGAIN last night!  And the mattress was completely dry!  She won't be sleeping with us again for a while but not having to try to clean the mattress again today made me so happy!

review_title: Soft top but still feels and sounds like plastic
review_body: I previously bought a waterproof mattress protector from a store and it doesn't have the plastic sound or texture. I thought this would be similar but am disappointed. The protector is still loud and changes the feeling of the mattress

I purchased this for my bed because I have a 10 month old puppy in potty training.  Although she does not potty on the bed as a general rule, I know accidents may happen.  I have already washed and line dried.  It has been tested and is certainly water proof.  I don't know if it would be water proof if drenched with a LOT of liquid.  But for about 1/2 cup or a little more, it certainly is.  I'm very pleased with the product and the price.  I would recommend this product.  In fact, I plan to get another one to place on my guest bed where my young grandchildren sleep.... just in case.
The Best paper towels available!  Heavy like a towel!
Price point is pretty good. Very absorbent. Feels cheap however.

review_title: Cheaper than Walmart after sales tax
review_body: Die-hard viva fan. Beats Walmart’s in store price and you can save on the gas.
This type is not durable. It’s like a cheap version of the good stuff I used to know. Very disappointed. I’ll have to look more closely in the future to make I have the original viva

review_title: Very good product. Better than the leading competitor that we ...
review_body: Very good product.  Better than the leading competitor that we used for years. Lasts longer and is stronger
Love these - they are so soft!
Excellent
This is the only brand I use
Rolls are not big but the paper towels are good

review_title: These paper towels are the best on the market
review_body: These paper towels are the best on the market! These are money well spent. They are durable and extremely absorbent. A mess that would normally take three regular paper towels could easily be cleaned up by one of these gems!

review_title: Smaller Size, Fewer Sheets, Much More Expensive
review_body: BEWARE - the "Quick Size" is smaller than the previous Select-a-Size.  The number of sheets in each roll in this particular packaging (143) is fewer than Amazon's previous 12 roll pack of Select-a-Size (158).  The net result is a Product is now SIGNIFICANTLY MORE EXPENSIVE per square foot.. There are better values at other chains, but you need to check the per square foot cost carefully as Bounty's (deceptive) business practice is to have varying numbers of sheets in packages that have the same name.  Square Ft per package is the only measure that is currently useful.. Amazon needs to do a better job of providing unit cost measures that truly represent the underlying value/

review_title: Another big company cheats the loyal customers
review_body: Amazon converted my subscription instead of giving me a choice so I foolishly trusted that it would be equal.. IT IS NOT EQUAL. 15 fewer sheets, smaller size, loosely rolled, no longer "huge"-now "family" size. The description has a twisted way of defending the change in a positive light but the facts are there. Obviously they think consumers are morons unable to do simple math.. What really irks me is that in order to make this change, P&G had to SPEND money to change the equipment used to process this deceitful change!. I will not buy this product again because I don't like to be cheated. And I no longer TRUST P&G or Amazon.

review_title: Bounty - the quicker picker upper for Pupper!
review_body: Actually ran out of these before they arrived - OH THE PANIC.  We have a brand new piddling pup.  And believe me, Bounty really is the quicker picker upper for pupper!  Nice thick sheets, just one little section kills the piddle with a few sprays of the enzyme stuff and another sheet - DONE!  You can't even tell we have a dog.. Great, absorbent, paper towels.  The one - the only - the BEST!  Was actually having a panic attack when I was waiting for these to come I broke down and got a TJs package of three, which were killer expensive and not even 1/2 the paper towel.  SO happy when my Bounty quick size arrived!  Whew!. See the culprit in the picture - HE is why I need BOUNTY!

These Bounty Paper Towel Rolls are huge! They don’t fit on my kitchen’s PT holder. I know the trend nowadays is mega-sized paper products but I do you wish designers would consider if their products will actually fit in most consumers’ paper products holders. The paper towels themelves are super absorbent and the quick-size means you only use the amount you need for the job.  These come in at about $2.42 per roll which is good, but not great. For softness, I like Viva the best, and I can usually get those at about two dollars per roll. If I go with Aldi brand, I can cut that price in half and the rolls will fit on my paper towel holder.. All in all, you get a lot of paper towels, the choose a size feature is great, and they are thick and absorbent.

review_title: Good paper towel in a convenient size
review_body: My preferred paper towel brand has always been Brawny — because they never fail to do the job and a six-pack is often on sale at my local store — but when Amazon VINE offered these, I decided to give them a try. I use paper towels a lot and the half-size sheets are convenient.. The Bounty Quick-Size Paper Towels are about the same size as the Brawny “pick-a-size” towels I use. However, the Bounty ones are thinner, stiffer and coarser feeling. Otherwise, they do as good a clean-up as the Brawny towels. (A note of caution: I normally don’t buy “family-size” rolls because they don’t fit all paper towel holders. These barely squeezed into mine.)

review_title: Bigger than jumbo rolls of your fave PT
review_body: These are the same all-time-best paper towels as ever, just on a bigger roll.  Love the select-a-size perforations, love the absorbency, love that they are fee of any printed designs... but these "family Size" rolls are really just a tad too big.  This may not be an issue for everybody, but they barely fit on my PT dispenser at the start.  Not a big deal if you use one of those vertical dispensers, but we use a horizontal TP-style rollers attached under-cabinet, and we can't really put the roll on until we've used a couple of sheets.  That being said, there's less waste - both for the center cardboard and the packaging, so it's worth it.

What can I say? They're paper towels! Sturdier than the Seventh Generation/recycled paper towels I usually get, but I never really had a problem with those. I would actually prefer if Bounty could make some kind of effort to market themselves as sturdy + environmentally friendly.. The one unique feature about these things over your typical paper towel roll is that you can choose a thin, rectangular sheet OR a larger square sheet depending on what you need to sop up.

I normally buy Sparkle brand because it came is the extra large quantity and select-a-size. But Bounty may have just edged them out! These are thicker and bigger rolls than Sparkle and still offer a small sheet option. I cannot speak to the previous version, which others have pointed out contains 15 fewer sheets. But I can say that I'm very pleased with the quality and will be switching my order to Bounty.

These paper towels have the common 'choose your size' scoring so you can grab a small paper towel or a bigger one.  You can easily get what you need without waste.  They are super absorbent and stronger than the El Cheapo brand, for sure.  Use them for everything from basic spills to light cleaning to craft messes.  These have come in super handy all around the house.

When they call these rolls "family size," they are not joking. The rolls are huge. I also appreciate the option to use smaller-size sheets when necessary, without having to tear the roll to shreds.. These are the thick, quality and absorbent paper towels you've come to expect from Bounty. Really pleased with them.
These are nothing special. They don't fill out the pillow covers' corners and can't be fussed with/manipulated to do this acceptably. Would not buy again.
Worked great with the pillow case I ordered. Full, soft pillow.

review_title: Satisfied with this insert and the price!
review_body: Exactly what I needed to fit a 12× 12 cover over this insert.It wasn't flat like a previous one I purchased the pillow is nice and fluffy and the corners are filled generously as well.I think this is almost better than I had anticipated it to be after reading mixed reviews. Price point I'm very satisfied and though it wasn't expensive i feel I truly got a good deal and good quality for the price.I appreciate that it's hypoallergenic as well.Would and most likely be buying more of these.Keep in mind their are several sellers who offer this so perhaps every seller may offer this pillow same style mybe different brand or very similar. That's all I can think of since some reviews were great and some not so great!
Got what I paid for!
These came vacuum sealed which concerned me at first, but they quickly fluffed up and are the perfect size.

The price has gone up since I bought this, but I'd still consider it for the quality. I bought it to fill a linen-cotton throw-pillow case, and it fills it out perfectly. The quality of the insert is really top notch.

review_title: It fit perfectly into the special zippered case and I just love it! Very nice quality will buy again
review_body: I was very impressed with the quality of this pillow. It fit perfectly into the special zippered case and I just love it! Very nice quality will buy again.
Fit and filled perfectly the 18" x 18" pillow cover I purchased separately.
Good throw pillows for the couch.. I would prefer if they were a touch bigger, but that's not a knock on this product.

I ordered this to replace a large pillow I'd bought from a thrift store that lost it's shape.  I used it as a backrest when I'm on the couch.. This one just arrived, & I love it!  As usual, I'm always grateful for others who  take the time to write reviews on products.  I followed the advice of many, and did NOT buy a cover a size smaller - as the manufacturer recommends.  It would have made this feel like a basketball, rather than being soft and pliable.  The cover I have is the same size as the pillow and it's perfect.
Great product and works great! I've had no issues. In case anyone's wondering: no, this does not burn your hand while using it.

review_title: Works well on light fabrics (cotton shirts) but pretty ineffective on thicker fabrics (dress shirts)
review_body: Works well on light fabrics (cotton shirts) but pretty ineffective on thicker fabrics (dress shirts). The top part snaps into place but after the first use, it seems the plastic has warped from the heat and now it stay connected, causing hot steam to flow from the middle.
A perfect travel steamer but I use it at home and I love it! Heats up very fast and does the job without a big bulky steamer to store.
I was quite amazed at how well this worked. It’s phenomenal and works on thick fabrics too! Love it!!!

review_title: ... have to return this steamer as I was very disappointed because it had high ratings
review_body: I have to return this steamer as I was very disappointed because it had high ratings. It leaked water and made water stains on my beautiful drapes. Little steam came out but water dripped all over.

I can't believe how easy to use and how effective this is. I know how to use an iron and I like my clothes looking nice but I have to say that unless I need to crease my pants, it wI'll be steamer all the way!
A nicely slim, easy way to steam. It is well made and beats dragging out the ironing board and iron!
I got a job that requires me to look polished. This steamer works great and has saved me so much time in the morning compared to using an iron.

review_title: Less than 6 months of owning it, it started ...
review_body: Less than 6 months of owning it, it started spewing jets of hot water instead of steam. Dangerous and messy. Junk!!!!
Does good enough job.  Wife uses it for scrubs and can get an outfit out of one fillup.  Lightweight and easy to use. Good quality.

These are really great lights that worked well. The different lighting settings are great. Two problems I had with this though:  the lighting is NOT the soft white listed. It is more of a blue white. And the power cord is really really short so an extension cord is needed.

Super cute! I just wish the clear cord was longer so it can reach to the plug in easier! As you can see on my picture the clear cord that runs to the plug in is only about half the length of on of the strands. That’s the only downside.
These illuminate just like the picture shown. I don't regret this purchase one bit. Can't wait to use them for a birthday party I am throwing.
Absolutely beautiful. Thinking about buying one more for the living room.

review_title: I bought these for my daughter's room. They have ...
review_body: I bought these for my daughter's room. They have a lot of settings and they looks really cute hanging from her window. They are really long and too wide for a typical window so I hung them much higher than the window and had to double back the width.

review_title: I love this strand of lights and all the options
review_body: I love this strand of lights and all the options. Hut a heads up for cat owners, the strands are VERY thin, so only a couple chomps from your kitty and that sections done. I ended up buying a second strand and stapling it to my ceiling

review_title: Be careful, they tangle easy. Extra LONG
review_body: I love the look, they're exceptionally long. They arrived neat but, as a warning, don't unwrap each strand without a solid game plan. I did that and they stayed in a tangled ball in my cabinet for a few months before my fiance found them  and patiently untangled them. Otherwise they're great!

review_title: Even more beautiful than I imagined.
review_body: These are even more beautiful than I imagined.  I highly recommend these.  The bulbs are small rice bulbs and they give a lovely delicate display of light.

I love these lights! Several different options on how you want the lights to shine, and although I don't like clicking 7 times to get to just the regular glow lighting these lights are worth the price!

Paired together 3 of these to cover a large wall leading up to my front door. Look really good and everyone is impressed. When they are turned off, they aren't too noticable because of their light colour

Item is nice and clearly does its job. My only flaw was the stiffness of the item. Have had it on for a couple weeks now and it still seems pretty stiff. Again works just fine but it would be nice if it was a little more flexible.

This is a great shower curtain liner.  The worst thing about getting a new one is the awful plastic smell that stays for weeks. This shower curtain had no order right out of the packaging.  Not only that but it was very flexible.  Other shower curtains are stiff and don't move well.  Totally satisfied with the purchase and will be recommending it to my friends and family.. Thanks!

I love the thickness and the material on this curtain liner. I have yet to see mold form on it, and I am happy with that.. The only con I have on this product is the magnets at the bottom of the curtains. They do not work as well as I would've liked them to.. Other than that, I am happy with my purchase and would recommend to anyone who wouldn't mind the magnets.

I use this shower curtain liner as a straight-up shower curtain. Nothing else added. My bathroom is tiny and I like being able to see out when I'm in the shower. This curtain is far better than the one I had before, which lasted about a year before succumbing to mold. It is lighter, stronger, and more flexible. Soap seems to just slide right off it too. It had a bit of plasticy smell when first unwrapped, but the smell was completely gone 2 hours later. So, it has met my every expectation and even cost a little less than the older not-so-good liner.
Excellent shower curtain liner.  Has metal grommets to prevent tearing although it is thick in it's own right.. Pros:. Good Price Point. Quality Construction. Cons:. None

review_title: Good liner, very good price, fast shipping
review_body: Good liner at a very good price.  I wish it was heavier, but I think the days of finding "hotel quality" liners easily is over.  This exceeded anything I found locally and was less expensive, so very happy with it.

review_title: LiBa Shower Curtain Liner -- a good purchase
review_body: This is a reasonably good shower curtain at a reasonable price.  It is well manufactured and does not have a strong "plastic" smell. The magnets arranged at the bottom of the curtain work. The metal reinforced grommets are great and should add to the life of the curtain.  Because it is clear, lots of light gets in.  The only negative is that the curtain is a bit stiff, but I hope that after hanging a while it will soften up.. Overall, I find this to have been a good and useful purchase.

review_title: Awesome and not just for Showering.
review_body: This is the best curtain I have found for the price. I even buy them for non-shower related tasks. Great drop cloth for painting. Don't want to make a mess on your garage floor when changing the oil? Works for that. Weed barrier in your garden? Works for that? Need to wrap a dead body before dumping in the river? Haven't tried it, but I think it would work well for that too.. Does a great job at not getting hard water stains. The Anti-mildew coating is also a kind of water proofer which prevents spots. It also won't fog up, so if you use just this people can watch you shower, if you are in to that..... Typically you will pair this with a cloth curtain, but you don't have to.. I really do use these for a lot of things because they are so inexpensive.

review_title: There are nice grommets at the top
review_body: This is a high quality shower curtain - not a thin one that blows whenever the heat comes on. There are nice grommets at the top, and a weight at the bottom to help it stay down. I am very happy with this purchase, and this seller. Would not hesitate to buy from them again.

Very light weight.  The magnets do not have enough power to hold the liner in place.  That's the negative.  Positive, it DID NOT SMELL.  Seems like good quality but because of the lightweight, I gave it 3 stars.  It's okay but nothing to "write home about".

review_title: Very nice, very accurate, and very fast results!
review_body: Works fast and accurate!  It also looks very elegant, and I really love the display too!  Don't worry, you're not going to crack this thing by standing on it like some people think.  Not sure about the battery life, but it doesn't take that many, so I'd be ok with changing them every now and then if it came to that.

Just bought it to replace a similar scale that gave up after two years.  I vacillated between this, the most economical, and a more expensive one that may be of better quality.  But I reasoned that all this electronic stuff has a limited life (my high dollar indoor outdoor thermometer just gave up too) so just treat it as a disposable item, buy the cheapest one and plan on replacing it every year or two.  That said, there is a lot of discussion about accuracy on these scales.  I don't now if it records my exact weight, but it seems to be consistent.  I am tickled by these folks that complain about 1 lb difference day to day.  In my experience your can easily vary by a pound or two just from water.

This is the second scale we bought.  The first was for personal use and it works so nicely that we bought this one as a gift to our daughter.  The scale is very sleek and accurate.  It takes only a few seconds after you stand on it to give a stable, digital readout of your weight.  I like the blue background color also.  It is a good contrast to the black numbers.  I also like that it can weigh in kilograms.  That comes in handy if you are going to travel overseas and all the weight restrictions are metric.  We had our personal scale for over a year and it has worked flawlessly.  I would certainly recommend to a friend.

review_title: Looks and feels like an expensive, contemporary scale
review_body: This is an excellent scale for the money. I keep seeing reviews that it isn’t accurate the first time you step on it, but that’s because every time it turns on it recalibrates itself. Whenever you move it, you need to step your foot on it, take it off and let it zero, then weigh yourself. Otherwise, it’s going to account for the weight of the scale and read 4-5 lbs over your true weight. Or just don’t move the scale and you don’t have to worry about it. Mine hasn’t spontaneously shattered, and it looks sturdy enough to where that won’t happen, but I guess we’ll see in the next couple of months if it randomly decides to kick the bucket.  Great product!

I'm very happy with this product.  The numbers are large and easy to read with a degree of squinting, which is saying a lot because I'm very near-sighted and frequently seem to weight myself before finding my glasses.  The scale seems to be accurate.  It's very lightweight and it resets very quickly.  I'm very glad I bought this.

review_title: Appears to be a good product
review_body: The item was delivered promptly in a nice and appropriate package. The unit started working right out of the box (of course, after the plastic strip on the battery tab was pulled out). It appears to show correct weight, almost exactly same as the weight given by our 10-year old another unit.  This product looks pretty and the numbers are easy to read.

I liked what I read about this product.  Ordered one for my Mom thinking about order one for my own house.  I did not believe her when she told me  that it did not work.  Went to her house to check it out.  Within 10 minutes, my weight were 186.5 lbs, 178 lbs, 173 lbs, and 188 lbs.  So I wonder why 72% of the 13,334 reviewers gave this product a Five-Star rating?  Am I the unlucky one that received a defective product?  Anyway, returning it.

I have had scale for 2 years. It worked well, but started staying on without use. I would remove batteries but still same thing would happen.. My scale has stopped even with changing batteries and it's still doesn't work. I have to buy a new one. It worked well, very accurate, but now I will be buying a new one since this will not work at all.

Loved it at first then started messing up only after 4 months of ownership. Couldn't return by then out of period to return.. Company would not replace or refund $$. Out of my $$ only after 4 months . Do not buy from them. Bad product and company will only take your $$ then your on your on.

Scale claims a .2 pound sensitivity, but fails to register small changes in weight.  Scale shows same weight multiple days in a row, which doesn't happen in real life (I used a balance beam type scale daily for decades, so I know.).  You can even drink a couple of mugs of coffee without changing the weight, even after re-calibrating it.  So if you want a scale for daily weight control, look elsewhere.
Good price and I like the bulk size
durable brand and a super deal
these are good paper towels for the price
These paper towels are amazing. Better than any I have bought in the store.
Super absorbent great price love these paper towels

Excellent value- for under $20 you can get 24 rolls of paper towels delivered to your door (Amazon Prime). The paper towels are just as good as Bounty's. There are 52 sheets per roll, they are durable and soak up spills well. Writing this review reminds me to order more-this time I am going to use Alexa because there is a promotion for $10 off any reorder if you use Alexa for it - so this time I will be getting 24 rolls for about $10!
Cheap and really good paper
This is a fine product - plenty of paper!!!
they work
Good quality
it really do help with garbage scent
Great bag.  Decent scent

review_title: The bags are ok. My issue is the actual ...
review_body: The bags are ok. My issue is the actual drawstring part. If we arent careful it completely pulls away from the bag.
Super
Strong and smell great.

review_title: not breakage and easy to pull strings for transport
review_body: Durable and strong. No leaks, not breakage and easy to pull strings for transport.

review_title: These were the worst bags I've purchased yet
review_body: These were the worst bags I've purchased yet. This is second time ordering them and alot of them ripped along the seams when I opened them.
Great scent, tough , never tears
Ok
Love these
So good to have product in supply at good price
Good Value
sparkles... love it
Best bargain on the market....
Not quite as good as some other paper towels I had bought, but they will do.
very nice
Can't beat the price!
Best paper towels for someone who uses a lot on there home....great price!

review_title: ... in your cart any day and the price is better than my local wholesaler
review_body: this beats loading up paper towels in your cart any day and the price is better than my local wholesaler.
These paper towels last me a long time I use them a lot when cooking. Great paper towels.

I generally like Glad trash bags, but these are just too thin. Holes easily poke in the sides and they rip at the top if the bag is too heavy. I want a trash bag that can actually handle the capacity it is meant to hold. These bags just don't do it and I can't wait until I'm through with them so I can get something better.
Great as always.
Exactly as described, Thanks
It doesn’t even deserve one star. Wanna give it zero star. Cheaply made. Never buying again.

At some point, Glad began  making this product scented.  These trashbags didn't used to be. Now they smell gross and toxic.  I will look for a different trash bag that is unscented.  They should include this on the product description.
Great price. I never had one tear in all the years I've used these.
The handles pull away from the bag. It's impossible to lift it out of the can, even half full, without ripping the bag.
great and stretchy did not brake. also almost like a grip at the top so it dosnt slide down when you fill it up.
I have a 15 gallon trash can, these surprisingly fit perfect!! Draw strings are very sturdy even when the bag is full and heavy.
durable bags! served it's purpose
some of the best paper towels out there at a reasonable cost.
best deal
Great product
Great product and great price.
A good quality, and Quantity
Great price, great product..
Delivery fast towels just what it says
Great product
These are the perfect size.
I have always loved this paper towel.

review_title: i fold these in half and put on my swiffer ...
review_body: i fold these in half and put on my swiffer sweeper,  they grab everything from tracked in dirt to pet hair.  Toss them in the wash and never buy the disposable pads again!

review_title: The annoying tags cost at least one star
review_body: Otherwise, they're microfiber cloths that basically do what you think they will. They could be thicker and sort of wad up after you wash and dry them, but they work.

Not sure if this deserves the label of microfiber. Maybe micro-sandpaper would be better as it left scratches all over my car. It's very thin and does not absorb well. It's price is cheap but still no excuse to be so poor quality
Several were missing

review_title: Please make sure Amazon sends out correct towel count!!
review_body: Disappointed that the towel count was only 23 (not the 24 count as stated for product).  I normally would not be too picky about my products, but it's an Amazon product!!  Towels came in light plastic packaging, before i threw them in the wash that's when I decided to see if I had the correct number of towels.  Thinking no big deal that I would get 8 each of the blue, white, and yellow towels Amazon shorted me one.  Towels had a weird chemical smell to them when I opened up my washer to throw in dryer.  Hopefully smell won't be an issue after several washes. I plan on using these towels to clean my oven and interior car.
These are very nice.  Use to clean computer screens to wiping off golf cart and car.  Wash up great.  I just reordered more.
great for polishing the sailboat.

Twenty-four rags at a great price. Plus, they've held up great with every cleaning job I've thrown at them, plus they survive the washer in great shape and air dry completely in 20-30 minutes. Hard to beat.

While the white towels are great and work very well the yellow and blue are horrible. When you get them wet the color runs all over what you are cleaning as well as getting all over the towels you wash them with.. Spend a few extra dollars and buy all white.

review_title: Great set for all over the house!
review_body: Awesome purchase, so glad I bought these! I use white in the kitchen, blue for cleaning the rest of the house, and yellow in the car! I love these... my only complaint is they shrink in the dryer.

review_title: I am disappointed as it filter 10 cup dispenser really really slow
review_body: I bought 3 filters and used one filter for about two weeks now. I am disappointed as it filter 10 cup dispenser really really slow. I took more than 1 hour to go thru thru the dispenser! This usually happened only at the end of the filter life rather than a new one! I wrote to Brita and am waiting for their response.  I will provide update later.

review_title: does not fit all brita water filters
review_body: This is specifically advertised as "the only brand where the filter fits every brita pitcher" and guess what? It didn't fit my Brita pitcher. I can't close the top. My roommate can't close the top. We tried googling, youtube, to see if we were somehow missing something. I specifically have a Brita brand pitcher, not a different brand, not a generic pitcher, it's slightly slimmer than the regular ones but the filters seem to be the same.. AND as this product says, it should fit ANY Brita pitcher. Waste of money. Want a refund.

review_title: but my husband noticed the water smelled like sewage. I even sterilized the pitcher and put ...
review_body: These filters were awful. At first I thought it was just me, but my husband noticed the water smelled like sewage. I even sterilized the pitcher and put a new filter, just to find that in a week it was back to stinking. I'll stick with my pur

review_title: I love my Brita water pitcher
review_body: I love my Brita water pitcher, but no one else fills it up but me.  My grand daughters think my water is delicious and do not care about drinking fruit flavored sugary juices.  One problem is, since they have been staying with me temporarily one of them loosens the filter to fill up the pitcher because it is quicker.  I can tell the difference.

review_title: The second one I opened works great.
review_body: One of my filters kept floating in the pitcher.  First time that's ever happened to me.  Kept mixing the filtered and non filtered water - totally missing the point of having it in there.  I tried everything to get that air bubble out over the course of a week.  Gave up and threw it out.  The second one I opened works great.

review_title: These are cheaper than the Britta filters but they also ...
review_body: These are cheaper than the Britta filters but they also take about 5 times as long to filter the water. So far they work but slow. Takes about 20 minutes to fill the pitcher vs. 4 minutes with the Britta originals.. UPDATE after a month of using, these are worthless. They stop filtering water all together after about 20 uses. Keep the top of the Britta filter full of water and make it dump all over you as it just did to me now.. JUNK! DO NOT BUY.

review_title: Great price that is unbeatable by other stores
review_body: They filter the gross dorm water to be clean and taste bright/fresh, and fit into all of the different Brita pitchers that exist in my dorm. Great price that is unbeatable by other stores, and I like having 3 at once so I know I have a backup. The package arrived a bit damaged from shipping because they sent the box in an envelope, which was concerning.

review_title: Lasted less time than regular filters
review_body: Both filters lasted 2 months max. The water was barely coming through the filter as though they were clogged. I'm deeply disappointed to find these "long lasting" filters lasted less than the regular filters offered by Brita. I will NOT purchase these again and I recommend the same to all. Stick with the regular filters that last 2-3 months each are much less in price. Note: the water didn't taste any better or worse.

I am having a problem with these filters.  Have been using them correctly, changing them every 60 days, without problem.  My next change date is 9/11/15.  This morning it looks like green algae at the bottom of my pitcher.  I've tried many things and cannot get it to go away.  Perhaps the filter is faulty?  I will have to change it ahead of schedule.  I'm the only one using the pitcher and drink 64 oz. of water five days a week.  Your input would be greatly appreciated.  Thank you

review_title: This did not work in my Brita pitcher. At ...
review_body: This did not work in my Brita pitcher.  At first the water filtered through (in my mind) way to fast.  Then after a couple of weeks, it was down to a  slow drip.  It took an hour to filter half a pitcher.  I expect to receive a refund as I have returned it today. 8/4/17

review_title: Not enough bang for your buck
review_body: I like these plates but I'm not too thrilled about the price. Just found the exact size and brand at our local Sam's Club and it was MUCH cheaper with more plates in the package.
The value is good, multiple uses. Can't handle heavy, hot foods without losing its shape. In this situation it could be a problem.

review_title: These are quite firm especially if you double up.
review_body: These are quite firm especially if you double up. I don't compost them because of the waterproof finish. I wish it was made from recycled paper.

review_title: They are the perfect size, and I like the edge on them
review_body: I order these through subscribe and save, and have them delivered once a month.  They are the perfect size, and I like the edge on them.  Sturdy and colorful!
I use paper plates daily and I have had great luck with Dixie Everyday paper plates. They are reasonably priced and very reliable.
Walmart has giant packs now for cheaper. Other than that, Dixie is the epitome of good paper plates. That's about all there is to it.
Deepish plates with a nice wax reinforcement on them ... they hold a good size cut of meat and some sides without falling apart or leaking through!

We go through plates like crazy during the summer and always seem to run out! Amazon shipped these right to our door. They came just like the picture showed and are durable for summer picnics. Will be ordering again every summer!
I needed something that would not leak through, and would be strong enough to hold the food. I'm glad that I went with dixie
Say goodbye to doing dishes on my camping trips. Very happy with this purchase. My wife laughed at me because you get so many plates. Very happy!

I bought the 12 count Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels.  I have always been a Bounty user in the past but the price on these towels were worth the switch.  They perform just as well as Bounty  --  heavy-duty, absorbent, and I love the flex-a-size.  I will keep buying as long as the price is right.

Presto, a phrase often used in magic acts, aptly fits this product.  New to me at least with regard to online paper towels options, I discovered that Presto towels are marketing magic -- right price, thick towels, hefty rolls, and delivered to my door.  This product does not disappoint.
First time purchase of this brand. Just like Bounty but cheaper in price.
Presto! Paper towels are a great value. However, I recently used them to clean my windows the other day and they are very “linty” and leave too much “fuzz” behind.

These are pretty good towels.  As good or better than the premium branded towels I'd buy at the grocery or big box.  I just wish it was easy to find towels that are the old full size, instead of half.  I usually end up with 3 halves when I try to get two and waste half a towel!

I'm surprised how good these are. Very similar to the Bounty paper towels I get from Costco. I bought these because they were on sale and had a coupon. They end up more expensive than the Bounty paper towels (when Costco offers a coupon) so I will go back to Bounty.

review_title: good product for a really good price
review_body: good product for a really good price. we are simple folks. if you're looking for an expert critique, cant give ya one. need a paper towel? we grab one, use it, throw it in the garbage. cant give why it better than other towels. it is well priced and does its job.

review_title: You get what you pay for.
