review_body: Did not like the texture. Low price but the roll is gone in a 24 period. Just order Scott  again still the best value.

I usually buy Bounty, but gave these a try. They dont hold up very well. I have started grabbing 2 sheets, rather than one, just to wipe down the counters and they thin out so quickly. I wont buy these again.

review_title: Nope, sorry, but the quality and consumer-friendly Kirkland costs less at less convenient Costco!
review_body: 2 pgs, 6 each.. Unless you have 6 holder/dispensers to replenish at the same time,. up to 5 rolls have the opportunity to get dirty or dusty waiting their turn.. AND. because they're not individually wrapped,. they dry out and have a terrible touch.

review_title: Work in water resistant. Otherwise nicely made.
review_body: Gave a 4 because it doesn't seem too be as waterprrof as stated. A little spill and cleane fit seemed too soak through.  Otherwise breathable and great for the Purple Mattress.  Would love too see it work with the purple sheets they have every one via PURPLE waiting months in back order. King Sheets are not cheap. Work on water resistant and a 5 stars.Grazie . Fits nice and still loose as to not ruin the new mattress as they recommended this for that particular Mattress.

review_title: ... work very well (it seems quite thin) it's worked like a charm
review_body: I've had this mattress protector on my bed for a few weeks and despite wondering how it could possibly work very well (it seems quite thin) it's worked like a charm.  When removing the product from the packaging there was no lingering smell but I noticed the product was quite light weight and very noisy.  Despite my initial concerns I threw it in the wash to discover that it holds a good amount of water.  After an extra spin cycle and a trip through the dryer it was still quite noisy but lacking an alternative I put it on the bed anyways.  Once on there's no noise, it's super thin so you hardly notice it's there - until you drop a cup of coffee onto the bed after tripping over a cat.  OOPS!  Worried about the brand new Tuft & Needle bed I'd just bought I hurriedly removed all of the linens to find my new mattress as perfect as the day I'd gotten it.  Despite being so thin not a drop of coffee had made it's way to the mattress underneath.  Success!  Another trip through the wash has the protector looking good as new and right back on the bed.  I'm quite pleased with my purchase and wouldn't hesitate to order more.

review_title: The best cover for your mattress
review_body: I have tried quite a few different mattress covers through the years and here is why these are the best in my opinion:. 1. Low profile - they are thin but very well made. I really don't like big bulky covers.. 2. Waterproof - you never know when you will get a spill on your bed and this cover will keep you protected. It's definitely worth the investment.. 3. Nice soft top - There is no plastic feel to the cover and the top side is soft and gentle. I've never felt "hot" like some others that were waterproof.. I haven't found these in any stores so finding these here on Amazon was a good find. I have bought one of these for all my family's beds and everyone really seems to like them.

This is a great mattress pad.  I have been using a matress pad that was torn up and, a hard time getting on the bed.  I needed to buy a new one for years.  This is awesome matress pad.  It fits well not to smal when you wash it.  Don’t have to really struggle with it.  Would buy this product again.  Even though this is a higher price then I have ever spent on a matress pad,  sometimes you get what you pay for.

review_title: Great mattress cover at a reasonable price!
review_body: UPDATE 12/7/15: Below is my original review for context. I have now had this cover for almost half a year and feel confident in saying I'm still happy with the product quality and the price. The main reason for getting this cover is because we have a dog that every now and then goes in the house, usually only when really anxious. I bought a nice but pricey mattress that I want to last for years, and didn't want to take chances. I believe the dog wet the bed once since we've had the cover, and it did not leak onto the mattress. We have washed the cover two or three times and haven't had any issues getting it dry in our old, cheap dryer. Still no noise, no problems with fit, no changing the way the mattress feels. I wish I had purchased this mattress cover last time I bought a mattress.. Original review:. This isn't the most thorough review as I've only had this mattress cover for a few weeks (no spills yet, thankfully!), but I wanted to give my initial impressions. I have faith that this mattress is hypoallergenic, waterproof, and everything else it claims. A 10 year warranty is better than I would have expected.. What I can say for certain is this cover doesn't alter the feel of the mattress, which is one of my largest issues with waterproof covers (or any bed cover). We just got a nice new mattress that feels amazing, and this cover doesn't change that! It doesn't make noise when you move, and it fits snug to a standard mattress size--no excess fabric, and no tight stretching (like my last mattress/cover combo). It also seems very well made and had no odor. The price was great and I look forward to not worrying about it being stuck if anything happens during the 10 year warranty period.

review_title: Easily washable yet very noisy under sheets
review_body: I’m giving this mattress cover 4 out of 5 stars because it is very noisy. The reviews I read said it doesn’t produce sounds yet when I move or adjust my sleeping position all I hear is my body moving on top of plastic. At first I didn’t think it was a big deal but it’s become so annoying. I do love how easy it was to wash and dry and put on my mattress. Unfortunately after using it for a week, I’ll be looking for a different mattress cover & returning this one.

This product is very good.....and fits our deep side mattress nicely.  The quality of the mattress protector is great, well made and easy to wash/dry.  The cotton feel of the top is soft and not crinkly.  I gave a four star to the durability since I just rec'd it and don't know how long it will last....but have a feeling it will go 5-star all the way.

review_title: Changing my review- awesome protector! Just hot to sleep on.
review_body: It's probably a good mattress protector but sure can't sleep on it, especially during the summer months. All I do is sweat! I'm trying to find another pad to put between it and me so I can keep the protection of my mattress but stay cool too.. ***Updated Sept 19, 2014- so that is what I wrote when I originally reviewed this pad. Well, I have been sleeping on it, with another thin pad between it and my sheets which has helped me stay cooler at night. Yesterday morning I woke up with a young child in my bed and it was soaked! Yep, he had an accident on my 6 month old mattress. I panicked as I stripped the bedding from it and could not believe when I got it all off. The mattress was bone dry! I am very impressed! We are done with the diaper stage , so this was more than just a leaking diaper. He outright had an accident, but this mattress protector lived up to what it said and kept my mattress dry! I am very pleased!

Great mattress protector. I just bought an all foam mattress from Tuft & Needle and this is one of the protectors they recommend on their website. It fits perfectly! Snug all around. It did feel a little "plasticy" right out of the package, and even after I washed it. But when it's actually fit over your mattress and you put a sheet over it, you'd have no idea. The top of the protector is terry cloth so no worries about it feeling funny under your sheets.. If you need a hidden barrier to protect your mattress from adult activities, this is the one!

review_title: So far so good! It fit our extra deep king size mattress ...
review_body: Our four year old sneaks into our bed at some point each night and there have been times when her nighttime pull-up diaper didn't manage to be adequate ;). To mitigate any more mattress damage, I went to Amazon and found the SafeRest Premium. So far so good! It fit our extra deep king size mattress beautifully, hasn't shifted or bunched or made rustling noises AND it resists accidents leaking into the mattress. All at a fair price: well done!
Love having paper towels delivered!!
good deal
They are soft and stick together on the roll.  Don't care for them.
very soft and absorbent.  Used to use bounty, now after trying Viva, that's what everyone now prefers at work. So much softer and one select a size sheet drys hands.
Quality product and price
Paper towels where all wet in the box because of the rain.and I got charged for it after the representative told you can throw it away . I need my refund ASAP .
Good price and quality
I love these paper towels! They are a bit pricey compared to some other brands, but they are worth it.
Great for smoothing cakes

review_title: Affordable and convenient purchasing my favorite paper towel.
review_body: Viva is my favorite paper towel.  Purchasing from Amazon is affordable and convenient.

Bounty has long been the paper towl of choice in our house.  It picks up faster and holds moisture better than anything else I’ve used.  These are “select-a-size” rolls that are perforated at 5 ¾” intervals so you can tear at the most appropriate length for the job, potentially saving paper over the life of the roll.

review_title: Love the size of the sheets
review_body: These are great paper towels. The best thing about them is that the pick-a-size lines keep the individual size of each sheet small, thereby not forcing you to mop up something tiny with a huge sheet. they soak up a lot of liquid too. Being able to buy them in a 12 pack is a great idea - they'll last for ages.

Bounty has always been the gold standard of towels.  I like the smaller size option, but I usually use two smaller ones, so just like a regular sized paper towel.  They don't disintegrate like other brands.  As far as paper towel quality, I like these.  As far as changing sizes, prices, etc., buyer beware.

What’s there to say about Bounty? It is a premium brand paper towel with excellent absorption. Unique to this package is that the sheets are half the normal size making it easier to handle small spills without wasting an entire towel.

Great product for just about everything to dust and clean. The half sheet keeps waste to a minimum. They are thick and soft. They are great for cleaning up spills for liquids and paint. I keep a roll handy in my craft room.
Love these paper towels.  They are thick and absorbent. Pulls off the roll easily one-handed without tearing off into strips and pieces like some brands.  Good price on subscribe and save.
Absorbs liquids very well but does a streaky job when using to clean glass windows or mirrors.
Superb.

review_title: Really thick sheets, love convenience of deciding size to use each time.
review_body: see above
Pricey

This cushion has very nice loft, I use it as a booster in my daughter’s hammock swing seat so she’s not so far down in it. You’ll definitely want to get a cover for it, the material is that stuff that seems to collect dust easily.
PERFECT FIT.

The FAQs suggests to buy a size up, but after reading the comments I decided against it.. I'm glad I did, because this pillow insert was almost too fluffy for my cover! No, the corners don't fill all the way, but at $7 for the 18x18, I don't mind. I'm sure that with use the extra plush center will even out to the corners.. This isn't a high end pillow insert, but it does the job and made my pillow covers look nice: 8.5/10.
Pillow fluffy enough.  However, the corners had NO fluffyness as there was no stuffing in the corners at all.

Great pillows for the cases I bought. Size was as described. Very inexpensive and fast shipping. One of them way kind of lumpy, but they were vacuum packed so I believe they'll puff up in short order. Thanks!
Perfect for my new throw pillow covers.

So when I first opened the box, I thought these were the wrong size because they looked rectangular. Then I ripped open the plastic and voila! Out sprang two fluffy pillows. I let them fluff up on their own for a bit and then put covers on them. Safe to say they're super soft and great for resting on as well as for home decor.

review_title: Great and does NOT smell funny!!
review_body: My daughter loves it.  It filled the pillow case great and stays puffy AND does NOT smell : )  Bonus of buying "made in the USA" products!
Great pillow insert. Not flimsy!
Product as described ..easy to use pillow insert.

Waste of money!!! If I could figure out how to return it now I would...threw out packaging and return info. Putting my regular iron on steam was more effective than this product....bascially it did nothing.. Very disappointed
I love it...never had a steamer before.  It is very easy to use and compact for travel.

review_title: I used this product once and it will not work ...
review_body: I used this product once and it will not work again. I turn it on and no steam comes out after more than 10 minutes.
After a month of having my steamer it started to spit out hot water. DO NOT BUY!!!!! Tried contacting the company no response. It’s a safety issue. Will never buy again.
Very cheap. Does not work.

review_title: Not worth paying double the price for this
review_body: Broke after a month. Had another steamer with a different brand that was more durable.
It's small but works great!  It got the wrinkles out of my daughters shower curtain which would have been a pain to iron.  It will be great to take on our trip next  week.
works well and I am very happy with it.
DO NOT BUY THIS! The heating element broke suddenly, sending boiling water all over the room and almost burning me. See photo.
This is my second steamer -didn’t like my old one as it didn’t work. This little thing is great! Quick to heat up and steams those wrinkles out quickly. Wish I’d bought it sooner!
One of the strands went out after only 2 weeks. I really liked them at first but now it looks funny and I'm really disappointed.
I ordered warm white lights but the ones that I got were a bluish white. They don’t look like the lights in the description at all.

review_title: These get tangled VERY easily!! I would make sure they are UP ...
review_body: These get tangled VERY easily!!  I would make sure they are UP before untieing the hang down parts!!  Not sure if they will be usable again without major untangling but they were BEAUTIFUL!!!!
I’m upset because only 1 box of them is working and the 2nd one flashed a little and then went dead.
They are wonderful! I put them under a tapestry and i just love the way it looks!

I’m in love with these lights. We hung them on a wall behind a family picture collage and bookshelf and they are just the right brightness on setting 8 to leave them on all the time. They’re beautiful any time of day and have even put up with our cats batting at them from time to time!

Love these behind my bed. Easy to install and make the room so cozy! I like the multiple settings they have. The only thing I wish it had was an on off switch instead of unplugging them every time you want to turn them off.

review_title: I LOVE these lights in my daughter's bedroom window
review_body: I LOVE these lights in my daughter's bedroom window! My new puppy chewed up the cord on the first set I ordered and I had to replace them. They really make the room special.

I love these so much!!!. I have two sets in my room for my canopy bed and behind my TV, they don't look super dense but they're super long so if you needed to double up for a brighter and fuller look no problem.. Also if you get more then one pair you can connect them together if you need a longer strands for some reason.. A remote is attached to the end where it plugs in. Theres a lot of settings so it's kinda tedious getting back to the not patterned lights

Love these lights!! They are perfect. I used mine for a curtain backdrop and it was beautiful. The lights come with a remote attached to change the light settings like twinkle, fade and others. If you get more than one string light there is a plug on one end to plug in the other set of lights. That's my plan to buy another set so I can use it on larger backdrops. You won't be disappointed.

This is a nice thick shower liner with magnets on the bottom to help keep it in place. So far it has been easy to clean and I haven't seen any signs of mold or other growths on it. The price was reasonable and I'm completely satisfied with it.

review_title: Super thick, durable- a little cumbersome though
review_body: This curtain is super thick and heavy... maybe too thick and heavy... I use it under a fabric shower curtain and it always seems too thick to fold back out of the way to give my little ones a bath. It kid of bounces out when I try to push it all the way back. Seems sturdy though.

review_title: I needed a shower curtain that didn't leave a bad smell behind when you put it on the shower ...
review_body: I needed a shower curtain that didn't leave a bad smell behind when you put it on the shower rod.  I also worry about the material that these liners are made of. I looked up reviews and this was suppose to be good. I waited to write this review  and it still is in good condition.  I think it could use another little magnet on the bottom to hold it against the tub but that's not a major thing I still gave it 5 stars.

review_title: The liners work great for a few months- I still have to replace ...
review_body: The liners work great for a few months- I still have to replace every year in my beach home because of mildew. They material has not ripped and is a good thickness. We have ordered these the last 3 years.

review_title: Very pleased with this shower curtain liner
review_body: This is a very nice shower curtain liner.  It is totally clear and has not mildewed or turned any color so far.  It was easy to install and it's big enough so that no water leaves the shower tub.  I'm very pleased with this purchase.

Very happy with this purchase.  I like that this curtain is a little heavier and thicker than I normally buy. Stays in place while showering. Haven't noticed any mildew on it yet, which is good. The top holes are reinforced with metal and helps it from not ripping from being moved on the rod.

This shower liner has been great so far. No mold or mildew on it, it keeps the shower brighter because it's clear, and it has magnets to attach it. The only bad thing about it is that a magnet has fallen out of the liner. It still works great, but it fell out within a few months.

This shower curtain liner is of a much better quality plastic than the average shower curtain liner. Usually a clear liner is see through but kind of cloudy, this plastic liner is clear as glass. It has heavy duty grommets to hang it from and it doesn't have any nasty plastic smell when you take it out of the packaging. Plus it has a 12 month warranty. Stop looking for a shower curtain liner, buy this one!

I lack the ability to measure microbial deaths and have no means to verify that it is PVC Free. That said, the curtain certainly is "frosted" and did a fine job of keeping the water from being splashed on the bathroom floor as I washed. Thumbs up!

This shower curtain has absolutely no smell!  When I took it out of the bag and hung it up, there was no chemical smell at all.  I was pleasantly surprised because that's the worst part of getting a new shower curtain liner.  We've only had it in there a month, but so far no mold, mildew, smell, or discoloring.  It's super easy to clean and keep clean.  When it's time, I will definitely be ordering another one!

This scale is just what we were looking for. It is sleek and pleasing to the eye. It's a basic scale so we don't have bells and whistles to contend with. We just got it today so I'm not sure of long-term reliability. The only problem I see is that it matches my doctor's scale exactly...and the Doctor's scale obviously reads too heavy.

Great scale! Easy to use, weighs fast and accurately. We have used it several times a day for awhile now and it still has battery power, so it apparently is efficient in its battery use. I like that it's not clunky and doesn't take up tons of visual space in a small bathroom setting. Sturdy and plenty wide enough to stand on even for heavy people. I am happy with the purchase and would recommend the product.

review_title: Sleek, elegant, and accurate body weight scale
review_body: We received this scale about 2 weeks ago and so far have been very pleased with it.  It is slim, sleek and elegant; nice enough not to have to hide it when company comes over.  The readings are accurate as long as you start at zero.  If it doesn't reset to zero, simply step on the center until it recalibrates itself (we've only had to do this once because someone stepped on the scale before the previous reading had cleared).  We bought this for 3 reasons: 1) the numbers are large; 2) the backlight makes it even easier to read; and 3) the display stays on for several seconds after you step off of the scale.  This feature is convenient for writing down your exact weight.. We've only weighed people because that was the intent of this purchase.  But we highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a precision body weight scale with large, backlit numbers.  In fact we are so pleased with it that we just ordered a digital food scale from the same company (Etekcity Digital Food Scale and Multifunction Kitchen Weight Scale with Removable Bowl, 11 lb 5kg) and will write a review on that scale after we've had a chance to use it.

I run Vancourt Dog Rescue, we have about 170 dogs.  Needed an inexpensive way to weigh them for meds.  I hold them and step on the scale and subtract my weight.  I am very pleased with this scale.We use it on dogs from 25 to 175 lb.  Lifting a 175 lb doggie will put a little strain on your back, but it is doable.  We needed this inexpensive scale pretty bad. It is necessary to be very still for the digital readout to lock on.  Standing by oneself is not a problem unless you have been drinking, holding a large moving dog is much more of a challenge, but it can be done.  For what it is and what it does, I have to give it 5 stars.

review_title: Hasn't broken, seems accurate and is nice and sturdy.
review_body: I searched all over Amazon before buying this scale.  A lot of reviews seem to indicate that it is delicate or prone to shattering, but I haven't had any problems with it so far.  The scale has a nice heft to it, and feels sturdy when you step onto it.  I'm not a huge fan of the fact you have to step on, off, and back on again to get a reading, but every reading is the same and accurate.  I'm not sure if others have gotten defective scales, but mine does what it needs to do, does it well, and looks good while doing it.

review_title: Do you want to know what you weigh?
review_body: ... Then this scale will help answer your question.. After our previous scale stopped working, we stopped weighing ourselves.  As part of some other lifestyle changes we have made, we wanted to gather some data for ourselves, so it was time to replace the old scale.  Since I don't have a second scale I cant compare for accuracy, so Ill just assume that its accurate.  The design in sleek and the construction is solid.  The size of the top plate is large enough that my feet fit completely on top.  The price was better than a local department store.

Great scale. I purchased a digital scale because my analog scale caused me to misread my weight due to the large number placement, I'm 15 lbs lighter than I had originally thought!. Once I read my weight on the digital scale, I reread my analog scale and realized where I misread the scale and they both DO show the same number so I didn't lose weight but I'm lighter than I had originally thought! :). I'm very happy with the digital scale, nice big numbers and the scale even looks more modern.

review_title: Readings are not reproducible, accuracy is seriously in question
review_body: A scale which is off by a percent or 2 is usually fine, as long as it's reproducible. This scale will vary widely by as much as 10%. I bought it to get a rough estimate on the weight of packages. It's fine for that task, but if you are buying this for measuring your own weight, find another scale. For monitoring your own weight to see if a diet is effective, whether to lose weight, gain weight, or maintain weight, you need a scale that gives reproducible results. This is not that scale.

EDIT: More than a year later, the numbers on the display started to fade. I thought it was a battery issue so I replaced the batteries, and to my surprise it didn't help anything. After a few times I could only see the numbers from a very deep angle with my head almost on the floor. Go to weigh myself this morning and the screen is completely blue, I can't see any hint of numbers from any angle. Kind of a bummer. Guess they weren't kidding about the 1 year waranty. Kinda crap though.. Works great so far, seems to give accurate results multiple times in the same spot. I have uneven wooden floors (thanks 1930s NYC apt) but when I found a good flat spot to put it on, it worked perfectly! I always weigh in that specific spot now to get consistent results. Didn't realize the display screen lit up, so was pleasantly surprised! All I wanted was a basic digital scale for a good price and this hit the spot.

I love this scale. I weigh myself in the morning before I eat breakfast and after I go to the bathroom for an accurate reading for my weight. It's consistent every time and I would lose a little more weekly. The lighting is perfect even in the night time. I would put the scale on the tile as the carpet floor wouldn't give an accurate reading for the scale. This, plus a body fat monitor or skinfold caliper would be a perfect combo towards the weight loss journey. While the scale would tell you your weight were you to weigh yourself in the morning, it wouldn't tell you if you were bloated and/or what not.. It's thin and easy storage, it doesn't take up much room either.

First off, I do like Brawny Paper Towels and would give 4 stars, but I'm very unhappy with these "XL" rolls. If you were getting the 24 Giant rolls on Subscribe & Save, you may want to go elsewhere for them; Amazon converted my order to these Giant rolls and I would be paying almost the same amount for approximately 4+ ROLLS LESS!  This isn't Amazon's fault, it lies solely on the manufacturer of Brawny.  I don't like the bait and switch with promises of giving me more.  Plus, I couldn't find any information about sheet counts on Brawny's website; instead I had to rely on customer images.. Old Giant Rolls: 117 sheets per roll x 24 rolls = 2,808 sheets total. New XL Rolls: 140 sheet per roll x 16 rolls = 2,240 sheets total. 568 sheets LESS!. I'll be shopping for another brand.

review_title: Supermarket packaging tricks still in practice at Brawny
review_body: I had the 24 pack box on subscribe and save and was changed to this. Previously box had 24 rolls of select a size sheets at 117 sheets per roll, 2808 sheets for around $29.  Now this box has 16 rolls w 140 sheets per roll, so 2240 select a size sheets for around $29. The old consumer supermarket tricks of reducing size but not price doesn't work when you have accounts with purchase history.

I'm going to jump in here too. I don't like the new XL rolls. They are too big. And I'm getting LESS for my money. Compared to the 24 Giant rolls I was getting. This pack won't even get me through a month. I'm cancelling my subscription.

review_title: Very bad deal. These pieces are like napkin sizes
review_body: Very bad deal. These pieces are like napkin sizes. I have to put 3 or 4 together to use on my car. Even that, it is very difficult to use since grabbing 3-4 together is difficult to use than one large one. This is one of Amazon's bad deals. Read Amazon's spec carefully next time.

Great packaging, great product. The towels are the perfect size and the quality is nothing less than the name brands of microfiber godliness. Washed and used a couple to dry my whole car and performed great. Wipes off polish and wax equally well. Threw them in the washer with some microfiber wash and they're as good as new. The best product for your car or home needs!

review_title: Great to clean with, but not sure how long they will last...
review_body: When I first get new products in store or online, I always wash them before use. They package comes with instructions telling you  how to wash them- cold water, only with other microfiber cloths, and no fabric softener. I followed those instructions, however, I'm not sure how well they will last considering I noticed the some of the  seems on the outer edges of the fabric tore after the first wash (generally in the corners). In terms of use, however, they're very absorbent and work great as an eco-friendly way to clean around the house. I really enjoy cleaning with them.

review_title: Nice deal..useful in many spaces, sturdy, not chunky
review_body: Nice quality, definitely a deal. I wish for one color as I am fussy when doing laundry.. But then, these dont leech out color !  I dont like grubby cleanung supplies, so I am almost afraid to use the whites. I dont want to mess them up?!  Oh, I have used them for blotting  water.. !

Theses are very basic microfiber towels.  The are thin and doesn't pick up dirt as well as other microfiber that cost more.  But since these are multipurpose you can use them as household cleaning towels.  I find out that they are not so great for cars.  They don't remove wax or polish as well as thicker or higher GSM towels.. Otherwise, they get the job done.

Great value! Perfect size. Absorbent, washes and dries well. I use these for all cleaning: from cleaning granite counter tops to stainless steel to leather. In fact, I often use these with my favorite . , works great on leather. I also keep a few of them in my car to clean up spills or during the winter months to clean the windows.

review_title: They give off no little bits of lint
review_body: Great lint-free cloths. I use these for painting and they are wonderful. They give off no little bits of lint that other cotton had towels do. I'm very happy with these.
Great quality tags for detailing exterior and interior on a car. The different colors are great for keeping them separated for different products. (Glass, paint, interior.)

review_title: You get what you pay for ...
review_body: Nothing like Norwex or e-cloths ... These are the inexpensive version that catch on your hands and make you want to recoil in a "fingernails on a chalkboard" kind of way. They're okay generic cleaners, but I'd save your money and get the e-cloths. I have the more expensive Norwex cloths too and I still reach for the e-cloths first.

review_title: But these all the time they’re great!
review_body: Super soft, great for cleaning your car and or cleaning anything delicate. I throw them in the wash and clean them and after they get way too dirty throw them out and buy some more. Great price for great soft microfiber cloths.
Nothing but the best for us! We bought Walmart brand paper plates once - never again! These are the bigger ones, but they're great and sturdy.

review_title: These plates are very sturdy and perfect when it is just my husband and ...
review_body: These plates are very sturdy and perfect when it is just my husband and I eating dinner.  Saves time and water because you simply recycle it and don't waste the water by washing dishes.
Great price and quantity for these larger and sturdier plates. Other plates at this price point are usually 8-9" and flimsy.
Okay, they're plates. Kinda flimsy but durable product. Coated so nothing seeps through. Price is great and will order again.

review_title: This product arrived in a damaged outside box that appeared ...
review_body: This product arrived in a damaged outside box that appeared to be stored in a wet area as the cardboard was still moist and wrinkled. Inside, 2 of the 5 packages of 44 plates looked as tho the plastic wrap had failed even tho it still covered the package. Many of the plates inside however were  bent, moist and damaged to the extent that they are not usable.  It is a bit difficult to see in the picture but approximately 30% of this package had damp plates on the bottom.
Very happy with my purchase.  Good quality plates. Very durable and pretty print on them.  Plan to buy more in the future.
purchased in bulk and do so whenever possible  they are pretty sturdy for the kids I go through a lot with daycare
I live alone and use them on a daily basis.  They are perfect, they are microwave safe. I also have three dogs that sometimes get fed on them as well! No dishes to wash!!!

review_title: Dixie is great brand for paper plates
review_body: I never buy generic paper plates, they always bend or leak through. Dixie is great brand for paper plates. Hold hot and cold items pretty well.
Best paper plates ever.  The best thing is that these are sturdy.  I have purchased these over and over and will continue to do so.

review_title: Crazy fast delivery and makes my distilled water taste perfect
review_body: I use the Brita to make my water from distiller taste crisp and yummy as the filters that came with distiller just didn't quite give it that crisp taste. They r good at making water taste good even if they don't really remove anything that's bad in the water on any level that counts, but does make it taste much better so thumbs up there. Price as the exact same at grocery store so not a deal that way but I ordered sat am and was shocked to see it delivered sat afternoon. Same day, you get 5 stars

Does the job but takes FOREVER. It literally takes hours to filter one pitcher of water through this filter, as opposed to the 10 minutes or so with the regular filter. We make sure we fill the reservoir before bed so it has all night to get the job done.

These seem to work well with our Brita Classic.  We have another model we will be trying them out on as it is a larger size.  We started getting iron in our water as we have a well and when it rained a lot, the well would rise and dip into a layer of soil that had iron in it.  This filters out that iron and who knows what else quite well.

review_title: Costly and not matching the mark.
review_body: Regular filters are better than this. Bought two of these to check and disappointed with the performance. Both are not working properly, I have to wait whole night to get a pitcher full of water from these and now I have to go back to regular filters.

After several quality issues consisting of mostly non-uniform filtration filtering flow (one filter worked quickly, another took twice as long to allow water to pass through), I wrote the company. One filter seemed s though there was no charcoal at all in it, as the water ran through so fast and it didn't "taste" filtered. These cost too much to get even one bad filter in  three pack. I have used over two dozen of these and understand what I am implying. The Brita customer service treated me as if I was a moron, but spoke as if she herself wasn't even familiar with the product.

Hopefully you’re survival doesn’t depend on filtered water. One drop every 2 seconds? I thought it was a defect until I saw other reviews. No wonder it’s “long lasting”. No thank you. Never purchasing the longlast filter again. I’d like to filter a pitcher in less than 90 minutes.

These filters do not work properly.  They clog up and stop processing water thru after about a week of use.  I have used both filters and had the same issue.  I have gone back to the normal filters as there are no issues. with them.  Would like to get my money back but it seems this review is past the date of refund.

Water is extremely slow going through the filter. It takes over an hour to fill a 10 cup pitcher. After trying the  Longlast replacement filter for a month, it will be going in the trash. My Brita Standard Replacement filters arrived today.

review_title: Less than 2 months after buying this product (and conveniently ...
review_body: Less than 2 months after buying this product (and conveniently after the 30-day warranty), the rate of filtering has slowed to a crawl. I've been using Brita filters for more than 20 years. This is beyond disappointing. Guess I'm shopping for a generic filter next time.

review_title: Great Tasting Water in Only 2 Hours!
review_body: This is our second time using longlast filters, as we thought the first set was broken. Turns out they all seem to be broken. A pitcher of water takes hours to filter through. We soaked it, we squeezed air out, nothing works. Just a flawed design in every conceivable way.

review_title: I did not like the Presto toilet paper
review_body: I’m a Bounty and Northern user, but took a chance on the Presto brand paper towels and toilet paper to see how they measure up and to save a few $$$. I did not like the Presto toilet paper, but am good with the paper towels.  I’ll keep using them unless the price increases.

review_title: As good as the name brand maybe better.
review_body: These seem to work as well as the bounty towels. The added bonus is the seem to tear off the roll easier than the name brand. I will definitely consider these as an alternative when I'm unable to find the bounty for less locally.

review_title: These are very absorbsent and look nice on the counter
review_body: These are very absorbsent and look nice on the counter. Better than most name brands. If the price stays low, I’ll be buying more.
These paper towels are awesome!  They are strong and most of all extremely absorbent.  I will purchase them over and over again.
Used to exclusively buy the Bounty brand, but I didn't notice a big difference when compared to Amazon's "Presto" brand, besides the significant savings!
Good Value.  Holds up well to all uses.

I was really surprised at what a great paper towel this was. I thought I would try it once and if it didn’t work out, I just wouldn’t purchase it again. They exceeded my expectations! I actually use less sheets of these, than I do of the more expensive Brand name paper towels. I will continue with my Subscribe and Save monthly purchase. :)

When my housemate purchased these, I was irritated. They aren’t the usual brand we purchase and I did not expect them to be quality. I was so very wrong. I love these paper towels. They are strong. A roll lasts a long time. They are your basic high quality paper towel.

We were a little apprehensive buying an "off name brand" paper towel but since it was an Amazon brand we decided to give it a chance. We were pleasantly surprised! They performed as good or better than the leading brand we were using and are more cost effective. We highly recommend Presto paper towels.

I was unfortunately not impressed.  They are not very absorbent. I used almost 3x the amount of Presto vs Major Brand (ie Bounty).  The difference in price does not offset the lack of absorbency or strength.

review_title: was very surprised it was so thin but i like that the most about it i have only had ...
review_body: was very surprised it was so thin but i like that the most about it  i have only had it on the bed three days and i cant even tell it is there.  usually they wrinkel and cause uncomfortable spots and this one does not.  sure am glad i stumbled upon this product  have told everyone about it  it als os a very cool cover eventhough it is waterproof.  i have not found anything i dislike about it yet  am little worried as it said to wash and dry so it would shrink some  please tell me it wont do that every time i washi it now  it fits so beautifully. The ten year warrenty was also a nice surprise.  I would say you have paid great attention to the things that cause most people to not invest in a mattress cover.  I had to as i got a new mattress and needed it protected.For a low set income that was a daunting process but i would buy this product again and again.  Thanks
This cover really works! Trust me this works, the only reason I did not give it 5 stars is the drying time after washing it. Because it is waterproof it takes forever to dry after washing.

Just what I needed for my 3 year old sons' first mattress..this sheet fitted mattress protector. I have thought about getting a full encasement but that would be too much work when he has accidents to unzip and remove from the entire bed.. This cover is a better idea for him. I don't worry about bedbugs at the moment so this fitted sheet style protector with terry cloth is perfect for him and for me! I love this brand mattress protectors, this is my 4th  one i've purchased (needed different ones for different size beds and accidentily purchased fitted once when i wanted encasement for bedbug protection).. I like the quality of this brand. anywhoo, love this for my son's bed.

This is one of the mattress protectors that Tuft and Needle recommend for their mattresses.  It is much better than an "advanced technology" mattress protector that we paid $90 for at the Serta store last year.  It washes and dries with no problems if you throw a sheet or two in with it.  The terry top is comfortable, does not get hot, and makes no noise. When you have 2 big dogs and 1 or 2 cats sleeping with you (yes at the same time :-) it is comforting to know that nothing they do is going to stain my mattress, LOL.

review_title: They end up covered in duct tape and I can't help but feel like a member of the Beverly Hillbillies family
review_body: This is my second order of these mattress covers and trust me i am the mattress cover queen spending a fortune on them yearly. I have special needs children who frequently have accidents and a wayward dog who is a thorn in my side. Vinyl covers are water repellent bur ALWAYS rip. They end up covered in duct tape and I can't help but feel like a member of the Beverly Hillbillies family. Then there are the water resistant fabric ones that do not keep the mattress protect. These covers are wonderful. They wash beautifully without ripping, fraying, etc. They are super repellent and they are comfortable. Easy to put on bed without ripping them as you are struggling to cover the mattress. I will only order this brand in the future.

review_title: Perfect for what I need it for.
review_body: I bought this pad due to it's light weight.  I use it for travel (see my review of the sheets I got with it: http://www.amazon.com/review/R1K6UW9UV0BSZA/ref=cm_cr_rdp_perm) when I am on long trips and supplied a bed in a dorm room.  Typically the mattresses are old and have had multiple occupants, so I don't care to be exposed to whatever may have been left behind.. This mattress pad gave a me a small, easily transportable solution.  Keep in mind this pad is very thin, so it will not provide any cushioning.  It does not, however, make me sweat or cause discomfort you might get from a cheaper, non-breathing waterproof material.. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase.

Excellent product! I would refer to everyone who has toddler. Protect very well mattress from diaper spill. Fits perfectly to the king size and even to California king beds. It isn't noisy. Easy to maintain, safe in washing and dryer..  I bought 2 - one for home and one for the trips. Fold compact and didn't take a lot of space in suitcase (even carry on). Travel across USA, Canada and Europe with my 2,5 year old toddler this protector prevented us from paying extra money for cleaning hotel mattresses in case of diaper spills  which usually occurred very early morning  time.

Bought this because of my dog.. Haven't had any problems with him so far so I haven't been able to test the water resistance on the cover yet. I like the product because it doesn't make the crunching noise like some over the other ones I've tried or felt in stores. It's a nice extra layer on top of a cold memory foam bed but don't consider this a suitable cushion if you were looking to add more softness.

We have bought a few of these in full size for our boys' beds; however, due to sick child we realized that we needed one for our bed also. It fit the bed perfectly and so far has worked perfect..  It was put to the test when my 2.5 year old had an accident while sleeping in our bed, no pee made it to the mattress!  Highly recommend this brand.

review_title: Nothing to report as potentialy negativel as my cat hasn't had any accidents since I purchased this.
review_body: I received this product exactly as advertised and in a timely fashion.  The product is well constructed.. I purchased this product because I have a cat named Rambo that sometimes gets on my bed to pee.  You see, he does this to communicate to me that his litter box needs attention.  I have a physical disability and hire someone to change the litter box as I can't get to it.  We'll if this person missed one day (they can't work 365 days a year ya know) Rambo would "talk" to me the only way he knew how - by leaving me a present on my bed. This would require through cleaning and disinfecting.. I resolved the problem, at least for now, with Rambo not urinating on my bed.  I simply put twice as much litter in the box.  That gives me two days with the litterbox.  I also had the litterbox placed where I could physically get to it  I did this after I ordered the SafeRest product.  I went ahead and put it on, just in case.. At this time I cannot review the product based on how it works, I can only review it on the following:. 1. I received the product as advertised (5 stars). 2. I received the product within the expected time frame (5 stars). Hopefully I won't have to review this product on any other factors but if I do, I will review and adjust this product review accordingly.
Feel just like cloth!  FANTASTIC for clean-ups, no matter how "messy".  Won't buy anything else again!

great size pillow.  I bought a pillow case for it and have it on my sofa.  It's comfortable and cushy.

review_title: This is a super fluffy pillow
review_body: This is a super fluffy pillow. It did not arrive flat and squished. It was full and perfect size. It's so thick and fluffy, I didn't think it would fit in my pillow case but it did and it looks great. I highly recommend this product.

review_title: which was a nice unexpected bonus
review_body: My mother in law sent us some cute throw pillow covers for Christmas and these insert fit perfectly.  They also arrived quickly, which was a nice unexpected bonus!
nice and fluffy and substantial. a little bummed with how the corners collapse.
Love the quality

review_title: They live up to their name!
review_body: Convenient.  No dealing with stores and carrying bulky groceries.
The quilted quicker picker upper! Bounty!

Bounty paper towels are the best. Period. And this 12-pack of family-sized, Quick-Size rolls is a great way to buy them in bulk. I've tried just about every other brand of paper towels out there, and I always come back to Bounty.

Love these towels.  They're incredibly absorbent, you can wring out the water from a spill and reuse them again, and they're perforated at the smaller sizes, so you can tear them according to the size of the mess you're cleaning.  Bonus for parents:  if you've got little kids tearing the sheets, the smaller "quick size" helps make sure they don't waste paper by tearing excessively large sheets for small spills or cleanup.

review_title: Bounty is the best. This was a great deal.
review_body: as described.
Bounty Quality.

review_title: A standard for me. Re-ordered several times now.
review_body: A standard for me. Re-ordered several times now.

review_title: Worth the dough as you don’t have to use the whole roll on big spills.
review_body: They last so much longer and you use less.  Worth the money.
Wonderful size and quality!!!Fast delivery
Love it...easy to hold, gets wrinkles out easily
Makes a wet mess of clothes

I love this small steamer! I purchased it mostly for blouses that need a little touch-up after laundering...especially those blouses that hang to dry. It does not hold much water because it is not large, but it is just the right size for my needs.
it is pretty tiny but it works really well. some may think it takes too long to go over all  parts of the clothing item but works for me!
Doesnt have enough power and the nozzle is too small. Takes too long to unwrinkle stuff.

I thought it was a cordless steamer but I was incorrect. It doesn’t matter though as the cord has been long enough for all of my steaming needs. This product works well, is a great size to travel with and is priced appropriately.
Steams great
Works good
This steamer is horrible. Not only does it not remove wrinkles, it leaks water all over your clothes.  It’s very small and looks very cheap

This steamer is absolutely awesome!!!  I have had two different hand held steamers in the past, and there is simply no comparison.  This unit is small and ideal for travel.  I can steam two shirts, possibly three, with one fill.  I highly recommend!
These came neatly bundled and were a breeze to hang.  I used the ten twist ties that came with the packaged lights to attach the lights to my curtain rod.  Plug and glow!
I bought two sets but the plug-in on one came broken. I was able to connnect them together and they thankfully worked out. They are really pretty, but the quality is really cheap unfortunately
ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE! Look beautiful! Make the whole apartment look brighter!! So pretty!!
Love these lights!! Very nice LEDs and the perfect dim light for a bedrooom. 10/10 recommend

My daughter was excited to get these for x mas.We didn't open them until we moved for her new room. Well most of them do not light up. Disappointed. I would love to order more but afraid the same might happen.

review_title: Used this as a backdrop with a white curtain over ...
review_body: Used this as a backdrop with a white curtain over them, and it came out lovely! Use a more sheer curtain if you want a lot of lights showing.

GORGEOUS!!!  Fairytale PERFECT look!!!!!!!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE! We---Ordered six lighted panels and ALL worked beautifully without a single issue. Shipping was super fast and packed exceedingly well. We hung these behind lace curtains on diner restaurant windows, lace curtains purchased here on Amazon that also were super stunning for the price. Seriously. If you hang these lights across the top first then let down each strand separate one at a time, you will have no problem. Afterwards we just rolled across the top and lay the long grouped strands one curtain panel at a time on a table cloth and wrapped the length by rolling them in the cloth to easily transport and move to our home gazebo! Again no issues. They continue to dazzle us. Full lights all twinkle functions work. The LED bulbs are tiny but the glow amazing!!!!! Really like stars twinkling---really! You do not have to hesitate to buy. I am so glad we tried even after reading negative reviews--these lights made the photos of our party beyond beautiful--romantic and cozy! We would give more than five stars if we could! Even if they just worked that one special night for our 25th Wedding Anniversary the price is well worth it--still we are enjoying them weeks later outside under covered porch and gazebo. If they stop, we would just order more--- they are THAT wonderful! See for yourself in our photos-----how utterly lovely these are, EVERYONE remarked how stunning and we did it ourselves..........THANK YOU for making and selling these lighted strands in curtain form!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! They were just as pretty----- without the lace curtains you should know!!! The look like star light. ~Sarasota Florida

review_title: I put this lights up in a doorway between the ...
review_body: I put this lights up in a doorway between the kitchen and living room. They really impress the guest when we have a party. People talk about them for days after seeing them.

These lights were exactly what I needed to make my bedroom extra cozy and beautiful for my upcoming home birth. They are well made and I appreciate the way each strand was tied made them super easy to hang, even 8months pregnant!
Received package which was opened with many exposed wires. Seems used. Lights are very dim. Will most likely return.

Great product. It is light and easy to unfold and hang. I have ordered others in the past that were kind of stiff and hard to unfold - didn't have that experience with this product at all. Would buy again.

review_title: It arrived on time. It did not have any ...
review_body: It arrived on time.  It did not have any odor which can happen to products.  It fit and it has magnets on the bottom which I had not realized but appreciate as it keeps it off my daughters legs when she's in there.

review_title: Better than other higher priced curtains!!!
review_body: I am very impressed by this curtain. It is durable but still lightweight, so it retains it's flexibility and ability to conform to the curves of my tub. The magnets on the bottom work great. Also, it didn't have a smell like plastic or chemicals, which was very nice.

Ordered because it has no chemical odor /off-gassing. Happily it lived up to this claim. Plastic is thicker than I’d expected, more rigid, which I suppose is good as far as shower curtains go. Glad to learn it has a 12month warranty..

review_title: I never thought i would like a shower curtain liner enough to write a review
review_body: I never thought i would like a shower curtain liner enough to write a review, but i love this thing.

This is my second time buying this particular liner.  The weight is perfect and it's fairly mildew resistant.  It lasted about 5 months before I had to replace it again.. I've heard that you can wash liners in the washing machine, but for this price, I had no problem just getting another one to replace it.

review_title: Just as you expected, and yes, Mildew Resistant
review_body: No issues, came as expected, after serval months, no build up/no slime, etc.
Not too thick that it's hard to move around and not too thin that it creeps up on you in the shower.

This shower liner offers supreme protection, as it couples very well with the navy blue overlaying shower curtain I purchased.  This liner was recommended as a purchase along with the shower curtain, so it's nice to see a match between the two in regards to convenience. :-)

Awesome shower curtain! Sturdy, thick plastic. Love the magnets/weights at the bottom. And the grommets at the top so it doesn’t tear from normal use with the shower curtain hooks. Fast shipping and amazing price. Couldn’t ask for more.

Worked great for 18 months and then one day I pushed it back into place after using it, the corner touched the base of the toilet and it shattered into a thousand pieces. Thank goodness I wasn’t standing on it at the time.... UPDATE: seller contacted me in response to this review with an apology and a refund, which I consider pretty generous considering I’ve had it for 18 months.

review_title: Very happy with the new scale and especially with the great ...
review_body: I ordered the scale 6 months ago and every time I got on the scale the weight would change from 1-6 lbs.  After 6 months of putting up with the scale I finally complained to the company.  Within 6 hours I received an apology from Etekcity Amazon and a new scale was immediately sent to me at no cost.  Very happy with the new scale and especially with the great service of this company.  I encourage everyone to give the scale a try.  Very good product.

This is a wonderful, well-made, and accurate product.  The rendering of weight is smooth and the final weight is displayed for another few seconds after stepping off the scale. I trued it up to a medical scale and it is spot-on.  I cannot recommend this scale highly enough - it is a great value, and runs from two "AAA" batteries.

I like these scales.  The scales do have to be placed on a flat surface, other than carpet, for them to work properly.  Until we replace our bathroom carpet with tile, I will continue to place the scales in the shower for a quick weigh before I shower.  Yes, I do remove them before turning on the water.  The scales are a nice sleek design, lightweight, with a low profile. I leave them out as my reminder to watch what I eat, and they are not unsightly.  The accuracy seems to be true, lining up with how my clothes fit if I gain or loose a few lbs.  I would recommend these scales.

Very accurate.  My old scale would fluctuate every time I got on the thing.  This one seems to accurately weigh me each time... and if I get back on a second, third, 4th time.. the weight is the same.  My wife compared the weight reported on it with the doctors office, and it was right on, so she is happy and no longer "adjusting" for the error of the scale.  Unfortunately, I can no longer blame my sudden weight gains on scale inaccuracy.

review_title: Easy to read back-lit in area where weight is displayed
review_body: Easy to read back-lit in area where weight is displayed, as opposed to other similar units which lack the back-lighting. I can never see the weight without that back-lighting. Glad I switched out this unit. It's sleek, and "sexy", as far as bathroom scales go. Register the warranty and it is automatically extended for another year.

I checked the other reviews about fluctuations but went ahead and purchased anyway...my weight changes by 5-8 pounds within minutes and the fluctuations can go up to 12 pounds. Having some error is still acceptable but this is beyond acceptable limits

I just received my scale in the mail today, it was packaged very nicely with very easy and clear instructions! Everything was in English and nice and neat! It’s very thin and light weight also! The scale comes with batteries and all you have to do is pull a plastic tab from the back for it to turn on and start working. It zeros itself so you do not need to do anything even if you pick it up and move it! I work at a doctors office and I weighed myself this morning, it was extremely accurate! I’m very impressed! Not to mention it came with a tape measure in a really cool plastic case (sorry little things like this excite you when you work in pediatrics!). I highly recommend if you would like a scale that is not too expensive, looks nice, and is very accurate and easy to get this!

review_title: Very consistent. I tried to trick the scale in ...
review_body: Very consistent. I tried to trick the scale in a series of experiments designed to reveal if the scale was using "memory tricks". For example, there are many scales on the market that trick users into thinking that they are consistent by remembering the last reading and only showing a new reading if the value changes by some non-trivial amount. I was able to get different readings after varying the load only 4-6 tenths of a pound. Further, adding combinations of several known weights resulted in very consistent readings. Thanks for not building a device that uses psychology to trick users. Would buy again.

Overall I really like this scale. Works fast and is sleek and thin so it’s easy to store anywhere. The only problem I’ve had is some days it will randomly decide to tell me I weigh 20 lbs lighter than my actual weight, then once my kids use it it magically works correctly for me again

review_title: best towels for the price LOVE THEM !!:)
review_body: best paper towels for the price
Nice just a little rough
Love a deal!
These are much thicker and absorbent than expected.
they are ok
Great Value and not too thin
These are good quality.
sufficient office paper towels
Great!
This has lasted me almost 4 months such an amazing deal!
Excellent bags they stretch and hold alot without ripping
The smell is worst then the garbage.

review_title: They break when you put them in the trash can ...
review_body: They break when you put them in the trash can. The strings also break when you go to tie them.
My favorite
keeps the order down alot
Works/smell great
Good price very convenient
fine
Best trash bags I have ever used. Smell simply amazing.
Very good to use and I love the fact it has fabreeze sent.
Great product for the subscription service.
Good product. Great price!
great price
I order monthly
Great deal, great price. win/win.
These seem to be a little thinner than the ones I buy in the grocery store.
There no flowers or color
Solid product
These paper towels smell like wet dog. They repel water more than absorb, almost like they've been dipped in Rainx. I will not be purchasing them again
These are paper towels and do the job.
These trash bags are perfect for daily use!
good price
It’s a trash bag
great
Quality product, does the job.
GOOD PRICE FOR THIS PRODUCT!

review_title: I bought these in Amazon, becsuse I kept forgetting ...
review_body: I bought these in Amazon, becsuse I kept forgetting to buy trash bags when I was at the store.  They do the job and they fit my trash cans perfectly.
Holds trash well, then holds a little more trash.
Great trash bags; the extendable top part is a great plan for wrapping the trash bags around trash cans.
ok

review_title: Good product, just less of it.
review_body: I really like Brawny paper towels, especially the pick a size.  I purchased this same 16XL Rolls on March 8th and thought I was getting the same product when I purchased them again in July.  However as others have mentioned you now receive less product.  I could tell as soon as I opened the box that the rolls were smaller.  The first box had 16 rolls with 156 sheets for a total of 1144 sq ft.  The recent box had 16 rolls with 140 sheets for a total of 1026.6 square feet.  It is still a good paper towel but I am annoyed when companies decrease the size or volume of their products but the packaging looks the same and the price is the same or higher.

Amazon switched my subscription to this one that has 20% less square footage than the previous product for the same or higher price. These rolls are extra thick, which is a bit of a tight fit in the holder and storage area. The actual product is ok, I'm just frustrated with the company that they would "upgrade" the product by supplying less value for the money. There's all kinds of marketing messages about how these rolls are so much bigger than other rolls, and they are trying to make it seem like such a great value, but the old product was a much better deal. If they had raised the price 25% it would have been more obvious I guess, so instead they shave off 20% of the quantity.

review_title: Good product, but less sheets per roll then before
review_body: Brawny used to provide more sheets for a lower cost.  Yes, your product is good, but stop squeezing us Brawny, stop squeezing us; we might spite you and buy elsewhere, just because.
You get less and pay more

I used to think, like I believe most people do, that nothing can replace bounty. I saw this on Amazon and decided to give it a try (after reading many reviews), and boy, so happy I did!. They are strong, very absorbent (see below) and for a much better price (especially if you have subscribe and save).. I did an experiment: filled a glass with 2.5 oz of water and one size single sheet actually absorbed 1 oz of water which is a lot. I also out water in the glass (weighing the glass with water at 11oz) and the picked it up with the WET sheet and it didn't rip. Thought it was pretty cool lol.. I keep recommending everybody.

review_title: Did not receive Brawny.... Received CHEAP SPARKLES BRAND instead!
review_body: We ordered Brawny without any question or hesitation because of it's quality and received cheaper Sparkles brand. We're not sure if this was deliberate or a mistake. Either way, we are stuck with very cheap non quality paper towels for a very long time.  If we wanted this cheap stuff we could have driven 5 miles to the nearest dollar store.  Very disappointed.

Changed for the worst! I have been using Brawny for years. This last order you can use it for sand paper. The box it came in is softer and would absorb more. I guess they changed their product and really cheaped out.

review_title: Get these wet and stick your tongue through! Try it!
review_body: We have this on subscription and it serves the purpose of a paper towel. Can these wipe up messes? Yes. Can they dry off baby bottles? Yes. Can you get them wet and not stick your tongue through them? One second...........No. But two out of three isn't terrible.. How can you not get the pick-a-size? It's insanity!

review_title: Changed Product. Poor Quality Paper Now
review_body: I've been buying these towels for a long time and now they have changed the paper quality. They don't absorb as half much and are very stiff and rough.
These paper towels have a strange finish to them.  I will make sure Amazon never substitutes these again.

review_title: Great bargain and are as expected
review_body: These microfiber cloths are a great bargain. They are large cloths and can serve several purposes. I didn't care much for the different colors until I started using them and now have certain colored cloths for certain chores. For instance, I use the yellow for dusting furniture, blue to clean glass and electronics, and white are any other use. I will definitely look for these again when searching for replacements.

These are magic cloths - they hold water like a sponge without leaking. I use them every day to wipe my guardian shower door and they are fantastic. They also double as great dust rags. They hold the dirt without slinging it around the room. It stays in the cloth and they are washable too.

review_title: Great value and super soft until around the 8+ month mark.
review_body: I trust these on my 2017 Corvette paint and you should too! I use these for exterior paint and reuse older microfiber cloths for wheels, pipes, and interior cleaning. Just keep two piles of clean clothes, newer and older for all your detailing work and they work great.

I love these so much that I ordered a second batch. They are great for multipurpose use (cleaning countertops and drying dishes). They are so soft and great at catching dust on keyboards and laptops. Depending on what you use them for, they can be washed and reused(although they lose much of their static cling). When they get too stained, I just wash them and use them as a rag to clean my wooden floors. I love the quantity you get and the colors help to differentiate them.

review_title: ... clinging together and it makes folding them into squares pretty much impossible
review_body: After washing these with special microfiber detergent designed for micro fiber towels these always end up clinging together and it makes folding them into squares pretty much impossible. These are budget at best; they do the job but I feel like I should have bought about 1/2 as many high quality ones. They would absorb water better, are large, clean better and don't stick together like these. They work well for the price but I wouldn't buy them again. I use these for washing cars only.

review_title: Very absorbent and ready to go from the start
review_body: I was very impressed with the quality and size of these microfiber towels. They are way better than the cheap ones you get from Harbor freight. An excellent value in my opinion. It is important to note that I received three colors, 1/3 white 1/3 yellow, and one third blue.

Awesome little towels!  Once your car is washed these are the perfect little towels to use on a daily basis to wipe any dust from your vehicle to make it look shiny again. I absolutely love them!  Quite a lot of them for the money.  Wash them( as directed)  when you first receive them. It softens them.

review_title: we finally found this super cleaning cloth
review_body: Well, we finally found this super cleaning cloth. Through out all the old stuff. Took a chance and ordered this based on the reviews.. The reviews were accurate. Great product!

These are great! This is my second package and I use them for so many things - from cleaning to removing makeup - they're even soft enough to clean my glasses with. The super expensive MLM version is much thicker but it doesn't work better enough to justify the significantly higher cost. These take a beating and wash up time and time again...and if they do get grimy enough that I no longer want to use them, then I give them to my husband for working around his cars. Great bargain!

review_title: A great way to stop throwing your money away on paper towels!
review_body: I really love these! I was looking for a way to cut down on my family's paper towel usage.  I searched all over Amazon for inexpensive wash clothes, hand towels..etc. This was the best deal, especially if you use subscribe and save.  These towels are durable, absorbent, and haven't faded even after dozens of washings.  My only complaint is that microfiber acts like Velcro and things tend to get stuck in it.

review_title: It usually comes in great condition all but this last time
review_body: I have these on my subscribe and save.  It usually comes in great condition all but this last time. One package was opened and i only have half the plates i was suppose to get
as advertised
Great price. Great size. Perfect for a paper plate. Not sure why everyone says it Is thin. It's a paper plate not a soup bowl
My husband and now us these more then regular plates. Get a GREAT product at a GREAT price plus the time we save during clean up.
These paper plates are sturdy my wife likes design. Holds heavy food well if you must stand to eat.We would recommend
I thought these were the same ones I bought at walmart but they were the bigger ones and my husband liked them better.

review_title: It comes without thinking about it
review_body: We use these at the church and they turned out great for the price. We went back and purchased more we were so happy.
Ordered as part of a panty box on Amazon.  Paper plates are paper plates, so there's not much to say.  These are fairly sturdy.
This plates are awesome and sturdy and can hold a lot! So great!
Great thick paper plates that I like to keep on hand! Food does not soil threw and hold up excellent for any type meal :)

review_title: Water filters so slowly it's useless
review_body: Takes over an hour to filter two cups of hour. Very similar to all the other negative reviews. Somebody said it gets air bubbles. Stay away from this product.  Update:  Brita is aware of the problem and is sending 3 regular filters as a replacement.  Still an annoying problem but kudos for the support.

I am a reformed Aquasana user.  The filters are so expensive and they keep going up every year!  These filters work very well. They filter out the nastiness in our Southern California water.  We can usually 'see' our water when it comes out of the tap.  It's disgusting.  Filtered with these in my Brita pitcher and the water is clear.  It tastes great too!  One filter will last for 50 to 60 pitcher refills (or about two months).  Buy these every six months and enjoy clear, refreshing water for 6 months for $15.
Have gotten these filters before. Sometimes they clog, and I have watched videos on how to fix with no luck fixing a bad filter. When they do work they work well. Need better quality control.

review_title: These don't fit standard brita water filter devices that well ...
review_body: These don't fit standard brita water filter devices that well.  I have a pitcher and an 18cup refrigerator reservoir and I constantly have to push this down before putting water in to filter or the water will miss the filter and seep in around it.  Supposed to last longer, but more of a pain to use... think I'll go back to the regular filters

review_title: Too expensive for what it is, but better then generics
review_body: Just plain too expensive for a plastic tube of charcoal.  But the generics I've tried don't seat well into the pitcher and tend to leak water through without filtering it.  So in short, the genuine Brita filters do indeed work better than the generics, but are excessively priced for what they are.

I don't love that you are supposed to discard several pitchers of water each time you replace the filter, but I have yet to find a better option. So 4 stars.  These are easy to put in and I do love Brita pitchers - I keep 2 in my fridge so one is always full/cold!

doesn't fit regular britta counter top dispenser. too late to get my money back . the bottom is flat with a little round indent on the bottom. picture shows the one side and I expected it all to have those indents to fit over the filter hole

These water filters are VERY slow. I’d rather replace more often than wait. With my small Britta pitcher, the reservoir won’t completely drain even with plenty of room in the bottom.. Again, emphasis on the lack of speed. About one drip per second.

I can tell a big difference between tap water and Brita filtered water.  Pet water bowls don't have the lime deposits, and houseplants don't develop a white crust on top.  It has to better for people, too!

review_title: Buyer beware - they do not fit.
review_body: My Brita Large 18 Cup UltraMax Water Dispenser came with a standard filter and it worked flawlessly. Since these are supposed to be better, I bought a 2 pack at the same time as the dispenser. However, I waited until the standard filter was exhausted, and Amazon's return window has closed, to swap in one of these blue ones.  Well, I guess I should have read the other reviews first.  Sure enough.  They do not fit. They do not stay snug and secured in the dispenser. They pop up with force and gusto. I took the blue one out and put the standard back in and was able to get it to reseat just fine. Tried the blue one again, and it kept popping up. This is ludicrous. I paid way too much for these things for them not to fit.  I could have gotten 5-6 standard filters for the price of 2 longlast and yet 6 standard filters would theoretically last for 18 months while 2 longlast only last for 12 months. That is a poor return on investment. I think Brita or Amazon owes me some standard filters. In the meantime, I'll not buy these again and I suggest no one else do so either.

These paper towels are fine, but the rolls are not oversized, and they are not any better than any other store brand paper towel.  They are also more expensive.  Sorry to say, I will not be buying these again.

review_title: Sorry, it’s not equal to Bounty...
review_body: Sorry folks, this product is not equal to Bounty. I read the reviews and was curious so I ordered some. They are better than other economy single ply paper towels but not equal to Bounty. I will be ordering Bounty in the future.
I really was hesitant about ordering these but they are just like the name brand. If fact, they may be a little softer. Love them!

The quality of this product is excellent—sturdy but still soft.and absorbant.  It’s great to pick up messy spills. I keep a roll handy in every room as well as the car. They are reasonably priced too.  Great product!
I love this paper towel.  It's as good as any other brand I have purchased.  I love ordering it through Amazon and not having to hassle with picking it up at the store.  Really good quality!

Not bad, not great. Pretty much like most better quality no name brand products. It was convenient to have them delivered rather than going to Sam's Club, but then you've got a big box to get rid of...

Presto brand is great! The quality is great and the amount you get for the price is also great! The fact that this is a house-hold staple that I can have delivered is amazing. For quality and convenience you can't beat it!!

review_title: Will continue to buy this product as long as it's available
review_body: By Far and Away the best I've tried a lot of different brands my husband and I I have never been happy and there's always been a problem with the quality or the price but this is perfect

review_title: Absorbant but too much lint for cleaning
review_body: These are fine for drying your hands or a spill cleanup as they are very absorbant. As a cleaning professional trying these for the first time, they are not suitable for cleaning. For windows, mirrors, and chrome especially, they are far too fiberous and leave an unexpected  amount of lint on cleaned surfaces that require extra attention.
I did not love these paper towels.  Even though they had a selec a size hey were not as absorbent as my bounty previous purchases.  I would not recommend unless you are ok with a thinner paper towel.

The fit perfectly on all the beds they were purchased for.. 10” memory foam queen. 12” memory foam queen. 12” memory foam full. 12” memory foam king. No crinkling noise. No wrinkles under the sheets. No heat retention. They don’t pull off during tossing and turning or when I take the sheets off to wash. It’s like it’s not even there.

VERY SATISFIED WITH PRODUCT.  WASHED BEFORE USE PER SUGGESTION BY MANUFACTURER.  IT CAME OUT NICE BY WASHING IN WARM TO COOL WATER AND LOW HEAT.  GLAD IT DOES NOT CONTAIN RUBBER/VINYL AS MY OLD ONE DID BECAUSE IT WOULD WRINKLE UP AND COULD NOT PULL OUT THE WRINKLES LEFT BY THE RUBBER/VINYL IN IT.  I FEEL.  THIS WILL LAST FOR SEVERAL YEARS.

This did not shrink in the first wash, and I can tell it is high quality material. It was easy to put on the bed and fits snugly but not too tight. My only complaint is that I wish it actually encased the whole mattress rather than just going around it like a thick fitted sheet-this would offer optimal protection from dust mites, bed bugs, etc., so it’s fine for us as we live in a private house, but if you live in an aparmebt building you’d need something that zippers around the entire mattress.

review_title: Keeps out stains but not smells
review_body: So far it has kept the bed from staining or getting wet but when my dog peed on it the smell still got through. Good for the price but not the best out there. We have one on my son's twin bed that was $80 (can't remember the brand) that is much better but at the time we couldnt afford the size we would need. Either way its a great back up and it does keep the bed dry.

I now am the happy owner of 2 of these. The price can't be beat! But even if the price was undesirable, the fact that it works like a champ would keep me coming back.  My almost 9 year old English bulldog periodically urinates while he's sleeping. I got this to protect my mattress and I'm delighted. This is my second one which I purchased so I didn't have to wait for the soiled one to get done in the wash. Don't hesitate to buy this product!

I can not yet speak on durability or how easy it is to clean but so far I am very pleased with the product. The material is soft and doesn't make noise. I really thought it would be similar to something you would put in a crib but it's not at all. I have a "cooling" matress and I will say that this protector does take away from that effect a bit. It doesn't breathe as well as I would like it to but maybe I'm asking for too much. Overall I think it's a great product especially for the price. I'm very pleased and would definitely buy again and tell my friends.

review_title: It pays for itself if you have dogs
review_body: This is the same thing that a big box mattress store sold me with my mattress for an additional hundred bucks! Crazy. Should've come here first. Oh well. Does its job.
