Got two dogs that still have accidents occasionally but this thing has kept that stuff from getting into the mattress. It pays for itself

This was a replacement for a mattress cover that got ruined when my husband had an injury begin to bleed badly during the night.  I could not get the stain out of the much more expensive cover and was forced to throw it away.  As my husband is on a blood thinner, these incidents happen  more often than I would like...your product cleaned up beautifully this morning!  Thank you for a product that works so well!  Before you spend money on a cover with a big price thinking it is better, look into all the great reviews, including mine, that this one has.

When our last mattress protector needed replacing we weren't sure where we'd find a comparable one, yet we found an even better one! We actually purchased the king size pillow protectors first (they are fantastic) and then after that good experience decided to purchase the king size mattress protector. It fits perfectly, easily washes with sheets, doesn't make any noise at all, isn't hot, and makes you feel like your mattress is really protected (especially if you have children, pets, and allergies like we do in our home). This is a great mattress protector, we would highly recommend it to anyone. In fact we're looking at buying one for our oldest sons bed as we've been so impressed with the SafeRest products. So far we've been using it only a couple weeks, washed once (in hot water), but we're happy customers at this point. :) Well deserved 5-star rating.

We have one of these on every bed in our home and even a spare for the blowup bed used for camping. AMAZING! And fits really deep mattresses. We have this on our plush pillow top and are still able to fit an edge bumper under it. We easy to clean than the zip up kind because lord knows those are a pain to remove every time your kid spills something or has an accident. Great buy!

review_title: These paper towels are not good. They stick together
review_body: These paper towels are not good. They stick together! That is not at all what you want from paper towels! I wish I could return them.
I love how absorbent the towels are. You can use fewer towels to get the job done.
Viva paper towels are extremely soft but without the tearing!!! Awesome quality!
Go through a roll if not 2 a day!!!

review_title: I liked them because they were great for normal paper towel ...
review_body: This used to be a 5 star product but as a PP said, they are now rougher and more flimsy and hard to get off the roll. I liked them because they were great for normal paper towel tasks but I could also wipe my daughters face with it hurting her. Not anymore. Really sad that they changed this wonderful product to something that’s just meh. Probably switching back to bounty :(
Ultra absorbent and works awesome!
I love these towels, they are so soft & it is easy to get only one towel without the whole role coming off, love them ❤️
Wouldn't buy again. Feel like cloth, not paper towels. They do absorb liquid.
These towels are the best and I loved that they came right to my door and have enough to last. For a while!!
Happy with the purchase. The price and quality both good

When the pillow first arrived, it was smashed a bit.  I was pleasantly surprised to see that after several days it puffed up to be full, soft and round.  It fit my Funny Animal pillow case perfectly and looked great!  It was a perfect thank you gift for a friend.
What I expected a filler to be like.
After about a month they’ve shrunk…
These do not look durable. The outer lining looks like it will tear with the slightest tug. Definitely do not look washable though they claim to be. I won't risk it.
It is the right size and nicely plump although I did have to work the stuffing into the corners a bit. Works for me.
Nice pillow 18x18. Fluffy. Will work great.
Not too stuffed nor too understuffed. It's a good, solid pillow. Not much else to say.
Completely filled up my 18x18 pillow cover. Made it fluffy and full.
Quick delivery, as described, god quality

review_title: These last a while in the holder.
review_body: I hate changing out the paper towel roll, mostly because I’m cheap and it seems like they go way too fast.  But these last a lot longer.  Love Select-a-size.  I don’t think I could go back to full sized sheets or smaller rolls.

review_title: Clean your whole house with one role!
review_body: I hate cleaning my house but I do love Bounty paper towels! They are thick and strong and never tear or rip while using them. It takes me one entire role to clean my house ( I have 6 kids so theres a-lot of mess to clean ) I'm inspired to know that as the roll thins out my job is almost complete. Bounty is also great for arts and crafts; wet a towel and lay it flat in front of your child with fat crayola markers. When your child is done drawing, lay the towel over an air vent or on a table to dry. The finished product is quite colorful and its a great activity to keep your kids busy.. Also great to wrap around left overs before placing them in the microwave to avoid splatter and to keep your food moist! I've also used bounty to pack my fine china dishes when we moved. The list goes on and on. I've tried many paper towels in my time and Bounty is the best!!!
These big rolls are awesome.  I don't have to change the roll as frequently.  I keep purchasing these again and again.
Thirsty!

review_title: Alll of the above products are of the highest quality, and I feel fortunate to have them in my home on a regular basis!!
review_body: I actually prefer the full sized paper towels, however the Bounty product is such high quality, I really don't mind it at all!

review_title: 13% downsize: fewer sheets per roll; each sheet is smaller!
review_body: Compared to the previous "select-a-size", this "quick size" product has 143 instead of 158 sheets per roll, and each sheet is only 5.7 inches instead of 5.9 inches wide. That's a 13% down-size, while keeping the price the same. What a scam!!!
I love these! They are very durable and worth every penny. When I purchase this package, I don't have to buy them again for a few months.
good product
These last so long. Will edit post when I see how long they last. I want to say about 5 months for us as a family of 3.
Love the mega rolls and they last quite a while, unlike others that I’ve purchased.
we love this product.  We've used it several times with no issues what so ever.  The size makes it perfect for traveling but doesn't comprimise it's steam ability.  Highly recommend this steamer!!
I’ve only used it once but I love it. Heats up fast, light weight and easy to use

review_title: Easy and effective but need to be careful.
review_body: Got this for my son who’s in college. Need to look professional for interviews. Work like a charm. Easy to use. Just need to be careful and keep it upright. Any tilting can cause the hot (very hot) water to spill.

review_title: Water leaks from bottom of steamer
review_body: As soon as I filled with water the water started leaking ( a steady stream) from the bottom of the steamer.
Works great so far.
Love this to take on business trips. Just a quick and easy way to steam my shirts
Compact but still puts out nice steam.
Does the job 👍🏼

review_title: I like the idea of employing differently-abled folks so I want ...
review_body: This was the firs steamer I have bought. It is compact, heats up very quickly and seems to be working perfectly. Plus, I like the idea of employing differently-abled folks so I want to support businesses that do that, Nice work iSteam!

review_title: Too small to be useful except for travel
review_body: also can't return. vendor was not responsive.

review_title: One is great and just as promised
review_body: I ordered two sets of lights. One is great and just as promised. The other one only lights up part of the way. I'm not satisfied with my experience.
Great lights for inside or out!  You have to make sure part of the electrical box is covered so it doesnt get wet, if used outside. I hung these from a tree for Christmas (2017) and it looked great!
Exactly what I was looking for! I love that the lights dont get hot like other curtain and xmas lights. The patterns are pretty cool too. I'll probably need 2-3 to cover a whole wall though!

review_title: It turned out great! The lights come packaged in a way that ...
review_body: I ordered this for a Twinkle Twinkle Little Star themed gender reveal party. It turned out great! The lights come packaged in a way that they are easy to unroll and set up in a matter of minutes. The lights made our focal point really shine!
If there's light in the room, you can barely see these lit up.

review_title: Love how many settings it has
review_body: Love how many settings it has. They can be on for hours and not get hot. Just wish there were an off setting on the remote rather than having to unplug and plug it in every time!

review_title: Great set of lights but the control box for patterns doesn’t work well
review_body: These lights are so beautiful! I hung them up in my daughters window.. they DO tangle very easily so I wouldn’t  undo the twist wraps on them till they are hung.. you can shuffle through different patterns with a push of a button on the small black control box, but mine doesn’t seem to be working right which is why I rated 4 stars.. other than that it’s a wonderful product would definitely repurchase!
Just be sure you hang them before untying the individual strings.  They were a nightmare to untangle....

review_title: I love this light curtain so much
review_body: this light curtain upgraded my room in a second!! I put it over my tapastery, and it just glowed up my room. I love this light curtain so much!! I have to say that the instructions were a bit confusing at first, but once we figured it out, it all made sense. I also have to warn you that the light strings are pretty long, I'd say about 3 feet, so i'd plan to hang them on a tall wall, since my wall is average sized but i have to tie them at the bottom to keep them out of the floor.
I like the ambiance these provide, but the color of the lights we received are not Warm White, but more of a yellow which is disappointing.

review_title: Buy This if You Want a Good Shower Curtain
review_body: Very very high quality shower curtain.  I bought a cheap curtain previous to this thinking they are all the same, and it was flimsy and started to get mildew on it real quick.  This is standing the test of time so far, and is thicker so it stays in place with the magnets.

The product arrived on time and was well packaged. I am use to a white liner so I was a little bit uncomfortable with the light leaking into the shower enclosure the first few times I showered with this liner. Now, I am glad. The shower enclosure is a little brighter and I like that.

Replacing a rotating shower door, just cut the curtain to fit and everything works.  Including installing the rod and hooks (ordered separately), the job took less than 10 minutes.  After a shower, the curtain looks fine and hangs well.

review_title: much better than the previous curtain that I also purchased on ...
review_body: Simple product but works wonder. it is thick and high quality, much better than the previous curtain that I also purchased on Amazon. The smell went away in 1-2 days, which is awesome.
This is a great shower curtain. It actually seals to the inside of the shower keeping the water inside. The magnets hold tight to the tub. Very satisfied with this purchase.

review_title: Excellent! I wish I had discovered this product years ...
review_body: Excellent!  I wish I had discovered this product years and years ago.  No smell and it just feels CLEANER than the vinyl liners.  The surface is very smooth, easy to see one of the reasons why i resists mold. Some reviews complained that it's lightweight and flys up when the water is running.  In my experience, all liners do this, so, whatever.  I always use a shampoo bottle to keep the curtain flying up and sticking to me.  I have recommended it to all of my family!

This seems to work great.  I have only had it for about a week, but it is in the kids bathroom that gets used all the time and so far no issues.  The liner seems very heavy and no rips or tears at the top from the kids, which is a plus.
I've had it for a bit now, and we make sure to dryly it out and give it an occasional wipe down. No mold or any gross stuff on it yet, and keeps the water in the bathtub.

review_title: Looks to do everything I need it to
review_body: Too early to know for sure, but so far so good. The liner fits the shower in our daughters' bathroom. The magnets appear to help it cling to the tub and prevent water from escaping. I like the grommets, they seem study. Time will tell how well it resists mildew, but initial impressions are favorable. Will update if necessary.

I’ve purchased this 3 times. After 6 months of use mildew shows up even when cleaned properly. It’s goid in the beginning, but I assume over time whatever treatment they use wears if and it becomes a daily battle to keep mildew from springing up. Will not purchase again.

review_title: Scale was delivered with empty batteries and the glas is very thin. Hopefully it will not brake like it did with other customers
review_body: Disappointing... The order includes the scale with batteries. BUT.... On the beginning, the scale wasn’t working because the batteries where empty. I had to buy new ones. The glas of the scale is very thin. I hope it will not brake like it did with other customers. I am only 155 pounds, so fingers crossed 🤞🏽

review_title: It seems to pretty accurate, in that it’s very consistent
review_body: This is a very stylish scale, unfortunately I had to put in my kitchen, because the rest of my apartment is carpeted….even the bathroom. What kind of weird people carpet the bathroom? The point is it does not really work on carpet nor do I believe it’s expected to. It seems to pretty accurate, in that it’s very consistent. You can step on and off it three or four times and get the same result. I get up and weigh myself every morning, I do this sans clothing….I have to walk my naked butt all the way to the kitchen. The thing about the kitchen is, my parakeets live there so I keep the windows open as to not undermine their circadian rhythms. Well this is the part I love the best about this scale…it’s dark when I wake up and I sneak into the kitchen step on the scale…the blue back lit display is just bright enough to read….yet dim enough not to expose my modesty or alarm the parakeets.

Very pleased with the scale so far.  I'm still amazed at the price.  I placed it on a hard surface, and I don't move it around...so that it stays calibrated.  Not that re-calibrating it is hard to do.  It arrived with batteries, and was ready to go.  I still feel a bit uneasy stepping on a piece of glass, but it's very thick, and doubt it will have any problems...it's just in my mind.  Digital readout is nice and bright, and big enough to see.  Scale is attractive, and modern looking.  If I step on and off several times, it reads the same weight...with no weird fluctuations.  Honestly, if it holds up over time, this is a bargain.

review_title: No More Excuses To Lose Weight.
review_body: This thing works as advertised. It looks good. Nothing really to calibrate. Ready to use right out of the box. One thing I do recommend is that you read the instructions ... the manufacturer DOES NOT RECOMMEND that you store this weight scale on its side standing up. Store it flat.

I have set a weight loss goal and use the scale frequently. I bought this scale because my older dial scale was getting hard to read.. I had bought a different scale from big box store and it was Taylor digital with aluminum finish and I had issues getting a consistent reading with it minutes apart. My wife had same issue. So I was a bit cautious getting another digital scale but then this one went on sale and thought I would try it.. My conclusion: works great, is consistent with readings and easy to read the display. I am very happy with the purchase.

I tested this scale against a digital scale at the gym and there was only a pound difference, so I feel fairly confident that this is showing good numbers.  The readout screen is easy to read and it doesn't take up much space in my tiny bathroom.  I use this on a flat, non-carpeted surface only.. Above was my original review.  Yesterday, I was weighed with a doctor's scale and it was 10 lbs lighter than what this scale tells me at home!  I'm thrilled that I've lost 10 more lbs than I thought I had, and I could understand a 1-2 lbs discrepancy between scales, but 10!!?!?!  I'm downgrading this from 5 stars to 3 stars because of that.  I will change the battery when I get home to see if that helps and will amend it if it does.

review_title: Great Price but Durability is Questionable.
review_body: Failed after five months of very light use, it was really a great scale until today.  Does not reset to zero. Weight fluctuate as you is it.  Can't be reset or hard reset.  Even new batteries does not help.

This scale is quite beautiful, and feels well built. It has nice big easy to read numbers that even light up so you can read them in the dark. I didn't test its accuracy, but it is at least consistent in that it always gives the same reading if you put the same object on it. It is pretty much a perfect scale, and at a good price. I don't know if all scales are like this, but there is one thing I wanted to mention. The instructions say the scale should only be stored horizontally. This surprised me as I had planned to store it on its side in the closet. I just keep it under my couch instead though.

We needed a newer scale, but were nervous about getting a digital scale. Past experience with digital scales has not been good. I am happy to say that we are very happy with this purchase. The scale works perfect, it's sleek design looks nice in the bathroom, and it weighs accurately.

review_title: Issues with very low battery life - resolved with prompt replacement
review_body: I bought this product in May and since then I have replaced the batteries at least 3-4x's in the past four months.  Now it is giving me another "low battery" warning and I just put in new batteries last week.  For this reason alone, I would not recommend this product.. UPDATE: Sept 18 2018:  I appreciate the fact that Etekcity contacted me directly and promptly after my original review and replaced the defective product with a new one.  The new one seems to be working fine and without any issue.  Thank you, Etekcity.  That's good customer service.
Seem to go fast, full sheets, not partial sheets.

review_title: Bounty Quality, a Bounty of savings!
review_body: Use to buy Bounty or Kirkland. Tried these at a a significant savings to Bounty. Like the autoship feature so will likely continue to get these and save a trip to Costco.
Good price. Good product.
I buy these every time, very good quality
Great product
They give you plenty of towels but you really need to use a lot on any spill plus the tubes aren't as full as they seem
This toilet paper is soft and is made with good quality.
Good product!
good deal

review_title: I'm a paper towel snob and these are great! Definitely recommend and they are priced well relative ...
review_body: I'm a paper towel snob and these are great!  Definitely recommend and they are priced well relative to other brands in store.
Love the smell
The fragrance hides the smelliness of the trash very well!! Itkeep my kitchen smelling fresh!!
Great deal. Love these bags hold up really well.
Love them, they don't tear easily!

review_title: These are my favorite. Nice clean smell for all the trash cans ...
review_body: These are my favorite.  Nice clean smell for all the trash cans and they are tough and hold up well.
Very good
I run a dog rescue. Poop stinks, this helps.

review_title: Not heavy-duty, but practical and keep the kitchen smelling nice
review_body: Like the Febreze scent.
Good product.
Love the smell of the bags.  It does help with the trash smell.
Adequate .
Reasonable price, decent paper towels, I like the pick-a-size feature.
I have these delivered every 3 months. Perfect for what I need.
Work great and a good price.
good
great price
Good value
As expected.
Works as great as the more expensive towels
So great I order using subscription when available!

Just a tad too small for my average rubbermaid kitchen garbage can and unfortunately that little bit makes a really big difference when the bag gets full and slips inside the container.  At 22 inches high and a 14 inch diameter the bag is just not big enough for my can.

review_title: this is a strong bag. Not for outside work but very good in your kitchen. Very good for any room.
review_body: These bags are strong. Not like a outside bag, but strong to hold a lot of trash. Never had any trouble with the actual bag. Red draw strings are easy to see and easy to tie. They can have different uses besides kitchen trash.
great
these were tried and have been satisfied... ordered 2nd box recently
Just perfect
Great bags .. easy to open, use and very sturdy. LOVE these and will reorder.

review_title: Trash Bags - They Hold Trash, but not liquids.
review_body: They hold trash.  but they do seem to leak easily and I do not feel we "overstuff" the bags,  We still buy them for the price.  But the commercials on TV are perhaps a little misleading in my opinion.

I don't know why, but the last few boxes of these we received stink like the cheap perfume they put in scented trash bags. We finally got to where we couldn't stand it any more and switched to a different brand.

review_title: Good product, would be perfect if it was 3 inches longer.
review_body: The Glad Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags are a very good product.  The don't tear or leak easily.  They would be perfect if they were about 3 inches longer, they often get pushed down inside the bag with the trash and sometimes are hard to get out of the can because something gets hung up under the bale of the garbage can liner.

So far, so good..  they are not like the last ones of these that i ordered.. a change has been made.. the color is a little darker of the plastic and the tabs are grey not red.. but they are working well as far I can see...  I like having so many of them on hand, plus I can share some with my daughter.

review_title: Not the same paper towel as when previously ordered!
review_body: I've ordered these multiple times before and they have been my favorite paper towel until the latest order. The thickness and durability is not the same anymore! Why did they change?!! :(
Rip off only five in the box!!

I love Brawny Pick-A-Size paper towels. They are sturdy, large, tear well and absorb well. I prefer buying them by the case, which is how I receive them when I order from Amazon. Bonus points if I can order them and get a discount using the coupon that can be applied at checkout. The prices vary (sometimes they are more expensive than I’m willing to pay), so monitor the price if you pay attention to such things. It usually drops.

These are super heavy duty and well worth the price.  I have a geriactric dog that has recently forgotten about being potty trained, and so we go through a ton of paper towels at my house.  As a thrifty woman, I needed to find some that were priced well but weren't thin due to the urine that I am constantly cleaning up but not wanting to touch.  These are perfect and lasting so much longer than other paper towels I have gotten in the past for this task.

review_title: They don't seem to be any bigger than the old Scott Big Rolls
review_body: These are a little bit thicker than the Scotts we used to get on subscribe and save, but also a little more expensive. They seem just as reliable, with enough to them to be able to use for scrubbing without falling apart.. I'm not sure what the significance of the XL sizing is, but as long as the price doesn't go up, we will likely keep buying these with subscribe and save.

review_title: Don’t fall apart and very absorbent!
review_body: Pick a size is great, more economical. Like the absorption and thickness Brawny has that other popular brands claim to have but don’t. I use them for hand drying and any/all kitchen cleanups as kitchen towels and sponges hold bacteria. Also use the same way in the bathrooms and other areas in my home. I’ve used Brawny Paper Towels for years and don’t intend to change.

review_title: Ordered Brawny, received Sparkle. An inferior brand.
review_body: I love Brawny Paper Towels. What I actually received was a giant box of Sparkle paper towels which are cheap, flimsy and terrible quality. I'd return if it wasn't a hassle. I would think you'd be notified if the product changed something as significant as the brand. Removing this from my subscribe and save.
so the package was short 6 rolls! is there another package coming with the rest of the towels? If not I am going to return it. package did not seem to be sealed correctly.

I love the pick-a-size feature of these towels.  It's less wasteful.  I use fewer rolls over time because I'm not always using a whole big sheet for small tasks.  These paper towels are durable and very absorbent.  I think they're well worth the price over cheaper brands.

I always use Brawny Pick-a-Size since they seem like they are some of the best absorbing. These come in a big brown box labeled Brawny so they aren't in an amazon box so keep that in mind. Though doubt many people are going to steal paper towels but never know! Anyways came in great condition and my wife loves using them. They are strong and durable.

Great to use for everything.  Use these instead of paper towels in several occasions.  Window cleaning, detailing car, dusting furniture.  Very affordable and good quality.  Amazon Basics rocks.  No frills, just does the job period.

This is a good price for a bunch of microfiber towels.  They're a good size for general cleaning and polishing.  The colors are neutral.  They have nearly unlimited uses.  I wash them in the washing machine and hang them to dry so they stay soft.

So far so good.  I have a cleaning business so these rags get plenty of use and they seem to be holding up to the scrubbing and washing process quite well.  Not as thick as some other rags, but they are not as expensive as the thicker ones.

review_title: Great price! Use it for everything from using it ...
review_body: Great price! Use it for everything from using it as a wash cloth for my face to wiping things up around the house.. I designated the colors for specific uses. This helps to keep from mixing them up after it comes out of the laundry!

review_title: Must have item in your house!
review_body: Using these microfiber cloths has become a daily ritual in my house. These Amazon microfiber cloths aren't the thickest or softest, but they get the job done and the price is right. At first I thought that these would be too cheap and rough and that they might leave micro scratches on some of my electronics, but that wasn't the case at all.. Tip: Fill a squirt bottle with 1/2 water and 1/2 rubbing alcohol and use that and a microfiber cloth to clean everything imaginable.

review_title: Love these. Will be ordering more soon
review_body: Love these. Will be ordering more soon. They have lasted over two years. Haven't tried washing any yet as usually they have grease or paint on them and don't want to put them in the washer.
Use these all the time. They don’t fall apart easily and they don’t leave lint everywhere

I would definitely buy these again. They're just the right size to be useful all around the house and when cleaning my car. I wear glasses and always keep one in my purse for when they inevitably get dirty. It was a large enough pack, I have these cloths scattered around my house for various purposes. They've become a cleaning staple.

review_title: It's ok. Not much of a fan
review_body: I don't know if I'll order these again. When I clean with it the cloths they get easily stained with the cleaning products I use which is annoying to see especially on my white cloths that have been stained with Lysol Lemon stains that look like the cloths been stained with pee. Lol. Also when I dust I have to keep replacing with a new cloth because these hold on to lint and cat hair easily and it starts spreading everywhere. Not too much of a fan.

Well, I suppose you get what you pay for.  These are cheaply made and of low quality.  The pile is very thin (i.e., they aren't soft and thick, they are thin and see-through).  I wouldn't trust them to use on my car, so I guess I will just use them for dirty jobs around the garage/house and throw them away after one use.  They simply do not have the level of quality that would motivate me to wash them and use them again.  While that may seem wasteful, it would actually be a waste of water and electricity to wash them and try to use them again.
Paper plates. Not much to say about them. These are top notch quality. Very sturdy. Liquids don't soak through. Can put a lot of weight on them. Good product, will buy again.

review_title: Awesome buy. We use A LOT of paper plates ...
review_body: Awesome buy.  We use A LOT of paper plates when I'm working so that my husband can keep up with the kids and chores and not have to worry about doing a bunch of supper dishes.  The price is awesome.
Nice plates. Ok price.. I ordered it for a group gathering, but it arrived a day late.. Very disappointed.
Sent to hurricane victims
Not much you can say about these.  It's a paper plate.  Not the flimsy kind, and came very quickly. I would order them again.
The product is excellent. Exactly as expected. Will purchase again.

review_title: this is a good plate, and a really good price from amazon
review_body: keeps my food from touching the table! Mind blowing! but seriously, this is a good plate, and a really good price from amazon.
Caregivers are in and out of our house quite a bit.  These plates are roomy and sturdy.  Saves me lots of time in cleanup.
This brand name paper plate is a paper and money saver.  No more having to double-up on cheap coated paper plates.. Very happy with Dixie brand.
Holds your food well without a backer.

review_title: Works as advertised. I will admit it is very ...
review_body: Works as advertised. I will admit it is very slow, but I would much rather remove the led in my water and wait a night for it to filter. I ended up upgrading my water pitcher to the Brita Ultramax Dispenser with Longlast Filter after this filter had been used for a few months. The Ultramax is the solution to the slow filtration. Fill it up and have water for an entire day. I will never go back to the standard filters. Thank you Brita

review_title: and they seemed to work fine and would easily last several months
review_body: I have used standard Brita filters for years, and they seemed to work fine and would easily last several months.  I would replace the filter once I could detect the unpleasant taste the city tap water.  The more expensive "Longlast" filters last but two weeks before the unpleasant taste of the city tap water came through. Very disappointed and will be looking for an alternative brand.

review_title: Not Even One Week - Water Barely Coming Through
review_body: The filter is dripping extremely slowly. I put it in, literally, a week ago, but even in its first week water would drip slowly come through the filter. This morning I filled the top to max 1.5 hours ago and 75% of the water is still in the top!! I should have read the other reviews. I only bought this since someone else in the office bought a Brita and we went through the non-Longlast too quickly.

review_title: DO NOT BUY.  Filters do not work.  Do not waste your money
review_body: Absolute crap.  After following the directions precisely, this "filter" turned into a water tight plug literally after filtering 3 gallons of water.  I even tried to pour water over the filter and let sit overnight, and still nothing got through.  I tried both filters thinking that only one was bad.  Nope, they are both crap.  DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.  Do not waste ~$30 like I did.

Extremely slow filtering. I would find water in the top an hour after I filled it up. Apparently these get air trapped in them very easily. I had to constantly fiddle to get them to work, and then they'd slow down again a couple fills later. Went back to the regular old filters and I'm much happier.
Not only was the item damaged, but it was the wrong item!

review_title: Not the Brita I’m accustomed to
review_body: I installed one and it didn’t produce the fresh tasting water I’ve grown accustomed to with Brita filters. I tried a second one, same deal. What’s up? Can these expire? Unfortunately they’re non refundable so I’ll have to go another route. One⭐️

review_title: Water flow slowed down after 2 weeks for the first ...
review_body: Water flow slowed down after 2 weeks for the first filter. Even if the second filter works as advertised 50% of the filtering capacity lost. I will order the regular filters. I wanted to reduce waist even further.
My husband and I live in a city and these significantly improve the taste of the gross city water. Also, buying these in bulk on Amazon is the best deal you’ll find when it comes to water filters!

review_title: So far, no burning stomach from faucet water
review_body: Using everyday, but keeping track of gallons to see if it holds true to advertising.. Water direct from faucet burned my stomach. This filtered water does not, so far.
It's not as soft as Bounty.  However, you can't beat having them shipped right to home.  I don't need to go to a big box store.  No driving, no waiting in line.  That more than make up for it.

They don’t unravel quickly - they kind of stick to each other. And they don’t like to tear at the perforations which messes with my OCD. But great absorption, decent durability, and softer than most paper towels so I don’t feel bad wiping my son’s face with one.
These paper towels are just a good as the brands I have been buying. I have tried several and I really like these and will order again. They also are very durable.

review_title: Cost effective and very close to Bounty.
review_body: I have always used Bounty paper towels and was looking for something cheaper but good.  I found it in Presto Flex a size, as close to Bounty as I think I can come.
It's paper towels - these are fine. - nothing special they do the job

We had always used Bounty because it seriously had the best ability to soak up any spilll and being a momma of two boys I am constantly cleaning up spills or cleaning up messes and these paper towels are seriously right up there with them! They are strong enough to scrub the counter while soft enough to wipe a mouth at dinner time plus to soak up the inevitable spill at the dinner table. I would recommend this brand of paper towels to anyone who has  a mess to clean up. 😉

review_title: Good product, Ive switched from Scott
review_body: Very large rolls. Good absorbency. Easy tear at half & regular lengths. Surprisingly low lint factor. Ive switched permanently from Scott!
The thickness was thinner than I was expecting. It does the job for light spills and is much lower in price as compared to competitive brands.
No more using 2 or 3 towels when 1 will do. This is the one. Durable, thick, absorbent towels. Love the select-a-size sheets. Even better than Brawny.  Highly recommend.

Very sturdy and absorbent paper towel without excessive thickness.. I haven't yet tried it to wash windows. I would like to see whether or not it leaves white streaks when used for this purpose, which would be a reason to use this towel for regular, daily use next to the kitchen sink but another brand for washing windows.

review_title: Works great, even with kids wetting the bed
review_body: We liked our first one so much, we bought a second. Originally, we had a full mattress protector that the mattress slid inside and we zipped it up but it was such a pain. When it did need to b cleaned, it took us forever to get it back on the mattress because i took two of us to do. These protectors do the job and are much easier to get on and off. We have two kids under age three and with diaper leaks and bed wetting and dumped cups of water, we change the sheets a lot but our mattress has remained perfect! I can now rotate the two mattress protectors so when I am washing one(I mean you know, with a kid peeing on them they need to be washed) I can just put the other one on. RECOMMENDED!

review_title: Serves its purpose, my god daughter had stitches on ...
review_body: Serves its purpose, my god daughter had stitches on her elbow and she was sleeping with me and her stitches opened up and she bled all over the bed but this cover saved a brand new mattress from being stained. Kind of noisy when moving around in bed though, I think because it fits a little loose. Bought a padded mattress pad to put over the top and that seems to have solved most of the noise from the cover, I think because it fits snug. Bought one for the queen bed in my guest room.

My husband and I are clumsy...like spill your coffee in bed, knock over your makeup bottle kind of people (I can't blame the makeup on my husband). We needed a mattress cover that was waterproof and comfortable. After a lot of research, we ordered this great product from SafeRest and I am so glad we did! Some waterproof mattress covers are flimsy and make a sound whenever you move--not this one! The quality is excellent and it fits our California King deep pocket mattress perfectly! Our mattress was expensive so this product is a great way to extend its life! We are very pleased with our purchase!

review_title: Makes Crinkling Noise with Every Move, Thin and Material not Comfortable
review_body: Disappointed. This is marketed as "Noiseless". This was not true. First, the material is thin and not cushiony at all. I guess it might serve a "waterproof" purpose I dont know. The material is like a waterproof material. It is noisy with every move on it and not comfortable under your sheet. It is quite expensive for the quality you get

as a mom of almost three kiddos, baby number 3 due in a few weeks, i needed something to protect my mattress from baby and toddler pee and leaking boobs! i can't stand synthetic materials so finding this affordable cotton topped waterproof mattress cover has been a life saver! this is actual my second one because i'm upgrading to a king but my queen sized one has lasted for years perfectly. i plan on buying one more for my king so i can quickly change them out while the other gets washed and a couple for my 4 year olds bed too! can't recommend highly enough!

review_title: This King Size SafeRest Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof Mattress Protector was exactly what I was looking for!
review_body: This King Size SafeRest Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof Mattress Protector was exactly what I was looking for! It's made really well, so no fingers punching through the skirt of the protector while putting it over the mattress. It fits my mattress perfectly! I've washed my mattress protector without any issues at all, and it's very comfortable to sleep on. No noise and no heat! I also really appreciate the 10 year replacement warranty. Who does THAT in this day and age?? Since my husband and I have gotten older (no fair!) it seems our skin is more fragile and we bleed more freely. We can finally stop worrying about the mattress whenever we get scratched by one of our dogs. :)

review_title: ... water on it based on a few of the bad reviews and underneath was dry
review_body: Just received and ran some water on it based on a few of the bad reviews and underneath was dry.  The top is soft and it fits our king sized bed very well and after putting the sheet on could not tell it was on.  It is relatively thin and I could see it ripping if you snagged it on something or pulled with too much force, but if you have a sheet over it it's fine.  First night I listened for noise and there is some, but not more than the sound of sheets sliding on each other.  It does not have the plastic feel and sound I had with a previous mattress cover.

Seemed to work great for two years, but you don't really know until it's tested. My cat got locked in the room and peed on the bed. Changed the sheets and discovered that the water proof layer of the cover disintegrated where the pee was, and only where the pee was, ruining my thousand dollar latex foam mattress. Very disappointed.

Yuck!  I had no idea these would sound like plastic/rubber sheets.  I feel like I'm sleeping on a child's bed.  I wanted this because the guy at the mattress store said that sweat is the number one thing that can deteriorate a mattress, but man I don't think I can stand the "plasticy" sound of this every time I move.  Disappointed.

Bought for a new bed that I wanted to keep clean, bug free, and clear of any spoils and spills etc. Must take care when washing and drying or will ruin the protective barrier of mattress pad. Nothing difficult, just do not use high heat in wash or dry. Does not make crinkle sounds and is nice to the touch. I recommend this product if you are particular about what you sleep on or with. Not sure of durability as purchased recently. Will care for properly.
Really like these.
Strong, quality paper towels.
This may be fine for some people but we hated the texture of these and how they stuck together,
Repeat order
Very nasty paper towels
Thin, cheap and need to use double the amount of quilted brand paper towels to clean. Will never buy again.
It was the same paper towels as the ones in the store.
Best ever.Very absorbent, thick full roll and the roll lasts a very long time. I have tried many and this one is a keeper.
You need two hands to tear a sheet off.
adf
Perfect fit and hold their shape nicely.
Perfect for your throw pillows on your bed. They do give some support, but I would not buy them to use to support me while reading in bed as they are a little soft for that.
Bigger than expected due to stuffing but still works.
The 18" x 18" pillow form is 16" x 16".

review_title: One of my best purchases ever!
review_body: We really love these. Nice fill, hypoallergenic at a fantastic price! What more could we want?!
Very nice pillow! I took the other reviewers advise and ordered the same size as my case and it fits wonderfully. (18x18 for both) I ordered even more for more fun pillow cases!
These inserts are so thin I had to double them up.
Unless you like your insert to make your cushion look like it has ears, you're not going to like this. Poor poor quality.
Perfect for a Christmas gift fills out pillow case and worked really great.
very fluffy and comfortable!
Cleaning around the house
like it a lot
It is really handy to be able to get just what you need .
Great value

review_title: Good for a 2 minute steam of shirt and skirt
review_body: Arrived on time.. Good for a 2 minute steam of shirt and skirt.. Like it
A great steamer. Warms up quickly, can do 2 garments before it runs out of water.

review_title: This steamer was perfect and took out all the wrinkles in the dress
review_body: I purchased this steamer for my daughter's Holy Communion dress, which has a lot of lace and sequins (therefore it cannot be dry cleaned).  This steamer was perfect and took out all the wrinkles in the dress.  So happy to have picked this product.
It does the job but it’s very small, enough for one shirt
Works best on soft flowy fabrics.
This product is very easy to use and it does what it says but because it’s kind of small I wouldn’t use it for things like curtains, just clothing. It’s great!
very handy
Excellent steamer. Heats up quickly and takes wrinkles out quickly.
Do yourself a favor and buy an iron and ironing board.

review_title: Removes wrinkles quickly. Small, easy to bring in a suitcase
review_body: Works great! Removes wrinkles from shirts, pants, sweaters and other clothing dried in the dryer or air-dried in just a couple minutes. No ironing needed.

review_title: These were beautiful or about 5 minutes and then my cat ate ...
review_body: These were beautiful or about 5 minutes and then my cat ate one of the wires :( i will have to reorder
It's very pretty! I used for pic backdrop light! It would be the prettiest decoration in my apartment!

My daughter loves having these string lights in her room. It gives off such a warm, cozy ambiance in her bedroom. It does not come with the sheer curtain; that is mine. I highly recommend this product!

review_title: These are great! They blink and twinkle if you want
review_body: These are great ! They blink and twinkle if you want , they are long and beautiful.  I'm going to buy more
I just wish the cord was longer. I had to buy an additional extension cord.
Looks good ... but gets tangle easily... just be careful and you will have amazing decor.

I absolutely love these!!!  They look beautiful and add a lovely glow to my window. They aren't very heavy so I had someone help me secure it with regular scotch tape instead of putting holes in my wall. They have stayed up for a few days now with no issues falling. I will definitely be ordering more for next Christmas!

Had the lights for ONE day and they must have had a short, they “popped” and went out. Went to unplug and the plug along with the outlet were black and popped a fuse. Glad we were in the same room when it happened.
So pretty when all the tiny lights are up. The packaging is really helpful in sorting out the strings. The direct connection to power outlet is such a huge plus. Just love it.

review_title: The quality of these light is excellent and a bang for your buck
review_body: The quality of these light is excellent and a bang for your buck! All LED bulbs work and look great in my bedroom! Highly recommend getting hooks to help hang them since they do not come with their own hooks.

review_title: Easy to install, don't smell, and hold up great against mold - 5 months running mold free
review_body: 5 months and still no mold. Sometimes mold develops in my apartment and the shower is the first place where it starts. I have been using these shower curtains for 5 months now and they still look new. Another plus is that these don't smell like other curtains I purchased in the past. Also, they cut easily if you need to adjust for your shower/ tub. Will buy again

I have used this liner for about a month and it has been great.  It is really flexible and light which makes it easy to deal with when you are opening and closing the curtain.  So far it has no mold or residue built up on it.  It truly doesn't have that harsh plastic smell that most shower curtains come with.  The rings seem strong and long lasting.  I will buy this again when the old one wears out.

review_title: glad I did because this price is reasonable and lasts ...
review_body: 1 year and still going strong with no mold or mildew. I was too lazy to go to Bed Bath & Beyond, glad I did because this price is reasonable and lasts fairly long.

review_title: No issues..but definitely not mildew resistance.
review_body: It worked,. But is anything mildew free?no.

This liner is so great in that it has magnets on the bottom to help attach to the tub to prevent water getting out. Having little ones, that helps ease my main concern of splashing water all over the bathroom. One happy mommy!

review_title: They are thick and good quality. I haven't had any rust or mold/fungus ...
review_body: I've had these for 2 months now.  No issues.  They are thick and good quality.  I haven't had any rust or mold/fungus issues.  I'm glad I paid extra for these rather than get the cheaper ones that fall apart/get gross within a few months.  I got these along with the double-hook shower curtain hangers.  I hang my cloth shower curtain on the outside.  This does a real good job of protecting the cloth curtain.  Highly recommend.

I am, so far, very pleased with this product. First, unlike the stiff, white ones that inevitably turn dingy yellow, this one is crystal clear, which lets more light into the shower area. Second, it has 3 magnets so not only the ends are held in place, but also the middle is kept from billowing out. As to the mold/mildew thing, I will need to wait 2 or 3 Months to see how that works out. If I find no mildew at that time, I will add a star to this review.
I love this frosted look. It is still light frost so light can come thru. The rings at the top are extra strong to hold. Also, there was no odor from the package when I opened it.

The shower curtain liner is used as a shower curtain in our household and works as intended.  Water does not stay on the curtain for long and appears to roll off quite easily.  Therefore, the curtain should not lead to mold or mildew buildup.. One bad feature are the magnets which does not appear to work well (it doesn't stick to our tub), but otherwise, this is one of the very best shower curtain if you hate the nasty buildups on other curtains.

review_title: Does what it says on the tin.
review_body: Overall it does the job. I havent had any issues with it so far, and I've had it for several weeks. Magnets don't work with my shower, but it's heavy enough that much. Having the suction cups on the sides that a lot of curtain liners have would be preferable.

review_title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM. STARTED MALFUNCTIONING 6 WEEKS AFTER PURCHASE.
review_body: DO NOT BUY. Etekcity 400lb Bathroom Scale failed shortly after 1-1/2 months of use. It no longer resets to zero and switches between lb & kg intermittently on its own. It looks very nice but that's it. Changed batteries, tried switching weight scale with manual switch but still malfunctions. Unless the air has gotten really heavy in the past few weeks. (SEE PIC)

The weight changes every time I step on the scale. Not just throughout the day but within 3 times in a row at one time. I have put it on my hardwood floor each time, so I know that I am still using a flat surface. I am trying to diet and lose weight and its really disappointing that I am going to keep putting my daily measurements on hold to find another stupid scale. Will be returning. Very disappointed.

I bought this to replace a bathroom scale someone dropped and broke. I've had it for about a week so far works perfect I tested it with some hand weights around the house and it seems very accurate. Up until this point I had none of the glass breaking or other issues that I have seen noted another reviews. It's shipped on time it arrived on time it can complete and ready to use.

I really like the design on this scale. It's easy to operate and so far appears to be well made. It's also very pretty. Don't mind leaving this out where it can be seen. Also, become a EtekCitizen and receive an extra year warranty  plus exclusive deals from EtekCitizen.

It works. Sometimes finicky and does NOT work on carpeting, but when used properly, it does its job. Display is hard to see from a standing position if you're near sighted but thankfully the read-out stays on the screen for a few seconds after it finishes the measurement.

I love this scale! It is thin enough to fit perfectly in my small bathroom space without it hitting the bottom of the door. I like the fact that you can just step on it and it displays your weight vividly. So far, I think it has been spot on when it comes to displaying my weight, i.e., it does not seem to simply display the last weight recorded. As long as you have it settle in the same space all the time, I think this is a very reliable scale. It is made of glass, so you just need to be cautious about vacuum cleaners, etc. I would buy it again!

Scale is completely inaccurate and keeps changing numbers every day. (Not my weight because I know I am not gaining or losing 10+ pounds from one day to the next.) Went back to the order to try to exchange it or return it and it says it is not eligible for return. So they pretty much stole my $15. I wouldn't trust this product or company if I were you. I hope this helps.

I have had this scale for over a year now and I bought another one for my mother because I liked it so much. It is super sturdy, I have traveled back and forth several times to college, putting it in my checked baggage and it had yet to crack or be damaged in any way. It is super simple to use to, I don’t like the gimmicky ones with body fat estimation because it’s never going to be accurate enough to rely on. I have not tested the accuracy of the scale but based off of consistency it seems to be accurate, I haven’t noticed any odd flucuations. For the price, I think this is pretty much the best scale you could get.

A very nice, sleek scale.  I was a little worried about stepping on it at first.  I thought it would break, as it is thin glass, but it wasn't a problem for this scale.  The scale measures weight very quickly, however, it does not give consistent weight each time.  After weighting myself and others, several times in a row, it is different each time, within 5 ounces.  Its not too big of a difference, so I'll keep it, but some may have an issue with it.  It also shows footprints, so will need to wipe it often to keep it looking shiny new.

review_title: Not very accurate. Measuring by tenths misleading
review_body: I've used this scale for 2 months, weighing every am and often at night. I have lost 10# and have seen my weight fluctuate up and down, both in am and pm. Plus the weight at night varies from the am wt. The problem is that the scale has certain weights that it likes, down the the tenth and what ever the actual weight is, it will select one of the specific weights it likes. Therefore what I see is an approximation of my weight, probably within 1/2 pound. If I were to list all (approx 80) of the weights I have recorded you would see many repeats of the same exact numbers. I get only one reading per whole number, like 184.2.. My very old "spring" scale is actually more accurate (if I could read it to a tenth of a pound".
Great towels and price. Wife loves em and she don’t have to lug home from store.

great buy

review_body: Great product, great price! I'm very particular to brands if trash bags, best ever in my option!! Amazon prime makes it nice to always have on hand!

review_body: Just arrived today...just in time.  I'm cleaning out closets and lots of clothing will be packed in some of these bags.  They hold a lot.
Good trash bags
strong- but still tears - should have used their guarantee

review_title: I've always used Glad trash bags
review_body: I've always used Glad trash bags. Purchased these thru Amazon because of the convenience while I was laid up with an injury and not able to get to the store. Pleased with the price and number of trash bags. Can't find that at the store.
Its a kitchen trash bag... functions as expected
It said 90 in the box... And there was. Lol, seriously though they're trash bags. So not much to say other than I'll be buying them on a regular basis 😎
Fantastic!!!!! They are very strong...use them all the time for my kitchen garbage!
Cheap, versatile, highly absorbent and easy to wash - what more could you ask for in cleaning cloths? I keep these in my kitchen for all things cleaning, and they have been a terrific find.
These towels are soft and above average quality. They do have a tag on them that will need to be removed from each towel if used on automobile. Still a good price at $9.99 for 24 towels

review_title: Good, but not for your 2 or 4 wheeled baby.
review_body: Price is very good, however I will not use on my black Triumph.  Cloths are great for general use around the house, washing, drying the car, and other sundry uses, but again, I prefer a softer microfiber cloth for wax removal on vehicles.  Instructions on the attached tags advise not to tumble dry after washing???  Say what??  How may of us still have clotheslines?  They do tend to "curl" rather badly coming out of the dryer.  Still, a good bargain.
Worked as everyone described. One other use was the grill. I have a stainless steel built in grill and this made it look new again. Took the grease right off!

review_title: The sheer number of these that you get for the price is awesome and so I highly recommend them
review_body: I should have read a little bit more carefully before ordering these things but they're larger than I thought. The sheer number of these that you get for the price is awesome and so I highly recommend them.

review_title: Great product, good price/performance alternative to more expensive microfiber cloths
review_body: ​Good product. I use it to clean anything in the kitchen and bathrooms with only water as the cleaning agent.  It doesn't leave streaks on our dark granite counter top as well.  I find it equal to or better than more expensive Microfiber products.  Some manufacturers of other products offer 1-2 cloths for the price of 24 of these from Amazon.

review_title: Much thinner than Costco Bulk Pack
review_body: I usually buy microfiber towels in bulk at Costco but going out to shop is no longer an option for me. I've had excellent luck with AmazonBasics for everything but these leave a lot to be desired. They are cheaply made and VERY thin.. If you cloth diaper and sew inserts from microfiber towels, these are probably not a good option at all.
very thin/transparent, static, not very water absorbent polyester fabric = OK for your general cleaning,however not pleasant when it's touching your skin.

.... um best purchase ever!?!? I bought these on a whim and I’ve used them to clean the floor, mirror, oven, counters, all the things!  Toss them in the wash and use over and over. I like how easy to use they are and they’re the perfect size!

These are average microfiber cloths. Heed warning that suggests washing them alone. Like any other microfiber, they are magnets for any detritus in washer (or heaven help you if they accidentally end up in a regular load in the dyer.) Burrs, twigs, pocket lint; anything, really, will lock into the fibers and become virtually impossible to detach from the cloth.

Best paper towel ever.  Easy to use and I have 6 cats at home and foster 1 or 2 other cats at any given time.  Some of these poor souls are very very sick and I need TONS of paper towels.  I don't think I'll ever use anything but Brawny.

review_title: Compare and there is no better product on the market. A strong value.
review_body: As always, Brawny continues to be of the highest quality at a very competitive price ordering from Amazon Prime Pantry and I now have them on auto delivery!
All defective

review_title: Perfect size - small paper towels in great big packages
review_body: I really like these paper towels. Dumb, I know, but I do. I love the ability to tear off a smaller piece, which is usually sufficient, and I love the huge amount in the package (16 rolls) that saves me oodles of time in ordering or back and forth trips to the store.
These paper towels are very absorbent.

review_title: the paper has just enough tooth to be good at removing dried spills in box
review_body: indispensable, couldnt live without paper towel.  Tough stuff: you can dry your hands, wipe the counter top, pick up food spills.........then you can throw it away,  I use it damp for a quick tidy in the refrigerator , the paper has just enough tooth to be good at removing dried spills in box.

review_title: Best paper towels on the market.
review_body: Best paper towels on the market. Strong and reliable time after time. They're hard to find in-store where I live, so ordering from Amazon is the best way to always have a stash at home.

I love this Brawny paper towels they don't tear apart when they are wet and I can use them for napkins if I run out of my regular napkins. I give them a 5 but they are on the pricey side just for something you are going to throw away any.

Good, but shucks, BOUNTY IS STILL THE BEST.  But Bounty must realize since it costs so much more and always going up.. BRAWNEY is high end paper towel acceptable.  Just coming off the end of a large BOUNTY order ... And they hooked me again.  But I'll get over it in 28 days :)

review_title: Tough enough for a 2 golden retriever household!
review_body: Love getting these paper towels delivered, in bulk, to our front door.  They are plain white, strong and divided into smaller sections, allowing for less waste.  We use these all over the house, especially to clean up after our two golden retrievers!
These plates are so sturdy, quite large, and attractive.  The price was highly competitive too with Prime Pantry.

review_title: I like that I can order this online
review_body: I like that I can order this online. I have a busy home life with my husband and four children in the house, this makes life easier for me.
good price  better than i thought  so sturdy i 'd liked to run them thru the dish machine but did not
love these and when you can buy in bulk and save its a plus! I love these and they hold up very good.
Strong enough for Thanksgiving Day meals! No mess, no hassle doing dishes!  We use these at all big family meals!
I got exactly 240 paper plates, they were very sturdy and durable and I still have a ton leftover. Also, everything was pretty cheap.

review_title: These are my favorite paper plates
review_body: These are my favorite paper plates. Super thick. My go to plate when I don't want to wash dishes. Which is often.

review_title: Not as STURDY as they used to be.
review_body: These plates are not as strong as they used to be. I have to layer TWO plates or even THREE with some foods.  ..
Great paper plates, hold up well, don't bend or sag with a lot of food on it. Saves water, really convenient..
Love these for just Hubby & I. Saves a lot on running the dishwasher. Sturdy enough to cut meat on.
After using well below the expected duration, charcoal started to appear in the water and drop to the bottom of the pitcher. Disgusting.

review_title: Tasty water, but slow to filter
review_body: I guess they work better than original to clean out impurities, but bc of this it's very slow to process and already very very slow only 1/2 way through the indicator buttons I have on top of the lid. Definitely tastes cleaner but the slow filling is a bummer.

The filter's flow has slowed to a trickle (1 drop per second), rendering if effectively useless.  I have tried soaking the filter again and squeezing the ends to release air bubbles, but it is still excruciatingly slow.  It is quite disappointing.

review_title: They don't serve their own purpose
review_body: I ordered these for my Brita pitcher and they do not fit. They left a gap in the pitcher so it isn't filtering the water. The whole purpose of this product is that it filters and cleans my water, but it's letting more water through without filtering it than it's actually filtering. I bought this on amazon because I didn't want to drive all the way to Walmart, but I would rather have clean water.
I had my water tested and lead was just barely detectable after a first draw, we already use Brita just to improve the taste so we just got this better filter and yeah-problem solved.

review_title: This just stopped working after 1. 5 months. ...
review_body: This just stopped working after 1.5 months.  Water literally would not even run through it.  I have had my Brita for over 10 years and I have never had that happen with a filter.  They tell you to replace after 3 months, but water will still run through the filter, you just are not getting clean water.  What the heck

review_title: Great for filtering vodka and other liquor
review_body: These things are awesome. I use them to filter cheap gutrot vodka into something far more palatable. I use one filter for every half-gallon of liquor, which easily saves me $40+ over buying a top shelf bottle at the store. Put it in an old top-shelf bottle, bring it to a party, and you friends won't know the difference.

I live in Los Angeles, and our tap water does not taste very good to me. I love my brita pitcher, as it quickly and effectively removes any of the junk that might be in the water, and leaves you with much better, cleaner tasting water. These refills work perfectly, and are a very good value for the price being sold by amazon. Occasionally you will get a little black flake in your water from the filter, but it is rare. Very happy with my purchase, and will be ordering this again when its time to replace again in a few months.

Far worse than tap water. I did soak and rinse the filter, still tastes awful. The filter has a strong plastic smell. It should be identical to the one that came with my pitcher but this seems to be far lower quality
Clogged within about a month. Water doesn't flow through. Never faced such problems with the regular filter.
Paper towels are expensive and we go through alot so decided to try Amazon's brand instead of Bounty. Not disappointed at all! They're exactly like Bounty. Will continue to buy these.
It was a great towel we have a young puppy ans it seemed to soak up messes well with out me feeling like it was getting on my hands!
The best quality paper towel out their! You don’t need to use but one single section of the towel as they are super absorbent.

review_title: Works just as good as bounty
review_body: Works just as good as bounty for half the price. I will definitely be ordering this again in the future. I do wish it came in full sheet size. I’m not a fan of the half sheet.
My husband and I agree that these are great paper towels. I used to buy Bounty's lower end product. I forget the name now... and these are better.

review_title: Very good price and good paper towels
review_body: Very good price and good paper towels.  I have always used Bounty and was hesitant to try something else.  These are just as good and not as expensive.
Paper towels would have been 100% better if they would have been individually wrapped, to keep clean while storing, other than that towels are just fine

review_title: and that makes it perfect for window cleaning
review_body: I'm picky about paper towels, and Presto! is right up there with Bounty! I couldn't believe how similar they are. It's also low dust, and that makes it perfect for window cleaning.
Cannot tell the difference between this Amazon brand and higher priced store bought brands!!! Nice big rolls with select a size. A really great buy!
Great paper towels! I think I finally found my favorite brand. This is very sturdy and you get a lot of use per roll!

I’m picky and was skeptical over it’s inexpensive price but was in need  for the guest room ASAP. It’s every bit as good as the one on my master and a fraction of the cost. Doesn’t make any noises and easy to wash

review_title: Takes less time to inflate....less then 72 hours....good to go after a day
review_body: Liked that it was lighter then the mattress I was replacing.  It's easy to move and unroll.  Had to look at the instructions to open it and , yes indeed you have to cut the cloth bag it's in and the plastic.  Slept on it first time last night.  I will not be going back to the dump to retrieve my old mattress.  I was thinking about other sizes like the 10 and 12 inch but was concerned about standard sheets fitting on them.  All in all it was a good purchase.  Left " easy to clean" blank because how would I know.  Bought the optional mattress protector so that shouldn't be a consideration.

This is the second one I have ordered.  I ordered one for our motor home and the other for home.  I love that it is washable and dryable. I have 2 little dogs and want to be prepared for any accidents.  These are both new beds and the cover is great.  Fits nice and waterproof. It doesn’t make any noise when you lay on it.  Love it.

review_title: Looks Nice, Feels Nice, Soft and Lightweight
review_body: I am unable to provide a durability review or attest to the waterproof claim as I just today pre-washed the cover and put it on the mattress.  I can say that on looks and feel alone, I prefer it to the waterproof mattress cover I had on my previous bed. It does not hold water from the washer and dries quickly.  I put it for just a few minutes to warm it up in dryer on low and then hung it on pants hangar.  My previous waterproof mattress cover dragged several gallons of water with it after spinning--seriously annoying.

I was nervous about getting a Tempurpedic bed because I've heard they can get ruined with any moisture getting on them.  I immediately started looking for a waterproof cover and landed on this one.  I tested it out by pouring some water on it and it held up great.  It also is unnoticeable to sleep on as far as not being able to hear or feel it.  The only thing that could make this cover better is if it were a zippered cover and could maybe be held a little more taught.  Not that it bunches up badly- but can use readjusting when changing the sheets.  Overall, I would definitely recommend and buy again.

I’ve never felt the need to buy a mattress pad but with a new puppy squirting all over the place I’m super glad I did! Check out my pictures, speaks for itself. Obviously I haven’t put it to the test with anything crazy but this thing totally stood up to my puppy’s morning pee! Throwing it in the wash now and was happy to still see my clean mattress beneath so I definitely wanted to express my gratitude! Thanks!

I got this because my cat had a UTI and peed on my bed. Initially I bought a cheap vinyl sheet but it was really loud and the cat would claw at it. Since he's got his claws that meant he'd be poking holes into the sheet.. So I bought this, put it on, and it's nearly silent, the cat doesn't want to attack it. He peed on it once and it kept my mattress dry. I went and bought a second one so I have a backup. Totally worth the price. Also, it doesn't get hot and moist like vinyl mattress covers do.

I purchased this mattress cover after my doctor told me I was allergic to everything, including all that disturbing stuff hanging out inside my nearly 10 year old mattress. The item arrived yesterday; directions recommend washing it first to remove any factory smells and soften it up for sleeping. What is most impressive about this cover is that it is waterproof, but doesn't have that crinkly, plastic feel of other waterproof items. The cover was soft right out of the package. The top has a terry cloth-like feel and the pockets are deep enough to fit on my non-pillow top mattress. After washing, I put this immediately over my mattress, then topped it with my usual mattress cover, which has a little extra padding. My husband and I got a good night's sleep and didn't notice the addition of the new cover. Time will tell if the item alleviates allergy symptoms.

Well I must say that this was beyond my expectations, I came in the time promised, the packaging was very good, it really does not change the feel of my mattress, the material is soft the edges are very stretchy so that is hugs the entire mattress, I actually thought it would just fit like the top half of my mattress like my sheets does but this is not the case it actually fits the whole width and even goes under the mattress, does not cover the entire bottom not that that's gonna be a problem. I have a full size therapeutic backsense mattress by the way and I think if it was a little bigger this cover would still fit because of the stretchy material on the sides. So the big question is does it really protect from liquid, well I just got mine today so i'm not 100% sure but i did try wetting the corner just a little with water and so far so good not leaks no wetness on the other side so I strongly believe that it would protect from other stuff such a bed wetting, (which by the way was the reason I got this, I have a 4 yr old son that never stays in his room and sometimes he has accidents during the night.) I will surely come back and maybe update this review as time goes to tell you guys more about when I wash it and stuff, if for some reason you really wanna get this now there are a lot of other helpful reviews which helped me decide if to get this or not.  SO GOOD LUCK AND IF YOU DO DECIDE TO GET ONE OF THESE I SURE HOPE YOU LOVE IT CAUSE I SURE DO LOVE MINE SO FAR. Thanks for reading.

review_title: We bought this for our new matress, instead of ...
review_body: We bought this for our new matress, instead of the $160 one they tried to sell us, babies stains void the ability to return or exchange and the warranty. We have an infant and she peeed and pooped ALL OVER this when I took her diaper off and not a drop got through. Our new mattress is still perfectly clean.
Wonderful quality! Very strong fabric that cleans up any mess.
Soft paper towels I like usu g in my granddaughters face and hands
Thanks! Arrived as stated!
Best paper towels, hands down.
enjoyed the price
