review_title: more like a Niagara Falls type of wetter
review_body: So, I have a bedwetter.  My child is 9, 5ft 1 and about 120lbs. He's not a tiny bedwetter, more like a Niagara Falls type of wetter. I have had many types of "waterproof " mattress protectors, plastic backing with padded tops, plastic (just plastic) and it has always gone through. The plastic types just don't seem clean to me nor comfortable under a sheet.  These, for the last 5 months, work perfectly! When I first opened the package and realized how thin it was I immediately thought no way this is gonna work! Well, it does and I love that this mattress protector  isn't bulky, so he can throw it, his sheets and comforter all in 1 load. He is responsible for his bedding, so he removes, washes and makes his bed with no issues.  We bought 2, thinking he can just throw one in the wash and immediately put the clean one on, but have really only used 1 and it has stood up well to nearly daily washings.. Bottom line, buy it if you need it. Great price as well.

review_title: This liner survived the birth of 11 puppies
review_body: This liner has been on my mattress since December. It's now nearly August. My dog decided to hop in my bed to give birth over the course of a day to 11 puppies. Very, very gross. So in addition to afterbirth, pee, poop and a few spilled Pepsi's here and there, I was afraid to take the liner off. Imagine my surprise when my mattress was as pristine as the day I purchased it. I highly recommend this product.

I’m an Airbnb host and discovered I still need a mattress protector on my beds. At first I thought they were way too thin because a lot of protectors were puffy. But they are soft and thin and the material is waterproof/resistant. It’s actually perfect for what I need it for.. I’m editing this: I washed and hung up to dry, a few days later there was water caught on the inside: this is really WATERPROOF!!!!

This is a very well made mattress protector.  It fit our standard ["Eastern"] King size mattress perfectly.  I like the soft texture of the top side of the pad and appreciate the fact it is not vinyl or "rubbery" like some of the protectors.  The price was excellent.  Our local mattress store charges $100.00 for each of their mattress protectors.

review_title: Very easy to wash (cool or warm water and low dryer) ...
review_body: I bought one for our master bedroom after being impressed with the twin sized one we purchased for a guest who wet the bed. Very easy to wash (cool or warm water and low dryer) and care for. It does not make you sweat and there is no audible crinkle noise like others. It has always been 100% waterproof. Great product for the price.

Product seems to be made of good quality although I've only used it for a month or so. As recommended I washed it prior to putting it on the bed. It does not feel uncomfortable at all beneath the sheets, and although I haven't exactly been wetting the bed to test it's waterproof-ness I have to say it's exactly what I was looking for - no reason not to give it 5 stars!

I’d love to say I don’t need this but my kids don’t know how to sleep in their own beds. Works great since the little isn’t potty trained yet. Doesn’t make the mattress hot either. Great buy. If I ever need one again I will definitely return. Suggested your product to my in laws as well and they are equally satisfied.

review_title: This waterproof mattress pad kept our air mattress dry when our toddler grandson wet the bed.
review_body: I used this waterproof mattress protector on an air mattress where my toddler grandson slept during a visit to Grandma's house.  He wet the bed one night.  Although the sheets got wet, the mattress protector prevented the air mattress from getting wet.  Great product!  I washed the mattress protector in the washing machine and dried it on low heat, and it came out looking good as new.
I Love the smaller sheets!!!  Don't have to rip them smaller, so much more convenient to use
They are great
Great product!
Small rolls. Poor quality.
The sheets are sticking to one another. Hard to pull apart
Not what i would call Big Plus Rolls. 4.5" diameter.
Efficient, handy.
Poor quality.
Most soft
Great towels, soft and thick.

review_title: The only pressure that's building is my frustration!
review_body: I have been trying to work with this pot since January.  I have had some successes but more failures.  Sometimes it will work, sometimes it won't.  The problems have been mainly with the pressure cooker function but this week I had a meal in the slow cooker that did not cook at all.  Even my daughter, who has cooked professionally, tried it because she was thinking about buying one and she hated it.
We used it 8 times and it died. And now it's too late to return. Terrible product.
Worked great for about 2 weeks.  After that it would no longer pressurize.
The pot works fine itself, but it has a defect with its lid. The screw is supposed to go inside the lid, but it is sticking out. It is easy to catch your hand when washing.

review_title: I LOVED this until the pressure cooker feature no longer worked
review_body: I LOVED this until the pressure cooker feature no longer worked.  I bought 2 of these (one for me and one for my daughter). BOTH of ours broke the same way. The silver button on top will no longer pop up to seal for the pressure cooker setting... my favorite setting!  So, I loved it, but it should last longer than 6 months!  UGH!

review_title: Will change the way you cook.
review_body: Was excited to try this when it arrived yesterday. While putting on the  plastic steam collector (it slips onto 2 very fragile and tiny black brackets) one of the brackets fell off. I immediately called Instapot and they told me to put a towel Near the back if I wanted to use it and return it to Amazon. I decided to try and cook Brussel sprouts and 2 large baked potatoes. Since I had to send it back I wanted to make sure I was happy with the way it cooked. I was delighted. In less than 13 minutes I had cooked perfect baked potatoes and Brussel sprouts, even though there seems to be a learning curve. I can see this is going to change my cooking habits and I can probabally store some of my cooking pots. Needless to say, I requested a replacement and not a refund. I am only giving this 4 stars due to what appears to be a defect in those fragile brackets.  The tech support guy certainly understood what I was talking about. Attidional note: there are just 2 of us so I ordered the 3 quart. I should have ordered the 6 quart because If I time things right this will take the place of 2-3 pots on the stove.

review_title: Not so sure about this product
review_body: So far, the Instant Pot mini has sort of worked... and the 3 qt size is perfect for me.  The LED display does not go from ON to HOT on the Saute selection like it is supposed to.  Should I return it for that, I haven't decided yet.  It was hot so I sauteed the onions.. But, why on earth do they suggest that you can SEE the black arrows embossed on the black lid and the black neck of the pot-----  when it would be such a simple thing to print these in WHITE so you can actually see how to set the lid onto the pot?  I took a marker and outlined the arrows, which helps, although of course, you cannot actually make a really visible mark with a marker pen on a black surface.  When the light shines just right, it is sort of makes the marker ink shine slightly.

I bought this based on reviews and "What's the best pressure cooker of 2016" websites all saying this is the best. Well it came today and I will be contacting Amazon for a return NOT an exchange. This passed the steam test the manual recommends you do but as soon as you add food it doesn't come to pressure and just starts counting down. I not see other reviews stating the same issue and wish I read more of them before ordering..  Please keep in mind I AM NOT a pressure cooker noob, I own 2 others and have no issue with them. For the money and the amount of reviews I am soooooooooooo disappointed.. Hope this helps someone who is about to blow $160 on this thing, don't do it.

review_title: Faulty valve in the lid does not seal
review_body: This unit is designed with a self sealing valve that is supposed to pop up when the pressure raises to the proper level.  It acts as a locking mechanism for the lid so you can't open the top when under pressure.  We battled with getting the valve to pop up every time we used it.  We kept the valve very clean and really did everything by the book to get the unit to seal up.  We would have to resort to tapping or banging on the the top or shaking the whole unit to get the mechanism to pop into place.  Last night after a frustrating 30 minutes of working to get the valve to seal, we ended up turning the unit off.  I had hoped to open the lid to investigate the problem - mistake!  It was still too hot.  We ended up with a huge mess.  See the photo of the mess we ended up with!  Yikes!  We cleaned it all up and emailed instant pot customer service today to see if they will assist with a solution.  I think the lid was defective to begin with as the seal should pop right up once under pressure.  I am really disappointed with the overall experience, but we will update here if we get a satisfactory level of customer service to fix the problem.  We keep trying because we have had some great meals (despite the effort) from this unit.  Just hope we can get it to work as designed...

review_title: Defect developed after less than a year of use -- Customer service, warranty no good!
review_body: This is my 2nd one, first one I gave away when I replaced it with this one. Anyway, worked great for 8 months but now the pressure control valve refuses to hold and it releases steam and makes a terrible mess.. I'm trying to get their customer service to respond to the issue. Submitted the problem over a week ago with photographs and everything and they have not responded. So much for the warranty.
Happy! Firm, but not hard. Pillow cases look stuffed, but are very soft when you lay on them.

review_title: Amazing product for an amazing price!
review_body: This pillow is fantastic, easy 5 star rating. It is incredibly soft, and fluffy, and a perfect throw pillow for my couch! I originally bought one, but I love it so much, I bought a second to replace the other pillow I had. Considering the price point other single pillows were, I was not expecting much from this pillow, but I was completely blown away by it!

May be fine for a pillow that is never used but ended up throwing both pillow inserts out after a month. After using on family room couch for a month, pillows became out of shape and flat. They were a waste of money.
It’s a nice throw pillow. My boyfriend sleeps with it every night!
Very cheaply made but its ok for me.  My dog is most likely going to chew them anyway.
Excellent quality!  Good price.
Thanks!  Just used this pillow form to stuff a magic mermaid pillowcase and it was PERFECT!  Arrived new and in perfect condition.

review_title: Very pleased with how 'full' and 'poofy' these pillows are
review_body: Very pleased with how 'full' and 'poofy' these pillows are.  I ordered several to make 'memory pillows' to give as gifts for Christmas.  Some of them arrived 'somewhat vacuum packed' but when I opened the bag, they sprung into shape beautifully.  I was very pleased with the quality.
Super fluffy pillows! My case was 18x18 and I ordered 20x20 pillow insert. Love it!
Great buy. Standard pillow. I've had it for about 4 months now and it's still fluffy.

review_title: THIS STEAMER REALLY WORKS AND VERY RELIABLE. I HAVE ...
review_body: THIS STEAMER REALLY WORKS AND VERY RELIABLE.  I HAVE USED IT ON MY TRAVELS, IT WORKS ON SILKS, LINEN, COTTON, WOOL AND POLYESTER. .  I HAVE GOTTEN  OTHER STEAMERS THAT NEEDED SALT TO STIMULATE STEAM OR DIDN'T CREATE ENOUGH STEAM.  THIS STEAMER WORKS AS STATED.
Budget friendly but gets the job done!
Great little steamer**works wonders, is easy to use.  I highly recommend.
Wow! Love it!

I was hesitant about a steamer because I've heard not so great things in the past but this one is AMAZING! My entire family wants to get one. Easy to use, small, convenient for traveling, quick, doesn't damage your clothes. So great!
Worked Great.

review_title: I contacted the company and they were amazing! They sent me a brand new steamer and ...
review_body: My first steamer worked well at the beginning and after about 5 uses it started spitting water all over whatever I was steaming. I contacted the company and they were amazing! They sent me a brand new steamer and it works great! Customer service at its finest!
Not satisfied not efficient spouts water
Easy to use. Perfect size for travel.
It is very light , easy to steam. Works well but dont expect it to do a good jos as a professional dry clean does. I am satified .

Great purchase for the money. Lots of settings. Easy to hang. I would recommend not taking the twist ties off of each strand before hanging. Much easier to hang with each strand still twist tied together!
I love them! I hung the lights on my huge free standing mirror and they look great.
Great twinkle lights!! Great for the price. Very long but you can pull Up the extra length to add the rest of the strings to make it brighter in that area.
Simply gorgeous!! These lights were perfect as a decor for our guest bedroom. We used them on a wall in place of a headboard. We get a lot of compliments on them!
Would give zero stars if possivle.straight out of the box they didn't work.
The lights were just as described.  They were easy to install and provided the look we expected from the description and pictures.

review_title: which I love. They have 3 settings
review_body: These are so magical!!! They are a yellow light, which I love. They have 3 settings: on, dimmed, and twinkle! I was excited to get them but I’m more excited now that I have them up. I can’t wait to put more in my house!!!

review_title: but I’m definitely very happy with how these look
review_body: Took a while to figure out where & how to hang these, but I’m definitely very happy with how these look! They were a little too long, so I used tiny rubber bands to tie up the ends.

review_title: These are awesome! I put these behind my curtains in my ...
review_body: These are awesome! I put these behind my curtains in my room  definitely  Going to buy more for my daughter! Not hard to put up. They are a little too long but I fixed them!

review_title: The product works fine, however it was stated these would be a ...
review_body: The product works fine, however it was stated these would be a warm white and they almost look like bright LED lights. Not at all how it's  pictured which is disappointing. Also the box it came in was open, torn and crushed. The lights were barely placed in it. I'm actually surprised they worked because of the way they were packaged. I was sure I was going to plug them in and they wouldn't light up.

I bought this because it was the top-selling liner on Amazon, and had rave reviews.. I had to switch it out in a few weeks because it's so bulky and crunchy and cheap-looking. Yes, it's a functional shower liner, but it's so ugly. I'm trying to go for a spa-like vibe, and this curtain is terrible for that purpose. I ended up replacing it with the Matouk shower curtain liner, which is much smoother and nicer looking.

review_title: Perfect Curtain. No Sticking, No Mold!
review_body: This shower curtain has been absolutely perfect! I bought it a few months ago and waited to write a review. Unlike every other curtain I've ever purchased, this one does not collect mold or mildew, which is perfect for me because I am very lazy when it comes to cleaning my curtain. Also, unlike many curtains, this one does not stick to me. The magnets help a bit (they would be more helpful if I had measured my shower before purchasing this.). For anyone who is tired of finding mold on your shower curtain, this is the curtain for you.
Great so far but kind of thick and they don’t fold and move as easy as I had hoped they would. Maybe it’s just because they are new

review_title: Great price for a great product
review_body: Great price for a great product.  Fast shipping and quick and easy to hang.  I bought 2 for both our bathrooms and we haven't had any issues so far.  These are a necessity product for our household.  Feels like great quality so hopefully we won't have to replace for a while!

review_title: Has appealing features but does get mildewy
review_body: I have used three of these in the last year to year-and-a-half.  I hung the last one in early September and just replaced it with another LiBa because it had mildew and streaks on it.  We sometimes forget to spread out the shower curtain so that it can dry after we use it . This is probably why the curtain has mildew spots after several months.  I seem to recall that washing the mildew-stained shower curtain in the washing machine did not remove all the mildew.  I like that the shower curtain has no smell, is transparent, and is very reasonably priced, but I feel guilty about landfilling more than my fair share of shower curtains!

review_title: Lack of smell is great, but grommets are not rust proof
review_body: It is worth spending a couple extra dollars to get a shower curtain that doesn't have that chemical smell that the cheap ones have. The magnets work well. However, I must have a different definition of "rust proof" than the seller. The grommets started to rust after about 9 months, maybe sooner.

review_title: One of the better shower liners
review_body: One of the better shower liners. It arrived without a smell upon opening, and the weights at the bottom do a good job of making sure the liner doesn't float around and cling to your body (which my previous liner did). It isn't the "cheapest" (only more expensive by a few dollars) shower liner I've purchased, but it's definitely the best. I especially like that this one is see-through- really feels like it's not there at all (the way a curtain liner should be).

review_title: This shower liner works 100% better than the one I replaced
review_body: This shower liner works 100% better than the one I replaced. This one doesn't attempt to wrap itself around me while showering. Well worth the coin. When this new one needs replacing, I'm purchasing the same as I saved the amazon info. The same curtain is more than twice the price at a brick and mortar store. Happy camper here! !

review_title: that arrived nicely packaged. Metal grommets at top where the shower ...
review_body: A clear shower curtain, that arrived nicely packaged. Metal grommets at top where the shower hooks insert. Built in magnets to secure the curtain to the tub. Nice thickness to the curtain to keep it from breezing in if there is a draft during your shower.

Are the reviews fake? What about the answers to people’s questions when they asked about thickness? It’s so misleading! I thought for sure I would be getting a thicker good quality shower curtain liner but this one is as thin and flimsy as they get!

review_title: It's pretty accurate weighing things - usually
review_body: It's pretty accurate weighing things - usually. The problem is that it's kind of fussy. If your feet aren't in the perfect position or the scale is the least bit tilted it'll weigh you off by 10 or 20 pounds. The only upside is that the error is usually large enough you can tell that you need to adjust position.

This scale reads weight in wild variations. I weighed myself six or seven times in a row this morning and received weights that varied between 90 pound differences. I put a 10-pound weight on the scale and it read it as 12.4 pounds, 9.2 pounds, 10.2 pounds, and 8.4 pounds. It seems there is no way to get a consistent reading and no way to trust what the scale is saying.
This item has to be on a level hard surface/floor, to work properly, otherwise it will not give the correct weight.

review_title: You get what you pay for
review_body: This scale works well enough, but it takes some time to get an accurate weight. It gives a different number every time I step on it. In order to get an accurate reading, I weigh myself until it gives me the same number 3 times in a row which can take anywhere from 4-10 tries. If you're thinking about purchasing this scale, I would spend a little more money on one that is more consistent and accurate.

So disappointed! 5 starts to Amazon who has great customer services but 0 starts for the scale. It arrived on time and looked great, but it stopped working a month after I got it. I tried new batteries, but it just turns off everytime someone steps on the scale. Amazon was kind enough to give me a refund, but purchasing this scale was a waste of time and energy. Spend money on another scale. This one isn't worth your money!!!

This is the worst scale have ever owned. The glass showes every water spot. But more importantly I weigh myself and it give me a reading and then I double check and it goes up or down 3 lbs randomly. Very hard to get a accurate reading. And is super annoying when one min you think you are doing great and 5 min later you are up a couple of pounds. I would like to give it zero stars but it won't let me give a review if j don't give it at least 1.

review_title: This scale is very nice in appearance
review_body: This scale is very nice in appearance. It was nice and worked well the first month of use. We have had the product now for almost two months and we are getting measurements  that are far in range. One minute you are 200 lbs. and another minute you are 175 lbs. We have kept the scale in the same spot this whole time as well. We feel like this product is okay.. UPDATE!! After posting my review the company personally contacted me and sent me a new scale. After receiving the new scale and using for the past 2 or so months it is working perfectly. It is consistent and working great. I commend the company in being proactive and taking pride in their product. It was great customer service. I would buy again!!

review_title: Broken in less than a year
review_body: I bought this scale last August, and it used it maybe once a month or so. It always seemed to work fine, but suddenly it won't read my weight. It just cycles through a huge span of numbers nowhere close to my weight before finally just turning back off. I've tried changing the batteries but it didn't change anything. I'm nowhere near the max weight and it hasn't moved spots since I put it down.

I bought this to track how much weight I have gained as I am trying to bulk, but three weeks after purchasing this scale and I cannot trust it anymore. Every time I step on the scale, I get a different weight even when stepping on the scale five times, less than one minute apart each time. I step on the scale and I'm one weight, I step off the scale, zero the scale, and step on again and I'm suddenly four pounds heavier (and yes I keep the scale on a hard surface when weighing myself). This scale has a lot of good reviews but do not waste your money!

After four months, the scale now errors out - no reason or explanation. I have not used it in a week since my last check and all it does now is error.  I thought it might be batter related so I put in new batteries.  Still all I get is an error and no weight.  Not a fan of this scale at this time.
on time ok!^^
Just as good as more well known name brands, you cant tell the difference. They are a little more reasonable price wise also.

review_title: Perfect for removing that trash can odor.
review_body: The Febreeze Glad Kitchen bags are a staple in my kitchen. They keep the trash can smelling pleasant for several days before the bag is removed. The draw strings are sturdy and have not broken on me. The mega pack lasts me about 6 months in a one person household.

review_title: great if not for the smell
review_body: These smell so disgusting, it does not even matter that they are otherwise the perfect bags with the best price. I do not want these in my house, and yet there are 109 left to go. THE SMELL IS SO GROSS!!! It infects not only the whole room but your hands for touching them.

review_title: Works Great and they smell awesome too!
review_body: Got a great deal on these and LOVE THEM! I bought several boxes and they smell GREAT for a long time! I would purchase again. They also are great at not tearing when I tie up the bag and take it out to the garbage can.

Glad quality at the best price ever. Several months supply at the rate we use them. The Fabreeze is a plus if you have to store your garbage in the garage for a few days before the truck shows up. Better price than I could buy at any of the local stores. Will purchase again.

review_title: Faulty drawstrings render bags almost unusable
review_body: Like other recent reviews mentioned, I've been having issues with the drawstrings not being properly crimped. This is extremely frustrating, as the drawstrings I've pre-tied will no longer fit around the rim of my larger trash can. Overall, very dissatisfied, Not a big fan of the scent, either.

What can I say? Less expensive than a store purchase, brought right to my door. Plastic stretches, and the odor shield keeps garbage from getting stinky! Cheaper bags break and smell, ain't nobody got time for that! Lol

review_title: I bought this in March 2017 and I'm stil using ...
review_body: I bought this in March 2017 and I'm stil using this original order. It is now February 2018. I can see that we're down to maybe a few more left on the roll. We're a family of 4, 2 adults and 2 giant dogs. These block odor very well and can hold a lot of trash. Will Gladly purchase again *ba dum tsss*
Great price for these trash can liners.  Really does stop the odor for at least 5 days.  I'd thrown away vegetable (including onion) scraps and there was no smell even after 6 days.

review_title: Sickening "Odor Shield" is worse than trash!
review_body: The odor shield is very strong and makes me ill.  And the odor lingers on.  I prefer the smell of trash to the odor shield!  I've gone back to bags with no odor.
Product arrived in timely fashion and in good shape. . Carton a bit difficult to open but product in good shape.

review_title: Good product, if also an expensive one.
review_body: Hard to go wrong with these in a pinch, but to be honest, Costco's Kirkland kitchen trash bags are every bit as good and about half the price. Only bought these because I could get them in 2 days (Prime) and didn't have time to run to Costco (the closest one of which is about an hour away).

We've almost always used Glad Trash Bags for our household waste, so when we saw this brand and good price on Amazon we were happy to purchase this product right away. Plus we didn't have to waste gas to go to the store to purchase them. You won't be sorry if you use Glad Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags.

review_title: Glad Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags
review_body: This is one of those purchases that you like to brag about because the price was great, delivery was fast and the bags are generally great. Every now and then, the handle has an issue, but overall, recommend.

review_title: We got a quarter of the way through the box ...
review_body: We got a quarter of the way through the box and discovered and the rest of both rolls are defective. The drawstring is not attached so there is no way to synch the bag once it's full.
There is a defect in the bags I received.  The drawstring are on the same side..both of them.  Normally there is one in each side to sinch the garbage bag closed.

review_title: The bags are fine. I did not realize that one box represents ...
review_body: The bags are fine. I did not realize that one box represents a 3 month supply and thus became over supplied. I now have 3 full boxes of these bags so I wish to cancel this subscription until I use up my existing supply.. This is all my fault and no reflection on Amazon or the product. When my current supply is exhausted I shall return! Thank you.. Richard Rhodes

review_title: I love the tie strings also
review_body: These are the only trash bags I use. They never bust open or drip when I load the trash full. I love the tie strings also. Easy to throw away in the dumpster.

I love these paper towels.  They are very absorbent and I love that you can tear off a small size one if that is all you need.  Makes cleaning up small messes easily.

Good price.  Doesn't matter how many rolls or what size they call it (big, double, xl), you have to compare the square foot/inch.

review_body: You just throw these things away after using them! What a wonderful time we live in today!

I luv Dixie plates because they are strong, you don’t have to layer plate after plate. I was extremely pleased to find this set a this price, they were everything they said it was. My package arrived extremely fast with no damage. I still have some left for Christmas. I would definitely reorder again when I need them.

I will never stop buying these in bulk from Amazon. Perfect dinner size, large and sturdy.
Great product, great price, would definitely buy again and would recommend to others.
Nice size plates and sturdy.  Just the right size for someone who is trying portion control.

After trying an off-brand filter replacement, I'll never go back.  This is one of those things you need to get the brand name for, to be sure your water is filtering and the filter fits snugly in the pitcher.  I bought some other ones at another store and they were so bad that I don't even want to remember what the "eco friendly" brand was called.

These will perform as expected I hope. The one that came with the pitcher is doing a remarkable job in giving my water a nice, non odiferous taste, certainly not the creek water taste that comes out of my tap. But my water company tries, they really do.

I've had a Britta pitcher for years. This is the first time I ordered filters from Amazon. The first filter gave the water a sweet taste. We thought it would go away. It actually changed the taste. After three weeks we threw it away. The second filter still changed the taste but not so much. I don't know what Britta did to their filters but for the money you pay you would think they would provide better ones.

review_title: Speed was fine when I first opened the package around 2 weeks ...
review_body: Speed was fine when I first opened the package around 2 weeks ago.  Now, the water drips out.  Takes almost 40 minutes for the water to get through.  I'm sure it'll get worse too.  Disappointed in these.

I have had no problems with these. I keep them in my Brita much longer than when the little timer on the top tells me to swap them out. I heard some complaints about the new style of the filter, but they work great for me and I actually find them easier to get in/out of the pitcher than the old ones.

I will definitely purchase these Brita filters again. This is a great value for the price. I searched other places, but this was the most reasonable price for three filters. They are exactly the same filters I've purchased from a larger retailer, and they work great. Also, they arrived in a timely. I have already recommended these filters to several of my friends.

These are going to save me hundreds of dollars a year in bottled water.  I drink 40 to 50 ounces a day plus this makes the coffee taste great over city water. Just sorry I did not get Brita and the replacement years ago.. Seldom more impressed with a product!

I do like this design over the old ones. I have been using brita water filters for about 7 years now and I really enjoy them. Buy these in bulk to save money.. I have not tried any of the off-brand filters to compare, mostly because the whole worth of the item is in the filter technology.. These worked great, fit in my old pitcher no problem, and they seem to filter more efficiently than before (quicker).

I really love having my Brita Walter Filter Pitcher in my fridge and so does my whole family!  We really like how clean the water tastes and having it cold all the time (unless someone forgets to fill it up).  I ordered these.  They didn't look exactly the same as the one that came with our pitcher.  I was worried it may not fit as well.  It fit like a glove!  I'm glad I got the 3 pack.  These will last us for awhile!

If had this filter since the beginning of December, so about 2 months now. Since about week two it has steadily filtered water slower and slower. It is now to the point were is filters 1 drops about every 5 seconds. Which amounts to about a quart an hour. At this point the filter is pretty much useless and a waste of money. If I could return it I would. Instead it is going where it belongs, in the trash.  I will go back to the regular filters. They have been working great for me for years.

review_title: Great inexpensive option to Bounty SeletASize!
review_body: Very good quality paper towels at bargain price!!  I'll be a repeatbuyer for sure!

review_title: I thought it was great. I'd definitely buy this again
review_body: We usually buy Bounty, but I thought I'd give it a try.  No complaints.  I thought it was great.  I'd definitely buy this again.  I price shop and right now I need to buy more paper towels.  Brawny is a better price right now, so I'll get Brawny.  I tried Presto because they offered a 20% off for first time purchase deal.  But if they drop their price again, I'd buy it.

review_title: Just as awesome as expensive ones!
review_body: These towels are great and work just as good as the more expensive ones. I love the flex a size as I have small messes and don't need a huge sheet. Or if i need, i can pick a large section.

review_title: durability and quality says it all for Presto!
review_body: I tried both the bathroom tissue and paper towels and was extremely impressed and basically reordering again in the next week or so as my stock at home depletes. I had purchased Kirkland for a number of years based upon the durability and consistently being a good product for my household. Add in the fact that I can get it delivered and you have a no-brainer. Price was secondary....
Been buying different towels every time. Finally a keeper! This is my first choice now!
Equivalent to the brand that gives a reward for capturing wanted criminals...A good deal.
Great alternative to Koch brothers products. I've recommended it to many neighbors and friends.

review_title: No bad news. They are great.
review_body: LOVE these Amazon Presto paper towels. They are actually way better than the walmart store brand I was using.
I typically purchase Bounty and was persuaded to give this a try. I have found it to be as absorbent and strong as Bounty and less costly. The convenience of home delivery is a bonus.

review_title: Costco is a better deal. Quality is the same
review_body: Too expensive! Costco is a better deal. Quality is the same. Also e bay has more choices and better prices

Great product, we gave a very expensive new tempurpedic king size bed and my wife, who sometimes has,  how should I put it, heavy flow days, was panicking, thinking she had to use whatever extra protection to keep our new mattress pristine, so much so that even before using the Saferest,  she tested it using some dye on top of an old towel. All I can say is that she now will sleep like an undiapered baby without any worries in the world. Can I give these guys 10 stars?

Fits very well and is a little on the larger side, which I prefer over being to small and having it pull up in the corners. We have these on both my kids beds and they have protected the mattress very well so far, including when our puppy sneaked in the bedroom and wet on the bed. The top of the pad feels more like a towel and isn't as soft as other mattress pads, but we don't notice it once its under the fitted sheet.

We have not had this protector long enough to form any opinions as to its protection capabilities, but it is worth mentioning that it is significantly thinner that others that we have purchased in the past.  If you are looking to add some padding to the top of your mattress this probably isn't going to help much.  However it does do a good just of fitting on the sides of the relatively deep mattresses.

Appears that it will serve the purpose intended.  Well-made and deep enough to fit the mattress with foam mattress topper.  As with other water-repellent coverings, drying time is extended.  Quality product.  Would have given it 5 stars but for the extended drying time - but then, guess that is to be expected.  Okay....it gets FIVE STARS!

This mattress cover has so far been pooped on, peed on, and barfed on by my 2 toddlers. I have one of these covers on each of their beds. The covers wash very easily and have not retained any of the smell or stains from the body fluids. The cover is soft enough that it doesn't make any plasticy sounds while they're being slept on, and we don't even notice they're on the bed. The mattress underneath the cover doesn't have any stains nor smells, so this cover has worked exactly how I like it to.

I just got my first one a few weeks ago, to replace my Tempurpedic mattress protector that was falling apart after six years. It is a bit snug, but otherwise fits our king size mattress well. I ordered a second one as a spare the day after my dog had an accident on the bed. This protector did its job, the quilt and sheets were soaked, but nothing penetrated through the protector to the mattress. As long as it holds up for a few years, I'm happy.

Doing exactly what is is meant to do! I use with my new Tuft And Needle mattress. The only con I have is that it is starting to poke through my fitted bed sheet, but that might be an issue with my sheets and not this product. Overall I really recommend. If you are worried about bugs then I would not recommend this as the entire "back" of the mattress isn't covered by this product.. The product was easy to wash, had clear instructions, and doesn't have a weird smell like many other bed safety products have. I really recommend for anyone with kids, pets, or have a lot of bedroom fun.

Bought the Safe Rest Mattress Cover for my toddler's twin bed; My child was born 3 months premature, so due to her past breathing concerns, it was important  for me to find a Mattress cover that was Hypoallergenic and protects against Dust Mites, Allergens & Bacteria.  Also, although she is fully potty trained, I wanted the peace of mind in the event of an "accident" along with protection from ALL the other forms of liquid/stains a toddler causes.. It was also important for me to find a noiseless mattress cover that wasnt made of vinyl or any other "noisy" material so that my child could get a restful night sleep.  The Safe Rest Mattress protector meets ALL my expectations and more!  :)
I ready the reviews before buying this and saw the good and the bad, I’ve had this since October 2017 and I haven’t found a problem with it at all, it stays in page and doesn’t move out of place

I love this product!! Just bought a 2nd one for a back-up. My 1st one has lasted nearly 3 yrs. I bought it for it's waterproof capabilities for night sweats and it hasn't disappointed. I especially like the fact that there's no plastic "crunching" sound when I move in bed. Now it's saving my mattress from my cat who sometimes has urinary incontinence on the bed. I have no stains on my mattress. I also have the matching pillowcases and love them too, especially during warm summer nights.
They are awesome

review_title: Weird texture but gets the job done
review_body: To be honest, I think I prefer the Sparkle brand. The texture of the Viva towels combined with this new industry trend of placing the perforations closer together makes each sheet feel like what you'd find while cleaning out your dryer's lint trap. The wife on the other hand, likes these much better. And since she's the official provisioner of sex around here (and more likely to do so when happy and content), if she likes it, I love it.

review_title: Like cleaning with an Hermes neckerchief
review_body: Yeah, I'm not ordering these again.  I can see why people like them, but they're not my style.  It's like pulling handkerchiefs off a roll.  I am going back to Bounty I guess, I need my token scratchy paper towels.  I feel like I'm throwing away shirts or something.
The most annoying paper towel. Trying to get a sheet off the roll is a pain.  They cling so bad it takes two hands and what a pain that is. Can't wait for them to be gone!!

These are my absolutely favorite paper towels.  I think they're much stronger and clean up better than all the other leading brands including Bount and ones that claim to be heavy duty versions.  They also feel soft and nice.

Not a fan of these at all. They leave behind SO MUCH LINT. I'm guessing that's supposed to be the cloth-like texture? They're also difficult to unroll--you can't just grab one off the roll one-handed, it's a two-hand job. Anyway. Definitely not getting these again!

review_title: Big Plus?  I Don't Think So
review_body: Really small compared to Sparkle,  I will stick with Sparkle next time around,  see pictures Sparkle vs Viva, Sparkle is the bigger roll,  I'll leave it to you to make up your own mind
I'd much rather have the Bounty huge rolls. They are so much better for making my own homemade cleaning wipes. I don't think I will order these again.
The worst paper towels in the world. They are annoying to pull off and they leave towel particles all over everything you wipe including your hands.

review_title: NOT the Viva towel- soft and cloth like as I always knew- these are rough with a ...
review_body: NOT the Viva towel- soft and cloth like as I always knew- these are rough with a "weave like surface"- seem to be strong enough for regular use- did not find any "flaking" when used wet. They do NOT cling to each other on the roll Iike the original Viva- so look sloppy when on the paper towel dispenser. Cancelled my S & Save subscription after this first shipment. The ORIGINAL Viva is still available- wished I had read the other reviews before ordering this box of 24!!

review_title: Float valve doesn't pop up on its own.
review_body: We're using this pot to cook for two and it does a great job, save for one problem--the little float valve in the lid does not pop up on its own.. In order to get the float valve to pop up, I have to tap on it or grab the lid and press down on it once enough pressure has been built up inside the pot.. I can't tell if this is a design flaw or a fault of the valve--it's a pretty basic little thing and unless the valve is catching on a rough bore in the lid or something, I don't see why it won't raise up on its own.  Once I get it to pop up, the unit works like a charm.. I was hoping it was user error, but after four months of using the pot almost weekly and experimenting with advice from online, I'm pretty sure this isn't right. Maybe I should contact the manufacturer, because right now, I have to watch the pot to ensure it will build pressure.

Worked great... when it worked.  After telling so many people how much I loved it, our InstantPot was dead after less than 2 months.  Middle of a cycle just powered off and wouldn't turn back on.  Tried to contact support, no answer.  Finally called and was told they had a two week wait to answer a support request.  After much hemming and hawing they finally put my ticket into a queue just for dead pots, but it'll be another couple weeks minimum before I get a replacement.

review_title: ... rubber seal tends to absorb smells and it's been pretty hard if not impossible to get the smells out
review_body: The only issue I've had is that the rubber seal tends to absorb smells and it's been pretty hard if not impossible to get the smells out.

review_title: Absolutely love it. I have only used it once (made ...
review_body: Absolutely love it.  I have only used it once (made Indian Butter Chicken), and realizing how beneficial and convenient this is, I've decided to buy all 12 of my employees who are all very busy working mothers there.  I'm going as far as preparing all the meals for our Xmas party with it so that after they open their gift I'll be able to brag that all meals they ate that night were cooked with the IP.

I received my Instant Pot yesterday and this morning I read the instruction book, ran the test run, and found a website "Pressurecookingtoday.com" which gave me instructions for doing steamed pudding in my pressure cooker.  I have made persimmon pudding for the holidays for years, using an old Presto appliance which doubled as a deep fryer, and took 2-1/2 hours of steaming and having to add water at least once.  Today I made it in my Instant Pot in 60 minutes and it came out perfect.  So happy I bought this appliance.  Can't wait to try the next thing.

review_title: I have bought 2 of these over last 2 years ...
review_body: I have bought 2 of these over last 2 years. Lid melted both times. First time it was after 1 year, Second time within a year, so contacted Instant pot for warranty, and they directed us to buy lid from their website.

review_title: I'm going to build a shrine for my instant pot
review_body: Ever since I learned to make real Italian meatballs when I was a teenager, I've loved spending time in the kitchen. I enjoy creating recipes and watching people enjoy a delicious home-cooked meal. I'm not into fancy-schmancy gadgets, but I'll spend money for items that help me make good food. So, when I heard people raving about the Instant Pot recently, my ears perked up. But, I didn't want something that would just collect dust on my counter. Then I read the reviews and saw all the recipes online and decided to give it a try. Well, this baby is worth its weight in gold! I have used it every single day since I got it. I've made rice & beans, Creamy African Stew (see photos), steamed sweet potatoes, brussel sprouts, oatmeal, popcorn, veggie soup and so much more. My hubby is thrilled and so am I. It's so easy to use, there are so many free recipes online and clean up couldn't be simpler. A few people have bought the Instant Pot just from my recommendation. It's THAT good. I also bought the glass cover and an extra insert for when I want to make two things back-to-back. If you are on the fence, try it. It is so worth it!

review_title: The best money I ever spent on a kitchen appliance!
review_body: I love my Instant Pot!  After watching several infomercials about electric pressure cookers, I did some research.  This Instant Pot had the best reviews and overall customer satisfaction ratings as well as being quite a bit less expensive than the one I saw on TV!. Last night after watching a YouTube video on how to cook a beef roast in the Instant Pot and after reading the instruction manual, I tried that bad boy out.  Below is the recipe I followed with parts I made up myself:. Ingredients:. 1 - 2.5 pound chuck roast. 4 - red potatoes. Weber Chicago Steak Seasoning. Beef Bullion Cubes. Garlic Salt. Minced Onions. About a tablespoon of cooking oil. I took the roast straight out of the freezer and put it on defrost in the microwave just long enough to get it to separate from the wrapper (about 4 minutes).. I put the Instant Pot on Saute and let it get up to temperature.  When it read HOT on the display, I put in just enough oil to cover the bottom of the pot lightly (about a good tablespoon.). Next, I took the frozen roast and put it in the pot and browned it on all sides and ends.  (This took less than five minutes, total.). After the roast was brown, I added two cups of water and 3 beef bullion cubes, a dash of garlic powder, a good coating of the Weber Chicago Steak seasoning and about four tablespoons of minced onions I got at the dollar store.  I put on the lid and hit the Meat / Stew button and per the YouTube video I watched on how to cook the roast, I moved the time up to 41 minutes, made sure the release valve was set to pressure and walked away.. When I heard the timer go off I manually released the steam.  You can do this by gently bumping the release valve so it doesn't all come out at once or just move the release valve to "release" and watch it.  Since this was the first time in my life I'd ever used a pressure cooker, I just kept gently bumping the valve to release pressure until the ball thing next to it dropped and I knew it was safe to open the lid.. The result was the best roast I've ever had in my life in about a fourth of the time it would have taken me to cook it in the oven.  The meat was tender and juicy but not mushy.  The potatoes had the flavor of the meat all through them and the broth left from cooking I could've used to make gravy, which I didn't because my guys were hungry.  So I saved the broth to use in a stew.  In less than one hour I had a meal that would've taken me three or four hours to cook to the same degree of tenderness in my oven.  The whole kitchen wasn't heated up, and I was left with a single pot to clean.. If a novice like me can use this bad boy and have such outstanding results, anybody, and I mean anybody can do it!  And, if you work all day and would rather spend your evenings hanging out with your family than hanging out in a kitchen, do yourself a favor and get this machine!  I'm so glad I did.  We have GOOD, HEALTHY food to eat that tastes wonderful and save both time and money.  I love my Instant Pot!

review_title: Machine does not build pressure after a year and CS is subpar
review_body: Owned this for 11 months.  Will not come up to pressure with anything but water in it.  I have been back and forth with customer support for a month now.  They sent me a new sealing ring to test.  Same issues.  Then they reply that since it is not leaking steam that the unit is fine.  Well it wasn't leaking steam to begin with and it is still not working right (trying to simply cook spaghetti sauce).. We'll see how it goes with getting a replacement but blaming the thickness of the liquid you are cooking is poor.  It's a pressure cooker right?

Love this appliance but be warned, the 8qt one is pretty big. See the pic of it I uploaded next to my rice cooker. It dwarves my air fryer too. I got the 8qt because the 6qt was out of stock and I didn't want to wait "one or two months". I figured the extra size would give me flexibility to make more stuff while still being able to do small quantities. While that's true, it takes longer to get to pressure and it takes up quite a bit of counter space.. Kinda wish I'd waited now to get the 6qt.
My Mongolian Lamb pillows look excellent. My fur baby is enjoying them so much.
Good for the price point
When I opened the package the pillow was starting to become unstitched, the corner stuffing was coming out.
Exactly what I wanted!  I ordered this 18x18 form and it fit perfectly full in my 16x16 pillow case.  I wanted it firm and it worked!
Nice comfortable pillow

review_title: Not 22 x 22 two inches too small
review_body: It doesn’t fit a 22 by 22 pillow cover. It is more than two inches to short.
This is an amazing pillow for the price zero complaints at all much fuller than expected would buy again

review_title: thank you Jason for informing me on how to get the best fluff for the pillows
review_body: I wanted to say, thank you Jason for informing me on how to get the best fluff for the pillows.The pillows are of excellent quality and when I inserted them into the covers they filled them up just right! The pillows are very poufy and firm, just what I was looking for.  Thanks again for reaching out to see if I was satisfied with my (your)pillows!I would most definitely recommend them!
Great quality waiting for the cover to arrive

review_body: A little more full than I'd like, but if your looking for a full pillow- it would be 5 stars.
Did not steam a lot of my wife's dresses =(

review_body: This steamer is perfect for traveling.  It's also very simple to manage...just fill up the water, plug it in and let the steam get to work! And this steamer really gets the wrinkle out!!!  Highly recommend this product!!
This is fabulous!! Ordering more
Works great and easy to use!!
Heats up fast and does a great job!
Had to fill up twice for one shirt.  Use bottle water so you will not get calcium build up.
spits
The steamer is easy to hold and use. It is very small, so I use the entire container of water with one shirt. It would work well for someone steaming a short at a time.
Perfect for travel. Unit is small, but is fantastic for touch ups needed from packing.
First of all have to compliment the company on the fantastic customer service. Excellent people to work with. Great product!! Easy to use. Works well.
There gonna be perfect with the tulle . they work as do all the different settings!. I added a photo because there was a question about connecting strands together. I don't think you can.

review_title: Theses lights are super pretty and i love that the setting allows me ...
review_body: Theses lights are super pretty and i love that the setting allows me to display them differently. My favorite is the twinkling setting. However the lights are not as bright as I expected them to be, but I still really like them! I put them over my bed and folded them in half, they are pretty long!

review_title: Cute lights, would buy again if I could
review_body: Unfortunately, mine broke by a freak accident only after a month but I really enjoyed them. Wish I still had them :(
after not even using these for a day, they stopped working.... very unhappy

The lights just suddenly stopped working AT ALL!  Definitely do not recommend buying unless you’re willing to risk receiving bad lights . Just buy at Michaels or Target nearby instead.

review_body: They arrived on time.  A little difficult to unravel but not a nightmare.  To get the look in the picture, you're going to need at least 3 sets stacked.  They are 6' wide and 8-9 feet tall.

review_title: These are so cool I love them
review_body: These are so cool I love them! My only complaint is the plug is a little short if you are hanging these above a window but other than that, the cute lights make up for it
They were all tangled. Box was old. Awful.

review_title: These look very pretty and were what I wanted
review_body: These look very pretty and were what I wanted. I used them in a picture window. They hang to the floor and would be pretty in other places too.
Love these! They are thick and durable.  They hold up well in the washer. They clean well with just water. They help me to be motivated to clean!:) lol.
Not sure if this is real microfiber, feels coarse and leaves fine sticky lint every where. Will buy something else in future

review_title: Great utility cleaning rags for the house
review_body: I bought these for our granite countertops but now use them all over the place. Inexpensive, they wash well, and clean surfaces really well.
These cloths shunk to less then half the size after washing ... Disappointed.. Needed the larger size for cleaning .

review_title: A little on the thin side
review_body: A little thinner than the ones I would get at the warehouse clubs. Not as plush I would call it.  If you are going to use and throw away these are better. I'd rather them be thicker to be reused more often. Overall though they are good. They are called basics so I would say they are exactly that.

review_body: These are quality micro fibre towels, full washcloth size too, not those mini cheap cloths. They wash well and keep their effectiveness.

review_body: Good quality microfibers for the price, especially considering how many you get. Just be sure to rip off the tag if you're using these to clean/dry your cars.

review_title: Good quality but smaller than expected
review_body: Good quality microfiber cloths that doesn't leave behind too much micro lint like some other cloths I have used in the past. Smaller than the standard size kitchen towel, but it gets the job done for drying my car after a car wash and for small jobs around the house. Overall a good value but it would be nice if the cloths were a little larger.

review_title: This is my new favorite product. I am sensitive to using chemicals in ...
review_body: This is my new favorite product.  I am sensitive to using chemicals in my home so this is perfect, considering they pick up bacteria as you wipe.  I have a lot of stainless steel in my kitchen and when I wipe things down with a barely damp cloth, everything shines.  I also use the same method for streak free window cleaning.  The fact that they are multi-colored is a bonus.  I use white for kitchen, blue for bathroom and yellow for dusting.  Wish I would have discovered the beauty of this way of cleaning sooner!
Great clothes for general around the house cleaning.  They are soft, don't scratch the wood furniture.  Pick up all sorts of little pieces of whatever you didn't even really know were there.

I really like this scale. It's accurate.  After you move it to another spot on the floor, It calibrates automatically; if it's off by a few ounces, then you can see it reset to zero.. Works as soon as I step on it, and it's gorgeous - the thinnest scale i've owned. The read out is clear.. I had an issue, and the manufacturer sent me a new one quickly. Super customer service!. I have another brand from amazon and Taylor from costco (which requires stepping on the scale first).

COMPLETELY INACCURATE!. I bought this based on all the positive reviews, and the fact that it was the #1 Best Seller.  Unfortunately the weight is off by almost 20 lbs (18 if I want to be precise, unlike the scale).  I do have another scale, and I weight myself regularly at the gym, so I'm confident it's not my imagination.  In fact, if anything I'm thankful it's off by so much, because otherwise I might not have noticed, and just attributed to "weight fluctuation".. I suppose I could have gotten unlucky on my product, because I don't want to accuse my fellow Amazoners of lying (too many reviews to be a scam, I hope).  But boy, apparently when it's defective, it's reeeeeaaaaly defective.. Returning mine now.  Will try another one and hope for the best.

The scale stopped working less than a year after I purchased it. It began giving random weights, none within the ball park of what I weigh and never the same two, even minutes apart. It was never abused in any way. Just  cheaply made (but not cheaply priced.)

I've had this scale just for a few weeks, but I LOVE it !!!!!  I know the accuracy of scale is most important, but I really like the elegant and simple design of it. I tied to check the accuracy with a couple of big bags of cat litter and rice.  Pretty close for both...  It is glass, and so you must be careful handling it. Once I placed it on the flat bathroom tiled floor, it gives me accurate weight each time.  Oh, yes, also the price was right!!  it was a real bargain for this great scale.

It's been 2 years since I bought this and I'm barely writing a review... Well it still works!!!havent changed the battery. I weigh myself after a shower sometimes and get water all over it- it's still good. It's also very accurate. I weighed myself with it then with another brand and then at Dr. It's good. I recommend tho it's addicting to weigh yourself all the time

review_title: stopped working after one month - even after changing battery ...
review_body: stopped working after one month - even after changing battery - refund please! Etekcity Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale with Step-On Technology, 400 Pounds, Body Tape Measure Included, Elegant Black. Sold by: Etekcity. Return window closed on May 11, 2018. $22.90. Condition: New

Year and half ago, my wife and I, we were discussing about our weight gain. My wife said, it would be nice, if could check our weight once and while to help us keep in check.. After researching on Amazon for a couple of days, I came across this one. It has all good reviews and more people has reviewed it. I gave a shot and ordered it.. It is still working. I didn't even change the battery.

review_title: Way better aesthetically in the bathroom
review_body: Upgraded to this after years with the old needle scale. Way better aesthetically in the bathroom. Quick turn on after you step onto it. Gives the weight in just a few seconds. To make sure you get an accurate reading, stay on it until the number flashes. This means it's determined the final number. The scale doesn't take up much space or height. Most doors can swing right over it, it's so short. If you want to use it in the dark, the blue colored display is very easy on the eyes and the numbers are easy to read.

I like it, but it seems to be two pounds off in my favor! I've compared it to the scale at my Dr. and another digital scale I purchased about a month ago. It's two pounds off like our scale at the gym is, and my husband uses that one, so I gave this one to him.

review_title: Lighter and smaller than my old scale
review_body: I love the new Etekcity Digital Body Weight bathroom scale. It is very slim and trim looking and started up immediately. It does shoe footprints when I weigh, but It is only mine, so it does not matter. The scale is smaller than my original digital scale and much lighter. It is a good fit in my bathroom and I highly recommend it.
Like the towels very well.  Wish they were the split design but hey, it works.

review_title: This name brand of paper towel is just as thick and strong as bounty.
review_body: Actually these paper towel are at great price for good quality. I am very pleased with them.

I received a box that was already opened along the sealed sides of the box, so if I had wanted to keep it, I would have had to reseal in order to use the dispensing side. However, I'm assuming this was previously returned by someone equally disgusted by the scent. Just having the box sitting semi-open waiting to be returned makes me feel like I'm inhaling toxic fumes.. If you're not someone who wants your whole house to smell like cheapo and plastic-y air freshener, don't buy these. review_title: Look No Further, This Is The Best!
review_body: This was a replacement purchase.  Since I didn't purchase the first one through Amazon, I can't look up the exact date of the first purchase, however I would estimate it to have been at least 7 years ago.  This mattress protector held up very well through many washes, and most likely would have held up through many more had I not mistakenly put bleach into the washing load!  Just know that is something the manufacturer warns not to do.  The bleach will soften and compromise the protective coating.  I would say that aside from protecting the mattress very well, it is also a silent and comfortable protector.  I don't believe that many would ever suspect that there is a moisture barrier protector beneath the sheets when a bed is made with this product.  Obviously, I feel that it a good mattress protector since I looked no further when replacing the one that I had ruined.

1.) it's not a plastic cover but it is! It has a cloth like material over the plastic material or "built in" which is great because you don't sweat in bed from the plastic. And just when you assume it's a cloth cover your kid has a accident and you find out nope the protector is doing its job and the added cloth material for comfort doesn't hurt. Great product.

review_title: My wife wants me to order 2 more.
review_body: We've got a girl who's not quite potty trained yet, plus a new son 2 months old. Inevitably one or both of them will end up sleeping, playing, or getting a diaper change on our full sized bed. And inevitably there will be diaper leaks or other accidents. So it is a huge relief to have this mattress protector.. It seems like great construction... terry cloth (like a very thin towel) with some sort of plastic layer that seems to be bonded directly onto the back side. The plastic is very supple, and being bonded together with the stable fabric there is no crinkliness or slip-sliding effect to annoy us. It looks pretty durable, and the fabric between us and the plastic layer keeps it more comfortable.

review_title: I was very happy with this matress protector
review_body: I was very happy with this matress protector.  I have a young son who doesnt like to sleep pn his own. Tgis present issues especislly since i have expense sleep number bed.  This SafeRest protector has been a life saver!. I also suggested it to my brother as he is living in NYC and with the bed bug issues that has cpme up in recent years. He is also happy with his purchase.

Definitely good quality, especially for the price.  Our kids have spilled everything from juice to milk and have had accidents on their mattress, but this has prevented the actual mattress from getting wet or stained at all.  Highly recommended.. ALSO, update 11/4/2014:. I am extremely happy with Everyday Pure's customer service as well as their mattress protectors. I have purchased three of these protectors, and when one didn't seem to be working as well, I gave them a call and they replaced it free of charge. Wonderful, wonderful customer service that you rarely see in this day and age. I would definitely have no qualms about purchasing more products from this company, because they clearly stand by their products and value customer service as much as the customer does! A+ service, guys! Thank you for making this easy!!!

You cannot dry this in a dryer unless you have a low heat setting, it you do not have that, it takes FOREVER to air dry. If any liquids get on this thing (which is why I presume you buy this thing) the odor does not come out even after washing. Because it is made out of plastic, it just retains the odor.

review_title: A comfortable way to protect your mattress
review_body: Overall a comfortable way to protect your mattress. I haven't tried purposefully testing its ability to protect against spills/sweat so I'll have to assume it does that.. Pros:. Does not sleep any hotter. Not noisy when you roll over like other plastic mattress protectors. Easy as a fitted sheet to put on and remove. Inexpensive means its worth the money. Cons:. Slightly firm texture; not so much that a mattress pad is necessary but you can feel that it's under the fitted sheet.. Not really a con but I was unaware that it doesn't fully encapsulate the mattress; only the top is protective, the sides are like a fitted sheet, and it's open on the bottom.

I have these on all the beds in my house, since I have little ones. They are excellent quality. They are not thick plastic-y mattress covers, but soft and thin and keep mattresses completely dry. They hold up wonderfully in the wash and the drier (mine have been through many washes). They have wide corners so they are super easy to put on. Highly recommend for any home with little kids.

I wanted to write this review after we had used this mattress protector for awhile and let me just say, it is awesome! It fits my pillow-top king sized mattress perfectly and so far it’s done a wonderful job at keeping it stain and animal smell free. We’ve got a small child and accidents are prone to happen, but this mattress protector puts all of our fears to rest.

I bought this because I have a puppy that occasionally can't hold it through the night, and I didn't want my new mattress to be ruined. Srsly, dog pee on a mattress is a nightmare to clean and when you think you've got it all cleaned up 3am hits and you roll over and catch just a wiff of it and you start to go crazy and.. well you get the idea.. Anyways, this IS actually water proof. I bought a second one to use between pee episodes. It's also comfortable and doesn't have any kind of plastic-y feel to it at all. Am quite pleased with it and will be buying two more for the guest room.
