review_title: Sorry to lose an old standby; glad now that I switched to PUR
review_body: Smelled like mold within 2 weeks of use, so tried another filter after thorough washing of pitcher w hot soapy water and letting it all dry overnight. (Purchased a package of 3 filters.) I came here to read Reviews and see what others were experiencing and how they were dealing w the mold problem. Then tried a 2nd filter from the package, but the water smelled of mold within 2 DAYS. I wrote to Brita directly. They asked for and received all the particulars on the package, like zebra code, UP, date and proof of purchase. I thought they might then trace the manufacturing site and let me know an outcome. I even asked for their suggestions. When I didn't hear back in a week, I emailed them again to remind them. No reply and still none, 2 months later. After years of trusting Brita brand, ended up trying a PUR pitcher and filter. It's a wonderful relief to have good tasting and fresh smelling water again. I sent a large box of old, used Brita filters to their recycling program, after taking a picture, w new PUR products, to send to Brita. If this gets resolved some day, I can re-post later.
One of the filter started to filter really slow after only using it for a week. The 2nd filter is starting to filter slower in its 2nd week. Not a happy customer.

review_title: Much slower than standard brita filter
review_body: Filters water very slowly when compared to the standard brita filter. I can see how it filters out more pollutants though so it’s give and take. Overal if it lasts 6 months I’ll be happy. Just be prepared for your pitcher to fill up much more slowly than what you are used to.
They last about a month before getting so slow it takes well over an hour to filter a pitcher’s worth!. After a few months, it takes literally hours.

review_title: Makes my tap water great tasting
review_body: Carbon filtering works great. Good for the amount of gallons stated. I live in Jacksonville Fl and this city is listed as in the top ten in the US for the worse quality city water and man can you taste why. Night and day difference after I run it through this filter in my Brita pitcher
I like these filters, but they do NOT last 6 months, as stated. Mine has been used maybe two and it's already slowing down. I will be going back to the original filters.

review_title: Great for a month, then stopped working as expected
review_body: This filter worked great for a month or so and then the water started taking forever to filter and tasted about the same as when it came out of the tap.  Our 2 person household has come nowhere close to the 120 gallons promised.  A regular brita filter lasts for about the same amount of time for us, so I would not recommend these.  Disappointed.

review_title: water flow stops after a couple of days.
review_body: The water flow always slows down to a point where it almost stops, after a couple of days of use. Their customer care tells you to try soaking it in water, tap for air bubbles, twisting it etc. Did all of them, bought new ones, again, the same problem. Went through 5 of these and still the same problem. It filters one glass in an hour. will not buy it again.
Easy to install. Can clearly taste the difference between tap water and filtered water. Would highly recommend.

I was a little shocked these arrived in a brown bubble envelope.  The boxed was mashed on one corner but there was no damage to the filters.  Deducted one star for the poor packaging.  Otherwise, product is what I expected and satisfied so far.

review_title: I love the convenience of having them shipped right to my ...
review_body: We have 3 dogs and use a lot of paper towels! I love the convenience of having them shipped right to my door and it's also a quality product. I was reluctant to give up my Vida paper towels, but I am impressed.
Price is what attracted me first, and then the quality sealed it for me!  I had been a “bounty” fan for years until trying Presto.  I’ll doubt I’ll ever use anything else now!
Great product right to my door!  Will definitely order again.
Great quality. Love this brand. Would buy again!
I really like these paper towels. The absorb very well.
Great paper towels for a low price
Great paper towels, will certainly order again!
Exactly as I expected. I have been using "Sparkle" and other name brands, and this product is just as good.  Love this automatic delivery!
Great price! They come in a big package and last longer than other paper towels. I love how you can select a size.
These are very similar to Bounty paper towels but are slightly less money. The only difference in quality I noticed is that they leave a bit of residue (white lint).

This is a polyurethane mattress protector with a very thin layer of cotton terry cloth on top. I am giving this a rating of 4 because I think the cover should be of thicker substance. However with that being said it seems it should prove to be very water proof. I have no reason or desire to test the waterproof ability of the product, however I am pretty certain the polyurethane substance is quite substantial to protect your mattress from any liquid..   I am giving this only a 4 because I am not sure how many washings this thin mattress protector can withstand. This product has a 10yr. guarantee ,,,,. so as  long as I go by the manufacturer recommendations ( only very low heat drying ) I believe this product should last several years.

Honestly at first I was worried about purchasing because of the bad reviews. In my experience the only bad thing was the smell, it was horrible but thankfully after about a week or so the smell began fading and quickly went away. I had horrible back pain and neck pains with my old mattress and decided to give this one a try per my sister's recommendation. It's been 6 months since purchasing and I no longer wake up feeling sore or in pain and the mattress is still feeling amazing. Great buy and for the price definitely worth it!

review_title: I liked this so well I bought a second one
review_body: I liked this so well I bought a second one. It held up and kept the mattress clean and dry when my daughter was sick and vomiting every hour or two and has also held up through many night time leaks and accidents. It's easy to clean and care for: just throw it in the washing machine then tumble or line dry. I also like that it works well without being noisy when you move or making you hot. Another plus is it isn't made with some of the more questionable chemical ingredients that are in the some of the others. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone with small children or anyone trying to protect their mattress and keep it clean and dry.
Fits the Zinus Memory Foam 12" Green Tea Mattress in queen.. After 6 months and several washings this has retained it's shape well. it doesn't slip, no weird smell and no "noise" while sleeping.

I really like this product.  I have a hard time with my arms and this went on so easy.  Fits perfect!  Good quality.  For the price one cannot beat it!  I haven't washed it yet but the material is so that it should launder really well. I would buy this again if I had another queen size bed.

Bought for my sons mattress when we moved him from a toddler bed to a twin. He is still potty training and this is the best mattress protector I've ever had. I've had one for my queen bed for almost a year now and our son has wet the bed on a couple of occasions and the mattress still looks brand new!

They don't seem like much, especially right out of the package, but give 'em a wash and you'll understand why.... This is the third of four of these I've ordered and I love them all. Initially I needed a decent cover for two twin beds over a year ago. We just purchased a new king and gave our queen to our oldest who's certainly outgrowing his twin. They cover perfectly, wash well and are quite surprisingly comfortable! If these EVER wear out, I'll be back for more of them.. They will fit shallow to very deep pillowtop mattresses; the fitted band forms to the mattress like a dream. The terry fabric simply holds your sheet in place, is not scratchy like I assumed from the description and repel everything including my teenage son's stinky feet! Overall, these are quality covers.. The king size I ordered is currently covering a deep pillowtop mattress and 2" plush mattress pad and has not lost its plush-ness. I recommend this product to everyone, especially allergy sufferers!

review_title: Durable, quiet, comfortable and not hot. Great buy!
review_body: First of all, after reading the review of a woman having her baby on this thing and the user who tested its waterproofness with a pop of water and took pictures.... I had faith in that department and was more worried about the comfort, noise, and temperature of this thing. It's great and definitely getting 5 stars! I have a family member who spent $200 on a cover and I was worried I'd have to do the same to get something of quality. I'm glad I didn't. This makes no noise, and doesn't feel like anything extra under my sheet. I'm a warm blooded person (can't even sleep with full pjs on) so I coldnt have something that slept hot and this does not. I'd feel very comfortable with this purchase.

This product has saved our mattress so many times! I would recommend this to anyone! It is breathable so you don't notice it is there, but it is totally waterproof, which is great for trapping sweat (gross, but we all do it more than we realize at night), and the occasional dog puke or puppy pee incident. Our mattress still looks spotless and brand new after almost two years of use thanks to this.

review_title: Works well as new for twin mattress 6 inches depth
review_body: Fit the form of my new Milliard foam matress, twin, 6 inches depth. Only took a little struggle to get it around the mattress. Waterproof only on the top, and does not fully encase a matresss (i.e. no zipper to the cover)

review_title: I love Viva. Did you know it can go thru ...
review_body: I love Viva. Did you know it can go thru the wash and still be intact? My only paper towel!!!

review_title: it is not paper towels, it is something also ...
review_body: it is not paper towels, it is something also. It is too soft and thin to perform regular duties with regular paper towels. you need to use 3 or 4 sheets.  of viva compare to one sheet to normal paper towels. Also, rolls are very small.
excellent value.
These are the only paper towels I use they are super absorbent!
best paper towels EVER!!! not kidding. they are more of a cloth made quite thick so 1 goes a long way
Arrived on time and right order
I hate the way these paper towels feel. Period.
I like viva.
Best paper towels I've tried so far. I hate Bounty and most store brands. These leave the least amount of lint on my surfaces when I clean.
This is the very best way for me to purchase this item and is much more cost efisheniant  than buying it in the Walmart or grocery store.

I was loving my instant pot, bragging to all about it. Making my dogs food was so easy! I put in the food and the water, pressed pressure cook and like magic it was just done when it beeped.  Getting used to the pressurization wasn't hard at all.  It wasn't really difficult to use.. Until last week... My pot just didn't turn on! I tried other outlets and other electronics so it was not the outlet. I moved the pot to a different outlet, nothing. It was the pot. The manual gave explicit troubleshooting directions based on what is wrong. Not turning on meant that the circuit board blew and it advised to call support, which I did. When you call, an automated message tells you to go online and put in a ticket- because this is clearly a company that doesn't want to be bothered 'talking' to their customers. So I do this. A day later no response! So I email again asking for help. This time I email them the same information. Didn't hear from them until Friday! I needed my pot fixed on Tuesday.... On Thursday though I had had enough and called Amazon who thankfully knows how to treat customers and were able to refund me the product and I shipped it back to them. The pot was less than a year of purchase and within warranty after all! Even Amazon tried getting ahold of the company and they couldn't get a response!. Beware of this brand! I would look for another pressure cooker because when it breaks, and it likely will, you won't be getting help for days..... My first attempt to post this review Amazon blocked for an unknown reason. It should be posted though people should know what kind of company this is...

review_title: Amazon is WONDERFUL!!! Instant Pot is not.
review_body: I own 3 Instant Pots, including this DUO80.  The pot has been defective since I unboxed it.  It failed the initial water test by displaying the "burn" message.  Customer service at Instant Pot has consistently taken the position that I, a Chef of over 40 years, don't know ow to cook rather than admitting that I have received a defective device.  They even went so far as telling me that I purchased the product from an "inauthentic" seller (Amazon), and that they would honor the warranty as a "one time courtesy". When I asked them for the contact information for the regulatory agency in Canada that is responsible for oversight of their industry, they have been silent.  No response to my email request. Fortunately, Amazon has stepped up to the plate and said that they would replace the product since the manufacturer has failed to live up to their responsibility.  Amazon is WONDERFUL!!!  That's why we purchase several thousands of dollars of products per year through them.  Amazon rocks!  Instant Pot has gone from a company with superior products and outstanding service to an entity that doesn't deserve to remain in business.  Unreliable products and very poor customer service.  They have been totally unresponsive to emails sent to sales and marketing. I use 3 Instant Pots simultaneously in my day-to-day meal preparation. When it comes time for replacement of these units, I will certainly be looking at other manufacturers because I cannot trust Instant Pot to provide quality products and honest customer service.  Buyer beware!

review_title: Excellent - and just ordered Fagor steamer basket to go with it.
review_body: Love it so far. I was disappointed though that they don't offer either a steamer basket, glass lid, nor silicon lid for the pot. I think for the money, it should have at least come with the silicon lid and the other two items could be optional, but at least available. If I could take off half a star for these annoyances, I would.. I know I'm going to use this unit all the time for steaming since I tried it on green beans the other day and it was fantastic. The unit heats up to cooking temp in about 4 minutes and the beans are done in another 2 minutes or so. With this steamer basket I just ordered, I'm hoping this will work out very nicely.. So, which 3rd party steamer basket? I did a fair amount of research and my decision came down to these two because I wanted a steaming container, not just a shallow steaming platform. I want to be able to pull the whole thing out easily and not have to worry about dumping some of the contents back into the steam water, if you know what I mean. So again down to these two:. 1. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B019D7MSZA/ref=psdc_289761_t2_B007SPKR8U - This one works according to some reviewers of the 8qt model. It fits if you remove the handles. For some folks that might be a bit of a challenge to remove those with a hacksaw or other tool.. 2. https://www.amazon.com/Fagor-998338900-Pasta-Basket/dp/images/B0000717BM - I chose this one.. I chose the Fagor because it has a handle that swings out of the way and I did ideally want a handle. One thing I don't know about this. "pasta basket" is whether it has holes in the bottom. After all it is a pasta basket, not a steamer basket specifically. If it doesn't have holes in the bottom, I'm going to test steaming and see how it works since there are plenty of holes on the sides. Seems to me it should work quite well whether there are holes in the bottom or not. But, if I'm wrong and think it's not performing quite right, I'll drill holes in the bottom if they are indeed not already there. I can't tell from the picture. It also does not have a platform to raise above the water, so I'll just put the Instant Pot trivet beneath it.. So far I made chicken soup (came out great and fast), boneless country style ribs (came out fall off the bone tender and tasty in an hour), and the green beans I steamed. The steaming feature really surprised me how fast it is. After all pressure cookers always take awhile to heat up. But I'd forgotten that it's only heating up about a cup and a half of water, not six quarts of liquid and solids before it's up to temp. So, it's very fast steaming. I'll update this review in regard to the choice of steamer basket. Option #2 is a bit more costly though but still reasonable, I think. It was $18 including shipping from Fagor.. All for now...

review_title: Takes quite a bit of effort to learn.....
review_body: I'm an Instant Pot newbie - thought I'd give it a try to see if I could save some time and have a meal ready even though I'd forgotten to take something out of the freezer. I have to say - I find it a bit intimidating and I was really disappointed by the recipes that were included in the instruction manual. They were really nothing that either I, or anyone in my family would eat. So where to go from here - I like the idea of a single pot and reduced cooking time. I headed to youtube for videos of people getting started and some recipes from pinterest. It would be really useful for the manufacturer to do video "tutorials" just to get you started. Having tried a couple of basic chicken recipes it works quite well. Essentially, I've traded the time I'd save in cooking with time scouring the internet for tips, tricks and ideas.  It will take me a while to learn how to use it properly, so whether or not I stick with the learning curve remains to be seen. I have several friends who are fans, so I'll probably get with them for tips. Hope that helps other people with a realistic view.

I love the Instant Pot...but absolutely HATE the smell of the silicone ring!  I was so excited to try out the pot when I got it.  I put in all the ingredients to make tortilla soup...I set the timer and off I went to run errands.  When I got home the soup was ready and delicious.  I was so happy...I thought this pot is going to simplify my life...UNTIL I could not get the smell of the soup off of the silicone ring!  What?  I tried everything to get rid of the smell and nothing seems to work.  Other recipes I tried took on the smell...now I can't even look at the pot without getting that rank smell in my head.  I think I'm going to send the pot back!

review_title: I did not believe I would use the Instant Pot very often. I was wrong.
review_body: I didn't believe I would use the Instant Pot. There are many glowing reviews, but their content boils down to "it cooks faster".. So? When we make mashed potatoes or soak garbanzo beans for falafel, it isn't as if we spend our day hovering over the pot. We get on with our day while the water does its work.. Cutting to the chase, I was wrong. Yes, this and all pressure cookers primarily just cook faster, but it is surprising how much that changes the game. Many foods no longer require planning. You can start cooking when hungry. You can cook dinner at dinner time rather than starting hours earlier.. I just steamed 11 uncut potatoes (to be mashed) in 15 minutes! When making baby food, I steamed carrots and broccoli in 3 minutes of cook time!. Some specific observations:. - Cook times listed in various recipes do not include warm-up time and depressurization time.. This isn't as significant as it sounds. The Instant Pot requires very little water to do its work, so it heats surprisingly quickly. I haven't timed it, but starting with cold tap water, it seems to take 1-5 minutes depending on the amount.. - Depressurization is very easy and safe, but loud. The steam shooting out of the vent isn't particularly hot, nor is it particularly flush with moisture. On our first use, I was concerned that what appeared to be a large volume of steam would collect on the cabinets, but after a few seconds they were dry. I have no concerns about accidental steam burns because it just isn't hot enough to burn before your body can respond. I suspect the vent somehow mixes outgoing steam with cool air from the room.. - Clean-up is very easy. We rarely use our food processor because there are so many parts to clean -- it's usually overall faster to chop small batches by hand. With the Instant Pot, we have only had to clean the stainless steel bowl that ships with the unit. It is dishwasher-safe, unlike many plastic food processor parts which get cloudy and brittle after repeated washes in hot detergent water, and it is surprisingly easy to clean by hand. Because of the way the cooker works, many recipes are such that food doesn't burn onto the metal surface.

review_title: ... had this for about 2 years now and we LOVE it. It has made cooking many dishes very ...
review_body: We have had this for about 2 years now and we LOVE it.  It has made cooking many dishes very easy and we have since disposed of our rice cooker, pressure cooker and crock pot.  Very easy to use and clean, and most dishes (especially chili) cook faster and turn out way better than cooking them the old fashioned way.  Even ribs turn out great using the Instant Pot, although we cheat and a little Liquid Smoke to give it that grilled taste.  I have recommended it to many friends and family members and if ours ever breaks, I will definitely order another.

review_title: You need this. Don't even second guess it. You need this.
review_body: I love this, I love this, I love this! And I really hate cooking. I have had this for a week and have made so many different meals that I don't think I have to go shopping for a while. I bought the 6 quart because it was on sale. I am so glad I did! I was eating out all the time and we all know what that can do to your budget. Read the instructions, do the water test just to get accustomed to how it works. If you read them while distracted you wont notice you set the delayed timer and not the cook timer and you will be unimpressed with the thing... until you notice your mistake and then you will fall in love.. You prep all the food and most things you would do like browning meat will be done in the pot, not on the stove. -1 dish there. You toss all the things into the pot, close the lid and set the time. *At this point you have a dirty cutting board and knife, maybe a measuring cup or two. You wait for the pot to heat up until the time starts counting down. *So this time will be added to the cooking time, it all depends on the amount in the pot.. The think kicks on and starts the cooking. I made a full pot of chicken stew in less than 1 hour.. Once it beeps let it cool for a bit or just pop the release valve. It will hiss and steam will come out. Caution Hot.. Clean up is simple, food is tasty, easy to use even if you miss a spot in the directions but don't do that.. To make this even more amazing. I live full time in a travel trailer and this is a MUST HAVE. I may never eat out because I am lazy again.. I am making sesame chicken tonight. All in one pot. Cooks rice just right! I am so going to try out this yogurt thing.

review_title: Buy this pot and you'll not be disappointed.
review_body: I was introduced to this pot by my vegetarian sister and vegan nephew.  I am just starting to experiment with the multiplicity of options but it is definitely a keeper.  I cleared out my rice maker, yogurt maker and pressure cooker and could have also gotten rid of my slow cooker if I had wanted to.  I've cooked dry soy beans, dried black beans, quinoa and beets and each recipe has turned out as expected - nutritious and delicious. I have been advised to check on-line recipes in addition to the enclosed recipe book since some measurements need to be tweaked.  Buy one for yourself, give one as a gift and remember this as a winning wedding gift for domestic and foreign weddings.  It's an all round winner and clean up has been a breeze!

review_title: Love it. The features of a larger appliance
review_body: Love it.. The features of a larger appliance, small enough that I can cook for 2-4 or scale back for myself.  No boatload of leftovers to hassle with, just enough that I can cook a couple meals and alternate wirh a couple days of leftover lunches.  Max 3 quarts.  I make 1/2 an Instant pot of something, make a 1/2 an instant pot of something else the next and I’m done for the next 2-3 days.  I use it for oatmeal too.. It’s got the Goldilocks “just right” thing going for it.
Received item with Low battery error. Canged the batteries. BUT, I have to change batteries every 15 days. And i use scale only 2-3 times a week.. Very ennoying.. and no respond from the seller

My original scale kept giving me different readings no matter what surface I put it on. Etekcity's customer service reached out to me and offered me a replacement scale nearly a year later! Apparently the scale has a 1 year warranty and I never knew it. My replacement scale arrived just a few days after Mark from Etekcity reached out to me. The replacement scale gives much more accurate results than the original once I received. Maybe it was defective? Either way, I am updating my rating due to the excellent customer service I was given :)

This is a great scale.  I finally found a space in my bathroom that protects bare toes from damage from the corners (this is glass and glass corners cut).  I could probably duct tape the corners but it's such a clean pretty product I don't want to mess it up.  The scale is totally consistent in showing my weight and it's also quick.  This was the least expensive Etekcity body scale but I couldn't ask for better performance.

I am totally unsatisfied with this scale.  The readings are erratic and inconsistent.  They are also 3 to 3.5 pounds higher than 2 other sets of scales, which agree exactly with each other.  My weight can vary by 4 pounds just by picking up the scale and turning it over a couple of times, or by removing and replacing the batteries.  To me, this product is useless junk.  I will return it to Amazon for a refund.

I bought this scale after seeing all the great reviews and being ready to start my fitness journey, but after getting my etekcity scale (which arrived quickly) it would change numbers within a large range no where near my actual weight. Even my girlfriend tried it out and the same thing would occur. I wish I had as good of a luck as some of the people on here.

I’m so disappointed... It was working fine when I first got it a few months ago. I stopped my diet and stopped using it for a while. I started using it couple days ago. It gives me different weights 10 seconds apart. I’m 143 and 140 at the same time according to this scale. I’ll end up buying a better, more accurate scale soon.

Great product but.....goes through batteries like crazy. I weigh myself twice every 2 weeks. The battery dies after weighing myself only twice! I need to change the batteries every two weeks just for weighing myself twice!!! Changed the brand of batteries and they still drain super fast!!

review_title: This scale may be dangerous. My daughter, maybe ...
review_body: This scale may be dangerous. My daughter, maybe 145-150 pounds, stepped on this scale in the bathroom and it shattered. She didn't get cut but did have a little glass in her feet. The scale was on a solid surface floor. She has used it since January.

review_title: Different weights in different areas of home
review_body: Same thing has happened to me twice.. Very inaccurate weight readings.. I weigh myself, then move the scale to different places as close as a foot away, and totally different weight. I contacted the company because I thought it was a defect and they sent out another but the new scale is the same. I do wonder if my floors have a slight incline but even still.  I'm annoyed I have to spend money to get another scale.

review_title: When you get off the scale it holds the measurement time enough to read
review_body: The company that makes this product makes all their products excellent. You get on, get off, then it holds your measured weight after you get off for over a minute so you can have time and ease to read your weight.
Quality was very disappointing. I read the reviews and am shocked that the quality was so poor. I found a much better pillow for less  at Walmart.
Just as described, will work well with 12x12 pillow covers
Won’t buy again, way too full!

review_title: It looks like it would be
review_body: Could be firmer! It looks like it would be, in the picture, but its a little too soft.

review_title: but the pillow was flat and didn't fill my pillow case nicely. On the bright side it had a zipper ...
review_body: I had a 16x16 pillow case, I ordered the 18x18 pillow case because I wanted it to be full, but the pillow was flat and didn't fill my pillow case nicely. On the bright side it had a zipper so you could add more stuffing, but I wished it was full enough to where I didn't have to get more stuffing
The perfect stuffer pillow for my smallest sham.  Sturdy and well made, definately will recommend to others.
bought these with a unicorn pillow case for a bday present
As described.  I use this to stuff a decorative throw pillow.  It has held its shape well over the past six months, though admittedly it has not been heavily used.

review_title: too squirmy, feels like a stuffed-animal stuffing pillow
review_body: too squirmy, feels like a stuffed-animal stuffing pillow

review_title: Gave new life to sofa throw pillows!
review_body: These pillows were a low cost way to refresh flattened sofa pillows. As suggested, I bought a size larger for my 18x18 pillow covers, and it filled them out nicely. I would definitely buy these again.
I absolutely loved these lights!! I am extremely happy with my purchase !
Great product! I used this for the background of the center stage for the party.

review_title: Low Price, Great Quality and Good Looking
review_body: They look amazing and you get a lot of lights for the price.  I had no idea that they have the 8 different light settings which is a very cool thing.

review_title: Perfect for a big front window!!!
review_body: So pretty, will really make my huge front and back windows look WOW for Xmas!

The box was tore open when I got the package. The wires have cuts all over them. They do work so that is a plus! Pretty let down by these tho. I knew I should of just went and got clear Christmas lights

review_title: These lights are gorgeous, just what I was looking ...
review_body: These lights are gorgeous, just what I was looking for! They're very generous in length and the plug in cord was just right for me - I did you use an extension cord to have the lights lay flatter against the wall. There is however, a strong plastic smell when you hang these lights. So I suggest keeping a window open until the odor disperses.
Great for the holidays, have 8ft windows and strung them with the hooks they suggested, (command decrating clips clear) works great.  Love the look.

review_title: These lights are beautiful behind any shimmery
review_body: These lights are beautiful behind any shimmery,shiny material. Perfect for decorating almost anything. Made my party decorations look so beautiful.
So gorgeous!!! Lots of different settings to put it on and looks amazing behind a sheer curtain. Favorite Christmas purchase to date!
Very cute, my daughter was very happy with it. Also just know that the light are very long.
So far so good! Appears to keep it's promises.  Soap and grime seem to slide right off and dry clean.  I was a little skeptical at first

The price point for the quality of this product is seriously amazing. As advertised, this product is made of high-quality materials, there are not crazy plastic odors (even when holding the product right under your nose). There are also heavy-duty metal grommets for the shower hook holes, so guaranteed no ripping. The curtain also has magnets sewn into the bottom; however, my tub is not magnetic. Still, the weight of the magnets prevents the curtain from sticking to you and/or floating up as steam fills the shower. You won't go wrong buying this!
Very easy to unpackaged and put up. Exactly what is advertised. Had it for a couple weeks no complaints.
I like the thickness of this plastic and the size of the magnet weights at the bottom. The curtain stays in place when I'm showering! (unlike cheaper, lighter ones I've bought in the past.)
I just put it up the other day so I don't know how long it will last.  The plastic is thick & heavy and does not have that chemical plastic smell that liners usually have.
This is the best product (shower curtain liner) that I have ever purchased. Excellent quality.

review_title: Works well I use it in downstairs shower that only ...
review_body: Works well I use it in downstairs shower that only gets used about once a week. Cut cleaning down to about every six weeks.

This is a great shower curtain liner, although I use it as a standalone shower curtain and it works just as well. It didn't have any odor at all out of the box, and it seems to be more mold-resistant than any curtain I've used before; the water droplets practically sprint off of it after you turn off the showerhead.
I’ve had of the month and it seems pretty cool. Definitely traps  the heat of the shower in.
Good quality, price. I can see it lasting a long time and will order for my other bathroom shower.

review_title: I HAVE WASHED THEM MANY TIMES OVER AND THEY ARE STILL WONDERFUL AND ABSORBANT
review_body: HANDIEST THINGS EVER !  I HAVE WASHED THEM MANY TIMES OVER AND THEY ARE STILL WONDERFUL AND ABSORBANT. MANY MANY USES.  I ORDERED ANOTHER SET.  MY GUY LOVES THEM FOR HIS WORKSHOP AND CAR WASHING JOBS TOO. PRICE DOESNT GET ANY BETTER THAN THIS SO IF YOU WANT SOMETHING TO WASH OVER AND OVER OR JUST TOSS THEM WHEN YOU ARE DOING A REALLY DIRTY JOB...SO BE IT.  YOU WILL LOVE 'EM.

review_title: As cleaning rags these are fine but beware
review_body: As cleaning rags these are fine but beware, they are not colorfast.  The yellow and the blue run and if you were cleaning up, say a white rug with them, they might leave a stain.  I suggest washing them several times before using.  Fortunately I noticed the yellow and blue colors coming off on the white cloths when I first opened the package.  Also be aware these are smaller and thinner than other cleaning cloths, this is reflected in the price and as mentioned above, they are fine for cleaning.

review_title: I thought it would be better once washed for the first time
review_body: These cloths did not work at all for our specific purpose, which was putting in a guinea pig cage to help with extra absorbency.  There was no way we could get the seeds or hay off the cloth.  I thought it would be better once washed for the first time, but the cloths stuck to themselves and were even difficult and time consuming to fold.  For dusting, I am guessing this is a good product to buy but for anything else, I would not recommend these cloths.

Lots of towels, great price...stick together like Velcro?? Weird how I had to pull them apart from each other like they were long lost friends not wanting to say goodbye. Crisis averted, they work great and I haven't seen a lot of lint.

review_title: Excellent basic cleaning cloth - what you see is what you get
review_body: They are just the right thickness for what I use them for - cleaning stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.  I had no problems with the quality.  They washed and dried fine.  I lined dried one and machine dried another to compare for shrinkage.  I found that the only difference was that the machine dried cloth had some curling on the corners and edges, while the line dried cloth did not.  When compared for shrinkage, both towels were the same size and there was very little shrinkage.  I will buy these again.

review_title: OK towel for drying a motorcycle.
review_body: Used these towels to dry a washed motorcycle.  Before using the towels I used a leaf blower to get the heavy water off.  Used these towels to do the final drying.  I like the number of towels I received at the price point.. Only two cons: 1) there is a large amazon label on each towel that I had to remove to avoid scratching the bike.  Would rather have no tags on the towel.  2) For drying purposed, they didn't appear to hold that much water.  I used all 24 towels to finish drying the motorcycle.. I would purchase another set when needed.
Good fluffy absorbent micro fiber towels to make my black car as shiny as a new diamond. And cheap!  What is not to love?

review_title: Add these to your cleaning arsenal
review_body: Great, multipurpose cloths I used on my car and cleaning the house! You can wash these and reuse them or if they get very soiled throw them away.

review_title: A ton of these, and they work great!
review_body: Wow, tons of these for every purpose. Just remember to NOT put them in the dryer! I use these for everything. I use them dry on mirrors and ceramic surfaces, for dusting. I use them wet for more stubborn cleaning. I rarely use them with detergent, as they are so good on their own, for normal dusting/shining jobs. I live on an island - so when I can locate such a useable, affordable item in quantity, I'm thrilled. That's what happened here!

review_title: Dye comes off from cloth, zero star
review_body: The dye comes off from the cloth when wet and sticks to whatever you’re cleaning.  Glad I noticed right away...

i love these so much oh my god trashbags 4ever YOLO
Great strength a large quantity so I never run out. Can fill them pretty good before any tears and yeah great price== not as strong as the force flex but stronger than most basic.

I wish I had read the reviews - these garbage bags ARE garbage. They split with hardly any weight or bulk so I have double or triple bag EVERYTHING just to get the garbage out...hardly a savings. Don't. Even. Bother.

Really like these bags.  Very strong and the pull strings make it easy to take outside.  They fit nicely in our trash can. Much nicer than the generic brands at the grocery.  Definitely worth the price.

you get 80 very large and durable plates. will order these plates again.

I like the longlasting filters better than others that I've had from Brita; although, I liked them too.
The title says it all.  Filters arrived in a timely manner and so far I have had no issues with the one I am currently using.  It fits perfectly and appears to be doing its job.

review_title: Great Consistent Filter with Excellent Results
review_body: Solid filters.  I had a lot of issues finding these filters at my local CVS and grocery store for some reason, but Amazon came through as always.  The filters must be purged for 15 minutes before use in water (standard).  After using the filter, you will immediately notice that your water tastes fresher and that the previously noticeable water particulates are either significantly reduced or completely gone.  I recommend this product highly.

This filter is great for helping my water taste better But it is soo slow. It takes about an hour for the water to filter through. Maybe theres something wrong with my filter or maybe this is how they all are. Either way I'm hesitant to purchase again.

review_title: Finally threw them away in disgust. Hopefully they improve the product
review_body: Found these to be overrated and not working well after about 30 days. Tried every trick in the book to get the water to flow through, and no water was passing through after 30-40 days. Finally threw them away in disgust. Hopefully they improve the product, but I feel I have been scammed by a product that doesn't work.

review_title: I like the idea that I only have to change it ...
review_body: This makes a difference over the standard Brita filters that I can taste. I like the idea that I only have to change it every 90 days so I'm am adding less trash to the waste stream.
When water in the top half of the container is over the top of this filter, it pops out of place and floats, rendering it useless.  I will go back to using the regular Brita filters.

The item I received was an updated version of the one in the pictures.  The top is a bit different looking.  But per the packaging, you no longer need to soak the filter prior to use (just a quick rinse).  It also claims there is no more black stuff coming out of the top.  I have only used one filter 3-4 times so far, but it seems true.. No other noticeable differences.  Filtering fast.

We've used Brita for years and years and wouldn't be without it.  We also have a fridge with filtered water dispenser but still use the Brita to filter water for our coffee and for cooking as the filtered water makes a huge difference in taste.
Love these filters when no time to go out. and buy them.. Don't waste your money on bottled water!
This nice strong  paper towel Just good as Scott ti issue LOVE product
They are as strong as any of the top brands.  We love them.
These towels get the job done. They work just as good as other brands I've used in the past but better priced.
Just as good a Bounty. I've subscribed for a monthly order.
as good as any paper towel I've ever purchased. F
Comparable to other better brands of paper towels, but much easier on the budget. Will surely re-purchase.

review_title: Not for heavy use they will fall apart
review_body: Not bad for soaking stuff up but if you start scrubbing they start  fall apart. Good product but middle grade quality
Great quality, inexpensive, lasts a long time.

review_title: Great paper towels for the money
review_body: I like the fact that I can use part of one or a bigger piece. I liked the price.
Loved the strength and softness of the tissue and strength and moisture wicking of towels. Will definitely be reordering.

I was so pleased with the full size mattress cover I ordered a King sized one right after. So glad I bought the cover when I did because my son's diaper leaked a few days after I put it on. Mattress saved!  Washed well. I hung it up to dry. It takes a little while to dry and I had to turn it inside out a few times to get the whole thing to dry (it has been humid here). So comfortable to sleep on, not hot at all. My husband gets radioactive hot at night when he sleeps, I did not mention the cover change and he hasn't noticed it.

review_title: would recommend and would buy again!
review_body: I love this sheet! As a mom of a 2 year old who is just growing like a weed, sometimes she has spills, accidents and she definitely is a warm sleeper and sweats quite a bit for a little girl! I have 4.5" matresses that I bought at Ikea and with the odd size these sheets not only protect her lovely foam matress from all the accidents etcetera but they also fit the odd size matress perfectly! I bought one for my cal king foam matress as well and it is 14" thick so another odd size and once again LOVE IT! I dont have to freak out when something spills that it is ruining my memory foam! Would definitely recommend and buy it again and again. I have had the one for my Cal King for about 6 months and still working well, no fraying or anything wrong with it at all despite having to go in the washer and dryer weekly.

We just bought a new mattress and I wanted to make sure it was adequately protected, considering the investment.  However, in shopping at some the local bed and bath stores along with department stores, the cost was concerning me.  Then I went onto Amazon to check out my options.  That's where I found the SafeRest mattress protector.  It looked like good quality and had great reviews so I ordered it.  It arrived within 2 days.  I was a little nervous initially because I did not want a "plastic" like feel under my sheets even though I wanted the mattress protector to be waterproof.  This mattress protector fit the bill on both counts.  It is great quality, fit like a glove and there is no plastic feel or noise.  It keeps the bed a comfortable temperature and has no odor whatsoever.  Highly recommend.  Great Product!!

review_title: My wife has late stage Alzheimers and this is great. Even with night pads in her depends she ...
review_body: My wife has late stage Alzheimers and this is great.  Even with night pads in her depends she leaks.  Now I just have to wash this instead of removing and washing sheets.

I ordered three of these (2x twin, 1x queen), thinking they would be really good from all the positive reviews on here. I unzipped the package and took one look and decided to return. The entire thing is extremely thin. The waterproof layer (assuming it even would work since it is so thin) only covers the top, not the sides. The sides look so cheap that I think they will rip. I don't think this product would be comfortable at all under the sheets. Very disappointed.

I’m giving it 2 stars for now. I bought it for my queen size bed, because my puppy has urination problems and he will leak small drops of urine when she sleeps. I’ve had for 3 weeks easy to sleep on, don’t really notice it.. The issue that I have is that my little puppy had an accident and having small drips here and there the urine went straight through to my super nice mattress. The mattress is stained and smells like urine. It’s kinda hard to replace a 800$ mattress. The product wasn’t waterproof. I might as well have laid more blankets.. Really disappointing. I did purchase a second one, to see if it occurs again.

After reading some reviews on how the product is NOT waterproof, etc, etc, I was reluctant to buy it.  But because we bought a brand new mattress for our son, I decided to make the purchase.  I noted that there are very specific wash instructions for this cover, which makes sense to protect it's integrity.  It is important to note that proper washing ensures the durability and effectiveness of the product.  My 4 yo has not had any issues thus far in the bedwetting department, but I will update my review if/when that happens.

review_title: We absolutely love this mattress cover
review_body: We absolutely love this mattress cover. We have it on our King bed, and it has saved our mattress more times than I can count. It is so quiet, and breathes really well. If it is really saturated, and is left on the mattress for a long time, it will eventually become moist on the back (because it is meant to be a little breathable so you don't feel like you are sleeping on plastic), but it has to be for a really long time. I loved having this mattress protector on my own king bed so much that we put them on all 7 mattress that we have in our vacation rental house, and it has proven its worth there as well. It can handle large amounts of liquid, and is a life saver!!! I can't say enough good things about the SafeRest Premium Hypoallergenic mattress protector!

It is as described and makes no noise and does not make us sweat while sleeping as others do. If the price becomes better, I will likely purchase a spare for laundry day. -- Updated review: I have now ordered three of these because they work well. Our mattress has had several accidents - spills and animals - and these have worked every time, even after already being washed and dried. I just wish they were a little less expensive.

review_title: This has better quality than its "classic" counterpart
review_body: I actually bought the Classic version first before buying this one and I'm mentally hitting myself in the head for doing that! I should have heeded the reviews and stuck with the premium version. There's a vast difference in the quality between the two. The premium version feels less plasticky than the classic one and doesn't sound like rustling plastic whenever you shift around on your mattress. The classic version feels like polyester both inside and outside, while the premium version is polyester on the inside and has this nice fabric feel on the outside that prevents it from rustling. The premium one is also much softer.

I decided to try these because they were a good price with Amazon coupon, but we're disappointed with their performance. They leave small pieces of (almost dusty) white residue when you dry your hands. We won't be purchasing again.

review_title: Amazing quality! Nothing compares to Viva
review_body: The only paper towels I use now!

The material is very rough not like regular napkin

review_title: sorry to say these are among the worst quality paper towels

I hate how these paper towels stick

leaves a lot of fibers behind during surface cleaning
Paper towels are molded.  Several out of a 6 pack.
I like to price & quantity but each sheet "sticks" to the roll.  You have to pry it off in order to tear the sheet off.  You can't get a paper towel with one hand.

review_title: Change of mind its a POS not a POT!!!!
review_body: Great pressure cooker. Easy to use and clean. Not like old fashion pressure cookers that you fear would explode or injure. This has many safety features built in that keep you from harm. There are endless amounts of recipes or even jarring uses for this too. It cuts down on cooking and wait time by hours. The food taste amazing.. UPDATE 3.30.2017 I originally gave this 5 stars. But after only a handful of uses the device now seems to have  stopped functioning. It will not build up pressure. I have read numerous articles on this issue and many claim it just needs cleaning. The device is very clean and yet doesn't build up pressure. I have ruined 2 pasta dinners  after it failed to build pressure  and had to spend alot of time trying to clean the pot after it burned to the bottom of the pot. Last evening we tried it one more time cause we wanted to make cheese and grits for an office party the next day. It was late and we figured it would take 10 mins in the pressure cooker. Nope, again it failed to build pressure and burnt to the bottom of the pot.  If this device is only good for a few uses it's needs to be taken off the market.

We are sending ours back.  It's not nearly as versatile as we had hoped for, and ultimately it's just a pressure cooker.  The rice function is crap.  When you sautee you need to be very careful that it's completely de-glazed, otherwise the burn warning goes off no matter how much water you add for the pressure cook... then you add so much water that any sauce or broth is watered down!. The lid smells.  It reeks,  It cannot be helped. I used practically boiling water to clean it.  I removed the seal, the pressure cover, the steam cover.  All of it.  Soap, soaking in vinegar, everything.  Walked into our kitchen and when I walked past it smelled foul.  Nope.  If I have to go through that just to clean it, then the time savings to pressure cook is just not worth the exchange for a watered down flavor.. THUMBS DOWN- over-hyped.  Sending it back today and getting a multi-cooker!. UPDATE- as we were packaging up to return... discovered a CRACK on the lid!  We have had our slow cooker for at least 15 years!  We haven't even had this thing for two weeks.  What a piece of junk.

review_title: some of them doing a good job but this one by far is the best ...
review_body: This is the most complete I've ever bought. I've had owned several pressure cookers in the past, some of them doing a good job but this one by far is the best one ever. My complaints with pressure cookers were that at some point the flavor of the food was lost and also I had to use a pan to sauté for seasoning the meat, beans etc. With this one is different, you sauté your condiments, mix with the meats, beans, etc and forget about your meal. In just a few minutes it would be ready, leaving you with a delicious, nutritive meal

review_title: Perfect for 2 people and still have leftovers!
review_body: This is the perfect size for a 2 person family.  We can make chili without soaking the beans!  Also, we just 1/2 Instantpot recipes on the net and we still have leftovers for other days.

review_title: How Do I Love Thee, Instant Pot Duo?  Let Me Count the Ways....
review_body: The Instant Pot 7 in 1 Duo is the latest generation Instant Pot, and my THIRD Instant Pot!  Did I NEED this one?  Not  r e a l l y, but I sure did WANT it!!  It has so many brilliant features that it always seems to be on the counter. While we had one recipe in the pot, it always seemed to there was something that we could have ready to go if only we had another stainless steel inner liner.  Because my husband is equally addicted, shortly after that came the second pot, The Smart Pot.  The differences in the 7 in 1 Duo pot and the first pot, The Lux, are VAST--. I no longer have to wonder where to put a hot lid. It fits conveniently into the slots on either side on the handles. The MULTI-TEMPERATURE cooking levels ensure perfectly cooked EVERY time, including the SAUTE button that can be used to sear meats or saute vegetables. Here is a quick list of some of our favorite food, for which we faithfully use our Instant Pots regularly. And by that, I mean daily!. Stocks and broths from scratch• Soup from scratch• Quinoa in one-minute•Steel cut oats, 3 minutes• Hard-boiled eggs there are easy to peel and come out perfectly every time•Thai Congee•Chilis of numerous varieties•Frozen chicken/meat, etc., which turns out fork-tender•Whole winter squash!.   I've learned an enormous amount from the authors who sell pressure cooker books on Amazon. Jill Nussinow is one of them. When I  contacted her asking a few questions, imagine my surprise when she wrote right back to me! Laura Pazzaglia is another not only legendary author but, also a knowledgeable person about all things Instant Pot.  After you purchase your Instant Pot and are feeling lost- don't hesitate to contact cookbook authors..   I don't work for Instant Pot or these authors. I do derive great joy from all three, however!

review_title: A Great Gadget You Will Actually Use!
review_body: What an awesome idea! One unit takes the place of multiple products! You can use it as a pressure cooker as well as a slow cooker! Saves time and dishes because you can saute then cook in the same pot. It has a rice button, a soup button, you can even make homemade yogurt in it (there's a button for that, too!) There are so many recipes out there in books and online, you should never run out of options! My favorite thing to make in it is mashed potatoes! You can cook the potatoes and use a hand mixer right in the pot when they're done! This wonderful little gadget not only saves on time, but also saves on clean up because you don't need to wash as many dishes, and saves on space because it is so many things rolled into one! Great wedding gift or even for the college student or someone who may be moving a lot as well as someone who doesn't have a lot of storage space.

review_title: Amazon sent me a used Instant Pot
review_body: I was so excited to purchase the instant pot & had a recipe ready to go. The IP-DUO60 arrived this morning. I opened the box to find a used IP, complete with food stains around lid, inner pot, & control buttons. Disgusting. I am returning for a replacement. Will update review after replacement arrives.

review_title: Instant Pot IP-DUO60 7-in-1 Programmable Pressure Cooker with Stainless...
review_body: Since I bought this I haven't used the stove.  Everything I make in it gets great!  Food has a better flavor than when made in a manual pressure cooker.. This one pot cooking- from saute to pressure cook to slow cook all in one pot! Just put ingredients in- set the time- and go about your business.  When the time is up, It automatically sets to warm.. Keep in mind that it only goes to about 11-12 psi.  That hasn't been an issue for me but I guess it would for canning (should be 15 psi).. This is my first electric pressure cooker and I look forward to using it every day.  My husband asks me what am I going to put in the pot for dinner today, everyday!. I even made hard boiled eggs to perfection.. After I make a roast (a frozen roast in 45 minutes and it falls apart), I will remove the roast and let it rest.  In the meantime I will put my veggies in the broth from the roast, set it for 9 minutes.  What a time saver.. I normally don't eat pork until I got this pressure cooker.  Pork falls apart!. I do wish Instant Pot would come out with an 8 quart.. Do yourself a favor and order an extra pot insert and a lid.. One con would be the rubber seal picks up an odor from everything you make.  I wash it each time I use it and store it outside of the pot.. I haven't used this to it's full potential yet, so I will update with more results.

Had just over one year. Very disappointed. This electrical failure happened when I was cooking chicken a week ago. We started to smell something like plastic and this is what happened. Very scared what might have happened if we had not been home. Nothing seems to last anymore.

review_title: Check to make sure every function works!
review_body: First one I received only had a few functioning buttons and did not work in any low temperature settings.  Returned it and second one works great, which is why I rated it four stars. But make sure you check every function as soon as possible after receiving it or you could get stuck! I was almost too late to exchange it. (I also read other reviewer's who said they had similar problems with nonfunctioning units, which is why I wanted to test every function.  This admittedly takes several hours.)  Other than that, it makes perfect, fluffy brown rice, although not with the preset rice button.  (The rice button is only for regular white rice.)  I thought the stainless cookpot might be a problem cleaning after using the pressure cooker function, but it's not. Overall, I really like the various functions as it has made it somewhat easier for my husband to use it, as well. I do find, however, that we both need the manual to remember how to operate it for our recipes, as many do not conform to the preset function buttons.  Also, I have to remember to be very careful when releasing the steam to do it very slowly and to avoid reaching directly over the unit (which is my first instinct), or I get scolded. Nevertheless, I would buy it again without hesitation.

Great scale! It gives a very precise and fast reading , the only thing is that once you step on a scale again right after the first time, it will give you a 5 lbs lighter reading , so I think the scale needs some time to reload or whatever . If you give it a minute and step on it again it will give you the right reading . Tricky but reasonable . It looks very nice and its light , the top part is made of glass so don't drop it. Overall happy with my purchase

review_title: dont give as a wedding anniversary gift
review_body: My husband was in big trouble after forgetting our wedding anniversary. i scathingly told him, "Tomorrow there better be something in the driveway for me that goes zero to 200 in 2 seconds flat.". The next morning the I found a small package in the driveway. When opened it I found a new bathroom scale.. Funeral arrangements for my husband have been set for this Saturday at 9am

review_title: getting in better shape. Decided it was time to get a ...
review_body: I have a really old scale that I occasionally use at home. But I've decided to start the journey of being more healthy, getting in better shape. Decided it was time to get a nice new scale. I read quite a few reviews of a handful of scales and decided on this one. The look was appealing to me and so was the price.. I received it last week and have used it a few times. It comes with the 2 AAA batteries that it needs. Each time I've used it have worked perfectly fine. No weird or crazy weights have shown.

This is a new purchase so I can't gauge long-term function, but it appears to be a well made, sturdy product. I appreciate how quickly it analyzes weight and the back light is extremely helpful to these old eyes. ;)  I see no reason not to expect great service from it.

So I finally decided to buy a new scale after misplacing my old one after we moved. I found this scale for a decent price so I bought it and I wasn't overly thrilled the problem I have with it is that it's always so sporadic and it never reads the same and if you move it and inch it will be off as many as 5 pounds!!!! Although I think most digital scales are notorious for this Ive learned my lesson and won't get another, But overall it does give you a general idea of what you weigh

review_title: It will fluctuate up to 4 pounds which is very annoying when you are trying to track your weight loss ...
review_body: This does not give a consistent weight. It will fluctuate up to 4 pounds which is very annoying when you are trying to track your weight loss progress.

review_title: Great scale, great price, great look, worth buying.
review_body: It's a scale, and it's blue and black, and it's accurate.  What more can you say?. Well, my bathroom is done in black and white so I was looking for a scale that would fit in.  Even though you never see it, except for a few seconds at a time when it's in use, it's still nice.  For the price, it's great.  I love the glass top, it's nice and thick and I don't feel like I'm going to break it when i take it out and put it back. It sits easily on my tile floor, and quickly and accurately displays my weight.. Now, this doesn't work well on carpet (unless you're trying to lose weight, then it works great), and accuracy is an issue if you're unfamiliar with digital scales in general.  First, you really should tap the center top (right under the display, I use my foot...) to zero the scale out and turn it on, THEN step on with your feet centered and stay still until it flashes your weight.  If you just jump on, jump off, and have your feet and balance all over the place like you're jumping off a roof as Liam Neeson looking for his family, then it's going to be inaccurate as any scale would be.. Overall, great purchase, and I didn't have to go to Wal-Mart, double win.

I really love this scale. It's slim and reads the weight fast. I know it's accurate because I had gone to the doctors recently and got the same weight. The background where the numbers are lights up so you can always see them even in the dark. Would definitely recommend.

I received the replacement and tried it out and this one is also doing the same thing. For context, I'm a 6'7" man. Both scales weigh me in 210-215 lbs. it just isn't possible. So I was pretty disappointed with having to troubleshoot something that was made to put on the ground and stepped on. So I don't really have a working product but is it worth it?

review_title: I like the scent, but these could be stronger
review_body: First, I really like the smell. Our trash can is lidless, so anything that can help the smell is A+ in my book.. But for all the claims of reinforcements, these tear much too easily. Luckily, it's usually a tear near the top of the bag so you can still carefully carry the trash out, but it's rather annoying. review_title: Perfectly developed for hiding noxious odors
review_body: Don't pay attention to people claiming the scent is too strong or bad.  It's just right for knocking out severe odors trash can cause.  I use these bags for my RV to avoid using the black tank.  These bags combined with poo powder and sometimes kitty litter eliminates -all- odors, which is important in the small space of an RV. No chemicals. No odors. No black tank filth to deal with. These bags are perfect when you want to cover up any kind of noxious odor.

My favorite smell on earth is fresh cleaned clothes.  Especially when they are cleaned with gain.  I like that they have flexible stretchy plastic and I haven't had any tear through despite me putting awkwardly shaped items in them.  I only wish that Gain was a scent that kept squirrels away.  Still looking for that one.

I had choices when I purchased Brita at the first time and I'm stuck to it now because its quality is awesome!. My water tastes really great and I love this 3 pack deal on Amazon.. It's not too many for one person to use for 6 months, and this set doesn't take too much shelf space.

When I returned the underside was bone dry. Not the most scientific test, but I am satisfied. It also does not make any crinkle or other weird noises when moving on the mattress. No unusual smells I can detect either. Satisfied with purchase :)

My kids have definitely peed their beds countless times, and these mattress cover are amazing!  They wash easily in the washing machine and they protect the mattress thoroughly! 😃😃

review_title: ... my potty training two year old and I'm so glad I did
review_body: I bought two of these for my potty training two year old and I'm so glad I did! Upon receiving them I did a little test and poured water on the sheets then applied pressure to that area, absolutely no water leaked through. Thankfully my daughter has only peed the bed once but when I took the sheet off, the mattress underneath didn't even have the faintest pee smell. I'm so happy I found these sheets and definitely recommend them!

review_title: Wonderful! Saved My Memory Foam Bed!
review_body: I have ordered several of these mattress protectors for our Zinus Memory Foam Beds. My husband eats his breakfast in the bed and often spills things ( he denies it :) and if it weren't for these protective covers, my mattress would be stained. I purchased 2 per bed so while one is washing, I have a spare one to use. They also are waterproof  (never any stains on my bed) but they are breathable which you will need for your memory foam bed. We LOVE these protectors. They are not plastic feeling like others. Very nice and it fits all of our mattresses perfectly.

I wouldn’t recommend this. Sometimes it stops the pee from going thru if my dog pees on my bed but most of the time it doesn’t I have pee spots on my brand new mattress bc it went through. There’s so many mixed reviews so I decided to give it a try but I’d recommend trying another brand

Solution to my pets urinary incontinence. After ruining a costly memory foam mattress, I searched for waterproof mattress pads that are comfortable and effective. This pad is exactly that. The cloth cover is soft and the waterproof layer is hardly noticeable once it is covered with a bed sheet. The pad does not hold heat like some other pads have been noted to do. It's machine washable and after several "incidents" I can attest to it's protection!

I've bought so many different mattress covers for my boys twin beds. They always tear, rip or are just completely not durable. Generally, I am purchasing a new one within months of purchase. This product changes that... they are amazing and just as good as the $100 mattress protectors we have bought. No signs of wear or tear over the time we've had them. They are holding up to all that my two active boys can throw at them. I highly recommend this product and in fact, I won't buy any other. They are affordable, breathable, not hot, not crinkly and excellent quality. I've purchased these for all of our beds now. The oldest is almost 2 years old now and still going strong. Others barely made it 6 months with my boys before needing to be replaced. A must have for any home...

review_title: but it looks like it would perform well
review_body: The product arrived quickly and frankly it exceeded my expectations in terms of appearance and perceived quality.  It fit well onto our queen bed.  I guess we won't know about performance until it is put to a test, which I hope never happens, but it looks like it would perform well.  But it is nice to know it is there in case it is tested along the way. I plan to buy another for a different bed in our home.

Also the semi-wraparound fit is off and.  needless to say, found an alternative that fit much better and without noise.  As a heads up, we were charged return shipping on this.  Do yourself a favor and pass on this and go to one of the many other well rated options.

review_title: It fits and stays in place!!!
review_body: Waterproof was not a factor for me, but my wife insisted on it for our expensive king size mattress. This is the third and last mattress cover that we will ever purchase. The biggest problem with the other ones is the fit. While the vinyl in the other ones detracts from the comfort of the mattress, the poor fit causes the cover to bunch up and wrinkle, which leads to the fitted sheet coming untucked. This mattress cover fits like a glove, and absolutely stays in place, is very comfortable. Could not be happier.
